Akak a kts ms tayl, na Jess in kaniy na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan nin kidhb na Jakobo ani kale jajkitsik ba jun i tekat chn.
Taja, na Jess in jalkuy tinb tin tamt nin exbaliltsik xi kalnek kal Jaj. Nin wal chaxkin jelti na kts ani nin kudhkmil dhaknib jelti an tajaxtalb.
Tmki jachan, in chuutsik jeye na Moiss ani na Elas, ti tiloll kal na Jess.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, alwa tajat abal tech u kwajat! Max Tat a l, neech ki taja x i padhel, jn abal Tat, jn abal na Moiss ani jn abal na Elas.

Lejat na Pedro kwajat ti kw, dhabyattsik kal jun i chaxixl tokow ani ban tokow achatm jun i kwintalb, xu kw in ulu ench: —Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat ani in kulbl tajat kal Jaj. Ka axtsitsik xowa Jaj in ulal.
Tam tin achatsik jech, an exbaltsik tudhlan kututsik asta chabl ani jikeytsik tajat.
Utey tm na Jess xon ti kwajattsik, takan ani utsantsik ench: —Ki chakaytsik ani yab ki jikey.
Tam ti chakaytsik ani in tela, yab ms xita in chuu, tokot na Jess kwetm.
Tam ti exomich ti paltsik ban chn, utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab xita ka tiltsi xowa a chuutsik, asta tam kin chemdh Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik ani in ejnekich ti t.
Konyat tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Jantki p tm an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss tin ulaltsik ke kool ka tsch okox na Elas?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax kejle ke na Elas neech ka tsch okox ani neech kin lejkiy ejtal.
Por Nan tu utsltsik ke na Elas tsinekich, por yab exl, tokot tajtsin xowa ka len. Anchan neye ti neech kin tajtsin Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
In exbch tm an exbaltsik ke na Jess kwajat in till na Juan xu pujax.
Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik, utukn na Jess kal jun i inik, tudhlan tin tamt ani utsan ench:
—Ajtik, ka kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb nu chakmil; pos ochadh kal i atax ejattalb ani in achl tajat i yajtsiktalb; ynlich kwajlank ba kamal ani ba ja.
U tsidhantsm na exbaliltsik, por yab in ejtmal kin kldhantsi an ti atax ejattalb.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, yab lejtal tajat i belom ani i walablomtsik tajat! Asta jowki kool kin kwajay kal tattsik? Asta jowki kool tu kuxuytsik? Ka tsidha tech an kwitl.
In kwiya tm na Jess an atax ejattalb, kale ani tmki jachan jilkon jelnek an kwitl.
Tayl an exbaltsik in kaniy tm plki na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Jantki waw ti yab i ejto ki kldha an atax ejattalb?

Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Pos tattsik w tajat ta belom. Tsubax tu utsltsik max i belomak ela w, jelt in publ jun in itsch i mostasa, neech ka ejto ka utsatsik jech an chn: “Ki wixkin tech ani ki kale pl” ani an chn neech ka kale. Ejtal neech ka ejto ka tajatsik max i belomak.
Por jelti jech an atax ejattalb tokot neech ka ejtotsik ka kldha max ki lan ani ki klin.
Tam ti kwajattsik Galilea, na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Nanich xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban walablom iniktsik
ani neech kin chemdh, por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t. Tam tin achatsik jech xowa utsan, tepintsik tajat.

Tam ti na Jess ani nin exbaliltsik ulich ban bitsow xi Kapernam, utukn na Pedro kal xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb kal tin kwenta an at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani konyat ench: —Yabxe Ja in pidhnl na Oktsxal an jalbixtalb abal an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios?

Tkon ench na Pedro: —In pidhnl. Tam ti na Pedro ochich alt, tsusbl ti utsan ench kal na Jess: —Janta chutal, Simn? An oklektsik xi tech ti kayl jita nin kontsaltsik an ti jalbixtalb nin at kidhtaltsik o xi pltsik?
Tkoyat ench kal na Pedro: —Xi pltsik. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Tm, yab yejat ka jalbixin xi techtsik.

Por abal yab ki itixbdhatsik, ki kale ban pujal, ka petna nin jixb an tool ani ka yakwa an jidhtal tool xi ka palkan. Ka chatsi tin wi ani taja neech ka ela jun i patl tumn, ka jixtsi ani ka jna abal ka jalbiy xi tat a lujyal ani xi Nan neye.
Tam ti jachan i kij, utey an exbaltsik ba na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Jita j na ms ultalb xon tu takix na Dios?
In kaniy tm na Jess jun i chakam kwitl, in kwajba junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik
ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max yabtsik ka jalkuy tab ani yabtsik ka junu jelti an chakamtsik, yab neech ka ejto ki kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios.
Jaxtm, xita na ms ultalb xon tu takix na Dios, jaich xin chakl tinb ani in junwal jelti jech an chakam.
Ani xita in bachwal jun i chakam jelti jech kal Nan tu bij, Nan tin bachwal.
Xita kin walbindha jn ti b jech an chakamtsik xi tin bellichtsik, ms alwa abal an walbindhom ka wiktsin bin nk jun i yejche cha tujub ani ka petn ban pujal abal ka luychin.
Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl abal waach tajat xantokl ti ka walbindh! Echeki neech ka wachin xantokl ti ka walbindh, por chojontl in chubl xita ka walbindhaxin!

Jaxtm, max na kubak o na akan ti walbindhl, ka kotoy ani ka petna w; pos ms alwa ki ochich mocho o kweche ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab kal chablam na kubak o chablam na akan ki petn ban kibeltalb.
Ani max na wal ti walbindhl, ka jixa ani ka petna w; pos ms alwa ki ochich ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal jn tokot na wal ani yab kal chablam na wal ki petn ban kibeltalb.
Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka pojkatsik ni jun xita xi tin bellichtsik. Pos tu utsltsik ke nin tokat abatwlejiltsik t walki echeki kwajat tin tamt nu Tta xi kwajat walki.
Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, in tsinek ku loo xi kibchonkichtsikwiik ti kwajat.
Jan ta chutaltsik? Max jun i inik in kool bo inik i borregotsik ani kin kibdha jn, yabxe neech kin jila xi che inik lajubelju abal ka kale ban chnlom kin aliy xi kibchonk?
Ani max kin ela, tu utsltsik tsubax ke ms neech ka kulb kal tin kwenta jachan xi kibchonk k kal tin kwenta xi che inik lajubelju xi yab kibchonk.
Anchan jeye, na Tta xi kwajat walki, yab in l kin chuu ka kibchon ni jun xita.
Max na at kidhb ti tajtsi jun xata yab alwa, ki kale abal ki tilololch tatkitsik. Max ti ki axtsi xowa ka utsa, neech tm kin exbay ke yab alwa xowa in taja.
Por max yab ti ki axtsi, ka kaniy tm jn o chb i belomtsik abal ka tawn jeye kal chb o x i belomtsik.

Max yab jeye kin axtsi xi jechtsik, ka ulu tm tin tamt an kidhblbtsik; ani max yab jeye kin axtsi an kidhblbtsik, ka kchtsik tm jelti jun i pl inik o jelti jun i bachkul jalbixtalb xi yab in exll a Dios.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita ka pakwlantsitsik tech ti kayl, neech jeye ka pakwlantsat t walki ani xita yab ka pakwlantsitsik tech ti kayl, yab jeye neech ka pakwlantsat t walki.
Tu utsltsik jeye, ke max chb xi tattsik a kidhtal xi kwajat tech ti kayl kin tajatsik i kw abal kin kontsi jun xata nu Tta xi kwajat walki, neech ka pidhantsik.
Abal xon ti ka junkun chb o x kal Nan tu bij, taja neye in kwajat kal jajtsik.
Utukn tm na Jess kal na Pedro ani konyat ench: —Ajtik, jyl kool ku pakwlantsi nu at kidhb max tin waltsi? Asta bkl?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab neech tu utsa ke tokot bkl, yejat ka pakwlantsi echeki.
Jaxtm, xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i pulek takix xin lena kin taja i kwenta kal nin tojnliltsik.
Tam ti tm in tujwal kin taja an kwenta, uldhantsat jun xita xu jntsinal kl yn i tumn.
Kom jachan an tjontsix yab in kool xan ti kin jalbiy, an pulek takix in ulu abal ka nujwat jachan an tjontsix kl nin tomtal, nin chakmiltsik ani ejtal xowa in kool abal ka jalbin nin jntsixtal.
Tudhlan jachan an tjontsix tin tamt an pulek takix ani in pakabdha ench: “Ajtik, ti kin aytsintsi neye ani neech tu jalbintsi ejtal xowa tu jntsal.”
Kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal nin ajtik, pakwlantsat an tin jntsixtal ani walk.
Por tam ti kale jachan an tjontsix, in ela jun in at tjontsix, xu jntsinal kl w i tumn. In yakwa bin nk ani in tuju kin kuchdha, in utsa ench: “Tin witsbantsi xi tin jntsal!”
Tudhlan tm nin at tojnal tin tamt ani pakabdh ench: “Tin aytsintsi neye ani neech tu jalbintsi ejtal xowa tu jntsal.”
Por jaj yab in lena kin aytsintsi, kale kin ulu ka balyat ban wikaxte asta kin jalbiy ejtal xu jntsinal.
Tam tin chuu nin at tojnaltsik xowa tmun, tepintsik tajat ani kaletsik kin tiltsi an ajtiklb ejtal xowa tmun.
In abna tm an ajtiklb ka kanyat an tojnal xi yab pakwlantsixin ani in utsa ench: “Atax tjontsix! Nan tu pakwlantsi ejtal ta jntsixtal, abal tin pakabdha.
Yabxe yejat ka pakwlantsiwiik teye na at tojnal, jelt xan ti nan tu pakwlantsi?”
An ajtiklb chakuy tajat ani in ulu ka atax tajtsin an tojnal xi yab pakwlantsixin asta kin jalbiy ejtal xowa in jnl.
&Anchan jeye neech kin taja kal tattsik nu Tta xi kwajat walki, max yab ka pakwlantsitsik na at kidhbtsik kal ejtal na ejattal.
Tam ti na Jess okon kin ulu ejtal jech, kale Galilea ani kale ban chabl xi Judea xi kwajat tin ejtsm kalel kts kal an walja Jordn.
Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn ani in jeldha taja an yaultsik.
Utukn tm na Jess kal chb x i fariseotsik ani abal ka taktamiyat, konyat ench: —Alwaxe kin jila jun xita nin tomtal kal xowakichki tin kwenta?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe a ajymaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab, ke tam ti tujeyki, na Dios in taja jun i inik ani jun i mmlb?
In ulu jeye ench: “Jaxtm, an inik neech kin jila nin tta ani nin nna abal ka kwajay junax kal nin tomtal ani xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
Yabich chb ti neech ka jin, jn tokot. Jaxtm, an inik yab yejat kin kxliy xowa in jnkxliymal na Dios.
Konyat tm ench na Jess: —Jantki p tm na Moiss tin ulu ka pidhan an tomiklb mmlb jun i w xon tin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti neech ka jilan?
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —In ulu ka tajan anchan, kom tattsik watats ta tanchu; jaxtm tin ulu ke awil ka jilatsik na tomtal, por tam ti tujeyki yab anchan ti tujenek.

Nan tu utsltsik ke xin jilltsik nin tomtal ani yab abal u junkunal kal keet ani ka tomkin kal keet i mmlb, u walbinalich kal i uxmbetalb; ani xita ka tomkin kal jun i jiladh mmlb, u walbinalich jeye kal i uxmbetalb.
Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Max anchan u tmnal, ms alwa abal an inik yab ka tomkin.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab ejtalki neech kin ejto ka kwajay kwetm, tokotki xi bijtsidh kal na Dios ke anchan neech ka kwajay.

Yn waach xantki tin kwenta ti yab neech kin ejto ka tomkin an iniktsik: taltsik u wachinal abal yab ka tomkin, taltsik yab in ejtowal ka tomkin abal tajtsidh jun xata kal an iniktsik ani taltsik yab u tomkinal abal in l kin tjontsi na Dios ani ka kwajay taknl kal Jaj. Xita in ejtowal ka kwajay kwetm, ka kwajay kwetm.
Utuntsat tm na Jess chb x ti chakamtsik abal kin kwajba nin kubak ban chakamtsik ani ka lan kal jajtsik tin kwenta; por an exbaltsik tujey kin kwiya xita nin utwal an chakamtsik.

In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Ka walkatsik ti kin utukna an chakamtsik ani yab ka tamkuytsik; pos xita kin walka tinb ka takyat kal na Dios, jelt xan tin walkl tinb ka takyat jun i chakam, jachan jaich xi neech kin ejtotsik ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
In kwajba tm nin kubak ban chakamtsik ani tayl kale pl.
Kale ti chutb na Jess kal jun i kwitl ani konyat ench: —Alwa Oktsix, jantom alwatalb yejat ku taja abal ku ejto ku koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin bijyal tin alwa? Jn tokot waach xita alwa, na Dios. Por max a l ka koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, ka taja xowa in ulal an takixtalb.
Konyat ench kal an kwitl: —Jowa takixtalb? Ani tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita,
ka kakna na tta ani na nna ani ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.
Utsan ench kal an kwitl: —Ejtal jech u tajl asta tin chipl, janty ms yejat ku taja?

Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Max a l lejtal ki xechin lujat, ki kale ka nuju ejtal xowa a kool ani ka pidha an ti tumn an chojontltsik, anchan neech ka koy t walki xowa xin jalbl; ki tsch tm ani ti kin wwna.
Tam ti an kwitl in acha jech, u tepinal tajat ti kale, abal jaj yn xata in kool.
Utsan tm ench an exbaltsik kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tojlb tajat kin jila tinb ka takyat kal a Dios jun i tumnladh inik.
Tu utsltsik jeye, ke ms yab tojlb ka watey jun i konl xin bij kameyo bin chultl jun i tidhab k kin walka tinb jun i tumnladh inik ka takyat kal na Dios.
Tam ti an exbaltsik in acha jech, labantsik tajat ani knxin jajkitsik ench: —Pos jita p tm neech kin ejto ka loey?
Teloloyattsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, por an iniktsik, yaba. Tokot na Dios in ejtowal kin loo xitakichki.
Konyat tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, waw i jilmal ejtal xowa i kool abal ku xechin kal Tat, janty p weye neech ki koy?

Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tam kin bajaw an kij tam ejtal ka tmdhjich, tam Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, kin buxkan bu tokat kwajtal, tattsik xi tin wwnmal, neech ki buxkantsik teye ba lajuchb i tokat kwajtalb. Neech ki buxkantsik abal ka ljundha nin kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.

Ani ejtal xin jilmaltsik in kim, o in kidhbtsik, in ixmtsik, in tta o in nna, in tomtal, in chakmiltsik o in chabliltsik, kal Nanki tu kwenta, neech ka pidhantsik ms yn kal na Dios ani neech jeye kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Por yn xi xo kwajattsik ultalb, neech ka jilkon tayl ani yn xi xo kwajat tayl, neech ka kwajaytsik ultalb.
Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i dhabal tjomtalb xi kale dhajawe ti lim tojnaltsik abal ka kale ti tojnal xon tin kool tayadh i uba.
In ela an tojnaltsik ani utsan neech ka tolmiyat. In utsa neech kin jalbiytsik jun i denario ta kts ani in aba ti tojnaltsik xon tin kool tayadh an uba.
Tayl, tam ti beljujich xna i dhajaw, kale jun, in ela keet xi yabtsik xata in tojnl
ani in utsatsik ench: “Ki kaletsik teye ta tojnal xon tu kool tayadh an uba ani neech tu pidhatsik xowa in tomnl ka ta.” Ani kaletsik.
An dhabal tojlb kale jun tam ti chejelich a kts ani tam ti xich i wkal ani anlki tin taja.
Tam ti bich i wkal, kale jun ani in ela keet xi ta ti kwajattsik yab xata in tajl ani in utsatsik ench: “Jantki ta kwajattsik tech putl a kts yab xata a tojnl?”
Tkoyat ench: “Techki u kwajat kom yab xita tu kanymal tu tojnal.” Utsantsik tm ench: “Ki kaletsik teye ta tojnal xon tu kool tayadh an uba ani neech tu pidhatsik xowa in tomnl ka ta.”

Tam ti jikwchinich, an dhabal alelb in utsa ench an oklek tojnal: “Ka kaniy an tojnaltsik ani ka jalbiy, okox ka jalbiy xi taylichtsik ti ochenek ti tojnal ani taylich ka jalbiy xi okoxtsik ti ochenek.”
Ulichtsik tm xi ochenektsik ti tojnal bich i wkal ani kidhat jeye pidhantsik juntsik i denario.
Tayl, tam tin bajchtsik jeye kin bachutsik nin jalbl xi okoxtsik ti ochenek ti tojnal, in chalpay ke ms yandha neech ka pidhantsik; por tokot jeye juntsik i denario pidhan.
Tam tin bachutsik, tujeytsik ti itixbl
ani in utsatsik ench an dhabal tojlb: “Jechtsik xi ulich taylich, tokot tjontsik jun i ora ani anlki jeye ta jalbiytsik jelti waw, xu tjnk ani i kuxymal nin yjtsk an kakal putl a kts.”
Por an dhabal tojlb tkon ani in utsa ench jn ti b xi kwajat an ti kw: “Jab, yab exom tu tajtsal ni jun xata yab alwa. Yabxe tu utsa abal jn tokot i denario neech tu jalbiy ta kts?
Ka bachu na jalbl ani ki kalch. Por nan u l ku pidha anlki jeye xan tu pidha tat jech xi ochich taylich an ti tojnal.
Awxe yab alwa ku taja xowa nan u l kal xowa u kool? O i chakl abal a chutal ke nan in alwa inik?”
Pos anchan p, xi xo kwajat ultalbtsik, neech ka jilkon tayl ani xi xo kwajat tayl, neech ka kwajaytsik ultalb. Pos yn tajat xi kanidhtsik, por w tajat xi takudhtsik.
Tam ti na Jess nechich abal Jerusaln, in kaniy plki xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench:

—A chutaltsik ke u nechich Jerusaln ani taja, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban oklek pletsik ani ban oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Neech kin ulutsik abal kin chemdh
ani neech kin pidhn ban pl iniktsik abal kin labdhn kal jajtsik, neech kin lekbayat ani neech kin chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te; por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
Utey tm ba Jess nin nna na Jakobo ani na Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo junax kal jajtsik ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess abal kin kontsi jun i alwatalb.
Konyat ench kal na Jess: —Janty a l? In ulu ench an nnalb: —Tam kin bajaw xowki neech ta takixich, tu kontsal ke jn ti b nu chakmil ka buxkan ta ejt ani xi jn ta kwatab.
Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik yab a chob xanty a konyal. Neechxe ka ejto ka watnatsik an yajtsiktalb xi neech ku watna ani an cheml jeye? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Neech ki ejto.

Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Ani kejle. Tattsik neech ka watnatsik jech an yajtsiktalb ani an cheml jeye; por kal tin kwenta xita neech ka buxkan tu ejt ani tu kwatab, yab Nan neech ku ulu, tokot neech ka buxkantsik xitam j na takudhtsik kal nu Tta.
Tam tin achatsik jech xi lju an exbaltsik, in chakuntsitsik xi jech chb an kidhblbtsik.
Kanyattsik tm kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Anchan xan ta chobichtsik, an pakdha takix u takix jelti ajtiklbtsik ani xi ms ultalbtsik, u chapik takixtsik tajat.
Por tattsik yab yejat ka taja anchan. Xita in l ka kwajay ms plek kal tattsik, yejat kin tjontsi ejtalki
ani xita in l ka kwajay ms ultalb kal tattsik, yejat kin tjontsi ejtalki.
Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab in tsinek abal kin tjontsat, in tsinek tin tjontsix ani ku pidhna tub kin chemdh abal ku jalbiy an loeltalb xi yn neech kin bachutsik.
Tam ti exomichtsik ti kalel ban bitsow xi Jerik, kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn na Jess.
T ti buxutsik wal bl chb i jokoltsik ani tam tin achatsik ke na Jess exom ti watel taja, in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Ajtik, xi kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti ku yajnantsi weye!
Kwiyantsik kal an atiklbtsik abal ka chamkan, por jajtsik ms kawidh ti dhjaxintsik: —Ajtik, xi kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti ku yajnantsi weye!
Kubey tm na Jess, in kaniy an jokoltsik ani in konoytsik ench: —Janty a l tu tajtsitsik?
Jajtsik tkon ench: —Ajtik, ti ku chuxindha weye.
Kontsattsik tm ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Jess ani taktsintsik an tin wal. Tmki ti chuxin an jokoltsik ani in wwnatsik na Jess.
Tam ti kunatichtsik ti kwajat Jerusaln ani ulichtsik ban kwentsal xin bij Betfaj, xi kwajat kunat ban chn xin bij Olibos, na Jess in aba chb nin exbaliltsik
ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ban kwentsal xi n kwajat tametlb. Taja neech ka ela wikats jun i uxum burru ani taja jeye kwajat in tm. Ka wila ani ti kin tsidhantsi.
Ani max ki tawn kal jun xita, ka utsatsik abal an Ajtiklb in yntsal, por jikat neech kin witsba.
Jech tmun abal ka tjan xan tin ulmal an tiltsix, tam tin dhutsa ench:
Ka utsa an atiklbtsik xu kwajl Sin: “Ka tela, nich tl na Pulek Takxal, xin chakl tajat tinb, punat ba jun i burru, ba jun i burru, in tm jun i konl xu kitandhb.”
Kale tm an exbaltsik ani in taja jelt xan ti usnktsik kal na Jess.
In tsidhatsik an uxum burru kl nin tm, in tatlabiy kal nin kudhkmiltsik ani puney na Jess.
Ani yn an atiklbtsik xi taja ti neech, in nukltsik nin kudhkmil ban bl xon ti neech ka watey na Jess ani keettsik in pejl in kwel an te ani in umltsik ban bl.

An atiklbtsik xi neech okox ani xi tltsik jeye kuxlek, in ulaltsik kawidh ench: —Ajtik, xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti ku loch xo! Lbtajadh xi tl tin bij an Okxlb! Okxlb t walki, ti ku loch xo!
Tam ti na Jess ochich Jerusaln, ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja, xakwan ani yn konoxintsik ench: —Jitam j jeye jech an inik?
Ani an atiklbtsik in ulaltsik ench: —Jech jaich an tiltsix Jess, xu kwajl Nasaret, an bitsow xu taknal Galilea.

Tayl ochich na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in kldha elb ejtaltsik xi ta ti kwajat taja ti njultsik ani ti chaumtsik. In ketpantsi tin mesajil xi ta ti kwajattsik taja in jaltsal ti tumn an atiklbtsik. In ketpantsi jeye tin laktmil an njul kukutsik
ani in utsatsik ench: —Ban Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Nu kim abal i lbki ti bijidh neech ka yn”; por a wenkmalichtsik tin chinkontal i kw.
Taja ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, utukn na Jess kal chb x i jokoltsik ani i kwechetsik ani Jaj in jeldhatsik.

Por tam ti an oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb in chuu an labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl na Jess ani in achatsik jeye ke an chakamtsik kawidh in ulaltsik ench ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios: “Kin bachu an labidh tokattalb xu kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid!”, chakuytsik

ani in utsatsik ench na Jess: —A achlxe xanty in ulal xi jech kwajattsik? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —U achl. Yabxe a ajymaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab xan tin ulal kal jech tin kwenta? In ulal ench: A tajmal ke xi tsitsik ani an chakamtsik xi bl u tsutsul kin ajatna alwa i ajatlb.
Jilanichtsik tm kal na Jess. Kale tm na Jess ba jachan an bitsow, kale ban kwentsal xi Betania ani taja tin watna an akal.
Tam ti dhajaw, tam ti nechich jun ban bitsow, na Jess in acha u kal.

In chuu jun akanlek i igo bin wl an bl, utey taja, por yab in eltsi ni jun in wall, tokot in xekl. Utsan tm kal na Jess jachan nin akan an igo: —Yab jayki neech ki witsiy ta walim! Ani tmki ti wayey jachan nin akan an igo.
Tam ti an exbaltsik in chuu jech, labantsik tajat ani in konoytsik ench na Jess: —Jantki ti jikat tajat ti wayey nin akan an igo?

Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, max i belomtsik ani yab ka jlkkliytsik na chalab, yab tokotki neech ka ejto ka tajatsik xowa a chuu u tajtsi nin akan an igo, neech jeye ka ejtotsik ka utsa jech an chn: “Ki wixkin tech ani ka petna tab ban pujal” ani anchan neech ka tjan.
Ejtal xowa ka kontsitsik na Dios, max ka belatsik ke neech ti pidha, neech ka bachutsik.

Tam ti ulich na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ochich ani oktsixin taja. Lejat kwajat ti oktsix, utukn kal an oklek pletsik, kal nin oklkil an judotsik ani konyat ench: —Kal jantom awiltalb ta tajl jech? Jita ti pidhmal jech an ti awiltalb?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Neech tu konoytsik jun xata; max tin tkoytsik, neech tm tu utsatsik neye kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl jech.

Jita kl ti abnk na Juan ti pjal? Kal a Dios o kal i iniktsik? Tujeytsik tm ti kwlx jajkitsik ani u tsxtsik ench: —Max ki ulu ke kal a Dios ti abnk, neech tu tkoy ench: Jantki p tm ti yab a beltsitsik?
Ani max ki ulu ke kal i iniktsik, neech ku tajtsin xata yab alwa kal an iniktsik; pos ejtal in belltsik ke na Juan kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
Jaxtm tin utsatsik ench na Jess: —Yab i chob. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos yab neye neech tu utsatsik kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl jech.

Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik kal jech xowa neech tu tiltsitsik? Jun i inik in kool chb in chakmiltsik ani in utsa ench jn ti b: “Chakam, ki kale xo ta tojnal xon tu kool tayadh an uba.”
Tkon ench an chakmlb: “Yab u l!” Por tayl in jalkuy nin chalab ani kale an ti tojnal.
Tayl, kale an ttalb kin chuu xi jn ani in utsa jeye anlki ani jech an chakmlb tkon ench: “Neech.” Por yab kale.

Jowa j xi jech chb in taja xowa in l an ttalb? In ulutsik ench: —Xi jidhtal. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb ani an junkux inik uxumtsik, okox neech kin walkatsik tinb ka takyat kal na Dios k tattsik.

Pos na Juan xu pujax tsch ti oktsitsik xan ti yejat ki kwajaytsik ani yabtsik a beltsi; por xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb ani an junkux inik uxumtsik in beltsitsik ja. Por tattsik, maske a chumal jech, yab a jilatsik ta walablom abal ka beltsitsik xowa in ulu.

Ka achatsik jeye jech keet an junbaxtalb: Jun i dhabal chabl in taya yn i akanlek i uba ani in mapuy; in taja jun i balixtalb abal kin watiy taja an uba ani jun i pnchy abal kin beletna taja an ubalom. Tayl in matintsi jachan an ti alelb keet i tojnaltsik ani jaj kale w ti belal.
Tam tin bajaw xowki neech ti pitnal an uba, in aba chb x in tojnliltsik abal kin kontsi jachan an tojnaltsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu an dhabal alelb.
Por an mat chabltsik in yakwa nin tojnliltsik an dhabal alelb, jn in chaaw, jn in chemdha ani jn in tujbay.
An dhabal alelb in aba jun ms yn i tojnaltsik k tam tin jidhtal; por ejtaltsik yab bachwat alwa kal an mat alelb.
Tin okontal in aba nin chakmil, kom in chalpay ench: “Neech xna kin kaknantsat tu chakmil.”
Por tam tin chuutsik an chakmlb, an mat alelb tsxintsik ench: “Jech jaich xi neech ti dhabal tayl, wana ki chemdha abal waw ki dhabalna an alelb.”
Jaxtm tin yakwatsik, in kldha elb alelb ani in chemdha.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos tam ka tsch an dhabal alelb, janty neech ka tajtsintsik jachan an mat alelb?

Utsantsik ench: —Neech kin chemdha jachan an atax mat alelb ani neech kin matintsi keet i tojnaltsik jachan an ti alelb, xi ka pidhan kl xowa jaj in lujyal kin bachu tam kin bajaw xowki neech ti pitnal an uba.

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench?: An tujub xi pojk kal an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb. Jech in tajmal an Okxlb ani waw i chutal jelti jun i pulek labandhaxtalb.
Jaxtm tu utsltsik, ke yab neech ki kyattsik taknl kal na Dios; tokot neech ka kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios, xita kin taja xowa in l na Dios.
Xita ka kwajlan ba jech an tujub neech ka mukan ani xita ka tuchiyat kl, neech ka jilan jelti pojodh.
Tam ti an oklek pletsik ani an fariseotsik in acha an junbaxtalb xin ulu na Jess, in exbaytsik ke jajtsik kwajat ti tilnal.
In lenatsik tm kin yakwa, por in jiknltsik an atiklb, kom an atiklbtsik in bell ke na Jess kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
In ntsi tm jun ti kw na Jess kal i junbaxtalbki ani in utsatsik ench:
—Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i tomkixtalb xi jun i pulek takix in taja abal nin chakmil.
In aba nin tojnliltsik abal kin kaniy xi kwajatichtsik kanidh, por jechtsik yab in lena ka kale.

In aba jun keet nin tojnliltsik ani in utsa ench: “Ka utsa xi kwajatichtsik kanidh abal tojojodhich u kool an kapnl. Ka utsa abal chemdhatsich an bkatsik, an konltsik xi kosdha ani ejtalich kwajat tojojodh; ka utsa abal ka tschichtsik.”
Por xi kanidhtsik yab in taja ti kij. Jn kale bin ale, jn kale xon tin tajl nin limtal
ani xi keettsik, in yakwa nin tojnliltsik an pulek takix, in atax tajtsitsik ani in chemdha.
Tam ti an pulek takix in acha jech, chakuy tajat ani in aba nin soldadojiltsik kin chemdha jachan an chemdhax iniktsik ani abal kin tsiktsi tin bitswil.
Tayl in utsa ench nin tojnliltsik: “Ejtalich kwajat tojojodh abal an tomkixtalb, por jachan xi kanidhtsik yab xna in tomnl ka tsch.
Pos ki kaletsik p xon tu xaymanal an bl ani ka kaniy ban tomkixtalb ejtalki xita ka elatsik.”
Kale tm an tjontsixtsik ban bl ani in junku ejtal xin elatsik, xi alwa iniktsik ani xi atax iniktsik. Anchan ti tsutsich an alt kal an atiklbtsik.
Ochich tm an pulek takix kin chuu xi kanidhtsik ani in chuu jun i inik xi ta jeye ti kwajat, por yab xeketlidh jelt xan tu xeketlinal jun xita xu kalel ba jun i tomkixtalb.
Ani in utsa ench: “Jab, jan ta ochenek tech ani yab i xeketlidh jelt xan tu xeketlinal jun xita xu kalel ba jun i tomkixtalb?” Por yab tajat xata in ulu.
An pulek takix in utsa tm ench xi kwajattsik ti tojojl: “Ka wika bin akan ani bin kubak ani ka kldha elb ban jikwaxtalb, xon ti neech ti uknal ani ti rechechl nin kamab.”
Pos yn tajat xi kanidhtsik, por w tajat xi takudhtsik.
Kale tm an fariseotsik ani in taja i kw abal kin aliy xan ti kin uwatsik kin taja kin ulu jun xata yab alwa na Jess ani anchan kin ejto kin lna.

Jaxtm tin aba chb x nin kidhtaltsik junax kal nin kidhtaltsik jeye na Erodes ani utsan ench na Jess: —Oktsix, i chob abal tsubax xowa a ulal ani a oktsixnl in lujtalki xan tu takix na Dios ani yab a dhl ti kwenta xanty in ulal an iniktsik, pos yab a tell an iniktsik eblidhki.
Pos ti ku utsa: Alwaxe ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an lej pulek takix romano o yaba?
Por na Jess in chuu abal kwajatki ti taktamiyb ani in utsatsik ench: —Kambixtsik, jantki tin taktamiyaltsik?
Ti kin ltsi jun i patl tumn xi kl tu tajnal an jalbixtalb. Pidhan tm jun i denario.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jita in wal ani in bij xi jech kwajat chilbadh?
Tkoyat ench: —An lej pulek takix romano. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos ka pidha an lej pulek takix romano xowa in lujyal kin bachu ani ka pidha na Dios xowa Jaj in lujyal kin bachu.
Tam tin achatsik jech, labantsik tajat. Jilan tm na Jess ani kaletsik.
Jaychki jachan a kts, kale ti lnb na Jess kal chb x i saduseotsik. Jech an saduseotsik, in ulal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t; jaxtm ti konyat ench na Jess:

—Oktsix, na Moiss in ulu ke max jun i tomkidh inik ka chemech ani yab kin jila i chakamtsik, nin kidhb yejat ka tomkin kal jachan an chemtsidh mmlb abal kin koy i chakamtsik jelti max in chakmil nin kidhb xi chemech.
Pos alwaich, kal waw twiik ti kwajat bk i kwitltsik in kidhbkitsik. Xi jidhtal tomkin ani chemech. Kom yab in jila in chakmiltsik, in jiltsi an tin tomtal nin chabtal kidhb.
Anchan jeye ti tmun kal xin chabtal, kal xin oxtal ani anchan ti tmun kal xi bk an kwitltsik.
Ms tayl chemech jeye an mmlb.
Tam ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik, Kal jowa j xi bk an kwitltsik ti neech ti tomiklb jachan an mmlb, abal ejtal an kwitltsik in tomiknmal?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik i ukpink tajat ta kwajat, abal yab a exlltsik an Tokat Dhuslab nibal nin chp na Dios.
Pos tam ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik, yabich neech ti tomkinaltsik nibal neech ti pidhnb xita abal ka tomkin, pos neech ka kwajaytsik jelti nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios xi kwajattsik walki.
Por kal tin kwenta max u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik, yabxe a ajymaltsik xan ti na Dios tin ulu, tam tin ulu ench?:
“Nan tin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.” Na Dios yab in Diosil i chemlomtsik, in Diosil xi kwajattsik ejat.
Tam ti an atiklbtsik in acha jech, labantsik tajat xan tin acha u oktsix na Jess.
Tam ti an fariseotsik in chobna abal na Jess tknk in lujtalki ani an saduseotsik yab in ela xan ti ka tkon, junkun an fariseotsik
ani jn ti b xin will nin takixtal na Dios, in lena kin taktamiy. Jaxtm tin konoy ench:
—Oktsix, jowa j an takixtalb xi ms uluts xi kwajat dhutsadh bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —“Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil kal ejtal na itsch, kal ejtal na ejattal ani kal ejtal na chalab.”
Jech jaich an takixtalb xi ms uluts ani xi ms ultalb.
Nin chabtal, in junwal jeye jelti xin jidhtal: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.”
Jech chb an takixtalb jaich nin tujtal ejtal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani xin jilm dhutsadh an tiltsixtsik.
Lejat an fariseotsik bl ta ti kwajat junini,
konyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik kal tin kwenta an Kristo? Kal jita kl tu chakmlb? Tkoyat ench: —Kal an pulek takix Dabid.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jantki p tm na Dabid, ti ijtsiyat kal an Tokat Ejattalb kin bijiy tin Ajtik? Abal na Dabid in ulu ench:
An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt, asta ke Nan tu tantsi ejtal xi ti atl.”
Pos max an pulek takix Dabid in bijiy tin Ajtik an Kristo, jantki p tm ta ulaltsik ke an Kristo u chakmlb kal na Dabid?
Ani kal ni jun xita ti ejtowat ka tkoyat ani asta tam ti tm, jikeytsik ani ni jun xita ms konoxin xata.
Utsan tm ench an atiklbtsik ani an exbaltsik kal na Jess:
—An fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in kooltsik i awiltalb abal kin wila nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Jaxtm, ka exbantsitsik ani ka taja ejtal xowa kin ulutsik; por yab ka wwna xowa in tajltsik, pos jajtsik in oktsixnl jun xata ani keet xowa in tajl.

Pos in oktsixnltsik xata xi tojlb tajat ani in utsl an atiklbtsik kin taja; por jajtsik yab in tajl nibal ela w, jelt tam jun xita in tajl jun i kitlb altsik ani in kityal xi keettsik, por jajtsik nibal ela in l kin taka.

Ejtal xowa in tajltsik, in tajl abal ka chutat kal an atiklbtsik. Pos in kulbetnltsik kin chata bin pkib ani bin okb wetsik an Tokat Dhuslab, dhutsadh ba juntsik peje i kudhkum. In kwajbltsik in kudhkmil kal ms nakdha in dhutsell k xi keet an atiklbtsik.
Xon tu tajnal i kapxnich, in kulbetnltsik ka buxkan xon ti ms ultalb ani ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in kulbetnltsik ka buxkan ban kwajtalb xi ultalb.
In kulbetnltsik ka chapndh ti bl kal an atiklbtsik kal yantam i kaknaxtalb ani ka bijyat ti oktsixtsik.
Por tattsik yab yejat ka lena ke an atiklbtsik ti bijiy ta oktsix, pos jn tokot i Oktsix a kooltsik, jaich an Kristo. Ani ejtal tattsik a kidhbkitsik.
Yab ka bijiy ta tta ni jun xita xi tech ti chabl, pos jn tokot a Tta a kooltsik, xi kwajat walki.
Nibal yejat ka walkatsik ki bijyat ta oklek, pos jn tokot i oklek waach, jaich an Kristo.
Xita in tjontsal xi keet, jaich xi ms ultalb kal tattsik.
Pos xita kin teka tinb, neech ka chak ani xita kin chaka tinb, neech ka tekb.

Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Abal yab a walkl xi keettsik ka kwajch taknl kal na Dios. Pos nibal tattsik yab a l ki kwajay taknl kal na Dios ani nibal a walkl xi keettsik ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.

Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Abal a kntsal tin kim an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ani tayl, abal ki utsan ke i alwa iniktsik, a tajltsik i nakdha lb. Jaxtm ti ms plek an yajtsiktalb neech ka bachutsik.

Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a lonyal i chabl ani i pujal abal ka oktsi jun xita na belomtal ani tam ki beltsinich kal jun xita, a tajlich ke jachan an inik ka kale ms ban kibeltalb k tattsik.

Chojontl a chubl, jokol junkiltsik! xa ulaltsik ench: “Max jun xita kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, yab xata; por max kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an oro xi kwajat taja, yejat tm kin taja xowa in ulu.”
I kwajattsik jelti max i jokol ani yab i chalpadh! Pos jowa ms uluts: an oro, o an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xin tokwal an oro?

Ani a ulaltsik jeye ench: “Max jun xita kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, yab xata; por max kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an pikbaxtalb xi taja kwajat, yejat tm kin taja xowa in ulu.”
I kwajattsik jelti max i jokol ani yab i chalpadh! Pos jowa ms uluts: an pikbaxtalb, o xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb xin tokwal an pikbaxtalb?
Pos xita in lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, yab tokotki kwajat in lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, klich jeye xowa kwajat taja.

Xita kin lej tsubka jun xata kal tin bij an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, yab tokotki kwajat in lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij an at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in lej tsubklich jeye kal na Dios xi kwajat taja.
Anl jeye, xin lej tsubkl jun xata kal tin bij an walki, in lej tsubklich jeye kal tin bij nin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani kal na Dios jeye, kom taja u buxkanal.

Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a pidhl na Dios xowa in lujyal kin bachu kal an menta, an ans ani an komino, por yabtsik a tajl ti kij an takixtalb xi ms uluts, ke jaich an lujattalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani ka belatsik na Dios. Jech jaich yejat ka tajatsik, por yab ka jila ka pidha xowa in lujyal na Dios.

Tattsik, jokol junkiltsik, a tajltsik xowa xi yab lej uluts, por yab a tajltsik xowa xi ms uluts. In junwal jelti max a dhikltsik an chichim abal yab ka kutu, por jelti max a kutwaltsik an konl xin bij kameyo!
Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a junwal jelti an baso ani an talab xi eblidhki ti takadh, abal alkidh ta itsch tokot a chalpmtsik an kwlch ani ka taja xowa yab lujat.
Fariseotsik, tattsik a junwal jelti max i jokol, okox ka taktsi alkidh na basojil, na talbil ani tokatich jeye tm neech ka jilkon xi eblidh.

Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Pos a junwaltsik jelti an jlimtalb xi mukudh ani labidh u xalkanal eblidhki, por alkidh tsutsat kal in beklk i chemlomtsik ani kal xowakichki i ataxtalb.
Anchantsik teye, eblidh, jelti max i lujat iniktsik, por alkidh ta itsch tokot a chalpmtsik i kambixtalb ani i walastalb.
Chojontl a chubl oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! Tattsik a lejkintsal xon ti jolidh an tiltsixtsik ani a dhibyal nin chilbil an lujat iniktsik,
ani a ulaltsik ench: “Max techak tu kwajat tam ti xechink ni weje pakliltsik, yabak i tolmiymal kin chemdha an tiltsixtsik.”
Kal jech, a ulalichtsik abal a kidhtal xin chemdhmal an tiltsixtsik.
Pos ka okchtsik ka taja xowa in tujmal na weje pakliltsik!
Tattsik a kidhtal jelti an chan! Yab neech ka ejto ka jekatsik abal yab ki kale ban kibeltalb.

Jaxtm, Nan neech tu abtsi ti tiltsixtsik, ti chalpadhtsik ani ti oktsixtsik. Por tattsik neech ka chemdha, taltsik neech ka pajkiytsik ba peltsidh te, taltsik neech ka chaawtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani neech ka kajnatsik bitsow ti bitsow.

Jaxtm, tattsik i walbidh kal nin chemtal ejtal an lujat iniktsik xi chemdhats, asta tam ti chemdh na Abel an lujat inik asta na Sakaras nin chakmil na Berekas, xi tattsik a chemdha tamchejlidh ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal jech an walastalb neech kin kitna an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij.

Atiklbtsik xi kwajl Jerusaln, xa chemdhl an tiltsixtsik ani a tujbayal nin abatwlejiltsik na Dios xi abtsinal! Ynlich tajat u lenmal tu junkutsik, jelt xan ti jun i pkwlam kwita in junkuwal nin tsitsik tm tin l in sutsts, por yab a lena!
Pos ka achatsik, an at xon ta kaknltsik na Dios, neech ka jilkon walbadh;
pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech ki witsiy ti kin chuutsik asta kin bajaw an kij tam tattsik neech ka ulu ench: “Lbtajadh ti kwajat xi tl tin bij an Okxlb.”
Kale na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani tam ti nechich, utukn kal nin exbaliltsik ani tujey ti ltsinal xan ti kubadh an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Xo a chutaltsik ejtal jech, por tsubax tu utsltsik ke yab neech ka jilkon ni jun i tujub tbx. Ejtal neech ka julp.

Kaletsik tm ban chn Olibos ani tam ti na Jess taja ti buxl, kale ti usnal chinatki ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Ti ku utsa, jowki neech ka tmun jech? Jantom exl neech ki chuu tam i tlich ani tam u kunelich an pakwenib?
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ti ki kambiytsik ni jun xita.
Pos yn neech ka tsch ti kambixtsik ani neech kin ulu ke jajich nu Kristo ani yn neech kin kambiy.
Neech ka achatsik ke exom i pjxtalb ani ke tich jun neech ka tujey, por yab ki jikeytsik. Pos anchan kool ka tmun, por yabl jaich an pakwenib.
Pos jun i kidhtalb neech ti pjx kal keet i kidhtalb ani jun i bitsow neech ti pjx kal keet i bitsow; neech ka wachin i kanab, i yawlchtsik ani neech ka lwkin an chabl putlki.
Por ejtal jech jaich nin tujtal an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka tmun. Jelti an chukuxtalb xin achl jun i mmlb tam nechich kin wachiy i chakam.
Neech tm ki pidhntsik abal ki atax tajtsin, neech ki chemdhtsik ani neech ki atantsik kal ejtal an atiklbtsik kal Nanki tu kwenta.
Tam jachan i kij, yn neech kin jilatsik ti belom, neech ka chkxintsik ani neech ka pdhnxintsik jn ani jn ban awiltalb.
Neech ka wachin yn i kambix tiltsixtsik, xi neech kin ulu ke kal a Dios ti abadh ti tiltsix ani yn i atiklbtsik neech kin kambiy.
Ani kal tin kwenta abal neech tajat ka wachin xowa yab alwa, yn neech kin jilatsik ti kndhx.
Por xita kin kuxuy ejtal jech, neech ka lowat.
Ani jech an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios, neech ka tilan putlki an kayl abal ka exl kal ejtalki an kidhtalbtsik; ani tm neech ka ulchich an pakwenib.
Xita kin ajay jech, kin exbay: Tam ka chuutsik an kakadh ataxtalb xin tilmal an tiltsix Daniel kwajatich xon tu kaknb na Dios,
tm, xi kwajattsik ban chabl xi Judea, ki kaletsik ta chinkonal ban chnlom.
Xi kwajattsik tin b nin kim, yab ka paaytsik abal ka ochich kin iki jun xata alt;
ani xi kwajattsik bin ale, yab ka witsiy abal kin iki nin wt.
Chojontl in chubl an mmlbtsik xi ka elan kodh jachan i kij o u tsutsdhom!
Ka kontsaltsik na Dios abal yab ka tmun jech tam chamay nibal tam in ktsjil i koyxnich;
pos jachan i kij, neech ka wachin jun i kakadh yajtsiktalb xi yab jayki wachink asta ti tujenek an kayl, nibal ms neech ka wachin jayki anchan.
Max na Dios yab kin wmdha jachan an pulek yajtsiktalb, yab xita neech ka loey; por kal tin kwenta in knl xi Jaj in takwymal, neech kin wmdha jachan an kij.
Tam jachan i kij, max jun xita ti ki utsatsik ench: “Ka tela, j kwajat an Kristo”, o “ka tela, n kwajat”, yab ka beltsi.

Pos neech ka wachin i kambixtsik xi neech kin ulu ke jajich nu Kristo, o ke jajich xi abadh ti tiltsix kal a Dios. Neech kin taja i pakdha exl ani i pakdha labandhaxtalb abal kin kambiy an atiklbtsik ani neech kin lena kin kambiytsik max kin ejto asta xi takudhichtsik kal na Dios.
Exomichtsik tu utsl ejtal xowa neech ka tmun.
Jaxtm, max ki utsantsik ench: “Ka telatsik, n kwajat ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh”, yab ki kaletsik ka chuu; o max ki utsantsik: “Ka telatsik, j kwajat alt”, yab ka belatsik.
Pos anchan jelt xan tu lamkil an ly asta xon tu kalel na kts ani asta xon tu ochel, anchan neye ti neech kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Xon ti kwajat an chemlom, taja neech ka junkun an tottsik.
Tmki tam ka watch jech an yajtsiktalb, na kts neech ka jikwchin, na ch yab neech ka tajkan, na ttsik neech ka kwajlan ani asta an pakdha chplb xi kwajat walki neech ka yoywat.

Neech tm ka xalkan walki nu exlil Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik. Ejtal an kidhtalbtsik xi yab u belom xi kwajattsik ban kayl, neech ka ukintsik tam tin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, in tl ban tokow xi walki kal ejtal nu chp ani nu labidh tokt.
Neech ku aba nu tokat abatwlejiltsik abal kal jun i chapik jutsuxtalb i korneta kin junku xu takwymaltsik putlki, asta jun pake jun pake an kayl.
Ka exbaytsik xowa oktsixtalb in pidhnl an junbaxtalb kal tin kwenta in akan an igo: Tam dhlamich nin kweltsik ani exom ti kalel nin xekl, a chobichtsik abal exomich ti kunel an kakal kij.
Anchan jeye, tam ka chuutsik ejtal jech, ka chobnatsik abal Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, kunatich i kij neech kin tsch.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal jech neech ka tmun tam yabl chemnek na kidhtaltsik xi jech i kij.
An chabl ani an walki neech ka taley, por ejtal xowa u ulu, anchan neech ka tmun.
Por kal tin kwenta xowki jun bl ti neech kin tsch, yab xita in chob, nibal an tokat abatwletsik xi kwajat walki, nibal nin Chakmil na Dios. Tokot in chob na Dios an Ttalb.
Anchan xan ti tmun tam ti xechin na No, anchan jeye ti neech ka tmun tam kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.

Jachan i kij, tam ti yabl tujenek an chapik bal kij, an atiklbtsik in ntsal ti kapul ani ti uchal, ti tomkinaltsik ani ti pidhnax tin chakmiltsik abal ka tomkin, asta tam tin bajaw xowki na No ti ochichich ban tan at;
ani yab in exbaytsik asta tam ti ulchich an chapik b ani chemechtsik ejtal. Anchan jeye ti neech ka tmun tam kin tsch jun Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Tam jachan i kij, chb i iniktsik xi kwajat ti tojnal junax bin ale, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
Chb i mmlbtsik xi kwajat ti cheel junax, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
Yabtsik p ki kwajay ukpipidh kom yab a chobtsik xowki ti neech kin tsch jun.
Por ka chobnatsik jech, ke max jun i dhabal at in chob xowki jun bl ti neech ka ulich an kw, yab neech ka wayich ani yab neech kin walka ka ochich an kw tin kim abal ka kwyat.
Jaxtm, yab ki kwajaytsik teye ukpipidh, pos tam yabtsik a tlm, neech kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Jitam j an alwa tjontsix xin tajl xowa ka utsan, xu jilnal kal nin ajtik punkudh abal kin kapundha xan ti yejat ejtal xi kwajat bin kim an ajtiklb?
Kijidh abal an tjontsix xi ka elan kal nin ajtik tam ka witsiy, in tajl xowa jilnk kin taja.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ka kwajb kal nin ajtik abal kin beletna ejtal xowa in kool an ajtiklb.
Por max jachan an tjontsix jaich jun i atax inik ani kin chalpay ke nin ajtik yab neech ka witsiy jikat,
ka tujey kin atax tajtsitsik xi keet nin at tojnaltsik, ka kwajch ti kapul ani ti uchal kal an uchltsik,
tam ka witsiy nin ajtik tam yab xata in tlm, nibal in chob max neech ka witsch,
neech ka pidhan jun i yajtsiktalb plek kal nin ajtik ani neech ka kwajb abal kin tamu jelt xan ti neech kin tamu an kambixtsik. Taja neech ti uknal ani ti rechechl nin kamab.
Xan tu takix na Dios, in junwal jelti lju i tsidhantsik xin tyna i tajbaxtalbtsik xu joltsinal ti gs ani kaletsik kin bachu an tomkinl inik.
B xi jajtsik chalpadh tajat ani xi b yaba.
Xi yabtsik chalpadh, tam tin jna nin tajbaxtalbiltsik, yab in jnatsik i gs abal kin baltsi ti t tam kin tala;
por xi chalpadhtsik, in jnmaltsik i boteya tsutsat kal i gs, yab tokotki xi baltsidh nin tajbaxtalbiltsik.
Kom an tomkinl inik owch ani yab u ulel, tujey ti onkal wayal ejtal an tsidhantsik ani tayl wayichtsik.
Tam ti chejel akalich xna, achatm in kawidh kwintal jun xita xin ulu kawidh ench: “Nich tl an tomkinl inik, ki kaletsik ka bachu!”
Ejtal jachan an tsidhantsik chakay abal kin tojojoy nin tajbaxtalbiltsik.
Utsan tm ench an tsidhantsik xi chalpadh kal xi yabtsik chalpadh: “ti ku pidha weye w an ti gs abal exomich ti tepel ni tajbaxtalbil.”
Por tkon ench an tsidhantsik xi chalpadh: “Yaba, xib yab tm neech ka kidhey abal waw nibal abal tattsik. Ms alwa ki kale ka chaaytsik xon tu nujnal ani ka chaay abal tattsik.”

Por lejat xi b an tsidhantsik kalnek ti chaum an ti gs, ulich an tomkinl inik. An tsidhantsik xi ta ti kwajat tojojodhtsik, ochichtsik ja junax kal an tomkinl inik ban tomkixtalb ani tayl mapyat an wileb.
Tayl ulich xi b an tsidhantsik ani in ulutsik ench: “Ajtik, ajtik, ti ku japtsi!”
Por tkoyattsik ench: “Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yab tu exll.”
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabtsik p ki kwajay i ukpipidh, pos yabtsik a chob xowki jun bl ti neech kin tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i inik, xi tam ti nechich ka kalch pl bitsow, in kaniy nin tojnliltsik ani in pidhatsik ti tumn kin tjondha.
Jn ti b in pidha bo mil i patl tumn, jn chab mil ani xi jn in pidha mil i patl tumn; pidhan juntsik ti b xantiki ti chutat neech kin ejto kin tjondha ani tayl, kale tm w ti belal.
An tjontsix xin bachu bo mil i patl tumn, in taja i limtalb kal an tumn ani in ta anlki in yanl.
An tjontsix xi jiltsin chab mil, anlki jeye tin taja ani in ta jeye chab mil ms.
Por xi pidhan tokot mil kal nin ajtik, kale kin cholka i chabl ani in tapa taja an tumn.
Ms tayl, witsiy nin ajtik jachan an tjontsixtsik ani tujey kin taja i kwenta kal jajtsik.
Ulich okox xin bachmal bo mil i patl tumn, in pidha nin ajtik bl bo mil ani in utsa ench: “Ajtik, bo mil i patl tumn tin pidha ani j kwajat bo mil ms xu ta kl.”
Utsan ench kal nin ajtik: “Alwa tajat, tat i alwa tjontsix ani i lujat; kom a tjondha alwa xowa w tu pidha, neech tu pidha ms. Ki ochich ani ki kulb kal nan.”
Tayl ulich jeye an tjontsix xin bachm chab mil i patl tumn ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, tin pidha chab mil i patl tumn ani j kwajat chab mil ms xu ta kl.”
Utsan ench kal nin ajtik: “Alwa tajat, tat i alwa tjontsix ani i lujat; kom a tjondha alwa xowa w tu pidha, neech tu pidha ms. Ki ochich ani ki kulb kal nan.”

Por tam ti ulich an tjontsix xin bachmal mil i patl tumn, in utsa ench nin ajtik: “Ajtik, nan u chob abal tat kidhat tajat a konyal, ke i kjol xon ti yab i mmadh ani a junkuwal nin wall an tayablb xon ti yab a bukmal i iyalb.
Jaxtm tu jikna, in kale ani u joliy na tumnal al chabl. Por j kwajat xi tin pidhmal.”
Tkoyat ench kal nin ajtik: “Atax tojnal ani be, max a chobich abal in kjol xon ti yab in mmadh ani u junkuwal nin wall an tayablb xon ti yab u bukmal i iyalb,
jantki ti yab a kwajba nu tumnal xon tu tjondhb abal tam kin witsiy, ku bachu nu tumnal klich xowa in tmal?”
Utsan tm ench kal an ajtiklb xi ta ti kwajattsik: “Ka kntsi xin kool mil an patl tumn ani ka pidha xin kool lju i mil.
Pos xita xin kool, neech ka pidhan ani neech kin koy ms yn; por xi yab in kool, neech ka kntsin asta xowa in chalpayal in kool.
Ani jech an tjontsix xi yab xata ti alwa, ka kldha elb ban jikwaxtalb, xon ti neech ti uknal ani ti rechechl nin kamab.
Tam Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik kin tsch kal ejtal nu labidh tokt ani kal ejtal nu tokat abatwlejiltsik, tm neech kin buxkan bu labidh tokat kwajtalbil abal tin takix.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik neech ka junkun tu tamt ani tm neech ku takuytsik, jelt xan ti an belkol borrego in kwajbl pl an borregotsik ani pl jeye an chibotsik.
Neech kin kwajba an borregotsik tin ejt ani an chibotsik tin kwatab.

An Pulek Takix neech tm kin utsa ench xi kwajattsik tin ejt: “Jalaichtsik, xi lbtajadhichtsik kal nu Tta ani ka bachchtsik xon ti neech ta takix, xi bijtsidhich neech ka takiy asta tam ti tujeyki an kayl.
Pos in kaay ani tin kapundhatsik; in tsikey ani tin pidhatsik ti ja; in xechin jelti pl inik ani tin koydhatsik.
U yntsi u kudhkmil ani tin pidhatsik; in yawlch ani tin lnatsik; in wikan ani i kaletsik ti kin lna.”
Xi lujattsik neech tm kin ulutsik ench: “Ajtik, jowki ta kainek ani tu kapundhmal? O jowki ta tsikenek ani tu pidhmal ti ja?
Jowki ta xechink jelti pl inik ani tu koydhmal? O a yntsmal a kudhkmil ani tu pidhmal?
Jowki ta yawlmadh o i wiknk ani u kalnek tu lna?”
Ani neech ka tkoyattsik ench kal an Pulek Takix: “Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xowa a tajtsi jn nu at kidhbtsik, maske yab lej ultalb, Nan tin tajtsmaltsik.”

An Pulek Takix neech jeye tm kin utsa ench xi kwajattsik tin kwatab: “Ki wixkintsik tech kal Nan, atiklbtsik xi atax; ki kalchtsik ban kamal xi yab jayki u tepel xi kwajat tojojodh abal an lej atax ani abal nin tjontsixiltsik.
Pos in kaay ani yab tin kapundhatsik; in tsikey ani yabtsik tin pidha ti ja;
in xechin jelti pl inik ani yabtsik tin koydha. U yntsi u kudhkmil ani yabtsik tin pidha; in yawlch ani in wikan ani yabtsik i kale tin lna.”
Neech tm kin ulutsik jeye ench: “Ajtik, jowki ta xechink ta kal, ta tsikl, jelti pl inik, a yntsal a kudhkmil, ta yaul, o ta wiknl ani yab tu tolmiymal?”
Ani neech ka tkoyattsik ench kal an Pulek Takix: “Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xowa yab a tajtsi ni jun xita, maske jaich xi yab lej ultalb, yab jeye tin tajtsmaltsik Nan.”
Jechtsik neech ban yajtsiktalb ani xi lujattsik neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Tam ti na Jess in okoy kin ulu ejtal jech, in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik:
—Jelt xan ta chobichtsik, t chb a kts neech kin bajch in ajb an paskwa; ani Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn abal kin chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Jachan i kij, an oklek pletsik, an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani nin oklkil an judotsik, junkuntsik bin elbil nin kim na Kayfs, nin oklkil an pletsik.
Taja, in tajatsik i kw abal kin chalpay xan ti kin uwa kin yakwa na Jess kal i kambixtalb ani kin chemdha.
Por in ulaltsik ench: —Yab ki yakwa tam exom an ajib abal yab ka kwajaytsik ti pjx an atiklb.
Na Jess kwajat Betania, bin kim na Simn xin kymal an kwajat atax tt;
ani utukn kal jun i mmlb xin tsidhl jun i frasko xi tajadh kal i alabastro tsutsat kal i niwiytalb xi kajbidh. Tam ti na Jess kwajat ban mesa, joltsin an ti niwiytalb bin k kal an mmlb.
Tam ti an exbaltsik in chuu jech, chakuytsik ani in ulu ench: —Jantki ti odhn jech an niwiytalb?
Ka nujwatwiik kajbidh jech an niwiytalb abal ka pidhan an ti tumn an chojontltsik.
Achantsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Jantki ta itixbdhltsik jech an mmlb? Jech xowa tin tajtsi, alwa tajat.
Pos an chojontltsik echeki neech ka kwajay kal tattsik, por Nan yab echeki neech kin kwajay kal tattsik.
Xowa in taja jech an mmlb, tam tin joltsi an ti niwiytalb bu tul, jaich abal ti kin tojojontsi an tu tul abal ka kwajch tojojodh tam ka jolyat.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xntikichki ka tilan jech an alwa tilab ba putlki an kayl, neech jeye ka tilan xowa in taja jech an mmlb abal ka chalpayat.
Jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, xu bijyb ta Judas Iskariote, kale ti kw kal an oklek pletsik
ani in utsatsik ench: —Jy i patl tumn neech ti kin pidhatsik max tu pidhatsik an ta Jess? Utsan tm kal an oklek pletsik abal neech ka pidhan jun inik lju i patl tumn xi tajadh kal i plata.
Ani asta tam ti tm, na Judas in tuju kin aliy xan ti kin pidhna na Jess.

Tin jidhtal ktsjil an ajib tam u kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye, an exbaltsik utey ba na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Jn ta l ki tojojoy an kapnl abal ka kapu an wiyadh borrego tin kwenta an paskwa?

Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ki kaletsik ban bitsow bin kim jun i inik ani ka utsatsik ench: “An Oktsix in ulu ench: Exomich in bajwal an ora xowki neech kin chemdh ani ba na kim neech ku kapu an kapnl kal tin kwenta an paskwa junax kal nu exbaliltsik.”
An exbaltsik in taja xan ti utsantsik kal na Jess ani in tojojoytsik an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
Tam ti jikwchin, na Jess buxkan ti kapul ban mesa junax kal xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik;
ani lejat kwajat ti kapultsik, in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke jn ti b xi tattsik neech ti kin pidhna ban atiklbtsik xi tin atl.
Tepintsik tm tajat ani tujey ti konoxtsik juntsik ti juntsik ench: —Ajtik, awxe nan?
Tkon na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Xita xi kwajat ti kapul junax kal Nan ban talab, jaich xi neech ti kin pidhna.

Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna ejtal xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab kal Nan tu kwenta; por chojontl in chubl an inik xi ti kin pidhna! Msakwiik alwa abal jaj max yabak wachink ti chakam.
Kwin tm na Judas, xi kl ti neech ka pidhn ani in ulu ench: —Oktsix, nanxe? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tat.
Lejat kwajattsik ti kapul, na Jess in tyna an pan ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios. In peja tm an pan, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in ulu ench: —Ka bachutsik ani ka kapu, jech jaich nu tul.
Tayl in tyna jun i lejab baltsidh kal i yajtsik uxnl, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka uchatsik ejtal ta b jech an yajtsik uxnl,
pos jech, jaich nu xichl xi neech kin jalblna an t lejkintalb. Jaich xi neech ku wakla tam kin chemdh abal yn xita tin alwabl ani abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbiltsik.
Pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku uxtsi tin jall an uba asta kin bajaw xowki neech ku ucha kal tattsik an t yajtsik uxnl xon tu takix nu Tta.
Tam ti okonich ti ajattsik, kaletsik ban chn xu bijyb Olibos.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ejtal tattsik neech ti kin jilatsik jech i akal; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Neech ku chemdha an belkol borregotsik ani neech ka bukey an borregotsik.”
Por tam kin ejech ti t, neech kin okxin kin kale Galilea ani tattsik tayl.
Tkoyat tm ench kal na Pedro: —Maske ejtal ti ki jila, nan yaba.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl ke jech i akal, tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, xl neech ka ulu ke yab tin exll.
Por utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Maske kin utsan ke neech kin chemdh junax kal Tat, yab neech ku ulu ke yab tu exll. Ani ejtal an exbaltsik anlki tin ulu.
Ulich tm na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ba jun i kubtalb xin bij Jetseman ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki buxkantsik tech, lejat Nan in neech n tin l.
In jna na Pedro ani chablam nin chakmiltsik na Sebedeo ani tujey kin acha jun i pulek tepintalb tin itsch.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —U achl tu ejattal jun i pulek tepintalb xi neech ku chmay. Ki jilkontsik tech ani yab ki wayichtsik.

Kale tm na Jess lej w t ani, tudhlan kutl asta chabl, lan ani in utsa ench na Dios: —Tta, max Tat a l ka chuu yab ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ka ejto ti kin wixkintsi; por yab ka tjan xan ti Nan u l, ka tjan xan ti Tat a l.
Witsiy tm xon ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik ani u wayaltsik tin ela. In utsa tm ench na Pedro: —Yabtsik a ejto ka kuxuy ki kwajay ejat kal Nan ela jun i ora?
Yabtsik ki wayich ani ki lan abal yab ki ttsik kal an lej atax. Tsubax kejle ke na ejattal in l ka lan, por na tul yab likat.
Kale jun tin chabtal, lan ani in ulu ench: —Tta, max kool ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, ka tjan xan ti Tat a l.
Witsiy tm tin chabtal xon ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik ani u wayaltsik jun tin ela, kom u mtnalichtsik tajat nin wal kal an akal.
In jilatsik tm, kale jun ti l tin oxtal ani anlki jun ti lan.

Witsiy tm tin oxtal xon ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Xo awilich ka ntsitsik ta wayal ani ta koyol. In bajch an ora xowki Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban walablomtsik.
Ki chakchtsik ani wanch; nich tl xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.

Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess tam ti ulich na Judas, xi jaich jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik. Kal jaj, ta ti tl yn i atiklbtsik teykodh kal i machttsik ani i te. Abnktsik kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani kal in oklkil an judotsik.
Na Judas, xi neech an ti pidhnax, in utsmalichtsik xowa exl neech kin taja, ench tin utsmaltsik: —Xi ku chuchbay, jaich ka yakwatsik.
Utey tm ba na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Janta uwats, Oktsix! Ani in chuchbay.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jab, jantki ta tsinek? Uteytsik tm, in yakwa na Jess ani in jna ti wiknl.
Por jn ti b xi ta ti kwajat kal na Jess, in jixna nin machtil ani in patntsi tin xuchun jun in tojnlil an oklek pletsik.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka tapa an macht. Pos ejtal xu pjxtsik kal i macht, kal i macht jeye ti neech ka chemdh.
Yab a chob ke Nan neech ku ejto ku kontsi nu Tta ani Jaj neech ti kin abtsi xoki lajuchb i pakdha kwene i tokat abatwletsik abal ti kin loo?
Por max ku taja anchan, jan ti neech ka tmun xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab, ke anchan yejat ka tmun?

Tmki jachan, utsan ench an atiklbtsik kal na Jess: —Jantki ta tsinektsik kal i macht ani kal i te abal ti kin yakwa, jelti max neech ka yakwatsik jun in kw? Tsudhey ka tsudhey in buxkank kal tattsik tin oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani yab jayki tin yakwmaltsik.
Por ejtal jech exom ti tmnal abal ka tjan xan tin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik ban Tokat Dhuslab. Tmki jachan, ejtal an exbaltsik in jiloloy kwetm na Jess ani kaletsik ti chinkonal.
Xin tajatsik ti ykwal, in jna na Jess ba na Kaifs, nin oklkil an pletsik. Taja, junkunk an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb ani nin oklkil an judotsik.
Por na Pedro w wwnaxin asta bin elbil nin oklkiltsik an pletsik. Ochich taja ani buxkan kal an belkoltsik abal in l kin chuu xan ti neech ka kale ti oknal jech.
Nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, nin oklkil an judotsik ani ejtal an Junkulom Awiltalb, in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa kin ani walbiy na Jess abal kin ejtotsik kin ulu ka chemdh.
Por yab in elatsik xan ti kin ani walbiy, maske yn i kambix lnaxtsik ulich. Por tayl ulich chb i kambix lnaxtsik,
xin ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik in ulm ench: “Neech ku ejto ku paku jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ku kuba ti t ti x a kts.”
Chakay tm an oklek ple ani in konoy ench na Jess: —Janty a ulal kal jech tin kwenta? Janty in y xi jech i kwajat ta usnal?
Por na Jess yab tkon. Utsan tm ench kal an oklek pletsik: —Kal tin bij na Dios xi ejat, tu kontsal abal ti ku utsa max tatich lejtal ni Kristo xi Chakmlb kal na Dios.

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Nan. Ani tu utsltsik jeye, ke asta xo neech tin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, buxl tin ejt na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja. Ani neech jeye ti kin chuutsik tam in tl ban tokow xi walki.

Kom chakuy tajat an oklek pletsik, in michna nin xekt xin kwajbm ani in ulu ench: —Jech an inik in odhbijyalich na Dios kal xowa in ulal; yabich ms i yntsal ni jun i lnax. Tattsik a acha xan tin odhbijiy na Dios kal xowa in ulu,
janty xo a chalpayaltsik? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Walbidh ti kwajat ani yejat ka chemdh.
Tubkayat tm bin wal ani chawat. Taltsik in pikiy bin wal
ani in utsltsik ench: —Kom Tat i Kristo, ti ku utsa xita ti chaaw!
Tam ti jachan, lejat na Pedro buxl bin elbil an at, utukn kal jun i mmlb xu tjontsix taja ani utsan kl ench: —Tat junax teye ta xeech kal na Jess, xi Galilea u kwajl.
Por na Pedro in ulu ke yab ani tin tamt ejtal xi ta ti kwajattsik, ench tin ulu: —Yab u chob xanty a till.
Tam ti na Pedro nechich ban wileb, chutat jun kal keet i mmlb ani an mmlb, in utsa ench xi ttsik ti kwajat: —Jech an inik junax jeye ti xeech kal na Jess, xi Nasaret u kwajl.
Por in ulu jun na Pedro ke yab ani, in lej tsubax ulu ench: —Yab u exll jachan an inik.
Ms tayl, utukn na Pedro kal xi ttsik ti kwajat ani utsan ench: —Tsubax lejtal, tat a kidhtal teye nin exbaliltsik na Jess, pos anlki teye i kw jelti jajtsik.
Tujey tm na Pedro kin lej tsubax ulu ench: —Yab u exll jachan an inik. Ani tmki jachan, dhjan jun i pekel.
In chalpna tm na Pedro xanty ti usnk kal na Jess: “Tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.” Na Pedro kale elb ani ukin tajat kal i tepintalb.
Tam ti tsudhey, ejtal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik, in taja i kw xan ti kin uwatsik abal kin chemdha na Jess.
In jnatsik wikadh na Jess ani in pidhna ba na Ponsio Pilato, xi jaich an pulek awiltalb.

Tam ti na Judas xin taja ti pidhnax an ta Jess abal ka chemdh, in chuu abal walbiyatich na Jess, in acha abal yab alwa xowa in taja, in jalkuy nin chalab ani kale kin witsbantsi xi jun inik lju an tumn an oklek pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik.
In utsatsik ench: —Nan u wala abal u pidhna ka chemdh jun i inik xi yab walbidh. Por tkoyat ench kal jajtsik: —Waw yab i kwenta xanty a taja. Tatich teye.
In petna tm na Judas an tumn ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, kale ani in pala tinb.
Nin oklkil an pletsik in pena an tumn ani in ulutsik ench: —Yab alwa ki baliy jech an tumn xon tu tapb an pikbantsixtalb, kom in jalbl in chemtal jun i inik.
In tajatsik tm i kw abal kin chaay kal jachan an tumn jun i chabl xu bijyb tin Chablil i tojom pats, xon ti ka jolyat an pl iniktsik.
Jaxtm ti bijyat jachan an chabl asta xo, tin “Chablil i Xich.”
Ani anchan, tmunich xan tin ulmal ench an tiltsix Jeremas: In bachutsik xi jun inik lju an patl tumn xi tajadh kal i plata, nin jalbl an inik xi an israelitatsik in kwajbantsi,
ani kl tin chaaytsik an chabl xu bijyb tin Chablil i tojom pats, jelt xan tin utsan kal an Okxlb.
Na Jess jn tin tamt an pulek awiltalb ani konyat ench kal an pulek awiltalb: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan.
Ani tam ti nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik kwajat in walbiyal na Jess, Jaj yab u tknal.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pilato: —Yabxe a achl ejtal xowa exom ta usnal?
Por na Jess yab kuchun, jaxtm ti labandhjich tokot an pulek awiltalb ani yabich in chob xanty kin chalpay.
Pos alwaich, tam exomich an ajib, an pulek awiltalb in walkl jun i wiknl, xi ka kontsin kal an atiklbtsik.
Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat jun i wiknl xi exlmte tajat xu bijyb ta Barrabs;
ani tam ti an atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat junkunk, konyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Jita a l ka chuutsik ku walka: na Barrabs o na Jess xu bijyb ti Kristo?
Na Pilato in ulu anchan, kom in chob ke na Jess pidhnats abal u atnal.
Lejat na Pilato buxl xon tu ljundhom, abn ti usnal ench kal nin tomtal: “Yab ka tajtsi xata jachan an lujat inik, pos ti akal u koy jun i kakadh watsib kal Jaj tin kwenta.”
Por nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik, in pidhkwliy an atiklbtsik abal kin konoy ka walkantsat ta Barrabs ani ka chemdh na Jess.
Tawntsik jun kal an pulek awiltalb ani konyattsik ench: —Jita a l ka chuutsik ku walka xi jech chb? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Na Barrabs.
Konyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Ani janty ku tajtsi na Jess, xu bijyb ti Kristo? Ejtal tkontsik ench: —Ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
Utsantsik tm ench kal an pulek awiltalb: —Pos, jantom walastalb in tajm? Por jajtsik in ulu jun kawidh ench: —Ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te!

Tam tin chuu na Pilato abal yab xata neech kin exbay, tokot exomich in pjxlindhl ms an atiklbtsik, in abna ka iktsin ti ja, in taka nin kubak tin tamt an atiklbtsik ani in ulu ench: —Nan yab u l kin walbin kal nin chemtal jech an lujat inik, tattsik a chob xanty a tajl.
Ani ejtal an atiklbtsik tkon ench: —Waw ani ni chakmiltsik ku jilkon u walbidh kal nin chemtal!
Na Pilato in walka tm na Barrabs, in abna ka lekbayat na Jess ani in pidhnaich tm abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Tayl, nin soldadojiltsik an pulek awiltalb in jnatsik na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb, in junku ejtal an soldadotsik ani wiliyat na Jess kal jech an soldadotsik.
Kotsin tm tin kudhkmil ani xeketliyat kal jun i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn.
Kwajbantsat jeye bin k jun i kwetsotsl dhipadh kdh ani teykoyat ti te bin ejt kubak. U tudhltsik tm tin tamt na Jess ani in labdhnltsik ench: —Ki kwajay kijidh, Pulek Takxal an judotsik!
Tubkayat jeye, u kntsinal an ti te ani u toxyb kl bin k.
Tam ti okon ti labdhnb, wkontsatich tm an ti chak kudhkum, kwajbantsat xi Jaj in kudhkmil ani jnjich tm abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Tam tu kalelichtsik, elan jun i inik xu kwajl Sirene, xu bijyb ta Simn ani tajtsin ti chplb abal kin kitnantsi an ti peltsidh te xin nedhl na Jess.
Ulichtsik tm ba jun i chabl xu bijyb Glgota. Ti tnek kw, Glgota, in l kin ulu: “In chablil in beklk in k i chemlom inik.”
Taja, pidhan na Jess kin ucha i yajtsik uxnl xukudh kal i tsaiktalb; por tam tin leka, na Jess yab in lena kin ucha.

Tam ti pajkidhich na Jess ban peltsidh te, an soldadotsik ubtin abal kin wlchxnantsi tin kudhkmil na Jess. Anchan ti tmun jelt xan tin ulmal an tiltsix ench: “Ubtintsik abal ti kin wlchxnantsitsik an tu kudhkmil.”
Buxkantsik tm taja abal kin beletna.
Ani b in k an peltsidh te, kwajb jun i dhuslab xin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti pajkidh ban peltsidh te. An dhuslab in ulal ench: “Jech jaich na Jess, nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
Pajkiyat jeye kal na Jess chb i kwtsik, jn tin ejt ani jn tin kwatab.
U odhbijyb kal xu wateltsik taja, in wwkliyaltsik nin k

ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tat, xa ulal ke neech ka paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ti x a kts neech ka kuba ti t, ka loo xo tab. Max Tatich lejtal ni Chakmlb kal na Dios, ki paay xo ban peltsidh te.
Anchan jeye tu labdhnb kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kal an fariseotsik, kal nin oklkil an judotsik ani u tsxtsik ench:
—In lom keet, por xo yab in ejto kin loo tinb. Max Jajich lejtal nin Pulek Takxal an Israelitatsik, ka paay xo ban peltsidh te abal ki belaich.
Jaj in bell tajat na Dios, pos ka lowat xo kal na Dios, max tsubax lejtal tu lenb; kom in ulal ke Jaj u Chakmlb kal na Dios.
An kwtsik xi ta ti kwajattsik pajkidh junax kal Jaj, u odhbijixtsik jeye.
Jikwchin tm ba putl an chabl, asta chejel kts ani asta x i wkal.
Tam ti wich x i wkal, na Jess in ulu kawidh ench: —El, El, lama sabaktani? —Ti tnek kw, jech in l kin ulu: Dios tu Ajtik, Dios tu Ajtik, jantki tin walba?
Taltsik xi taja ti kwajat, in acha jech ani in ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik kwajat in tawnl an tiltsix Elas.
Tmki jachan, jn ti b xi ta ti kwajattsik, kale adhik kin iki jun i kwinim ani in axdha ba jiliy jaytsik uxnl. In kwajba bin tsm jun i te ani in utuntsi na Jess abal kin juchu.
Por utsan ench kal xi keettsik: —Jila kwajat, wana ki chuu max ka tsch ti lowb kal an tiltsix Elas.
Dhjan tm kawidh na Jess ani chemchich tm.
Tmki jachan, an tolow kudhkum xi ta ti palat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xlan asta tekat ani asta chaat. An chabl lwkin, an pakdha tujub pokchon,
jakpin xon ti jolidh an chemlomtsik ani ejdh yn i chemlomtsik xin belmal na Dios tam ti xechinktsik ejat.
Jechtsik, kale xon ti kwajattsik jolidh tam ti ejnekich ti t na Jess ani ochichtsik ban tokat bitsow Jerusaln, xon ti chutat kal yn i atiklbtsik.

Tam ti an oklek soldadotsik ani xi t ti kwajattsik junax kal jaj ti belkol an ta Jess, in chuutsik lwkin an chabl ani ejtal xowa tmun, jikeytsik tajat ani in ulutsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal, jech an inik u Chakmlb kal na Dios.
T jeye ti kwajat i mmlbtsik ti w telom, xin juniknmaltsik na Jess asta Galilea ani in tjontsmaltsik.
J kwajat taltsik nin bij xi ttsik ti kwajat, na Mara Magdalena; na Mara nin nna na Jakobo ani na Jos; ani nin nna nin chakmiltsik na Sebedeo.
Tam ti exomich ti jikwchinal, ulich jun i tumnladh inik xu bijyb ta Jos, xu kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Arimatea, xin wwnmal jeye na Jess.
Jech na Jos kale kin chuu na Pilato ani in kontsi tin tul na Jess. Na Pilato in ulu ka pidhan.
Na Jos in bachu nin tul na Jess, in boliy kal jun i alabl kudhkum
ani in kwajba ba jun i t jlimtalb, xi jaj in ulmal ka cholkantsat ba jun i tujub chn. Tam tin paxkiymich an jlimtalb kal jun i yejche tujub, kalch tm.
Ani ttsik jeye ti kwajat na Mara Magdalena ani na jn na Mara, buxutsik tin tamt an jlimtalb.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, xi jaich tam watenekich xowki tu tojojoyb xowa u yntsinal tam in ktsjil an koyxnich, nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an fariseotsik kaletsik kin chuu na Pilato
ani in utsatsik ench: —Paylomlb, i chalpaymal ke jachan an kambix inik in ulmal tam ti bl ejat, ke neech ka ejech tin xlb a kts.

Jaxtm, i konyal abal ka abna ka beletn jachan an jlimtalb asta ka watey xi x a kts. Yab telab ka kale nin exbaliltsik akal, kin kweytsik nin tul na Jess ani tayl kin utsa an atiklbtsik ench: “Ejech ti t.” Max ka tmun anchan, jachan an kambixtalb ms tm plek k xi okox.
Utsantsik ench kal na Pilato: —T a kool i soldadotsik. Ki kaletsik junax ani ka paxkiytsik alwa an jlimtalb jelt xan ta chobtsik.
Kaletsik tm ani in paxkiytsik alwa an jlimtalb. In tsutskiytsik alwa nin paxkl jachan an jlimtalb ani in jila taja ti belkol an soldadotsik.
Tam ti watch in ktsjil an koyxnich ani exomich ti tsudhl tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, na Mara Magdalena ani na jn na Mara, kaletsik kin lna xon ti jolidh na Jess.
Jun jiktowl ti tujey ti lwk an chabl. Jaich abal jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb painek walki ani in wkoy an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb. Tayl, buxkan ban tujub.
An tokat abatwle chaxixl tajat jelt in tajx i ly tam u lamkil ani nin kudhkmil dhakni tajat jelti an chm.
Tam ti chutat an tokat abatwletsik kal an soldadotsik, an soldadotsik wipipilch kal i jkib ani jilkontsik jelti max chemnek.
Utsan tm ench an mmlbtsik kal an tokat abatwle: —Yab ki jikeytsik. Nan u chob abal a ayaltsik na Jess xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Yab waach tech, pos ejnek ti t, jelt xan tin ulmal. Jala ka chuutsik xon ti kwajbantsidh an tin tul.
Ki kaletsik jikat ani ka utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: “Jaj chemech por ejech ti t, okxinkich Galilea ani taja neech ka chuutsik.” Jech jaich xowa kool tu utsatsik.
Kale tm an mmlbtsik jikatki ban jlimtalb, u jikltsik por u kulbl; ani kaletsik jikat kin ltsi an exbaltsik.

Lejat neechtsik ti bl abal kin ltsi jech an exbaltsik, na Jess in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal an mmlbtsik ani chapndhtsik. Uteytsik tm an mmlbtsik ba na Jess, in muluknantsi tin akan ani tudhlantsik kutl asta chabl abal kin kakna.
Ani utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab ki jikeytsik. Ki kale ka ltsi an kidhblbtsik ke yejat ka kaletsik Galilea ani taja neech ti kin chuutsik.
Lejat an mmlbtsik kale kin ltsi an exbaltsik ejtal jech, taltsik an soldadotsik xi ta ti kwajat ti belkol, kale ban bitsow ani in ltsi nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ejtal xowa tmnk.
Jech an oklektsik, kale ti kw kal nin oklkil an judotsik ani tam tin chalpaymichtsik xanty neech kin taja, in pidhatsik tm yn ti tumn an soldadotsik
ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka ulutsik ke tam ti akal, lejat i kwajat ta wayaltsik, nin exbaliltsik na Jess ulich ani in kweytsik nin tul na Jess.
Ani max an pulek awiltalb kin chobna abal i waymadhtsik, waw neech ku kwin kal jaj abal yab xata ki utsantsik.
In bachu tm an tumn an soldadotsik ani in taja xan ti utsantsik. Ani anchan tin till an judotsik asta xo.
Xi lajujn an exbaltsik, kaletsik Galilea ba jun i chn xi bijtsidhich kal na Jess.
Ani tam ti chutat na Jess kal an exbaltsik, kakn, maske kal taltsik yab u lej belnal.
Utukntsik tm kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —In pidhan ejtal ti awiltalb ban walki ani ban chabl.
Jaxtm, ki kaletsik putlki an kayl ani ka oktsi an atiklbtsik xowa tu oktsmaltsik; ka pujaytsik tin bij an Ttalb, an Chakmlb ani an Tokat Ejattalb.
Ka oktsitsik kin taja ejtal xowa tu oktsmaltsik ka taja ani ka chobnatsik ke Nan in kwajat kal tattsik malill i kij, asta kin bajaw an pakwenib. Anchan ka tjan.
Ench ti kwajat dhutsadh xan ti tujey an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xowa in taja na Jesukristo, nin Chakmil na Dios.
An tiltsix Isaas in jilm dhutsadh xowa na Dios in utsa nin Chakmil. Ench tin jila dhutsadh: Neech ku aba nu abatwlejil abal ka okxin xon ti neech ki ulich. Jaj neech ti ki tojojontsi an ti bl.

Achat in kwintal jun xita ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh ani xu kw, in ulal kawidh ench: Ka tojojontschtsik tin blil an Ajtiklb. “Ka jnaichtsik jun i xechintalb alwa; abal anchan, ki kwajchtsik tojojodh tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb.”

Anchan ti tmun tam ti ulich na Juan ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. In pujyal taja an atiklbtsik ani in utsl abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom. In utsl ka pujanichtsik abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbiltsik kal na Dios.

Ejtal xu kwajltsik ban bitsow Jerusaln ani xu kwajltsik jeye ban kwentsaltsik xu taknal ban chabl xi Judea, u kaleltsik kin axtsi xowa in ulal na Juan. Tam kin lujutsik nin walastalbil, u pujybichtsik tm kal na Juan ban walja Jordn.
Na Juan u xeketlinal kal i xeketlb xi tajadh kal in xil an konl xu bijyb kameyo ani in wikl nin tsukul kal i t. Nin kapwl, jaich an pichich ani an alte chiik.
Jaj u tiltsix ench: —Wich u kibel ka ulich jun i inik xin kool ms i awiltalb k nan. Nan yab xata u y nibal abal kin kutpan ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab.
Nan tu pujymaltsik kal i ja, por Jaj neech ti ki pujaytsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Tam ti jachan i kij, kale na Jess ban bitsow Nasaret, xu taknal ban chabl xi Galilea ani ulich ban walja Jordn. Taja ti pujyat kal na Juan.
Tam tu kalelich ban ja, na Jess in chuu ti jakpin an walki ani in chuu an Tokat Ejattalb ti pal jelti jun i kuku ani buxkan tin b Jaj.
Achatm tm jun i kwintalb t walki. Xu kw in ulu ench: —Tat tu Chakmil ani tu kanidhl tajat. In kulbl tajat kal Tat.
Tayl, ijtsiyat na Jess kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal ka kale ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Kwajay taja chab inik a kts akal i kij xon tu kwajl an padhumtsik. Taja, t jeye ti kwajat an lej atax abal ka taktamiyat kl na Jess ani ta jeye ti kwajat i tokat abatwletsik xu tjontsb kl na Jess.
Tayl, tam ti balidhich na Juan ban wikaxte, na Jess kale Galilea. In tila taja an alwa tilab xin ulal xan tu takix na Dios.
In ulu ench: —Xo in bajch xowki neech ka tujch ti takyb an iniktsik kal na Dios. Ka jilaichtsik ta walablom ani ka belaichtsik an alwa tilab.
Jun i kij neech ti belal na Jess tin waltsik an pujal xi Galilea ani in chuu na Simn junax kal nin kidhb Andrs, xi kwajat in petnltsik nin jixb an tool ban ja, kom jajtsik u jixom tool.
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan. Tattsik i jixom tool, por xo neech tu oktsi xan ti ka aliy an atiklbtsik xi neech ti kin bela.
Jikatki tin jilatsik nin jixb an tool ani in wwnatsik na Jess.
In ntsi tm ti belal ani in chuu na Jakobo junax kal nin kidhb Juan. Jajtsik u chakmlb kal na Sebedeo ani kwajattsik jeye balidh bin tanil ti patskux tin jixb an tool.
In kaniytsik jeye abal ka junikn kl. In jilatsik tm nin tta Sebedeo ban tan kal an tojnaltsik ani kaletsik kal na Jess.
Kaletsik tm ban bitsow Kapernam ani tam tin bajch nin ktsjil an koyxnich, na Jess ochich ti oktsix ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
Labantsik tajat xin acha xan tu oktsix na Jess abal u oktsix kal yantam i awiltalb ani yab jelti an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
T jeye ti kwajat alt xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, jun i inik xi ochadh kal jun i atax ejattalb ani dhjaxin kawidh ench:
—Janty a l kal waw, Jess xi Nasaret? I tsinekxe abal ti ku kibdha? Nan tu exll ani u chob ke Tat i Tokat Chakmlb kal na Dios.
Kwiyan tm ench an atax ejattalb kal na Jess: —Ki chamkan ani ki kale ba jech an inik!
An atax ejattalb in wipipindha chapik an inik, dhjan kawidh ani tmki ti kale ba jachan an inik.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik laban tajat ani u tsxtsik ench: —Janty in l kin ulu jech xowa tmun? Jantom t oktsixtalb xin oktsixnl? Abal Jaj in kool i awiltalb kin utsa ka kale an atax ejattalb ani u axtsinal!
Ejtal xowa in taja na Jess, jikatki ti chobn kal ejtal xu kwajltsik ban pulek chabl xi Galilea.
Tam ti kalchtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, na Jess kale bin kim na Simn ani na Andrs, junikn kal na Jakobo ani na Juan.
Nin mm na Simn ta ti kwachat abal u kakl ani utsan na Jess, ke an mmlb u yaul.
Ochich tm xon ti kwajat an yaul, in tyna bin kubak ani in dhaya. Tsusbl ti wkon an kaklch. Tayl, kapundh na Jess kal an mmlb ani an junkiltsik jeye.
Tam ti ochenekich na kts ani jikwchinkich, jntsin xon ti kwajat na Jess ejtal an ti yaultsik ani ejtal jeye xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow, junkun tin tamt in wilbil an at.

Jeldh kal na Jess yn i yaultsik kal xowakich i yawlchtsik xin kool ani kldhantsat jeye yn ti atax ejattalb xi kl ti ochadhtsik. Na Jess u exlb kal an atax ejattalbtsik, jaxtm na Jess yab in walka kin ulutsik xitam j jeye Jaj.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, bl tajat jikwax ti chakay na Jess. Kale ban bitsow ani kale ti l walte xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Tayl, na Simn kl nin juniktsik kale kin aliy na Jess putlki.
Tam tin ela na Jess, in utsatsik ench: —Ejtaltsik exom ti ayal.
Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Wana ki lna an pl kwentsaltsik xi utat abal ku tiltsitsik jeye an ti alwa tilab, pos jaich tin tsinek tech ti kayl.
Anchan ti xechin na Jess ti tiltsix ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb putlki Galilea ani ti kldhantsix an ti atax ejattalbtsik.
Utukn tm na Jess kal jun i inik xu yaul kal an kwajat atax tt, tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Max a l, neech ka ejto ti kin jeldha kal jeche an yawlch xu kool.
Na Jess in yajnantsi an yaul, in taka ani in utsa ench: —U l ani xo i jelch.
Tmki ti wkon ejtal an kwajat atax tt ani jilkon jelnek an inik.

Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab xita ka ltsi xowa tu tajtsi. Tokot ki kale xon ti kwajat nin pleil an israelitatsik abal ki chutat ani ka kwajbantsi na Dios an ti pikbantsixtalb jelt xan tin ulmal na Moiss abal kin chobna ejtaltsik ke i jelch.

Por tam ti kalch an inik, in tuju kin tiltsi xitakich xowa tajtsin kal na Jess. Putlki tin tila. Jaxtm na Jess yabich in ejto ka xechin tametlb ba ni jun i bitsow. U jilkonal xon ti yab kwajtsidh, por blki u utuknb kal an atiklbtsik xi tl putlki.
Tayl, tam ti watenekich chb x a kts, witsiy jun na Jess ban bitsow xi Kapernam. Tam ti chobn abal ta ti kwajat ban at xon tu kubl,
jikatki ti junkun yn i atiklbtsik ke nibalich ejtidh tin tamt in wilbil an at ani Jaj in tiltsaltsik tin kwintal na Dios.
Ulich tm i iniktsik xin tsidhl jun i yaul inik xi yab in ejtowal ti belal. Kitmte tu tsidhb bin chaytil kal ch ti b.

In lwiik kin dhatsik alt xon ti kwajat na Jess, por yab in ejtotsik abal ta ti kwajat yn i atiklbtsik. Xowa in tajatsik tm, kadhiytsik tin b an at ani in wixkintsi w tin jujl. Taja tin dha ani tin paba an yaul kal nin chaytil asta xon ti kwajat na Jess.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu xanty in tajatsik, in chobna abal u belnal kal jajtsik; jaxtm tin utsa ench an inik: —Jab, na walastalbil pakwlantsidh ti kwajat.
T jeye ti buxutsik chb x i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xin chalpayaltsik ench:
“Jantki tu kw yab alwa jech an inik? Abal u kw jelti max u Dios. Tokot a Dios in ejtowal ti pakwlantsix an ti walastalb.”
Por na Jess in chobna xanty u chalpantsb kal an oktsixtsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki tin chalpantsal anchan?
Jowa ms yab tojlb ku utsa an yaul: “Na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat”, o ku utsa: “Ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley”?
Pos neech tu xalkantsitsik ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb tech ti chabl abal ku pakwlantsi i walastalbtsik. Utsan tm ench an yaul kal na Jess:
—Ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki kalch ta kim.

Chakay tm an inik, in dhaya nin chaytil ani kalch tm tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik. Ejtal xi tajatsik ti kwajat, laban tajat, in pubdhantsaltsik tin bij na Dios ani in ulaltsik ench: —Yab jayki i chumal jun xata jelti jech.
Tayl, witsiy jun na Jess bin waltsik an pujal ani tam ti an atiklbtsik utey xon ti Jaj kwajat, in oktsitsik.

Tam ti exomich ti watel ban bl, in chuu jun i inik buxl xon tu bachwb an jalbixtalb abal an chabl xi Roma. An bachkul tumn in bij ta Leb, nin kwitlil na Alfeo. Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan. Chakay tm na Leb ani in wwna.
Tayl, na Jess kwajat ti kapul bin kim na Leb junax kal nin exbaliltsik, kal yn i bachkul jalbixtalb ani kal an walablomtsik kom yn xita kl ti wwnadh.
