Por an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ani an fariseotsik, tam tin chuu ti kapul na Jess junax kal an walablomtsik ani kal an bachkul jalbixtalb, in konoy ench an exbaltsik: —Jantki tu kapul na Oktsxal kal an bachkul jalbixtalb ani kal an walablomtsik?

Tam ti na Jess in acha xowa in ulutsik, in utsatsik ench: —Xu yaul, jaich nin yntsal an illix; xi yab u yaul, yab in yntsal. Anchan jeye, an walablomtsik jaich xita tin yntsal. Jaxtm, Nan yab in tsinek ku aliy xi xeechtsik lujat, in tsinek ku aliy xi walbidhtsik abal ki jilaichtsik ti walablom.

Jun i kij, tam ti nin exbaliltsik na Juan klin ani nin exbaliltsik jeye an fariseotsik, ulich chb x i atiklbtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess abal ka konyat ench: —Jantki tu kl an fariseotsik, nin exbaliltsik jeye na Juan ani na exbaliltsik yaba?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Awxe neech kin ejto ka klintsik xi kanidh ba jun i tomkixtalb tam bl kwajat an tomkinl inik kal jajtsik? Yaba!
Por neech kin bajaw an kij tam an tomkinl inik neech ka wixkintsat ani nechich jeye tm ka klintsik.
Yab xita in patskuyal i kej xeketlb kal jun peje i t kudhkum; pos an t kudhkum, u muchel ani in michl ms an kej kudhkum.

Nibal u balyb an t yajtsik uxnl ban kej t balixtalb; pos max ka tajan anchan, an t yajtsik uxnl in michl an kej t balixtalb, neech tm ka waklan an yajtsik uxnl ani an t balixtalb u kibchonal. Jaxtm ti yejat ka balyat an t yajtsik uxnl ban t t balixtalb abal chablam yab ka kibchon.
Jun i sbado, xi jaich nin ktsjil an koyxnich, na Jess xeech ba jun i alelb xon ti tayadh i trigo ani nin exbaliltsik in tuju kin puu an trigo abal kin kapu.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an fariseotsik: —Ka tela, jantki tin tajl i tojlb na exbaliltsik xi yab alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil i koyxnich?

Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik xowa in taja na Dabid junax kal nin juniktsik tam ti bl ejat na Abiatar, nin oklkil an pletsik? Kaaytsik tajat ani yab in kool xata kin kapu.

Jaxtm ti ochich na Dabid ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in kapu an pan xi pikbantsidh na Dios maske yab jaj in bijtsl kin kapu. Tokot in bijtsl kin kapu an pletsik. Na Dabid yab u ple, por in kapu jachan an pan ani in pidha jeye nin juniktsik.
Utsantsik jeye ench: —Na Dios in jila nin ktsjil an koyxnich abal tin alwabl an iniktsik ani yab abal kin koy jelti jun i tojlixtalb.
Jaxtm, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb abal ku ulu xowa alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.
Tayl, ochich jun na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani taja, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i inik xi mulkank in kubak.
T jeye ti kwajat i atiklbtsik ti kwchix abal u lenb ka chutat max na Jess kin jeldha an yaul tin ktsjil an koyxnich, pos max kin jeldha, in chalpayaltsik tm kin lna.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess an inik xi mulkank nin kubak: —Ki kubey n junax chejel.

Utsan tm ench an atiklbtsik kal na Jess: —Janty alwa ki taja tam in ktsjil an koyxnich? Ki taja xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa? Alwaxe ki jeldha an yaultsik o ki walba ka chemech? Por yabtsik in ela xan ti ka tkon.
Na Jess chakuy ani tepin tam tin teloloy xi ta ti bukl abal yabtsik tajat in l kin exbay. In utsa tm ench an inik xi mulkank nin kubak: —Ka lujku na kubak. In lujku tm ani jeley.
Kaletsik tm an fariseotsik ani kale ti junkunal kal in kidhtal na Erodes abal kin chalpaytsik junax xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess.
Por na Jess kale bin wl an pujal junax kal nin exbaliltsik ani wwn kal yn i atiklbtsik xi tl Galilea.

Tam ti chobn ke na Jess in tajl an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb, ulich tm xon ti Jaj kwajat yn i atiklbtsik xi tl Judea ani xi tl Jerusaln, xi tl Idumea, xi tl tin ejtsm kalel kts kal an walja Jordn ani xi tl jeye ban chabl xi Tiro ani Sidn.
Jaxtm na Jess tin utsa nin exbaliltsik abal kin koy tojojodhich jun i tan xon ti ka balin max ka nichokn kal tin kwenta nin yanl an atiklbtsik.
Kom ynich xita in jeldhmal, ejtal an yaultsik tokot u nxkxtsik abal in l ka utey kin taka na Jess.
T jeye ti kwajat xi ochadhtsik kal i atax ejattalbtsik. Tam ka chutat na Jess kal jajtsik, u tudhlanal tin tamt na Jess ani u dhajnal tilomtsik chapik ench: —Tat i Chakmlb kal a Dios!
Por utsantsik abal yab kin ulu xitam j jeye na Jess.
Tayl, kadhiy na Jess ba jun i chn ani in kaniytsik xita Jaj in lena abal ka junikn kl. Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti Jaj kwajat,
in takuy tm lajuchb i iniktsik abal ka xechin kal Jaj ani abal kin abatsik kin tila an alwa tilab.
In pidhatsik ti awiltalb abal kin jeldha i yaultsik ani kin kldha i atax ejattalbtsik.
J kwajat nin bij xi lajuchb in takuy: Jn u Simn xin bijiy jeye ta Pedro,
na Jakobo kl nin kidhb Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo. Jech chb in bijiy jeye ta Boanerjes. Jech an bijlb in l kin ulu, in chakmiltsik i junkil b.
Na Andrs, na Felipe, na Bartolom, na Mateo, na Toms ani na Jakobo, xu chakmlb kal na Alfeo. Na Tadeo ani na Simn; jech na Simn jaich xu taknal kal an junkunl xu bijyb kananista.
Takwyat jeye na Judas Iskariote, xi tayl pidhnaxin an ta Jess abal ka chemdh.
Junkun jun yn i atiklbtsik ke asta nibalich u jolkanal ti kapul na Jess ani nin exbaliltsik.
Tam tin chobnatsik jech nin at kidhtal na Jess, kale ti iktb abal in chalpayaltsik max olmank na Jess.

Ulich jeye an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios, xi tltsik Jerusaln ani in ulaltsik ench: —Jech an inik kwajat teykmte kal an lej atax, nin oklkil an atax ejattalbtsik ani kal tin chp an lej atax tin kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik.

Jaxtm tin kaniy na Jess ka utey xon ti Jaj kwajat xin ulutsik anchan. In wiltsitsik tm chb x ti kw abal kin exbay an tsubaxtalb, in utsatsik ench: —Janti neech kin ejto an lej atax kin kldha tinb xi kwajat bin itsch an iniktsik?
Max an atiklbtsik xu taknal ba jun i bitsow ka kxin kwene ti kwene ani ka pjxin kal in at kidhtal, jachan an bitsow neech ka taley.
Anl jeye, max xu kwajltsik ba jun i at ka pjxintsik, neech ka kxin.
Max an lej atax ka kwajay ti pjx kal in at atax, yabich neech kin ejto ti oklek. Neech ka okon nin awiltal.
Ni jun xita neech kin ejto ka ochich bin kim jun i likat inik ani kin kntsi xowa in kool max yab kin wika okox. Tokot neech kin ejto kin kntsi xowa in kool max kin wika okox.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke na Dios neech kin pakwlantsi ejtal tin walab an iniktsik ani an atax odhbijixtalb jeye xu usnal.
Por xita kin odhbijiy an Tokat Ejattalb, yab jayki neech ka pakwlantsat kal na Dios; neech ka jilkon walbidh malill i kij.
Anchan tin ulu na Jess kom u usnal ke Jaj in kool jun i atax ejattalb.
Ulich tm nin nna ani nin kidhbtsik na Jess, in abna ka kantsin an ta Jess ani jajtsik jilkon elb.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal xi ta ti buxutsik wilill xon ti Jaj kwajat: —Na nna ani na kidhbtsik ta kwajat n elb ani ti ayal.
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —A exlltsikxe xita j nu nna ani nu kidhbtsik?
In tela tm xi ta ti buxutsik wilill ani in ulu ench: —Jechtsik jaich xi kwajattsik jelti nu nna ani jelti nu kidhbtsik.
Pos xita in tajl xowa in l na Dios, jachan jaich nu kidhb, nu ixm ani nu nna.

Jun i kij, na Jess tujey jun ti oktsix bin wl an pujal, junkun yn i atiklbtsik xon ti Jaj kwajat ani wiliyat. Jaxtm ti balin na Jess ba jun i tan xi kwajat ban pujal ani buxkan, an atiklbtsik jilkon tin wl an pujal.
In oktsitsik tm yn xata, por kal i junbaxtalbki. Tam ti exomich in oktsal, in utsatsik ench:
—Ka achatsik jech an junbaxtalb xi neech tu tiltsi: Jun i kij, kale jun i inik ti bkul iyalb bin ale.
Tam ti exomich in bukwal an iyalb, taltsik kwajlan ban bl, ulich an chichintsik ani in kapu.
Taltsik an iyalb, kwajlan ban tujublom xon ti yab lej owtsik an lukuk ani jikat ti ixkan.
Por tam ti yajb an kakal, batey ani kom yab owtsik tin kool nin ibl, wayey.
Taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban kdhlom, pakey an kdhtsik ani in paxkiy an tayablb ani yab xata in koy.
Por taltsik an iyalb kwajlan xon ti alwa an chabl, ixkan, pakey ani labey tajat. Taltsik, kal jn tokot an iyalb xi tayan, in koy jun inik lju itsixlek; taltsik, ox inik ani taltsik, bo inik.
In utsatsik tm ench xi ta ti kwajattsik: —Xita in kool nin ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa u ulal.
Tayl, tam ti jilkonich kwetm na Jess, konyat kal xi ta ti kwajattsik jeye kunat junax kal xi lajuchb an exbaltsik xanty in l kin ulu jachan an junbaxtalb xin ulu.
Utsantsik ench: —Tattsik, ti pidhl na Dios ka chobna xowa in kool yab tejwa kal tin kwenta xan ti Jaj tu takix. Por xi yabtsik tin bell, tokot u oktsaltsik kal i junbaxtalb.
Abal anchan, maske in chutaltsik, por jyki max yab in chutal; in achltsik, por yab in exbayal. Anchan yab neech ka uteytsik kal Nan abal ku pakwlantsi tin walastalbiltsik.
Utsantsik jeye ench: —Yab a exbayaltsik jech an junbaxtalb? Pos max yab a exbayaltsik, jan ti neech ka ejto ka exbaytsik xi ms an junbaxtalb?
An inik xu bkul iyalb, in junwal jelti xin till nin kwintal na Dios.

Xowa u tmnal kal taltsik an atiklbtsik xin achl nin kwintal na Dios, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan ban bl. Tam in achmalich, u utuknb kal an lej atax ani u tajnal kin uktsi xowa in achmal.
Xowa u tmnal kal xi keet an atiklbtsik, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan xon ti yab lej waach an lukuk. In achl nin kwintal na Dios ani in bachwal kal i kulbtalb.
Por eb itschki, jaxtm ti yab u owel an kulbtalb; pos tam kin tamu jun xata yajtsik o ka atantsik abal in bachmal nin kwintal na Dios, in jilltsik kin bela.
Xowa u tmnal kal xi keettsik, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan ban kdhlom. In achltsik nin kwintal na Dios,

por u chalpaxtsik tajat kal xowa in ltsik kin taja ani u kambiybtsik kal an tumn abal in chalpayaltsik ke an tumn u kijidhmdhom. In ltsik jeye tajat kin koy ejtal xowa waach. Jaxtm, max jaich tokot in chalpmtsik echeki, in uktsal nin kwintal na Dios ani yab u tjnal ni jun xata alwa ba jajtsik.

Por xowa u tmnal kal xi keettsik, in junwal jelt xan ti tmun kal an iyalb xi kwajlan ban chabl xi alwa. Tam in achltsik nin kwintal na Dios, in bachwal ani in belltsik kal yantam in ejattal. Jechtsik in junwal jelti an tayablb xi labey tajat. Taltsik, kal jn tokot an iyalb xi tayan, in pidhna jun inik lju itsixlek, taltsik in pidhna ox inik itsixlek ani xi taltsik, in pidhna bo inik.
Utsantsik jeye ench: —Awxe u letkoyb jun i tajbaxtalb abal ka paxkiyat kal jun i kajn o abal ka kwajb bin l i waytalb? Yaba! An tajbaxtalb u letkoyb ani u kwajbb tekat abal ka tajbaxin alwa.
Pos yab waach ni jun xata chinat xi yab neech ka xalk tayl, nibal waach ni jun xata yab tejwa xi yab neech ka chobn.
Max a kooltsik a ochoxtal alwa, ka exbaytsik xowa u ulal.

Utsantsik jeye: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal xowa exom a achl. Max w i chplb ka tajatsik abal ka exbay, w jeye neech ki pidhantsik ka exbay kal na Dios. Por max yn i chplb ka tajatsik, yn jeye neech ki pidhantsik ani ms tajat neech ki pidhan ka exbaytsik kal na Dios.
Xin exbayaltsik, neech ka tolmiyat ms kal na Dios abal kin exbay; ani xi yab in lej exbayal, neech ka tajan kin uktsitsik kal na Dios xowa w in exbaymal.
In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Xan tu takix na Dios in junwal jelti jun i inik xi kale ti m bin ale.
Tam mmadhich, neech tm ka kalch ti wayal ani tam ka tsudhey neech ka chakay. Ani anchanki, tsudhl u tajkanal u watel an kij. Lejat an iyalb u ixkanal ani u pubel, por jaj yab in chob xan ti.
An chabl jaich nin ixkandhl an tayablb ani in pubedhl. Okox u xeknal, u wixnal ani tayl u walim.
Tam kin bajch nin yjnk an tayablb, an dhabal neech tm kin junkuntsch an tin wall abal in bajmalich an kij ka junkuwat.
In ntsi ti kw ani in ulu jeye ench: —Neech jeye tu tiltsitsik keet ti junbaxtalb abal tu ltsi xan tu takix na Dios.
In junwal jelt in itsch an mostasa. Jech, jaich an iyalb xi ms tsitsik xu taynal tech ti kayl,
por tam tayadhich, u ixkanal ani u pubel ms k xi keet an tayablbtsik. In kyal tajat pakdha in kwel, in kyal tajat i chalam ani an chichintsik in tajl taja nin pkw.
Anchan ti oktsintsik an ti tsubaxtalb kal na Jess. Yn i junbaxtalb tiltsintsik jelti jech abal ka oktsintsik xantiki kin ejtotsik kin exbay.
Tokot kal i junbaxtalbki tin oktsaltsik, por nin exbaliltsik, in wiltsal ejtal xowa in l kin ulu an junbaxtalb tam kwajatichtsik kwetm.
Tam ti dhamch jachan a kts, in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Wana ku watey jun pake pujal.
In jila tm an atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat bin wl an pujal ani kaletsik kal an tan xon ti kwajat balidh. T jeye ti kwajat i atiklbtsik ba keet i tantsik ani kale jeye kin junikna na Jess.
Jun jiktowle ti tujey ti wawnal jun i chapik ik ani in mlkindha an ja. Ochich an ja ban tan ke asta wich tajat ka tsutsich an tan kal an ja.
Na Jess kwajat ti wayal ba jun i latsiklb tin kx an tan. Bakyat tm kal nin exbaliltsik ani utsan ench: —Oktsix! Yabxe a dhl ti kwenta max ku lupun?
Chakay tm na Jess in kwiya an ik ani in utsa ench an pujal: —Ki chamkan! Yabich ki kuchun! Tmki ti kublan ti wawnal an ik ani jilkon chamamadh tajat.
Utsan tm ench an exbaltsik kal na Jess: —Jantki ta jikltsik ani jantki ti yabtsik tin bell?
Jikeytsik tajat ani u tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jantom awiltalb in kool jech an inik abal u axtsinal tam kin tawna an ik ani an pujal?
Ulichtsik tm jun pake pujal ban chabl xin bij Gadara.
Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kalel ban tan, ulich jun i inik xi kwajat ochadh kal i atax ejattalb. Jaj tl xon tu jolyb an chemlomtsik
abal tajaich u kwajl; kom watats ti olmankich, yabich u ejtowb ka yakwan, nibal ka wikan kal i patl.
Yantalich wiktsidh tin akan ani tin kubak kal i patl, por tyidh in tapyal ani in muwal an patl. Kal ni jun xita tu ejtowb ka t.
Akal i kij u xechinal ti dhajnal ban chnlom, ban jlimtalb ani in chojbdhl tinb kal i tujub.
Tam ti w chutat na Jess, jlch an inik abal kin utukna ani tudhlan tin tamt.
Ani kawidh ti utsan ench na Jess: —Jess, xi Chakmlb kal na Dios xi plek tajat, janty a l kal nan? Tu kontsal kal tin bij na Dios abal yab ti kin lej watpintsi an ti yajtsiktalb.
Anchan tin ulu abal kwajatich ti usnal ench kal na Jess: —Atax ejattalb, ki kale ba jech an inik!
Konyat tm ench an atax ejattalb kal na Jess: —Jan ta bij? Jaj tkon ench: —Nan u bij Lejin, kom yn tajat tu b.
Pakabdh tajat na Jess kal jn ti b an atax ejattalb abal yab ka abantsik pl chabl ti kwajl.
Kom ta ti xeech taja utat ban chn yn i olom ti kapupl,
pakabdh na Jess kal ejtal an atax ejattalbtsik ench: —Ti ku walka ku ochich ban olomtsik xi n xeech.

Tokontsat tm kal na Jess xowa in konoytsik, kale tm an atax ejattalbtsik ban inik ani ochich ban olomtsik. Chab mil xna in yanl an olomtsik, bololl ti kale adhik ban chn, in petna tinb ban pujal ani taja ti lupuntsik.
jlchtsik tm an belkol olomtsik, kale ban bitsow ani bin waltsik an bitsow abal kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik xanty tmun. An atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow kaletsik tm kin chuu xanty tmnk.
Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess, chutat an inik xi teykmtewiik kal an atax ejattalbtsik, buxlichki, xeketlidhich ani juntam anikijich. Jikey an atiklbtsik xi ulich ti telom.
Xin chuutsik xanty tmun kal an inik xi kwajatwiik teykmte kal an atax ejattalbtsik ani xanty jeye tmun kal an olomtsik, jaich kl ti tiltsin an atiklbtsik xi ulich.
Tujey tm ti pakabdhb na Jess kal an atiklbtsik abal ka kalch ba jachan an chabl.
Tam ti na Jess exomich ti ochel ban tan, an inik xi teykmtewiik kal an atax ejattalb in pakabdha na Jess abal ka jn jeye kal Jaj.
Por na Jess yab in lena, tokot in utsa ench: —Ki kalch ta kim xon ti kwajat na jabtsik, ka tiltsi ejtal xanty ti tajtsmal an Okxlb ani xan ti kontsmal ti yajnantsixtalb.

Kale an inik ani tujey tm kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba xi lju an bitsowtsik xu taknal Dekpolis an ti pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb xowa tajtsin kal na Jess. Tam tin achatsik xowa tiltsin, labantsik tajat.
Ochich tm na Jess ban tan ani tam ti ulich jun jun pake pujal, yn i atiklbtsik junkun wilill xon ti kwajat na Jess.
Ulich jun i inik xin bij ta Jairo xu oklek jeye ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Tam ti chutat na Jess, tudhlan na Jairo tin tamt
ani pakabdh ench: —Nu tsidhnil exomich ti chemel, jala ka puntsi an ta kubak bin tul abal ka jeley ani yab ka chemech.
Kale tm na Jess kal na Jairo ani yn kale ti juniknax. Kal nin yanl an atiklbtsik, u nichoknbich tajat na Jess.
T jeye ti kwajat jun i mmlb xin kidhbaymalich lajuchb i tamub ti yaul kal i lakmtalb ani yab u jell.
In watnmalich tajat yajtsik kal yn i illixtsik, in pakmalich ejtal nin tumnal ti illnal, por yab u elbml; ms tokot yawlchich.

An mmlb in achmal an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl na Jess ani in chalpayal ench: “Max ku ejto ku taktsi tin kudhkmil, neech kin jeley.” Jaxtm ti utey tin yanl an atiklbtsik xi ta ti tl, in utukna na Jess tin kx ani in taktsi tin kudhkmil.
Tmki ti kublan ti yaul ani in chobna abal jelch.
Na Jess in acha abal jeley jun xita kal an chplb xin kool, chawkin ani konoxin ench: —Jita tin taktsi tu kudhkmil?
Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —A tellich p j kwajat yn i atiklbtsik ti kichkm, ani bl a konyal xita ti taka?
Por na Jess in teloloy putl abal kin chuu xitam j na takxink.
Utey tm an mmlb ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess u wipipl kal i jkib abal in chob xanty tmnk kal jaj. An mmlb in utsa ejtal na Jess kal tin kwenta xowa in tajm.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, i jeley abal i belmch. Awil ki kalch tsububudh a itsch, i jelch kal an yawlch xa koolwiik.
Tam ti na Jess bl kwajat ti tilom, ulich chb x i iniktsik xi tl tin kim na Jairo ani utsan ench: —Na tsidhnil chemech, yabich ka tojliy an Oktsix.
Na Jess in acha xowa ulwat ani in utsa ench na Jairo: —Yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, ka bela tokot abal Nan neech ku ejto tu tolmiy.
Kale tm na Jess kal na Jairo ani tokot in walka ka junikn kal na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan, nin kidhb na Jakobo.
Tam ti ulich bin kim jachan an inik xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in acha abal kbalich tajat an ukil ani an dhajal abal chemech an tsidhan.
Ochich tm na Jess ban alt ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta uknaltsik ani ta dhajnaltsik? An tsidhan yab chemnek, u wayalki ti kwajat.
Jajtsik in labdhnaki tokot na Jess. Utsantsik tm kal na Jess abal ka kale ejtal elb, ochich ban alt xon ti kwajat an tsidhan junkmte kal an ttalb, an nnalb ani xi kalnek an ti junkiltsik.
In tynantsi tm tin kubak an tsidhan ani kwin arameo ench: —Talita, kumi. Ti tnek kw, in l kin ulu: Tsidhan, ki chakay.
Tmki ti chakay ani beley jachan an tsidhan xin kool lajuchb i tamub ani ejtaltsik xin chuu jech, labantsik tajat.
Por utsantsik tajat kal na Jess abal yab xita kin tiltsi xowa in taja ani utsan kin pidha ti kapul an tsidhan.
Kale tm taja na Jess junkmte kal nin exbaliltsik ani kale ban bitsow xon ti pubenek.

Tam tin bajch nin ktsjil an koyxnich, kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kwajay ti oktsix. Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti axtsin xowa in ulu ani labantsik tajat. U tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jn ti kalnek kin exbna jech xowa in oktsixnl? In ulutsik jeye: Jantom witomtalb xi jech pidhnk ani jan tin tajl an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik?

In ulutsik jeye ench: Yabxe jaich an dhakm, nin chakmil na Mara, nin kidhb na Jakobo, na Jos, na Judas ani na Simn? Yabxe tech jeye u kwajl nin ixmtsik? Jaxtm tu pojkb ani yab u beltsinal xowa in oktsixnl.
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Putlki tu kaknb jun i tiltsix, tokotki bin chablil, kal nin kidhtaltsik ani kal xu kwajltsik bin kim ti yab u kaknb.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti yab in ejto na Jess kin taja ni jun i labidh labandhaxtalb taja bin bitswil. Tokot in kwajba nin kubak bin b in k chb x i yaultsik ani in jeldha.
Laban tajat na Jess abal yab beltsin kal jajtsik. Kale tm taja, kale kin loniy an kwentsaltsik xi taja utat ani in oktsitsik.

In junku tm xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani in pidha ti awiltalb kin kldhantsi ti atax ejattalb xita kwajat teykmte kl. In aba chabtsik ti chabtsik abal kin taja xowa utsan, por tam ti yabl kalnektsik, utsantsik abal yab kin jna xata abal an bl; yab kin jna i morrl, nibal i kapnl, nibal i tumn, tokot kin jna jun in kwayab.
Utsantsik ke tokot kin jna nin pajab xin pajbm ani nin kudhkmil xin kwajbm, yab kin jnatsik chb.
Utsantsik jeye ench: —Xowakich an kimdh xon ti ki bachwat, ki kwajay taja asta kin bajaw xowki neech ki kale ba jachan an bitsow.

Max ki ulich ba jun i bitsow xon ti yab ki bachwat ani yab ti ki axtsitsik, ki kale, ka tiniy an pojodh xi palenek ba na akan jelti jun i exl abal kin chobnatsik ke yab alwa xan ti tajtsitsik ani ki kaletsik tm pl bitsow. Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, an atiklbtsik xi yab ti bachu xu kwajltsik ba jachan an bitsow, ms ja plek an yajtsiktalb neech kin bachu k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek Sodoma ani xi Gomorra.
Kale tm nin exbaliltsik an ti tiltsix ani in utsl an atiklbtsik abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani ka utchtsik ba na Dios.
Yn tajat xin kldhantsitsik ti atax ejattalb xi kwajattsik teykmte kl. Yn jeye i yaultsik in majuy kal i asyte ani jeley.

An pulek takix Erodes in acha xowa in tajl na Jess kom putlki tu tilnal ejtal xowa in tajl. Jaxtm tin ulu ench: —Jech jaich xna na Juan xu Pujax, xi chemdh ani xo ejnekich ti t; jaxtm tin kool an awiltalb abal kin taja an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik.
Xi keettsik in ulal ench: —Jaich an tiltsix xin bij Elas. Taltsik in ulal: —Jaich jun i tiltsix jelti an weje tiltsixtsik.
Tam ti na Erodes in acha xowa in ulal an atiklbtsik, in ulu tm ench: —Jech jaich na Juan xu Pujax, xi nan u abna ka kotsin tin k ani xo ejnekich ti t.

Xowa tmnk jaich jech: na Erodes in abnmal ka balyat ban wikaxte na Juan xu Pujax wikadh kal i patl kal tin kwentaki na Erodas. Jech na Erodas, kwajat tomkidh kal na Felipe, nin kidhb na Erodes, por na Erodes junkun kal jech an mmlb ani in taja tin tomtal.
Jaxtm ti utsan ench na Erodes kal na Juan: —Yab tajat alwa abal a tajmal ta tomtal na atml.
Na Erodas in atl tajat na Juan ani in l kin chemdha, por yab in ejtowal

abal na Erodes in chob alwa ke na Juan, jaich jun i lujat inik ani tokat, jaxtm tin jiknl. Jaxtm ti yab in walkl ka chemdh na Juan kal na Erodas. Maske na Erodes yab in lej exbantsal alwa xowa in ulal na Juan, u jilkonal tajat ti chalpax tam in axtsal an tin takixtal kal yantam i kulbtalb.

Por na Erodas in ela an kij abal ka chemdh na Juan, tam ti na Erodes in ajbna nin tambil ani tajtsin jun i pulek kapxnich an pakdha awiltalb, an pakdha oklek soldadotsik ani ejtal an ultalb tjodhtsik xi Galilea.

Tam ti exomich an kapch, ochich nin tsidhnil na Erodas ani bixmch. Na Erodes ani ejtal xi kanidhtsik, watats tin kulbetna xan ti bixmch an tsidhan, jaxtm na Erodes tin utsa ench an tsidhan: —Ti kin kontsi xowa ka lena ani neech tu pidha.
Ani in utsa lej tsubax ench: —Neech tu pidha xowa ti kin kontsi, maske ti kin kontsi asta junax chejel an chabl xu takyal.
Kale tm an tsidhan kin konoy nin nna ani in utsa ench: —Janty ku kontsi? Utsan ench kal nin nna: —Ka kontsi tin k na Juan xu Pujax.
Witsiy tm dhubatki an tsidhan xon ti kwajat an pulek takix ani in utsa ench: —U l ti kin pidha xoich balidh ba jun i talab nin k na Juan xu Pujax.
An pulek takix watats ti tepin tam tin acha xowa kontsin, por kom yab in lena ka jilkon tidhetl tin tamt an ajblomtsik, kool in taja xowa kontsin.
An pulek takix in aba jun i soldado abal ka tsidhantsat tmki tin k na Juan. Kale tm jachan an soldado ban wikaxte ani in kotsi tin k na Juan.
Tsidhantsat tm ba jun i talab, pidhan an tsidhan ani an tsidhan in jntsi nin nna.
Tam ti nin exbaliltsik na Juan in chobna xanty in tammal na Juan, kale kin dhaytsi tin putll nin tul ani in jnaichtsik tm abal kin joliy.
Ms tayl, witsiy an abatwletsik xon ti kwajat na Jess ani in tiltsitsik xowa in tajmaltsik ani xowa in oktsixnmal.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Wana xon ti yab xita u kwajl abal ki ejto jun w tu koyol. Anchan ti utsantsik abal yn an atiklbtsik xu ulel ani xu kalel ani nibalich u jolkanaltsik ti kapul.
Balintsik tm ba jun i tan ani kale xon ti yab xita u kwajl abal kin ejtotsik ka kwajay kwetm.

Por kal yn ti chutat tam ti kalchtsik ani exl na Jess abal ta jeye ti neech. Jaxtm an atiklbtsik xi tl ba putlki an bitsowtsik, adhik ti kale xon ti neech ka ulich na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ani okoxtsik ti ulich.

Tam ti na Jess kale ban tan, ynich tajat an atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat taja. In kontsi tajat ti yajnantsixtalb abal kwajattsik jelti borrego xi yab in kool xita kl ti ka beletn. Ani yn xata oktsintsik kal na Jess.
Tam ti wklch, utey nin exbaliltsik ani utsan ench na Jess: —Exomich ti dhamul ani tech yab xita u kwajl.
Ka aba an atiklbtsik ban attsik ani ban kwentsaltsik xi tech utat abal kin chaay xanty kin kapu, pos tech yab xata waach xanty kin kapu.

Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka pidha tattsik ti kapul. An exbaltsik tkon ench: —Yab neech ki ejto, pos neech ki yntsi chb i bo inik i denariotsik abal ki chaytsi ti kapnl ejtal jech an atiklbtsik.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jy i pan a kooltsik? Ki kale ka chuu. Kaletsik tm kin chuu ani tam ti witsiy in utsa ench na Jess: —I kool b i pan ani chb i tool.
Na Jess in aba nin exbaliltsik abal kin utsa an atiklbtsik ka buxkan kwene ti kwene ban yax tm,
ani buxkantsik tm ti kwenetsik. Taltsik an kwene ti bo inik, an xi keet an kwene ti chab inik lju.

In bachu tm na Jess xi b an pan ani xi chb an tool, in tela walki ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios. Tam tin tajmich jech, in peja an pan ani in pidhaich tm nin exbaliltsik abal kin pidha an atiklbtsik. Anchan jeye tin taja kal xi chb an tool.
Ejtaltsik kapch asta ajw
ani bl junkuwat lajuchb i x tsutsutsik kal an pejadh pan ani an pejadh tool xi jilkonich.
Nin yanl xi kapchtsik, bo mil i iniktsik.
Tayl, na Jess in aba nin exbaliltsik ka balin ban tan ani ka okxin ka kale jun pake pujal ban bitsow Betsayda, lejat Jaj in abl an atiklbtsik ka kalch tin kim.
Tam tin tala abmich ka kaletsik, kadhiy ba jun i chn ti l.
Tam ti aklch, an tan kwajatich junax chejel an pujal ani na Jess jilkonk kwetm ban chabl.

Na Jess in chuu nin exbaliltsik ti xaltsix kal yn i chplb abal u nixkbtsik kal an chapik ik ani jaxtm ti yab in ejtowaltsik kin beldha an tan. Tam ti dhajaw akalich, na Jess beley bin b an ja asta xon talat ti kwajattsik ani wala ka jekwattsik.
Por tam ti chutat ti belal bin b an ja, an exbaltsik in chalpay max i labax ani dhjantsik.
Kal ejtal ti chutat ani jikeytsik tajat. Por Jaj in utsatsik ench: —Ka likedhatsik tab! Nan, yab ki jikeytsik.
Ochichich tm na Jess ban tan xon ti kwajattsik ani tsusbl ti kublan ti wawnal an ik. Nin exbaliltsik laban tajat ani u jikltsik
abal yabl in exbaymaltsik xanty in l kin ulu tam tin yanedha an pan, pos yabtsik tajat in ejtowal kin exbay.
Tam tin watnaichtsik an pujal, ulich ban chabl xin bij Jenesaret ani taja tin wika an tan tin wl an pujal.
Tokot ti kaletsik ban tan, dhubatki ti exl na Jess.
An atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl, adhiktsik ti kale tki tki abal kin iki an yaultsik kwachat ban chayte ani kin jna asta xon ti kin acha xeech na Jess.
Xontiki ka ochich ban tsitsik bitsow, ban pakdha bitsow o ban kwentsaltsik, u pakabdhb abal kin walka ka taktsin tin waltsik nin kudhkmil kal an yaultsik. Ejtaltsik xita kl tu taknal, u jell.
Utukn tm na Jess kal an fariseotsik ani kal chb x i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xi tltsik Jerusaln.
Jajtsik in chuu ke taltsik nin exbalil na Jess u kapul yab takadh nin kubak, jaxtm ti kawyattsik abal yab in takatsik nin kubak xan ti yejat kin taja.
(Pos an fariseotsik ani ejtal xi ms an judotsik, in wewkmtsal tin takixtal nin weje pakliltsik, yabtsik u kapul max yab kin taka okox nin kubak ynl.

Tam ka witsiytsik ti chaum, max yabtsik in takm nin kubak xan ti yejat kin taja, yabtsik u kapul ani yn ms xata xowa in ujnmaltsik in tajl. Anl jeye, in takltsik an balixtalb, an patl balixtalb ani an koytalb xon tu jedhkanal tam u kapul.)

Konyat tm ench na Jess kal an fariseotsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios: —Jantki na exbaliltsik ti yab in ntsal kin wwnantsi tin takixtal ni weje pakliltsik abal u kapultsik yab takadh nin kubak?

Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Kambixtsik! Tsubax tajat tin ulu an tiltsix Isaas kal tattsik ta kwenta, tam tin dhutsa ench: Jech an atiklbtsik kal in wiki tin kaknl, por nin ejattal w tajat ti kwajat kal Nan.
Yab xata in jalbl xan tin kaknltsik, pos tokot in oktsixnltsik in takixtal i iniktsik.
Tattsik yab a tajl ti kij nin takixtal na Dios abal tokot a wwnl xowa in tajl an iniktsik. A takltsik an balixtalb xa ynltsik ka uxna ani yn ms xata a tajltsik jelti jech.
In ntsi ti kw na Jess ani in utsatsik jeye ench: —Yab a tajltsik ti kij nin takixtal na Dios abal a ntsaltsik tokot ka wwnatsik xowa in tajl an iniktsik.
Pos na Moiss in ulu ench: “Ka kakna na tta ani na nna”, ani “Xita kin odhbijiy nin tta o nin nna, yejat ka chemdh.”
Por tattsik a ulal ke jun xita awil kin utsa ench nin tta o nin nna: “Yabich neech ku ejto tu tolmiy, pos ejtal xowa u kool u pikbantsmalich a Dios.”
Ani max jun xita kin utsa anchan nin pakliltsik, a ulaltsik ke yabich tm yejat kin tolmiy.

Anchan, a tajlichtsik jelti max yab xata in jalbl nin takixtal na Dios abal tokot a tajltsik xowa i jiltsink kal na weje pakliltsik. Jaich tokot a oktsixnl ka tajan ani jech yab in takixtal a Dios. Ani yn ms xata a tajl jelti jech.
In kaniy tm jun na Jess ka utey an atiklbtsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka achatsik alwa xowa neech tu utsa ani ka exbaytsik.
An inik yab u chnal nin itsch kal xowa in kapal, u chnal kal xowa yab alwa in chalpayal tin itsch ani kin taja.
Max a kooltsik na ochoxtal alwa, ka exbaytsik xowa u ulal.
Tayl, tam ti na Jess in jilaich an atiklbtsik ani ochich ban at, utsan tm kal nin exbaliltsik kin wila an junbaxtalb xin ulu.
Utsantsik ench: —Yabxe teye a exbaymaltsik? Yabxe a chobtsik ke ni jun xita yab u chnal nin itsch kal xowa in kapal?
An kapnl yab u ochel bin itsch an inik, u kalel bin tsukul ani tayl neech kin wakla alte. Anchan tin ulu na Jess abal kin xalka ke xowakich an kapnl yab tu chotsal an ti itsch.
In ulu jeye ench: —U chnal nin itsch an inik kal xowa in chalpayal yab alwa ani kin taja.

Pos xowa kwajat alkidh bin itsch an iniktsik, jaich kl tu tajnal kin koy an atax chalab. Kal jachan an atax chalab, kl tu tajnal ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal. Waach jeye xi yab u tomkinal, u ani junkunalki. Waach xu chemdhax,

xu kw, xi chene, xin tajtsal ti ataxtalb xi keet, xu kambix, xin jill tinb ka xn kal xowakich i ataxtalb, xin tell kal i chkub xowa in kool keet, xu tilom yab exbadh, xin tekl tinb ani xi yab lujat in chalab.
Ejtal jech xowa yab alwa, u tujl bin itsch an iniktsik ani tam kin taja, u jilkonalich tm choodh nin itsch kal an walastalb.
Kale tm taja na Jess ani kale ban chabl xi Tiro ani Sidn. Tam ti ulich taja, ochich ba jun i at abal yab in l ka chobn max taja ti kwajat, por yab in ejto ka chinkon.
Abal jun i mmlb xin kool jun in tsidhnil ochadh kal i atax ejattalb in chobna ke ta ti kwajat taja, tsch ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess.
Jech an mmlb yab u israelita, jaj Sirofenisia in chablil. Pakabdh na Jess kal an mmlb abal ka kldhantsat an ti atax ejattalb xi kl ti ochadh nin tsidhnil.
Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ka walka okox ka kapch an chakamtsik, pos yab alwa ki kntsi ti kapnl an chakamtsik ani ki pidha an pikotsik.

Tkon ench an mmlb: —Ajtik, tsubax xowa a ulal. Xi tl pl bitsow jelti nan u usnal kal tattsik abal i junwal jelti an piko, por asta an pikotsik xi kwajat tin l an mesa, in kapal xowa u kwajlanal muax tam exom ti kapul an chakamtsik.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Alwa tajat xan ta tkon; jaxtm, awil ki kalch, pos an atax ejattalb kalnekich ba na tsidhnil.
Tam ti an mmlb witsiy tin kim, in ela nin tsidhnil kwachlkijich bin waytal abal an atax ejattalb, kalnekich.
Kale na Jess ban bitsow xi Tiro, watey Sidn, bin chabliltsik jeye xi lju an bitsowtsik xin bij Dekpolis ani ulich ban pujal xi Galilea.
Uldhantsat taja jun i inik xi yab u ochox ani yab in ejtowal ti kw alwa ani pakabdh kin kwajba nin kubak ban inik.
Na Jess in jna plki xon ti yab waach an atiklbtsik ani in xaptsi tin tstsbixtal bin xuchuntsik, in tubkay nin kubak ani in taktsi kl tin lekb.
In tela tm walki, dhutsutsun asta tin itsch ani in utsa ench an inik: —Efata! —Jech an kw in l kin ulu: Ki jakpin!
Tmki jachan ti ochxin an inik ani in ejtch ti kw alwa.
Utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab kin tiltsi ni jun xita xowa in taja, por yabtsik in taja ti kij, ms tokot in tilltsik.
Xin achltsik, u labnaltsik tajat ani in ulaltsik ench: —Ejtal xowa in tajl, alwa tajat; asta xi yab u ochox in ochxindhl ani an mtsik in kwindhl.
Tam ti jachan i kij, junkunk yn i atiklbtsik ani tam ti yabich in kooltsik xata kin kapu, na Jess in kaniy ka utey nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench:
—U yajnantsal tajat jech an atiklbtsik abal kwajinekich x a kts kal Nan ani xo yabich in kool xata kin kaputsik.
Max ku abaich ka kaletsik tin kim anchan yab kapmadh, neech ka palmtsik ti bl kal an kanab abal taltsik owdha tajat ti tl.
Tkoyat ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Por jn ti neech ki ela an kapnl abal ki kapundha tech xon ti yab xita u kwajl?
Konyattsik tm kal na Jess: —Jy i pan a kooltsik? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Bk.
Utsan tm an atiklbtsik kal na Jess ka buxkan chabl. Na Jess in bachu tm xi bk an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in peja ani in pidha nin exbaliltsik abal kin pidha an atiklbtsik.
T jeye tin kool chb x i tsitsik tool ani anlki jeye tin taja jelt xan tin taja kal an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in pidha nin exbaliltsik abal kin pidha an atiklbtsik.
Ejtal kapchtsik asta ajw. Tayl, nin exbaliltsik in tsutsiy bk i toknal kal in pejmats an kapnl xi jilkon.
Wich xna che mil i atiklbtsik xi kapch. Tayl abanichtsik tm kal na Jess abal ka kalch.
Balin tm na Jess ban tan kal nin exbaliltsik ani kale ban chabl xin bij Dalmanuta.
Ulich tm an fariseotsik ani in tuju ti kwlx kal na Jess. Ani abal ka taktamiyat na Jess, u kontsinal kin taja jun i labidh labandhaxtalb abal kin xalka ke tsubax lejtal kal a Dios ti abadh.

Dhutsutsun tm na Jess tin ejattal kal yantam i tepintalb ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki tin kontsaltsik ku taja i labidh labandhaxtalb? Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ni jun i labidh labandhaxtalb yab neech ku taja ta tamttsik.
In jilonatsik tm taja, balin ban tan ani watey kal nin exbaliltsik jun pake pujal.
Nin exbaliltsik na Jess yab in chalpay kin jnatsik i pan, jn tokot i pan ta tin kooltsik ban tan.
Takyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal nin oktsixtal an fariseotsik ani kal nin oktsixtal na Erodes xin junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye.
Tujey tm an exbaltsik ti tsx jn ani jn ench: —Awxe tu utsl jech abal yab i tsidha an pan?
Na Jess in chobna xanty in ulaltsik, jaxtm tin utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta kwajat ta tsxtsik ke yab a tsidhm i pan? Yabxe tajat a exbayaltsik? Blxe tajat tojlb ka exbaytsik?
A kooltsik a wal ani a ochoxtal, por jyki max yabtsik i chuux nibal i ochox! Yabxe a tlmtsik?
Tam tu peja xi b an pan abal xi bo mil an atiklbtsik, jy i x a tsutsiytsik kal xi jilkon? Tkontsik ench: —Lajuchb.
Utsantsik jeye ench: —Ani tam tu muu jeye xi bk an pan abal xi che mil an atiklbtsik, jy i toknaltsik a tsutsiy kal xi jilkon? Tkontsik ench: —Bk.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe bl a exbayaltsik?
Tayl, ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Betsayda, tsidhantsat na Jess jun i jokol kal chb x i atiklbtsik ani pakabdh kin taka jachan an jokol abal ka chuxin.
In lotokna tm an jokol ani in kldha ban kwentsal. In ijlintsi tin wal an jokol, in kwajbantsi tin kubak bin b nin wal an jokol ani in konoy max in chutalich xata.
An jokol chuxinich tm ani in ulu ench: —U chutal an iniktsik, por jyki i te, por u belaltsik.
In kwajba tm jun na Jess nin kubak bin b in wal an jokol, chuxinich tm alwa an inik ani jelnek alwa ti jilkon. Ejtalich tm in chutal alwa.
Abanich tm tin kim kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —Yab ki ochich ban kwentsal, nibal xita ka ltsi xi tajatsik xanty tu tajtsi.

Tayl, kale na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ban kwentsaltsik xi kwajat wilill Sesarea, an bitsow xu taknal Filipo. Tam ti neechtsik ti bl, in konoy ench nin exbaliltsik: —Kal an atiklbtsik, jita p tin usnal ke Nan neye?
Jajtsik tkon ench: —Taltsik in ulal ke Tat i Juan xu Pujax, taltsik in ulal ke i Elas xi xechink ti tiltsix ti weje ani xi keettsik in ulal ke Tat jaich jun ti b xi keet an tiltsixtsik.
Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Jess: —Ani tattsik, jita ta ulaltsik ke Nan neye? Tkoyat kal na Pedro ani utsan ench: —Tat i Kristo, xi takudh kal na Dios abal ta takix.
Por utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab kin tiltsitsik jech ni jun xita.

Tujey tm ti ltsinaltsik kal na Jess xanty neech kin tamu Jaj. Utsantsik ench: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna yn xata yajtsik. Neech kin pojk kal an pakdha tjodh, kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Neech kin chemdh, por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
Ejtal jech tajax tajat ti utsantsik, jaxtm na Pedro tin jna plki na Jess ani in kwiya abal kwajat in chalpayal ke anchan neech ka tajtsin.

Por na Jess chawkin kin tela xi ms an exbaltsik ani in kwiya na Pedro ench: —Ki wixkin tech lej atax! Tat yab a chalpayal xan ti na Dios tin chalpayal, tokot a chalpayal xan tin chalpayal an iniktsik.
In kaniytsik tm na Jess ka utey an atiklbtsik ani nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Max jun xita in l ti kin wwna, yab kin ajay tinb ani yab kin dha ti kwenta maske ka chemdh.
Pos max jun xita in l kin loo nin xechintal, neech kin kibdha, por xita kin jila tinb ka chemdh kal Nanki tu kwenta ani kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, neech kin loo.
Jant ti alwa abal jun xita, max kin bajaw kin koy ejtal xowa waach ban kayl ani kin kibdha nin ejattal ban kibeltalb?
O janty neech kin ejto kin pidhna an inik abal kin loo nin ejattal?

Max jun xita kin tidhena tin tila ani kin tidhena jeye kin tila nu oktsixtal tin tamt an atiklbtsik xi atax ani u walablom xi xo waach, tm, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye kin tidheb kal jaj tam kin witsiy kal ejtal in pulek labidh tokt nu Tta ani in junkmte kal an tokat abatwletsik.
Utsantsik jeye ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke taltsik xi xo tech i kwajat, yab neech ki chemech asta ka chuutsik ti takix na Dios kal ejtal nin chp.
Akak a kts ms tayl, na Jess junax kal na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan, kadhiytsik ba jun i tekat chn. Tam ti tajaich ti kwajattsik, na Jess in jalkuy tinb.
Nin kudhkmil chaxkin ani dhaknib tajat jelti an chm; dhaknib tajat, ke ni jun i pakwtsix xi tech ti kayl yab neech kin ejto kin dhaknibdha jelt xan ti dhaknib nin kudhkmil na Jess.
An exbaltsik in chuu jeye na Elas ani na Moiss ti tiloll kal na Jess.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Pedro: —Oktsix, alwa tajat abal tech u kwajat! Neech ki taja x i padhel, jn abal Tat, jn abal na Moiss ani jn abal na Elas.
Anchan ti kwajat ti kw abal jaj ani nin kidhtaltsik jikenektsik tajat ani na Pedro yab in chob xanty kwajat in ulal.
Chakan tm jun i tokow xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani dhabyattsik, achatm jun i kwintalb ban tokow ani xu kw, in ulu ench: —Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat, ka exbantsitsik xowa Jaj in ulal.
Tmki, tam tin telatsik wilill, yab xita ms in chuu, tokot kwetm na Jess.
Tam ti exomichtsik ti pal ban chn, utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab xita kin tiltsi xowa in chumaltsik asta tam Jaj, xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik ka ejech ti t.
Anchan tin tajatsik xan ti utsan ani ni jun xita yab in tiltsitsik; por jajtsik echeki u knx xanty in l kin ulu tam ti kwajat in ulal ke neech ka ejech ti t.
In konoytsik tm ench na Jess: —Jantki tin ulal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ke yejat ka tsch okox na Elas?

Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax kejle ke na Elas neech ka tsch okox ani neech kin lejkiy ti t ejtal xowa waach. In ulal jeye an Tokat Dhuslab ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna tajat yajtsik ani neech kin pojk.
Por tsubax tu utsltsik ke na Elas tsinekich ani tajtsin kal an iniktsik xan ti ka len, jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ke neech kin tamu.

Tam ti witsiytsik xon ti kwajat xi ms an exbaltsik, in chuu yn i atiklbtsik wilill xon ti kwajattsik ani ta jeye ti kwajat ti kwlx kal jajtsik i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Tam ti chutat na Jess, labantsik tajat ani kaletsik adhik ti chapndhom.
Konyattsik tm kal na Jess: —Janty i kwajat a kwlxnl kal jajtsik?
Tkon tm jn xi taja jeye ti kwajat: —Oktsix, j tu tsidhantsmal tu kwitlil abal kwajat teykmte kal jun i atax ejattalb ani mbdhats.

Tam ka bajujuyat xontiki ti xeech, u wipipindhb, u dhopopl in ijil, u rechechl in kamab ani u jilkonal teytemadh. U utsmalich na exbaliltsik abal kin kldhantsi an ti atax ejattalb por yabtsik in ejtm.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, yab lejtal tajat i belomtsik! Asta jowki kool kin kwajay kal tattsik? Asta jowki kool tu kuxuytsik? Ka tsidha tech an kwitl.
Utuntsat tm ani tam ti chutat na Jess kal an atax ejattalb, wipipindh tm an kwitl. Kwajl chabl, tlkin ani u dhopopl in ijil bin wi.
Konyat tm an ttalb kal na Jess: —Jyich i kij in kool ti kwajat anchan? Tkon ench an ttalb: —Asta ti chipl.
Yantalich an atax ejattalb in tajm ka kwajlan ba kamal o ba ja abal kin chemdha. Ti ku yajnantsi weye ani ti ku tolmiy max ka ejto.
Utsan tm kal na Jess: —Jantki tin utsl max ka ejto? Ejtal u tjnal max jn u belom lejtal.
In ulu tm kawidh ench an ttalb: —In belomich, por ti kin tolmiy neye abal kin belmch ms.

Tam tin chuu na Jess ke exom tajat ti junkunal an atiklbtsik, in kwiya an atax ejattalb ench: —Atax ejattalb, xa kool jech an kwitl u m ani yab u ochox, tu utsl ki kale ba jaj ani yab ki witsiy ka ocha.
An atax ejattalb in taja ka dhjan an kwitl, in wipipindha chapik ti t ani kalch tm ba jachan an kwitl. An kwitl jilkon kwachl jelti max chemnek. Jaxtm ti yn in ulutsik ke chemchich.
Por na Jess in tyna an kwitl bin kubak ani in tolmiy ka chakay.
Tayl, tam ti kwajatichtsik kwetm ba jun i at, konyat ench na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik: —Jantki waw ti yab i ejto ki kldha an atax ejattalb?
Tkoyattsik ench: —Jech an atax ejattalb ani xi ms nin kidhtaltsik tokot u kalel tam jn ka lan ani ka klin.
Tam ti kaletsik taja, wateytsik Galilea. Na Jess yab in lena ka chobn kal ni jun xita xon ti kwajat,

abal Jaj kwajat in oktsal nin exbaliltsik ani in utsltsik ench: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban walbidh iniktsik abal kin chemdh, por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
An exbaltsik yab in exbay xanty kwajattsik ti usnal ani in jiknltsik kin konoy ka wiltsin.
Ulichtsik tm ban bitsow xin bij Kapernam ani tam ti kwajatich ban at, na Jess in konoy ench nin exbaliltsik: —Janty i kwajaytsik ta tsxtsik ti bl?
Por yab tkontsik, kom kwajinektsik ti kwlx abal in l kin chobna xita j na ms ultalb xi jajtsik.
Buxkan tm na Jess, in kaniy ka utey xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Max jun xita in l ka kwajay ms ultalb, yejat tajat kin chaka tinb ani kin tjontsi ejtalkitsik.
In yakwana tm jun i chakam kwitl, in kwajba junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik, in mulukna ani in utsatsik ench:
—Max jun xita kin bachu ani kin beletna jun i chakam kwitl jelti jech kal Nan tu bij, Nan tin bachwal ani xita ti kin bachu Nan, yab Nanki tin bachwal, in bachwalich jeye na Dios xi tin abmal.
Utsan tm ench kal na Juan: —Oktsix, i chuu jun i inik xin kldhl i atax ejattalb kal tin awiltal na bij, por i taxkantsi abal jaj yab xeech kal waw.
Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Yab ka taxkantsitsik, pos xita in tajl i labidh labandhaxtalb kal tin awiltal nu bij, yab neech kin ejto kin ulu tayl ke Nan yab in alwa inik.
Pos xita yab tu atl, junax kal waw.
Xitakich ti ki pidha jun tu ti ja ka ucha kal Nan tu kwenta abal i junax kal Nan, tu utsltsik tsubax ke neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb kal na Dios.

Tu utsltsik jeye, xita kin walbindha jn ti b jech an chakamtsik xi tin bellichtsik, yn an yajtsiktalb neech ka pidhan. Ms alwa abal an walbindhom ka wiktsin bin nk jun i yejche cha tujub ani ka petn ban pujal abal ka luychin.

Max na kubak ti walbindhl, ka muchiy; pos ms alwa ki ochich ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal jn tokot a kubak ani yab kal chablam na kubak ki petn ban kibeltalb xon ti an kamal yab jayki u tepel.
Xi neechtsik taja, neech ka kapattsik kal an dhm xi yab jayki u chemel ani neech jeye ka taaytsik kal an kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.

Max na akan ti walbindhl, ka muchiy; pos ms alwa ki ochich ban xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal jn tokot a akan ani yab kal chablam na akan ki petn ban kibeltalb xon ti an kamal yab jayki u tepel.
Xi neechtsik taja, neech ka kapattsik kal an dhm xi yab jayki u chemel ani neech ka taaytsik kal an kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
Max na wal ti walbindhl, ka jixa; pos ms alwa ki ochich xon tu takix na Dios kal jn tokot a wal ani yab kal chablam na wal ki petn ban kibeltalb.
Xi neechtsik taja, neech ka kapattsik kal an dhm xi yab jayki u chemel ani neech ka taaytsik kal an kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
Ejtal xita kin bela na Dios neech ka tokwattsik kal an yajtsiktalb, jelt in yjtsk an kamal. Pos anchan jeye, nin tul an konl xu pikbantsb na Dios, okox u chapniyb abal ka tokwat.
An atem alwa, por max ka xawm, ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin chapmdha. Ki kwajaytsik echeki jelti an atem ani ki kwajaytsik kijidh jn ani jn.

Kale tm na Jess ban bitsow xi Kapernam ani kale ban chabl xi Judea ani ban chabl xi kwajat jun jekat walja Jordn. Junkun jun taja xon ti kwajat na Jess yn i atiklbtsik ani Jaj in oktsitsik jelt xan tin ujnmal in tajl.
Utukn tm na Jess kal taltsik i fariseotsik abal ka konyat max in tomnl ka jlxin xi tomkidhtsik. Anchan ti konyat na Jess abal ka ejtowat ka walbindh max yab ka tkon alwa.
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty in takixnmal na Moiss ba nin dhuslbil?
Jajtsik tkon ench: —Na Moiss in takixnmal ba nin dhuslbil ke an inik awil kin jila nin tomtal max kin pidha jun i w xin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti neech kin jila ani awilich tm kin jila.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Na Moiss in jila dhutsadh jachan an takixtalb abal i tanchutsik tajat ani yab a l ka exbaytsik.
Por tam ti tujeyki, tam ti na Dios in taja ejtal xowa waach, “in taja an inik ani an mmlb”.
“Jaxtm, tam jun i inik ka tomkin, kool kin jila nin tta ani nin nna abal ka kwajay kal nin tomtal.
Xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
Jaxtm, xowa na Dios in jnkxliymal, yab yejat kin kxliy an inik.
Tayl, tam ti kwajatichtsik ban at, an exbaltsik in konoy jun na Jess kal jech tin kwenta.
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Max jun i inik kin jila nin tomtal ani ka tomkin kal keet i mmlb, u jilkonal walbidh kal i uxmbetalb ani kal jech, in waltsalich nin jidhtal tomtal.
Ani max jun i mmlb kin jila nin tomkl ani ka tomkin kal i keet inik, an mmlb u wenkonalich jeye tm ti junkux inik.
Utuntsat tm na Jess chb x ti chakamtsik abal kin lbtaja, por an exbaltsik tujey kin kwiya xin utwal an chakamtsik.

Tam ti na Jess in chuu ti kwiyax nin exbaliltsik, chakuy ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka walka ka utey an chakamtsik xon tin kwajat, yab ka tamkuytsik, pos xita in jilltsik tinb ka takyat kal na Dios, in junwal jelti jech an chakamtsik.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita yab kin jila tinb ka takyat kal na Dios jelti jun i chakam, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal a Dios.
In mulukna tm an chakamtsik, in punu nin kubak bin b in k an chakamtsik ani in lbtaja.
Tam ti na Jess in ntsch an bl, utey adhik jun i inik, tudhlan tin tamt ani utsan ench: —Alwa Oktsix, janty yejat ku taja abal ku ejto neye ku koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin bijyal tin alwa? Jn tokot waach xita alwa, na Dios.
A exllich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita, yab ki kambixin ani ka kakna na tta ani na nna.”
Tkon tm ench an inik: —Oktsix, ejtal jachan an takixtalb u tajl asta tin chipl.

In teloloy tm na Jess jachan an inik, in kontsi ti kanidhaxtalb ani in utsa ench: —Tokot u kibel jun xata ka taja: ki kale ka nuju ejtal xowa a kool ani ka chejwaliy an chojontltsik an ti tumn. Anchan, neech tm ka koy t walki jun xata xi yn tajat in jalbl ani wana tm ta exbal kal Nan.
Tam ti an inik in acha jech, tepin tajat ani kale, kom tumnladh tajat.
In tela tm wilill na Jess ani in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Tojlb tajat kin jila tinb ka takyat kal na Dios jun i tumnladh inik!
Labantsik tajat an exbaltsik kal xowa in acha in ulu na Jess, por utsantsik jun ench: —Chakamtsik, tojlb tajat kin jila tinb ka takyattsik kal na Dios xin kyaltsik tin belomtal an tumn!
Ms yab tojlb ka watey jun i konl xu bijyb kameyo bin chultl jun i tidhab k kin walka tinb jun i tumnladh inik ka takyat kal na Dios.
An exbaltsik ms laban tajat ani u knxtsik ench: —Pos max anchan jita neech kin ejto ka loey?
Telantsik tm kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, por an iniktsik, yaba. Tokot na Dios in ejtowal kin loo xitakichki.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, waw i jilmal ejtal xowa i kool abal ku xechin kal Tat.

Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin jila in kim, in kidhbtsik, in ixmtsik, in tta, in nna, in tomtal, in chakmiltsik o in chablil kal Nanki tu kwenta ani kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab,

neech kin bachu ba jech an kayl bo inik ms in yanl xowa in jilmal: in kimtsik, in kidhbtsik, in ixmtsik, in nnatsik, in chakmiltsik ani in chabliltsik, maske neech ka atan, por tayl neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Por tam na Dios kin taja an ljundhaxtalb, yn xita xo kwajat ms ultalb, neech ka jilkon ms tayl ani yn xita xo kwajat ms tayl, neech ka kwajay ms ultalb.

Tam ti nechichtsik ti bl abal ka kale Jerusaln, na Jess okox ti neech ani an exbaltsik kuxlek. An exbaltsik labnk tajat ani u jikltsik. Plm tm jun na Jess kal xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani tujey jun kin utsatsik xowa Jaj neech kin tamu.

In utsatsik ench: —A chutaltsik ke u nechich abal Jerusaln, xon ti Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn ban oklek pletsik ani ban oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jajtsik neech kin ulu abal kin chemdh ani neech tm kin pidhn ban pl iniktsik.
Neech ti kin labdhnatsik, neech ti kin kwadha, neech ti kin tubkay ani neech ti kin chemdha; por tin xlb a kts, neech kin ejech ti t.
Uteytsik tm ba na Jess, na Jakobo ani na Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo ani in utsatsik ench: —Oktsix, i l ti ku tajtsi jun i alwatalb.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty a l tu tajtsitsik?
Jajtsik in ulu ench: —Tam kin bajaw xowki neech ta takix kal na pulek labidh tokt, i l weye ku buxkan kal Tat, jn ta ejt ani jn ta kwatab.
Utsantsik tm kal na Jess: —Yab a chobtsik xanty a konyal. Neechxe ka ejto ka kuxuytsik an yajtsiktalb xi Nan neech ku kuxuy? Ani neechxe ka ejto ka watnatsik an cheml xi jelti Nan neech ku watna?
Jajtsik tkon ench: —Neech ki ejto. Utsantsik tm kal na Jess: —Neech kejle ka kuxuytsik an yajtsiktalb xi Nan neech ku kuxuy ani neech jeye ka ejto ka watnatsik an cheml jelti xi neech ku watna.
Por yab u kool an awiltalb abal tu utsatsik xitam j neech ka buxkan tu ejt ani tu kwatab; tokot neech ka buxkantsik kal Nan xi takudh kal na Dios.
Tam tin achatsik xi lju an exbaltsik xowa kontsidh na Jess, in chakuntsitsik tajat xi chb an exbaltsik.

Por kanyattsik ka utey kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Jelt xan ta chobichtsik, xin takyal i bitsowtsik xi yab u israelitatsik u chapik takixtsik ani an pulek oklek, in tajl tinb ti pulek inik kal an atiklbtsik.
Por tattsik yab ka taja anchan xan ti jajtsik in tajl. Max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal in l ka kwajay ultalb, yejat kin tjontsitsik xi ms.
Max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal in l ti tjodh, yejat ka kwajay ti jolib kal ejtalkitsik.
Pos nibal Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab in tsinek abal kin tjontsat, in tsinek abal tin tjontsix ani abal ku pidhna tub kin chemdh ani anchan yn kin ejto ka loeytsik.

Ulchichtsik tm Jerik. Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kalel ba jachan an bitsow junax kal nin exbaliltsik ani kal yn i atiklbtsik, in ela buxl wal bl jun i chojontl jokol xin konyal i tolmixtalb. Jech an jokol in bij ta Bartimeo ani u chakmlb kal na Timeo.
Tam tin acha abal exom ti watel na Jess xi Nasaret, tujey ti dhjax ani in ulu ench: —Jess, xi kuxlab kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
Yn kwiyxin abal ka chamkan, por jaj ms kawidh ti dhjaxin: —Jess xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
Kubey tm na Jess ani in abna ka kanyat an jokol. Kale tm ti usnal ench an jokol: —Yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, ki kubey, ti kanl.
In petna tm nin wt, kubey ani kale xon ti kwajat na Jess.
Konyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty a l tu tajtsi? An jokol tkon ench: —Oktsix, u l neye ti kin chuxindha.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Awil ki kalch, i jeley abal i belmch. Tmki jachan ti chuxin an jokol ani in wwna na Jess xon ti neech.
Tam ti ulichtsik juntal xi chb an kwentsal xin bij Betfaj ani Betania kunatich Jerusaln xi kwajattsik tin tamt an chn Olibos, in okxiy na Jess chb nin exbaliltsik.
Utsantsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ban kwentsal xi n kwajat tametlb ani tam ki ulichtsik taja neech ka elatsik wikadh jun i burru xi yabl pnadh jayki kal ni jun xita. Ka wilatsik ani ka tsidha tech.
Max ti ki konoy xantki ti exom a will an burru, ka utsa ench: “An Ajtiklb in yntsal ani tmeye kwa neech kin witsba.”
Kaletsik tm, in ela wikadh an burru elb ban bl kunat ba jun i wileb ani in wila.
Utsantsik ench kal xi tajatsik ti kwajat: —Janty a tajltsik? Jantki ta willtsik an burru?
Tkontsik jelt xan ti usnk kal na Jess ani walkjich tm kin jnatsik an burru.
In jntsitsik an ti burru na Jess, in tatlabiytsik kal nin kudhkmil ani puney na Jess.
Tin nakl an bl neech in nukltsik nin kudhkmil xon ti neech ka watey na Jess ani keettsik in pejl in kwel i tetsik ani in kwachbl tin nakl an bl.
Xi neechtsik okox ani xi palattsik kuxlek in ulaltsik kawidh ench: —Ti ku loch xo! Lbtajadh xi tl tin bij an Okxlb!
Lbtajadh xi tl ti takix jelt xan ti takxink ni weje paklil Dabid! Okxlb t walki, ti ku loch xo!
Ochich na Jess ban bitsow Jerusaln ani kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Tam tin telmalich putl wilill ejtal xowa waach taja, kalch tm Betania kal xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, abal wklch.
Jun tsudhelom, tam ti kaletsik Betania, kaay na Jess.
In w chuu jun akanlek in xekedh akan i igo ani kale kin chuu max walidh; por yab in eltsi ni jun in wall, tokot in xekl, kom yabl in kijil ti walim.
In utsa tm ench na Jess jachan in akan an igo: —Yab jayki neech ki witsiy ta walim abal ki kaptsin an ta wall. Nin exbaliltsik in acha xan ti utsan in akan an igo.

Tam ti ulichtsik Jerusaln, na Jess kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in aja ka kale elb ejtal an njultsik ani an chaumtsik xi taja ti kwajattsik. In ketpantsi tin mesajil xin jaltsal ti tumn an atiklbtsik ani nin njumtal jeye an njul kuku.
Ni jun xita yab in walka ka watey ti kititl kal in kitltsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
In oktsi an atiklbtsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Na Dios in ulal ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Nu kim abal i lbki ti bijidh, neech ka yn kal ejtalki an atiklbtsik”; por a wenkmalichtsik tin chinkontal i kw.

Tam tin achatsik anchan an oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tujeytsik kin aliy xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess. Pos in chejnltsik kom ejtal an atiklbtsik labnk tajat kal xowa in oktsixnl na Jess.
Por tam ti jikwchinich, na Jess kale ba jachan an bitsow.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, wateytsik dhajawe xon ti kwajat in akan an igo ani in chuu abal waynek asta bin ibl.
In chalpna tm na Pedro xanty usnk kal na Jess jachan in akan an igo ani in utsa ench na Jess: —Oktsix, ka tela, in akan an igo xa odhbijiy, waynek xo.
Tkon tm na Jess ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka belatsik na Dios.
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke xita kin utsa jech an chn: “Ki wixkin tachan ani ka petna tab ban pujal”, max tsubax lejtal tin bell na Dios ani yab kin jlkkliy nin chalab, neech ka tjan xan tin ulu.
Jaxtm tu utsltsik, ke xowakich ka kontsi na Dios kal i lb, ka bela ke Jaj ti pidhmalich xowa a kontsmal ani neech ka bachutsik.
Tam ki lantsik, max jun xita ti tajtsmal jun xata yab alwa, ka pakwlantsi; abal na Tta xi kwajat walki, ti ki pakwlantsi jeye an ta walastalbil.
Pos max yab ka pakwlantsi xi keettsik, na Tta xi kwajat walki yab jeye neech ti ki pakwlantsitsik.

Witsiy tm jun na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik ban bitsow Jerusaln. Tam ti xechich na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, utukn kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ani kal nin oklkil an judotsik,
ani konyat ench: —Kal jantom awiltalb ta tajl jech? Jita ti pidhmal ti awiltalb ka taja?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Neech neye tu konoytsik jun xata, max ti kin tkoytsik, neech tm tu utsatsik neye kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl xowa u tajl.
Ti kin utsatsik, Jita kl ti abnk na Juan ti pujax? Kal a Dios o kal i iniktsik?
Tujeytsik tm ti knx jajkitsik ench: —Janty ki utsa? Max ki utsa ke kal a Dios ti abnk, neech ti ku tkoy ench: “Jantki p tm ti yab a beltsitsik xowa in ulu?”
O awxe ki utsa ke kal i iniktsik ti abnk? Por tkxintsik jn ani jn abal yab xata kin utsa, pos in chejnl an atiklbtsik kom ejtal in bell ke na Juan kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
In utsatsik tm ench na Jess: —Yab i chob xita kl ti abnk. Utsantsik tm kal na Jess: —Pos kom yabtsik tin utsa xita kl ti abnk, yab neye neech tu utsatsik kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl jech.

In tuju tm ti kw na Jess kal i junbaxtalbki ani in ulu ench: —Jun i inik in taya yn i akanlek i uba ani in mapuy. In taja jeye jun i pulek balixtalb abal kin baliy taja nin jall an uba ani in taja jeye jun i pnchy abal kin ejto kin beletna an tayablbtsik. In matintsixna tm an alelb abal ka tjomn kal keet ani jaj kale owl.
Tam tin bajch an kij xowki ti neech ti pitnal an uba, in aba tm jun in tojnlil abal kin konoy xowa in lujyal jeye kin bachu an dhabal alelb.
Por yakwan kal an mat alelb, chawat ani mapats kubak ti witsiy.
In aba jun t in tojnlil ani jech tujbayat kal an mat alelb, chojbdh bin k ani odhbijyat jeye.
An dhabal alelb in aba jun bl jn ani xi jech chemdh. Tayl in aba yn ms keet, taltsik chawat ani xi taltsik chemdh.
Jilkonk bl nin junkax chakmil xin kanidhl tajat. Tin okontal in aba jeye abal in chalpay ench: “Neech xna kin kaknantsat tu chakmil.”
Por tam ti ulich an chakmlb, tsxintsik ench an mat alelb: “Jech jaich xi neech ti dhabal tayl; wana ki chemdha ani wawich tm neech ki dhabalna an alelb.”
Pos in yakwatsik tm, in chemdha ani in petna elb alelb.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik neech kin taja an dhabal alelb? Yabxe neech ka tsch kin chemdha jachan an mat alelb ani kin matintsi keet an ti alelb?
Konyattsik jeye ench: —Awxe yab jayki a ajymaltsik an Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench?: An tujub xi pojk kal an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb.
Jech in tajmal an Okxlb ani waw i chutal jelti jun i pulek labandhaxtalb.

U lenbwiik ka yakwan na Jess kal taltsik xi ta ti kwajattsik abal in chob ke kal jajtsik tin kwenta ti tiltsin jachan an ti junbaxtalb kal na Jess. Por yab xata ti tajtsin na Jess ani kalchtsik tokot kom in chejnl an atiklbtsik.
Tayl, abtsin na Jess chb x ti fariseotsik junax kal in atiklbil na Erodes abal ka taktamiyat ani anchan ka tajan kin ulu jun xata yab alwa abal ka walbindh.

Tam ti ulichtsik, utsan ench na Jess: —Oktsix, waw i chob ke ejtal tsubax xowa a ulal. Tat yab a dhl ti kwenta xowa in chalpayal an atiklbtsik, pos yab i kwajat a eblidh tell an iniktsik xanty in wynltsik in y. A oktsixnl kal i tsubaxtalb nin takixtal na Dios. In tomnlxe ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an pulek takix romano, o yaba? Ki pidhaxe o yaba?
Por kom na Jess in chobich abal u kambixkitsik, in utsatsik ench: —Jantki tin taktamiyaltsik? Ti kin tsidhantsi jun i patl tumn abal ku tela.

Tsidhantsat tm an ti tumn, tam tin telmich na Jess, in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Jita in wal xi jech kwajat chilbadh ban tumn ani jita in bij xi jech dhutsadh? Tkontsik ench: —An lej pulek takix romano.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos ka pidha an lej pulek takix romano xowa in lujyal kin bachu ani ka pidha na Dios xowa Jaj in lujyal kin bachu. Labantsik tajat abal anchan ti tkoyattsik.
Tsch jeye ti chutb na Jess kal chb x i Saduseotsik, xin ulal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t ani utsan ench:

—Oktsix, na Moiss tu jiltsi dhutsadh ke max jun i tomkidh inik ka chemech ani kin jila nin tomtal ani yab in kymaltsik ni jun i chakam, nin kidhb kool ka tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb abal kin koy i chakamtsik jelti max in chakmil nin kidhb xi chemech.
Pos twiik ti kwajat bk i kwitltsik in kidhbkitsik. An jidhtal kwitl tomkin, por chemech ani yab in jila ni jun i chakam.
In chabtal an kwitl tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb, por chemech jeye ani yab in jila ni jun i chakam. Anchan jeye ti tmun kal nin oxtal kidhb.
Ani anchan ti tmun kal ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik. Tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb ani ni jn yab in jila in chakmil. Okontalb chemech jeye an mmlb.
Tam ka ejechtsik ti t, kal jowa an inik ti neech ti tomiklb jachan an mmlb abal ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik in tomiknmal?
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik i ukpink tajat ta kwajat, por jaich abal yab a exlltsik an Tokat Dhuslab nibal nin chp na Dios.
Pos tam ka ejdh an chemlomtsik, neech ka kwajay jelti an tokat abatwletsik xi kwajat walki; yabich neech ti tomkinaltsik nibal neech ti pidhnb xita abal ka tomkin.

Por kal tin kwenta an chemlomtsik xi neech ka ejech ti t, k yab jayki a ajymaltsik bin dhuslbil na Moiss xan ti tawn kal na Dios ban kidhadh te, xi kwajat ti tal? Ench ti utsan: “Nan tin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.”
Na Dios, in Diosil xi ejattsik, pos nin ejattal an chemlomtsik kwajat ejat. Tattsik i ukpink tajat ta kwajat kal tin kwenta an chemlomtsik.

Jun i oktsix xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss utey xon ti kwajattsik ani in acha xanty u kwlxnb. Kom in chobna ke na Jess tknk alwa, in konoy ench: —Jowa j an takixtalb xi ms uluts?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —An takixtalb xi ms uluts jaich jech: “Ka acha, atiklbtsik xi Israel: an Okxlb jaich ni Diosil ani Jaj, jaich nu junkax Okxlb.
Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil kal ejtal na itsch, kal ejtal na ejattal, kal ejtal na chalab ani kal ejtal na chp.” Jech jaich an takixtalb xi ms uluts.
Nin chabtal, in junwal jeye jelti xin jidhtal: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.” Yab waach ni jun i takixtalb xi ms uluts k xi jechtsik.
Utsan tm ench kal an oktsix xin will nin takixtal na Dios: —Oktsix, alwa tajat ani tsubax xowa a ulu. Jn tokot a Dios waach ani yab waach ms keet.

Max i kaknl na Dios kal ejtal ni itsch, kal ejtal ni chalab, kal ejtal ni ejattal ani kal ejtal ni chp ani max i kanidhl jeye ejtal xi keettsik jelt xan ti kanidhl tib, jaich ms in jalbl tin tamt na Dios k tam ki chemdhl i konl abal ki pikbantsi na Dios tsikadh o tam ki pikbantsi xowakich.
Tam ti na Jess in acha abal tkon kal i tekat chalab, in utsa tm ench: —Wich tajat u kibel abal ki kwajay taknl kal na Dios. Yabich tm xata konyat ms kal ni jun xita.

Tam ti na Jess kwajat ti oktsix bin elbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulu ench: —An oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in ulaltsik ke an Kristo u chakmlb kal an pulek takix Dabid.
Pos max anchan, jantki p tm ti jaj jeye tajat na Dabid ijtsiyat kin ulu ench kal an Tokat Ejattalb?: An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt, asta ke Nan tu tantsi ejtal xi ti atl.”

Pos max jaj jeye tajat an pulek takix Dabid in ulu ke an Kristo jaich nin Ajtik, jantki p tm tu ulwb ke na Dabid, jaich in weje paklil an Kristo? Yn i atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat taja ani u ochwixtsik kal yantam i kulbxnich.

Tam ti na Jess bl kwajat in oktsal an atiklbtsik in utsatsik ench: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios. Jajtsik in kulbetnl ka xechin kal in jochdha xekt ani ka chapndhtsik kal yantam i kaknaxtalb tin tamt an atiklbtsik.
Ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in kulbetnltsik ka buxkan ban koytalb xon tu buxkanaltsik xi ms uluts ani tam waach i kapxnich, in kulbetnltsik ka buxk ban koytalb xi ms alwa.

Jajtsik in kntsal tin kim an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ani tayl, in tajltsik i nakdha lb abal kin makuxna ani abal ka utsantsik ke i lujdha iniktsik. Xin tajltsik anchan, neech kin bachu jun i yajtsiktalb ms plek.
Jun i kij, na Jess buxl tin tamt xon ti kwajat nin bl an tumn xu pikbantsb na Dios, in tell xan ti an atiklbtsik tin balyal an pikbantsixtalb ani yn i tumnladh iniktsik in balyal yandha i tumn.
Ulich jeye jun i chojontl chemtsidh mmlb ani in baliy chb i tsitsik tipax tumn xi yab yandha in jalbl.

Na Jess in kaniy tm nin exbaliltsik ka utey ani in utsatsik ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, an tumn xin pidhna jech an chojontl chemtsidh mmlb w tajat, por ms ja yn in jalbl tin tamt na Dios k xi ejtal an tumn xi keettsik in balymal bin bl an pikbantsixtalb.
Pos keettsik, tokot in pidhnl xowa yabich in yntsal; por an mmlb, kal in chojontltal, in pidhna ejtal xowa ta tin kool abal kin watna kl na kts.

Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kalel bin elbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, utsan ench kal jn ti b nin exbaliltsik: —Oktsix, ka tela an labidh tujubtsik xi kl ti tajadh an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani an attsik xi jaych jeye in adhk!
Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xo a chutal jech an pakdha at, por yab neech ka jilkon ni jun i tujub tbx. Ejtal neech ka julp.
Kaletsik tm ban chn Olibos xi kwajat tin tamt an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Tam ti tajaich ti buxl na Jess, utey tm na Pedro, na Jakobo, na Juan ani na Andrs abal kin konoytsik chinatki ench:
—Ti ku utsa xowki neech ka tmun ejtal xowa a ulu ani ti ku utsa jeye xantom exl neech ki chuu abal ki chobna ke exomich ti kunel xowki neech ka tmun.
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka beletnatsik tab abal yab ki kambiyat kal ni jun xita,
pos neech ka tsch yn kin kambixna nu bij ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Nanich nin Kristo”. Ani yn neech ka kambiyat kal jech an kambixtsik.
Tam ka achatsik ke exom i pjxtalb tki tki ani u tilnal ke tich jun neech ka tujey, yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, pos anchan kool ka tmun, por yabl jaich an pakwenib.

Pos an pakdha bitsow neech ti pjx kal in at pakdha bitsow ani an pakdha oklek neech ti pjx kal in at pakdha oklek. Neech ka lwkin an chabl tki tki, neech ka wachin i kanab ani neech ti pjx an atiklbtsik. Por ejtal jech, jaich in tujtal an yajtsiktalb, jelti an yajal xin achl jun i mmlb tam nechich kin wachiy i chakam.

Ka beletnatsik tab, pos neech ki pidhn ban pakdha tjodh ani neech ki chawattsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Neech ki kinandhtsik ban pakdha awiltalb ani ban pakdha takix kal Nanki tu kwenta. Anchan, neech ka ejto ti kin tilatsik tin tamt jajtsik.
Ani neech ka tiltsin jech an ti alwa tilab ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl ani tm neech ka ulchich an pakwenib.

Tam ki yakwantsik ani ki jnjich abal ki pidhn ban awiltalbtsik, yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal tin kwenta xowa neech ka ulu. Tam kin bajch an ora xowki neech ki kwin, neech ki pidhantsik xowa ka ulu. Pos yab tattsik neech ta kw, neech ti kw an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba na itsch.

Taltsik neech kin pidhna nin kidhbtsik abal ka chemdh ani an ttalbtsik neech jeye kin pidhna nin chakmiltsik abal ka chemdh. An chakmlbtsik neech kin tomna nin tta ani nin nna ani neech kin pidhna abal ka chemdhtsik.
Neech ki atantsik kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom kal Nanki tu kwenta, por xita kin kuxuy ejtal jech, neech ka lowat.

Xita kin ajay jech, kin exbay: Tam ka chuutsik an kakadh ataxtalb xin tilmal an tiltsix Daniel kwajatich xon tu kaknb na Dios, tm, xi kwajattsik ban chabl xi Judea, ki kaletsik ta chinkonal ban chnlom.
Xi kwajattsik tin b nin kim, yab ka paaytsik abal ka ochich kin iki jun xata alt.
Ani xi kwajattsik bin ale, yab ka witsiy tin kim abal kin iki nin wt.
Chojontl in chubl an mmlbtsik xi ka elan kodh jachan i kij o u tsutsdhom!
Ka kontsaltsik na Dios abal yab ka tmun jech tam in kijil in chamy,

pos watats ti kakadh an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka wachin jachan i kij. Asta tin tajm na Dios an chabl ani an walki ani asta xo, yab jayki wachink ni jun i yajtsiktalb jelti xi neech ka wachin. Ani yab ms jayki neech ka wachin jun i yajtsiktalb anchan.
Max an Okxlb yab kin wmdha jachan an kij, yab xita neech ka loey; por kal tin kwentaki in knl xi Jaj in takwymal, neech kin wmdha jachan an kij.
Tam jachan i kij, max jun xita ti ki utsatsik ench: “Ka tela, j kwajat an Kristo”, o “ka tela, n kwajat”, yab ka beltsi.

Pos neech ka wachin i kambixtsik xi neech kin ulu ke jajich nu Kristo, o ke jajich xi abadh ti tiltsix kal na Dios. Neech kin taja i pakdha exl ani i pakdha labandhaxtalb abal kin kambiy an atiklbtsik ani neech kin lena kin kambiytsik asta xi takudhich kal na Dios.
Por yab ka uktsitsik ke ejtal jech tu okox utsmalich abal ki kwajaytsik tojojodh.
Tayl, tam ka watch jachan an yajtsiktalb, na kts neech ka jikwchin ani na ch yab neech ka tajkan;
neech ka kwajlan na ttsik ani ejtal an pakdha chplb xi kwajat walki, neech ka yoywat.
Tmki jachan, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin chutat kal ejtalki, pos neech kin tsch ban tokow kal ejtal nu chp ani nu pulek labidh tokt.
Neech tm ku aba nu tokat abatwlejiltsik putlki an kayl ani putlki t walki abal kin junku xu takwymal.
Ka exbaytsik jech an junbaxtalb kal tin kwenta in akan an igo: Tam ka tujch ti kalel nin dhlam kweltsik ani ka tujch ti eblinal nin xekltsik, a chobichtsik abal exomich ti kunel an kakal kij.
Anchan jeye, tam ka chuutsik exomich ti tmnal ejtal xowa tu utsmal, ka chobna abal wich u kibel kin tsch jun.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal jech neech ka tmun tam yabl chemnektsik xi kwajat ejat jech i kij.
Ejtal xi t kwajat walki ani xi kwajat jeye tech ban kayl, neech ka pakchun; por xowa Nan u ulal, yab ja neech ka watey yab ka tmun anchan.
Por kal tin kwenta na kts ani an ora xowki ti neech kin tsch jun, ni jun xita yab in chob, nibal an tokat abatwletsik xi t kwajat walki, nibal Nan xin Chakmlb kal na Dios, tokot in chob nu Tta.
Jaxtm tu utsltsik: Ka kokm i kwenta ani ki lantsik junini abal yab ki elan ukpidh, pos yab a chobtsik xowki neech kin witsiy jun.

In junwal jelti jun i inik xi neech owl bitsow. Tam ti yabl kalnek, in punkuntsi nin tojnliltsik abal ka beletnantsat tin kim; juntsik juntsik in pidha ti tojlb ani in takiy an belkol wileb kin chuchm alwa abal ka japtsin an ti wileb tam ka witsiy.
Nan u junwal jelti an dhabal at xi kale owl bitsow. Jaxtm tu utsltsik ka kokm i kwenta kom yab a chobtsik xowki neech kin witsiy, max dhamkulom, chejel akal, tam ka dhjan an pekel o tam tsudhenekich,
abal tam kin tsch jun jiktowle, yab tu ela i ukpidhtsik.
Xowa tu utsltsik yab tatkitsik tu utsl, ejtalki u utsltsik ench: Ka kokmtsik i kwenta.

Tam ti jachan, u kibel chb a kts abal ka ajbn an paskwa junax kal nin ajb an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye, an ajib xin ajbnl an israelitatsik. An oklek pletsik junax kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin yakwa na Jess kal i kambixtalb ani kin chemdha.
Por in ulaltsik ench: —Yab ki taja tam exom an ajib abal yab ka kwajay ti pjx an atiklbtsik.

Tam ti na Jess kwajat ban bitsow xi Betania bin kim na Simn xin koolwiik an kwajat atax tt, lejat buxl ti kapul, ulich jun i mmlb xin tsidhl jun i frasko tajadh kal i alabastro. An frasko tsutsat kal i niwiytalb xi mapal j in niwy i wich xu bijyb ti nardo ani kajbidh tajat in jalbl. In pejkntsi tin nk an frasko ani in joltsi an ti niwiytalb bin k na Jess.
Taltsik xi ta ti kwajattsik, chakuytsik ani u tsxtsik ench: —Jantki ti odhn jech an niwiytalb?
Ka nujwatwiik kal x i bo inik i denariotsik o ms abal ka pidhan an ti tumn an chojontltsik. Ani ulwat abal yab tajat alwa xowa in taja jachan an mmlb.
Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Jila kwajat, yab xata ka utsa. Jech xowa tin tajtsi, alwa tajat.
Pos an chojontltsik echeki neech ka kwajay kal tattsik ani neech ka ejto ka tolmiytsik tam ka lena, por Nan yab echeki neech kin kwajay kal tattsik.
Jaj tin tajtsi xowa in ejto, tin niwbdhantsmalich an tu tul abal ka kwajay tojojodhich tam kin jolyat.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke putlki tin publ an kayl xntikichki ka tilan an alwa tilab, neech jeye ka tilan xowa in tajmal jech an mmlb abal ka chalpayat.
Na Judas Iskariote, jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, kale tm kin chuu an oklek pletsik ani in utsa abal jaj neech kin pidhna na Jess.
Tam tin achatsik, kulbtsik tajat ani utsan na Judas abal neech ka pidhan ti tumn. Na Judas in tuju tm kin aliy xan ti kin uwa abal kin pidhna na Jess.

Tin jidhtal ktsjil an ajib tam u kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye ani tam u chemdhb jeye an borrego abal ka ajbn an paskwa, konyat ench na Jess kal an exbaltsik: —Jn ta l ku kale ki tojojoy abal ka kapu an wiyadh borrego kal tin kwenta an paskwa?
In aba tm chb xi ta ti xeech kal Jaj ani in utsa ench: —Ki kale ban bitsow, taja, neech ka elatsik jun i inik xin nedhl jun mul i ja ani ka wwna.

Ki ochichtsik xon ti jaj ka ochich ani ka utsa ench an dhabal at: “An oktsix in l kin chobna xon ti kwajat an alt xon ti neech kin kapu an wiyadh borrego junax kal nin exbaliltsik kal tin kwenta an paskwa.”
Neech tm ti ki ltsitsik jun i pulek alt tojojodhich alwa ba jun i pntsx at. Ka lejkiytsik tm taja an kapnl abal waw.
Kale tm an exbaltsik ani ulich ban bitsow Jerusaln. Anchan xan ti utsantsik, anchan tin ela ani in lejkchtsik tm an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
Tam ti aklch, ulich na Jess junax kal xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik
ani tam ti kwajatichtsik ti kapul ban mesa, utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke jn ti b xi tattsik, xi xo kwajat ti kapul kal Nan, neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
Tepintsik tm tajat ani tujey ti konyb ench na Jess kal xi lajuchb juntsik ti juntsik: —Awxe nan? Ani jn in ulu jeye ench: —Awxe nan?
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jn ti b xi tattsik lajuchb, xi exom in juwal an pan ba jaych an talab xon ti Nan u juwal, jaich xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.

Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin chemdh jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, por chojontl in chubl an inik xi neech ti kin pidhna! Pos yajtsik tajat ti neech kin jalbiy, msakwiik alwa max yabak wachink.
Lejat kwajattsik ti kapul, na Jess in tyna an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani tam tin pejmalich, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka kaputsik, jech jaich nu tul.
In tyna tm jun i lejab baltsidh ti yajtsik uxnl, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in watbantsi nin exbaliltsik ani ejtal in ucha wetsik wetsik.
In utsatsik ench: —Jech, jaich nu xichl xi neech kin jalblna an t lejkintalb xin lejkiymal na Dios. Jech nu xichl, jaich xi neech ku wakla ban peltsidh te abal tin alwabl yn i atiklbtsik.
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku uxtsi tin jall an uba asta tam ku ucha xi t an uxnl xon tu takix na Dios.
Tam ti okontsik kin ajtintsi na Dios, kaletsik tm ban chn Olibos.

Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Jech i akal ejtal tattsik neech ka jila ti kin bela kal tin kwenta xowa neech ku tamu, pos ench tin ulu na Dios ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Neech ku walka ka chemdh an belkol borregotsik ani an borregotsik neech ka bukey.”
Por tam kin ejech ti t, neech kin kale okox ban chabl Galilea ani tattsik tayl.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Maske ejtal xi ms kin jila ti bela, nan yaba.
Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl ke jech i akal, tam yabl dhjnk an pekel chbl, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.
Por na Pedro in witsko jun ani in ulu ench: —Maske kin utsan ke neech kin chemdh junax kal Tat, yab neech ku ulu ke yab tu exll. Ani ejtaltsik anchan tin ulu.
Ulichtsik tm ba jun i chakam alelb xin bij Jetseman ani utsan ench an exbaltsik kal na Jess: —Ki buxkankitsik tech, lejat Nan neech n ani tin l.
In jna na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan abal ka junikn kl ani tujey kin acha na Jess jun i tepintalb ani yajtsiktalb.
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —U achl tu ejattal ke neech ku chmay jech an tepintalb. Ki jilkontsik tech ani yab ki wayichtsik.
Kale tm na Jess lej w t ani, tudhlan kutl asta chabl ani in kontsi na Dios max in ejtowalak kin taja abal yab kin watna an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin tametna jachan i ora.

Ba nin lbil in ulu ench: —Tta, ejtal xowa a l u tjnal kal na awiltal ani kal na chp. Nan tu kontsal ti kin tolmintsi abal yab ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb xi tin aytsm; por yab ka tjan xowa Nan u l, ka tjan xowa Tat a l.
Witsiy tm xon ti kwajat xi x an exbaltsik ani u wayaltsik tin ela. Utsan ench na Pedro: —Simn, a bell ta wayal? Yab a ejto ka kuxuy ni jun i ora yab ki wayich?
Yabtsik ki wayich ani ki lan abal yab ki ttsik kal an lej atax. Tsubax kejle, na ejattaltsik in l ki lan, por yab i tolmiybtsik kal na tul abal yab tajat likat.
Kale tm jun ani lan. Anlki ti lan jelt xan tin tajmal tin jidhtal.
Tam ti witsiy na Jess, u wayaltsik jun tin ela abal u mtnalichtsik tajat nin wal kal an akal ani yabtsik in ela xan ti ka tkon.

Kale jun ti l tin oxtsl ani tam ti witsiy xon ti kwajat an exbaltsik, in utsatsik ench: —A ntsaltsik ta wayal ani ta koyol? Lejatich! In bajmalich an ora xowki Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhnjich abal kin chemdh kal an walablomtsik.
Ki chakchtsik ani wanch; nich tl xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.

Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess tam ti ulich na Judas, jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik. Ulich junax kal yn i ykwaltsik, in teykmtsik i macht ani i te. Abnktsik kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani kal nin oklkil an judotsik.

Na Judas, xi neech ti pidhnax, jayki tin utsmalich an ykwaltsik xanty neech kin taja abal kin exlatsik xitam j na Jess. Ench tin utsatsik: —An inik xi neech ku chuchbay, jaich xi tattsik a ayal. Ka yakwa ani ka jnatsik belkmte alwa.
Tam ti ulich, utey ba na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Oktsix, Oktsix! Ani in chuchbay.
Tmki ti yakwan na Jess kal an ykwaltsik.
Jn ti b xi ta ti kwajat kal na Jess in jixna nin machtil ani in patntsi tin xuchun nin tojnlil an oklek pletsik.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess xi ulich an ti yakwaxtsik: —Jantki ta tsinektsik kal i macht ani kal i te abal ti kin yakwa jelti max neech ka yakwatsik jun i kw?

Tsudhey ka tsudhey in kwajinek kal tattsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios tin oktsix ani yab tin yakwmal. Por jech xowa exom tin tajtsaltsik, jaich abal ka tjan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab.
Jilan tm kwetm na Jess ani kale ti chinkonal an exbaltsik.
T jeye ti neech wewkmte na Jess kal jun i kwitl inik ani tokot bolilidh kal jun i dhak kudhkum. Jech an kwitl inik, yakwan jeye kal an ykwaltsik xi kl ti yakwan na Jess,
por in jilchna an dhak kudhkum xi kl ti bolidh ani chilim ti jlch.
Jn tm na Jess bin kim an lej oklek pletsik ani junkun taja nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, nin oklkiltsik an judotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios.
Na Pedro wwnaxin wki ani ulich asta bin elbil in kim an lej oklek pletsik. Buxkan taja ti dhilal bin wl an kamal junax kal xin beletnltsik an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an Junkulom Awiltalb in ayal jun xata abal kin ejto kin walbiy na Jess ani anchan ka pidhn abal ka chemdh, por yab eltsin ni jun in walab.
Kal yn ti kwajay ti jantsinal ti kw na Jess, por keetich keetich xowa in ulutsik.
Kubey tm taltsik ti lnax jaychki kal i januts kw ani in ulutsik ench:
—Waw i achm tin ulmal ench: “Nan neech ku paku jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xin kubm an iniktsik ani ti x a kts neech ku kuba jun t xi yab kubadh kal i iniktsik.”
Por nibal anchan yab in junu xowa in ulutsik xi jidhtal.
Kubey tm an lej oklek pletsik junax chejel xon ti kwajat xi ttsik ti junkunk ani konyat ench na Jess: —Jantki ti yab i tknal? Tsubaxxe xowa i kwajat ta usnal o yaba?
Por na Jess n w yab kuchun ani nibal xata in tkoy. Konyat tm jun ench kal nin lej oklkil an pletsik: —Tatxe ni Kristo, xi Chakmlb kal na Dios xu kaknb?
Tkon ench na Jess: —Nan. Ani neech ti kin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, buxl tin ejt na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja ani tam kin tsch jun ban tokow.
An lej oklek pletsik in michna kal in chkub nin kudhkmil xin kwajbm abal anchan ti tkoyat kal na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Yabich ms i yntsal i lnax.
A achaichtsik xan tin chikat taja na Dios. Janty xo a ulaltsik ki tajtsi? Ejtal xi ta ti junkunk, jununl tin ulutsik abal walbidh tajat na Jess ani in tomnl ka chemdh.
