Tujey tm ti tubkayb na Jess kal taltsik, ti putsuntsb tin wal, ti chawb kal i kubaklek ani u usnal ench: —Ka ulu xo xita ti chaaw! Ani pikyat jeye bin wal kal an belkol pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Na Pedro kwajat chaat bin elbil an pulek at ani tmki jachan, ulich jun in tsidhan xu tojnal bin kim an lej oklek pletsik.
Tam ti chutat na Pedro ti dhilal, teloloyat alwa ani utsan ench: —Tat junax teye ta xeech kal na Jess xi Nasaret.
Por na Pedro in ulu ench: —Yab u exll, nibal u chob xanty a till. Kale elb xon tu oxnb ani dhjan tm jun i pekel.
Chab chutat jun kal an tsidhan ani tujey kin utsa ench xi ttsik ti kwajat: —Jech an inik jaich jeye in kidhtal na Jess.
Por jaj in witsko kin ulu ke yab ani. Tam ti ms lej jun w, utsan ench kal xi ttsik ti kwajat: —Tsubax lejtal, tat jaich teye jn ti b xi jajtsik, pos tat i Galileo ani anchan teye i kw jelti jajtsik.
Tujey tm kin ulu na Pedro abal kin tamu xata yab alwa max yab tsubax xowa in ulal ani in lej tsubax ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yab u exll xitam inik xi kwajattsik a till.

Tmki jachan, dhjan an pekel tin chabtsl. In chalpna tm na Pedro xan ti usnk kal na Jess: “Tam yabl dhjnk an pekel tin chabtsl, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.” Ani ukikl ti kwajay kin chalpay xowa usnk kal na Jess.

Tam ti tsudhey, dhajawe tajat ti junkun nin oklkiltsik an pletsik kal nin oklkil an judotsik, kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ani kal an Junkulom Awiltalb. Tam tin chalpchtsik alwa xanty neech kin taja, in jnatsik tm wikadh na Jess ani in pidhna ba na Pilato.
Konyat ench na Jess kal na Pilato: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik? Tkon ench na Jess: —Tat a ulal abal anchan.
Kal yn xata ti walbiyat kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik.
Konyat tm jun kal na Pilato: —Yabxe neech ki tkon? Ka acha xan ti exom ti walbiyaltsik, in ulaltsik ke yn xata a tajmal.
Por nibal anchan yab tkon na Jess ani labandhjich tokot na Pilato.
Echeki tam u ajbnb an paskwa, na Pilato in walkl jun i wiknl xi ka kontsin kal an atiklbtsik.
Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti balidh ban wikaxte jun i inik xin bij ta Barrabs xi wiknk junax kal nin kidhtaltsik abal chemdhaxnktsik tam tin pjeym i awiltalbtsik.
Junkun tm an atiklbtsik abal kin kontsi na Pilato kin walka jun i wiknl jelt xan ti echeki in ujnmal in tajl.
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —A ltsikxe tu walkantsi an tin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
Konyattsik anchan kal na Pilato kom in chob alwa ke yab u lenb ka chutat na Jess kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani jaxtm ti pidhnats na Jess abal ka chemdh.
Por nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, in nixokna an atiklbtsik kin konoy ka walk na Barrabs.
Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Pilato: —Ani janty a l ku tajtsi xa bijyaltsik tin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
Jajtsik tkon kawidh ani in ulutsik ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —Jantom walastalb in tajm? Por jajtsik in ntsi kin ulu ms kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te!
Kom na Pilato in l ka jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik, in walka na Barrabs. In abna tm ka lekbayat ynl na Jess ani tayl in pidhnaich tm abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Jn tm na Jess kal an soldadotsik bin kuxtlil an at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani kanyat ka junkun taja ejtal xi keet an soldadotsik.
Xeketliyat tm na Jess kal jun i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani kwajbantsat bin k ti kwetsotsl dhipadh kdh.
Tujey tm ti labdhnb ench na Jess: —Ki kwajay kijidh, Pulek Takxal an judotsik!
U toxyb bin k kal jun i te, u tubkayb ani u tudhltsik tm tin tamt.
Tam ti okontsik kin ubtna ani kin labdhna, in wkontschtsik tm an ti chak kudhkum, kwajbantsat xi Jaj nin kudhkmil ani kaldhjich tm abal ka jn ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.

Taman ti bl jun i inik xin bij Simn, xu taknal ban chabl Sirene, nin tta na Alejandro ani na Rufo. Jaj u witslich bin ale ani tam tu watelich taja, tajtsin ti chplb kal an soldadotsik abal kin kitnantsi an ti peltsidh te xin nedhl na Jess.
Jn tm na Jess ban chabl xu bijyb Glgota. Ti tnek kw, Glgota, in l kin ulu: “In chablil in beklk in k i chemlom inik.”
Pidhan na Jess ti yajtsik uxnl xukudh kal i tsaiktalb xu bijyb mirra, por yab in lena kin ucha.
Tam ti pajkiyatich ban peltsidh te, wlchxnantsat an tin kudhkmil na Jess kal an soldadotsik, por yab aniki, okox ubtintsik abal kin chuu xanty kin lujuy kin ta juntsik ti b.
Belju i dhajaw tam ti na Jess pajkiyat ban peltsidh te.
Kwajb bin k an peltsidh te jun i dhuslab xin ulal xantki tin kwenta ti chemdh. Ench ti kwajat dhutsadh: “Jech jaich nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
Pajkiyattsik jeye ba peltsidh te junax kal na Jess chb i kwtsik, jn tin ejt ani jn tin kwatab.
Anchan ti tmun abal ka tjan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “jin jeye jelti max i walablom, jelti xi chemechtsik junax kal Jaj.”
Odhbijyat kal xu wateltsik taja tin tamt, in wwkliyaltsik nin k ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tat, xa ejtowal ka paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani neech ka kuba jun ti x a kts,
ka loo xo tab ani ki paay ban peltsidh te.
T jeye ti kwajat nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ti labdhnax ani u tsxtsik ench: —In lomal keettsik ani xo Jaj yab in ejtowal kin loo tinb.

Max ani lejtal Jajich nu Kristo, nin Pulek Takxal an israelitatsik, ka paay xo ban peltsidh te ani neech tm ki belaich. Xi ta ti kwajattsik tin wlm kejtsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te, u odhbijixtsik jeye.
Tam ti chejelich a kts, jikwchin tin publ an kayl ani in tjontsi asta x i wkal.
Tam ti xich i wkal, na Jess in ulu kawidh ench: —Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani? —jech an kw in l kin ulu: Dios tu Ajtik, Dios tu Ajtik, jantki tin walba?
Taltsik xi taja ti kwajat, in achatsik ani in ulu ench: —Ka acha, exom in kanl na Elas, an tiltsix xi xechink ti weje.

Jn ti b kale adhik kin axdha ban jiliy uxnl jun xata jelti kwinim, in wika bin tsm jun i te, in utuntsi bin wi na Jess abal kin juchu ani in ulu ench: —Yabich ms xata ki tajtsi, wana ki chuu max ka tsch na Elas kin paba ban peltsidh te.
Dhjan tm kawidh na Jess ani chemech.
Tmki jachan, an tolow kudhkum xi ta ti palat alt ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xlan asta tekat ani asta chaat.
An oklek soldado romano xi ta ti kubl tin tamt na Jess, tam tin chuu xan ti dhjan ani chemech, in ulu ench: —Tsubax lejtal, jech an inik u Chakmlb kal na Dios.
T jeye ti kwajat i mmlbtsik ti w telom. J kwajat taltsik nin bij: na Salom, na Mara Magdalena ani na Mara xin kool chb in chakmil, jn in bij ta Jos ani xi tayl in bij ta Jakobo.
Jech an mmlbtsik, juniknadh ani tolmidh kl na Jess tam ti kwajay Galilea. Ta jeye ti kwajat ms keet i mmlbtsik xi juniknadh kl na Jess tam ti kale Jerusaln.
Tam ti exomich ti dhamul, tam an israelitatsik in tojojoyal xowa in yntsal abal in ktsjil an koyxnich,

ulich na Jos xu kwajl ban bitsow Arimatea. Jaj jaich jeye jun i ultalb kidhtalb kal an Junkulom Awiltalb. Jaj kwajat jeye in aytsm xowki na Dios neech ka tujch ti takix ani in kuba tinb ka ochich xon ti kwajat na Pilato abal kin kontsi tin tul na Jess kin joliy.
Na Pilato labandh abal in acha ke jayki ti chemnek na Jess. Jaxtm tin kaniy an oklek soldadotsik abal kin konoy max ani lejtal ti chemnekich.
Tam ti utsan kal an oklek soldadotsik abal ani, utsanich tm na Jos kal na Pilato abal awilich kin jna kin joliy.

In chaay tm na Jos jun i kudhkum, in paba nin tul na Jess ban peltsidh te ani in boliy kal an kudhkum. Kale tm kin kwajba ba jun i jlimtalb xi ta ti kwajat cholkadh bin akan jun i tujub chn ani tolill tin utu jun i yejche tujub abal kin paxkintsi kl tin wilbil an jlimtalb.
Na Mara Magdalena ani xi jn na Mara, nin nna na Jos, in chuutsik xon ti kwajbantsat tin tul na Jess.
Tam ti watch nin ktsjil an koyxnich, na Salom, na Mara Magdalena ani xi jn na Mara nin nna na Jakobo, in chaaytsik i niwiytalb abal ka kaletsik kin mawtsi kl tin tul na Jess.
Dhajawe tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, kaletsik ban jlimtalb ani tam ti ulich taja jayki ti eblinkich na kts.
Knxintsik ench: —Jita neech ti ku wixkintsi an ti tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb?
Por tam ti ulchichtsik, in chuu abal an yejche tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb jayki ti wixkintsidh.
Ochichtsik tm alt ani in chuu taja buxl tin ejttsik jun xita jelti kwitl inik. An kwitl inik xeketlidh kal jun i dhak jochat xeketlb ani jikey tajat an mmlbtsik.
Por utsan ench an mmlbtsik: —Yab ki jikeytsik, u chobich abal a ayaltsik na Jess xi Nasaret, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Jaj ejnekich ti t, yabich waach tech. Ka telati n xon ti kwajbadh.
Ki kalchtsik ani ka utsa nin exbaliltsik ani na Pedro: “Na Jess neech ka okxin ka kale Galilea ani tattsik tayl; taja neech ka chuutsik jelt xan ti utsmal.”
Kale tm adhik an mmlbtsik ban jlimtalb abal tokot u wipipltsik ani u jikl. Nibal xata in utsatsik ni jun xita abal u jikltsik tajat.
Tam ti na Jess ejech dhajawe tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, okox in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Mara Magdalena, xi kldhantsidh bk i atax ejattalb.
Na Mara kale tm ani in utsa xi xechinktsik junax kal na Jess ke jaj in chumal na Jess. Xi xechinktsik kal na Jess, elantsik ti uknal ani ti tepinal kal na Mara.
Tam tin acha ke na Jess ejnek ti t ani ke na Mara in chum, yab in belatsik.
Tayl, chutat na Jess kal chb nin exbaliltsik tam ti neech ti bl, por Jaj in jalkuymal tinb.
Tam tin exlaichtsik abal jaich na Jess, witsiytsik xon ti kwajat xi ms an exbaltsik ani in tiltsi ke in chumaltsik na Jess, por nibal jajtsik yab beltsin.

Ms tayl, na Jess in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal xi lajujn an exbaltsik tam ti buxutsik ti kapul. Kwiyantsik tm kal na Jess abal yabtsik tajat u belom ani yabtsik tajat in exbayal, kom yab in belatsik xowa tiltsin kal xin chumaltsik ke na Jess ejnek ti t.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kaletsik putlki tin publ an kayl ani ka tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab ejtal an atiklbtsik.
Xita kin bela ani ka pujan, neech ka loey; por xita yab kin bela, neech ka kale ban kibeltalb.

Ejtal xita kin beltsi an tin kwintal na Dios, neech kin ejto kin taja jech an exltsik: Kal tin awiltal nu bij neech kin ejto kin kldhantsi ti atax ejattalbtsik xita kwajat teykmte kl, neech ti kwtsik kal i t kwintalb
ani max yab kin chuu ani kin tyna i chan o max kin ucha jun i itlab, yab xata neech kin tamu. Neech jeye kin kwajbatsik nin kubak ban yaultsik ani neech ka jeley jachan an yaultsik.
Tayl, tam ti okonich ti tawnbtsik, jnjich tm walki an Ajtiklb ani buxkan tin ejt na Dios.
Tam ti kalch an abatwletsik, xechin putlki kin tila an alwa tilab ani tolmiyattsik kal an Ajtiklb kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb abal ka chobn ke tsubax xowa in tilltsik. Anchan ka tjan.
Yn i atiklbtsik in dhutsmal kal tin kwenta ejtal xowa in taja an Ajtiklb tech ba ni chablil.
Anchan tin dhutsmaltsik jelt xan tu tiltsink kal xi chlmadhtsik asta tam ti tujey jech xowa tmnk ani tolmixnktsik abal ka tilan jech an alwa tilab.
Pulek chalpadh Tefilo, nan u alimay neye kal yantam i kaymtalb ejtal xowa tmnk asta tam ti tujeyki ani u chalpayal abal in tomnl tu dhutsuntsi ejtal xowa in taja an Ajtiklb anchan xan ti tmun.
Tu dhutsuntsal jech abal ka exla alwa an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta xowa i oktsinkich.

Tam ti na Erodes u pulek takix ban chabl xi Judea, ta ti kwajat jun i ple xu bijyb ta Sakaras, jn ti b xu kidhtalb bin junkunlil na Abas. Nin tomtal in bij ta Elisabet ani jaj u kidhtalb kal an ple Arn.
Chablam ti b lujattsik tajat tin tamt na Dios, in tajltsik ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb ani xowa in ulal ka tajan an Okxlb.
Por yab in kool i chakamtsik kom na Elisabet yab u knal, tm jun pakdhaichtsik tajat.
Jun i kij, tam ti an pletsik xon tu taknal jeye na Sakaras in lujuy ka tjontsik abal kin tjontsi na Dios,
ubtintsik abal kin chobna xita neech kin lujuy ka ochich ti ikbax ban pulek at xon tu kaknb an Okxlb. Ubtintsik okox kom anchan tin ujnmaltsik in tajl ani na Sakaras, jaich in lujuy ka ochich.
Lejat an ikob kwajat ti tal, ejtal an atiklbtsik kwajat elb ti l.
Tmki jachan, na Sakaras in chuu jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb xi xalkan kubl tin ejt xon ti kwajat ti tal an ikob.
Tam ti na Sakaras in chuu an tokat abatwle, laban tajat ani jikey.
Por utsan ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Sakaras, yab ki jikey, pos na Dios in achmalich na lbil ani na tomtal Elisabet neech kin koy jun i chakam xi neech ka bijiy ta Juan.
Tat neech tajat ki kijidhm ani yn neech ka kulb abal wachin jachan an chakam,
pos jachan na chakmil neech ka kwajay plek tin tamt na Dios. Yab neech kin ucha i yajtsik uxnl nibal i bk ani neech tajat ka kwajay teykmte kal an Tokat Ejattalb asta tam ka wachinki.
Neech kin taja ka witsiytsik ti t ban Okxlb nin Diosil, yn i atiklbtsik xu kidhtalb kal na Israel.

Jech na Juan neech ka okxin xon ti neech ka ulich an Ajtiklb ani neech kin koy nin ejattal ani an chplb jelti xin koy an tiltsix Elas. Neech kin taja ka pkwlntsxin an ttalbtsik kal nin chakmiltsik ani abal kin lujkchtsik jeye nin chalab xi yabtsik u tajax ti kij. Anchan, neech tm ka kwajch tojojodh an atiklbtsik abal kin bachu an Ajtiklb.
Na Sakaras in konoy ench an tokat abatwle: —Janti neech ku ejto ku chobna max tsubax jech? Pos nan in yejchelich ani nu tomtal plekich jeye tajat.
Tkoyat ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Nan u bij Gabriel ani u tjontsal a Dios, Jaj tin abmal tu tawna ani tu ltsi jech an ti alwa tilab.
Por xo, kom yab a bela xowa tu utsa, neech ki mb ani yab neech ka ejto ta kw asta ka wachin na chakmil. Jech neech ka tmun, tam kin bajaw an kij.
Lejat kwajat ti tmnal jech, an atiklbtsik kwajat elb in aytsal na Sakaras, u labnalichtsik abal owch tajat ani yab u kalel ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.

Tam ti kale na Sakaras, yabich in ejtowal kin tawna an atiklbtsik, tawnaxin kal in kubakki abal mbdhats. An atiklbtsik in chobn tm abal na Sakaras in chumal jun i xalkantsixtalb ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Tam ti kidhch an kij ti tjontsix, na Sakaras kale tin kim.
Ms tayl, nin tomtal Elisabet jilkon kodh ani b a ch yab kale tin kim. Jaj in ulal ench tin itsch:
“An Okxlb tin tajtsm jech abal yabich ti kin tidhebdha an atiklbtsik.”
Tam tin akaklbich a ch ti kwajat kodh na Elisabet, aban kal na Dios an tokat abatwle Gabriel ba jun i bitsow xi kwajat Galilea xu bijyb Nasaret
abal kin chabiy jun i tsidhan xin bij ta Mara. Jech an tsidhan, kwajatich konodh abal ka tomikn kal jun i inik xin bij Jos. Jech an inik u kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid.
An tokat abatwle ochich xon ti kwajat na Mara ani in ulu ench: —Mara, tu chapndhl, xi kanidhb tajat kal an Okxlb! An Okxlb kwajat kal tat ani ti lbtajmal ms k xi keet an mmlbtsik.
Por tam ti na Mara in chuu an tokat abatwle, laban tajat kal xowa in acha utsan ani u chalpax xantki ti chapndh anchan.
Utsan tm ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Mara, yab ki jikey, pos i chutat kal na Dios ke alwa ka bachu nin alwatal.
Xo neech ki jilkon kodh, neech ka wachiy jun i chakam kwitl ani neech ka bijiy ta Jess.
Jaj neech ka kwajay ultalb tajat, neech ka bijyat tin Chakmil a Dios xi plek tajat ani neech ka kwajb kal na Dios ti Pulek Takix jelti nin weje paklil Dabid,
neech kin takiy malill i kij nin kidhtaltsik na Israel ani nin takixtal yab jayki neech kin koy in okontal.
Na Mara in konoy ench an tokat abatwle: —Jantich tm ti neech ku koy i chakam ani nan yab jayki in junkunk kal ni jun i inik?

Tkoyat ench kal an tokat abatwle: —An Tokat Ejattalb neech ka ulich ba tat ani na Dios xi plek tajat, neech ti ki paxkiy kal nin chp jelt xan tu paxkix jun i chalam. Jaxtm, an chakam kwitl xi neech ka koy tokat Ja tajat ani neech ka bijyat tin Chakmil a Dios.
Na exlowl Elisabet, maske plekich tajat, neech jeye kin wachiy jun i chakam kwitl. Xu usnal ke yab u knal, xo in koolich akak a ch ti kwajat kodh.
Abal na Dios yab waach ni jun xata xi yab neech kin ejto kin taja.
In ulu tm ench na Mara: —Nan tin jolbal an Okxlb, ke Jaj kin taja kal nan jelt xan tin utsl. Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, an tokat abatwle kalch tm.
Tam ti jachan i kij, na Mara kale jikatki ba jun i bitsow xi kwajat ban chnlom xi Judea.
Tam ti ulich ba jachan an bitsow, ochich bin kim na Sakaras ani in chapndha na Elisabet.
Tam ti na Elisabet in acha nin chapndhaxtal na Mara, an chakam xi kwajat in kitkm, yoyon ani na Elisabet in bachu nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
Ani kawidh tajat tin ulu ench: —Na Dios ti lbtajmal ms k xi ejtal an mmlbtsik ani in lbtajmal an chakam xa kitkm.
Jita u y nan abal ka tsch ti kin lna nin nna nu Ajtik?
Pos tam tu achpiyki na chapndhomtal, an chakam xi kwajat u kitkm, yoyon kal i kulbxnich.
Kijidh tajat abal a bela xowa i utsan, pos neech ka tjan jelt xan ti utsmal an Okxlb.
In ulu tm ench na Mara: Nan u kaknl an Okxlb
ani nu ejattal u kijidhml kal na Dios nu Loxil.
Abal na Dios in chuu ke nan jaich jun in chojontl jolbal ani xo, ejtal an atiklbtsik xi neech ka wachin tech ti kayl, neech kin ulutsik ke nan in lbtajadh.
Pos na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, tin tajtsmal yn xowa pakdha. Jaj, tokat Ja tajat.
Na Dios echeki neech kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ejtal xita kl tu kaknb.
Yn xata pakdha in tajmal kal nin chp; in pakwtsmal tin chalab xin tekltsik tinb abal yab kin ejto kin taja xowa in chalpaymal.
In wkontsmal tin awiltal an pakdha takix ani in tekbmal xi yabtsik in tekl tinb.
Xu kaltsik, in pidhmal kin koy xowakich xi alwa ani xi tumnladhtsik, in ajmal ka kale mapats kubak.
In tolmiymal nin tjontsixil, xi jaich an israelitatsik ani yab in uktsmal kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb;
anchan tin utsmal ni weje paklil Abraham ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik abal malill i kij.
Na Mara kwajay taja kal na Elisabet x a ch xna ani ms tayl witsch tm jun tin kim.
Tam tin bajch an kij xowki na Elisabet ti neech kin wachiy an chakam, in wachiy jun i chakam kwitl.
Nin at kimdhtsik ani nin jabtsik, kulb tajat tam tin achatsik ke na Elisabet kontsidh tajat ti yajnantsixtalb kal an Okxlb.
Tam tin kidhbay waxik a kts ti wachink an chakam, in jnatsik abal ka kwajbantsat ti exl bin tul jelt xan ti usnk kin taja na Abraham. U lenbwiik ka bijyat ta Sakaras jelti nin tta,
por nin nna in ulu ench: —Yaba. Kool ka bijyat ta Juan.
Tkoyat tm ench: —Jantki? Yab waach ni jun xita a kidhtal xi anchan in bij.
Konyat tm kal i kubaklekki nin tta an chakam abal ka chobn xowa bijlb in l kin chuu ka kwajbantsat nin chakmil.
Nin tta an chakam, in konoy jun i okcha ani in dhutsa taja ench: “Jaj neech ka bijyat ta Juan.” Ani ejtaltsik laban.
Tmki jachan, in ejtch tm jun ti kw na Sakaras ani tujey kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.
Ejtal nin at kimdhtsik laban tam tin chuu jech ani putlki ba jachan an chenadh chabl xi Judea, u tilnal xowa tmnk.

Ejtal xin achltsik jech u chalpaxtsik ani u knxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Janty awil neech kin taja jachan an chakam kwitl tam ka pubey? Pos jech an chakam kwitl, tsubax lejtal ti teykmte kal in chp an Okxlb.
Na Sakaras, nin tta an chakam, teykmte kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb, ijtsin kin ulu ench:
Ki kakna an Okxlb, nin Diosil na Israel, abal tsinek tech ba nin bitswil abal ti ku loo.
Tu pidhámal jun i pulek Loßóxil, xi tál bin kidhtal na Dabid, nin tœójontsixil.
Anchan tin ulmal kal nin tokat tiltsxiltsik asta ti weje.
In ulmal ke neech ti ku loo kal xi tu pjeyal ani kal xi tu atl,
ke neech kin yajnantsi ni weje pakliltsik ani ke yab neech kin uktsi nin tokat lejkintalbil.
Jech jaich xowa na Dios in lej tsubax utsmal ni weje paklil Abraham:
ke neech ti ku loo kal xi tu pjeyaltsik abal ki tjontsch kal ni jun i jkib
ani ku kwajay lujat ani tokat tin tamt Jaj, tsudhey ka tsudhey putl i kij asta xon talat tu ejat.
Ani tat teye, chakam, neech ki bijyat tin tiltsxil a Dios xi plek tajat, pos neech ki okxin ka tojojontsi tin blil an Ajtiklb
abal kin pidha kin chobna nin bitswil ke nin walastalbiltsik neech ka pakwlantsat ani anchan neech kin bachchtsik an loeltalb.
Kom tu kanidhl ani tu yajnantsal ni Diosil, neech ti ku abtsi jun xita xi t walki abal ti ku tolmiy. Jaj in junwal jelt in tajx jun i t kij xin wkoyal i jikwaxtalb.
Jaj neech kin tajbay xi xeechtsik ban jikwaxtalb, xi neechtsikwiik ban kibeltalb tam ka chemech ani neech ti ku tajbantsi ku beley ban bl xi kijidh.
An chakam kwitl u pubel ani nin ejattal ms u chapnibl, kwajay ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh asta tam tin bajaw an kij kin pidhna tinb ka exl kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel.
Tam ti jachan i kij, an lej pulek takix xu bijyb ta Awgusto in ulu abal ka ajyat putlki ejtal an atiklbtsik.
Jech an jidhtal ajumtalb, tajan tam ti na Sirenio kwajat ti pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Siria.
Ejtaltsik kool ka witsiy bin bitswil abal ka jin taja.
Jaxtm, na Jos kale Nasaret, an bitsow xi kwajat Galilea ani kale ban chabl xi Judea ban bitsow xu bijyb Beln xon tu chakam an pulek takix Dabid, kom na Jos u kidhtalb kal na Dabid.
Kale Beln abal ka jin taja junax kal na Mara, xi konodhich tin kool abal ka tomkin kl ani kwajatich kodh.
Lejat kwajattsik Beln, in bajaw xowki na Mara ti neech kin wachiy an chakam.
Taja tin wachiy nin jidhtal chakmil, in dhantsiy, in boliy kal i kudhkum ani in kwachba xon tu mujtsinal tin kapwl an konltsik, pos yab in elatsik ejtidh xon ti ka koych ba jachan an at xon tu koynb.
Kunat Beln, ta ti kwajat chb x i belkol konltsik xin beletnl nin kowltsik tam akal.
Jun jiktowle tin chuutsik jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb, nin labidh tokt an Okxlb tajkan malill xon ti kwajattsik ani jikeytsik tajat.
Por utsantsik ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Yab ki jikeytsik, pos tu tsidhantsaltsik jun i alwa tilab ani yn neech ka kulb kal jech tin kwenta:
ke xo wachinich ti chakam bin bitswil na Dabid jun i Loox abal tattsik, jaich na Kristo an Ajtiklb.
Ti exl, neech ka elatsik an chakam dhantsidh, bolilidh kal i kudhkum ani kwachat xon tu mujtsinal tin kapwl an konltsik.
Tmki jachan, xalkan tin wl an tokat abatwle yn i tokat abatwletsik xi tl walki, in pubdhantsaltsik tin bij na Dios ani in ulaltsik ench:
Kin koy an labidh tokattalb na Dios t walki ani ban chabl, kin koy an kijidhtalb an iniktsik xu kanidhbtsik kal na Dios!
Tam ti an tokat abatwletsik kadhchtsik jun walki, an belkol konltsik tujey ti tsx jn ani jn ench: —Pos wana p asta Beln abal ki chuu jech xowa tmnk, xi tu ltsch an Okxlb.
Kaletsik jikat ani in ela na Mara ani na Jos ani an chakam xi ta ti kwachat xon tu mujtsinal tin kapwl an konltsik.
Tam tin chuutsik, in tilatsik xanty usnktsik kal an tokat abatwle kal tin kwenta jech an chakam.
Ejtal xi kl ti achan xowa in ulutsik, labantsik kal xowa in acha.
Por na Mara in chalpm tokot tin itsch ejtal jech.
Ms tayl, an belkol konltsik kalchtsik tm, por in pubdhantsal ani in kaknantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta xowa in achatsik ani in chuutsik, abal anchan ti tmnk jelt xan ti usnktsik.

Tam ti kidhey waxik a kts ti wachink an chakam, tajtsin ti exl bin tul jelt xan ti usnk na Abraham ani bijyat ta Jess. Jachan an bijlb, jaich xi usnk na Mara kal an tokat abatwle tam ti jaj yabl kodh.
Tam ti kidhey an kij xowki jajtsik yejat kin toko tinb jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in jnatsik an chakam ban bitsow Jerusaln abal kin utu ban Okxlb.
In tajatsik anchan kom bin takixtal an Okxlb kwajat dhutsadh ench: “Ejtal an tsitsik kwitl xi jidhtal ka wachin ti chakam, yejat ka pidhn abal an Okxlb.”
Kalnektsik jeye abal kin pikba chb i bk o chb i tsitsik kuku jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal an Okxlb.
Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat Jerusaln jun i inik xu bijyb Simen. Jaj jaich jun i lujat inik xin kaknl na Dios ani in aytsm jeye ka lowat an israelitatsik. Jaj teykmte tajat kal an Tokat Ejattalb
ani usnk kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal yab neech ka chemech max yab kin chuu okox an Kristo xi neech ka aban kal an Okxlb.

Jech na Simen kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ijtsidh kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Tam ti na Jess jn kal nin ttatsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios abal ka tajtsin xan tin ulal an takixtalb ke yejat ka tajtsin,
na Simen in mulukna an chakam ani in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios ench:
Okxlb, awilich ti kin walka kin chemech tsububudh u itsch abal a tajaich jelt xan ta utsmal na tjontsixil.
Pos xo u chuch kal nan tajat u wal an Loox
xa kwajbmal tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik.
Jaj jaich jelti an tajaxtalb xi neech kin tajbay ejtalki an bitsowtsik xi yab u israelitatsik ani neech kin pidha ti labidh tokattalb an israelitatsik.
Nin tta ani nin nna na Jess labantsik kal xowa in achl in ulal na Simen kal tin kwenta an chakam.

Lbtajantsik kal na Simen ani utsan ench na Mara nin nna na Jess: —Ka acha, jech an chakam kwajb abal kin taja ke yn i israelitatsik ka kale ban kibeltalb o ka loeytsik. Jaj jaich jun i exl xi neech ka pojk kal yn xita.
Anchan neech ka chobn xowa in chalpayal jun xita tin itsch. Por abal tat, ejtal jech neech kin junu jelti max exom ta tidhbantsb ta ejattal kal jun i macht.

T jeye ti kwajat jun i mmlb plekich tajat xu tiltsix jeye, jaj in bij ta Ana ani u chakmlb kal na Fanuel, xu kidhtalb kal na Aser. Jech an mmlb, tsidhan tajat ti tomkink ani tokot bk i tamub kwajay kal nin tomkl.
Jaj jaich xo jun i chemtsidh mmlb xin koolich che inik kal ch i tamub ti kwetm. Echeki kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, akal i kij in tjontsal an Okxlb kal i klixnich ani kal i lb.

Na Ana ulich jeye tmki jachan, in tuju kin pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta jachan an chakam xu bijyb ta Jess. Jachan an atiklbtsik xu kwajl Jerusaln, jaich xin aytsm ka lowat abal yabich ms ka kyattsik taknl kal i keet bitsow.
Tam ti na Jos ani na Mara in tajaichtsik ejtal xowa in ulal nin takixtal an Okxlb, witsiytsik Nasaret, an bitsow xu taknal ban chabl xi Galilea.
Tsudhl u tajkanal an chakam u pubel, u likel ani ms u chalpadhml. Ani echeki in bachwal nin alwatal na Dios.
Tamub ti tamub nin ttatsik na Jess u kalel Jerusaln abal kin ajbna an paskwa, an ajib xin ajbnl an judotsik.
Tam ti na Jess in kidhbay lajuchb i tamub, kaletsik ejtal ti b Jerusaln, jelt xan tin ujnmalichtsik in tajl tam kin bajaw an ajib.
Tam ti okonich an ajib, kaletsik tm abal ka witsch tin kim, por na Jess jilkonk Jerusaln ani nin ttatsik yab in chob max Jaj jilkonk taja.
Jajtsik in chalpay ke na Jess ta jeye ti tl bin yanl an atiklbtsik ani anchan ti beleytsik putl a kts; por tam ti alyat na Jess bin kidhtaltsik ani bin exlowltsik, yab elan.
Kom yab elan, witsiytsik tm Jerusaln nin ttatsik abal kin aliy taja.

Xechintsik kin aliy ani tin xlb a kts in ela ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Taja ti buxl junax kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. In ochwiyal xanty in tilltsik ani in konyal ka wiltsin xowa Jaj in l kin exbay.
Ejtaltsik xin achl u labnal abal in chutal chalpadh tajat na Jess ani abal in tkoyal jeye alwa xowa u konyb kal jajtsik.
Tam ti chutat kal nin ttatsik, labantsik ani utsan ench kal nin nna: —Chakam, jantki tu tajtsmal anchan? Na tta ani nan neye u kwajinekich tajat tu lim ani tu chalpax abal i kibchonk.
Tkoyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin ayaltsik? Yabxe a chobtsik ke yejat kin kwajay tech abal ku taja xowa in jilm ka tajan nu Tta?
Por nin ttatsik yab in exbay xantki ti tkoyattsik anchan.
Junaxich tm ti witsiy ban bitsow Nasaret. Taja ti kwajay ani in tajl ejtal xowa u usnal kal jajtsik. Ani nin nna echeki in chalpm tin itsch ejtal xowa tmun.
Na Jess neech u pubel ani ms u chalpadhml, in tajl ejtal xowa alwa tin tamt na Dios ani tin tamt an atiklbtsik.

Tam ti lajubich i tamub ti takix an lej pulek takix Tiberio, na Ponsio Pilato u pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Judea. Na Erodes u pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Galilea, nin kidhb xin bij ta Felipe, u takix ban chabl xi Iturea ani xi Trakonite. Na Lisanias, u pulek awiltalb ban chabl xi Abilinia.
Na Ans ani na Kayfs, jaich nu oklek pletsik. Tam ti jachan i kij, na Dios in tawna na Juan ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. Jech na Juan, jaich xu chakmlb kal na Sakaras,
watey putlki an kwentsaltsik xi kunat ban walja Jordn, in utsl an atiklbtsik ke yejatich kin jilatsik ti walablom ani ka pujanichtsik abal ka pakwlantsat an tin walastalbiltsik.

Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsix Isaas ench: Achat in kwintal jun xita ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh ani xu kw, in ulal kawidh ench: “Ka tojojontschtsik tin blil an Ajtiklb; ka jnaichtsik jun i xechintalb alwa abal anchan, ki kwajchtsik tojojodh tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb.
An chabl xi jokitsik neech ka tsutsiyat, ejtal an pakdha chn ani an tsitsik chn neech ka lujkuwat, an bl xi kuchutsik neech ka lujkuwat ani an bl xi jkmx neech ka lejkiyat.
Kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl ti neech ka chutat an loeltalb xin pidhnl na Dios.”
Tam ti an atiklbtsik u ulel abal ka pujyat kal na Juan, u usnaltsik ench kal na Juan: —Tattsik a junwal jelti chan! Abal a ltsik ka jeka kal i pujaxtalb nin chkub na Dios xi exomich ti kunel.

Ki kwajchtsik alwa abal ka xalkan ke tsubax lejtal ta jilaichtsik ta walablom ani yab ka chalpaytsik ta ejattal ke neech ki loeytsik abalki i kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham; pos tu utsltsik ke na Dios neech kin ejto kin kldha in chakmiltsik a Abraham asta ba jech an tujubtsik.
Anchan jelt xan ti jun i inik in kwajll ani in tsikl jun i te xi yab xata ti alwa, anchan jeye ti neech kin taja na Dios kunat i kij kal an iniktsik xi yab alwa.
Konyat tm ench kal an atiklbtsik: —Janty yejat ki taja?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Juan: —Xita in kool chb in xekt, yejat kin pidha jn xi yab in kool ani xita in kool i kapnl, yejat jeye kin pidha xi yab in kool.
Ulich jeye chb x i bachkul jalbixtalb xin l ka pujyattsik ani konyat ench na Juan kal jajtsik: —Oktsix, janty yejat ki taja?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Juan: —Yab ka konoy watats an jalbixtalb, tokotki xowa in ulal an awiltalbtsik.

Konyat jeye kal chb x i soldadotsik ench: —Ani waw, janty yejat ki taja? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Juan: —Yab ka kntsitsik xata ni jun xita, nibal ka ani lna ni jun xita xi yab in walm ani ki kulbtsik kal xowa a tl.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik kwajat in aytsm an Kristo xi bijidh neech ka tsch ani in chalpayaltsik max na Juan jachich an Kristo;

por utsantsik ejtal ench kal na Juan: —Nan tu pujyaltsik kal i ja, por ta tl jun xita xi ms in kool i awiltalb k nan; nan nibal ela xata u y abal ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab. Jaj neech ti ki pujaytsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani kal i kamal.
In teykm an pala abal kin jutsuy an trigo ani abal kin wixkintsch an ti aml. Neech kin junku an trigo bin wiltil, por an aml neech kin tsika ban kamal xi yab jayki u tepel.
Ench ani yn ms xan ti, na Juan in takyal ani in tiltsal an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik.
In kwiya jeye an pulek awiltalb Erodes abal in tajmal tin tomtal na Erodas, nin tomtal nin kidhb Felipe ani kal tin kwenta jeye xowa yab alwa in tajmal.
Por na Erodes yab in taja ti kij xowa utsan kal an Juan, ms tokot in ntsi kin taja xowa yab alwa: in baliy na Juan ban wikaxte.
Jun i kij, tam ti na Juan bl kwajat ti pjal an ti atiklbtsik, pujyat jeye na Jess. Lejat na Jess kwajat ti l, jakpin an walki,
paay an Tokat Ejattalb ani buxkan tin b Jaj. Tejwa tajat ti paay jelti jun i kuku ani achatm jun i kwintalb t walki, xu kw in ulu ench: —Tat tu Chakmil ani tu kanidhl tajat. In kulbl tajat kal Tat.
In kool xna jun inik lju i tamub tam ti na Jess in tuju nin tojlbil. An atiklbtsik in chalpayal ke na Jess u chakmlb kal na Jos. Na Jos u chakmlb kal na El,
na El u chakmlb kal na Matat, na Matat u chakmlb kal na Leb, na Leb u chakmlb kal na Melki, na Melki u chakmlb kal na Jana, na Jana u chakmlb kal na Jos,
na Jos u chakmlb kal na Matatas, na Matatas u chakmlb kal na Ams, na Ams u chakmlb kal na Nam, na Nam u chakmlb kal na Esli, na Esli, u chakmlb kal na Nagai,
na Nagai u chakmlb kal na Mt, na Mt u chakmlb kal na Matatas, na Matatas u chakmlb kal na Semei, na Semei u chakmlb kal na Jos, na Jos u chakmlb kal na Jud,
na Jud u chakmlb kal na Joana, na Joana u chakmlb kal na Resa, na Resa u chakmlb kal na Sorobabel, na Sorobabel u chakmlb kal na Salatiel, na Salatiel u chakmlb kal na Neri,
na Neri u chakmlb kal na Melki, na Melki u chakmlb kal na Adi, na Adi u chakmlb kal na Kosam, na Kosam u chakmlb kal na Elmodam, na Elmodam u chakmlb kal na Er,
na Er u chakmlb kal na Josu, na Josu u chakmlb kal na Elieser, na Elieser u chakmlb kal na Jorim, na Jorim u chakmlb kal na Matat,
na Matat u chakmlb kal na Leb, na Leb u chakmlb kal na Simen, na Simen u chakmlb kal na Jud, na Jud u chakmlb kal na Jos, na Jos u chakmlb kal na Jonn, na Jonn u chakmlb kal na Eliakim,
na Eliakim u chakmlb kal na Melea, na Melea u chakmlb kal na Mainn, na Mainn u chakmlb kal na Matata, na Matata u chakmlb kal na Natn,
na Natn u chakmlb kal na Dabid, na Dabid u chakmlb kal na Isa, na Isa u chakmlb kal na Obed, na Obed u chakmlb kal na Bs, na Bs u chakmlb kal na Salmn, na Salmn u chakmlb kal na Nsn,
na Nsn u chakmlb kal na Aminadab, na Aminadab u chakmlb kal na Aram, na Aram u chakmlb kal na Esrom, na Esrom u chakmlb kal na Fares, na Fares u chakmlb kal na Jud,
na Jud u chakmlb kal na Jakob, na Jakob u chakmlb kal na Isk, na Isk u chakmlb kal na Abraham, na Abraham u chakmlb kal na Tar, na Tar u chakmlb kal na Nakor,
na Nakor u chakmlb kal na Serug, na Serug u chakmlb kal na Ragaw, na Ragaw u chakmlb kal na Peleg, na Peleg u chakmlb kal na Eber, na Eber u chakmlb kal na Sala,
na Sala u chakmlb kal na Kainn, na Kainn u chakmlb kal na Arfaksad, na Arfaksad u chakmlb kal na Sem, na Sem u chakmlb kal na No, na No u chakmlb kal na Lamek,
na Lamek u chakmlb kal na Matusaln, na Matusaln u chakmlb kal na Enok, na Enok u chakmlb kal na Jared, na Jared u chakmlb kal na Mlall, na Mlall u chakmlb kal na Kainn,
na Kainn u chakmlb kal na Ens, na Ens u chakmlb kal na Set, na Set u chakmlb kal na Adn ani na Adn tajadh kal na Dios.
Na Jess, teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, kale ban walja Jordn ani jn kal an Tokat Ejattalb ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Kwajay taja chab inik a kts ani taktamiyat kal an lej atax. Yab kapch tin nakl jachan an kij ani tayl kaay.
Utsan tm ench kal an lej atax: —Max tsubax lejtal i Chakmlb kal a Dios, ka utsa jech an tujub ka wenkon ti kapnl.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Yab tokotki kal i kapnl ti ejat an inik, ejat jeye kal ejtal xowa na Dios in ulal.”
Jn tm kal an lej atax ba jun i tekat chn ani xalkantsat junwki ejtal an ti chabltsik xi kwajat taknl kal an pakdha takix.
Ani utsan ench kal an lej atax: —Neech tu pidha ti awiltalb ka takiy ejtal jech an chabltsik ani abal ka dhabalna jeye nin publ. Pos ejtal jech, nan in pidhnk ani neech ku ejto ku pidha xita ku lena.
Max ki tudhlan abal ti kin kakna, ejtal jech Tat neech ka dhabalna.
Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Lej atax, ki wkon tech tu tamt, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil ani Jajki ka tjontsal.”
Tayl, jna na Jess kal an lej atax ban bitsow xi Jerusaln, kadhb bin b an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani utsan ench: —Max tsubax lejtal i Chakmlb kal a Dios, ka petna tab abal chaat,
pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Na Dios neech kin aba nin tokat abatwlejiltsik abal ti ki beletna.
Neech ti ki bachu abal yab ka chaaw na akan kal ni jun i tujub.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —In ulal jeye ench an Tokat Dhuslab: “Yab ka taktamiy an Okxlb na Diosil.”
Tam ti an lej atax yabich ms in ela xan ti kin taktamiy na Jess, in jilaich tm w i kij.
Na Jess witsiy Galilea teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani u tilnal Jaj putlki ban chabl xi taja kunat.
U kwajl ti oktsix ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kal ejtalki tu kaknb.

Kale tm Nasaret na Jess, an bitsow xon ti Jaj pubenek. Tam tin bajaw nin ktsjil an koyxnich, ochich ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb jelt xan tin ujnmalich in tajl echeki ani kubey abal kin ajay an Tokat Dhuslab.
Pidhan tm kin ajay an dhutsadh w xin jilm an tiltsix Isaas, tam tin wila, in ela xon ti kwajat dhutsadh ench:

Nin Tokat Ejattal an Okxlb kwajat kal Nan, pos tin takwymal abal ku ltsi an ti alwa tilab an chojontltsik, tin abmal abal ku kijidhmdha xu tepinaltsik, abal ku tiltsi xi kwajat ti wiknltsik, ke walkanichtsik, abal ku chuxindha xu jokoltsik, abal ku loo xu atax tajtsinaltsik
ani abal ku tila ke in bajch xowki an Okxlb neech ti ku xalkantsi an tin alwatal.
Tam ti okon kin ajay, in tuliy an w, in witsbantsi xu tolmix ba jachan an at ani buxkan, por in ntsal ti telnal kal ejtal xi taja ti kwajattsik.
In tuju tm ti kw ani in ulu ench: —Xo exomich ti tjnal ta tamttsik jelt xan tin ulal jech an Tokat Dhuslab.
Kal ejtaltsik tu tilnal alwa na Jess ani u labnaltsik kal an labidh tilabtsik xi Jaj in ulal. U knxtsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech nin chakmil na Jos?

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Nan u chob alwa ke neech ti kin utsatsik jech an tilab: “Illix, ka illiy tab.” Neech jeye ti kin utsatsik: “Xowa i achmal a tajm t Kapernam, ka taja jeye tech ba chablil.”
In ntsi tm ti kw ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik ke ni jun i tiltsix u bachwb alwa bin chablil.
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yn i chemtsidh mmlb ta ti kwajat ban chabl xi Israel tam ti xechin an tiltsix Elas. Tam ti yab ulich i b x i tamub kal chejel ani wachin i pulek kanab tin publ jachan an chabl;
por na Elas yab aban kal na Dios ba ni jun i chemtsidh mmlbtsik xu kwajl Israel, tokot aban ba jun i chemtsidh mmlb xu kwajl Sarepta, kunat ban bitsow xi Sidn.
Anl jeye, yn ta ti kwajat Israel xu yaultsik kal an kwajat atax tt tam ti xechin an tiltsix Eliseo, por yab jeldh ni jun xita xi jajtsik, tokot jeldh na Nmn xu kwajl ban chabl xi Siria.
Tam tin achatsik ejtal jech, ejtaltsik xi ta ti kwajat ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb chakuytsik tajat.
Chakaytsik ani in kldha na Jess ba jachan an bitsow ani jn tm bin b an chn xon ti kwajat jachan an bitsow abal ka nixk taja.
Por na Jess watey junax chejel xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani kale.
Kale tm na Jess Kapernam, jun i bitsow xu taknal Galilea ani taja ti kwajay in oktsal an atiklbtsik tam in bajwal in ktsjil an koyxnich.
Ejtal u labnaltsik tajat xan tu oktsinaltsik, abal in chutaltsik ke na Jess u kw kal yantam i awiltalb.
Ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xi ochadh kal jun i atax ejattalb ani dhjaxin kawidh ench:
—Ti ku jila! Janty a l kal waw, Jess xi Nasaret? I tsinek abal ti ku kibdha? Nan tu exll ani u chob ke Tat i Tokat Chakmlb kal a Dios.
Kwiyan tm ench an atax ejattalb kal na Jess: —Ki chamkan ani ki kale ba jech an inik! Kwajl tm chabl an inik kal an atax ejattalb tin tamt ejtal jajtsik, kale ani yab xata ti tajtsin jachan an inik.
Ejtal jikey ani u tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jantom kwintalb awil jech? Jech an inik in utsl an atax ejattalbtsik kal yantam i awiltalb ani i chplb abal ka kale ani u kalel!
Putlki jachan an chabl ti chobn xowa in tajl na Jess.
Kale tm na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kale bin kim na Simn. Nin mm na Simn ta ti kwajat u yaul kal i kaklch ani pakabdh na Jess abal kin jeldha.
Kutpan tm na Jess xon ti kwajat an yaul, in utsa an kaklch abal ka wkon ani tmki ti wkon. Chakay tm an mmlb ani tujey ti tjontsb kal an mmlb na Jess ani nin juniktsik.
Tam ti ochichich na kts, ejtal xin kool i yaultsik xu yaul kal xowakich i yawlch, in tsidha ba na Jess. Jaj juntsik ti juntsik tin puntsi tin kubak an yaultsik ani anchan tin jeldhatsik.

Anl jeye, yn i yaultsik in kldhantsi ti atax ejattalbtsik; tam u kalel, u dhajnaltsik chapik ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tat i Chakmlb kal a Dios. Por na Jess in kwiya an atax ejattalbtsik ani yab ms in walka ti tilomtsik, abal chobte kal an atax ejattalbtsik ke Jajich nu Kristo.
Tam ti tsudhey, na Jess kale ban bitsow ani kale ba jun i chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. Por alyat kal an atiklbtsik ani ulichtsik asta xon ti Jaj kwajat. U lenb ka kubdh abal yab ka kale,
por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Kool jeye kin kale ku tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba keet an bitsowtsik abal ka takyatichtsik kal na Dios, pos jaich tin abnk.
Anchan ti xechin na Jess ti tiltsix Galilea, putlki ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
Jun i kij, tam ti na Jess kwajat bin wl an pujal xi Jenesaret, ulich yn i atiklbtsik, ke asta u kichnalich tajat na Jess, abal in ltsik kin acha nin kwintal na Dios.
Na Jess in chuu chb i tan xi ta ti kwajat mapats tin wl an pujal xon ti yab owtsik. Taja ti kwajat kom an jixom tooltsik painek ti tokom an tin jixb an tool.
Na Jess balin tm ba jn an tan xin dhabal na Simn ani pakabdh na Simn abal kin wmdha w an tan bin wl an ja. Buxkan tm na Jess ban tan ani tujey kin oktsi taja an atiklbtsik.
Tam ti okon ti kw, in utsa ench na Simn: —Ka jna an tan xon ti owtsik an pujal ani ka petna taja nin jixb an tool abal ka jixa an tool.
Tkon na Simn: —Oktsix, u tjnkich putl i akal ani yab xata i jixmal, por kom Tat a ulal, neech ku petna jun an jixaxtalb.
Tam tin tajatsik xowa utsan, yn i tool ykwan, ke asta u michkanalich an jixaxtalb kal in lm an tooltsik.

In kaniy tm kal in kubakki nin at jixom tool xi ta ti kwajattsik jun pake tan abal ka tsch ti tolmiyb. Utey tm xi jn an tan ani in tsutsiytsik chablam ke asta wetsikich ka luychin ban pujal kal in lm.
Tam ti na Simn Pedro in chuu jech, tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Ajtik, ki wixkin tech kal nan, pos nan in walablom!
Anchan tin ulu na Simn, kom jaj ani xi ms nin at jixom tool jikenektsik tajat abal yn i tool in jixatsik.

Anl jeye, na Jakobo ani na Juan, xu chakmlbtsik kal na Sebedeo, xi jaych nin juniktsik na Simn, jikenektsik jeye. Por na Jess in utsa ench na Simn: —Yab ki jikey, pos asta xo neech ka tujch ka aliy an atiklbtsik xi neech ti kin bela.
Tam tin jnaichtsik an tan bin wl an pujal, in jilatsik ejtal ani kaletsik kal na Jess.

Tam ti na Jess kwajat ba jun i bitsow, ulich jun i inik xu yaul kal an kwajat atax tt. Tam ti chutat na Jess, an inik, tudhlan kutl asta chabl ani pakabdh ench na Jess: —Ajtik, max a l, neech ka ejto ti kin jeldha kal jech an yawlch xu kool.
Takan tm kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —U l ani xo i jelch. Tmki ti wkon an kwajat atax tt ba jachan an inik.

Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab xita ka ltsi xanty tu tajtsi, tokot ki kale ban ple ani ka pidhna an pikbantsixtalb kal tin kwenta na tokeltal jelt xan tin jilm ka tajan na Moiss. Ka taja anchan abal ejtal kin chobna ke i jelch kal an yawlch xa koolwiik.
Por blki u chobnb putlki xanty in tajl na Jess. Yandha i atiklbtsik u junkunal abal ka axtsin xowa in ulal ani abal ka jeldhtsik kal an yawlch xin kool.
Por na Jess u kalel xon ti yab xita u kwajl ani taja u kwajl ti l.

Jun i kij, na Jess kwajat ti oktsix ani ta ti buxutsik taja chb x i fariseotsik ani i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jechtsik, tl tki tki ban kwentsaltsik xi Galilea, xi Judea ani xi tltsik jeye ban bitsow Jerusaln. Ani nin chp an Okxlb u xalkanal ba na Jess abal kin jeldha an yaultsik.
Ulich tm chb x i iniktsik xin tsidhl kal i chayte jun i inik. Jech an inik yab in ejtowal ka yoyon ani in exatsik kin dha ban at xon ti kwajat na Jess.

Por yab in elatsik xon ti kin dha, kom yn ta ti kwajat an atiklbtsik; kadhiytsik tm bin b an at, in wkontsi w tin jujl ani taja tin paba an yaul kal nin chaytil junax chejel an atiklbtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal u belnal kal jajtsik, in utsa ench an yaul: —Jab, na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat.

An fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in tujutsik tm kin chalpay ench: —Jitam j p jeye jech an inik xin tajl tinb jelti max u Dios? Tokot a Dios in ejtowal kin pakwlantsi an walastalbtsik.
Por na Jess in chobna xanty kwajat in chalpayaltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta chalpayaltsik anchan?
Jowa ms yab tojlb ku ulu: “Na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat”, o ku ulu: “Ki chakay ani ki beley”?

Pos neech tu xalkantsitsik ke Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb tech ti chabl abal ku pakwlantsi i walastalbtsik. In utsa tm ench an yaul xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon: —Tat tu utsl, ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki kalch ta kim.
Tmki jachan, an inik xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon, chakay tin tamt ejtal xi taja ti kwajattsik. In dhaya nin chaytil xon ti kwachatwiik ani kalch tm tin kim in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios.
Ejtal labantsik, in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios ani kal an jkib in ulutsik ench: —Xo i chuu yn xata xi labidh tajat.

Tayl, tam ti na Jess kalch, in chuu jun i inik xin bij ta Leb xin bachwal an jalbixtalb abal an chabl xi Roma. Jech an inik buxl xon tu ulel ti pidhnb an jalbixtalb ani utsan ench kal na Jess: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan.
Chakay tm na Leb, in jila ejtal ani in wwna na Jess.
Ms tayl, na Leb in tajtsi na Jess jun i pulek kapxnich tin kim; ta jeye ti buxutsik junax kal jajtsik ban mesa yn i bachkul jalbixtalb ani keet jeye i atiklbtsik.

Por an fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in tujutsik kin kawiy nin exbaliltsik na Jess. Ench tin ulutsik: —Jantki ta kapultsik ani i uchaltsik kal i bachkul jalbixtalb ani kal i walablomtsik?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Xi kwajattsik alwa ani yab u yaul yab in yntsal i illix, por xu yaultsik, in yntsal.
Nan yab in tsinek ku aliy xi xeechtsik lujat, in tsinek ku aliy xi walbidhtsik abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal jajtsik: —Nin exbaliltsik na Juan ani nin exbaliltsik an fariseotsik u kltsik ani u ltsik tajat, por na exbaliltsik echeki u kapultsik ani u uchaltsik.
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Awxe neech kin ejtotsik ka klin xi kanidhtsik ba jun i tomkixtalb tam bl kwajat an tomkinl inik kal jajtsik? Yaba!
Por neech kin bajaw an kij tam neech ka wkontsat an ti tomkinl inik ani nechich jeye tm ka klintsik.

Tiltsintsik jeye jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Yab xita in kotyal jun peje i t xeketlb abal kin patskuy kl i kej xeketlb. Max kin taja anchan, in odhnl an t xeketlb, tm jun, an t xeketlb yab neech kin tomna an kej xeketlb.
Nibal u balyb an t yajtsik uxnl ban kej t balixtalb; pos max ka tajan anchan, an t yajtsik uxnl in michl an kej t balixtalb, neech tm ka waklan an yajtsik uxnl ani an t balixtalb u kibchonal.
Jaxtm ti yejat ka balyat an t yajtsik uxnl ban t t balixtalb abal chablam yab ka kibchon.
Ni jun xita xi kin ucha okox an kej yajtsik uxnl, in kulbetnl jeye an t yajtsik uxnl, pos in ulal ench: “An kej yajtsik uxnl, ms ja alwa.”
Jun i kij tin ktsjil an koyxnich, lejat na Jess neech ti belal ban alelb xon ti waach i tayablbtsik, nin exbaliltsik in belal puwal i trigo, in ixyal kal in kubak ani in kapaltsik.
Konyat tm ench kal taltsik an fariseotsik: —Jantki ta tajltsik i tojlb xi yab alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik xowa in taja na Dabid tam ti jaj ani nin juniktsik kaay?

Ochich ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in iki an pan xi pikbantsidh na Dios, in kapu ani in pidha jeye nin juniktsik xi ta ti kwajat junax kal jaj, maske jachan an pan, tokot bijtsidh neech kin kapu an pletsik.
In ulu jeye ench: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u kool i awiltalb abal ku ulu xowa alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.
Jun i kij, jaychki tin ktsjil an koyxnich, ochich na Jess ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani in tuju ti oktsix. Taja, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i inik xi mulkank in ejt kubak.

An oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani an fariseotsik, ta ti kwajat in kwchiyaltsik na Jess abal in l kin chuu max kin jeldha jachan an inik tin ktsjil an koyxnich. Pos max kin taja anchan, neech tm kin koytsik jun xata xantokl ti kin lna na Jess.
Por na Jess, kom in chob alwa xanty kwajat ti chalpantsb, in utsa ench an inik xi mulkank nin kubak: —Ki chakay ani ki kubey junax chejel. Chakay tm an inik ani kubey tametlb.
Utsan tm ench xi keettsik kal na Jess: —Neech tu konoytsik jun xata: Janty alwa ka tajan tam in ktsjil an koyxnich? Xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa? Ka jeldh an yaultsik o ka walb ka chemech?
In teloloy tm na Jess ejtal an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat wilill ani in utsa ench an inik: —Ka lujku na kubak. Anchan tin taja an inik ani jelnek ti jilkon nin kubak.
Por chakuy tajat xi keettsik ani tujey ti knx jajkitsik xanty alwa kin tajtsi na Jess.
Tam ti jachan i kij, na Jess kale ba jun i chn abal ti l taja ani taja tin watna putl i akal ti lantsix an ta Dios.
Tam ti tsudhey, in kaniy nin exbaliltsik ani in takuy lajuchb xi jajtsik, xin bijiy ti abatwletsik.
Jajtsik jaich na Simn, xi bijyat jeye ta Pedro; na Andrs, nin kidhb na Simn; na Santiago, na Juan, na Felipe, na Bartolom,
na Mateo, na Toms, na Santiago xu chakmlb kal na Alfeo; na Simn xu taknal ban junkuntalb xu bijyb kananista;
na Judas, xu chakmlb kal na Santiago ani na Judas Iskariote, xi ms tayl in pidhna na Jess abal ka chemdh.

Paay tm na Jess ban chn junax kal jajtsik ani kubey ba jun i chalam kal nin exbaliltsik. Junkunk taja yn i atiklbtsik xi tl ban chabl Judea, ban bitsow Jerusaln ani xu kwajltsik jeye Tiro ani Sidn tin waltsik an pujal. Ulnektsik taja abal kin acha xowa in ulal na Jess ani abal ka jeldh jeye kal xowakich an yawlchtsik xin kool.
Xin achltsik i yajtsiktalb abal ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik, u jelltsik jeye.
Jaxtm, kal ejtaltsik tu lenb ka takan na Jess abal u jeldhbtsik kal an chplb xu kalel ba Jaj.
In teloloy tm na Jess nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Kijidh tajat abal tattsik xi chojontl, kom a walkltsik ki takyat kal na Dios.
Kijidh tajat abal tattsik xi xo i kal, pos neech ki ajwdhtsik. &Kijidh tajat abal xi xo i uknaltsik, pos tayl neech ki teen.
Kijidh tajat abal tattsik tam ki atan kal an atiklbtsik, tam ki ajan, tam ki odhbijyat ani tam ki pojk jelti jun xata atax, kal tu kwenta Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Ki kulbtsik tajat ani ki kijidhm jachan i kij, pos neech ka bachutsik jun i pulek chejwalixtalb t walki; pos anchan jeye ti atax tajtsink an tiltsixtsik kal nin weje paklil jachan an atiklbtsik.
Por chojontl a chubl tumnladh iniktsik abal a kymalichtsik xowa ti kijidhmdhmal.
Chojontl a chubl xi xo kidhat a kooltsik, pos tayl neech ta kal. Chojontl a chubl xi xo i tenaltsik, pos tayl neech ki ukintsik kal i tepintalb.
Chojontl a chubl tam ejtal an atiklbtsik ti till alwa, pos anchan jeye tin tajmal nin weje pakliltsik kal an kambix tiltsixtsik.
Por tattsik xi xo i kwajat tin axtsal, tu utsltsik ench: &Ka kanidha xi ti atltsik, ka tajtsi ti alwatalb xi ti atltsik,
ka lbtaja xi ti odhbijyaltsik ani ki kontsintsi xi ti atax tajtsaltsik.
Max jun xita ti ki pikiy ba jun a chab, ka pidha jeye ti piktsi xi jun pake. Max jun xita ti ki kntsi ta wt, ka walka jeye kin jna na xekt.
Ka pidha xitakich xowa ti ki kontsi ani xita ti ki kntsi xowa tat a dhabal, yab ka kontsi ti ki witsbantsi.
Ka tajtsi xi keettsik jelt xan ta l ki tajtsin kal jajtsik.
Max tokot a kanidhltsik xita ti kanidhl, janty exom a tajltsik watats? Pos asta an walablomtsik in tajl anchan.
Max tokot a tajtsaltsik ti alwatalb xita ti tajtsaltsik ti alwatalb, janty exom a tajltsik watats? Pos anchan jeye in tajl an walablomtsik.
Ani max tokot a matintsaltsik xa chalpayal ke neech ti ki pidha xata, janty neech ka tatsik? Pos an walablomtsik u mtntsxtsik jeye ani in aytsmtsik ka witsbantsat.

Por tattsik yejat ka kakna xi ti atltsik, ka taja i alwatalbtsik, ka matintsixna xowakich, por yab ka aytsm ki witsbantsat. Anchan, plek tm an chejwalixtalb neech ka bachu ani neech ki kwajaytsik ta chakmlbtsik kal na Dios xi plek tajat; pos Jaj i alwa inik tajat kal xi yabtsik in pidhnl i jalbintsixtalb ani kal xi yab alwa iniktsik.
Ki yajnantsixintsik, jelti xan ti ni Tta u yajnantsix.

Yab ka teltsi xanty in tajl xi keettsik ani na Dios yab jeye neech ti ki teltsi xanty a tajltsik. Yab ka walbiy ni jun xita ani yab teye neech ki walbiyattsik kal na Dios. Ki pakwlantsixin ani na Dios neech jeye ti ki pakwlantsitsik.

Ka pidhatsik xowa in yntsal xi keettsik ani na Dios neech jeye ti ki pidha xowa tattsik a yntsal. Neech ki pidhan ba na morrlil lejbadh alwa, kichadh alwa ani dhiyadh asta ke u waklanalich kal in tsutst. Na Dios jaychki neech kin yna an lejab xi tattsik ka yna kal keettsik.
Utsantsik tm kal na Jess jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Awxe jun i jokol neech kin ejto kin lotokna in at jokol? Yabxe neech ka kwajlan chablam ti b ban jl?
Ni jun i exbal in chob ms k nin oktsxal, por tam kin okch an ti exbal, neech jeye tm kin bajaw jelti nin oktsxal.
Jantki ta teltsal an ti elits xin kool na at kidhb bin wal ani yab a chutal an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal?

Ani max yab a ejtowal ka chuu an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal, jantki ta utsl ench na at kidhb: “Kidhb, ti kin walka tu jixtsi an ti elits xa kool ba na wal”? Kambix inik! Ka wkoy okox an yejche elits xa kool ba na wal ani anchan neech tm ka ejto ka chuu alwa abal ka jixtsi an ti elits xin kool na at kidhb bin wal.
Yab waach i alwa te xi neech kin koy in wall yab alwa, nibal waach i te xi yab alwa xi neech kin koy in wall alwa.
Pos an tetsik kal nin wallki tu exlb. Yab u pitnal i igo ban kdhtsik, nibal u pitnal i uba ban kidhadh te.
An inik xi alwa, in ulal xowa alwa, kom alwa xowa kwajat bin itsch. An atax inik, in ulal xowa yab alwa, kom yab alwa xowa kwajat bin itsch. Pos xowa kwajat bin itsch, jaich in ulal.
Jantki tin bijyaltsik, “Ajtik, Ajtik” ani yab a tajltsik xowa tu utsl?
Neech tu utsatsik xita in junwal xu uteltsik kal Nan, xi tin axtsal ani in tajl xowa Nan u ulal:

In junwal jelti jun i inik xin kuba jun in kim ench: okox in chaja alkidh tajat an chabl ani in kwajbantsi tin akan ba tujub. Tam ti owtsikm an walja, jlch chapik an ja xon ti kwajat an at ani yab ejtowat ka yoywat abal nin akan kubat ba tujub.

Por xin achl nu kwintal ani yab in tajl xowa u ulal, in junwal jelti jun i inik xin kuba nin kim eb chabl ani yab aknidh alwa; tam ti owtsikm an walja jlch chapik an ja xon ti kwajat an at, julp an at ani pakudh ejtal ti jilan.
Tam ti na Jess in okch kin tawna an atiklbtsik, kale Kapernam.
Taja ta ti kwajat jun i romano xu oklek soldadotsik xin kool jun in tojnlil xin kanidhl tajat. Jech nin tojnlil u yaul ti kwajat ani nechich tajat ka chemech.
Tam ti jachan an oklek soldadotsik in acha u tilnal na Jess, in aba chb x in oklkil an judotsik abal kin pakabdha na Jess ka kale ti jeldhantsb an tin tojnlil.
Kaletsik ba na Jess ani in pakabdha tajat ench: —Jech an oklek soldadotsik in tomnl tajat ka tolmiy;
pos jaj tu kanidhl tajat ani in abnmal ku kubtsin an ti at xon ti tajl an junkuntalb.
Kale tm na Jess kal jajtsik. Por tam tu kunelichtsik ban at, an oklek soldadotsik in aba chb x in jabtsik abal ka utsan ench na Jess: —Ajtik, yabich ki tojlin, pos yab in tomnl ki ochich bu kim;
jaxtm ti nibal ela nan in kale tu aliy. Kal tokot ka ulu ka jeley nu tojnlil, neech ka jeley.

Pos nan in taknlki neye tin kwajat kal nu oklkiltsik, por u kool neye i soldadotsik xi nan u takyal. Tam ku utsa jun i soldado ka kale, u kalel; tam ku utsa jeye xi keet ka tsch, u tsiil ani tam ku utsa nu tojnlil kin taja jun xata, in tajl.

Tam ti na Jess in acha jech, laban tajat kal xowa in acha in ulmal jachan an inik, in teloloy tm an atiklbtsik xi kl ti wewkmte ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke nibal ban israelitatsik yab u elmal jun xita xin kool in belomtal jelt xan tin kool jech an inik xi yab u israelita.
Tam ti witsiytsik ban at xi abnktsik ti kanix an ta Jess, jelnekich tin ela jachan an tjontsix.
Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess neech ba jun i bitsow xu bijyb Nan, junkmte kal nin exbaliltsik ani kal yn i atiklbtsik jeye.
Tam tu kunelich ba jachan an bitsow, in chuu jun i chemlom xu nedhbich ti jolyb. Jachan an chemlom jaich in junkax chakmil jun i chemtsidh mmlb. Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti neech junkmte.
Tam ti chutat kal an Ajtiklb jachan an chemtsidh mmlb, kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb ani in utsa ench: —Yab ki ukin.
Utey tm na Jess, in taka an kimlb ani kubeytsik xi neech in kitm jachan an kimlb. Na Jess in utsa tm ench an chemlom: —Kwitl, Nan tu utsl: Ki chakay!
Buxkan tm xi chemnekwiik ti kwajat ani tujey ti kw; na Jess in pidhnaich tm ba nin nna.
Ejtaltsik xin chuu jech, jikey ani tujeytsik kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios. In ulaltsik ench: —Jun i pulek tiltsix xalkank ba waw. In ulaltsik jeye ench: —Na Dios tsinek abal kin tolmiy nin bitswil.
Putl Judea ani an kwentsaltsik xi kwajat malill, in chobnatsik xanty in tajmal na Jess.
Na Juan in acha jeye ejtal jech, kom u tiltsinal kal nin exbaliltsik. In kaniy tm chb nin exbaliltsik
ani in aba abal ka kale ti konyb na Jess max Jajich lejtal xi bijidh neech ka tsch o kool ki aytsi keet.
Tam ti uteytsik ba na Jess xi abnk kal na Juan, in utsatsik ench: —Na Juan xu pujax tu abmal abal tu konoy max tatich kwa xi bijidh neech ka tsch o yejat ki aytsi keet.

Jachan i ora tam ti ulich nin exbaliltsik na Juan, na Jess in jeldha yn i yaultsik kal xowakich an yawlchtsik ani an chukuxtalbtsik xin kool, xi ochadhtsik kal i atax ejattalb in kldhantsi ani xu jokoltsik in chuxindha.

Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kalchtsik ani ka utsa na Juan xowa a chumaltsik ani xowa a achmal. Ka utsa abal an jokoltsik u chuxinal, an kwechetsik u belal, xin kooltsik an kwajat atax tt u jell, an tanchutsik u ochxinal, an chemlomtsik u ejdhb ti t ani an chojontltsik u tiltsinal an ti alwa tilab.
Kijidh tajat abal xita ti kin bela ani yab ka kux witsiy tayl.

Tam ti kalch xi abnktsik kal na Juan, na Jess tujey tm kin tiltsi an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Juan. In ulu ench: —Janty i kalnek ka chuutsik ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh? Jun i pakb xi kwajat ti wawyb kal i ik?
Max yaba, janty i kalnektsik ka chuu? Jun i inik xi xeketlidh kal i alwa kudhkum? A chobtsik alwa ke xu xeketlinaltsik kal i alwa kudhkum ani kidhat in kool u kwajltsik bin kim i pakdha takix.
Pos tm, janty i kalnektsik ka chuu? Jun i tiltsix? Ani kejle ani tu utsltsik ke na Juan, ms ja plek k jun i tiltsix.
Jech na Juan jaich xu tilnal kal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: J u okxiyal nu abatwlejil abal ti ki tojojontsi an ti bl.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ba ejtal an atiklbtsik yab jayki wachink jun i tiltsix ms plek k na Juan xu pujax; por xi ms chipl xon tu takix na Dios, ms ja plek k na Juan.
Tam tin achatsik jech, ejtal an atiklbtsik ani an bachkul jalbixtalb xi pujadhtsik kal na Juan, in exlatsik abal na Dios lujat tajat xowa in tajl;
por an fariseotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, xi yabtsik pujadh kal na Juan, in pojkatsik xowa na Dios in lenmal kin taja kal jajtsik.
In ulu tm ench an Ajtiklb: —Jantokl ti neech ku ejto ku junbay an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij? Janty in junwaltsik?
In junwal jelti tsitsik chakam xu buxkanal ti ubt xon tu tajnal an njlch ani in dhjayaltsik nin at chakamtsik ench: “I jutsuy i chl ani yab i bixmchtsik; i ajatna i tepidh ajatlb ani yab i ukintsik.”
Pos tsch na Juan xu pujax, xi yab in kapal i kapnl nibal in uchl i yajtsik uxnl ani a ulaltsik ke jaj ochadh kal i atax ejattalb.
Tayl in tsch Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, xin kapul ani in uchal por a ulaltsik ke in jiklom ani ke u jab i walablomtsik ani i bachkul jalbixtalb.
Por nin chalab na Dios u xalkanal abal lujat bin xechintal an atiklbtsik xi kl tu belnal.
Pakabdh na Jess kal jun i fariseo abal ka kale ti kapul bin kim jech an fariseo, kale bin kim jachan an fariseo ani buxkan ban mesa.

Tm, jun i mmlb xi xeech yab exbadh, xu kwajl jeye ba jachan an bitsow, xin acha abal na Jess kalnek ti kapul bin kim jachan an fariseo, ulich ani in tsidhl jun i frasko xi tajadh kal i alabastro, tsutsat kal i niwiytalb.
Utey u uknal ba na Jess ani tujey kin axdhantsi tin akan kal in jaml nin wal. Tayl exmch kin kwitsi kal nin xil, in chuchbantsi ani in joltsi bin akan an ti niwiytalb.

Tam tin chuu jech an fariseo xi kl ti kanidh na Jess, in chalpay ench: —Max jech an inik tsubaxak lejtal jaich jun i tiltsix, neech kin exla xita kl ti kwajat ti taknal ani xitam mmlb jeye jaj. Pos jaj, jaich jun i mmlb xi xeech yab exbadh.
Utsan tm ench an fariseo kal na Jess: —Simn, u kool jun xata xanty u l tu utsa. Tkon ench an fariseo: —Ti kin utsaich, Oktsix.
In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Chb i iniktsik in jntsal ti tumn jun i inik xin matintsixnl i tumn. Jn in jnl b i bo inik i denariotsik ani jn in jnl chab inik lju;
kom yab in ejtowaltsik kin witsba, an matintsix tumn in pakwlantsi an tin jntsixtaltsik chablam. Ani xo ti kin utsa, kal jowa kl ti neech ka kakn ms an matintsix tumn?
Tkon ench na Simn: —Nan u chalpayal abal kal xi ms yn nin jntsixtal pakwlantsat. Utsan kal na Jess: —Tsubax xowa a ulu.

Chawkin tm na Jess, in tela an mmlb ani in utsa ench na Simn: —A chutal jech an mmlb. In ochich ba na kim ani yab tin pidha ti ja abal ku taka nu akan; por jech an mmlb tin axdhantsmal tu akan kal nin jaml nin wal ani tin wayedhantsmal kal nin xil.
Tat yab tin chuchbay, por jech an mmlb, asta tin ochenek yab in koydhmal tin chuchbantsi tu akan.
Yab tin joltsmal ti asyte bu k, por jaj tin joltsmal ti niwiy asyte bu akan.
Jaxtm tu utsl, kom pakwlantsat ejtal nin walastalbil maske yn tajat, jaxtm ti kanidhaxin tajat; por xita w in walastalbil ka pakwlantsat, w jeye ti neech ti kanidhax.
In utsa tm ench an mmlb: —Na walastalbil pakwlantsidhich ti kwajat.
Xi ms an kapultsik xi ta jeye ti buxutsik kal Jaj, tujeytsik ti tsx jajkitsik ench: —Jitam j p jeye awil jech an inik, ke asta i walastalbtsik in ejtowal kin pakwlantsi?
Por na Jess in utsa ench an mmlb: —I loey abal i belmch, ki kalch tsububudh a ejattal.
Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess xechin ba yn i bitsowtsik ani ban kwentsaltsik ti tiltsix ani ti ltsix an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios. Junkmte kal xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik.

T jeye ti xeech ti junkil chb x i mmlbtsik xi Jaj in jeldhmal kal an yawlch xin kooltsikwiik ani in kldhantsm ti atax ejattalbtsik. Kal jech an mmlbtsik ta jeye ti xeech na Mara xu bijyb ta Magdalena, xi kldhantsidh bk ti atax ejattalb.
T jeye ti xeech na Juana, nin tomtal na Kusa, an inik xi jaichwiik in oklek tojnlil na Erodes. Na Susana ani yn ms keet i mmlbtsik ta jeye ti xeechtsik abal kin tolmiy na Jess kal xowa in kooltsik.
Yn xi kale ban bitsowtsik abal kin chuu na Jess. Tam ti junkunich yn i atiklbtsik, na Jess tujey tm kin tawnatsik kal i junbaxtalbki. Ench tin utsatsik:
—Jun i m kale ti bkul iyalb. Tam ti kwajatich ti bkul, taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban bl, kachyat ani kapat kal an chichintsik.
Taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban tujublom ani tam ti jachan an iyalbtsik ixkan, wayey kom taja, yab ch an chabl.
Taltsik an iyalb kwajlan ban kdhlom, ixkan, por kom junax ti pakey kal an kdh, paxkiyat.

Por taltsik an iyalb, kwajlan ban chabl xi alwa, tam ti ixkan ani pakey, tuuntsik tajat. Xi jun i iyalb in koy asta bo inik i itsixlek. Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, utsantsik kawidh ench kal na Jess: —Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa u ulal.
Konyat tm kal nin exbaliltsik xanty in l kin ulu jech an junbaxtalb.

Ani Jaj in utsatsik ench: —Tattsik, ti pidhl na Dios ka chobna xowa in kool yab tejwa kal tin kwenta xan ti Jaj tu takix; por xi keettsik, tokot u tawnl kal i junbaxtalbki. Anchan, maske in chutaltsik, por jyki max yab in chutal; maske in achltsik, por yab in exbayal.
Jech jaich xowa in l kin ulu an junbaxtalb: An iyalb, in junwal jelti nin kwintal na Dios;
an iyalb xi kwajlan ban bl, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin achl nin kwintal na Dios, por tam tl an lej atax u wkontsb bin itsch abal yab kin belatsik ani yab ka loey.

An iyalb xi kwajlan ban tujublom, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin axtsal tin kwintal na Dios ani in bachwal kal yantam i kulbtalb, por eb itschki; neech ka belmch w i kij, por tam ka taktamiyat, u kuxkultsik.

An iyalb xi kwajlan ban kdhlom, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin achl nin kwintal na Dios por yab in tajltsik ti kij. In walkl ka ttsik kal an chalpaxtalb, kal an tumn ani kal xowakich xin kulbetnltsik tajat. Anchan yab in ejtowal kin bajaw ka xechin lujat.

Por an iyalb xi kwajlan ban alwa chabl, in junwal jelti an atiklbtsik xin bachwal nin kwintal na Dios kal ejtal nin ejattal; in tajltsik xowa in achl ani kom in ntsal ti belomtsik, u xechinalichtsik tm lujat tajat.
Ni jun xita yab in letkoyal jun i tajbaxtalb abal tayl kin paxkiy kal jun i balixtalb o kin kwajba tin l i chy. U letkoyb an tajbaxtalb ani u kwajbb tekat abal ka tajbayat xita ka ochich.
Pos yab waach xata chinat xi yab neech ka xalkan tayl, nibal waach xata yab tejwa xi yab neech ka chobn tayl ani ka kwajb tejwa.
Anchan p, ka achatsik alwa, xita in exbayal, neech ka pidhan kin exbay ms ani xita yab in exbayal, neech ka kntsin asta xowa in chalpayal ke in exbayal.
Ulichtsik tm nin nna ani nin kidhbtsik na Jess, por yab in ejtotsik ka utey asta xon ti Jaj kwajat abal yn tajat ta ti kwajat an atiklbtsik.
Utsan tm ench na Jess: —Na nna ani na kidhbtsik n kwajat elb ani in ltsik ti ki chuu.
Por Jaj in utsatsik ench: —Xita in achltsik nin kwintal na Dios ani in tajltsik xowa in l na Dios, jachan, jaich xi kwajattsik jelti nu nna ani nu kidhbtsik.
Jun i kij, na Jess balin ba jun i tan kal nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Wana jun pake pujal. Ani kaletsik.
Por lejat exom ti watel, na Jess wayich. Tajatsik ti elan ban pujal kal jun i chapik ik, tujey ti baltsinal ti ja an tan ani wetsikich tajat ka luychin.
Kale tm ti bakyb na Jess ani utsan ench: —Oktsix! Oktsix! Exomich tu lupnal! Chakay tm na Jess, in kwiya an ik ani an mlk ja. Junwki ti kublan ani jilkon chamamadh.

In utsa tm ench nin exbaliltsik: —Janty tmun kal an belomtalb xa kooltsik? Por jajtsik jikenek ani labnktsik tajat kal xowa in chuu tmun ani u knxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Jantom awiltalb in kool jech an inik xin utsl ka chamkan an ik ani an ja ani u axtsinal?
Ulchichtsik tm ban chabl xi Gadara, xi kwajat jun pake pujal tin tamt an chabl xi Galilea.

Tam ti na Jess pach ban tan, utukn kal jun i inik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow. Jech an inik nakatich tajat i kij ti kwajat ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik. Yab u xeketlinal nibal u kwajl ba jun i at, u kwajl xon tu jolyb an chemlomtsik.
Tam ti chutat na Jess, tudhlan tin tamt ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Jantki ta ochom kal nan, Jess, xi Chakmlb kal na Dios xi plek tajat? Tu pakabdhl abal yab ti kin yajlombdha.

In ulu jech, kom na Jess kwajatich in utsl an atax ejattalb abal ka kalch ba jachan an inik. Owenekich tajat ti ochadh jachan an inik kal an atax ejattalb. Wiktsink kal an atiklbtsik tin kubak ani tin akan kal i patl abal ka kyat wikadh, por in tapyal ani u jnb kal an atax ejattalb ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Konyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Jan ta bij? Jaj tkon ench: —Nan u bij Lejin. Anchan tin ulu kom jaj yn tajat ti b ti kwajat ba jachan an inik.
Jachan an atax ejattalbtsik in pakabdha na Jess abal yab ka abntsik ban owtsiktalb.
Ba jachan an chnlom ta ti xeech yn i olomtsik ti kapupl ani pakabdhaxin an atax ejattalbtsik abal ka walk ka ochich ban olomtsik. Walk ka ochichtsik taja kal na Jess.
Kale tm an atax ejattalbtsik ba jachan an inik ani ochich ban olomtsik. Ejtal an olomtsik in petna tinb ban chn, kwajlan ban pujal ani taja ti lupuntsik.
Tam ti an belkol olomtsik in chuu xanty tmun, jlchtsik ani kale kin tila ban bitsow ani ban kwentsaltsik.

An atiklbtsik kale kin chuu xanty tmnk. Tam ti ulichtsik xon ti kwajat na Jess, elan an inik xi ochadhwiik kal an atax ejattalbtsik, buxlki xon ti kwajat na Jess, xeketlidhich ani juntam anikijich. An atiklbtsik, jikey.
Xi chlmadhtsik, jaich kl ti tiltsin an atiklbtsik xi ulich xan ti jeldh jachan an inik xi ochadhwiik kal an atax ejattalbtsik.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja ban chabl xi Gadara, tujeytsik kin pakabdha na Jess abal ka kalch bin chabliltsik, kom jajtsik u jikltsik tajat. Jaxtm na Jess ti balin ban tan abal ka kalch.
Por pakabdh na Jess kal an inik xin kldhantsmal an ti atax ejattalbtsik abal ka jn jeye kal Jaj, por utsan kal na Jess abal ka jilkon taja ani utsan jeye ench:
—Ki kalch ta kim ani ka tila xanty ti tajtsmal na Dios. Kalch tm an inik ani in tila putl an bitsow xanty tajtsin kal na Jess.
Tam ti na Jess witsch jun pake pujal, bachwat kal an atiklbtsik kal yantam i kulbtalb kom kal ejtal ti kwajat aytsmte.
Ulich tm jun i inik xu bijyb ta Jairo, xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Tudhlan tin tamt na Jess ani in pakabdha abal ka kale ti lnb tin kim,
kom ta tin kool jun in junkax tsidhnil xin koolich lajuchb i tamub ani jech an tsidhan exomich ti chemel. Kale tm na Jess ani kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwn, ke asta u kichnalich tajat.
Ba nin yanl an atiklbtsik, ta jeye ti tl jun i mmlb xin koolich lajuchb i tamub ti yaul kal i lakmtalb. In pakmalich ejtal xowa in kool kal i illixtsik ani yab u ejtowb ka jeldh kal ni jun i illix.
Jech an mmlb utey tin kx na Jess, in taktsi tin wl nin kudhkmil ani tmki jachan ti kublan ti xichnal.

Konoxin tm na ench Jess: —Jita tin taka? Kom ejtaltsik in ulal abal ni jun xita kl ti taknk, na Pedro ani nin juniktsik in ulu ench: —Oktsix, kal yn i atiklbtsik ta kichnal ani i nixkb tki tki, ani bl a konyal xita ti taka?
Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Tin takm jun xita, pos u acha abal kale i chplb xu kool ani jeley jun xita kl.
Tam ti an mmlb in acha abal axnk, utey u wipipl ani tudhlan tin tamt na Jess. In lna tm tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik xantki tin kwenta ti takxink ani xan ti jeley tmki.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, i jeley abal i belmch, awil ki kale tsububudh a itsch.

Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess, tam ti ulich jun xita xi tl bin kim na Jairo, an inik xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani utsan ench na Jairo: —Na tsidhnil chemech, yabich ki kwajay ka ani tojliy an Oktsix.
Por tam ti na Jess in acha xowa utsan na Jairo, in utsa ench: —Yab ki jikey, tokot ki belmch ani na tsidhnil neech ka ejech.
Tam ti ulich ban at, yab xita ms in walka ka ochich kal Jaj, tokot na Pedro, na Jakobo, na Juan, nin tta ani nin nna an tsidhan.
Ejtal u uknal ti kwajat ani u tepinaltsik abal chemnek an tsidhan. Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab ki ukintsik, an tsidhan yab chemnek ti kwajat, u wayalki.
Por labdhnki tokot, pos jajtsik in chob alwa ke chemnek ti kwajat.
Tyn tm bin kubak an tsidhan kal na Jess ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Tsidhan, ki chakay.
Ejech tm ti t an tsidhan ani tmki ti chakay; na Jess in ulu abal ka pidhan ti kapul an tsidhan.
Nin tta ani nin nna an tsidhan labantsik tajat, por utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab xita kin tiltsi xanty tmun.
Na Jess in junku xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik, in pidha ti chplb, ti awiltalb abal kin ejtotsik jeye kin kldha xowakich i atax ejattalbtsik ani abal kin jeldha xu yaultsik kal xowakich i yawlchtsik.
In abatsik abal kin tila xan tu takix na Dios ani abal kin jeldha i yaultsik.
In utsatsik ench: —Yab xata ka jnatsik abal ti bl, yab ka jna a kwayab, nibal i morrl, nibal i kapnl ani nibal i tumn. Tokot ka jnatsik jn a xekt.
Ba xowakich an at xon ti ki ulichtsik ani ki bachwat alwa, ki kwajaytsik taja asta kin bajaw xowki neech ki kale ba jachan an chabl.
Ani xon ti yab ki lentsik ki bachwat, ki kale ba jachan an bitsow ani ka tiniy an pojodh xi palenek ba na akan jelti jun i exl abal yab i bachwattsik alwa kal jajtsik.
Kaletsik tm ani kaletsik kwentsal ti kwentsal in till an alwa tilab ani in jeldhl an yaultsik.
An pulek awiltalb Erodes, in chobna ejtal xowa in tajl na Jess. Yabich in chob xanty kin chalpay abal taltsik in ulal ke na Juan xu pujax ejnek ti t.
Keettsik in ulal ke jaich an tiltsix Elas xi xo ulnekich ani keettsik in ulal ke jaich jun i weje tiltsix xi ejnek ti t.
Por na Erodes in ulu ench: —Na Juan nan tajat u abna ka kotsin tin k. Jita j p tm jech an inik xu achl u tilnal ke in tajl yn xata? Ani na Erodes in lenl tajat kin chuu na Jess.
Tam ti witsiy an abatwletsik, in tiltsi na Jess xowa in tajmaltsik. Jntsik tm plki kal na Jess ba jun i chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh kunat ban bitsow xin bij Betsayda.
Por tam ti achan kal an atiklbtsik, wwntsik. Bachwat an atiklbtsik kal na Jess, tiltsin xan tu takix na Dios ani jeldh an yaultsik.

Tam ti wklch, utey xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik ba na Jess ani in utsatsik ench: —Ka utsaich an atiklbtsik ka kalch ti koyol ani abal kin aliy xanty kin kapu ban kwentsaltsik xi waach tech kunat, pos tech xon tu kwajat yab xita u kwajl.

Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka pidha tattsik ti kapul. Jajtsik tkon ench: —Max yab ku kale ki chaay i kapnl abal ejtal jech an atiklbtsik yab neech ki ejto ki kapundha, pos yab i kool yn i kapnl, tokot b i pan ani chb i tool.
Nin yanl, bo mil xna i iniktsik. Por na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ka utsa ka buxkantsik kwene ti kwene, xi juntsik i kwene, chab inik lju in yanl.
Anchan tin tajatsik ani ejtal buxkan.

In tyna tm na Jess xi bo an pan ani xi chb an tool. In tela walki ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta jachan an kapnl. Tam tin pejmalich, in pidhaich tm an exbaltsik ani an exbaltsik in pidhaich tm an atiklbtsik.
Ejtaltsik kapch ani ajwtsik. Ms tayl, in tsutsiytsik lajuchb i toknal kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon.
Jun i kij tam ti na Jess kwajat ti l plki ani ta jeye ti kwajat nin exbaliltsik taja, in konoytsik ench: —Kal an atiklbtsik, jita p tin usnal ke Nan neye?
Jajtsik tkon ench: —Taltsik in ulal ke Tat i Juan xu pujax, taltsik in ulal ke i Elas xi xechink ti tiltsix ti weje ani keettsik in ulal ke Tat jaich jun i weje tiltsix xi ejnek ti t.
Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Jess: —Ani tattsik, jita p ta ulaltsik ke Nan neye? Utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Tat i Kristo, xi takudh kal na Dios abal ta takix. .
Por punkuntsattsik tajat kal na Jess abal yab xita kin ltsi jech.

Ench ti utsantsik: —Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ku watna yn i yajtsiktalb, neech kin pojk kal in oklkil an judotsik, kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Neech kin chemdh por tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.
Ms tayl in utsa ejtaltsik ench: —Max jun xita in l ti kin wwna, yejat kin uktsitsiy tinb ani ti kin wwna tsudhey ka tsudhey, nibal kin ajay tinb maske ka chemdh.
Pos xita yab in l kin uktsitsiy tinb, neech kin kibdha nin ejattal ani xita kin uktsitsiy tinb kal Nanki tu kwenta, neech kin loo.
Pos, jant ti alwa max jun xita kin bajaw kin koy ejtal xowa waach ban kayl ani kin kibdha nin ejattal ban kibeltalb?

Max jun xita kin tidhena ti kin tila ani kin tidhena kin tila an alwa tilab, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye ku tidhena jaj tam kin tsch kal ejtal nu labidh tokt, kal ejtal nin labidh tokt nu Tat ani nin labidh tokt jeye an tokat abatwletsik.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke taltsik xi tech kwajat yab neech ka chemech asta kin chuu okox ti takix na Dios.
Tam ti waxikich a kts tin ulmal jech, na Jess kadhiy ba jun i chn ti l, junkmte kal na Pedro, na Jakobo ani na Juan.
Lejat na Jess kwajat ti l, jalkun nin wal, dhaknib tajat nin kudhkmil ani chaxkin.
Xalkan tm chb i iniktsik xi kwajat ti tiloll kal Jaj. Jachan an iniktsik, jaich na Moiss ani na Elas,
wililidh kal i labidh tajaxtalb ani kwajat in tilltsik an cheml xi neech kin watna Jerusaln na Jess.
Maske na Pedro ani nin juniktsik in l tajat ti wayal, lamkantsik nin wal, in chutsitsik tin labidh tokt na Jess ani in chuutsik jeye xi chb an iniktsik xi ta ti kwajat kal Jaj.

Tam ti jachan an iniktsik wmch ba na Jess, utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Pedro: —Oktsix, alwa tajat abal tech u kwajat! Neech ki taja x i padhel, jn abal Tat, jn abal na Moiss ani jn abal na Elas. Por na Pedro yab in chob xanty kwajat in ulal.
Lejat kwajat ti kw, chakan jun i tokow, dhabyattsik kl ani jikeytsik tajat tam tin chuu dhabyattsik kal an tokow.
Achatm tm ban tokow jun i kwintalb xin ulu ench: —Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat, ka axtsitsik xowa in ulal.
Tam ti chamkanich jachan an kwintalb, in chuchtsik tm abal na Jess kwetm ti kwajat. Yabich ms xata in ulutsik ani yab in tiltsi xata ni jun xita xowa in chuutsik.
Jun tsudhelom, tam ti pachtsik ban chn, kal yn i atiklbtsik ti bachwat na Jess.
Utsan tm ench kawidh kal jun i inik xi ta jeye ti kwajat ba jachan an atiklbtsik: —Oktsix, tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin chutsi tu chakmil, pos tokot j tu kool.
U oxnal kal jun i atax ejattalb ani u tajnal ka dhjan; u wipindhb ani u dhopopl in ijil bin wi. U tajtsinal xan ti ka len ani yab u lenb ka walk.
U pakabdhmalich na exbaliltsik abal kin kldhantsi an ti atax ejattalb, por yab in ejtmaltsik.
Tkon tm ench na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, yab lejtal tajat i belom ani i walablomtsik tajat! Asta jowki kool kin kwajay kal tattsik? Asta jowki kool tu kuxuytsik? Ka tsidha tech na kwitlil.
Por tam ti exomich ti utwb an kwitl, kwajl chabl kal an atax ejattalb ani wipindh; por na Jess in kwiya an atax ejattalb, in jeldha an kwitl ani pidhanich tm an ttalb.
Ejtaltsik laban kal nin pulek awiltal na Dios.
—Ka achatsik alwa jech ani yab ka uktsi: Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin pidhn abal kin chemdh kal an iniktsik.
Por an exbaltsik yab in exbay xanty kwajat ti usnaltsik, pos yabtsik u pidhnal kin exbay ani in jiknltsik kin konoy ka wiltsin xanty utsantsik.
Tujey tm ti kwlx an exbaltsik abal in l kin chobnatsik xita j na ms ultalb xi jajtsik,
por na Jess in chobna xowa in chalpayaltsik. In yakwna tm jun i chakam kwitl, in kwajba xon ti Jaj kwajat

ani in utsatsik ench: —Xita kin bachu jun i chakam kwitl jelti jech kal Nan tu bij, Nan tin bachwal; ani xita tin bachu Nan, in bachwalich jeye xita tin abmal. Pos xita xin chakl ms tinb kal tattsik, jaich na ms ultalb.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal na Juan: —Oktsix, i chumal jun i inik ti kldhax atax ejattalb kal Tat a bij ani waw i taxkantsi kom yab xeech kal waw.
Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab ka taxkantsi, pos xita yab tu atl, junax kal waw.
Tam ti exomich ti kunel xowki na Jess ti neech ka kadhch walki, in ulch tm abal nechich Jerusaln kal ni jun i jkib.
In okxiy chb x i iniktsik abal ka kale ba jun i kwentsal xu taknal Samaria ani kin aliy xon ti neech ka koychtsik;
por yab len ka bachwat kal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja abal in achatsik ke Jerusaln ti neechtsik.

Tam ti na Jakobo ani na Juan, xi jaich in exbaliltsik na Jess, in chuu jech, in utsatsik ench na Jess: —Ajtik, a lxe ki konoy ka paay i kamal walki abal ka kibdhtsik, jelt xan tin tajmal ti weje an tiltsix Elas?
Teloloyattsik tm kal na Jess ani kwiytsikiyattsik ench: —Yab a chobtsik xantom ejattalb ti ijtsal ka ulu jech.
Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab in tsinek abal ku kibdhantsi tin ejattal an iniktsik, in tsinek abal ku lotsi. Ani kalchtsik tm pl kwentsal.
Tam ti jajtsik neech ti bl, utsan ench na Jess kal jun i inik: —Ajtik, u l tu junikna putlki xon ti ki kale.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Na wxtsik in kool in kim ani an chichintsik in kool in pkw; por Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab u kool nibal ela xon ti kin koych.
Na Jess in utsa jeye keet ench: —Wana ta exbal kal Nan. Por tkoyat ench: —Ajtik, ti kin aytsi okox asta ka chemech nu tta ani ku joliy, tm neech tu wwna.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jila ka jolyat an chemlomtsik kal xi yabtsik u belom; por tat, ki kalch ka tila abal na Dios in l kin takch an atiklbtsik.
Utsan tm jun na Jess kal keet ench: —Ajtik, u l tu junikna, por ti kin aytsi okox kin kale ku utsa xi ttsik tu kim abal in nechich.

Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Xita kin tyna nin jobb an chabl ani in tell tin kx, yab neech kin ejto kin jna lujat an kadhl. Anchan jeye, xita kin tuju kin tjontsi na Dios por yab in tjontsi kal ejtal in ejattal, yab xata ti alwa xon tu takix na Dios.
Ms tayl, an Ajtiklb in takuy jeye ox inik lju i iniktsik abal kin aba chabtsik ti chabtsik ka okxin ban bitsowtsik ani ban kwentsaltsik xon ti Jaj neech ka watey.

In utsatsik ench: —Tsubax kejle, yn tajat waach xi neech ti kin bela, por w tajat waach xita tin till. Jaxtm, yejat ka pakabdhatsik na Dios abal kin aba xita ti kin tila ani kin aliy xita neech ti kin belatsik.
Ki kaletsik ani ka chobna abal Nan tu abltsik jelti borrego xon ti waach tajat i padhum.
Yab ka jnatsik i morrl, nibal in bl i tumn, nibal a pajab ani yab ki kubey ka chapndha ni jun xita ti bl.
Tam ki ochichtsik ba jun i at, ki chapndhomchtsik okox ench: “Ke an kijidhtalb ka wachin echeki ba jech an at.”
Max ba jachan an at u kwajl i alwa kimdh, neech kin bachutsik an chapndhomtalb; por max yaba, an chapndhomtalb neech jun ka witsiy ba tattsik.
Xon ti ki bachwat alwa, ki koychtsik taja; ka kapu ani ka ucha xowa jajtsik ti ki pidha, pos an tjontsix in tomnl kin bachu nin jalbl. Yab ki xechintsik tki tki ban attsik.
Tam ki ulichtsik ba jun i bitsow xon ti ki bachwat alwa, ka kaputsik xowa ki pidhan;
ka jeldha an yaultsik xi ka ela taja ani ka utsatsik ench: “Na Dios in l kin tujch ti ki takiytsik.”
Por max ki ulich ba jun i bitsow xon ti yab ki bachwattsik alwa, ki kale ban bltsik ani ka utsatsik ench:
“Asta an pojodh xi waach tech ba na bitswiltsik xi palenek ba ni akan, i tinyal jelti jun i exl kom tattsik yab tu bachu alwa. Por ka chobnatsik jech, na Dios in l kin tujch ti ki takiytsik.”
