Tsubax tu utsltsik ke tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, jech an bitsow, ms ja plek an yajtsiktalb neech kin bachu k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek Sodoma.

Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi Korasn! Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi Betsayda! Abal max jech an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xu tajmal ba jajtsik, u tajmalak ban bitsowtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn, an atiklbtsik xi taja u kwajl, wejeichak tin kwajbmaltsik nin kodhow kudhkmil ani buxkankichaktsik ban kwixix abal kin xalka ke in jilmalichtsik ti walablom.
Por tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, ms ja plek an yajtsiktalb neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi Korasn ani xi Betsayda k an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn.
Ani tattsik, atiklbtsik xi Kapernam, a chalpayaltsikxe ke ms neech ki lbtajan kal na Dios? Pos tu utsltsik ke yaba! Neech ki petntsik asta xon ti kwajat an chemlomtsik.
Xita ti ki axtsitsik, Nan tin axtsal, xita ti ki pojkatsik, Nan tin pojkl ani xita tin pojkl, in pojkl xi tin abmal.
Xi ox inik lju an atiklbtsik, u kulbltsik tajat ti witsiy ani ench tin ulutsik: —Ajtik, asta an atax ejattalbtsik tu exbantsal tam ki kwiya kal Tat ta bij.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Nan u chuu ti kwajlan an lej atax adhik tajat jelti ly, tam ti petn abal chaat.
Nan tu pidhmaltsik ti awiltalb abal ka kachiy i chan ani i dhiniy ani yab xata neech ti ki tajtsitsik. Tu pidhmal jeye ti awiltalb abal ka tantsi ejtal tin chp an lej atax.
Por yab ki kulbtsik abal i axtsinal kal an atax ejattalbtsik, ki kulbtsik abal na bij kwajatich dhutsadh t walki.

Tmki jachan, na Jess u kulbl tajat kal an kulbtalb xi pidhan kal an Tokat Ejattalb in ulu ench: —Tta, tu kaknl, Okxlb xi takix walki ani chabl, abal a chintsmal jech xi chalpadhtsik ani xin exbayaltsik ani a xalkantsmal xi yabtsik lej chalpadh. Tta, anchan ta taja kom anchan ta lena.

Nu Tta tin pidhmalich ejtal xowa waach. Yab xita tin exll xitam j neye Nan, xin Chakmlb kal a Dios, tokot an Ttalb tin exll. Ani yab xita in exll xitam j jeye an Ttalb, tokot Nan u exll ani xita Nan, xin Chakmlb kal na Dios u l ku pidha kin exla.
In teloloy tm an exbaltsik ani in utsa jajkitsik ench: —Kijidh tajat abal xita in chutal xowa tattsik exom a chutal,

pos tsubax tu utsltsik, ke yn i tiltsixtsik ani i pakdha takix in lenmal kin chuu xowa tattsik exom a chutal, por yab in chuutsik; in lenmaltsik jeye kin acha xowa tattsik exom a achl, por yab in achatsik.

Jun i oktsix xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, chakay kin tawna ench na Jess abal kin taktamiy: —Oktsix, janty yejat ku taja abal ku ejto ku bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Janty kwajat dhutsadh ban takixtalb? Janti ta exbayal?

An oktsix xin will an takixtalb tkon ench: —“Ka kakna an Okxlb na Diosil kal ejtal a itsch, kal ejtal a ejattal, kal ejtal a chp ani kal ejtal a chalab ani ka kakna jeye na at kidhtaltsik jelt xan ta kaknl tab.”
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Alwa tajat xan ta tkon. Max ka taja jech, neech ka bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Por an oktsix xin will an takixtalb, kom yab in l ka jilkon tidhetl tin tamt na Jess, in konoy ench: —Ani jita j p tm nu at kidhtal?

Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jun i inik tl ti belal ban bl xi Jerusaln in km Jerik. Yakwan kal i kwtsik, kwetsin ejtal xowa in tsidhl ani kwetsin asta tin kudhkmil; chawat alwa, putedh ani tm ti jilanich.
Watey jun i ple ba jachan an bl, por tam tin chuu, yab in taja ti kij, wateyki.
Watey jeye taja jun i lebita, tam tin chuu, wateyki jeye.
Por jun i inik xu kwajl Samaria xi ta jeye ti neech ba jachan an bl, tam tin chuu, in kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb.

Utey tm xon ti kwachat jachan an inik, in illintsi kal i asyte ani kal i yajtsik uxnl xon ti chaudh ani in boltsi kal i kudhkum. In kadhba tm ban konl xi tl in pnm, in jna ba jun i at xon tu ulel i kubltsik ani taja tin beletna.

Ti jun tsudhelom, tam ti an samaritano nechich, in jixa chb i tipax tumn, in pidha an dhabal kubtalb at ani in utsa ench: “Ti kin beletnantsi alwa jech an ti inik ani max ka paku ms an tumn, neech tu witsbantsi tam kin witsiy.”
Konyat tm ench an oktsix kal na Jess: —Kal jowa xi jech x ta chalpayal tu kaknb jech an inik xi chaudh kal an kwtsik?
An oktsix xin will an takixtalb in ulu ench: —Xi kl ti kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kalch ani anlki teye ka taja.
Na Jess in ntsi an bl ani ulich ba jun i kwentsal. Taja, jun i mmlb xin bij Marta in bachu na Jess tin kim.
Na Marta in kool jun in kidhb xu bijyb Mara. Jech na na Mara, buxkan kunat bin akan na Jess abal kin axtsi xanty in ulal.

Por na Marta in ntsal tokot ti tojojl abal yn tajat in kool xanty kin taja. Utey tm ba na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Ajtik, Yabxe a chalpayal ke yejat ti kin tolmiy nu kidhb an tin tojojl? Ka utsa ti kin tolmiy.
Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Marta, Marta, tatki a tojliyal tab ani i chalpax kal xowakich.
Por jn tokot waach xowa yejat. Na Mara in takwymal xowa ms alwa ani yab neech ka kntsin.
Jun i kij kwajat ti l na Jess, tam ti okonich an ti l, utsan ench kal jn ti b nin exbaliltsik: —Ajtik, ti ku oktsi weye xan ti ku lan, jelt xan ti na Juan in oktsmal nin exbaliltsik.
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tam ki lantsik, ka ulu ench: Tta, xi kwajat walki, Tat i tokat tajat. Ti ku takch weye. Ka tjan tech ban chabl xowa Tat a l, jelt xan tu tjnal t walki.
Ti ku pidha xo an ti kapnl xi yntsal tsudhey ka tsudhey.
Ti ku pakwlantsi an ti walab, jelt xan ti waw i pakwlantsal xita tu waltsal. Yab ka walka ku taktamiyat, tokot ti ku beletna abal yab ku t kal an lej atax.
Utsantsik jeye ench kal na Jess: —Max jn ti b xi tattsik in kool jun in jab ani ka ulich chejel akal ti bakyb ani ka utsan ench: “Jab, ti kin matintsi x i pan,
pos jun u jab xi tl ti belal w, ulich tu kim ani yab xata u kool ku pidha kin kapu.”
Neech ka tkoyat ench altki kal na jn: “Yabich ti kin tojliy; mapudhich tu kool an wileb ani nu chakmiltsik j kwachatsik kal nan bu waytal. Yab neech ku ejto kin chakay tu pidha.”
Por neech tu utsatsik, maske yab ka chakay kin pidha xata abal in jab, neech ka chakay kin pidha abal yab ms kin ntsi ti itixbdhb ani neech kin pidha ejtal xowa in yntsal.
Jaxtm tu utsltsik ench: Ka kontsaltsik na Dios xowa a l ani neech ti ki pidhatsik; ka ayaltsik ani na Dios neech ti ki tolmiy abal ka ela; ka tawnltsik na Dios ani neech ti ki axtsitsik.
Abal xita in kontsal na Dios, in bachwal xowa in konyal; xita in ayal, in ell ani xita in tenyal an wileb, u japtsinal.
Awxe jun i ttalb xi tattsik a kidhtal, max ka kontsin ti pan kal in chakmil, neech kin pidha ti tujub? O max ka kontsin ti tool, neechxe kin pidha ti chan?
O kin pidha jun i dhiniy max ka kontsin jun i dhaktsok?
Pos max tattsik, xi yab i alwa inik, a witl ka pidha xowa alwa na chakmiltsik, an Ttalb xi kwajat walki, ms Ja in witl tajat! Ani Jaj neech kin pidha an ti Tokat Ejattalb xita kl ti ka kontsin.
Na Jess kwajat in kldhl jun i atax ejattalb xi mbdhats kl jun i inik ani tam ti kale an atax ejattalb, an m in ejtch tm ti kw. An atiklbtsik laban tajat kal jech xowa in chuu.
Por taltsik in ulu ench: —Jech an inik in kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin chp an lej atax, nin lej oklkil an atax ejattalbtsik.
Xi keettsik jeye, abal kin taktamiy na Jess, in kontsal kin taja jun i labidh labandhaxtalb xi tl walki.

Por na Jess, kom in chob alwa xanty kwajat in chalpayaltsik, in utsatsik ench: —Max jun i yejche bitsow ka kxin ani ka tujey ti pjxtsik, neech ka okon jachan an bitsow; ani max xu kwajltsik ba jun i at ka kxin, neech jeye ka okon.
Anchan jeye, max an lej atax ka kxin kal nin kidhtaltsik, jan ti neech kin ejto kin koy nin awiltal? Jech tu utsltsik abal a ulal ke u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin chp an lej atax;
pos max anchanak, kal jita in chp tin kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik na kidhtaltsik? Anchan, ti xalkantsalichtsik ke i ukpinktsik ta kwajat.
Por Nan u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik kal tin awiltal na Dios ani kal jech, u xalkanalich ke na Dios tujenekich ti takix ba tattsik.
Tam jun i likat inik kwajat tojojodh alwa ani in belkm nin kim, yab neech ka ejtowat ka kwetsin xowa in kool tapadh taja.
Por max tl jun xita ms likat k jaj ani ka t, neech tm ka kntsin ejtal tin yamtal xin ynl ti belkol ani neech ka wlchxnantsat ejtal xowa in kool.
Xita yab junax kal Nan, tin atl. Ani xita yab tin tolmiyal ku utu an atiklbtsik ba na Dios, jachan, jaich xin tajl abal an atiklbtsik yab ka utey ba na Dios.
Tam jun i atax ejattalb ka kale ba jun i inik, u xechinal ba waynek chabltsik in ayal xon ti ka koych. Tam yab kin ela xon ti ka koych, in chalpayal ench: “Neech kin witsiy ban inik xon tin kalnek.”
Tam ka witsiy, in ell jachan an inik jelti jun i at xi yab kwajtsidh, kwetodh ani lejkikidh.

Neech tm jun ka kale ani neech kin iki bk i atax ejattalbtsik xi ms atax k jaj ani ejtal neech ka ochichtsik ti kwajl ba jachan an inik. Jachan an inik neech tm ka jilkon ms kibenek k tam ti kwajatwiik.
Lejat na Jess kwajat in ulal jech, jun i mmlb xi ta jeye ti kwajat ban atiklbtsik, in ulu kawidh ench: —Kijidh tajat abal an mmlb xi ti wachiymal ta chakam ani ti pubedhm!
Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Ms kijidh abal xita xin axtsaltsik xowa in ulal na Dios ani kin taja!

An atiklbtsik in ntsal ti junkunaltsik malill xon ti kwajat na Jess. Tujey ti kw na Jess ani ulu ench: —Tattsik xi kwajat jech i kij, i ataxtsik tajat ani tin kontsaltsik ku taja jun i labidh exl; por yab ms neech ki pidhantsik keet i exl, tokot an exl jelt xan ti tmun kal an tiltsix Jons.
Pos anchan xan ti na Jons kwajay ti exl abal an atiklbtsik xi Nnibe, anchan neye Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin kwajay tin exl abal tattsik xi kwajattsik xo jech i kij.

An pulek takix mmlb xi All, neech ka ejech ti t tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, tam ki ljundh xi kwajattsik xo jech i kij. Jaj neech kin xalka abal tattsik, xi kwajat xo jech i kij, i walbidhtsik. Jaj tsch w chabl abal kin axtsi tin chalpadhtal na Salomn ani xo, tech in kwajat Nan, xi jaich jun xita xi ms plek k na Salomn ani yab tin axtsaltsik.

Xi kwajinektsik ban bitsow xi Nnibe, neech ka ejechtsik ti t tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, tam ki ljundh xi kwajattsik xo jech i kij. Neech kin xalkatsik abal tattsik, xi kwajat xo jech i kij, i walbidhtsik. Jajtsik in jila ti walablom tam ti tiltsin an tin kwintal na Dios kal na Jons; ani xo, tech in kwajat Nan, xi jaich jun xita xi ms plek k na Jons ani yab tin axtsaltsik.
Yab xita in letkoyal jun i tajbaxtalb abal kin kwajba xon ti chinat o abal kin paxkiy kal jun i kajn. In letkoyal abal kin kwajba tekat ani ka tajbayat xita ka ochich.
Na wal in junwal jelti jun in tajbaxtal na tul; max na wal alwa, na tul putl tin kool an tajaxtalb; por max yab alwa, na tul jelti max kwajat ba jikwaxtalb.
Ka koy i kwenta kal an tajaxtalb xa kool abal yab t ka wenkon ti jikwaxtalb.
Pos max ejtal na tul in kool i tajaxtalb ani yab in kool ni w i jikwaxtalb, ejtal xowakich, tajax ti neech ka chuu jelti tam i tajbantsb kal jun i tajbaxtalb.
Tam ti na Jess in kubdha ti kw, pakabdh kal jun i fariseo abal ka kale ti kapul tin kim jech an fariseo. Na Jess ochich alt ani buxkan ban mesa.
An fariseo, laban abal in chuu ke yab in taka okox nin kubak xan ti jajtsik in tajl tam neech ti kapul.

Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik an fariseotsik, a taktsal tin kx an baso ani an talab, por alkidh yab a takltsik. Anlki teye tattsik, eblidh i tokattsik, por ba na ejattal tokot a chalpmtsik i kwlch ani i ataxtalb.
&Yabtsik i chalpadh! Yabxe a chobtsik abal xita in tajmal xi eblidh in tajmal jeye xi alkidh?
Ka pidha an chojontltsik xowa a kanidhltsik tajat; anchan, tokatich tm neech ka kwajay na ejattal.

Chojontl a chubl, fariseotsik! Xa pidhltsik na Dios xowa in lujyal jeye kin bachu kal an menta, an ruda ani ejtal xi ms an chojltsik, por yab a tajltsik ti kij xowa lujat nibal i kanidhaxtsik jelt xan tu kanidhax na Dios. Yejat ka tajatsik xowa lujat ani ki kanidhaxintsik, por yab ka jila ka pidha xowa in lujyal na Dios.
Chojontl a chubl, fariseotsik! abal a kulbetnltsik ki buxkan ban alwa kwajtalbtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani a kulbetnltsik ki chapndh ti bl kal yantam i kaknaxtalb.

Chojontl a chubl, oktsixtsik ani fariseotsik xi kambix! abal a junwaltsik jelti jlimtalb xi yab tejwa ani tam jun xita kin kachiy maske yab in chob, u jilkonal choodh kal an ataxtalb. Anchan teye tattsik, yab tejwa an ataxtalb xa kooltsik ba na itsch ani xita ti ki wwnatsik u chnal kal na walastalbiltsik.
Tkon tm jn an oktsix xin will an takixtalb ani in ulu ench: —Oktsix, tam a ulal jech, tu tejtsalich weye.

Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Chojontltsik teye a chubl, oktsixtsik xa will an takixtalb! abal a utsltsik keet kin taja xowa in ulal an takixtalb ani tattsik nibal ela a tajltsik ti kij xowa a oktsixnl.
Chojontl a chubltsik! abal a kubtsal ti exl xon ti jolidh an tiltsixtsik xi chemdhats kal na weje pakliltsik.
Kal jech, u kalel jelti max a ulalichtsik ke alwa xowa in tajmal na weje pakliltsik; jajtsik in chemdha ani tattsik a kubtsal ti exl xon ti jolidh.
Kom na Dios chalpadh tajat, jaxtm tin ulu ench: “Neech ku abtsi ti tiltsixtsik ani ti abatwletsik, taltsik neech ka chemdh ani xi keettsik neech ka atan.”
Atiklbtsik xi xo jech i kij, na Dios neech ti tajatsik ka jalbiy nin chemtal ejtal an tiltsixtsik asta tam ti tujenek an kayl,

asta tam ti chemdh na Abel asta tam ti chemdh na Sakaras. Jech na Sakaras, jaich xi chemdh tamchejelidh ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb. Jaxtm tu utsl atiklbtsik xi jech i kij, ke na Dios neech ti tajatsik ka jalbiy nin chemtal an tiltsixtsik ani an abatwletsik.

Chojontl a chubl, oktsixtsik xa will an takixtalb! abal yab a ltsal an atiklbtsik xan ti kin uwa abal ka takyatichtsik kal na Dios. Yab a ltsik ki takyat kal na Dios nibal a walkl ka takyattsik kal na Dios xin ltsik ka takyat.
Tam ti na Jess in okoy kin ulu ejtal jech, an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb ani an fariseotsik, in chakuntsitsik tajat na Jess ani tujeytsik kin taktamiy kal yn i konkomixtalb.
In taktamiyal abal in ltsik kin acha max kin ulu jun xata yab alwa ani anchan kin ejtotsik kin lna.

Tam ti jachan, junkun yn i mil i atiklbtsik, ke tokotich u nxkx kal in yanl. Na Jess in okxiy kin utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ka koytsik i kwenta kal nin oktsixtal an fariseotsik xin junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye. Jech, jaich xowa in kambixnlkitsik.
Pos yab waach ni jun xata chinat xi yab neech ka xalkan ani yab waach xata yab tejwa xi yab neech ka chobn tayl.
Jaxtm tu utsltsik, ejtal xowa a ulmal ban jikwaxtalb, neech ka achan tam kij; ani xowa a ulmaltsik chinat ani mapudh i wileb, neech ka ulwat kawidh tin b an attsik.
Jabtsik, tu utsl ke yab yejat ka jikna ni jun xita xin ejtowal ti chemdhax ani tayl yab ms xata in ejtowal kin taja.
Por neech tu utsatsik xita yejat ka jikna: ka jiknatsik na Dios, xi tam ti chemdhmalich, in kool i awiltalb abal ti ki petna ban kibeltalb. Jech jaich yejat ka jiknatsik.
Yabxe u nujwb b i tsitsik chichin kal chb i tipax tumn? Por na Dios yab in uktsal ni jn xi jech an chichintsik.
Pos asta na xil xa kooltsik ba na k, ejtal ajidh ti kwajat juntsik ti juntsik. Yab ki jikeytsik, pos tattsik ms yn a jalbl k yantam i chichintsik.
Tu utsltsik ejtal ta b, xita ti kin tila tin tamt an atiklbtsik, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye ku tila tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios;
por xita kin tidhena ti kin tila tin tamt an atiklbtsik, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech neye ku tidhena ku tila tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios.
Xita kl ti kin odhbijyat Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech ka pakwlantsat; por xita kin odhbijiy an Tokat Ejattalb, yab jayki neech ka pakwlantsat.
Tam ki jntsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, tin tamt i ljundhomtsik o ban awiltalbtsik, yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax xan ti neech ki tkon o xanty neech ka ulu,
pos tam kin bajch xowki neech ta kw, an Tokat Ejattalb, jaich neech ti ltsi xanty neech ka ulu.
Utsan ench na Jess kal jn ti b xi ta ti kwajat ban atiklbtsik: —Oktsix, ka utsa nu kidhb ti kin pidha an ti jiltsixtalb xi nan neye u lujyal.
Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Jab, Nan yab in kwajbadh tin ljundhax ani tin wlchxlix.
In ulu jeye ench: —Ka koy tajat i kwenta kal an chenetalb, pos nin xechintal jun xita yab jaich tu likel kal xowa yn xata in kool.
Tiltsintsik tm jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i inik xi tumnladh tajat, in taja in ale ani labey tajat.
Kwajay tm kin chalpay ench an tumnladh inik: “Janty xo neech ku taja? Yab u kool xon ti ku tapa an kapnl.”
In chalpay tm ench: “U chobich xanty neech ku taja. Neech ku paku nu wiltiltsik abal ku taja t ms pakdha, neech ku tapa ejtal an kapnl ani ejtal xowa u kool.
Neech tm ku ulu ench tu ejattal: yn xata u kool tapadh abal ku watna kl yn i tamub; jaxtm xo, awilich kin kwajay koyol koyolki, kapul kapulki, uchal uchalki ani in kulbl.”
Por utsan ench kal na Dios: “Jab, yab tajat i chalpadh, pos jech i akal neech ki chemech ani xowa a kool tapadh, jita neech kin dhabalna?”
Anchan in tamwal xita in junkuwal i tumn abal jajki ani yab tumnladh abal a Dios.

Tayl, na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Tu utsltsik jech: Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal xanty neech ka kapu abal ki kwajay ejat, nibal ki kwajay ta chalpaxtsik kal xowa a kudhkmil neech ka kwajba.
Ni ejattal ms in jalbl k an kapnl ani ni tul ms in jalbl k ni kudhkmil.
Ka tela an chichintsik, yab u m, yab u kjol nibal in tapl xata ba wiltetsik; por u kapundhbtsik kal na Dios. Awxe tattsik ms w a jalbl k an chichintsik?
Jita xi tattsik, max ka kwajay tajat ti chalpax, neech kin ejto kin nakedha tinb ela chejel metro ms?
Max yab a ejtowaltsik ka taja xowa xi yab lej uluts, jantki ta kwajat ta chalpaxtsik kal xowakich xi ms?
Ka telatsik xan tu pakel an wich, yab u tojnaltsik nibal u dhutselix; tu utsltsik ke nibal an pulek takix Salomn, kal ejtal nin tumnladhtal, yab kudhkumlink labidh jelti an wichtsik.
&Pos max na Dios in labidhmdhl anchan an chojl xi xo kwajat ban alelb ani kalm neech ka tsikan, awxe na Dios yab neech ti ki kudhkumliytsik ms alwa? Tattsik w tajat ta belom.
Pos yab ki xechintsik ta chalpax ani ta lim xanty ka kapu o xanty ka ucha.
&An atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, jaich in ayal ejtal jech; por tattsik, a kool jun a Tta xin chob abal a yntsal ejtal jech.
Ka aliytsik xan ti ki kwajay taknl kal na Dios ani ejtal jech neech ka bachutsik.
Yab ki jikeytsik, tattsik xi tin bellich, yab tajat yn ta b, por na Tta in kulbetnmal ti pidhatsik an ti awiltalb abal ki takxin kal Nan.

&Ka nujutsik xowa a kool ani ka pidha an ti tumn an chojontltsik; anchan, a junkuwalichtsik i alwatalb t walki xi yab jayki in kool in okontal, xon ti an kw yab in ejtowal ka ochich, nibal u kapnal kal an takl.
Pos xon ti kwajat xowa alwa xi tattsik a kulbetnl, taja jeye neech ka kwajay na ejattal.
Ki kwajaytsik echeki i tojojodh, xeketlidh ani letotl na tajbaxtaltsik.
Ka tajatsik jyki jelti tam jun i tjontsix kwajat in aytsm ka witsiy nin ajtik ba jun i tomkixtalb. Kwajat tojojodh abal kin japtsi an ti wileb tam ka ulich tokot kin teney.

Kijidh tajat abal an tjontsix, xi ka elan ejat tam ka ulich nin ajtik; tsubax tu utsltsik ke jachan an tjontsix neech ka utsan kal nin ajtik ka buxkan ban mesa ani neech ka jotsin an ti kapnl kal nin ajtik.
Kijidh tajat abal jachan an tjontsix xi ka elan ejat kal nin ajtik, maske ka ulich chejel akal o dhajawichki.
Ka chobnatsik jech, max jun i dhabal at in chobak xy i ora neech ka ulich an kw, yab neech kin walka ka japtsin tin kim abal ka kwyat.
&Anchan teye tattsik, ki kwajaytsik i tojojodh; pos tam yab xata a tlmtsik, neech kin ulich Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Konyat tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, a tila jech an junbaxtalb abal wawki o abal ejtal tu b?

In ulu ench an Ajtiklb: —An tjontsix xi lujat ani chalpadh, jaich xi neech ka punkuntsat kin takiy xi ms nin tojnlil an ajtiklb; jaj jaich xi neech kin ulu xowki ti yejat ka pidhan ti kapul xi kwajattsik ba jachan an at.
Kijidh tajat abal an tjontsix xi ka elan kal nin ajtik tam ka witsiy, in tajl xowa jiltsidh kin taja.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ka kwajb ti belkol kal ejtal xowa in kool an ajtiklb.

Por max an tjontsix xi ka jilan punkudh, kin chalpay ke nin ajtik yab neech ka witsiy jikat ani ka tujey tokot ti kapul, ti uchal asta ka itey ani ka tujey kin atax tajtsi xi keet an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik xi taja u tojnal,
neech ka ulich nin ajtik tam jaj yab xata in tlm, nibal in chob xy i ora; neech tm ka pidhan jun i yajtsiktalb plek ani neech ka tajtsin anlki jelt xan tin tamwaltsik xi yab alwa inik.
An tjontsix xin chob xanty in l nin ajtik, por yab tojojon nibal kin taja ti kij, yn tajat i wichate neech kin bachu.
Por an tjontsix xi yab in chob, maske kin taja xowa walats, w i wichate neech kin bachu. Xita yn ka pidhan, yn jeye neech ka kontsin; ani xita yn ka punkuntsat, ms yn neech ka kontsin.
Nan in tsinek tech ti chabl abal ku taja jelt xan tin tajl an kamal, in tsikl xowa u tal ani in tokwal xowa yab u tal; ani u lak max exomichak ti tal!
&Por kool ku watna okox jun i yajtsiktalb plek, ani tojlb tajat ku kuxuy asta kin bajaw xowki neech ka tmun jech!
&A chalpayaltsikxe ke Nan in tsinek abal ku tsidha i kijidhtalb tech ti chabl? Tu utsltsik ke yaba, in tsinek abal ku taja i kxtalb.
Por xo ani tin nakl an kij, b xi kwajat ba jun i kimdh, neech ka kxin, xi x neech kin chakuntsi xi chb ani xi chb neech kin chakuntsi xi x.

&An ttalb neech kin chakuntsi nin kwitlil ani an kwitl neech kin chakuntsi nin tta; an nnalb neech kin chakuntsi nin tsidhnil ani an tsidhan neech kin chakuntsi nin nna; an mmlb neech kin chakuntsi nin alb ani an albe neech kin chakuntsi nin mm.
Utsan jeye ench an atiklbtsik kal na Jess: —Tam tattsik ka chuu u chakl an tokow xon tu ochel na kts, tmki a ulaltsik abal neech ka ulich i b ani anchan u tmnal.
Ani tam u wawnal an ik xi all ti tl, a ulaltsik abal neech tajat ka yajb an kakal ani anchan u tmnal.
&Kambixtsik! A witltsik ka exbantsi xowki neech ka ulich an b ani xowki neech ka yajb tajat an kakal, por yab a ejtowaltsik ka exbantsi xanty exom ti tmnal jech i kij.
Jantki ti yab a ejtowaltsik ka chalpay xowa alwa ka taja?

Max jun xita ti ki utsbiy abal a waltsmal ani ki lxin ti bl kal jaj tam i nechich ban awiltalb, ki lejkin kal jaj abal yabich ti ki utu tin tamt an ljundhom; pos max ti ki utu taja, an ljundhom neech ti ki pidhna ban ykwal ani an ykwal neech ti ki baliy ban wikaxte.
Tsubax tu utsl ke yab neech ki kale ban wikaxte asta ka jalbiy ejtal xa jnl.

Tmki jachan, ulich chb x i atiklbtsik ani tiltsin na Jess xan ti na Pilato tin chemdhmal i iniktsik xu kwajltsik Galilea. Tiltsin abal in xukuntsmal tin xichl kal in xichl an konltsik xin chemdhltsik abal kin pikba.
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —A chalpayaltsikxe ke jachan an iniktsik xu kwajl Galilea in tamu anchan abal ms ja walbidhtsik k xi keet xu kwajltsik tyki ba jachan an bitsow?
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yaba. Max yabtsik teye ka jila ta walablom, anlki teye neech ki chemechtsik.
O a chalpayaltsik ke xi lajuwaxik xi chemechtsik tuchidh kal an pulek tiadh tujub xu bijyb Silo, ms ja walbidhtsik k xi keet xu kwajltsik Jerusaln?
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yaba. Max yabtsik teye ka jila ta walablom, anlki teye neech ki chemechtsik.
Tiltsintsik tm kal na Jess jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Jun i inik in taymal jun akanlek i igo bin ale ani kale kin chuu max walidh, por yab in eltsi ni jun in wall.

In utsa tm ench an inik xi kl tu belkmtsb an tin ale: “Oxtalich tin tsiil tamub ti tamub ku altsi tin wall jech an te, por yab jayki u eltsmal. Ka kwajlaich, pos yab xata ti alwa ka kwajay kubat aniki ba nu ale.”
Por an belkol alelb tkon ench: “Ajtik, jila bl kubat jech i tamub. Neech ku jobtsi an ti chabl xon ti kubat ani neech ku mujtsi an ti lukuk xi alwa,
yab telab max anchan ka walin; max yab ka walin, neech tm ku kwajlaich.”
Jun i kij, tin ktsjil i koyxnich, na Jess kwajat ti oktsix ba jun i at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
Taja, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i mmlb xin koolich lajuwaxik i tamub ti yaul. Ktandhats kal jun i atax ejattalb ani jaxtm ti yab in ejtowal ni w ka lujkun.
Tam ti chutat kal na Jess, kanyat ani utsan ench: —Mmlb, i jelch kal an yawlch xa kool.
In kwajba tm nin kubak ban mmlb ani tmki jachan ti lujkun an mmlb. An mmlb tujey tm kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.

Por an inik xu oklek ba jachan an at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, chakuy abal na Jess in jeldha an mmlb tin ktsjil i koyxnich ani in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Waach akak a kts xowki ti alwa ku tjon; ki tschtsik jachan a kts abal ki jeldhtsik ani yab tam in ktsjil i koyxnich.
Tkon tm ench na Jess: —Kambixtsik, yabxe a willtsik na bkajil o na burrujil tam in ktsjil i koyxnich abal ka jnatsik ka uchandha?
&Jech an mmlb xu kidhtalb jeye kal na Abraham, xu kyb kal an lej atax ti yaul lajuwaxikich i tamub kal jech an yawlch, awxe yab in tomnl ka jeldh tam in ktsjil i koyxnich?
Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, ejtaltsik xi kl tu atnal na Jess, tidhebtsik; por ejtal xi ms an atiklbtsik u kulbl tam tin chuutsik an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl na Jess.
In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Janty in junwal xan tu takix na Dios ani jantokl ti neech ku ejto ku junbay?

In junwal jelti jun in itsch i mostasa xi jun i inik in tayl bin ale, u pubel tajat asta kin bajaw jelti jun i te. U pubel tajat, ke an chichintsik xi xeech ti jumuml in tajltsik nin pkw bin kweltsik jech an te.
In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Jantokl ti neech ku ejto ku junbay xan tu takix na Dios?
In junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye xi jun i mmlb in xukyal kl ox lejab i cheedh trigo ani in jilbdhl ejtal an xokadh cheedh trigo.
Tam ti na Jess neech ti belal abal Jerusaln, u kwajl ti oktsix ban bitsowtsik ani ban kwentsaltsik xon tu watel.
Konyat ench kal jun xita: —Ajtik, wxe tajat xu loel? Jaj tkon ench:

—Ka tajatsik an chplb abal ka ejto ki kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios, jelti an chplb xi yejat ka tajatsik tam a l ki ochich ba jun i xuyat wileb. Tsubax tu utsltsik ke yn tajat xi neech kin lena ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, por yabtsik neech kin ejto.

Tam ka chakay an dhabal at ani kin mapuy an wileb, tattsik, xi jilkonk elb, neech ka teneytsik an wileb ani neech ka ulutsik ench: “Ajtik ti ku japtsi weye.” Por Jaj neech ti ki tkoytsik ench: “Yab tu exlltsik nibal u chob xon ta tl.”
Neech tm ki tujeytsik ka utsa ench: “U kwajinek p tu kapul ani tu uchal junax kal Tat ani Tat i oktsixnk ba ni bitswil.”
Por Jaj neech ti ki tkoytsik ench: “Tu utslichtsik ke yab tu exll nibal u chob xon ta tl. Ki wixkintsik tech kal Nan, ejtal tattsik xa tajl xowa yab alwa!”
Taja neech ki ukintsik ani neech ti rechechl na kamab tam ka chuutsik abal na Abraham, na Isk, na Jakob ani ejtal an tiltsixtsik kwajat xon tu takix na Dios ani tattsik i jilan elb.
Pos neech ka tsch an atiklbtsik xi ebl ani all, xon tu kalel na kts ani xon tu ochel jeye abal ka buxkantsik ti kapul xon tu takix na Dios.
Jachan i kij, taltsik xi xo kwajat kuxlek, neech ka kwajay ultalb ani taltsik xi xo kwajat ultalb, neech ka kwajay kuxlek.
Tmki jachan a kts, ulich chb x i fariseotsik ani utsan ench na Jess: —Ki kalch pl, pos na Erodes in l ti ki chemdha.

Por Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ani ka utsa ench jachan an inik xin kool in chalab jelti a wx: “Ka tela, xo ani kalm u kldhl an atax ejattalbtsik, u jeldhl an yaultsik ani chabki neech ku okoy.”
Por xo kool ku ntsi nu blil, kalm ani chabki jeye, pos yab in tomnl ke jun i tiltsix ka chemdh pl bitsow ani yab Jerusaln.

In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Atiklbtsik xi Jerusaln, xa chemdhl an tiltsixtsik ani a tujbayal xi abtsinaltsik kal na Dios abal ti ki ltsi an tin tsubaxtalbil! Ynl u lena ku junku na chakmiltsik, jelt xan ti an pkwlam kwita in junkuwal nin tsitsik tm abal kin pkwna tin l nin sutsts, por yab a lenatsik.

Ka achatsik xanty neech tu utsa, an pulek at xon ta kaknltsik na Dios, neech ka walb. Tu utsltsik abal yab ms neech ki witsiy ti kin chuutsik, asta kin bajaw an kij tam tattsik neech ka ulutsik ench: “Lbtajadh ti kwajat xi tl tin bij an Okxlb!”
Jun i kij, tin ktsjil i koyxnich, na Jess kalnek ti kapul bin kim jun in oklkil i fariseo ani xi keet an fariseotsik ta ti kwajat ti kwchix.
T jeye ti kwajat taja tin tamt na Jess, jun i inik xu yaul kal i ml.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani an fariseotsik: —Awilxe ka jeldh jun i yaul tam in ktsjil i koyxnich o yaba?
Por jajtsik yab kuchun. Tyn tm an yaul bin kubak kal na Jess, jeldh ani in utsa tm ka kalch.
Utsan tm ench an fariseotsik kal na Jess: —Jita xi tattsik a kidhtal, max nin burrujil o nin bkajil ka balkin ba jun i mom, yab in jixl tmki maske in ktsjil i koyxnich?
Ani yabtsik in ejto ka tkon ni w.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu ti tkultsik an ti ultalb kwajtalb ban mesa xi kanidhtsik ba jun i tomkixtalb, in pidhatsik jech an ti takixtalb:
—Tam jun xita ti kaniy ta ajblom ba jun i tomkixtalb, yab ki buxkan ban kwajtalb xi ultalb, yab telab ka ulich jun xita xi ms uluts k tat
ani ka ulich ti ki utsa ench xi ti kanymal: “Ka pidha jachan an ti kwajtalb na je jn.” Tidhetlich tm abal tat ki kale ta buxkanal ban kwajtalb xi ms kuxlek.

Tam ki kanyat ba jun i tomkixtalb, ms alwa ki buxkan ban kwajtalb xi kuxlek; abal tam ka ulich xi ti kanymal, ti ki utsa ench: “Jab, j ki watey ta buxkanal ban koytalb xi ms ultalb.” Anchan neech ki kakn kal xi ta buxutsik ban mesa junax kal tat.
Pos xita in tekl tinb, neech ka chak; ani xita in chakl tinb, neech ka tekb.

In utsa jeye ench an inik xi kl ti kanidh: —Tam ka taja jun i kapxnich, yab ka kaniy na jabtsik, nibal na kidhbtsik, nibal na exlowltsik, nibal na at kimdh xi tumnladh; pos tam kin tajatsik jeye i kapxnich, neech jeye ti ki kaniy ani anchan, jelti max i witsbantsbich.
Tam ka taja jun i ajib, ms alwa ka kaniy an chojontltsik, an mochotsik, an kwechetsik ani an jokoltsik,
ani kijidh tajat neech ki kwajay. Pos jajtsik yab neech kin ejto ti jalbintsi, por tat, neech ka bachu an chejwalixtalb tam ka ejdh ti t an atiklbtsik xi alwa inik.
Tam tin acha jech, jn ti b xi ta ti buxutsik ban mesa, in utsa ench na Jess: —Kijidh tajat abal xita xi neech ti kapul xon tu takix na Dios!
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Jun i inik in taja jun i pulek kapxnich ani in abna ka kanyat yn i atiklbtsik.
Tam ti kwajatich tojojodh an kapnl, in aba nin tojnlil kin utsa ench xi kwajattsik kanidh: “Ki tschichtsik, tojojodhich ejtal.”

Por ejtaltsik in konoy ka pakwlantsat abal yab neech kin ejtotsik ka kale. Xi jidhtal in ulu ench: “Tall tu chaay jun i chabl ani kool kin kale ku chuu; tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin pakwlantsi.”
Jn in ulu jeye ench: “U chaymal bo kubl i bkatsik xu knal ani u l kin kale ku chuu max alwa; tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin pakwlantsi.”
Ani jn in ulu jeye ench: “Tall tin tomkin ani jaxtm ti yab neech ku ejto kin kale.”

Tam ti witsiy an tjontsix, in utsa ejtal jech nin ajtik. Chakuy an ajtiklb ani in utsa ench nin tjontsixil: “Ki kale jikatki ban pakdha bl ani ban chikwdha bl xi waach tech ban bitsow ani ka kaniy ka tsch tech xi chojontltsik, xi mochotsik, xu kwechetsik ani xu jokoltsik.”
Ms tayl, in ulu ench an tjontsix: “Ajtik, u tajmalich xan ta ulmal ani bl tajat ejtidh alt.”
Utsan tm ench an tjontsix kal an ajtiklb: “Ki kale putlki ban pakdha bl ani ban bltsik xi tin waltsik an bitsow ani ka tajtsitsik ti chplb ka ochich abal ka tsutsich nu kim.
Tu utsltsik, ke ni jn xi jachan xu kanymaltsik okox, yab neech ka ochich ba nu kim ti kapul.”
Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wewkmte na Jess, chawkilch ani in utsatsik ench:
—Max jun xita ka utey kal Nan, por in kanidhl ms nin tta, nin nna, nin tomtal, nin chakmiltsik, nin kidhbtsik, nin ixmtsik ani in kanidhl tajat tinb, yab neech kin ejto ti kin wwna.
Anl jeye, max jun xita in l ti kin wwna ani yab in l kin watna i yajtsiktalb o i cheml kal Nanki tu kwenta, yab neech kin ejto ti kin wwna.
Max jun xita xi tattsik in l kin kuba jun i at pulek, yabxe neech ka buxkan okox kin chalpay xatwa neech kin paku abal kin chuu max neech kin ejto kin okoy?
Pos max yab kin taja anchan, kin kwajbantsch tokot okox an tin akan ani yab kin ejto kin okoy, neech tm ka labdhn kal ejtal xita kl ti ka chutat
ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Jech an inik in tuju kin taja jun i at pulek ani yab in ejto kin okoy.”
O max jun i pulek takix neech ti pjx kal keet i pulek takix, yabxe neech ka buxkan okox kin chalpay max neech kin ejto kin tomna kal lju mil i soldadotsik, xi tl kal jun inik mil i soldadotsik?
Max yab neech kin ejto kin tomna, neech tm kin aba nin abatwlejiltsik abal kin konoy i lejkintalb tam na jn an pulek takix w bl ti tl ani anchan yabich tm ka pjxin.
Anchan jeye, max jun xita xi tattsik yab kin jila ejtal xowa in kool, yab neech kin ejto ka tsch ti exbal kal Nan.
An atem alwa, por max ka xawm, yabich xata ti neech ka yn.
Yab alwa abal an chabl nibal abal ka xukuxn an ti alwa lukuk, tokot abal ka wakl. Xin kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa u ulal.
Ejtal an bachkul jalbixtalb ani an walablomtsik, u uteltsik ba na Jess abal kin axtsi xanty in ulal.
Jaxtm tu kawyb na Jess kal an fariseotsik ani kal an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, in ulaltsik ench: —Jech an inik u junkunal kal an walablomtsik ani u kapul junax kal jajtsik.
Kwajbantsattsik tm jech an junbaxtalb kal na Jess:
—Jita xi tattsik, max in kool bo inik i borregotsik ani kin kibdha jn, yab neech kin jila xi che inik lajubelju ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh abal ka kale kin aliy na jn xi kibchonk asta kin ela?
Tam kin ela, kulbenek neech kin okobna
ani tam ka ulich tin kim, neech kin kaniy ejtal nin jabtsik, nin at kimdhtsik ani neech kin utsatsik ench: “Ki kulbtsik kal nan, abal u ela an borrego xu kibdhmal.”
Tu utsltsik abal u wachinal ms i kulbtalb t walki tam jun i walablom kin jilaich ti walablom k kal xi che inik lajubelju i atiklbtsik xi alwa ani yabtsik yejat kin jalkuy nin chalab.
Anl jeye, jitam mmlb xin kool lju i tipax tumn ani kin kibdha jn, yab neech kin letkoy jun i tajbaxtalb ani kin kwetoy putl an alt abal kin aliy kal yantam i kwenta asta kin ela?
Tam kin ela, neech kin kaniy ejtal nin jabtsik, nin at kimdhtsik ani neech kin utsatsik ench: “Ki kulbtsik kal nan abal u ela an tipax tumn xu kibdhmal.”
Tu utsltsik abal u kulbltsik tajat nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios tam jun i walablom kin jilaich ti walablom.
In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Jun i inik in kool chb in kwitliltsik
ani an kwitl xi tayl in utsa ench nin tta: “Tta, ti kin pidhaich an ti jiltsixtalb xi nan neye neech ku lujuy ku bachu.” Pidhantsik tm kal an ttalb xowa jajtsik in lujyal kin bachu.
Tam ti watch chb x a kts, an tayl kwitl in nuju ejtal xowa jaj in lujuy kin bachu. Kal an tumn xin bachu, kale ti kwajl pl chabl, xon ti kwajay kin atax paku ejtal an tumn xin bachmal.
Por tam tin pakmalich ejtal an tumn, wachin jun i pulek kanab ba jachan an chabl ani jaj tujey jeye kin acha i kanab.
Kale tm kin kontsi ti tojlb jun i inik xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl ani aban ti belkol olomtsik bin ale jachan an inik.
Kom u kalich tajat, in lakich max kin kaptsi tin kapwl an olomtsik, por yab u pidhnal kal ni jun xita.
Kwajay tm ti chalpax ench: “Yn i tojnaltsik bin kim nu tta u kapultsik alwa ani nan tech in kwajat tin chemel kal i kanab!
Neech kin witsiy bin kim nu tta ani neech ku utsa ench: Tta, u waltsmal na Dios ani tat teye;
yabich in tomnl kin bijyat ke in chakmlb kal tat; ti kin bachu neye jelti jun a tojnlil.”
In tuju tm an bl ani witsiy bin kim nin tta. Tam ti bl w ti tl, chutat kal nin tta ani kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb. jlch abal ka kale ti tamwb, mulukn ani chuchbayat.
In ulu tm ench jachan an kwitl: “Tta, u waltsmal na Dios ani tat teye, yabich in tomnl kin bijyat ke in chakmlb kal tat.”
Por an ttalb in utsa ench nin tojnliltsik: “Ka jixatsik jikat an alwa xeketlb, ka xeketliy ani ka pajbiy; ka kwajbantsi jeye ti aniyo bin tstsbixtal.
Ka tsidhatsik an baka xi ms kotsl ani ka chemdha. Neech tu kapul ani neech ki taja i ajib.
Pos jech nu chakmil kwajatwiik jelti max chemnek ani xo jelti max ejnekich ti t; kibchonkwiik ti kwajat ani xo i elaich.” Tujeytsik tm kin taja i ajib.
Tam ti jachan, an okox kwitl xeech ban alelb; por tam tu witslich ani exomich ti kunel ban at, in acha an tnlch ani an bixmch.
In kaniy tm jun ti b an tojnaltsik ani in konoy xanty exom ti tajnal.
Utsan ench kal jachan an tojnal: “Exom i ajib kom na kidhb witsch; na tta in abna ka chemdh an baka xi ms kotsl abal na kidhb witsiy juntam aniki.”
Por an okox kwitl chakuy ani kom yab in l ti ochel alt, kale ti pakabdhb kal nin tta abal ka ochich.

Jech an okox kwitl in utsa ench nin tta: “Tat, a chob xyich i tamub tu tjontsmal ani yab jayki tu chikat tajtsmal ta takixtal; por yab jayki tin ela pidhmal jun i chakam chibo abal ku chemdha ani ku ajbna kal nu jabtsik.
Por xo ulich jech na chakmil, xi ti atax pakwtsmal ta tumnal kal i junkux inik uxumtsik ani a chemdhantsal kin kapu an baka xi ms kotsl.”
Utsan tm ench kal nin tta: “Kwitl, tat echeki tech i kwajat kal nan ani ejtal xowa u kool, a dhabal teye.”
Por xo alwa ki taja i ajib ani ku kulb, pos na kidhb xi kwajatwiik jelti max chemnek, xo jelti max ejnekich ti t; kibchonkwiik ti kwajat ani xo i elaich.

Na Jess in utsa jeye ench nin exbaliltsik: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i tumnladh inik xin kool jun i oklek tojnal ani kale ti ltsinal an tumnladh inik ke exom ti atax pakwtsinal tin tumnal kal jech an oklek.
Abn tm ti kanyb kal nin ajtik ani utsan ench: “Janty in y xowa u achl in usnal kal tat ta kwenta? U l ti kin ltsi xo xanty a tajm kal nu tumnal, pos yabich ms neech ka ntsi ta oklek tojnal kal nan.”
An oklek tojnal in chalpay tm ench: “Janty xo neech ku taja abal nu ajtik neech ti kin kldhaich an tin tojnal? Nan yabich in likat ku taja u ale ani tidhetl u achl kin xechin tin konox tolmixtalb.
U chalpch xanty neech ku taja abal ku koy xita ti kin bachu tin kim tam kin kldhjich an tin oklek tojnal.”
Tujey tm kin kaniy juntsik ti juntsik xu jntsixtsik ban ajtiklb. Xi jidhtal in konoy ench: “Jatwa a jntsal nu ajtik?”

Tkoyat ench: “U jntsal bo inik barril ti asyte.” Utsan tm ench kal an oklek tojnal: “J kwajat an w xon ti dhutsadh abal anchan a jnl; ki buxkan jikat ani ka taja jn xin ulal abal tokot a jnl chab inik lju.”

Tayl in konoy jeye xin chabtal: “Ani tat, jatwa a jnl?” Jaj tkon ench: “Bo inik lejab i trigo.” In utsa jeye tm ench: “J kwajat an w xon ti dhutsadh abal anchan a jnl; ka taja t xon ti kin ulu abal tokot a jnl che inik i lejab.”

An ajtiklb in chuu abal jachan an oklek tojnal xi yab alwa, in chob tajat xan ti kin uwa abal yab ka xechin ti chojontlbl tayl. Pos an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, ms ja in chobtsik xan ti kin uwa kal nin kidhtaltsik k an atiklbtsik xu belom.
Nan tu utsltsik ench: ka yna xowa waach tech ban walbidh kayl abal ka koy a jabtsik, pos tam ka taley xowa waach tech ti kayl, ka wachin xita ti ki bachu ban at xi yab jayki u pakchunal.
Xita in tajl alwa kal xowa w in kool, anchan jeye neech kin taja kal xi yn ani xita in tajl yab alwa kal xowa w in kool, anchan jeye neech kin taja kal xi yn.
&Jaxtm, max yabtsik a tajl alwa kal xowa a kool tech ban walbidh kayl, awxe neech ki pidhan kal na Dios abal ka beletna xowa alwa?
Ani max yab ka beletna alwa xowa na Dios ti pidhl ka beletna, awxe neech ti ki pidha na Dios xowa ti bijtsmalich ke tat neech ka dhabalna?

Ni jun i tjontsix yab neech kin ejto kin tjontsi chb i ajtiklb; pos neech kin ata na jn ani neech kin kanidha na jn. Neech kin taja xowa ka utsan kal na jn ani na jn yab neech kin taja ti kij. Yab neech ka ejto ka tjontsi na Dios ani ka tjontsi jeye an tumnladhtalb.
An fariseotsik xi chene tajat kal an tumn, kwajat in achltsik ejtal jech ani in labdhnatsik na Jess.

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik a wynl ke i alwa iniktsik tajat tin tamt an atiklbtsik, por na Dios ti exlantsal an ta ejattaltsik; pos xowa u chutb kal an iniktsik ke alwa tajat, na Dios in pojkl.

Asta tam ti xechin na Juan xu pujax u ynal an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani in oktsixtal an tiltsixtsik. Tam ti xechin na Juan xu pujax, tm ti tujey ti tilnal an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios ani ejtalki in tajl an chplb abal ka kwajch taknl kal na Dios.
Por ms yab tojlb ka kibchon an walki ani an chabl k yab ka tmun ejtal jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Max jun i inik kin jila nin tomtal ani ka tomkin ti t kal keet i mmlb, u walbinalich tm kal i uxmbetalb ani xita ka tomkin kal an jiladh mmlb, u walbinalich jeye kal i uxmbetalb.
Twiik ti kwajat jun i tumnladh inik xu xeketlinal kal i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani in tajl i pakdha ajib tsudhey ka tsudhey.
T jeye ti kwajat jun i chojontl inik xu bijyb ta Lsaro, xi ttidh tajat ani u buxkanal chabl bin wilbil jachan an tumnladh inik.
Jech an chojontl inik, in lenl kin kapu nin mumats an kapnl xu kwajlanal tin l nin mesajil an tumnladh inik. Jech na Lsaro ttidh tajat ke asta an pikotsik u utel ti lekwtsinal kl an tin ttal.
Jun i kij, an chojontl inik chemech ani jn kal an tokat abatwletsik abal ka kwajay xon ti kwajat na Abraham. Chemech jeye an tumnladh inik ani jolyat.
Tam ti an tumnladh inik kwajat ti chojontlbl kal an yajal ban kibeltalb, in tela tekat ani in w chuu na Abraham junax kal na Lsaro.

Dhjaxin tm kawidh ench: “Tta Abraham, ti kin yajnantsi neye, ka aba na Lsaro abal kin axdha nin tsm nin tstsbixtal ba ja ani ka tsch ti kin chamambdhantsi tu lekb, pos yabich tajat u kuxyal an yajtsiktalb ba jech an kamal.”

Por utsan ench kal na Abraham: “Chakmlb, ka chalpay abal tat a bachmalich xowa alwa tam ta xechink ti chabl ani na Lsaro mapal yajtsiktalb in bachmal. Xo, jaj exom in bachwal i kijidhtalb tech ani tat exom a bachwal i yajtsiktalb.

Ani tm jun, yab neech kin ejto ka watey xon ti tat i kwajat kom waach jun i owtsik jl ani yab xan ti ka watey tachan. Jaxtm, xi techtsik kwajat, yab neech kin ejto ka kale tachan max in ltsik ka kale ani xi tachantsik kwajat, yab neech kin ejto ka tsch tech max in ltsik ka tsch.”
In ulu tm ench an tumnladh inik: “Tta Abraham, tu kontsal p ti alwatalb abal ka aba na Lsaro bin kim nu tta,
xon ti kwajat b u kidhbtsik abal kin ltsitsik jech ani anchan, yabtsik ka tsch tech ban yajtsiktalb.”
Por utsan ench kal na Abraham: “T in kooltsik an takixtalb xin dhutsmalt na Moiss ani an tiltsixtsik; awil kin exbantsitsik jaich!”
Tkon ench an tumnladh inik: “Ani kejle, tta Abraham, por max jn xi chemnekich ka ejech ti t ani ka witsiy xon ti jajtsik kwajat, neech tm kin jilatsik ti walablom.”

Por utsan ench kal na Abraham: “Max yab in l kin exbantsitsik xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss ani an tiltsixtsik, yab jeye neech kin exbantsitsik maske jun i chemlom ka ejech ti t ani ka witsiy xon ti jajtsik kwajat.”
Na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Echeki waach xantokl tu walbindhb an atiklbtsik; por chojontl in chubl xita kin walbindha jun xita!
Ms alwa abal an walbindhom ka wiktsin bin nk jun i yejche cha tujub ani ka petn ban pujal abal ka luychin k kin walbindha jn ti b xi jech an chakamtsik xi tin bellichtsik.
Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab ka walbindha ni jun xita. Max jun a at kidhb ti waltsi, ka tawna, max kin exbay ani yabich ms kin taja an walastalb, ka pakwlantsi.
Maske ti waltsi bkl ta kts ani bkl ti ki utsa ench: “Yabich ms neech kin witsiy ku taja”, ka pakwlantsi.
An exbaltsik in utsa ench an Ajtiklb: —Ti ku tolmiy abal ku belmch ms.

Utsantsik tm ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Max i belomaktsik ela w, jelt in publ jun in itsch i mostasa, neech ka ejtotsik ka utsa jech an te xu bijyb sikmoro: “Ki puchun tech xon ta kwajat ani ki kale ta kubl ban pujal”; ani an te neech ti ki axtsi.
Max jun xita xi tattsik in kool jun i jolib ti jbal chabl o ti belkol konltsik ban alelb, tam ka witsch, yab in utsl ench: “Ki ochichich ani ki buxkan ta kapul.”

Yab in tajl anchan, tokot in utsl ench: “Ti kin lejkintsi an ti kapnl xowa neech ku kapu ani ki kwajay tech abal ti kin bntsi xowa ku yntsi, lejat in kwajat tin kapul ani tin uchal. Tayl, tm teye ki kapch ani ki uchch.”
Awxe neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb jech an tjontsix abal in taja xowa utsan? Yaba!
Anchan teye tattsik, tam ki okon ka taja ejtal xowa ti utsltsik na Dios, yejat ka ulutsik ench: “Waw u tjontsix por yab xata tu alwa, pos yab ms xata i tajmal, tokot xowa xi yejat ki taja.”
Tam ti na Jess in ntsch an bl abal Jerusaln, watey bin xmll an chabltsik xi Galilea ani xi Samaria.
Tam ti ulich ba jun i kwentsal, kale ti tamwb kal lju i iniktsik xin kool i kwajat atax tt, por yab utukn,
tokot dhjaxintsik kawidh ench: —Jess, Oktsix, ti ku yajnantsi weye!
Tam ti chutattsik kal na Jess, utsantsik ench: —Ki kaletsik tin tamt an pletsik abal ki chutat kal jajtsik. Lejat neech ti belal, jeleytsik.
Jn ti b xi jajtsik, tam tin chuu abal jeley, witsiy in pubdhantsal kawidh tin bij na Dios.
Tudhlan kutl asta chabl tin tamt na Jess abal kin pidha ti jalbintsixtalb. Jech an inik, u kwajl Samaria.
In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Yabxe p lju an yaultsik xi jeley? Jn ti kaletsik xi belju?
Tokot jech an pl inik witsiy abal kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.
Utsan tm ench an inik kal na Jess: —Ki chakay ani ki kalch, i jeley abal i belmch.
Konyat na Jess kal an fariseotsik xowki neech ka tujey ti takix na Dios ani Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Xan tu takix na Dios, yab neech kin junu jelti jun xata xi tejwa.
Yab neech ka ulwat ench: “J kwajat” o “N kwajat”; pos na Dios tujenekich ti takix xon ta kwajattsik, por tokot u xalkanal bin itsch xita kl ti ka bachwat.

In utsa tm ench nin exbaliltsik: —Neech kin bajaw an kij tam tattsik neech ka lena ti kin chuu, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, maske jn tokot a kts, por yab neech ka ejto ti kin chuutsik kom yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech kin witsiy.
Taltsik neech ti ki utsatsik ench: “Ka tela, j kwajat an Kristo” o “Ka tela, n kwajat.” Por yab ki kaletsik ti kin aliy nibal ka wwnatsik.
Pos jelt xan tu lamkil an ly jun pake jun pake ban walki, anchan jeye neech ka tmun jachan i kij tam kin tsch, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Por kool okox ku watna yn i yajtsiktalb ani neech kin pojk kal an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij.
Jelt xan ti tmun tam ti xechink na No, anchan jeye neech ka tmun tam kin bajaw xowki ti neech kin tsch, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.

Jech an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, tokot in belltsik ti kapul ani ti uchal, u tomkinaltsik ani in pidhnltsik nin tsidhnil abal ka tomkin, asta tin bajaw xowki na No ti ochich ban tan at, tsch an chapik bal kij ani ejtaltsik chemech.
Anchan jeye ti tmun tam ti xechin na Lot. An atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, tokot in belltsik ti kapul ani ti uchal, u chaum ani u njultsik, u m ani u kbal attsik;
por tam ti na Lot kale ba jachan an bitsow xi Sodoma, kwajlan i kamal ani i asufre xi tl walki ani ejtal chemdhtsik.
Anchan jeye neech ka tmun jachan i kij tam kin xalkan, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Jachan i kij, max jun xita kwajat bin b nin kim ani in kool xata tapadh alt, yab ka paay kin iki ani max jun xita kwajat bin ale, yab ka witsiy tin kim.
Ka chalpaytsik xanty in tamu nin tomtal na Lot.
Xita kin lena kin loo nin xechintal, neech kin kibdha; por xita kin kibdha, neech kin loo.
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke jachan i akal, max kwajat chb ti wayal junax ba jun i waytalb, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
Max chb i mmlbtsik kwajat ti cheel junax, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
Max chb i iniktsik kwajat ti tojnal junax bin ale, jn neech ka jn ani jn neech ka jilan.
Tam ti an exbaltsik in acha jech, konoxintsik ench: —Ajtik, jn ti neech ka tmun jech? Na Jess tkon ench: —Xonti kwajat an chemlom, taja neech ka junkun an tottsik.
Na Jess in kwajbantsitsik jun i junbaxtalb abal kin oktsitsik ke yejat ka lan echeki ani yab kin jilatsik tinb.
In utsatsik ench: —Twiik ti kwajat ba jun i bitsow jun i ljundhom xi yab in jiknl a Dios nibal in tajl ti kij ni jun xita.
Tyki ba jachan an bitsow, ta jeye ti kwajat jun i chemtsidh mmlb xu kalel kin chuu jachan an ljundhom abal in l ka kinandhantsat jun xita xi waltsink kl.
Owey ti pakabdhax an ti ljundhom, por yab u tajnal ti kij. Tayl in chalpay ench an ljundhom: “Maske yab u jiknl na Dios, nibal u tajl ti kij ni jun xita,
kom jech an chemtsidh mmlb, blki neech kin ntsi ti kin itixbdha, neech ku exbantsi abal yabich ms kin ntsi ti tsiil yab t ti kin chakdha.”
Ani in ulu ench an Ajtiklb: —Jech jaich in ulu an ljundhom xi yab alwa inik.
Awxe na Dios yab neech kin exbantsitsik jeye xi Jaj in takwymal, xi akal i kij u tawnb kawidh kl? Awxe neech kin koy ti aytsixtsik?
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke neech ti ki exbantsitsik jikatki. Por tam kin tsch, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, blxe awil neech ku ela tech ti kayl xu belomtsik?
Na Jess in tila jeye jech an junbaxtalb abal taltsik an atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat, in chalpayaltsik ke alwa iniktsik ani in pojkl xi keettsik. Ench tin ulu:
—Chb i iniktsik kale ti l ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios: jn i fariseo ani jn i bachkul jalbixtalb.

An fariseo kubat ti l ench: “Dios, tu pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb abal yab u junwal jelti xi keettsik, xu kw, xi yabtsik alwa inik ani xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal. Nibal ela u junwal jelti jech an bachkul jalbixtalb.
Nan in kl chbl ti semana ani tu pidhl xowa a lujyal ka bachu kal ejtal xowa u tl.”
Por an bachkul jalbixtalb, wki ja ti jilkon ani nibal ela in lenl kin tela walki, in pewyal tokot in tamt nin itsch ani in ulal ench: “Dios, ti kin kontsi neye ti yajnantsixtalb abal in walablom!”
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke jech an bachkul tumn witsiy tin kim pakwlantsidh kal na Dios, por an fariseo yaba. Pos xita kin teka tinb, neech ka chak ani xita kin chaka tinb, neech ka tekb.
U utuntsb jeye ti chakamtsik na Jess abal kin puntsi tin kubak ani kin lbtaja, por tam ti an exbaltsik in chuu jech, tujey kin kwiya an tsidhom chakamtsik.
Kanyattsik kal na Jess ani utsan ench: —Ka walka ka utey an chakamtsik xon tin kwajat, yab ka tamkuy, pos xita in jill tinb ka takyat kal na Dios, in junwal jelti chakam.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita yab kin jila tinb ka takyat kal na Dios jelti jun i chakam, yab jayki neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
Konyat ench na Jess kal jun i oklek: —Alwa Oktsix, janty yejat ku taja abal ku ejto ku koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin bijyal tin alwa? Jn tokot waach xita alwa, na Dios.
A exllich an takixtalb: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita ani ka kakna na tta ani na nna.”
Utsan ench kal an inik: —Ejtal jech u tajl asta tin chipl.

Tam ti na Jess in acha xan ti tkon, in utsa ench: —Bl u kibel ka taja jun xata: ka nuju ejtal xowa a kool ani ka pidha an ti tumn an chojontltsik, anchan neech tm ka koy t walki xowa ms yn in jalbl, ki tsch tm ani ti kin wwna.
Tam ti an inik in acha jech, tepin tajat kom watats ti tumnladh.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal tepin tajat an tumnladh inik, in ulu ench: —Tojlb tajat abal jun i tumnladh inik kin walka tinb ka takyat kal na Dios!
Ms yab tojlb ka watey jun i konl xin bij kameyo bin chultl jun i tidhab k kin walka tinb jun i tumnladh inik ka takyat kal na Dios.
Xin achatsik xowa in ulu na Jess, in ulu ench: —Tm, jita neech kin ejto ka loey?
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Xowa yab in ejtowal kin taja an iniktsik, na Dios in ejtowal kin taja.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Waw i jilmal ejtal xowa i kool abal ku xechin kal Tat.
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin jila in kim, in ttatsik, in kidhbtsik, in tomtal o in chakmiltsik abal kin tjontsi na Dios,
ms yn neech kin bachu ba jech an kayl ani ban t kayl xi neech ka tsch tayl, neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Na Jess in kaniy plki xi lajuchb an exbal ani in utsatsik ench: —Xo u nechich Jerusaln, xon ti neech ka tmun ejtal xowa in dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik kal tu kwenta Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Neech kin pidhn ban pl iniktsik, neech kin labdhn, neech kin odhbijyat ani neech kin tubkayat.
Neech kin chawat ani neech kin chemdh; por tin xlb a kts, neech kin ejech ti t.
Por jajtsik yab in exbay xata jech xowa utsan kal na Jess, nibal in chobtsik xanty nu tiltsinal, pos jech xowa utsantsik, jaich xowa yabl neech kin ejtotsik kin exbay.
Tam ti na Jess exomich ti kunel ban bitsow xi Jerik, in ela jun i jokol buxl wal bl ti konox tolmixtalb.
Tam ti an jokol in acha abal exom ti watel yn i atiklbtsik, in konoy xanty exom ti tmnal.
Utsan abal exom ti watel taja na Jess xi Nasaret.
Tam tin acha jech, dhjaxin tm kawidh ench: —Jess, xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
Xi ta ti neechtsik okox kwiyxin abal ka chamkan, por an jokol ms kawidh ti dhjaxin ench: —Tat, xi kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid, ti kin yajnantsi neye!
Kubey tm na Jess ani in abna ka iktat an jokol. Tam ti tajaich ti kwajat, in konoy ench:
—Janty a l tu tajtsi? An jokol tkon ench: —Ajtik, u l neye ti kin chuxindha.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki chuxinich! I jeley abal i belmch.
Tmki jachan ti chuxin an jokol, in wwna tm na Jess ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios. Ejtal an atiklbtsik xin chuu jech, in pubdhantsitsik jeye tin bij na Dios.
Ulich tm na Jess ban bitsow xi Jerik ani tam ti exomich ti watel taja, ochich ba jech an bitsow.
Ba jech an bitsow, ta ti kwajat jun i tumnladh inik xin bij Sakeo, jaj u oklek kal xin bachwaltsik an jalbixtalb.
Na Sakeo in l kin exla na Jess, por yab in ejto kin chuu kom yn tajat an atiklbtsik ta ti neech ani tm jun, yab nakat na Sakeo.
jlch tm abal ka okxin ani abal kin ejto kin chuu na Jess, kadhiy ba jun i te kunat xon ti na Jess neech ka watey.
Tam ti na Jess watey taja, in tela tekat, in chuu na Sakeo ani in utsa ench: —Sakeo, ki paay jikatki, pos xo kool kin koych ta kim.
Paay tm jikatki na Sakeo ani kal yantam i kulbtalb ti bachwat na Jess.
Tam ti an atiklbtsik in chuu jech, ejtal in tujutsik ti kawix, in ulaltsik abal na Jess kalnek ti koyol bin kim jun i walablom inik.
Kubey tm na Sakeo ani in utsa ench an Ajtiklb: —Ajtik, neech ku pidha an chojontltsik junax chejel xowa u kool ani max u kwymal jun xita, neech ku witsbantsi chl in yanl xowa u kwetsmal.
In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Xo lowatichtsik xu kwajl bin kim na Sakeo, pos jaj u kidhtalb jeye kal na Abraham ani xo belmchich jelt xan ti belmmadh na Abraham.
Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, in tsinek ku aliy ani ku loo an atiklbtsik xi kibchonkichwiik ti kwajat.

Kom kunatich ka ulich Jerusaln ani kom xi ta ti kwajattsik in achl xowa in ulal na Jess in chalpayal ke wich u kibel kin tuju ti takix na Dios, jaxtm na Jess in ntsi ti kw ani in tiltsitsik jech an junbaxtalb.
In utsatsik ench: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i inik xu kidhtalb kal i pakdha takix. Jech an inik, kale w ba jun i pl bitsow abal ka bijyat ti pulek takix ani tayl ka witsiy ti takix.
Tam ti nechich ka kalch, in kaniy lju in tojnliltsik, in pidha juntsik ti b jun i patl tumn xi yn tajat in jalbl ani in utsatsik ench: “Ka tjondhatsik jech an tumn asta kin witsiy.”
Jech an inik u atnal kal an atiklbtsik xi taja bin bitswil. Jaxtm ti aban jeye chb x i iniktsik tin kuxmats abal ka kaletsik kin ulu ench: “Yab i kulbetnl jech an inik abal ti pulek takxal.”
Por blki bijyat ti pulek takix ani witsiy ba nin bitswil. Tam ti ulich, in abna ka kanyat an tojnaltsik xin jiltsmal an ti tumn abal kin chobna xatwa in tmal juntsik ti b kal jachan an tumn.
Ulich xi jidhtal ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, u tjondha na tumnal ani in ta ljujl ms in yanl.”
Tkoyat ench kal an pulek takix: “Alwa tajat, tat i alwa tjontsix; kom i tjon alwa kal w, neech tu pidha ti awiltalb ka takiy lju i bitsowtsik.”
Ulich jeye xin chabtal ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, u tjondha na tumnal ani in ta bl ms in yanl.”
Tkoyat jeye ench: “Tat neech tu kwajba ka takiy b i bitsowtsik.”
Ulich jeye jn ani in ulu ench: “Ajtik, j kwajat na tumnal. U boliy kal jun peje i kudhkum ani u tapa;
kom tu jiknl abal tat kidhat tajat a kawyal. Pos tat a kniyal xowa yab tat a dhabal ani i junkux xon ti yab i mmadh.”

In ulu tm ench an pulek takix: “Tat yab i alwa tjontsix, kal xowa a ulal, u xalkanal abal i walbidh. Max a chob abal kidhat u kawyal, abal u kniyal xowa yab u dhabal ani in junkux xon ti yab in mmadh,
jantki p tm ti yab a kwajba nu tumnal xon tu tjondhb abal tam kin witsiy, ku bachu nu tumnal klich xowa in tmal?”
In utsatsik ench xi taja ti kwajat: “Ka kntsi an ti tumn ani ka pidha xin kool lju.”
Jajtsik in ulu ench: “Ajtik, por in koolich lju an tumn xi yn in jalbl.”
An pulek takix tkon ench: “Tu utsltsik ke xita in koolich, neech ka pidhan ms kal na Dios; por xita yab in kool, neech ka kntsin kal na Dios asta xowa w in kool.
Ani an atiklbtsik xi tin atl, xi yabtsik tin kulbetnl tin pulek takxal, ka tsidhatsik tech ani ka chemdhatsik tu tamt.”
Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, na Jess in ntsi an bl abal Jerusaln.
Tam ti exomich ti ulel ban bitsowtsik xi Betfaj ani Betania, kunat ban chn xu bijyb Olibos, in aba chb nin exbaliltsik
ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ban kwentsal xi n kwajat kunat, tam ki ulichtsik taja neech ka ela wikats jun i burru xi yabl jayki pnadh. Ka wila ani ka tsidha tech.
Max ti konoy jun xita xantki ta will, ka utsatsik abal an Ajtiklb in yntsal.
Kale tm an exbaltsik ani anchan tin ela xan ti usnktsik kal na Jess.
Tam ti exomtsik in will an burru, konyat ench kal an dhabal: —Jantki ti exom a will an burru?
Jajtsik tkon ench: —An Ajtiklb in yntsal.
In jntsitsik tm na Jess, in tatlabiy an burru kal jajtsik nin kudhkmil ani in pumba na Jess.
Lejat na Jess neech punat, an atiklbtsik in nukl nin kudhkmil tin nakl an bl.

Tam ti exomich ti kunel bin pabl an chn xu bijyb Olibos, ejtal xita kl ti wewkmte in tuju ti dhajnaltsik kawidh kal i kulbxnich ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xin chumaltsik.
In ulaltsik ench: —Lbtajadh an Pulek Takix xi tl tin bij an Okxlb! Ka wachin i kijidhtalb t walki ani kin koy na Dios an labidh tokattalb!
Taltsik an fariseotsik xi ta ti kwajat ba jachan an atiklb in utsatsik tm ench na Jess: —Oktsix, ka utsatsik ka chamkan xi ti wwnltsik.
Por na Jess in tkoytsik ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max jech an atiklbtsik ka chamkan, an tujubtsik neech ka dhjaxintsik kawidh.
Tam ti ulchich kunat Jerusaln ani in chuu jachan an bitsow, na Jess ukin kal tin kwenta an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja
ani in ulu ench: —Max an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jech an bitsow in ejtowalak kin exbaytsik jech a kts xan ti neech kin koytsik an kijidhtalb, alwaak tajat! Por yab in exbayaltsik.
Por neech kin bajaw an kij tam xi kl tu atnal neech ka mapyattsik kl, neech ka wiliyat ani neech ka pjeyattsik tki tki.

Neech ka pakwtsin an tin bitswil ani yab neech ka jilan ni jun i tujub tbx. Neech ka pakwat ejtal ani neech ka chemdh ejtal an atiklbtsik xi taja u kwajl kom yab in exbaytsik an kij xowki ti tsch ti lnb kal na Dios abal ka lowattsik.
Ochich tm na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani tujey kin kldha xi ta ti kwajattsik taja ti chaum ani ti njultsik.
In utsatsik ench: —Ban Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Nu kim abal i lbki ti bijidh ti neech ka yn”, por a wenkmalichtsik tin chinkontal i kw.

Tsudhey ka tsudhey na Jess u kwajl ti oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios; por nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani an oklektsik xi ba jachan an bitsow in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess.
Por yab in elatsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin chemdha, pos kal ejtal an atiklbtsik tu axtsinal xowa in oktsixnl na Jess.

Jun i kij, tam ti na Jess kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios in oktsal an atiklbtsik ani in tiltsal an ti alwa tilab, ulichtsik nin oklkil an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss junax kal nin oklkil an judotsik
ani utsan ench na Jess: —Ti ku utsa kal jantom awiltalb ta tajl jech. Jita ti pidhmal jech an ti awiltalb?
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Neech neye tu konoytsik jun xata ani ti kin tkoytsik.
Kal jita ti abnk na Juan ti pjal? Kal a Dios o kal i iniktsik?
Tujey tm ti kwlx jajkitsik ani u knxtsik ench: —Janty ki utsa? Max ki utsa ke kal a Dios ti abnk, neech ti ku konoy ench: “Jantki ti yabtsik a beltsi?”
Ani max ki utsa ke kal i iniktsik ti abnk, an atiklbtsik neech ti ku chemdha kal i tujbaxtalb, kom in chobtsik alwa ke kal a Dios ti abnk ti tiltsix.
Jaxtm tin ulutsik ke yab in chob xita kl ti abnk na Juan ti pjal.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos yab neye neech tu utsatsik kal jantom awiltalb tu tajl ejtal jech.

Tujey tm na Jess kin tawna an atiklbtsik ani in kwajbantsi jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Twiik ti kwajat jun i inik xin taya yn i akanlek i uba. Tayl in matixna jachan an alelb abal ka tjomn kal keettsik, an dhabal alelb kale w ti belal ani owey ti witsiy.

Tam tin bajch an kij xowki neech ti pitnal an uba, in aba jun in tojnlil abal ka kontsin jachan an mat alelb xowa in lujyal jeye kin bachu an dhabal alelb; por an mat alelb in chaaw nin tojnlil an dhabal ani mapats tin aba ka kale.
An dhabal alelb in aba jun keet in tojnlil; por odhbijyat jeye, chawat ani mapats jeye ti aban ka kale.
An dhabal alelb in abna jun keet, por an mat alelb in chojbdha ani in kajna ka kale elb alelb.
Tayl an dhabal alelb in ulu ench: “Janty ku taja? Neech ku aba nu chakmil xu kanidhl tajat; tam ka chutat, neech xna ka kakn.”
Por tam ti an chakmlb chutat kal an mat alelb, tsxintsik ench: “Jech jaich neech kin dhabalna tayl an alelb; wana ki chemdha abal waw ki dhabalna tayl an alelb.”
Kldh tm an chakmlb ba jachan an alelb ani chemdh. Konoxin tm ench na Jess: —Janty a chalpayaltsik neech ka tajtsintsik jachan an mat alelb kal an dhabal alelb?
Neech ka tsch ti chemdhbtsik jachan an mat alelb ani neech kin matintsi keet an ti alelb. Tam tin achatsik anchan, in ulutsik ench: —Ke yab kin walka na Dios ka tmun anchan!

Por teloloyattsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Janty p tm in l kin ulu xi kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab? Awxe yab Nan tin till tam in ulal ench?: An tujub xin pojka an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ultalb.
Xita ka kwajlan ba jachan an tujub, muax neech ka kale ani max an tujub ka kwajlan ba jun xita, neech ka jilan jelti i pojodh.

An oklek pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, in lena kin yakwa na Jess tmki jachan abal in achatsik ke na Jess in ulu jech an junbaxtalb kal jajtsik tin kwenta; por in jiknl an atiklbtsik.
Abtsin tm na Jess ti kwchixtsik xin wynl u alwa iniktsik abal ka taktamiyat kal i tilabtsik ani ka tajan kin ulu jun xata yab alwa ani anchan, ka ejtowat ka utsbiyat ban pulek awiltalb.

Jaxtm ti konyat ench: —Oktsix, waw i chob ke xowa a ulal ani xowa a oktsixnl ejtal tsubax, Tat yab a dhl ti kwenta xanty in tajl o in chalpayal an atiklbtsik, Tat a oktsixnl kal i tsubaxtalb nin takixtalbil na Dios.
Ti ku utsa max alwa ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an lej pulek takix romano, o yaba.
Por na Jess in chuu abal kwajatki ti taktamiyb ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantki ta kwajattsik tin taktamiyal?
Ti kin ltsi jn i patl tumn. Jita j in wal xi jech kwajat chilbadh ban tumn ani jita in bij xi jech kwajat dhutsadh? Tkontsik ench: —An lej pulek takix romano.
Utsantsik tm ench: —Pos, ka pidha an lej pulek takix romano xowa in lujyal kin bachu ani ka pidha na Dios xowa Jaj in lujyal kin bachu.
Ani yab ejtowat ka walbindh kal xowa Jaj in ulu tin tamt an atiklbtsik; tokot labantsik tam tin acha xan ti tkon ani chamkantsik.
Ms tayl, kale ti chutb na Jess kal chb x i saduseotsik. An saduseotsik in ulal abal an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t ani jaxtm ti utsan ench na Jess:

—Oktsix, na Moiss tu jiltsmal dhutsadh ench: Max jun i inik ka chemech ani yab kin jila ni jun i chakam kal nin tomtal, nin kidhb jachan an inik, yejat ka tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb ani kin koy i chakamtsik abal ka kwajay jelti max in chakmil nin kidhb xi chemnek.
Pos alwaich, twiik ti kwajat bk i kwitltsik in kidhbkitsik. Nin jidhtal tomkin, por chemech an yab in jila ni jun in chakmil.
Nin chabtal tomkin kal an chemtsidh mmlb, por chemech jeye ani yab in jila ni jun in chakmil.
Tomkin jeye nin oxtal kal jachan an chemtsidh mmlb por yab jeye in koy in chakmil. Anchan tin taja ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik, chemechtsik por yab in jila ni jun in chakmil.
Tayl, chemech jeye an mmlb.
Tam ka ejechtsik ti t, kal jowa an kwitl ti neech ti tomiklb jachan an mmlb abal ejtal xi bk an kwitltsik tomkink kal jachan an mmlb?
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tech ti kayl, an iniktsik ani an mmlbtsik u tomkinal.
Tam kin bajaw xowki neech ka ejdh ti t an chemlomtsik xi takudh kal na Dios abal ka kwajch malill i kij t walki, yabich neech ti tomkinaltsik nibal neech ti pidhnb xita abal ka tomkin,
pos, yabich neech ka chemechtsik. Jajtsik neech ka kwajay jelti an tokat abatwletsik ani u chakmlbichtsik kal na Dios abal ejnekichtsik ti t.

Ani kal tin kwenta max an chemlomtsik u ejel ti t, yabxe jayki a ajymaltsik bin dhuslbil na Moiss xan ti tawn kal na Dios ban kidhadh te xi kwajat ti tal, tam ti utsan ench?: “Nan tin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.”
Na Dios, yab in Diosil i chemlomtsik; na Dios, in Diosil xi ejattsik; pos abal Jaj, ejtal kwajat ejat.
Utsan tm ench kal taltsik an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb: —Oktsix, alwaich xan ta ulu.
Ani yabich ms xita kwajay ti konkomix ni jun xata.
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Jantki tin ulal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios ke an Kristo u chakmlb kal an pulek takix Dabid?
Pos na Dabid in ulu jeye ench xon ti dhutsadh nin ajatlbiltsik: An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt,
asta ke Nan tu tantsi xi ti atl.”
Pos max na Dabid in bijiy jeye tin Ajtik, tm, yab tokotki in kidhtal.
Kal ejtal an atiklbtsik ti kwajat ti axnal tam ti na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik:

—Ka koytsik i kwenta kal xowa in tajl an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, yab ka tajatsik xan ti jajtsik in tajl. Jajtsik in kulbetnl ka xechin kal in jochdha xekt ani in kulbetnltsik ka chapndh kal yantam i kaknaxtalb. In kulbetnltsik jeye ka buxkan ban ultalb koytalbtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani xon tu tajnal i kapch.
Jajtsik, in kntsal tin kim an chemtsidh mmlbtsik; ani abal ka utsantsik ke jaj i alwa iniktsik, in tajl i nakdha lb. Jajtsik, jaich xi neech kin bachu ms pakdha an yajtsiktalb.
Na Jess kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios in tell xan ti an tumnladh iniktsik in balyal an tumn bin bl an pikbantsixtalb.
In chuu jeye xan ti jun i chojontl chemtsidh mmlb tin baliy taja chb i tsitsik tipax tumn xi yab in lej jalbl
ani in ulu ench na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke jech an chojontl chemtsidh mmlb, ms ja yn in pidhna k xi keettsik;
pos xi keettsik tokot in pidhnl xowa yabich in yntsal; por an mmlb kal in chojontltal, in pidhna ejtal xowa ta tin kool abal kin watna kl na kts.

Taltsik kwajat in tilltsik an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulaltsik abal labidh tajat an tujubtsik xi kl ti tajadh ani ejtal xowakich xi pidhnats ti pikbaxtalb. Tam ti na Jess in acha anchan, in ulu ench:
—Neech kin bajaw i kij, tam ejtal jech xowa a chutaltsik neech ka pakwat ani yab neech ka jilkon ni jun i tujub tbx.
Konyat tm na Jess: —Oktsix, jowki neech ka tmun jech? Jantom exl neech ka wachin tam neech ka tmunich jech?

Na Jess in ulu ench: —Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta ani yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik. Pos yn neech ka tschtsik kin kambixna nu bij ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Nanich nin Kristo, exomich in bajwal an pakwenib.” Por yab ka wwnatsik.
Tam ka achatsik exom i pjxtalb, yab ki jikeytsik; pos jech kool ka tmun okox, por jachan i kij yabl neech ka ulich an pakwenib.
In ntsi kin ulu ench: —An atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jun i pulek chabl, neech ti pjx kal an atiklbtsik xu kwajltsik pl chabl; ani jun i pulek takix, neech ti pjx kal keet i pulek takix.
Neech ka lwkin an chabl, neech ka wachin i kanab, neech ka wachin i yawlchtsik tki tki, neech ka wachin i kakadh telomtalb walki ani yn i exltsik.

Por tam yabl watenek jech, neech ki yakwantsik ani neech ki atantsik. Neech ki jntsik ta ljundhb ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, neech ki balyattsik ban wikaxte, neech ki jntsik tin tamt an pakdha takix ani tin tamt an pakdha awiltalb kal Nanki tu kwenta.
Anchan, neech ka ejtotsik ti kin tila.
Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax okox xan ti neech ki tkon abal ka lootsik tab,
pos Nan neech tu pidhatsik ti tilab ani ti chalab xan ti ki tkon abal ni jun xita xi ti atltsik, yab kin ejto ti ki tomnatsik.
Por taltsik xi tattsik, neech ka pidhn kal nin ttatsik, taltsik kal nin kidhb, taltsik kal nin exlowl ani taltsik kal nin jab. Neech ki chemdh taltsik xi tattsik
ani neech ki atantsik kal Nanki tu kwenta kal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom;
por yab neech ka kibdhatsik ni jun a xil xa kool ba na k.
Max ka kuxuytsik ejtal jech, neech ka bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Tam ka chuutsik abal an bitsow xi Jerusaln wilidhich tu kyb kal an soldadotsik, ka chobna abal kunatich i kij neech ka pakwat.
Jachan i kij, xi kwajattsik Judea, yejat ka kaletsik ti chinkonal ban chnlom; xi kwajattsik ban bitsow Jerusaln, ka kaletsik taja ani xi kwajattsik bin ale, yab ka witsiytsik ban bitsow.
Abal jachan i kij, mapal yajtsiktalb neech ka wachin, pos anchan neech ka tmun jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab.

Chojontl in chubl an mmlbtsik xi kwajat kodh o u tsutsdhom ti tsitsik chakam jachan i kij! Pos jachan i kij, neech ka wachin jun i pulek yajtsiktalb tech ti chabl ani neech ka pidhan jun i pulek yajtsiktalb an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom.

Taltsik neech ka chemdh ban pjxtalb ani xi keettsik neech ka jn wikats tki tki ban pl chabl abal ka tajantsik ti jolib. An atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo neech ti takixtsik ban bitsow xi Jerusaln ani neech kin atax tajtsi ejtal xowakich asta kin bajaw xowki neech ka kubdhtsik ti takix.
Jachan i kij, neech ka wachin i exltsik ba na kts, ba na ch ani ba na ttsik; tech ti chabl an atiklbtsik neech ka ukpindh ani neech ka jikeytsik tam kin acha ti bososl an ja ban pujal ani ti mlk.
Neech ka puteytsik kal an jkib tam kin chalpay xanty neech ka tmun tech ban kayl; pos asta an pakdha chplb xi kwajat walki neech ka yoywat.
Neech tm kin chutat, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik tam in tl ba jun i tokow kal nu chp ani kal nu labidh tokt.
Tam ka tujch ti tmnal jech xowa in kwajat tu utsltsik, ka likedhatsik tab ani ki kulb, pos kunatich i kij neech ki lowattsik.
Utsantsik jeye jech an ti junbaxtalb: —Ka telatsik in akan an igo o keet i te.
Tam ka chuutsik exomich ti eblinal nin xekl, a chobichtsik abal exomich ti kunel an kakal kij.
Anchan jeye, tam ka chuchtsik abal exomich ti tmnal xowa in kwajat tu utsl, ka chalpaytsik abal kunatich i kij neech ka tujey ti takix na Dios.
Tsubax tu utsltsik ke ejtal jech neech ka tmun okox ani tm neech ka chemech an atiklbtsik xi xo kwajat ejat jech i kij.
An walki ani an chabl neech ka wixk, por xowa u ulal, anchan neech ka tmun.
Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab tokotki ka chalpm ta kapul, ta uchal ani xowa a kulbetnltsik tajat tech ti kayl abal tam kin bajaw jachan an kij yab ki yakwantsik i ukpidh,
jelt xan tu yakwnal jun xita kal jun i paltsixtalb, pos anchan ti neech ka ulich jachan an kij ba ejtal xu kwajltsik putlki tech an kayl.

Ki kwajaytsik echeki i tojojodh, ki lantsik echeki abal ka ejto ka jeka ejtal jech an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka watey ani ka ejto ki uteytsik kal ni jun i jkib tu tamt tam kin tsch jun Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
Na Jess u oktsix tam kij ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani tam ka jikwchinich u kalel ban chn xin bij Olibos abal ka koych taja.
Tsudhey ka tsudhey u ulel dhajawe an atiklbtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios abal kin achatsik xanty in ulal na Jess.
Tam ti jachan i kij, exomich ti kunel an ajib xowki tu tajnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye abal ka kapat junax kal an borrego xu chemdhb tam exom an ajib xu bijyb paskwa.
Nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin chemdha chinatki na Jess kom in chejnltsik an atiklb.
Ochich tm an lej atax bin itsch na Judas xu bijyb jeye Iskariote, jech na Judas, jaich jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik.
Na Judas kale kin chuu an oklek pletsik ani xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, kwin kal jajtsik ani in utsa xan ti neech kin pidhatsik an ta Jess abal kin chemdha.
Jajtsik kulbtsik ani utsan na Judas abal neech ka pidhan ti tumn;
na Judas in tokoy ani in tuju tm kin aliy xan ti kin uwa abal kin pidhna na Jess tam yab waach yn i atiklbtsik.
In bajaw in ktsjil an ajib xowki tu tajnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye abal ka kapat junax kal an wiyadh borrego xu chemdhb abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
Na Jess in aba tm na Pedro ani na Juan ani in utsatsik ench: —Ki kaletsik ka tojojoy an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
In konoytsik ench na Jess: —Jn ta l ku kale ki tojojoy?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tam ki ochichtsik ban bitsow, neech ka ela jun i inik xin nedhl jun mul i ja. Ka wwnatsik asta ban at xon ti ka ochich
ani ka utsa ench an dhabal at: “An Oktsix in l kin chobna xon ti kwajat an alt xon ti neech kin kapu an wiyadh borrego junax kal nin exbaliltsik kal tin kwenta an paskwa.”
Neech tm ti ki ltsitsik jun i alt plek ba jun i pntsx at xi kwajat tojojodhich; ka tojojoy taja an tokat kapxnich.
Kaletsik tm ani anchan tin ela ejtal xan ti usnktsik kal na Jess ani in lejkchtsik tm an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa.
Tam tin bajch an ora, na Jess ani nin abatwlejiltsik buxkan ban mesa.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —U lenmal tajat ku kapu kal tattsik jech an kapnl abal tin kwenta an paskwa tam yabl in chemdhats!
Pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku ajbna ms an paskwa, asta tam ka tjanich xan ti yejat xon tu takix na Dios.
In tyna tm jun i lejab baltsidh ti yajtsik uxnl, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in ulu ench: —Ka bachutsik jech ani ka ucha wetsik wetsik,
pos tu utsltsik ke yabich neech kin witsiy ku uxtsi tin jall an uba asta tam u takixich na Dios.

Tayl, in tyna jeye an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in peja, in pidha nin exbaliltsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Jech jaich nu tul xi neech ku pidhna ka chemdh abal tattsik ta alwabl. Ka tajltsik jech abal ti kin chalpay.

Anchan jeye tin taja kal an yajtsik uxnl tam ti okonichtsik ti kapul ani in ulu ench: —Jech an yajtsik uxnl, jaich nu xichl xi neech ku wakla abal ku jalbiy kl na walabtsik. Jaich an t lejkintalb xi neech ku taja abal tattsik ta alwabl.
Por xo, an inik xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh, tech kwajat ti kapul kal Nan ban mesa.
Pos Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, kool ku tamu xan tin bijtsidh ke yejat ku watna; por chojontl in chubl an inik xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
Tujey tm ti knx jajkitsik ench: —Jita awil xi neech an ti pidhnax?
Tayl, an exbaltsik kwajay ti kwlx abal in l kin chobnatsik xitam j na ms ultalb xi jajtsik.
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —An pakdha takix xi tech ti kayl, chapiktsik tajat in takyal nin bitswil ani an oklektsik xi taja, u bijyb ti alwa iniktsik.
Por tattsik yab yejat ka taja anchan, tokot ka tajatsik ench: Xita ms uluts xi tattsik, yejat ka kwajay jelti xi ms tayl ani xu takix, yejat ka kwajay jelti xu tjontsix.
Pos jita j xi ms uluts, xu buxkanal ti kapul ban mesa o xu tjontsix? Yabxe jaich xu buxkanal ti kapul ban mesa? Por Nan in kwajat kal tattsik jelti xu tjontsix.
Tattsik echeki tin juniknmal ani yab i kuxkulmadhtsik tam tu watna xowakich i yajtsiktalb.
Jaxtm, neech tu kwajbatsik ta takix jelt xan ti nu Tta tin kwajbmal tin takix
abal ki kapchtsik ani ki uchchtsik ba nu mesajil xon ti Nan neech tin takix. Neech jeye ki buxkantsik ba tokat kwajtalb abal ka ljundha nin kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.
In ulu jeye ench an Ajtiklb: —Simn, Simn, ka acha, an lej atax in konymal i awiltalb abal ti ki tiniytsik jelt xan tu tinyb an trigo;
por tu kontsintsmalich abal yab ka jila ta belom. Por tam ka chalpay abal yab alwa xowa a taja ani ki witsiy jun kal Nan, ka tolmiy na at kidhbtsik abal ti kin belatsik tokotki Nan.
Utsan tm ench kal na Simn: —Ajtik, in kwajat tojojodh abal kin kale junax kal Tat ban wikaxte ani asta abal kin chemdh junax kal Tat.
Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Pedro, tsubax tu utsl ke xo tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tam tu abatsik ka tila an alwa tilab ani yab a jna i morrl, nibal in bl i tumn, nibal a pajabtsik, a yntsixe xata? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Ni jun xata.
Utsantsik tm ench: —Por xo yab anchan, max jun xita in kool i morrl, kin jna ani kin jna jeye in bl i tumn. Xita yab in kool i macht, kin nuju nin kk xekt abal kin chaay.

Pos tu utsltsik ke kool ka tmun kal Nan jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Ajyat jeye jelti max yab i alwa inik.” Pos ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh kal Nan tu kwenta, kool ka tmun anchan.
In ulutsik tam ench: —Ajtik, j kwajat chb i macht. Na Jess tkon ench: —Lejatich.
Kale tm na Jess, kale ban chn xu bijyb Olibos jelt xan tin ujnmalich in tajl echeki ani junikn kal nin exbaliltsik.
Tam ti ulichtsik taja, in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ki lan abal yab ki tatsik kal an lej atax.
Tayl wm tm na Jess ba nin exbaliltsik, nin owl jaich xna jelti xon tu kwajlanal jun i tujub tam ka kwin kal jun xita ani tudhlan taja ti l.
Ench tin ulu: —Tta, max Tat a l ka chuu yab ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ka ejto ti kin wixkintsi; por yab ka tjan xan ti Nan u l, ka tjan xan ti Tat a l.
Xalkan tm jun i tokat abatwle xi tl walki abal ka pidhan kl ti chplb.
Ani kom plek tajat an yajtsiktalb xi kwajat in achl na Jess, ms chapikich u l ani nin chakb jykijich i xich u tuknal chabl.
Tam ti chakay xon ti kwajat an ti l, witsiy xon ti kwajat an exbaltsik ani u wayaltsik tin ela kom yab in ejtmaltsik kin kuxuy an tepintalb.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jantki ta wayaltsik? Ki chakay ani ki lan abal yab ki ttsik kal an lej atax.
Bl kwajat ti kw na Jess, tam ti ulich yn i atiklbtsik. Okox ti tl xu bijyb ta Judas xi jaich jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik ani utey ba na Jess abal kin chuchbay.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Judas, kal jun i chuchbaxtalb ti neech tin pidhna kin chemdh Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik?
Xi ta ti kwajattsik kal na Jess, tam tin chuu xanty exom ti tmnal, konoxintsik ench: —Ajtik, ki tomnaxe kal an macht?
Jn ti b xi jajtsik in taktsi tin tojnlil an oklek pletsik, in taktsi tin ejt xuchun.
Por na Jess in ulu ench: —Jila kwajat, yab ka tajatsik anchan. In taktsi tm na Jess tin xuchun nin tjontsixil an oklek pletsik ani in jeldhantsi.

Tayl in utsatsik tm ench an oklek pletsik, nin oklkiltsik an belkol at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani nin oklkil an judotsik xi ulnektsik kl ti yakwnal: —Jantki ta tsinektsik kal i te, kal i macht abal ti kin yakwa, jelti max neech ka yakwatsik jun i kw?

Tsudhey ka tsudhey in kwajinek kal tattsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani yab tin takmaltsik; por xo in bajmalich na orajiltsik abal ka taja xowa na l ani xowki an lej atax, xu takix ban jikwaxtalb neech ka walk kin xalka nin awiltal.
Yakwan tm na Jess ani jn bin kim in oklkil an pletsik. Na Pedro wwnaxin wki.
Bin kim in oklkil an pletsik, jokp i kamal chejel elb, buxkantsik malill ban kamal ani na Pedro buxkan jeye taja kal jajtsik.
Tmki jachan, jun i mmlb xu tojnal ba jachan an at chutat kl na Pedro buxl bin wl an kamal; tam ti chutat, teloloyat alwa ani in ulu ench an mmlb: —Jech an inik junax jeye ti xeech kal na Jess.
Por na Pedro in ulu ke yab tsubax. Ench tin ulu: —Mmlb, yab u exll.
Ms tayl, chutat jun kal keet ani utsan ench: —Tat jaych teye a kidhtal. Por na Pedro in ulu ench: —Paylomlb, yab u kidhtal.
Jun i ora xna ms tayl, in witsko jun jun xita kin ulu ench: —Tsubax kejle, jech an inik ta jeye ti kwajat junax kal na Jess, pos jaj Galilea jeye ti tl.
In ulu tm ench na Pedro: —Jab, yab u chob xanty i kwajat a till. Tmki jachan, tam ti na Pedro bl kwajat ti kw, dhjan an pekel.
Chawkin tm an Ajtiklb ani teloloyat na Pedro. Na Pedro in chalpay tm xanty usnk kal an Ajtiklb: “Xo, tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.”
Kale tam na Pedro ani ukin tajat.
Na Jess u labdhnb ani u chawb kal an iniktsik xi kl ti belkmte.
U putsuntsb tin wal, u chawb ani u usnal ench: —Ti ku utsa xita ti chaaw!
Ani yn i odhbijixtalb u usnal.
