Tam ti tsudhey, junkun nin oklkiltsik an judotsik, nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb. Jn na Jess tin tamt an Junkulom Awiltalb ani taja, konyat ench:
—Ti ku utsa, tatxe ni Kristo, xi takudh kal na Dios abal ta takix? Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Max tu utsatsik abal Nan, yab neech ti kin beltsi.
Max tu konoytsik xata, yab neech ti kin tkoytsik nibal neech ti kin walkatsik.
Por asta xo, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik neech kin buxkan bin ejt na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
Tayl konoxin tm ejtaltsik ench: —Tatxe p tm ni Chakmlb kal na Dios? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik a ulal abal anchan.
In ulutsik tm ench: —Yabich ms i yntsal i lnaxtsik. Pos i achaich xan ti Jaj tu kw.
Chakaytsik tm ejtal ani in jnatsik na Jess tin tamt na Pilato.

Tam ti tajaich tin kooltsik, tujey tm kin lnatsik ench: —I elmal abal jech an inik in pidhkwliyal an atiklbtsik xi waw i kidhtal. In ulal ke yab yejat ki pidha ti jalbixtalb an lej pulek takix romano ani in ulal jeye ke Jajich nu Kristo, jun i Pulek Takix, xi takudh kal na Dios.
Konyat tm ench kal na Pilato: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik? Na Jess tkon ench: —Tat a ulal abal anchan.
Na Pilato in utsa tm ench an oklek pletsik ani an atiklbtsik: —Yab u eltsal ni jun i walastalb jech an inik.
Por jajtsik in ntsal kin ulu ms kawidh ench: —Exom in pjxlindhl ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Judea. Tujey ban chabl xi Galilea ani xo techich jeye exom in tajl.
Tam ti na Pilato in acha jech, in konoytsik max jech an inik Galilea u kwajl.
Tam tin acha abal Galilea u kwajl, in abna ba na Erodes, an pulek awiltalb xi Galilea, xi ta jeye ti kwajat Jerusaln jachan i kij.
Tam ti na Erodes in chuu na Jess, kulb tajat; pos na Erodes kejle owenekich in lenl kin exla, kom in achl u tilnal ani in l kin chuu tam in tajl jun i labidh labandhaxtalb.
Yn xata konyat na Jess kal na Erodes, por yab in tkoy ni jn.
T jeye ti kwajattsik taja in oklkil an pletsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will an takixtalb, xi kl tu lnb chapik na Jess.
Tm, na Erodes ani nin soldadojiltsik yabtsik in kakna na Jess. Ani abal kin labdhnatsik, in xeketliy kal i alwa kudhkum jelti xin ynl jun i pulek takix. Tayl in abna jun ka jn na Jess ba na Pilato.
Asta tam ti jachan i kij, na Pilato ani na Erodes in koytsik i junaxtalb; pos tam ti kwajatwiik, u txtsik.
Na Pilato in junku tm nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, an awiltalbtsik xu takix ba jachan an bitsow, an atiklbtsik

ani in utsatsik ench: —Tattsik tin tsidhantsi jech an ti inik, a ulaltsik abal in pidhkwliyal an atiklbtsik, por nan u ljundhmalich ta tamttsik ani yab u eltsi ni jun i walastalb xi tattsik a utsl in tajm.
Nibal kal na Erodes yab eltsin, pos jich jun tu witsbantsmal. A tellichtsik abal yab in tajmal ni jun xata xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml.
Neech ku ulu ka kwadhan ani tm neech ku walka.
Tam exom an ajib, na Pilato in ujnmal kin walka jun i wiknl.
Por ejtal tujeytsik ti dhajnal kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha jachan an inik! Ani ka walka na Barrabs!
Jech na Barrabs, balidh ban wikaxte abal chemdhaxnk ba jun i pjextalb xin tajmal tam tin tomna an awiltalbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow.
Na Pilato in lwiik kin walka na Jess ani in tawna jun an atiklbtsik.
Por jajtsik ms kawidh tin ulutsik ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te!

Na Pilato in witsko jun tin oxtsl kin utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Jantom walastalb in tajmal? Nan yab u eltsal ni jun in walab xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml. Neech ku ulu ka kwadhan ani tm neech ku walka.
Por jajtsik in ntsi kin konoy abal ka chemdh na Jess pajkidh ban peltsidh te; kom kawidh u dhajnal an atiklbtsik ani nin oklkiltsik an pletsik, exbantsat xowa nin konyaltsik.
In tokoy tm na Pilato kin taja xan tu kontsinal,
in pidhna na Jess abal ka tajtsin xan tin konyal an atiklbtsik ani in walka an inik xu kontsinal. Jech an inik xi walk, ta ti kwajat ti wiknl abal chemdhaxnk ba jun i pjextalb.

Tam tu nedhbich na Jess abal ka pajkiyat ban peltsidh te, yakwan jun i inik xu kwajl Sirene xu bijyb ta Simn. Jech na Simn u witslich bin ale, tajan kin kitna an peltsidh te ani ka kale in kitm in aykm na Jess.
Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wewkmte ani yn i mmlbtsik u uknal ani u tepinaltsik kal tin kwenta na Jess.
Por teloloyattsik kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Mmlbtsik xi kwajl Jerusaln, yab ti kin ukintsi, ka ukintsi tab ani na chakmiltsik.
Pos neech kin bajaw i kij tam neech ka ulwat ench: “Kijidh tajat abal an mmlbtsik xi yab u knal, xi yab jayki in wachiymal ani nibal tsutsudhommadhtsik.”
An atiklbtsik neech tm kin tuju kin ulutsik ench: u kwajlanalak an pakdha chn abal ti ku tuchiy. Ani neech jeye kin ulutsik ench: u kwajlanalak an tsitsik chn abal ti ku china.
Pos max Nan, xi yab in walbidh in tajtsinal jech, janty neech ka tajtsin xi walbidh?
T jeye tu nedhb chb i atax iniktsik abal ka chemdh junax kal na Jess.
Tam ti ulichtsik ban chabl xu bijyb tin Beklk in k i chemlom inik, pajkiyatich tm na Jess ban peltsidh te. Pajkiyat jeye ba peltsidh te chablam an atax iniktsik, jn tin ejt na Jess ani jn tin kwatab.

Tam ti exomich ti pajkiyb na Jess ban peltsidh te, in ulu ench: —Tta, ka pakwlantsitsik, pos yab in chob xanty exom in tajltsik. An soldadotsik, abal kin wlchxnantsi tin kudhkmil na Jess, ubtintsik abal kin chuu xita kin lujuy kin ta.

An atiklbtsik ta ti kwajat taja ti telom, asta u labdhnb na Jess kal an awiltalbtsik ani in ulaltsik ench: —In lomal keettsik, kin loo jeye xo tinb max tsubax lejtal Jajich nu Kristo xi takudh kal na Dios.
U labdhnb jeye na Jess kal an soldadotsik, u uteltsik kin pidha kin ucha ti jiliy yajtsik uxnl
ani in utsltsik ench: —Max Tatich lejtal nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik, ka loo xo tab!
Kwajb bin k an peltsidh te jun i dhuslab xi kwajat dhutsadh griego, latn ani ebreo, xin ulal ench: “Jech jaich nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
Jn ti b an atax iniktsik xi ta ti kwajat jeye pajkidh ban peltsidh te, u odhbijix ench: —Max Tatich lejtal ni Kristo, ka loo tab ani ti ku loo weye!
Por na jn in kwiya xi odhbijxin, in utsa ench: —Yab a jiknl a Dios, maske i kwajat teye a tamtm jaychki an yajtsiktalb?
Waw in tomnl wa ki bachu jech an yajtsiktalb kom exom i jalbiyal an walastalb xi tajmal; por jech an inik, yab in tajmal ni jun xata walats.
In ulu tm ench an inik xi kwiyxin: —Jess, ti kin chalpay neye tam ki tujch ta takix.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl ke xoich neech ki kwajay junax kal Nan ban kijidhtalb xi walki.
Tam ti chejelich xna a kts jikwchin ani putl an chabl jilkon jikwax asta x i wkal.
Na kts yab tajkan ani xlan an tolow kudhkum xi ta ti palat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Chab peje ti jilkon.
In ulu tm kawidh na Jess ench: —Tta, ka bachu nu ejattal. Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, chemchich tm.
Tam ti an oklek soldado romano in chuu ejtal xanty tmun, in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios ench: —Tsubax lejtal, jech jaich jun i lujat inik.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat ani in chuutsik xanty tmun, kaletsik tm ani in pewyaltsik nin tamt itsch kal tin kwenta an tepintalb.
Por ejtal nin jabtsik na Jess ani an mmlbtsik jeye xi juniknaxnktsik asta Galilea, jilkontsik wki in tell ejtal xowa tmun.
T ti kwajat jun i inik xi alwa inik tajat ani lujat xu bijyb ta Jos. Jech an inik u kwajl ban bitsow Arimatea, an bitsow xi kwajat Judea. Jaj u kidhtalb jeye kal nin Junkulom Awiltalbil an judotsik.
Jech na Jos, kwajat jeye in aytsm xowki neech kin tujch ti takix na Dios ani jaxtm jaj yab in kldhl ti alwa xowa in taja an Junkulom Awiltalb.
Kale kin chuu na Pilato ani in kontsi an tin tul na Jess.
Tam tin pabmich ban peltsidh te, in boliy kal jun i dhak kudhkum ani in kwajbaich tm ban jlimtalb xi ta ti cholkadh ba jun i tujub chn, xon ti yab jayki jolidh bl ni jun xita.
Tam ti jachan, jaich nin ktsjil xowki tu tojojoyb ejtal xowa neech ka yntsin tin ktsjil an koyxnich, pos jun tsudhelom, jachich nin ktsjil an koyxnich.
An mmlbtsik xi tsinek junax kal na Jess asta Galilea, kaletsik, in chuu an jlimtalb ani in chuutsik jeye xan ti tapantsat an tin tul na Jess.
Tam ti witsiytsik tin kim, in lejkiytsik i niwiytalb, i majuxtalb ani koychtsik tin ktsjil an koyxnich, jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb ke yejat ka tajan.
Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, an mmlbtsik xin juniknmaltsik na Jess, kale jun ban jlimtalb dhajawe ani in jnatsik i niwiytalb xin lejkiymal. Junikntsik jeye kal keet i mmlbtsik.
Tam ti ulichtsik ban jlimtalb, in chuu abal an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb, wkodh.
Ochichtsik, por yab in ela nin tul na Jess.
Jikeytsik tajat, ke nibalich in chalpayal xanty kin taja. Jun jiktowle tin chuutsik chb i iniktsik kubutsik tin wl jajtsik, xeketlidh kal i chaxixl kudhkum.
Kom an mmlbtsik jikey tajat, kutpan asta chabl; por utsantsik ench kal jachan an iniktsik: —Jantki ta ayal ban chemlomtsik xi kwajat ejat?
Yab waach tech, ejnekich ti t. Ka chalpay xan ti utsatsik tam ti Jaj bl kwajat Galilea,
tam tin ulu ke Jaj, xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik neech ka pidhn ban walablom iniktsik, neech ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani tin xlb a kts neech ka ejech ti t.
An mmlbtsik in chalpay tm xanty in ulmal na Jess
ani tam ti witschtsik xon ti kwajat xi lajujn an abatwletsik ani ejtal xi ms, in tiltsitsik ejtal xowa in chuu.
Xita kl ti ltsintsik jech an ti tilab an abatwletsik, jaich na Mara Magdalena, na Juana, na Mara nin nna na Jakobo ani xi keettsik jeye an mmlbtsik.
Por an abatwletsik yab in taja ti kij xowa in ulu an mmlbtsik ani yab in beltsi.

Por na Pedro kale adhik ban jlimtalb. Tam ti ulich taja ani in tela alt, in chuu abal yab waach nin tul na Jess, tokot in chuu ta ti kwajat an dhak kudhkum xi kl ti boltsidh an tin tul na Jess. Na Pedro labnk tajat ti witsiy tin kim tam tin chuu xanty tmnk.
Jaychki jachan a kts, chb xu belnal kl na Jess neech ti bl abal neechtsik ban kwentsal xin bij Emas, nin owl, jaich xna lajujn i kilmetro abal Jerusaln.
In tilltsik ti neech ejtal xanty tmun kal tin kwenta na Jess.
Ani lejat neechtsik in till ani in kwlxnl jech, utukntsik kal na Jess ani beley junax kal jajtsik.
Por maske in chutaltsik, yab u pidhnal kin exla max jaich na Jess.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty p a tilltsik? Ani jantki ta tepinaltsik?
Jn ti b xi jajtsik, xu bijyb ta Cleofas, tkon ench: —Ejtal an atiklbtsik in chob xanty tmnk Jerusaln jech i kij, tokot Tat xi taja teye ta kwajat yab a chobnmal?
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Janty p tmnk? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Na Jess xi Nasaret pidhn kal nin oklkil an pletsik ani kal ni awiltalbiltsik abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Jech na Jess, jaich jun i tiltsix xin kool tajat i awiltalb kal xowa in tajl ani kal xowa xin ulal tin tamt na Dios ani tin tamt jeye an atiklbtsik.
Waw i chalpaymal max Jajich xi neech ti ku loo ejtal waw xu israelita ani xo watenekich x a kts ti chemdhats.
Por taltsik i mmlbtsik xi waw i kidhtal tu labandhmal, pos kalnektsik dhajawe ban jlimtalb
ani kom yab in eltsi an tin tul na Jess, tam ti witsiytsik tu utsa abal in chumal i tokat abatwletsik xi usnktsik kl abal na Jess ejnek ti t.
Tayl kale jeye chb x ni kidhtaltsik ban jlimtalb ani anchan tin elatsik xan tin ulmal an mmlbtsik, por yab in chuutsik na Jess.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabtsik tajat a ejtowal ka exbay ani tojlb tajat ka belatsik xowa in ulmal an tiltsixtsik!
Yabxe in ulmal an tiltsixtsik ke kool kin watna okox ejtal jech an Kristo abal tayl kin bachu nin kaknabl?
Tujey tm ti wiltsinaltsik ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab xi kal Jaj tin kwenta, in tuju kal nin dhutsadh wil na Moiss ani tayl kal ejtal nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik.
Tam ti ulich ban kwentsal xon tin ulmal neechtsik, na Jess in wyna jelti max neech kin ntsi an bl.
Por in pakabdha abal ka jilkon jeye kal jajtsik, ench tin utsa: —Ki jilkon teye kal waw, pos dhamlich ani exomich ti jikwchinal. Ochich tm na Jess abal ka jilkon kal jajtsik.
Tam ti kwajatich buxutsik ban mesa, in tyna an pan, in lbtaja, in peja ani pidhantsik.
Tmki jachan, pidhanichtsik tm kin exla abal jaich na Jess xi ta ti kwajat kal jajtsik. Por Jaj yab ms chutat.
tsxintsik tm ench: —Yabxe tu kijidhmdhantsi ti itsch kal tin kwenta tam ti tl ti bl tu tiltsal ani tu wiltsal an ti Tokat Dhuslab?
Tmki jachan in tujutsik an bl abal ka witsiy Jerusaln. Tam ti ulichtsik, in ela junkunk xi lajujn an abatwletsik ani nin juniktsik.
Utsantsik ench xi chb: —Tsubax lejtal, an Ajtiklb ejnek ti t ani in xalkmal tinb abal ka chutat kal na Simn.
In tilatsik jeye tm xi chb xanty in tamm ti bl ani xan tin exlatsik na Jess tam tin peja an pan.
Bl kwajat in tilltsik jech, tam ti na Jess xalkan junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik ani chapndhomch ench: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh.
Jikeytsik tajat abal in chalpay max kwajat in telltsik jun i ejattalb.
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Jantki ta jikltsik? Jantki ta chalpaxtsik tajat ta itsch?
Ka telatsik nu kubak ani nu akan. Nan. Ti kin takatsik ani ti kin tela, jun i ejattalb yab in kool i tulek nibal i beklek jelt xan ta chutaltsik u kool.
Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, in lna nin kubak ani nin akan.
Por kom jajtsik yabl in bell max ejnek ti t abal u kulbltsik ani labnktsik tajat, utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —A kooltsikxe tech i kapnl?
Pidhan tm jun peje ti wiyadh tool ani jun peje ti tuyik kal i chiik,
in bachu ani kwajay kin kapu tin tamt jajtsik.

Tayl utsantsik ench: —Xowa u tamu, jaich xowa tu utsa tam ti bl in kwajat kal tattsik: ke kool ka tmun ejtal xan ti kwajat dhutsadh kal Nan tu kwenta ba nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, bin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik ani ban ajatlbtsik.
In pidhatsik tm ti chalab abal kin exbaytsik an Tokat Dhuslab
ani ench tin utsatsik: —Anchan ti kwajat dhutsadh, ke an Kristo, xi jaich Nanich, kool kin chemdh ani tin xlb a kts neech kin ejech ti t.

Kwajat jeye dhutsadh, ke kool ka tiltsin an atiklbtsik abal yejatich kin jilatsik ti walablom ani ti kin bela abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbiltsik kal na Dios. Jech an tiltsixtalb, Neech ka tujey Jerusaln ani tayl putlki an kayl neech ka tilan.
Tattsik yejat ka tila ejtal jech xowa a chumaltsik.
Ani Nan neech tu abtsitsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb xin ulmal neech ti ki abtsi an Ttalb. Por ki jilkontsik tech ban bitsow xi Jerusaln asta ka bachutsik nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb xi neech ka tsch walki.
Kldhtsik tm kal na Jess ba jachan an bitsow ani jntsik asta Betania, in dhaya tm nin kubak tekat na Jess ani lbtajantsik.
Tam tin lbtajaichtsik, wm kal jajtsik ani jnjich tm walki.
Tam ti okonichtsik kin kakna, u kulbltsik tajat ti witsiytsik Jerusaln,
echeki u kaleltsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.
Tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl, kejle Ja kwajatich jachan xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios; ani jachan nin Kwintal na Dios, kwajat kal na Dios ani jaich na Dios.
Pos tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl, Jaj kejle kwajatich kal na Dios.
Kal Jajki tin kwenta na Dios tin taja ejtal xowa waach; yab waach ni jun xata xowa yab tajadh kal Jajki tin kwenta.
Kal Jaj ti kwajat an t xechintalb ani jech an t xechintalb jaich an tajaxtalb abal an atiklbtsik.
Jech an tajaxtalb u tajbax ban jikwaxtalb ani an jikwaxtalb yab in ejtmal kin tepdha.
Wachin jun i inik xi abadh kal na Dios, xin bij ta Juan.
Jech na Juan, tsch jelti jun i ltsix abal kin lna jachan an tajaxtalb abal ejtaltsik ka belmch kal tin kwentaki xowa in lnl na Juan.
Na Juan yab jaj nu tajaxtalb; jaj jaich jun i ltsix xi abnk abal kin lna an tajaxtalb.
An lej tajaxtalb, xin tajbayal ejtal an atiklbtsik, u ulelich ti kwajat ban kayl.
Jachan xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios kwajatich ban kayl ani maske kal Jajki tin kwenta ti tajadh an kayl, yab exl kal xi kwajattsik ban kayl.
Tsch ban kayl xon ti kwajattsik xi Jaj in tajmal, por yab bachwat kal jajtsik.
Por ejtaltsik xita kl ti bachwat ani belan, pidhantsik ti awiltalb ka kwajay u chakmlb kal a Dios.
Yab in junwal jelti xu chakmlbtsik kal i ttalb xi tech ti kayl, xu wachinaltsik ti chakam kom anchanich ti jilnktsik o abal anchan tin kulbetna jun i inik; jajtsik u chakmlb kal a Dios.

Ani jachan xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios, wenkon ti inik ani kwajay kal waw, kal yantam i alwatalb ani i tsubaxtalb. I chutsmalich tin labidh tokt, xi jaich nin labidh tokt nin junkax Chakmil an Ttalb.
Na Juan jaich in till tam tin ulu ench: —Jech jaich xi nan tu tiltsmaltsik, tam tu ulu ke xi neech ka tsch tayl, kwajat ms ultalb k nan, kom Jaj kejlejich Ja kwajat tam ti nan yabl in waach.
Kal ejtal xowa Jaj in kool, i bachkuntsmalich yn tin lbtajaxtalbil kal tin kwentaki nin alwatal.
An takixtalb pidhan na Moiss abal kin lna, por an alwatalb ani an tsubaxtalb tsch kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo.
Yab jayki chuudh na Dios kal ni jun xita; tokot kal nin junkax Chakmil ti chuudh, xi kwajat junax kal an Ttalb ani jaich Jaj xi tu ltsmal abal ki exla an Ttalb.
An judotsik xi Jerusaln in aba i pletsik ani i lebitatsik ba na Juan abal kin konoy xitam j jeye jaj,
por na Juan in ulu tsubax ench: —Yab nan nin Kristo.
Konyat tm jun: —Tatxe p ni Elas, an tiltsix? Na Juan in ulu ench: —Yab nan. Konyat tm jun ench: —Tm, tatichxe p an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch? Ani jaj tkon ench: —Yaba.
Utsan tm ench: —Pos jita p teye? Kool ki jntsi jun i tsubaxtalb xi tu abmal. Janty p neech ti ku utsa kal tat ta kwenta?

Na Juan in tkoytsik ench: —Nanich xin tilmal an tiltsix Isaas tam tin ulu ench: Achat in kwintal jun xita ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh ani xu kw, in ulal kawidh ench: “Ka jnaichtsik jun i xechintalb alwa; abal anchan, ki kwajchtsik tojojodh tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb.”
Xi kalnektsik ti kw kal na Juan, abnk kal an fariseotsik.
Ani in konoytsik ench: —Tm, max yab tat ni Kristo, nibal i Elas, nibal an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch, jantki p tm ta pujax?
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Juan: —Nan tu pujyaltsik kal i ja, por kal tattsik ta kwajat jn xi yabtsik a exll.
Neech ka tsch tayl, por Jaj kwajat ms ultalb k nan. Nan yab xata u y nibal abal ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab.
Ejtal jech tmun ban chabl xin bij Betbara, xu jilkonal ejtsm kalel kts kal an walja Jordn, xon ti na Juan kwajat ti pjal.

Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Juan in chuu ti utel na Jess xon ti jaj kwajat ani in ulu ench na Juan: —Ka telatsik, jech jaich jelti nin borregojil na Dios xi neech ka pikb abal kin wkontsi tin walastalbil an atiklbtsik.
Jaj u till tin kwajat tam tu ulu ench: “Tayl neech ka tsch jun i inik xi ms ultalb k nan, abal kejle Ja kwajatich tam ti nan yabl in waach.”
Nan yab u exll xitam j jeye Jaj; por jaich tin pjal kal i ja abal ka exl kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel.
In ulu jeye ench na Juan: —Nan u chuu an Tokat Ejattalb ti pal walki jelti jun i kuku ani jilkon kal Jaj.

Nan yab u exll xitam j jeye Jaj; por xi tin abmal tin pjal kal i ja, tin utsa ench: “Tam ka chuu an Tokat Ejattalb ti pal ani ka jilkon ba jun xita, jachan jaich xi neech ti pjal kal an Tokat Ejattalb.”
Ani xo nan u chumalich ani u ulal ke jech jaich nin Chakmil na Dios.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, taja jun ti kwajat na Juan junax kal chb in exbaliltsik.
Ani tam tin chuu ta ti xeech na Jess, na Juan in ulu ench: —Ka telatsik, jech jaich jelti nin borregojil na Dios.
Chablam nin exbaliltsik na Juan in acha tam tin ulu jech ani in wwnatsik na Jess.
In tela tm na Jess tin kx, in chuu abal wewkmte ani in utsatsik ench: —Janty a ayaltsik? Jajtsik in utsa ench: —Oktsix, jn p teye i kwajl?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Jala ani neech ka chuutsik. Kaletsik tm ani in chuu xon tu kwajl na Jess. Jachan a kts jilkontsik kal Jaj abal tam ti jachan jaykich xna chich i wkal.
Jn ti b an exbaltsik xin achmaltsik xan tin ulu na Juan ani in wwnmal na Jess, jaich na Andrs, nin kidhb na Simn Pedro.
Na Andrs, kale okox kin aliy nin kidhb Simn ani in utsa ench: —I elmal an Mesas —jech in l kin ulu, an Kristo.
Na Andrs in jna tm na Simn xon ti kwajat na Jess ani tam ti na Jess in chuu na Simn, in utsa ench: —Tat i Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, por neech ki bijyat ta Sefas —jech in l kin ulu, Pedro.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Jess in lena ka kale ban chabl xi Galilea, in ela na Felipe ani in utsa ench: —Ti kin wwna.
Jech na Felipe u kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Betsayda, xon tu kwajltsik jeye na Andrs ani na Pedro.

Na Felipe in ela na Natanael ani in utsa ench: —I elmal an inik xu tilnal kal an tiltsixtsik ani kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jech an inik jaich na Jess, xu chakmlb kal na Jos xu kwajl ban bitsow Nasaret.
Na Natanael in utsa ench na Felipe: —Awxe neech kin ejto ka wachin jun xata alwa Nasaret? Tkoyat ench kal na Felipe: —Jala ani wana ka chuu.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu ke na Natanael exomich ti kunel, in ulu ench kal tin kwenta na Natanael: —J tl jun i inik xi tsubax lejtal tu israelita ani yab u kambix.
Konyat tm ench kal na Natanael: —Jn p tm tin exlmal? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan kejle tu chumalich tam ti yabl i kanidh kal na Felipe, tam ta kwajat tin l in akan an igo.
Utsan tm ench kal na Natanael: —Oktsix, Tat i Chakmlb kal a Dios; Tat nin Pulek Takxal an israelitatsik.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tin bell abalki tu utsa ke tu chumal tin l in akan an igo? Pos neech ka chuu tayl xanty ms pakdha k jech.

In ulu jeye ench na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ka chuutsik japidh an walki ani neech ka chuutsik ti pal ani ti kadhl nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios, ba Nanich xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik.
x a kts tayl, wachin jun i tomkixtalb ban bitsow Kan, xu taknal ban chabl xi Galilea ani taja ti kwajat nin nna na Jess.
Na Jess ani nin exbaliltsik kanidhtsik jeye ba jachan an tomkixtalb.
Taley an yajtsik uxnl ani utsan ench na Jess kal nin nna: —Yabich in kooltsik i yajtsik uxnl.
Por tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, janty kool ki chuu waw kal jech? Yabl in bajmal xowki neech ku xalka xitam j neye Nan.
Por utsan ench kal nin nna na Jess xi kwajattsik ti tojojl: —Ka tajatsik ejtal xowa Jaj ti ki utsa.
T tu kyb taja akak i pakdha balixtalb xi tajadh kal i tujub xu baltsinal ti ja, xin ynl an judotsik kin takaxna abal kin toko tinb. Xi jun i yejche balixtalb in knl che inik o bo inik litro i ja.
Na Jess in utsa ench xi kwajattsik ti tojojl: —Ka tsutsiy kal i ja jachan an pakdha balixtalb. In tsutsiytsik tm alwa
ani utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka jotiytsik xo w ani ka jntsi an tojom ajib. Ani anchan tin tajatsik.

An tojom ajib in leka an ja xi wenkonkich ti yajtsik uxnl, maske yab in chob xon tu tsidhb; tokot in chob xi kwajattsik ti tojojl, kom jajtsik in jotymal an ja. An tojom ajib in kaniy tm an tomkinl inik

ani in utsa ench: —Ejtalki in pidhnl okox an alwa yajtsik uxnl ani tam ynich in uchm an ajblomtsik, tm neech kin pidhna an yajtsik uxnl xi yab lej alwa. Por tat a tapmal an alwa yajtsik uxnl abal ka pidhna tayl.
Jech xowa in taja na Jess ban bitsow Kan xu taknal Galilea, jaich an jidhtal labidh exl xi kl tin xalka nin labidh tokt ani belan kal nin exbaliltsik.
Tam ti watch ejtal jech, kale ban bitsow xin bij Kapernam, junkmte kal nin nna, nin kidhbtsik ani nin exbaliltsik. Taja ti kwajay chb x a kts.
Tam ti exomich ti kunel xowki an judotsik tin ajbnl an paskwa, na Jess kale ban bitsow xin bij Jerusaln.
In ela taja alt ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xin nujwaltsik i baka, i borrego, i kuku ani xin jaltsal ti tumn an atiklbtsik.

Tam tin chuu jech, na Jess in taja jun i wichate kal i ldhutsik ani in ajatsik ejtal ka kale elb xi t ti kwajattsik taja ti njul, junax kal nin borregojiltsik ani nin bkajiltsik. Xin jaltsal an ti tumn an atiklbtsik, in waklantsi an ti tipax tumn chabl ani in ketpantsi an tin mesajiltsik.
An njul kukutsik utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ka kldhatsik elb xi jech! Yab ka wenko nin kim nu Tta ti njumtalb!
In chalpay tm nin exbaliltsik xi kwajat dhutsadh ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “U kanidhl tajat na kim.”
Konyat tm ench kal an judotsik: —Jantom exl neech ti ku pidha ki chuu abal ki exla ke ani lejtal ta kool i awiltalb ka taja jech?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Ka pakutsik jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani Nan neech ku kuba ti t ti x a kts.
Utsan tm ench kal an judotsik: —Chab inik kal akak i tamub in jnmal abal ka kuban jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios; ani Tat a ulal ke neech ka kuba ti t ti x a kts?
Por an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xi kwajat in till na Jess jaich Jaj nin tul.
Jaxtm, tam ti na Jess chemdh ani ejech ti t, nin exbaliltsik in chalpay jech xowa in ulmal na Jess ani in belatsik an Tokat Dhuslab ani ejtal xowa usnktsik kal na Jess.
Tam ti na Jess kwajat Jerusaln, ban ajib kal tin kwenta an paskwa, kal yn ti belan tam tin chuutsik an labidh exltsik xin tajl.
Por na Jess yab in lej beltsaltsik, abal Jaj in exll ejtalkitsik.
Yab in yntsal ka ltsin kal ni jun xita xanty in chalpayal an atiklbtsik, pos Jaj in chob alwa xanty in chalpayal tin itsch jun i inik.
T ti kwajat jun i Fariseo xin bij ta Nikodemo, jun i ultalb inik ban judotsik.

Jech na Nikodemo kale jun i akal kin lna na Jess ani in utsa ench: —Oktsix, i chob abal a Dios ti abmal ta oktsix, pos ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin xalka nin awiltal kal i labidh exltsik jelt xan ta tajl, max na Dios yab kwajat kal jaj.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl, ke xita yab ka wachin ti chakam ti t, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
Konoxin tm ench na Nikodemo: —Por jan ti neech kin ejto jun i pulek inik ka wachin ti chakam ti t? Awxe neech kin ejto ka ochich jun bin nna abal ka wachin ti chakam ti t?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl, ke xita yab ka pujan kal i ja ani kal an Tokat Ejattalb, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios.
Xu wachinal tech ti kayl, in kool in tul jelti nin tta ani nin nna; por xu wachinal kal an Tokat Ejattalb, in kyalich an Tokat Ejattalb.
Yab ki laban abal tu utsl: “Ejtaltsik kool ka wachin ti chakam ti t.”
An ik u wawnal xon ti kin lena; a achl u bososl, por yab a chob xon ti tl nibal a chob xon ti neech. Anchan jeye ejtal xu wachinaltsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Konyat tm jun ench kal na Nikodemo: —Jantich tm tu tjnal jech?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tat, xi jaich jun in oktsxal an israelitatsik, yab a chob jech?
Tsubax tu utsl, ke waw tokot i till xowa i chobich ani tokot i lnl xowa i chumal; por tattsik, yab a bell xowa tu utsltsik.
Max yab tin beltsaltsik tam kin kwajay tu tiltsitsik xowa waach tech ti kayl, jan ti neech ti kin beltsitsik max kin kwajay tu tiltsitsik xowa waach t walki?
Ni jun xita yab kadhinek walki, tokot xi painek t walki, jaich Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, xin kwajl t walki.
Ani anchan xan ti na Moiss tin tekba an chan t ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, anchan neye ti neech kin tekb Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik,
abal ejtal xita ti kin bela, yab ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb, tokot kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Na Dios in kanidha tajat xi kwajattsik ban kayl. Jaxtm tin aba nin junkax Chakmil ka tsch tech ti kayl, abal ejtal xita kl ti ka belan, yab ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb, tokot kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Na Dios yab in abmal nin Chakmil abal ti walbix, in abmal abal ti lol.
Xita kin bela nin Chakmil na Dios, yab neech ka walbiyat, por xita yab kin bela, walbidhich ti kwajat abal yab in bela nin junkax Chakmil na Dios.
Xita yab in bela, walbidhich ti kwajat, abal tam ti tsch an tajaxtalb ban kayl, in kulbetnatsik ms an jikwaxtalb k an tajaxtalb, kom tokot in tajltsik xowa yab alwa.
Ejtal xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa, in pojkltsik an tajaxtalb ani yab u uteltsik ban tajaxtalb abal yab ka xalkan an walastalb xin tajltsik.
Por xi kwajattsik xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb, u uteltsik ja ban tajaxtalb abal ka xalkan ke xowa in tajltsik, jaich xowa in l na Dios.
Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess kale kal nin exbaliltsik ban chabl xi Judea ani kwajaytsik w owat taja ti pjal.
Ani na Juan kwajat jeye ti pjal ba jun i kubtalb xin bij Enn, kunat Salim, kom taja waach tajat i ja. U ulel taja an atiklbtsik ani u pujyb.
Jech tmun tam ti yabl balidh na Juan ban wikaxte.
Taltsik nin exbaliltsik na Juan in tuju tm ti kwlx kal an judotsik kal tin kwenta an tokeltalb.
Kaletsik tm kin utsa ench na Juan: —Oktsix, xi ta ti kwajat kal tat t jun pake walja Jordn, xi tat a tilmal, u pjal jeye xo ani kal ejtaltsik ti exom ti wwnb.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Juan: —Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin koy xata max yab ka pidhan kal na Dios.
Tattsik a achmal tam tu ulu tsubax ke yab nan nin Kristo, nan jaich jun i abatwle xin abnk okox k Jaj.

Ba jun i tomkixtalb, xita kl tu dhabalb an tomkinl tsidhan, jaich kal an tomkinl inik; ani nin jab an tomkinl inik, xi kwajat junax ani in achl xowa in ulal, u kulbl jeye tajat kal xowa in achl in till an tomkinl inik. Anchan jeye, xo in kulbl neye tajat.
Jaj kool kin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb ani nan kool kin kwajay ms tayl.
&Xi tekat ti tl, ms Ja plek k ejtal waw. Xi kwajat chabl, chablki ti kwajat ani tokot in till xowa waach chabl. Por xi tl walki, ms Ja plek k ejtal waw
ani in till xowa in chumal ani in achmal; por yab xita kl tu beltsinal xowa in ulal.
Por max jun xita kin bela, in ulalich tm ke na Dios tsubax xowa in ulal;
abal xita abnk kal a Dios, in kwintal a Dios in till, pos na Dios yn tajat tin pidhnl nin Tokat Ejattal.
An Ttalb in kanidhl nin Chakmil ani in pidhmalich ejtal xowa waach tech ti chabl ani xowa waach walki.

Xita kin bela nin Chakmil na Dios, in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; por xita yab in l kin bela nin Chakmil na Dios, yab neech kin ejto kin koy jachan an xechintalb, tokot neech kin bachu an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
An fariseotsik in chobna abal na Jess u pjal ms k na Juan ani kal yn ms xita kl tu wwnb;
maske yab kejle Jaj na Jess nu pjal, u pjal nin exbaliltsik.
Tam ti na Jess in chobna jech, kale tm Judea abal ka witsiy Galilea.
An bl xin yakwmal abal ka witsiy Galilea, kool ka watey ban chabl xi Samaria,
jaxtm ti ulich ba jun i bitsow xin bij Sikar xu taknal Samaria. Jech an bitsow, kwajat kunat ban chabl xi na Jakob in pidhmal nin chakmil xin bij Jos.
Taja ti kwajat an mom xu bijyb tin momil na Jakob. Kom na Jess u chekelich ti tl an ti belal, buxkan bin wl an mom. Tam ti jachan, wich xna chejel kts.

An exbaltsik kalnek ban bitsow abal kin chaay xanty kin kapu. Tmki jachan, ulich ban mom jun i mmlb xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl xi Samaria abal kin jotiy i ja ani utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin pidha neye an ti ja.

Tkoyat tm ench kal an mmlb: —Jantki Tat, xa kidhtal an judotsik, tin kontsal ti ja maske a chob alwa ke nan in kwajl ban chabl xi Samaria? (Utsan anchan, kom an judotsik u tx kal xu kwajltsik Samaria.)

Tkoyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Max a exllak an chejwalixtalb xin pidhnl na Dios ani xita xi exom ti kontsal an ti ja, u chob alwa abal neech ti kin kontsi an ti ja ani Nan neech tu pidha ti ja abal a ejattal.
Utsan tm ench kal an mmlb: —Paylomlb, nibal ela a kool xantokl ka jotiy an ja ani an mom owtsik. Jn ti neech ka ela an ja abal nu ejattal xi kwajat a ulal ke neech ti kin pidha?

Ni weje paklil Jakob tu jiltsmal jech an ti mom, xon ti jaj in jotymal an ja abal kin ucha. Taja jeye tin jotymal an ja nin chakmiltsik ani taja tin uchandhmal nin konliltsik. Awxe Tat ms i plek k jaj?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Ejtal xin uchltsik jech an ja, neech jun ka tsikey;

por xita kin ucha an ja xi Nan u pidhnl, yab jayki neech ka tsikey. Pos an ja xi Nan neech ku pidha, neech ka kwajay alkidh ba jaj jelti jun in kalemtal i ja abal ka pidhan kl ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Utsan tm ench kal an mmlb: —Paylomlb, ti kin pidha neye jachan an ti ja abal yab ms jayki kin tsikey, nibal kin witsiy ms ku jotiy i ja ba jech an mom.
Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ki kale ka kaniy na tomkl ani ki tsch tm jun tech.
Tkoyat ench na Jess kal an mmlb: —Yab u kool u tomkl. Utsan tam ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax kejle ta ulal ke yab a kool a tomkl;
pos a beletnmalich b i inik ani xi xo i kwajat a belkm, yab a tomkl. Tsubax tajat xowa a ulu.
Tam tin acha jech an mmlb, in ulu ench: —Paylomlb, nan u achl ke Tat jaich jun i tiltsix.
Ni weje pakliltsik xi tech jeye ti kwajinek Samaria in kaknmaltsik na Dios ba jech an chn, por tattsik an judotsik a ulal ke Jerusaln ti yejat ki kakna.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, ti kin beltsi ke neech kin bajaw an kij tam neech ka kaknatsik an Ttalb ani yab neech ka yntsi ki tschtsik ba jech an chn o ki kaletsik Jerusaln.
Tattsik xi kwajl ban chabl xi Samaria, yab a chob xanty a kaknltsik; por waw i chob wa xanty i kaknl; pos an loeltalb tl ban judotsik.

Por xo in bajch an ora ani jaich xoich, tam xi tsubax lejtal tin kaknl an Ttalb neech kin kakna kal in ejattalki ani kal i tsubaxtalb. Pos an Ttalb in l kin chuu ke anchan kin tajatsik xi kl tu kaknb.
Na Dios i Ejattalb ani xita kl ti ka kakn, yejat kin kakna kal in ejattalki ani kal i tsubaxtalb.
Utsan ench kal an mmlb: —Nan u chob abal neech ka tsch an Mesas, xi jaich an Kristo xi bijidh neech ka tsch. Ani tam Jaj ka ulich, neech ti ku wiltsi ejtal jech.
Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Jachan xa bijiy, jaich Nanich, xi xo kwajat ti kw kal tat.
Tmki jachan, ulich nin exbaliltsik ani labantsik tajat abal in chuu ti tiloll na Jess kal jun i mmlb. Por ni jun xita yab in lena kin konoy xanty in konyal o xanty in till kal an mmlb.
An mmlb in jilna tm an mul ani kale ban bitsow xon ti kwajay kin tiltsi ench an atiklbtsik:
—Jala ka chuutsik jun i inik xi tin utsmal ejtal xanty u tajmal. Awxe yab jachich an Kristo?
Kaletsik tm ban bitsow ani kaletsik xon ti kwajat na Jess.
Lejat an exbaltsik kwajat in pakabdhl na Jess ench: —Oktsix, kapulich teye.
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nan u kool jun xata xanty neech ku kapu, xi tattsik yab a exll.
Tujey tm an exbaltsik ti knx jajkitsik ench: —Awxe tsidhantsidh ti kapnl kal jun xita?
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nu kapnlil, jaich ku taja xowa in l xi tin abmal ani ku okontsi an tin tojlbil.
Tattsik a ulal abal bl u kibel ch a ch abal ka junkuntsat tin wall a tayablb, por Nan tu utsltsik abal nin wall an tayablb yejnekich ani alwaich ti kwajat abal ka junkuwat.

Xu tojnal abal kin junkuntsi tin wall an tayablb, in bachwal nin jalbl. Ani an wallb xin junkuwal, jaich xi yab jayki neech ka kibey; abal xu m ani xin junkuntsal tin wall an tayablb, ka kulbtsik junax.
Tsubax xan tin ulal ench jun i tilab: “Keet xu m ani keet xin junkuntsal tin wall an tayablb.”
Nan tu abmaltsik ka junkuntsi tin wall an tayablb xi yab tattsik a taymal; jaxtm tu utsltsik ke keet xi tjnk ani tattsik neech ki labey kal an tojlb xi jajtsik in tajmal.
Yn i atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow xu taknal Samaria, in belatsik na Jess kal xowaki in achatsik utsan kal an mmlb, tam ti utsantsik ench: “Tin utsmal ejtal xanty u tajmal.”
Jaxtm, tam ti ulich an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Samaria, pakabdh na Jess abal ka jilkon kal jajtsik. Na Jess jilkon kal jajtsik chb a kts,
ani kal yn ms ti belan, tam tin achatsik xanty in ulal na Jess.

Utsan tm ench an mmlb kal an atiklbtsik: —Xo i bellich, yab tokotki kal xowa tat tu utsmal, i bell abal waw weye i achmalich xanty in till ani i chobich abal tsubax lejtal Jajich nu Kristo nin Loxil xi ejtal tech ti kayl.
Chb a kts ms tayl, na Jess kale Samaria ani in ntsi an bl abal ban chabl xi Galilea.
Pos jelt xan ti na Jess in ulu, ni jun i tiltsix u kaknb bin chablil.
Tam ti na Jess ulich Galilea, bachwat alwa kal xi tajatsik, abal xu kwajltsik taja, kalnektsik jeye Jerusaln kin ajbnatsik an paskwa ani in chumaltsik ejtal xowa in taja ba jachan an ajib.

Na Jess witsiy Kan, an bitsow xu taknal ban chabl xi Galilea xon tin wenkmal an ja ti yajtsik uxnl. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun in tojnlil an pulek awiltalb. Jech an tjontsix, in kool jun in chakmil u yaul ban bitsow xi Kapernam.
Tam ti jachan an tjontsix in acha ke na Jess ulich Galilea, kale kin chuu ani in pakabdha abal ka kale bin kim ani ka jeldhantsat tin chakmil xi ta ti kwajat tolowich tajat.
Utsan tm ench kal Jess: —Max yab ka chuutsik i exl ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik, yab neech ti kin belatsik.
Por utsan ench kal an tjontsix: —Ajtik, ki tsch jikat, lejat yabl u chemel nu chakmil.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ki kalch ta kim, na chakmil yab neech ka chemech. An inik in bela xowa utsan kal na Jess ani kale.
Tam tu witslich tin kim, kale ti tamnal kal nin tojnliltsik ani utsan ench: —Na chakmil yab chemech.
Ani in konoy tm nin tojnliltsik xy i ora ti tujey ti elbml nin chakmil ani utsan ench: —Ti wel, jn xna i wkal ti wkon an kaklch.
In chalpay tm an ttalb ke jachan i ora, tm ti usnk ench kal na Jess: “Na chakmil yab neech ka chemech.” Jaj ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik in bela na Jess.
Jech jaich in chabtal an labidh labandhaxtalb xin taja na Jess abal ti exl, tam ti witsiy Judea ani ulich Galilea.
Tam ti watenekich ejtal jech, na Jess witsiy Jerusaln xon ti an judotsik kwajat in tajl jun i ajib.
Taja Jerusaln, kunat bin wilbil an bitsow, waach jun i chakat ja xi ti kwintalb ebreo u bijyb Betesda. Jech an chakat ja, kwajat ban wileb xu bijyb Obejatsik ani in kool b i chalam.
Taja ban chalam, ta ti kwachatsik yn i yaultsik, xu jokoltsik, xu kwechetsik ani xi yabtsik in ejtowal ka yoyon. Jech kwajattsik in aytsm ka lanyat an ja.
Abal owdhaki i kij u pal jun i tokat abatwle ani in lanyal an ja. Xita ka ochich okox tam ka lanyat an ja, u jell kal xowakichki an yawlch xin kool.
T jeye ti kwajat taja jun i inik xin koolich jun inik lajuwaxik i tamub ti yaul.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu kwachl jech an inik ani in chobna abal nakatich tajat i kij ti kwajl anchan, in konoy ench: —A lxe ki jeley?
Tkoyat ench kal an yaul: —Ajtik, yab u kool xita ti kin dha ban chakat ja tam ka lanyat. Echeki tam u l neye kin ochich, okox u ochel keet.
Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ki chakay, ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley.
Tmki jachan ti jilkon jelnek an inik, in dhaya nin chaytil ani beley. Por kom tam ti jachan a kts jaich in ktsjil an koyxnich,
utsan ench kal an judotsik jachan an inik xi jeldh: —Xo in ktsjil i koyxnich, yab alwa ka kitna na chaytil.
An inik tkon ench: —Xi tin jeldha, tin utsa ench: “Ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley.”
Konyat tm ench: —Jitam j p jeye xi ti utsa: “Ka dhaya na chaytil ani ki beley”?
Por an inik yab in chob xitam j xi kl ti jeldhats, kom na Jess pitkonkich bin yanl an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat.
Tayl elan jachan an inik kal na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani utsan ench: —Ka acha, xo i jelch, yabich ms ka wala abal yab ka tamu jun xata ms yajtsik.
Kale tm an inik ani in ltsi an judotsik ke kal na Jess ti jeldhats.
Jaxtm na Jess tu atnal kal an judotsik ani u lenb ka chemdh, abal na Jess in tajl jech tin ktsjil an koyxnich.
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nu Tta echeki u tojnal ani jaxtm Nan tin tojnal neye.

Jaxtm an judotsik msich tin lenl kin chemdha na Jess, abal yab tokotki yab in pakwlantsal nin ktsjil an koyxnich, u lenb ka chemdh, abal in ulal ke Jaj jyki jeye a Dios, kom in ulal ke na Dios jaich nin Tta.

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke nin Chakmil na Dios yab neech kin ejto kin taja ni jun xata kal Jajki tin kwetm chalab; tokot in tajl xowa in chutal in tajl an Ttalb. Ejtal xowa in tajl an Ttalb, anlki jeye tin tajl an Chakmlb.
Pos an Ttalb in kanidhl nin Chakmil ani in xalkantsal ejtal xowa Jaj in tajl; ani neech kin xalkantsi xowa ms pakdha xi Jaj in tajl, xi neech ti ki jilatsik i labnk.
Anchan jelt xan ti an Ttalb in ejdhl an chemlomtsik ani in pidhl ti xechintalb, anchan jeye an Chakmlb in pidhl ti xechintalb xita Jaj in l kin pidha.
Pos an Ttalb yab in ljundhl ni jun xita, nin Chakmil jaich nin pidhmal ejtal an ti awiltalb abal ti ljundhax,
abal kal ejtalki ti ka kakn an Chakmlb jelt xan tu kaknb an Ttalb. Xita yab kin kakna an Chakmlb, yabich jeye tm u kalel in kaknl an Ttalb xi kl ti abnk.

Tsubax tu utsltsik: Xita kin exbay xowa Nan u ulal ani kin bela xitam J tin abmal, neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; ani yabich neech ka jilkon walbidh, pos jaj in watnaich an cheml ani in kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech kin bajaw an ora ani jaich xoich, tam xi kwajattsik jelti max chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb neech kin axtsitsik tin kwintal nin Chakmil na Dios; ani xita kin axtsi, neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Anchan jelt xan ti an Ttalb in kool i awiltalb abal kin pidhna i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, anchan jeye tin pidhmal ti awiltalb nin Chakmil abal kin pidhna i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
In pidhmal jeye ti awiltalb abal ti ljundhom, kom Jajich xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik.
Yab ki labantsik kal jech, kom neech kin bajaw an ora tam ejtal an chemlomtsik neech kin axtsi tin kwintal

ani neech ka kale xon ti kwajattsik jolidh. Xita xin tajmaltsik xowa alwa, neech ka ejechtsik abal yabich jayki ka chemechtsik; por xita xin tajmaltsik xowa yab alwa, neech ka ejechtsik abal ka abnjichtsik ban kibeltalb.

Nan yab u ejtowal ku taja xata kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab. Nan in ljundhax xantiki ti kin utsan ani in ljundhax in lujtalki, pos yab exom u tajl xowa Nan u l, tokot u tajl xowa in l an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
Max Nankijak in xeech u till tub, yab tsubax xowa u ulal.
Waach keet xi tin till ani u chob alwa ke tsubax xowa in ulal.
Tattsik a abnmal ka konyat na Juan ani tsubax xan ti jaj tknk.
Nan yab in teykmte kal xowa kin ulu jun i inik kal Nan tu kwenta; por u ulal jech abal tattsik ka ejto ki loey.
Xowa in ulu na Juan, in junwal jelti jun i tajbaxtalb xi kwajat letotl abal ti tajbax ani tattsik a lena ki kulb w i kij kal nin tajaxtalbil.
Por Nan u kool jun i ltsixtalb ms alwa k xowa xin ulmal na Juan. Ejtal xowa an Ttalb tin pidhmal ku taja, jaich nin xalkl abal tsubax lejtal tin abadh kal an Ttalb.
Anl jeye, an Ttalb xi tin abmal, in pidhnl jeye i ltsixtalb kal Nan tu kwenta, maske tattsik yab jayki a axtsmal tin kwintal nibal jayki a chumaltsik.
Por tattsik yab a beltsal nin tsubaxtalbil abal yab tin belltsik Nan, xin abadh kal an Ttalb.
Tattsik a ajyal an Tokat Dhuslab kal yantam i kwenta, abal a ltsik ka chuu max ka elatsik taja an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; por an Tokat Dhuslab Nan tin till,
por tattsik yab a l ki uteytsik kal Nan abal ka ejto ka koytsik jachan an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Nan yab u l kin exl ke in alwa inik kal an atiklbtsik.
Por Nan tu exlltsik ke yab a kaknl a Dios.
Nan in tsinek abal in abnk kal nu Tta, por tattsik yab tin bachwal; por max tl jun xita kal jajki tin kwetm chalab, jachan neech ja ka bachutsik.
Janti neech ka ejto ki belmchtsik, max tokot a l ki exlomn ke i alwa inik kal an atiklbtsik ani yab kal na junkax Diosil?
Yab ka chalpaytsik ke Nan neech tu lnatsik tin tamt nu Tta; xita ti lnltsik, jaich xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss, xon ta kwajbmaltsik na aytsixtalbil.
Abal max tsubaxak ta belltsik xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss, neech jeye tm ka belatsik xowa Nan u ulal, pos Nan tin till xowa in dhutsmal na Moiss.
Por max yab a belltsik xowa in jilmal dhutsadh na Moiss, jan ti neech ka ejto ka belatsik xowa Nan tu utsltsik?
Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jess kale jun pake pujal xi kwajat Galilea, xi jaychki in kidhtal an pujal xi Tiberias.
Kal yn i atiklbtsik ti neech wewkmte kom in chumalichtsik an labidh labandhaxtalb xin tajl, abal in jeldhl an yaultsik.
Kadhiy tm na Jess ba jun i chn ani buxkan taja kal nin exbaliltsik.
Tam ti jachan i kij, exomich ti kunel an paskwa, an ajib xin ajbnl an judotsik.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal kal yn i atiklbtsik ti wwnadh, in utsa ench na Felipe: —Jn neech ki chaay i kapnl abal ka kapch ejtal jech an atiklbtsik?
Por na Jess in ulu anchan abal in l kin acha xanty kin ulu na Felipe, pos Jaj in chobich alwa xanty neech kin taja.
Tkoyat tm ench kal na Felipe: —Maske ki chaay chb bo inik i denariotsik i pan, yab neech ka kidhey abal kin ela bachutsik wetsik.
Utsan tm ench kal jn ti b nin exbaliltsik xin bij Andrs, xi jaich nin kidhb na Simn Pedro:
—J kwajat jun i chakam kwitl xin tsidhl b i pan xi tajadh kal i sebada ani chb i tool; por kal jech yab neech ka kidhey abal ki kapundha yantam i atiklbtsik.
In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Ka utsa ejtal an atiklbtsik ka buxkan. Taja xon ti kwajattsik, waach tajat i tsitsik chojl ani buxkantsik bo mil iniktsik xna.

In tyna tm na Jess xi b an pan, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in pidhaich tm nin exbaliltsik. An exbaltsik in pidhaichtsik tm ejtal xi t ti buxutsik. Anlki jeye tin taja kal an tooltsik ani in pidhatsik asta xan ti jajtsik in lena.
Tam ti ajwchtsik, na Jess in utsa ench nin exbaliltsik: —Ka junkutsik an pejmatstalbtsik xi jilkon abal yab xata ka odhn.
In junkutsik tm ani in tsutsiytsik lajuchb i toknaltsik kal an pejmatstalb xi jilkon kal xi b an pan xi tajadh kal i sebada.
Tam ti an atiklbtsik in chuu jech an labidh labandhaxtalb xin taja na Jess, in ulutsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal jech jaich an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch tech ti kayl.
Por kom na Jess in chuu abal u lenb ka jn kal i chplb abal ka tajan ti pulek takix, kale jun ban chn abal ka kwajay kwetm.
Tam ti jikwchinkich, nin exbaliltsik na Jess kale ban pujal,
ochichtsik ban tan ani in tujchtsik tm kin watna an pujal abal ka kaletsik Kapernam. Jikwchinkich alwa ani na Jess yabl ulnek xon ti jajtsik kwajat.
An ja u mlk asta tekat, kom u wawnal jun i chapik ik.
Tam tin belmalichtsik b o akak i kilmetro, in chuutsik na Jess ti utel ban tan, tl belal tin b an ja ani jikeytsik tajat.
Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nan, yab ki jikeytsik!
Tam tin achatsik jech, in utsaichtsik tm ka ochich ban tan ani junwki ti ulichtsik ban chabl xon tin ulmaltsik neech.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, an atiklbtsik xi jilkonktsik jun pake pujal, in chuu abal an exbaltsik kalnekich kal an junkax tan xi ta ti kwajat ani na Jess yab kalnek kal jajtsik.
Por tmki jachan, ulich keet i tan xi tl ban bitsow xin bij Tiberias, taja kunat xon ti kapmadh an atiklbtsik tam ti an Ajtiklb in pidhnmalich i jalbintsixtalb.
Ani jaxtm, tam ti an atiklbtsik in chuu ke na Jess yabich taja ti kwajat nibal nin exbaliltsik, balin ban tan ani kaletsik Kapernam abal kin aliy.
Tam ti an atiklbtsik ulich jun pake pujal, in ela na Jess ani in konoytsik ench: —Oktsix, jowkijich ta ulnek tech?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsl, ke tattsik tin ayal abal a chuu tu kapundhatsik asta ki ajw ani yab abal a chumaltsik an labidh labandhaxtalb.

Yab ki tjontsik abal ka ta an kapnl xu tall, ki tjontsik abal ka ta an kapnl xi yab u tall xi neech ti ki pidhatsik an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech jaich an kapnl xu pidhnl Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik. Pos na Dios an Ttalb tin takwymal abal ku pidhna jech an kapnl.
Konyat tm ench kal an atiklbtsik: —Janty yejat ki taja abal ki ejto ki taja xowa in l na Dios?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Na Dios in l kin chuu ke tattsik ka bela xi Jaj in abmal.
Konyat tm jun ench na Jess: —Jantom labidh labandhaxtalb neech ka ejto ti ku xalkantsi abal ki chuu ani anchan tu belaich? Janty a ejtowal ka taja?
Ni weje pakliltsik in kapmal ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh an kapnl xi tl walki, jelt xan tin ulal ench an Tokat Dhuslab: “Na Dios in pidhatsik kin kapu an kapnl xi tl walki.”
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik: Yab kal a Moiss ti pidhnk na weje pakliltsik an ti kapnl xi tl walki, kal nu Tta ti pidhnktsik jachan an kapnl xi tsubax lejtal ti tl walki.
Pos an kapnl xin pidhnl na Dios, jaich xi painek walki ani in pidhl an atiklbtsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an atiklbtsik: —Ajtik, ti ku pidha echeki jachan an ti kapnl.
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nanich an kapnl xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Xita ka utey kal Nan, yab jayki neech ka kaay ani xita ti kin bela, yab jayki neech ka tsikey.
Por anchan jelt xan tu utsmalichtsik, tattsik yab tin bell maske tin chumalichtsik.
Ejtal xowa tin pidhl an Ttalb, u ulel kal Nan ani xita ka utey kal Nan, yab neech ku pojka.
Pos Nan yab in painek walki abal ku taja xowa u l, in painek abal ku taja xowa in l xi tin abmal.
Xowa in l nu Tta xi tin abmal, jaich ke yab ku kibdha ni jun xita xi Jaj tin pidhl, tokot ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
Xowa in l xi tin abmal, jaich ke ejtal xita kin chuu nin Chakmil na Dios ani kin bela, kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani Nan neech ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
Tam ti an judotsik in acha jech, tujeytsik kin kawiy na Jess abal in ulu ench: “Nanich nin kapnl xi painek walki.”
Ani in ulutsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech na Jess, nin chakmil na Jos? Waw i exlantsal tin tta ani tin nna. Jantki p tm tin ulal ke Jaj walki ti painek?
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka jilaichtsik ti kin kwna.
Yab xita neech kin ejto ka utey kal Nan max yab ka utwat kal an Ttalb xi tin abmal ani neech ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
Ba nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik in ulal ench: “Na Dios neech kin oktsi ejtalkitsik.” Jaxtm, ejtal xita kin axtsi an Ttalb ani kin walka ka oktsin kal Jaj, u utel kal Nan.
Jech yab in l kin ulu ke jun xita in chumalich an Ttalb; xita kl tokot ti chuudh na Dios, jaich xi taja ti tl ba na Dios.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, xita ti kin bela Nan, in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Nanich an kapnl xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Na weje pakliltsik in kapmal ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh an kapnl xi tl walki ani blki chemechtsik;
por xita kin kapu an kapnl xi tl walki xi Nan u till, yab jayki neech ka chemech.

Nanich an kapnl xi painek walki; xita kin kapu jech an kapnl, neech ka kwajay ejat malill i kij. An kapnl xi Nan neech ku pidha, jaich nu tul xi neech ku pidhna abal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl kin ejto kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Tujey tm ti kwlx an judotsik jajkitsik ani u tsxtsik ench: —Janti neech kin ejto jech ti ku pidha ki kaptsi tin tul?

Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max yab ti kin kaptsitsik an tu tul ani yab ti kin uxtsitsik an tu xichl, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, yab neech ka ejto ka koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Xita ti kin kaptsi an tu tul ani ti kin uxtsi an tu xichl, neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani Nan neech ku ejdha ti t tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
Pos nu tul jaich i lej kapnl ani nu xichl jaich i lej uxnl.
Xita ti kin kaptsi an tu tul ani ti kin uxtsi an tu xichl, kwajatich kal Nan ani Nan kal jaj.
Anchan jelt xan ti an Ttalb xi tin abmal kwajat ejat ani Nan in kwajat ejat kal Jaj, anchan jeye, xita tin kaptsi an tu tul jelti max i kapnl, neech ka kwajay ejat kal Nan.

Jech xowa in kwajat u till jaich an kapnl xi painek walki. Jech an kapnl yab in junwal jelti an kapnl xi painek walki xin kapmal na weje pakliltsik ani blki chemechtsik; xita kin kapu jech an kapnl xin kwajat u till, neech ka kwajay ejat malill i kij.
Na Jess in oktsixna jech ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ban bitsow xin bij Kapernam.
Tam tin achatsik jech an oktsixtalb, yn xi kl ti wewkmte na Jess in ulutsik ench: —Jech xowa kwajat in ulal tojlb tajat abal ki bela. Jita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka exbantsat?
Tam ti na Jess in chuu abal kwajattsik ti tilom kal jech tin kwenta, in konoytsik ench: —Ti itixbdhltsik jech?
Pos janty p tm neech ka tmun max tin chuutsik Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, tin kadhl xon tin kwajatwiik?

An ejattalb jaich nin pidhnl an xechintalb; ni tul yab xata ti alwa. Xowa Nan tu tiltsmaltsik jaich abal tin kwenta a ejattaltsik ani jaich kl ti neech ki pidhan an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Por waach taltsik na kidhtal xi yab in bell. In ulu anchan na Jess, kom in exlltsik xita kl ti yab u belnal asta ti tujenek an kayl ani xita kl ti neech ka pidhn abal ka chemdh.
Ani in ulu ench: —Kal jech tin kwenta tu utsmaltsik ke yab xita neech kin ejto ka utey kal Nan, max yab kal an Ttalb ti ka utwat.
Asta tam ti tm, yn xi kl ti wwnadh na Jess in jilatsik ti wwnax ani yabich ms xechintsik kal Jaj.
Konyat tm ench kal na Jess xi lajuchb an exbaliltsik: —A lxe teye ki kaletsik?
Por tkoyat ench kal na Simn Pedro: —Ajtik, Ba jita ti neech ki ejto ku kale? Pos tokot Tat tu oktsal xan ti neech ki ejto ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Waw i belmalich ani i chobnmalich ke Tatich ni Kristo, nin Chakmil na Dios xi ejat.
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe Nan tu takwymal tattsik xi lajuchb? Por jn ti b xi tattsik jaich in kidhtal an lej atax.

Tam tin ulu jech, na Jess kwajat in till na Judas Iskariote, xu chakmlb kal na Simn, pos na Judas jaich xi neech kin pidhna na Jess abal ka chemdh, maske jaj jaich jeye jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik.
Tam ti watenekich ejtal jech, na Jess xechin ban chabl xi Galilea kom yab in l ka xechin Judea, abal taja u lenb ka chemdh kal an judotsik.
Por kom exomich ti kunel xowki tu ajbnb an padheltsik, jun i ajib xin ajbnl an judotsik,
utsan ench na Jess kal nin kidhbtsik: —Yab ki kwajayki tech, ki kale Judea abal an atiklbtsik xi ti wwnl xu kwajltsik taja, kin chuu jeye xanty a tajl.
Pos max jun xita in l ka exlomn, yab in tajl xata chinat. Kom Tat a tajl xata jelti jech, ka taja tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik.
Anchan ti utsan kal nin kidhbtsik kom yab u belnal nibal kal jajtsik.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yabl in bajmal xowki ti neech kin kale, por abal tattsik, xowkijakichki alwa.
Xu kwajltsik tech ti kayl yab neech kin ejto ti ki pojkatsik, por Nan tin pojkl, abal u xalkantsal ke yab alwa xowa in tajltsik.
Ki kalchtsik ta ban ajib, Nan yabl in neech kom yabl in bajmal xowki ti neech kin kale.
Ani tam tin utsmalichtsik jech, Jaj jilkon Galilea.
Por tam ti kalnekich nin kidhbtsik ban ajib, na Jess kale jeye, maske yab chobte kal ni jun xita, jelti max chinatki.
U alyb kal an judotsik ban ajib ani in ulaltsik ench: —Jn awil ti kwajat jachan an inik?
Kal yn an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat u tilnal na Jess. Taltsik in ulal ench: “Jaj jaich jun i alwa inik” ani taltsik in ulal ench: “Yab i alwa inik, pos in kambiyal an atiklbtsik.”
Por kal ni jun xita tu tilnal kawidh, abal u chejnb an judotsik.
Por tam ti chejlbich an ajib, na Jess ochich ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in tuju ti oktsix.
An judotsik laban tajat ani in ulaltsik ench: —Janti awil tin witmal jech an inik yn xata ani yab exblommadh?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —An oktsixtalb xu pidhnl yab Nan u dhabal, in dhabal xi tin abmal.
Max jun xita in l kin taja xowa in l na Dios, neech kin exla max nu oktsixtal tsubax lejtal ba Dios ti tl, o exom tin kw kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab.

Max in kwak kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, u kalelich tm jelti max u ayal kin kakn kal an atiklbtsik; por yab u tajl anchan, tokot u ulal xowa tin pidhmal na Dios xi tin abmal abal Jaj kin bachu an kaknaxtalb. Nan tokot u ulal xowa tsubax ani yab in kambix.
Yabxe tsubax ke na Moiss ti jiltsmaltsik dhutsadh an tin takixtal na Dios? Por ni jun xita xi tattsik yab in tajl ti kij. Jantki ta ltsik ti kin chemdha?
Tkoyat ench kal an atiklbtsik: —I ochadh kal i atax ejattalb; jita in l ti ki chemdha?
Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Kal jun xata xowa u taja tin ktsjil an koyxnich, ejtal tattsik i labnal.

Na Moiss ti ltsi ka tajatsik an exl ba na tul, (yab abal jaj in tujmal kin taja, in tujmal kin taja na weje pakliltsik) ani jaxtm xo ta tajtsaltsik an ti exl bin tul na chakmiltsik maske in ktsjil i koyxnich.

Pos alwaich, max abal yab a ltsik ka chikat taja nin takixtal na Dios xin jilmal dhutsadh na Moiss, a tajtsaltsik an ti exl bin tul an chakamtsik maske in ktsjil i koyxnich, jantki tin chakuntsal abal u jeldha jun i inik tin ktsjil i koyxnich?
Yab ti kin kawiy kal tin kwentaki xowa a chutaltsik u tajl. Tam ka tajatsik anchan, ka tajatsik in lujtalki.
Taltsik xu kwajltsik Jerusaln in ulutsik tm ench: —Yabxe jaich jech an inik xi xeech ti alyb abal ka chemdh?
Pos n kwajat tejwa ti oktsix ani yab xata tu usnal kal ni jun xita. Awxe an awiltalbtsik in belmalich lejtal ke jech an inik jaich an Kristo?
Por waw i chob xon ti tl jech an inik; por tam ka ulich an Kristo, yab xita neech kin chobna xon ti neech ka tsch.

Tam tin acha jech na Jess, xi kwajat ti oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulu kawidh ench: —Tm, tin exlltsik ani a chobtsik xon tin tl! Por yab in tsinek kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, in tsinek abal in abnk kal na Dios xi kwajat ejat xi tattsik yab a exll.
Nan u exll kom ba Jaj tin tl ani Jaj tin abmal.
Len tm ka jn ti wiknl, por ni jun xita yab utey ti yakwax, kom yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech ka chemdh.
Por kal yn ti belan ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tam ka tsch an Kristo, awxe neech kin taja ms i labidh labandhaxtalb k jech an inik?
An fariseotsik in acha xanty in till an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Jess. Aban tm kal an oklek pletsik ani an fariseotsik i ykwaltsik abal ka yakwan na Jess.
Ani na Jess in ulu ench: —Bl neech kin kwajay w i kij kal tattsik ani neech jun kin kale xon ti kwajat na Dios xi tin abmal.
Neech ti kin aliytsik, por yab neech ti kin ela, pos yab neech ka ejto ki kaletsik xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay.

Tujey tm an judotsik ti tsx jajkitsik ench: —Jn awil ti neech ka kale jech an inik abal in ulal ke yab neech ki ejto ki ela? Awxe neech ban judotsik xi kwajat tki tki kal an griegotsik ani kin oktsi an griegotsik?
Janty awil in lena kin ulu abal tu utsa ench: “Neech ti kin aliytsik por yab neech ti kin ela, pos yab neech ka ejto ki kaletsik xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay”?
Tin okontalich an ajib xi jaich na kts xi ms uluts, chakay na Jess ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Max jun xita u tsikl, ka utey kal Nan ani kin ucha an ja.
Pos jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, tin ejattal xita tin bell Nan, neech ka kale jelti i waljatsik xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Kal jech, na Jess in lena kin ulu ke xita kl ti ka belan, neech kin bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb. Abal tam ti jachan, yabl ulnek an Tokat Ejattalb, pos na Jess yabl xalkantsidh an tin labidh tokt.
Taltsik an atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat, tam tin acha jech, in ulutsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal, jech an inik jaich an tiltsix xi bijidh neech ka tsch.
Xi keettsik in ulal ench: —Jech jaich an Kristo. Por taltsik in ulal ench: —Janti neech ki ejto ki ulu ke Jaj jachich an Kristo ani i chob alwa ke Galilea u kwajl?
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ke an Kristo kool ka tsch bin kidhtaltsik an pulek takix Dabid ani Beln ti neech ka wachin, ban kwentsal xon ti kwajinek na Dabid.
Jaich kal jech ti yab jununl nin chalab an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Jess.
Taltsik in lwiik kin yakwa, por ni jun xita yab in taja anchan.
Witsiy an ykwaltsik xon ti kwajat an fariseotsik ani an oklek pletsik ani konyat ench: —Jantki ti yabtsik a tsidha?
Ani an ykwaltsik tkon ench: —Yab jayki i achmal xita ti kw jelt xan tu kw jachan an inik!
Utsantsik tm ench kal an fariseotsik: —A walkmichtsikxe teye ki kambiyat?
Awxe belnkich kal jn ti b ni oklkiltsik o kal an fariseotsik?
Por jech an atiklbtsik xi yab in exll an takixtalb, bijtsidhichtsik abal neech ban kibeltalb.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Nikodemo, xi jaich jn ti b xi jajtsik in kidhtal xi kalnek kin lna jun i akal na Jess:
—An takixtalb xi waw i kool, in ulal ke yab in tomnl ki walbiy jun i inik max yab ki axtsi okox ani ki chobna xanty in tajmal.
Tkoyat tm ench na Nikodemo: —I galileoxe teye? Ka ajay an Tokat Dhuslab ani neech ka chuu ke ni jun i tiltsix yab wachink jayki Galilea.
Kalchtsik tm kejtsik kejtsik tin kim.
Por na Jess kale ban chn Olibos.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, witsiy dhajawe ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Utukn na Jess kal ejtal an atiklbtsik, buxkan ani tujey ti oktsix.

Utuntsat tm kal an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani kal an fariseotsik jun i mmlb xi elnk chinat junax kal jun i inik xi yab in tomkl. Kwajb junax chejel xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik
ani utsan ench na Jess: —Oktsix, jech an mmlb elnk chinat junax kal jun i inik xi yab in tomkl.
Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss in ulal abal jelti jech an mmlbtsik yejat ka chemdh tujbadh. Tat, janty a ulal?
In ulutsik anchan, abal in l kin achatsik xanty kin ulu na Jess ani max yab ka tkon alwa, neech tm ka ejtowat ka walbiyat. Kutpan tm na Jess ani in tuju ti dhutsum ban chabl kal in tstsbixtal.
Por kom in achl abal in ntsal ti konyb, lujkun tm ani in utsatsik ench: —Max jun xita xi tattsik yab walbidh, awil kin tuju kin tujbay jech an mmlb.
Kutpan tm jun na Jess ani in ntsi ti dhutsum ban chabl.

Por tam tin achatsik jech, in chalpay abal walbidhtsik ani in tuju ka kaleltsik juntsik ti juntsik. Okox tin tuju ka kale xi yejchelichtsik ani tayl xi ms. Tam ti ejtalich kalnektsik, na Jess jilkon kwetm kal jachan an mmlb, xi taja ti jilkonk.
Lujkun tm na Jess ani kom yab ms in chuu xita waach, tokot an mmlb, in utsa ench: —Mmlb, jn ti kaletsik xi kwajat ti lnl? Ni jun xita ti walbiy?
Tkon ench an mmlb: —Yaba Ajtik, ni jun xita. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Pos yab neye tu walbiyal; ki kalch ani yabich ms ka wala.

Na Jess in tawna jun an atiklbtsik ani in utsa ench: —Nanich nin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb abal an kayl; xita ti kin wwna neech kin koy an tajaxtalb xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech ka xechin jelti max ban jikwaxtalb.
Utsan tm ench kal an fariseotsik: —Tatki exom a till tab ani jachan xowa a till, yab xata in jalbl.
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Maske Nanki u till tub, in jalbl tajat xowa u till. Pos u chob xon tin tl ani xon tin neech; por tattsik yab a chob xon tin tl nibal xon tin neech.
Tattsik tin walbiyal kal xowaki a chutal u tajl. Nan yab u walbiyal ni jun xita.
Ani max ku walbiy jun xita, in lujtalki tu tajl; pos yab u tajl Nan kwetm, i tajl junax kal an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
Ban takixtalb xi tattsik a kool, ta kwajat dhutsadh ench: “Tam chb i lnax kin ulu jaychki, awil ka beltsin.”
Nan u till tub ani an Ttalb xi tin abmal tin till jeye.
Konyat tm ench na Jess: —Jn ti kwajat na Tta? Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik yab tin exll, nibal a exlltsik nu Tta; max tin exllaktsik, a exllaktsik jeye nu Tta.

Ejtal jech in ulu na Jess tam ti kwajat ti oktsix ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xon ti kwajat in bl an pikbantsixtalb. Por kal ni jun xita ti yakwan, kom yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech ka chemdh.
Witskontsattsik jun ka utsan ench kal na Jess: —Nan neech kin kale ani neech ti kin aliytsik, por neech ki chemechtsik kal na walastalbil; pos xon ti Nan in neech, tattsik yab neech ka ejto ki kale.
In ulutsik tm ench an judotsik: —Awxe neech kin chemdha tinb ani jaxtm tu utsl ke waw yab neech ki ejto ku kale xon ti Jaj neech?
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tattsik tech i kwajl chaat, por Nan in kwajl t tekat; tattsik tech i kwajl ban kayl, por Nan yaba.
Jaxtm tu utsatsik ke neech ki chemech kal na walastalbiltsik; pos max yab a belltsik xowa tu utsl kal tin kwenta xitam j neye, neech ki chemech kal na walastalbiltsik.
Konyat tm ench na Jess: —Jita p teye? Ani tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tu utsmalichtsik asta tam tu tujuki tu oktsitsik.
Yn tajat u kool xanty tu utsatsik ani tu lujtsitsik, por xita tin abmal jaich na Dios xi kwajat ejat. Ani xowa u utsltsik xi tech ti kayl, jaich xowa u achmal in ulal.
Por jajtsik yab in exbay ke na Jess kwajat in till an Ttalb.

Jaxtm ti utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Tam tattsik ti kin tekbaich pajkidh ban peltsidh te, Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, tm neech ti kin exlatsik ke Nanich xitam j tu utsmaltsik ani ke yab xata u till kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, tokot u till xowa in oktsidh kal an Ttalb.
Abal nu Tta xi tin abmal, kwajat kal Nan ani yab jayki tin jilmal kwetm, pos echeki u tajl tokot xowa Jaj in l.
Tam ti na Jess in tila jech, kal yn ti belan.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess an judotsik xi kl ti belnk: —Max tattsik yab ka jila ka bela xowa tu utsltsik, tsubaxich tm tu exbaliltsik.
Neech tm ka exlatsik an tsubaxtalb ani an tsubaxtalb neech ti ki walkaichtsik.
Tkontsik tm ench: —Waw i weje paklil na Abraham ani yab jayki u kwajinek tu jolib kal ni jun xita. Jantki p tm ta ulal ke neech tm ku walkjich?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xu walablomtsik, u kyb jelti jolib kal an walastalb.
Jun i jolib yab neech ka kwajay echeki ban kimdh xon tu tjontsix, por jun i chakmlb echeki ja neech ka kwajay ba jachan an kimdh.
Jaxtm, max an Chakmlb ti ki walkatsik, tsubaxich tm ta walkadhichtsik.
U chobich abal a weje pakliltsik na Abraham; por a ltsik ti kin chemdha, kom yab a bell xowa tu utsltsik.
Nan u till xowa tin xalkantsmal nu Tta ani tattsik a tajl xowa ti utsl na tta.
Tkoyat tm ench kal jajtsik: —Ni tta jaich na Abraham. Por utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Max tsubaxak lejtal ta chakmlbtsik kal na Abraham, a tajlaktsik xowa jaj in tajmal.
Por xo, maske tu ltsmalichtsik an ti tsubaxtalb xi tin xalkantsmal na Dios, blki a ltsik ti kin chemdha. Na Abraham yab jayki in tajmal anchan!
&Tattsik a tajl xowa in tajl na tta. Utsan tm ench kal jajtsik: —Waw yab u chakmlb kal keetich keetich i ttalb, jn tokot i tta i kool ani jaich na Dios.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Max tsubaxak lejtal na Dios jaichtsik na tta, neech ti kin kaknatsik, pos Nan ba Dios tin tl. Yab in tsinek kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, in tsinek kom na Dios tin abmal.
Tattsik yab a ejtowal ka exbay xowa u ulal kom yab a l ka achatsik an tsubaxtalb xi tu utsl.

Tattsik a tta an lej atax ani kl ta dhabalbtsik; ani tokot a l ka tajatsik xowa jaj in l. An lej atax jaich jun i chemdhax asta ti tujenek an kayl. Yab jayki in ynmal an tsubaxtalb ani yab jayki in ulal xowa tsubax. Tam u kambix, kwajat ti kw jelt xan ti jaj jeye; pos jaj jaich jun i kambix ani jaich nu oklek kal an kambixtalb.
Por kom Nan u ulal xowa tsubax, yabtsik tin beltsal.
Jita xi tattsik neech kin ejto ti kin utsa ke Nan in walbidh? Ani max u ulal xowa tsubax, jantki ti yab tin beltsaltsik?
Xita u dhabalb kal a Dios, in axtsal tin kwintal na Dios; por kom tattsik yab i dhabalb kal na Dios, jaxtm ti yabtsik a l ka axtsi an tin kwintal.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an judotsik: —Tsubax xowa i ulal tam ki ulu ke Tat i kwajl Samaria ani i teykmte kal jun i atax ejattalb.
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab in teykmte kal ni jun i atax ejattalb, tokot u kaknl nu Tta, por tattsik yab tin kaknl.
Nan yab u ayal kin kakn. Waach jun xita xin l kin chuu kin kakn ani Jaj, jaich nu ljundhax.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin exbay xowa u ulal, yab jayki neech ka chemech.

Tkoyat tm ench kal an judotsik: —Xo ojni i exbch ke tsubax lejtal i kwajat teykmte kal jun i atax ejattalb. Na Abraham ani ejtal an tiltsixtsik chemech, por Tat a ulal ke xita kin exbay xowa a ulal, yab jayki neech ka chemech.
Awxe Tat ms i uluts k ni tta Abraham? Jaj ani an tiltsixtsik chemech. Jitam j p ta chalpayal ke Tat teye?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Max Nanki u ayal kin kakna, an kaknaxtalb xi ku bachu yab xata in jalbl. Por xita tin kaknl jaich nu Tta xi tattsik a ulal ke jaich na Diosil.
Tattsik yab a exll, por Nan u exll ani max ku ulu ke yab u exll, in kalelich neye tm in kambix jelti tattsik. Nan tsubax u exll ani u tajl xowa Jaj in ulal.
Na weje paklil Abraham, kulb tajat abal jaj neech kin chuu an kij xowki Nan ti neech kin tsch. In chuu ani kulb tajat.
Utsan tm ench na Jess kal an judotsik: —Nibal bl a kool chab inik lju i tamub, ani a ulal ke a chumal na Abraham?
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke tam ti yabl waach na Abraham, Nan kejlejich ta tin kwajat.
In penatsik tm i tujub abal kin tujbay na Jess, por Jaj chinkon ani kale ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Taja ti watey junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik ani kale.
Tam ti na Jess watey ba jun i kwentsal, in chuu jun i inik xi jokol ti wachink ti chakam.
Ani konyat ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Oktsix, jantki ti anchan ti wachink ti chakam jech an inik? Awxe in walmal nin ttatsik, o jaj in walmal?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab jaj in walmal, nibal nin ttatsik; jech tmnk anchan abal ka xalkan ba jech an inik xowa na Dios in ejtowal kin taja.
Lejat xo bl tajax, yejat ku tajtsi an tin tojlbil xi tin abmal; pos neech ka jikwchin ani yab xita neech kin ejto ti tojnal.
Lejat in kwajat tech ti kayl, Nan nin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb abal an kayl.
Tam ti na Jess okon kin ulu jech, in tuba in ijil chabl, in taja w i kut kal nin ijil ani in mawtsi kl tin wal an jokol.
In utsa tm ench: —Ki kale ka midhiy na wal ban chakat ja xu bijyb Silo (Silo, in l kin ulu Abatwle). Kale tm an jokol, in midhiy taja nin wal ani tam ti witsiy, in ejtowalich tm ti chuux.
Jaxtm, tam ti chutat kal nin at kimdhtsik ani kal ejtal xita kl tu exlb abal jaj u jokol, in ulutsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech an inik xu buxkanal ti konox tolmixtalb?
Taltsik in ulal ench: —Jaj. Keettsik in ulal ench: —Yab jaj, por in junwal tajat. Por xu jokolwiik in ulal ench: —Nan.
Konyat tm ench: —Por jan ti p ta uwa abal i chuuxich xo?

Tkon ani in ulu ench: —An inik xu bijyb ta Jess in taja i kut, tin mawtsi kl tu wal ani tin utsa ench: “Ki kale ban chakat ja xu bijyb Silo ani ka midhiy taja na wal.” Pos in kale ani tam tu midhiy nu wal, in chuxinich tm.
Konyat tm ench: —Jn xo ti kwajat jachan an inik? Ani jaj tkon ench: —Yab u chob.
Jn tm ban fariseotsik jachan an inik xu jokolwiik.
Por kom in ktsjil i koyxnich tam ti na Jess in taja an kut ani in jeldha an jokol,
an fariseotsik in konoy jun jachan an inik xan tin uwmal abal u chuuxich xo. Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Tin mawtsi ti kut bu wal, u midhiy ani xo in chuuxich.

In ulu tm ench taltsik an fariseotsik: —An inik xin taja jech, yab xna ba Dios ti tl, pos yab in pakwlantsal in ktsjil an koyxnich. Por taltsik in ulal ench: —Janti neech kin ejto kin taja jelti jech i labidh labandhaxtalb max i walablom inik? Jaxtm ti keetich keetich an chalab in kooltsik kal tin kwenta xowa in tajm na Jess.
Konyat tm jun ench an inik xu jokolwiik: —Ani tat, janty a ulal kal tin kwenta jachan an inik xi ti chuxindha? Ani jaj in ulu ench: —Nan u ulal ke Jaj jaich jun i tiltsix.
Por an judotsik yab in bell ke jachan an inik u jokolwiik ani xo u chuuxich, asta ti kantsin tin ttatsik jachan an inik xi jeldhats
ani konyat ench an ttalbtsik: —Jaichxe jech na chakmil, xa ulaltsik ke jokol ti wachink ti chakam? Janti p xo tu chuuxich?
An ttalbtsik tkon ench: —I chob alwa abal jech jaich ni chakmil ani i chob abal jokol ti wachink ti chakam;
por yab i chob xantki tu chuuxich xo nibal i chob xita kl ti chuxindhats. Jaj ka konoy, plekich ani neech ti ki ltsitsik xita kl ti jeldhats.

Nin ttatsik in ulu jech abal in chejnl an judotsik, pos an judotsik in tajmalichtsik i kw abal yabich neech kin walka ka ochich ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb xita kin bela ke na Jess jaich an Kristo.
Jaxtm tin ulu ench nin ttatsik jachan an inik: “Jaj ka konoy, plekich.”
Kanyat tm jun kal an judotsik jachan an inik xi jokolwiik ani utsan ench: —Tin bij na Dios, ti ku utsa xowa tsubax. Waw i chob abal jachan an inik i walablom.
Jaj in tkoytsik tm ench: —Nan yab u chob max i walablom o yaba. Tokot u chob ke nan in jokolwiik ani xo in chuuxich.
Ani konyat jun ench: —Janty ti tajtsi? Jan tin uwa abal kin ejto ti ki chuxindha?
Jaj in tkoytsik ench: —Tu utsmalichtsik ani yab tin beltsal; jantki ta l tu witskontsitsik? A ltsik teye ka wwna?
Odhbijyat tm ani utsan ench: —Tat a wwnl jachan an inik, por waw i wwnl a Moiss.
Waw i chob abal na Moiss tawnadh kal na Dios; por jachan an inik, nibal i chob ela xon ti tl.
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal jachan an inik xu jokolwiik: —Pos jaich jech xowa yab i ejtowal ki exbay! Tattsik yab a chob xon ti tl ani nan tin chuxindha.
Waw i chob ke na Dios yab in axtsal xowa kin konoy jun i walablom; tokot in axtsal xita kl tu kaknb ani in tajl xowa in l na Dios.
Yab jayki i achmal ti tilnal jun xita xin ejtowal kin chuxindha jun xita xi jokol ti wachink ti chakam.
Max jech an inik yabak ba Dios ti tl, yab neech kin ejto kin taja jun xata jelti jech.
Utsan tm ench: —Tat xi walbidh tajat ta wachink ta chakam, a l ti ku oktsi? Ani utsan abal yabich ms ka kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
Na Jess in chobna abal ajnk jachan an inik xu jokolwiik ani tam tin ela in utsa ench: —A bellxe nin Chakmil na Dios?
Utsan ench kal an inik: —Ajtik, ti kin ltsi xitam j abal ku bela.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Pos a tellich ta kwajat, jaich Nanich xi kwajat ta tilom junax.
Tudhlan tm jachan an inik tin tamt na Jess ani in utsa ench: —U bell, Ajtik.

In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Nan in tsinek tech ban kayl abal ku xalkantsi an atiklbtsik xan ti kwajat. In tsinek abal ku chuxindha xi kwajattsik jelti max u jokol ani xu chuuxtsik, ka jilkon jelti max u jokol.
Tam tin achatsik jech, taltsik an fariseotsik xi ta ti kwajat xon ti kwajat na Jess, konoxintsik ench: —U jokolxe weye?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Max i jokolaktsik, yabak i walbidh; por kom a ulal abal i chuuxtsik, jaxtm ta walbidh.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, xi yab u ochel bin wilbil in mapl an borregotsik, xin tikontsalki an mapuxtalb, jachan jaich an kw.
Por xu ochel ban wileb, jachan jaich an belkol borregotsik.
U japtsinal kal an belkol wileb abal ka ochich, in bijyal tin bij an borregotsik ani u exlantsb tin kwintal ani in kldhl an borregotsik xon ti kwajat mapudh.
Tam in kldhmalich ejtal an borregotsik xi jaj in dhabal, u okxinal ani u wwnb kal an borregotsik kom u exlantsb an tin kwintal.
Por an borregotsik yab in wwnl ni jun xita xi yab kl tu dhabalb, in jiknl tokot kom yab in exlantsal an tin kwintal.
Utsantsik jech an ti junbaxtalb kal na Jess, por yab in exbaytsik xanty len ka utsantsik.
Witskontsattsik tm jun ka utsan ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax tu utsltsik: Nanich nin kwajat jelti an wileb xon tu ochel an borregotsik.
Ejtal xi tsinektsik okox k Nan, i kwtsik, por yab tajan ti kij kal an borregotsik.
Nanich nin kwajat jelti an wileb; xita ka ochich ba Nan xin kwajat jelti an wileb neech ka loey. Neech kin junu jelti jun i borrego xu ochel ani u kalel ban mapuxtalb ani in ell i tm.
An kw u tsiilki ti kw ani ti chemdhax; por Nan in tsinek abal ka koytsik an t xechintalb, an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Nanich nin kwajat jelti an alwa belkol borregotsik. An alwa belkol, yab in dhl ti kwenta maske ka chemdh abal kin loo an borregotsik.

Por xu belkol abal in lki kin ta i tumn, tam kin chuu tl an padhum, in jill kwetm an borregotsik ani jaj u kalel ti chinkonal. In tajl anchan kom yab i alwa belkol ani kom yab jaj in dhabal an borregotsik. U yakwnal tm taltsik an borregotsik kal an padhum ani xi keettsik, u bukel, kom u jikdhb.
Jech an inik u kalel ti chinkonal, kom tokotki kwajat ti belkol abal in l kin ta i tumn ani yab in kanidhl an borregotsik.

Nanich nin kwajat jelti an alwa belkol. Anchan jelt xan ti nu Tta tin exll ani Nan u exll Jaj, anchan tu exll xita tin bellichtsik ani jajtsik tin exll neye. Nan neech ku pidhna tub kin chemdh abal ku lootsik.
U kool jeye keet xi neech ti kin belatsik xi yabl kwajat kal Nan ani kool jeye ku ututsik kal Nan. Neech ti kin axtsitsik an tu kwintal, jn tokot i kwene neech ka wachin ani jnki jeye tokot i belkol.
An Ttalb tin kanidhl abal u pidhnl tub kin chemdh ani tayl kin ejech ti t.

Yab xita tin nixl ku pidhna tub kin chemdh, Nanki u pidhnal tub kal u kulbtal. U kool i awiltalb ku pidhna tub kin chemdh ani u kool i awiltalb abal kin ejech ti t. Jech jaich xowa tin utsmal ku taja nu Tta.
Tam ti an judotsik in acha jech, in koytsik keetich keetich i chalab kal tin kwenta xowa in ulu na Jess.
Yn xi jajtsik in ulal ench: —Jantki ta exbantsaltsik? Jaj ochadh kal i atax ejattalb ani u olmanal.
Por taltsik in ulal ench: —Ni jun xita xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalb yab neech kin ejto ti kw anchan. Awxe jun i atax ejattalb neech kin ejto kin chuxindha jun i jokol?
Tam ti jachan i kij, chamay ani ban bitsow Jerusaln kwajat ti tajnal i ajib kal tin kwenta xowki ti tokwat ani tujey ti ynb an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Na Jess ta ti xeech ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ban chak xu bijyb Salomn,
wiliyat kal an judotsik ani utsan ench: —Asta jowki neech tu koy tu chalpax? Max Tatich ni Kristo, ti ku ltsitsch.
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Tu ltsmalichtsik ani yab tin beltsal. Ejtal xowa u tajl kal tin awiltal nu Tta, in xalklich xitam j neye Nan.
Por yabtsik a bell, kom yab tin bell jelti xi utenekichtsik kal Nan, jelt xan tu utsmalichtsik okox.
Xita tin bellichtsik, tin axtsalichtsik xowa u ulal; u exlltsik ani jajtsik tin wwnl.
U pidhmalichtsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb, nibal xita neech kin ejto ti kin kntsi.
Nu Tta jaich tin pidhmaltsik. Jaj jaich xi ms plek ani xi ms ultalb ani kal ni jun xita ti neech ka ejtowat ka kntsin.
Nan ani an Ttalb, jun tokot tu ynal.
In pena tm jun i tujub an judotsik abal kin tujbay na Jess.
Ani utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Ynich tajat xata alwa u tajmal ta tamttsik kal tin awiltal nu Tta, kal jowa kl tin kwenta ta l ti kin tujbaytsik?

Tkoyat ench kal an judotsik: —Yab i lenb ki tujbayat kal ni jun xowa alwa a tajmal. I lenb ki tujbayat kom plekich tajat an walastalb a tajl abal a tajlich tab jelti max i Dios. Pos Tat jaych teye jun i inik jelti waw.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ban takixtalb xi tattsik a ynl kwajat dhutsadh ke na Dios in ulmal ench: “Tattsik i diostsik teye.”
I chob ke xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, yab neech ki ejto ki ulu ke yab tsubax ani na Dios in bijiy ti diostsik an atiklbtsik xi axtsin kl tin kwintal.
Ani max na Dios tin takwymal ani tin abmal tech ti kayl, yab neech ka ejto ka ulutsik ke u odhbijyal na Dios abal u ulal ke Nan in Chakmlb kal Jaj.
Max yab u tajl xowa in tajl nu Tta, yab ti kin belatsik.
Por max u tajl, maske yab ti kin belatsik, ka belatsik xowa a chutal u tajl abal ka chobnatsik ke an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan ani Nan in kwajat kal an Ttalb.
U lenbwiik jun ka yakwan, por chinkontsattsik kal na Jess.
Witsiy tm na Jess ban walja Jordn ani taja ti kwajay xon ti na Juan kwajinek ti pjal ms okox.
Kal yn i atiklbtsik tu kalel ti chutb na Jess ani in ulaltsik ench: —Tsubax lejtal, maske na Juan yab in taja ni jun i labidh exl, ejtal xowa in ulu kal tin kwenta jech an inik, tsubax.
Ani kal yn ti belan na Jess tam ti taja ti kwajat.
T ti kwajat jun i inik u yaul xu bijyb ta Lsaro. Jech an inik u kwajl ban kwentsal xin bij Betania, xon tu kwajltsik jeye na Mara ani na Marta, nin ixmtsik.
Jech na Mara, nin ixm na Lsaro, an inik xu yaul, jaich an mmlb xin mawtsi kal i niwiytalb tin akan an Ajtiklb ani in wayedhantsi kal in xil.
Jech chb an mmlbtsik in abna ka utsan ench na Jess: —Ajtik, na jab u yaul.
Tam ti na Jess in acha, in ulu ench: —Jech an yawlch yab jaich tokot abal ka chemech, jaich abal kin xalka nin labidh tokt na Dios ani anchan ka xalkan jeye nin labidh tokt nin Chakmil na Dios.
Maske na Jess in kanidhl tajat na Marta, na Mara ani na Lsaro jeye,
tam ti utsan ke na Lsaro u yaul, yab kale jikat kin lna, jilkon bl chb a kts xon ti kwajat.
Tayl in utsa tm ench nin exbaliltsik: —Wana jun Judea.
Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Oktsix, xo t, an judotsik xi taja u kwajl in lenmaltsik ti ki tujbay; ani xo a l jun ki kale taja?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe lajuchb i ora in kool xi jun a kts? Pos max jun xita xeech ti belal tam kij, yab u tadhkunal kom in tell an tajaxtalb xi waach ba jech an kayl.
Por max jun xita xeech tam jikwax, u tadhkunal kom yab tajax xon ti xeech.
Tayl utsantsik jun ench kal na Jess: —Ni jab Lsaro waymadhich, por neech ku bakiy.
Utsan tm ench kal an exbaltsik: —Ajtik, max waymadhich, tm, neech ka elbm.
Por xowa in lena kin ulu na Jess, jaich ke na Lsaro chemnek, por an exbaltsik in chalpay ke na Jess kwajat in till i ani wayich.
Utsutsuyattsik tm tsubax ench kal na Jess: —Na Lsaro chemech.
In kulbl tajat kal tattsik ta kwenta abal yab taja tin kwajat abal anchan ki belmchtsik. Por wana ki chuu.
Na Toms, xu bijyb ti Kwaya, in utsa tm ench nin at exbaltsik: —Wana weye abal ku chemech junax kal Jaj.
Tam ti na Jess ulich Betania, utsan abal in koolich ch a kts ti jolidh na Lsaro.
An kwentsal xi Betania, kwajat kunat ban bitsow Jerusaln, chb kal chejel xna i kilmetro in owl;
ani kal yn i judotsik ti kalnek ti lnb na Marta ani na Mara abal ka kijidhmdhatsik kom chemnek nin kidhb Lsaro.
Tam ti na Marta in acha abal tich tu ulel na Jess, kale kin tamu; por na Mara jilkon ban at xon tu kwajltsik.
Ani utsan ench na Jess kal na Marta: —Ajtik, max techak ta kwajat, yabak chemnek nu kidhb.
Por u chob alwa ke neech ti ki pidha na Dios xowa ka kontsi.
Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Na kidhb neech ka ejech ti t.
Tkoyat ench kal na Marta: —Ani kejle, u chobich abal neech ka ejech ti t tam ka ejdh an chemlomtsik tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Nanich nin ejdhax ti t ani xu pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Xita ti kin bela, maske ka chemech, blki neech ka kwajay ejat;
