ani ejtal xi xo kwajat ejat ani tin bell Nan, yab neech ka kwajay chemnek malill i kij. A bellxe jech?
Na Marta tkon ench: —U bell, Ajtik. U bell abal Tatich ni Kristo, nin Chakmil na Dios xi bijidh neech ka tsch tech ti kayl.
Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, na Marta kale kin kaniy nin kidhb Mara ani in utsa ench chinatki: —Ulnek an Oktsix ani tin abmal tu kaniy.
Tokot tin acha jech na Mara, chakay ani kale kin chuu na Jess.
Na Jess yabl ochenek ban kwentsal, taja bl ti kwajat xon ti kwajinek ti tiloll kal na Marta.
Tam ti chutat abal chakay na Mara ani kale jikatki tajat, an judotsik xi taja ti kwajat ti kijtnax, wwnaxintsik. In chalpaytsik max na Mara neech ti uknal xon ti jolidh na Lsaro.
Tam ti na Mara ulich xon ti kwajat na Jess, tudhlan tin tamt ani in utsa ench: —Ajtik, max techak ta kwajat, yabak chemnek nu kidhb.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu ti uknaltsik na Mara ani an judotsik xi wwnaxnk, tepin tajat asta tin ejattal
ani in konoytsik ench: —Jn ta jolymal? Tkoyat ench: —Ajtik, jala ka chuu.
Ukin tm jeye na Jess.
In ulu tm ench an judotsik: —Ka telatsik, in kanidhl tajat.
Por taltsik an judotsik in ulu ench: —Jech an inik, xin chuxindha an jokol, awxe yabwiik neech kin ejto kin jeldha na Lsaro abal yab ka chemech?
Na Jess, kal yantam i yajnantsixtalb, utey xon ti jolidh na Lsaro. Xon ti kwajat jolidh, jaich jun i cholax chn ani paxkidh kal jun i tujub.
In ulu tm ench na Jess: —Ka wkoytsik an tujub. Utsan ench kal na Marta, nin ixm an chemlom: —Ajtik, kaxiyich xna nin tul, kom chich a kts in kool ti chemnek.
Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Yabxe tu utsmich ke max i belom, neech ka chutsi tin labidh tokt na Dios?
Wkoyat tm an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh an jlimtalb, in tela walki na Jess ani in ulu ench: —Tta, tu pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb abal tin axtsmal.
U chob alwa abal Tat echeki tin axtsal, por jech tu ulal abal tin alwabl ejtal jech an atiklbtsik xi j kwajat abal kin belatsik ke Tat tin abmal.
Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, in ulu kawidh ench: —Lsaro, ki kale!
Ejech tm xi chemnek ani kale, malidh nin kubak ani nin akan kal i bolixtalb ani nin k bolidh jeye kal i kudhkum. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka wila ani ka walkaich ka kale.
Kal tin kwentaki xowa in chuutsik in taja na Jess, yn an judotsik xi kalnek ti junkil an ta Mara, in bela na Jess.
Por taltsik an judotsik kale kin chuu an fariseotsik ani in tiltsi xowa in tajmal na Jess.
Tam ti an fariseotsik ani an oklek pletsik in acha jech, junkun kal an Junkulom Awiltalb ani in ulutsik ench: —Janty neech ki taja? Jech an inik exom tajat in tajl yn i labidh exltsik.
Max ki walka kin ntsi anchan, kal ejtal ti neech ka belan. Neech tm ka tsch an awiltalbtsik xi Roma, neech ti ku pakwtsi an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani neech ti ku chemdha.
Por jun ti b xi jajtsik xu bijyb ta Kayfs, xi jaich nin oklkil an pletsik tam ti jachan i tamub, in ulu ench: —Tattsik yab a chob xata,
nibal a chalpayaltsik ke ms alwa abal waw, ka chemech jn tokot i inik abal tin kwenta an atiklbtsik ani yab ku chemdh ejtal.
Por na Kayfs yab in ulu jech kal jajki tin kwetm chalab; kom jaj kwajat ti oklek pletsik jachan i tamub, jaxtm ti ijtsin kin ulu kal na Dios ke na Jess neech ka chemdh abal ka loey an judotsik;
ani yab tokot jki, abal kin junku jeye nin chakmiltsik na Dios xi kwajat tki tki.
Jaxtm, asta tam ti jachan i kij, an awiltalbtsik xi Judea in ayaltsik xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin chemdha na Jess.

Na Jess yabich tm in lej xalkl tinb ka chutat kal an judotsik, kale ba jachan an chabl xi Judea ani kale ba jun i chabl kunat ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ba jun i bitsow xin bij Efrain. Taja ti kwajay kal nin exbaliltsik.
Tam ti jachan i kij, u kunelich xowki tin ajbnl an paskwa an judotsik ani yn i atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban kwentsaltsik kalnek Jerusaln abal kin tokotsik tinb tam yabl watenek an paskwa.
In ayaltsik na Jess ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani u knxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Janty a chalpayaltsik? Awxe neech ka tsch an ti ajblom o yaba?
An fariseotsik ani an oklek pletsik in ulmal ke max jun xita in chob xon ti kwajat na Jess, kin lna abal ka kale ti yakwnal.
Bl u kibel akak a kts abal ka watey an paskwa, na Jess kale Betania xon tu kwajl na Lsaro, xi chemnek ani ejdh ti t kal na Jess.
Tajan taja jun i kapch abal tin kaknabl na Jess; na Marta u jtil ani na Lsaro jaich jn ti b xi buxl ti kapul ban mesa kal na Jess.

In uldha tm na Mara chejel litro xna i niwiytalb xi tajadh kal i wich xin bij nardo. Jech an niwiytalb, kajbidh tajat in jalbl. Na Mara in mawtsi kl tin akan na Jess ani in wayedhantsi kal nin xil. Putl an alt niwb kal jachan an niwiytalb.
Na Judas Iskariote, xi jaich jeye jn ti b xi lajuchb nin exbaliltsik na Jess, xi kl ti neech ka pidhn na Jess abal ka chemdh, in ulu tm ench:
—Jantki ti yab nujwat jech an niwiytalb kal x i bo inik i denariotsik abal ka pidhan an ti tumn an chojontltsik?
Por na Judas yab in ulu jech abal tsubax lejtal tin kanidhl an chojontltsik, in ulu anchan, kom jaj jaich jun i kw, ani kom jaj in xechindhl nin bl an tumn, in kwyal xowa u balyb taja.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Jila kwajat, yab xata ka utsa; pos jaj in tapmal jech abal ti kin mawtsi an tu tul abal ka kwajch tojojodh tam kin bajaw xowki neech kin jolyat.
An chojontltsik echeki neech ka kwajay kal tattsik, por Nan, yab echeki neech kin kwajay kal tattsik.
Kal yn i judotsik ti chobn ke na Jess ta ti kwajat Betania ani kaletsik taja, yab tokotki abal kin chuutsik na Jess, anl jeye abal kin chuutsik na Lsaro, xi ejdhats ti t kal na Jess.
Nin oklkil an pletsik in tajatsik i kw abal kin chemdha jeye na Lsaro,
pos kal tin kwentaki na Lsaro, yn i judotsik in plmdhltsik tinb ani in bellichtsik na Jess.
Yn i atiklbtsik kalnek Jerusaln abal kin ajbnatsik an paskwa. Tam ti jun tsudhelom in achatsik abal na Jess exomich ti ulel ba jachan an bitsow,
in pejatsik i apach, kale kin bachu ani in ulaltsik kawidh ench: —Ti ku loch xo! Lbtajadh xi tl tin bij an Okxlb! Lbtajadh nin Pulek Takxal an israelitatsik!
Na Jess in ela jun i chakam burru ani puney taja, jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench:
Yab ki jikey, atiklbtsik xi kwajl Sin; ka telatsik, nich tl na Pulek Takxal punat ba jun i chakam burru.

Tam ti jachan i kij, nin exbaliltsik yab in exbay ejtal jech, por ms tayl, tam ti na Jess xalkantsatich tin labidh tokt, in chalpaytsik tm abal ejtal jech kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab kal tin kwenta na Jess ani anchanich ti tmnk.
An atiklbtsik xi ta ti kwajat tam ti na Jess in ejdha ti t na Lsaro ani in utsa ka kale ban jlimtalb, in tilltsik xowa in chumal.
Jaxtm an atiklbtsik ti kale kin bachu na Jess, abal in chobnmalichtsik an labidh exl xin tajmal.
Por an fariseotsik in ulu jajkitsik ench: —A chutalichtsik xo, yab neech ki ejto ki taja ni jun xata. Ka tela, kal ejtal an atiklbtsik ti exom ti wwnb.
Kal an atiklbtsik xi kalnek Jerusaln abal ti l tam exom an ajib, ta jeye ti kwajattsik chb x i griego.
Jech an griegotsik utey ba na Felipe. Na Felipe, jaich xu kwajl Betsayda, an chabl xu taknal Galilea. Tam ti utukn kal an griegotsik, pakabdh kl ench: —Jab, i l weye ki chuu na Jess.
Na Felipe kale kin utsa na Andrs ani chablam ti b ti kale kin ltsi na Jess.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —In bajch an kij xowki Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, neech kin xalkantsat an tu labidh tokt.

Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke max jun i iyalb yab ka tayan ani yab ka kibchon nin tul, yab jayki neech ka yaney. Por max ka tayan ani ka kibchon nin tul, neech ka ixkan, neech ka pubey ani neech kin koy yn in wall.
Xita in kanidhl nin ejattal neech kin kibdha; por xita xi yab in kanidhl nin ejattal tech ti kayl, in koolich tojojodh nin ejattal abal kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Max jun xita in l ti kin tjontsi, ti kin wwna ani xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay, taja jeye neech ka kwajay xita tin tjontsal. Max jun xita ti kin tjontsi, neech ka kakn kal nu Tta.
Xo in chalpax tajat tin kwajat; por yab neech ku utsa nu Tta ti kin loo kal xowa neech ku tamu, pos jaich tin tsinek abal ku tamu anchan.
Tta, ka xalkaich na labidh tokt. Achatm tm jun i kwintalb t walki ani xu kw in ulu ench: —U xalkmalich ani neech jun ku xalka ti t.
An atiklbtsik xi taja ti kwajat ani in acha jachan an kwintalb, in ulutsik abal i junkil b u julull ani xi keettsik in ulal: —Tawn kal jun i tokat abatwle.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Yab abal Nan tu kwenta ti achatm jech an kwintalb, achatm abal tattsik ta kwenta.
Xo in bajch an kij xowki neech ti ljundhb an atiklbtsik xi tech ban kayl ani neech ka petnjich ban kibeltalb an lej atax xi kwajat ti takix ba jech an kayl.
Ani tam Nan kin tekbjich pajkidh ban peltsidh te, neech ku ututsik ejtal kal Nan.
Kal jech kwajatich in lnl xan ti neech ka chemdh.

Tkoyat ench kal an atiklbtsik: —Waw i achmal ti ajyb bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ke an Kristo yab jayki neech ka chemech. Jantki p tm ta ulal ke nin Chakmil na Dios neech ka tekb pajkidh ba peltsidh te? Jita p jeye jachan xa utsl ke Jajich xi abadh abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik?

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Bl neech kin kwajay w i kij kal tattsik, Nan xin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb, por yabich neech kin lej owey. Ki uteytsik kal Nan lejat xo bl in kwajat kal tattsik abal yab ki yakwantsik ukpidh kal an jikwaxtalb; pos xi xeechtsik ban jikwaxtalb yab in chob xon ti neech.

Ti kin belatsik lejat xo bl in kwajat kal tattsik, Nan in kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb abal ki kwajaytsik jelti an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban tajaxtalb. Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, na Jess kale ani in chinkontsitsik.
Maske na Jess in tajmalich tajat yn i labidh exltsik tin tamt an judotsik, blki yab u belnal.
Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsix Isaas ench: Okxlb, jita in belmal xowa i lnmal? Jita xalkantsidh tin chp an Okxlb?
Jaxtm ti yab u belnal na Jess, pos na Isaas in dhutsmal jeye ench:
Jokolbdhatstsik kal na Dios ani chapikmdhantsidhtsik tin itsch, abal yab ka chuxintsik kal nin wal, nibal kin exbaytsik kal nin itsch, ani nibal ka uteytsik kal Nan abal ku jeldha.
Na Isaas in tilmal jech abal in chutsmalich tin labidh tokt na Jess ani Jaj kwajat in till tam tin ulu jech.

Por blki, kal yn i judotsik ti belan na Jess, belan asta kal taltsik i awiltalbtsik; por yabtsik in xalkl, kom in chejnl an fariseotsik ani in chejnl yabich ka walkan ka ochichtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
Pos jajtsik ms in kulbetnl ka kakn kal an atiklbtsik k kal na Dios.
Na Jess in ulu kawidh ench: —Xita ti kin bela Nan, yab Nan tin bell, in bell an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
Ani xita tin chutal Nan, in chutalich xita tin abmal.
Nan, xin kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb, in tsinek ban kayl abal xita ti kin bela yab ka jilkontsik ban jikwaxtalb.
Por max jun xita kin acha xowa u ulal ani yab kin taja ti kij, yab Nan exom u walbiyal; pos yab in tsinek ku walbiy an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl, in tsinek abal ku loo.
Xita tin pojkl ani yab in tajl ti kij xowa u ulal, in koolich xita kl ti neech ka walbiyat: xowa Nan u ulmal, jaich kl ti neech ka walbiyat tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.
Xowa Nan u ulmal, yab u ulmal kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab; an Ttalb xi tin abmal, jaich tin utsmal xowa neech ku ulu ani xowa neech ku oktsixna.
Ani u chob alwa ke xowa tin utsmal ku ulu nu Tta, jaich abal ka ejtotsik ka koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jaxtm, xowa u ulal, u ulal xantiki tin utsmal ku ulu an Ttalb.

Wich u kibel abal ka ajbn an paskwa. Na Jess in chobich abal in bajmich an kij xowki neech kin jilaich an kayl abal ka kalch ban Ttalb. Kom echeki in kanidhl an atiklbtsik xi kl tu belnal, xo kwajat in xalkantsal ke tsubax lejtal tin kanidhltsik tajat.

Na Judas Iskariote, xu chakmlb kal na Simn, dhantsidhich bin itsch kal an lej atax abal kin pidhna na Jess ka chemdh. Na Jess in chob alwa abal ba Dios ti tl ani abal neech jun ka witsch tyki ani in chob jeye abal pidhnkich ejtal an ti awiltalb kal an Ttalb. Jaxtm, tam ti kwajattsik an ti kapul, chakay na Jess ban mesa, in kotiy nin eblidh kudhkumil ani in wika jun i kudhkum bin tsukul.
In jolo tm i ja ba jun i balixtalb ani kwajay kin taktsi tin akan nin exbaliltsik ani kin wayedhantsi kal an kudhkum xin wkm bin tsukul.
Tam ti nechich jeye ti taktsinal tin akan na Simn Pedro, na Simn Pedro in ulu ench: —Ajtik, Tat neech ti kin taktsi tu akan?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xo yab neech ka ejto ka exbay xowa exom u tajl, por tayl neech ka exbay.
Por utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Nan yab jayki neech tu walka ti kin taktsi an tu akan. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Max yab tu taktsi an ta akan, yabich neech ka ejto ki kwajay kal Nan.
Utsan ench kal na Simn Pedro: —Ajtik, tm, yab tokotki ti kin taktsi tu akan, ti kin taktsi jeye tu kubak ani ti kin pakwtsi tu k.
Por utsan ench kal na Jess: —Xi tm ti oknk ti atsim, yab yejat xowa ms kin taka, tokot nin akan; pos ejtal kwajat tokat nin tul. Tattsik i tokat ta kwajat, maske yab kejle ejtal ta b.
Na Jess in ulu: “Yab ejtal ta b i kwajattsik tokat”, kom in chobich xita kl ti neech ka pidhn abal ka chemdh.
Tam ti okonich kin taktsi tin akan nin exbaliltsik, na Jess in kwajba jun nin eblidh kudhkmil, buxkan jun ban mesa ani in utsatsik ench: —A exbayaltsikxe xowa tu tajtsi?
Tattsik tin bijyal tin Oktsix ani tin Ajtiklb ani tsubax xowa a ulaltsik, kom ani kejle.
Pos max Nan, xin Oktsix ani in Ajtiklb, tu taktsitsik an ta akan, anlki teye ti yejat ki tktsxintsik an ta akan jn ani jn.
Nan tu pidhaichtsik jun i oktsixtalb abal ka tajatsik teye anlki jelt xan ti Nan u taja.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ni jun i tjontsix kwajat ms plek k nin ajtik ani ni jun i abatwle kwajat ms plek k xi kl ti abadh.
Max a exbayaltsik ejtal jech ani ka tajatsik anchan, kijidh tajat neech ki kwajaytsik.
Yab abal ejtal ta b tin kwajat tu utsltsik jech; Nan u chob xita nu takwymaltsik. Por kool ka tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Xi kwajat ti kapul junax kal Nan, tin atlich xo.”
Tu okxintsaltsik tu ltsi jech abal tam ka tmun, ka belatsik ke Nanich xitam j tu utsmaltsik u y.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita kin bachu xita Nan u abmal, Nan tin bachwal ani xita ti kin bachu Nan, in bachwalich xita tin abmal.
Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, na Jess in acha jun i pulek yajtsiktalb tin ejattal ani in ulu ench: —Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh.
Tujey tm an exbaltsik ti tlx jn ani jn, maske yab in chobtsik xitam j na kwajat ti usnal.
Jn ti b an exbaltsik, xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess, kwajat jeye ti kapul jedhl bin okb na Jess.
Na Simn Pedro in utsa jech an exbal kal in kubakki abal kin konoy xitam j na kwajat in till.
Utkakan tm ms jech an exbal ba na Jess ani in konoy ench: —Ajtik, jitam j xi kwajat a till?

Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Neech ku juu jun peje i pan ani xita ku pidha, jaich xi neech ti kin pidhna abal kin chemdh. In juu tm jun peje an pan ani in pidha na Judas Iskariote, xu chakmlb kal na Simn,
tmki tam ti na Judas in bachu an pan, ochich an lej atax bin itsch na Judas. Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Xowa neech ka taja, ka taja jikat.
Por ni jun xita xi ta ti kwajat ban mesa ti kapul, yab in exbay xantki ti utsan anchan na Judas.

Kom na Judas jaich nin xechindhl nin bl an tumn, taltsik in chalpay ke na Jess kwajat in utsl na Judas ke yejat kin chaay xata xowa neech kin yntsi abal an ajib, o kin pidha w ti tolmixtalb an chojontltsik.
Tam ti na Judas in kapmalich an pan, kale. Tam ti jachan, jikwaxich.
Tam ti kalnekich na Judas, na Jess in ulu ench: —Xo exomich ti xalkanal nu labidh tokt Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik ani nin labidh tokt na Dios u xalkanalich jeye ba Nan.
Ani max Nan, xin abadh abal kin wenkon neye tin inik, u xalkantsal tin labidh tokt na Dios, Jaj neech jeye ti kin xalkantsi tu labidh tokt kunatich i kij.

Tsitsik chakam, yabich neech kin kwajay nakat i kij kal tattsik. Neech ti kin aliytsik, por xowa u utsmal an judotsik, xo jaychki teye neech tu utsatsik: Yab neech ka ejto ki kaletsik xon ti Nan in neech.
Neech tu pidhatsik jun i t takixtalb: ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn; ki kndhxintsik jelt xan ti Nan tu kanidhmaltsik.
Max ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn, ejtal an atiklbtsik neech kin chuu ke Nan lejtal tu exbaliltsik.
Konyat ench na Jess kal na Simn Pedro: —Ajtik, jn ta neech? Ani tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xonti Nan in neech, yab xo neech ka ejto ti kin wwna; por tayl i neech teye xon ti Nan in neech.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ajtik, jantki ti yab neech ku ejto tu wwna xoich? Nan yab u ajyal tub maske kin chemdh kal Tat ta kwenta.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tsubax lejtal yab a ajyal tab maske ki chemdh kal Nan tu kwenta? Tsubax tu utsl, ke tam yabl dhjnk an pekel, tat xlich a ulmal ke yab tin exll.
Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax. Ka bela na Dios ani ti kin bela neye.
Ba nin kim nu Tta, yn tajat waach xon ti ki kwajaytsik; max yabak anchan, tu utsmalichaktsik. Jaxtm, neech kin okxin abal tu tojojontsi xon ti neech ki kwajaytsik.
Ani tam in kalnekich ku tojojoy xon ti neech ki kwajaytsik, neech kin witsiy tu ikitsik ani tu jnatsik kal Nan abal ki kwajaytsik teye xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay.
A chobichtsik xon ti Nan in neech ani a chobichtsik jeye an bl.
Utsan ench kal na Toms: —Ajtik, yab i chob xon ta neech; jan ti neech ki ejto ki chobna an bl?

Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nanich nin kwajat jelti an bl, Nanich nin tsubaxtalb ani Nanich nu pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Yab xita neech kin ejto ka ulich ban Ttalb max yab ti kin bela Nan.
Max tattsik ti kin exlatsik alwa, neech jeye ka exlatsik nu Tat; ani xo a exllichtsik, pos a ntsmalichtsik ka chuu.
Utsan tm ench kal na Felipe: —Ajtik, ti ku xalkantsi an ti Ttalb ani lejat kl.
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Felipe, owenekich tajat tin kwajl kal tattsik, ani yabl tin exll? Xita tin chutal Nan, in chutalich jeye an Ttalb; tm, jantki bl tin kontsal tu xalkantsitsik an ti Ttalb?
Yabxe a bell ke Nan in kwajat kal an Ttalb ani an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan? Ejtal xowa tu utsltsik, yab u ulal kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab. An Ttalb xi kwajat kal Nan, jaich nin tajl nin tojlbil.
Ti kin beltsitsik ke Nan in kwajat kal an Ttalb ani an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan; max yab a belltsik ke anchan, ka belatsik kal xowa a chutal u tajl.
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke xita ti kin bela, neech jeye kin ejto kin taja xowa Nan u tajl ani neech kin ejto kin taja xowa ms pakdha, pos Nan in neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.
Ejtal xowa ka konoytsik kal Nan tu bij, neech ku taja, abal Nan, xin Chakmlb kal na Dios, ku xalkantsi tin labidh tokt nu Tta.
Neech ku taja xowakichki ka konoy kal Nan tu bij.
Max tin kanidhltsik, ka tajatsik xowa tu utsl.
Ani Nan neech ku pakabdha an Ttalb ti ki abtsitsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb abal ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik. An Tokat Ejattalb jaich neech ti ki tolmiytsik ani ti ki pubdantsitsik an ta ejattal.

Jech an Tokat Ejattalb xi tsubax, yab neech kin ejto kin bachu xi yabtsik u belom kom yabtsik in chutal nibal in exll; por tattsik a exll, kom Jaj kwajat kal tattsik ani neech ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik.
Yab neech tu jilatsik kwetm, neech kin witsiy abal kin kwajay kal tattsik.
Kunat i kij, yabich neech kin chutat kal an atiklbtsik, por tattsik neech ti kin chuu; pos neech ki kwajaytsik ejat kom Nan in kwajat ejat.
Jachan i kij, neech tm ka exbchtsik ke Nan in kwajat kal nu Tta, tattsik i kwajat kal Nan ani Nan kal tattsik.
Xin exllich ani in tajlich xowa u ulal, in xalklich ke tsubax lejtal tin kanidhl. Xita tin kanidhl, neech jeye ka kanidh kal nu Tta, Nan neech neye ku kanidha ani neech kin xalkan ba jaj.
Utsan tm ench kal na Judas (yab kal na Judas Iskariote): —Ajtik, jantki ti neech ka xalka tab ba waw ani yab ja ban atiklbtsik xi yab u belom?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Xita tin kanidhl, in tajl xowa Nan u ulal. Neech ka kanidh kal nu Tta ani nu Tta ani Nan, neech ku tsch abal ku kwajay kal jaj.
Xita yab tin kanidhl, yab in tajl xowa Nan u ulal. Xowa a achltsik u ulal, yab u ulal kal Nanki tu kwetm chalab, tl bin chalab an Ttalb xi tin abmal.
In kwajat tu utsltsik ejtal jech lejat xo bl in kwajat kal tattsik;
por an Tokat Ejattalb, xi neech ti ki abtsitsik an Ttalb abal ti ki tolmiytsik ani ti ki pubdhantsitsik an ta ejattal, jaich neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal ani ti ki chalpantsitsik xowa tu utsmal.
Tu jillichtsik kal yantam i kijidhtalb. Tu pidhltsik ti kijidhtalb xu kool, por yab tu pidhltsik an ti kijidhtalb jelt xan tin pidhnl an atiklbtsik. Yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax nibal ki jikey.

A achmalichtsik tam tu ulu ke Nan neech kin kale ani ke neech jun kin witsiy abal kin kwajay kal tattsik. Max tin kanidhlaktsik, neech ki kulbtsik tajat tam ta acha ke Nan in neech ban Ttalb; pos nu Tta, ms Ja plek k Nan.
Tu ltsalichtsik okox jech, abal tam ka tmun, ka belatsik.
Yabich neech tin kw ynl kal tattsik, pos neech ka ulchich an lej atax xu takix tech ti kayl. Maske jaj u takix tech ti kayl, yab in kool ni jun i awiltalb abal ti kin takiy.
Anchan kool ka tmun abal kin chobna an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl, ke Nan u kanidhl an Ttalb ani tokot u tajl xowa Jaj tin utsmal ku taja. Ki chakchtsik ani wanch.
Nanich nin kwajat jelti nin akan an uba ani nu Tta jelti xu belkol.
Ejtal an kwelek xi yab u walim, in wkoyal; por in kaxwal ani in akyal an kwelek xu walim abal ka walin ms.
Tattsik i kwajat jelti max i akidhich kal an oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik.

Ki kwajaytsik echeki kal Nan, jelt xan ti Nan in kwajat kal tattsik. Jun i kwelek yab neech kin ejto ti walim max yab palat ban akanlek; anchan teye tattsik, yab neech ka ejto ka tajatsik xata alwa, max yab i kwajattsik kal Nan.

Nanich nin kwajat jelti nin akan an uba ani tattsik jelti nin kwel. Xita kwajat kal Nan ani Nan kal jaj, neech tajat kin taja xowa alwa. Tattsik yab xata neech ka ejto ka taja xowa alwa, max yab i kwajat kal Nan.
Xita yab ka kwajay kal Nan, neech ka petn jelti an kwelek xi yab u walim, neech ka wayey ani neech ka tsikan.
Max ki kwajaytsik echeki kal Nan ani yab ka uktsitsik xowa tu oktsmaltsik, ka konoytsik xowa ka lena ani neech ki pidhantsik.
Nu Tta in bachwalich i kaknaxtalb tam tattsik a tajlich tajat xowa alwa ani anchan u xalkanalich ke tsubax lejtal tu exbaliltsik.
Nan tu kanidhltsik jelt xan ti an Ttalb tin kanidhl; pos ka ntsitsik ki kwajay i kn kal Nan.
Max ka tajltsik xowa tu oktsmal, neech ka ntsi ki kwajaytsik i kn kal Nan, jelt xan ti Nan in kwajat kn kal nu Tta abal u tajl xowa tin utsl.
Tu tiltsaltsik jech abal ka koytsik an kijidhtalb jelti xi Nan u kool ani anchan ki kwajaytsik ms i kulbl.
An takixtalb xi Nan tu pidhltsik, jaich jech: ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn jelt xan ti Nan tu kanidhltsik.
An kanidhaxtalb ms plek xi jun xita yejat kin koy jaich jech: kin pidhna tinb ka chemdh abal kin loo nin jabtsik.
Tattsik tu jab, max ka tajatsik xowa Nan tu utsl.
Yabich neech tu bijiy tu tjontsixiltsik, pos jun i tjontsix, yab in chob xanty in tajl nin ajtik. Tu bijyaltsik tu jab, kom tu pidhmalichtsik ka chobna ejtal xowa tin utsmal nu Tta.

Yab tattsik tin takwymal Nan, Nan tu takwymal tattsik. Tu takwymaltsik abal ka tajatsik tajat xowa alwa ani ke jachan xowa alwa ka taja ka kwajay echeki. Anchan, ejtal xowa ka kontsi an Ttalb kal Nan tu bij, neech ti pidhatsik.
Jech jaich xowa tu punkuntsaltsik ka taja: ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn.
Max ti pojkltsik xi yabtsik u belom, ka chobnatsik ke Nan okox tin pojkadh.

Max yabak i belomtsik, an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, neech ti ki kanidhatsik jelt xan tin kanidhl nin kidhtaltsik. Por Nan tu takwymaltsik tam ta kwajatwiik kal jajtsik ani jaxtm xo ti pojkltsik, kom yabich a kidhtaltsik.
Ka chalpay xanty tu utsmaltsik: “Ni jun i tjontsix kwajat ms plek k nin ajtik.” Max Nan in atnk, neech teye ki atantsik ani max in exbantsidh an tu oktsixtal, neech teye ki exbantsattsik.
Ejtal jech neech ki tajtsintsik kal Nanki tu kwenta, kom yab in exlltsik xita tin abmal.
Jajtsik yabak walbidh, max yabak in tsinek tu tawnatsik. Por xo, yab neech kin ejtotsik kin ulu ke yab walbidh;
pos xita tin pojkl Nan, in pojklichtsik jeye nu Tta.
Yabak walbidhtsik max Nan yabak u tajmal xata ba jajtsik xowa yab jayki tajadh kal ni jun xita; por xo, in chumalichtsik ejtal xowa u tajmal ani blki tin pojkl ani in pojkl jeye nu Tta.
Por jech exom ti tjnal anchan abal ka tmun jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin takixtalbiltsik: “Tin pojkatsik maske yab xata tu waltsmaltsik.”
Por tam ka ulich an Tokat Ejattalb xi tsubax, xi Nan neech ku abna, xi neech ti tolmiy ani ti ki likedhantsitsik an ta ejattal, jaich neech ti kin tila Nan. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, tl ban Ttalb.
Tattsik neech teye ti kin tilatsik, kom i kwajinektsik kal Nan asta tu tuju tin oktsix.
Ejtal jech tu tiltsaltsik abal yab ka jila ti kin bela.
Yabich neech ki walkan ki ochichtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, asta neech kin bajaw i kij, tam jun xita ti ki chemdha neech kin chalpay ke exom in tajl jun xata alwa abal a Dios.
Neech kin tajatsik anchan, kom yab jayki in exlmaltsik an Ttalb nibal tin exlmaltsik Nan.
Tu okxintsalichtsik tu utsa jech, abal tam kin bajaw an kij, ka chalpaytsik ke tu okox utsmalichtsik. Jech yab tu utsmaltsik okox, kom Nan bl in kwajat kal tattsik.
Por xo neech kin kalch abal kin kwajay kal xi tin abmal ani yab xita tin konyal xon tin neech.
I tepinichtsik tokot abal tu utsltsik jech.

Por tsubax tu utsltsik ke ms alwa abal tattsik kin kale. Pos max yab kin kale, yab neech ka tsch abal ka kwajay kal tattsik an Tokat Ejattalb xi neech ti ki tolmiytsik ani ti likedhantsitsik an ta ejattal; por max kin kale, Nan neech ku aba ka tsch.
Tam Jaj ka tsch, neech kin xalkantsi an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl ke walbidhtsik, ke waach jun i lujattalb ani ke neech ka ljundh an atiklbtsik kal na Dios.
Neech kin exbaytsik abal walbidh, kom yabtsik tin bela.
Neech kin exbaytsik ke waach jun i lujattalb, kom Nan in neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb ani yabich ms neech ti kin chuutsik.
Ani neech kin exbaytsik ke neech ka ljundhtsik kal na Dios, kom an lej atax, xu takix tech ban kayl, bijtsidhich abal neech ban kibeltalb.
U kool yn xanty neech tu utsatsik, por yab neech ka ejto ka exbaytsik xo.

Por tam ka tsch an Tokat Ejattalb xi tsubax, Jaj neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xowa tsubax; pos yab neech ti kw kal Jajki tin kwetm chalab, tokot neech kin ulu xowa ka utsan kal na Dios ani neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xowa neech ka tmun tayl.
Jaj neech ti kin xalkantsi an tu labidh tokt, pos ejtal xowa u kool ani xitam j neye Nan, jaich neech ti ki ltsitsik.
Ejtal xowa in kool an Ttalb u dhabal neye; jaxtm tu ulu ke an Tokat Ejattalb jaich neech ti ki ltsitsik xitam j neye Nan ani ejtal xowa u kool.
Kunat i kij yabich neech ti kin chuutsik; por ms lej w tayl, neech jun ti kin chuutsik, kom Nan in neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.

Taltsik nin exbaliltsik knxin tm jajkitsik ench: —Janty in l kin ulu jech? Abal tu utsl ke kunat i kij yabich neech ki chuu ani ke ms tayl neech jun ki chuu ani ke jaich abal Jaj neech xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.
Janty in l kin ulu kal: “Kunat i kij?” Yab i exbayal xanty kwajat in ulal.

Na Jess in chuu abal u lenb ka konyat jun xata kal nin exbaliltsik, jaxtm tin utsatsik ench: —Nan tu utsatsik abal kunat i kij yabich neech ti kin chuutsik ani ms lej w tayl neech jun ti kin chuutsik. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ta kwajat ta knxtsik?
Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke neech ki ukintsik ani neech ki tepintsik, por an atiklbtsik xi yab tin bell, neech ka kulbtsik. Por maske tattsik i kwajat i tepinal, an tepintalb neech ka wenkon ti kulbtalb.

Tam jun i mmlb neech kin wachiy i chakam, u tepinal abal in bajch an ora xowki neech kin acha an yajal; por tam kin wachch an chakam, in uktsal an yajal kal an kulbtalb xin achl abal in wachch jun i chakam tech ti kayl.
Anchan jeye xo, tattsik i tepinal, por neech jun tu chuutsik. Tam tu chuutsik, neech tm jun ki kulbtsik tajat kal jun i kulbtalb xi yab xita neech kin ejto ti ki wkontsi.
Jachan i kij, yabich tm neech ti kin konoytsik ni jun xata. Tsubax tu utsltsik, ke ejtal xowa ka kontsi an Ttalb kal Nan tu bij, neech ti ki pidha.
Asta xo, yab xata a konymaltsik kal Nan tu bij; ka konoytsik ani neech ki pidhan abal ki kulbtsik echeki.

Ejtal jech tu tiltsaltsik kal i junbaxtalbki; por neech kin bajaw an kij tam yabich neech tu tiltsitsik xata kal i junbaxtalbki. Tam kin bajaw jachan an kij, neech tm tu xalkantschtsik tejwa ejtal kal tin kwenta an Ttalb.
Tam jachan i kij, neech ka kontsitsik xata an Ttalb kal Nan tu bij ani yab exom u ulal ke Nan neech ku pakabdha an Ttalb kal tattsik ta kwenta,
pos an Ttalb ti kanidhltsik. Ti kanidhltsik, kom tattsik tin kanidhl ani a belmalichtsik abal ba Dios tin tl.
In kale xon ti kwajat an Ttalb ani in tsch ba jech an kayl, por xo, neech ku jilaich jun an kayl ani neech kin witsch xon ti kwajat an Ttalb.
Utsan tm ench kal nin exbaliltsik: —Xo tajaxich exom ta kw ani yabich a ynl i junbaxtalb.
Xo i exbch abal a chob ejtal xowakich ani yab yejat ki konoy xata ni jun xita. Jaxtm ti bell ke ba Dios ta tl.
Tkoyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tm, tin bellichtsik xo?
Pos, neech kin bajaw an kij ani jaich xoich, tam neech ki bukeytsik tki tki xontiki ka chalpaytsik ki kale ani neech ti kin jilatsik kwetm. Por yab kwetm tin kwajat, kom an Ttalb kwajat kal Nan.

Tu utsltsik jech abal ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal tin kwenta abal i kwajattsik kal Nan. Neech tajat ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb tech ti kayl; por yab ka jilatsik tab, pos Nan u tmalich xowa yab alwa xi waach ban kayl.

Tam ti na Jess okon kin ulu ejtal jech, in teloloy walki ani in ulu ench: —Tta, in bajch an kij. Ti kin xalkantsch an tu labidh tokt, abal Nan, xin Chakmlb kal Tat, tu xalkantsch teye an ta labidh tokt.
Pos, Tat tin pidhmal ti awiltalb abal ku takiy an atiklbtsik ani abal ku pidhatsik jeye ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, ejtaltsik xi Tat tin pidhmal.
Neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal max ti ki exlaich Tat xi junkax Dios xi tsubax ani Nan, xi Tat tin abmal.
Nan tu xalkantsmalich an ta labidh tokt tech ti kayl ani u okymalich ku taja xowa tin abmal ku taja.
Tta, ti kin xalkantsch xo ta tamt an tu labidh tokt, kal jaychki an labidh tokattalb xu kool kal Tat asta tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl.
Xi Tat a takwymaltsik ti kayl abal ti kin pidha, u xalkantsmalich xitam j teye Tat. Tat a dhabaltsik ani tin pidha ani in exbaymalichtsik na kwintal.
Xo in chobichtsik abal ejtal xowa tin pidhmal, ba Tat ti tl;
pos u utsmalichtsik xowa Tat tin utsmal ani in exbaymalichtsik. In chobnmalichtsik ke tsubax lejtal ba Tat tin tl ani in belmalichtsik ke Tat tin abmal.
Tu pakabdhl abal ka pidhatsik ta alwatal, yab tu pakabdhl abal tin alwabl xi yabtsik u belom, tu pakabdhl abal tin alwabl xi Tat tin pidhmaltsik, kom Tat a dhabaltsik.
Ejtal xowa Nan u dhabal, a dhabal teye ani xowa Tat a dhabal u dhabal neye ani nu labidh tokt u xalkanal ba jajtsik.

Nan yabich ms neech kin kwajay ban kayl, por jajtsik neech ka jilkon ban kayl, Nan neech kin kalch abal kin kwajay kal Tat. Tokat Tta, ka beletnatsik kal na awiltal xita tin pidhmal abal ka kwajaytsik junini, jelti Tat kal Nan.

Tam tin kwajat kal jajtsik ban kayl, u beletnmal kal na awiltal, ejtaltsik xi Tat tin pidhmal. Xita Tat tin pidhmal, ni jun xita yab kibchonk, tokot xi kejle kibchonkich ti kwajat, abal ka tmun jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab.
Xo in nechich xon ti Tat i kwajat; por u ulal jech, lejat bl in kwajat ban kayl abal ka kulbtsik echeki jelt xan ti Nan in kulbl.
U ltsmalichtsik an ta kwintal, por atantsik kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, kom yabich tech u taknaltsik ban kayl, jelt xan ti Nan yab tech in taknal ban kayl.
Yab tu kontsal abal ka wkoytsik ban kayl, tu kontsal abal yab ka walka ka ttsik kal an lej atax.
Anchan jelti Nan yab in taknal ban kayl, jajtsik yab jeye u taknal ban kayl.
Ka tokotsik kal na tsubaxtalbil; na kwintal, jaich an tsubaxtalb.
Jelt xan ti Tat tin aba ban atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, anchan neye xo tu abltsik ban atiklbtsik xi yab u belom.
Ani kal jajkitsik tin kwenta ti neech ku pidhna tub kin chemdh abal jajtsik, kin pidhna jeye tinb kin tila an tsubaxtalb.
Por yab exom tu pakabdhl abal jajkitsik ka pidha an ta alwatal, tu pakabdhl jeye kal tin kwenta xi neechtsik ti kin bela tayl, tam kin achatsik an tsubaxtalb xi neech ka tiltsintsik.

Tu kontsal abal ka kwajaytsik echeki junini. Tta, ka kwajaytsik junini kal waw, anchan jelti Tat i kwajat kal Nan ani Nan in kwajat kal Tat. Ka kwajaytsik echeki junini abal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, kin belatsik ke Tat tin abmal.
U pidhmalichtsik an ti labidh tokattalb xi Tat tin pidhmal abal ka kwajaytsik junini, anchan jelti Tat ani Nan u kwajat junini.

Nan kin kwajay junini kal jajtsik ani Tat kal Nan abal ka kwajaytsik in tsubtalki lejtal junini. Anchan, neech tm kin exbay an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, ke Tat tin abmal ani ke a kanidhltsik tajat jelt xan ti Nan tin kanidhl.
Tta, xita tin pidhmaltsik, u l ka kwajay xon ti Nan neech kin kwajay abal kin chuutsik an labidh tokattalb xi Tat tin pidhmal; pos kejle tin kanidhl asta tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an chabl.
Tta, xa tajl tokot xowa lujat; xi yabtsik u belom, yab ti exll, por Nan tu exll ani jechtsik xita tin pidhmal, in chobichtsik ke Tat tin abmal.
U ltsmalichtsik xitam j teye Tat ani neech ku ntsi ku lna abal an kanidhaxtalb xi Tat tin kontsal, kin koytsik jeye ani Nan kin kwajay echeki kal jajtsik.
Tam ti okonich kin ulu ejtal jech, kale na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik abal ka kale jun jekat jl xu bijyb Sedrn. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun i alelb ani ochich taja na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik.
Na Judas, xi kl ti neech ka pidhn na Jess abal ka chemdh, in exll jeye alwa jachan an alelb, pos ynl tajat junkunk taja na Jess kal nin exbaliltsik.

Na Judas ulich taja kal yn i soldadotsik ani kal xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jech an belkoltsik, u taknal kal an oklek pletsik ani kal an fariseotsik. In jnmaltsik i macht ani i tajbaxtalb.
Por kom na Jess in chobich xanty neech kin tamu, utey xon ti kwajattsik ani in konoy ench: —Jita a ayaltsik?
Tkoyat ench: —A Jess xi Nasaret. Utsantsik ench kal na Jess: —Nanich xita na ayaltsik. Na Judas, xi kl ti exom ti pidhnb na Jess abal ka chemdh, ta jeye ti kwajat kal an ykwaltsik.
Tam ti utsantsik kal na Jess: “Nanich xita na ayaltsik”, kuxkulchtsik ani kwajlan.
Konyattsik jun ench kal na Jess: —Jita a ayaltsik? Tkontsik ench: —A Jess xi Nasaret.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Tu utsmalichtsik ke Nanich xita na ayal. Max Nan tin ayaltsik, ka walka ka kale xi jechtsik kwajat kal Nan.
Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulmal na Jess ench: “Xita Tat tin pidha, yab kibchon ni jn.”
Tmki jachan, na Simn Pedro xi ta tin kool jun i macht, in jixna ani in patntsi tin ejt xuchun jn ti b an ykwal xin bij ta Malko. Jech na Malko, jaich jn ti b nin tjnlil an oklek pletsik.
Por na Jess in utsa ench na Pedro: —Ka tapa an macht. Max an Ttalb in l kin chuu ku watna jech an yajtsiktalb, awxe yab yejat ku watna?
An soldadotsik kl nin oklkil ani an ykwaltsik xu taknal kal an judotsik, in yakwa na Jess ani in wika.
Jn tm okox na Jess bin kim na Ans. Jech na Ans jaich nin paylm na Kayfs, xi kwajat ti oklek ple jachan i tamub.
Na Kayfs, jaich xin utsmal an judotsik ke ms alwa abal jajtsik, ke jn tokot i inik ka chemech abal tin alwabl an atiklbtsik.
Na Simn Pedro ani jn jeye an exbal in wwnatsik na Jess. Na jn an exbal, in exlowl an oklek ple, jaxtm tin ejto ka ochich junax kal na Jess bin elbil nin kim an oklek ple.
Por na Pedro, jilkon elb ban wileb. Jaxtm, kale an exbal xin exlowl an oklek ple, kwin kal an mmlb xu belkol wileb ani in dha jeye na Pedro.
Konyat tm ench na Pedro kal an mmlb xu belkol wileb: —Yabxe jaich teye jn ti b nin exbaliltsik na Jess? Tkon ench na Pedro: —Yaba.
Kom chamay tam ti jachan i kij, an tjontsixtsik ani an ykwaltsik in jokpmal i kamal ani taja ti kubutsik ti dhilal. Na Pedro taja jeye ti kwajat kal jajtsik ti dhilal bin wl an kamal.
Konyat na Jess kal a oklek pletsik xanty in oktsixnl ani xitam j nin exbaliltsik.

Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan echeki in kwajinek tin kw tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Echeki in kwajinek tin oktsix ban pulek at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xon tu junkunal ejtal an judotsik ani yab u ulmal ni jun xata chinat.
Jantki tin konyal Nan? Ka konoytsik xanty u oktsmal xita tin achmal tin oktsix, jajtsik in chob xanty u oktsmal.
Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, chawat bin wal kal jn ti b an ykwaltsik xi taja jeye ti kwajat ani utsan ench: —Anchan ta tkoyal an oklek pletsik?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Max u ulu jun xata yab alwa, ka ulu xowa yab alwa u ulu; por max alwa xowa u ulu, jantki tin chawal?
Na Ans in abna tm wikats na Jess ba na Kayfs, nin oklkil an pletsik.
Tam ti jachan, na Pedro ta ti kubat ti dhilal ani utsan ench: —Yabxe jaich teye jn ti b nin exbaliltsik na Jess? Na Pedro in ulu ench: —Yaba.
Konyat tm ench kal jn ti b nin tojnlil an oklek pletsik, nin exlowl an inik xi kotsidh tin xuchun kal na Pedro: —Yabxe tat xita xu chumal ba jachan an chakam alelb junax kal Jaj?
Na Pedro in ulu jun ke yab ani ani tmki jachan, dhjan an pekel.

Kldh tm na Jess bin kim na Kayfs ani jn ban at xon tu ljundhom an pulek awiltalb. Tam ti jachan, exomich ti tsudhl ani an judotsik yab ochich ba jachan an at abal yab ka walbintsik, pos max ka walbintsik, yab tm neech kin ejto kin kaputsik an kapnl kal tin kwenta an paskwa.
Jaxtm ti kale na Pilato ani in utsatsik ench: —Jantom walastalb in tajmal jech an inik abal a utsbiyaltsik?
Jajtsik tkon ench: —Max Jaj yabak jaich jun i walablom, yab neech ki tsidha tech ta tamt.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —Ka jnaichtsik ani ka ljundhaich xan tin ulal an takixtalb xi tattsik a exll. Tkoyat ench kal an judotsik: —Waw yab i kool i awiltalb abal ki chemdha ni jun xita.
Anchan ti tmun abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulmal na Jess, tam ti kwajat in till xan ti neech ka chemdh.
Ochich tm jun na Pilato ban at xon tu ljundhom, in kaniy na Jess ani in konoy ench: —Tatxe nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Tin konyal jech kal Tatki ta kwetm chalab o abal i tiltsinkki kal keettsik?
Tkoyat ench kal na Pilato: —A chutalxe ke nan in judo neye? Na kidhtaltsik ani an oklek pletsik, jaich ti tsidhmaltsik tech tu tamt. Janty a tajmal?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan yab tech in takix ban kayl. Pos max anchanak, an atiklbtsik xi tin wwnl, pjxnkak abal yab kin pidhn ban judotsik. Por Nan yab tech in takix ban kayl.

Konyat tm ench kal na Pilato: —Tm, Tat i Pulek Takix? Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Nan in Pulek Takix, jelt xan ti tat a ulal. Nan in wachink ani in tsinek ban kayl abal ku tila xowa tsubax. Ejtal xita kin exbay an tsubaxtalb, in achltsik xowa u ulal.
Konyat ench kal na Pilato: —Ani janty in y an tsubaxtalb?
Por tattsik a ujnmalich ke nan ku walka jun i wiknl tam u ajbnb an paskwa; a lxe ka chuutsik ku walka nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik?
Tujeytsik tm jun kin ulutsik kawidh ench: —Jachan yaba! Ka walka na Barrabs! Jech na Barrabs, jaich jun i kw.
Na Pilato in abna tm ka lekbayat na Jess.
An soldadotsik in taja jun i kwetsotsl dhipadh kdh, in kwajbantsi bin k na Jess ani in xeketliy kal jun i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn.
U uteltsik tm ba na Jess ani in utsltsik ench: —Ki kwajay kijidh, Pulek Takxal an judotsik! Ani in chawaltsik bin wal.
Kale tm jun na Pilato ani in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Ka telatsik, u kldhl abal ka chuutsik ke yab u eltsal ni jun i walastalb.
Kale tm na Jess in kojm an kwetsotsl dhipadh kdh ani xeketlidh kal an chak kudhkum. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —J kwajat an inik!

Tam ti chutat na Jess kal an oklek pletsik ani kal xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pilato: —Ka jnaichtsik ani ka chemdhaich pajkidh ban peltsidh te, nan yab u eltsal ni jun in walab.
Tkoyat ench kal an judotsik: —Waw i kool jun i takixtalb ani jech an takixtalb in ulal ke yejat ka chemdh, abal in ulal ke u Chakmlb kal a Dios.
Tam ti na Pilato in acha jech, ms jikch.
Ochich tm jun ban at xon tu ljundhom ani in konoy ench na Jess: —Jn p teye ta tl? Por yab tkoyat kal na Jess.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pilato: —Yab neech ti kin tkoy? Yabxe a chob ke nan u kool i awiltalb ku ulu ki chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te o ku ulu ki walk?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Yab neech ka ejto ka koy ni jun i awiltalb kal Nan, max na Dios yabak ti pidhmal; jaxtm, xita tin pidhna kal tat, ms ja walbidh k tat.

Asta tam ti tm, na Pilato in ayal xan ti kin uwa abal kin ejto kin walka na Jess; por utsan kawidh ench kal an judotsik: —Max ka walka, yab a jab an lej pulek takix romano! Ejtal xita ka wenkon ti pulek takix, in tomnlich an lej pulek takix romano!
Tam ti na Pilato in acha jech, in ulu abal ka kldh na Jess ani buxkan xon tu ljundhom. An koytalb xon ti buxkan, ti kwintalb ebreo, u bijyb Gabata; jech in l kin ulu, Tujbidh.
Tam ti jachan, jnich a kts u kibel abal kin bajaw an ajib xu bijyb paskwa ani chejel ktsjich xna. Na Pilato in utsa tm ench an judotsik: —J kwajat na Pulek Takxaltsik!

Por jajtsik in ulu kawidh ench: —Ka chemdha! Ka chemdha! Ka chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te! Konyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Ku chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te na Pulek Takxaltsik? Tkoyat ench kal an oklek pletsik: —Waw yab i kool ms i pulek takxal, tokot an lej pulek takix romano.
Pidhanichtsik tm an ta Jess kal na Pilato abal kin jnatsik kin chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te. In bachutsik tm na Jess ani in jna.
Kldhjich tm na Jess in okbm an peltsidh te abal ka kale ban chabl xu bijyb “In beklk in k i chemlom inik”, (ti kwintalb ebreo, in l kin ulu Glgota).
Tam ti ulich ban chabl xin bij Glgota, pajkiyat ban peltsidh te. Junax kal Jaj, pajkiyat jeye chb i iniktsik, jn tin ejt ani jn tin kwatab.
Na Pilato in abna ka kwajb bin k an peltsidh te, jun i dhuslab xon ti kwajat dhutsadh ench: “Na Jess xi Nasaret, nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
Yn i judotsik in ajay jachan an dhuslab kom an chabl xon ti pajkiyat na Jess ban peltsidh te, kunat ti kwajat ban bitsow. An dhuslab kwajat dhutsadh ebreo, griego ani latn.
Jaxtm ti utsan ench na Pilato kal nin oklek pleil an judotsik: —Yab ka dhutsa: “nin Pulek Takxal an judotsik”, ms alwa ka dhutsa ench: “Xin ulal ke Jaj in Pulek Takxal an judotsik.”
Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Pilato: —Xowa u dhutsa, anchanich neech ka jilkon.

Tam ti an soldadotsik in pajkiymalich na Jess ban peltsidh te, in pentsi an tin kudhkmil na Jess ani in muu ti ch i peje, juntsik peje abal jun i soldado. In pentsi jeye an tin eblidh kudhkumil ani kom yab ja tsukudhki, juntaki ja tin publ ti kwajat,

tsxin an soldadotsik jn ani jn ench: —Yab ki muu, wana ku ubtin abal ki chuu xita kin lujuy kin dhabalna. Anchan ti tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “In wlchxnatsik nu kudhkmil ani ubtintsik abal kin chuu xita kin lujuy kin dhabalna nu eblidh kudhkumil.” Jech jaich xowa in taja an soldadotsik.
Kunat ban peltsidh te xon ti kwajat pajkidh na Jess, ta ti kwajat nin nna ani nin kidhb nin nna; na Mara, nin tomtal na Kleofas ani na Mara Magdalena.
Tam ti na Jess in chuu nin nna ani kubl jeye tin wl an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess, in utsa ench nin nna: —Mmlb, jachan kwajat na chakmil.
Tayl in utsa jeye ench an exbal: —Jachan kwajat na nna. Ani asta tam ti jachan i kij, nin nna na Jess, bachwat abal ka kwajch bin kim an exbal.
Ms tayl, kom na Jess in chob abal tmunich ejtal xowa bijidh neech ka tmun, in ulu ench abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab: —In tsikl.
T ti kwajat taja jun i balixtalb tsutsat kal i jiliy yajtsik uxnl. Axdh w i kwinim ba jachan an jiliy yajtsik uxnl, wikan bin tsm jun i te xu bijyb ti isopo ani utuntsat bin wi na Jess.
Tam ti na Jess in uchmich an jiliy yajtsik uxnl, in ulu ench: —Ejtalich tmun jelt xan ti bijidh neech ka tjan. Kutpan tm ani chemech.

Jnich a kts u kibel abal kin bajaw an paskwa ani an judotsik yab in l kin chuu ka jilkon nin tul an chemlomtsik ban peltsidh te tin ktsjil an koyxnich, pos jachan a kts jaich xi uluts tajat. Jaxtm ti pakabdh na Pilato abal kin abna ka pejtsin tin chejettsik xi ta ti kwajattsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani ka wkoyatichtsik tm ban peltsidh te junax kal na Jess.
Kale tm an soldadotsik ani in pejtsi tin chejet xi ta jeye ti kwajattsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Por tam ti uteytsik xon ti kwajat na Jess, in chuu abal chemnekich. Jaxtm ti yabich Ja pejtsin an tin chejet.
Por jn ti b an soldadotsik, in cholkantsi tin chyl kal jun i chupidh patl ani tmki ti kale i xich ani i ja.
Xita kwajat in till jech, jaich jun xita xin chumal ani tsubax xowa in ulal; jaj in chob alwa ke tsubax xowa in ulal abal ka belatsik teye.
Pos ejtal jech tmun abal ka tjan jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Yab neech ka pejtsin ni jun in beklk.”
Ani ta jeye kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab xon tin ulal ench: “Neech ka chuutsik xi chojbdhats.”

Tam ti watch ejtal jech, na Jos, xu kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Arimatea, in pakabdha na Pilato abal ka walkan kin jna nin tul na Jess. Na Jos jaich jun i inik xin bell na Jess, maske chinatki, kom in chejnl an judotsik. Pidhan an ti awiltalb kal na Pilato, kale tm na Jos ani in jnaich tm nin tul na Jess.
Ulich jeye na Nikodemo, xi kalnek jun i akal ti kw kal na Jess ani in tsidhl jun inik lju i kilo i ill xi tajadh kal i mirra xukudh kal i loe.
Na Jos ani na Nikodemo in bachutsik tm nin tul na Jess ani in boliy kal i kudhkum xi umtsidh jachan an ti niwiy ill; anchan xan tin tajl an judotsik tam in jolyal i chemlomtsik.
Xon ti chemdh na Jess pajkidh ban peltsidh te, ta ti kwajat jun i chakam alelb; taja, ta ti cholkadh i chn xon ti neech ka jolyat i chemlom, bl tajat t ani yab jayki jolidh bl ni jun xita.
Taja ti kwajbantsat tin tul na Jess, kom kunat ti kwajat jachan an jlimtalb ani abal tam ti jachan, tmich tin tojojoyal an judotsik xowa in yntsal abal an paskwa.
Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, na Mara Magdalena kale dhajawe ban jlimtalb, bl tajat jikwax. Tam ti ulich ban jlimtalb, in chuu abal wkodh an tujub xi kl ti paxkidh jachan an jlimtalb.
Kale tm adhik xon ti kwajat na Simn Pedro ani xi jn jeye an exbal xu kanidhb tajat ani in utsatsik ench: —An Ajtiklb wkodh ban jlimtalb ani yab i chob xon ti kwajbadh!
Na Pedro ani na jn an exbal kaletsik ani kale ban jlimtalb.
Chablam ti b ti kale ti dhiltsik; por na jn ms adhik ti kale k na Pedro ani okox ti ulich ban jlimtalb.
Kutpan kin tela ani in chuu an kudhkum xi kl ti boltsidh tin tul na Jess, por yab ochich.
Tin kuxmats ulich jeye na Simn Pedro ani ochich ja ban jlimtalb. In chuu jeye an kudhkumtsik xi kl ti boltsidh tin tul na Jess.
In chuu jeye abal an kudhkum xi kl ti boltsidh tin k na Jess yab junax ti kwajat kal xi ms an kudhkumtsik, plki ti kwajat mululudh.
Ochich jeye tm na jn an exbal xi okox ti ulnek ban jlimtalb, in chuu xanty tmnk ani in bela.
Pos yabl in exbaymaltsik xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, ke na Jess kool ka ejech ti t.
Tayl, jech an exbaltsik witsiy tin kim.
Na Mara jilkon elb ban jlimtalb ti uknal. Lejat kwajat ti uknal, kutpan kin tela alkidh ban jlimtalb,
ani in chuu chb i tokat abatwletsik xeketlidh kal i dhak kudhkum buxutsik xon ti kwajbantsidh tin tul na Jess, jn tin k ani jn tin akan.
Konyat ench kal an tokat abatwletsik: —Mmlb, jantki ta uknal? Jaj tkon ench: —In uknal abal in jntsidh an tu Ajtik ani yab u chob xon ti kwajbadh.
Tam tin ulmalich jech, chawkin ani in chuu na Jess, por yab in chob max jaich na Jess.

Konyat tm ench kal na Jess: —Mmlb, jantki ta uknal? Jita a ayal? Na Mara, kom in chalpay max jaich xu belkol an ti chakam alelb, in utsa ench: —Paylomlb, max tat a jnmal, ti kin ltsi xon ta kwajbmal abal kin kale ku iki.
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Mara! Na Mara chawkin ani in utsa ench kal i kwintalb xi ebreo: —Raboni! —jech in l kin ulu, Oktsix.

Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin walka, yabich ms ti kin taka, pos yabl in kalnek xon ti kwajat nu Tta. Por ki kale ani ka tiltsi an kidhblbtsik ke Nan in nechich xon ti kwajat nu Tta ani a Ttatsik teye, nu Diosil ani a Diosiltsik teye.
Kale tm na Mara Magdalena ani in ltsi an exbaltsik ke in chumal an Ajtiklb ani in ltsitsik jeye xanty usnk kal na Jess.

Tam ti jikwchinich jaychki jachan na kts, nin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, junkunk an exbaltsik ba jun i at mapupudh an wileb abal in jiknl an judotsik. Ochich na Jess, kubey junax chejel xon ti kwajat an exbaltsik ani chapndhaxin ench: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh!
Tam tin ulu jech, na Jess in lna nin kubak ani nin chyl. Ani an exbaltsik kulb tajat abal in chuutsik an Ajtiklb.
Utsantsik jun ench kal na Jess: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh! Anchan jelt xan tin abmal an Ttalb, anchan neye xo tu abltsik.
Jutsutsuyattsik tm kal na Jess ani utsantsik ench: —Ka bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb.
Xita ka pakwlantsitsik, neech ka pakwlantsat; xita yab ka pakwlantsitsik, yab neech ka pakwlantsat.
Na Toms, xu bijyb ti Kwaya, xi jaich jeye jn ti b xi lajuchb an exbaltsik, yab ja waach kal xi ms an exbaltsik tam ti ulich na Jess.

Tayl ltsin ench kal xi keet an exbaltsik: —I chumal an Ajtiklb. Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Toms: —Max yab ku chuu bin kubak xon ti ochenek an pajkixtalb ani ku xapa nu tstsbixtal xon ti ochenek an pajkixtalb ani ku xapa jeye nu kubak bin chyl, yab neech ku bela.

Waxik a kts ms tayl, an exbaltsik junkunk jun ba jun i at ani tam ti jachan i kij, ta jeye ti kwajat na Toms kal jajtsik. Mapudhtsik tin kool an wileb, por ochich na Jess, kubey junax chejel xon ti kwajattsik ani chapndhomch ench: —Ki kwajaytsik kijidh!
Utsan tm ench na Toms kal na Jess: —Ka xapa tech na tstsbixtal ani ka tela nu kubaktsik; ka tsidha na kubak ani ka xapa ba nu chyl. Yab ka jlkkliyal na chalab, tokot ka ntsi ti kin bela.
In ulu tm ench na Toms: —Tat tu Ajtik ani tu Diosil!
Utsan tm ench kal na Jess: —I belmch abalki tin chuu? Kijidhtsik tajat abal xita tin belltsik maske yab tin chumal!
Na Jess in tajm yn ms i labidh exltsik tin tamt nin exbaliltsik, xi yab kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w.
Por xowa kwajat dhutsadh, jaich abal ka belatsik ke na Jess jaich an Kristo, nin Chakmil na Dios ani max ka bela, neech ka koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Tam ti watenekich ejtal jech, na Jess in xalka jun tinb abal ka chutat kal nin exbaliltsik. Jech tmun bin wl an pujal xi Tiberias, ench ti tmun:

Jun i kij, kwajattsik junini na Simn Pedro, na Toms, xu bijyb ti Kwaya ani na Natanael, xu kwajl Kan, an bitsow xu taknal Galilea. T jeye ti kwajat nin chakmiltsik na Sebedeo ani chb ms in exbaliltsik na Jess.

Tam ti tajatsik ti kwajat junini, utsantsik ench kal na Simn Pedro: —Neech tin jixom tool. Jajtsik tkon ench: —U neech weye kal tat. Kadhiytsik tm ba jun i tan ani kale; por jachan i akal yab xata in ejtotsik kin jixa.
Tam ti exomich ti tsudhl, na Jess in xalka tinb tin wl an pujal, por an exbaltsik yab in chob max jaich na Jess.
Konyattsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Chakamtsik, yabxe xata a kool ki kapu? Tkontsik ench: —Yaba.

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka petnatsik nin jixb an tool tin ejt an tan ani neech ka jixatsik an tool. Anchan tin tajatsik ani junwki nibalich in ejtowaltsik kin kldha ban ja nin jixb an tool kal in lm, kom yn i tool ykwnk.
Utsan tm ench na Pedro kal an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess: —Jaich an Ajtiklb! Tam ti na Simn Pedro in acha abal jaich an Ajtiklb, xeketlin kom chilim ti kwajat ani in petna tinb ban ja.

Xi keet an exbaltsik, ulich kal an tan bin wl an pujal xon ti yab owtsik, in bodhkm in jixb an tool tsutsat kal an tooltsik; pos nin owl xon ti kwajattsik abal bin wl an ja, in kool xna bo inik i metro.
Tam ti ulichtsik ban chabl, in elatsik jokpadh i kamal. Ban kamal ta ti exom ti tekel jun i tool ani i pan jeye.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Ka tsidhatsik chb x i tool xi tall ta jixmaltsik.

Na Simn Pedro kadhiy ban tan ani in bodhoy in jixb an tool tsutsat kal an pakdha tool asta tin wl an ja xon ti yab lej owtsik. Nin yanl an tool, jun i bo inik kal chab inik lajux ani maske yn tajat an tool, nin jixb yab michkan.
Utsantsik tm ench kal na Jess: —Jala ta kapultsik. Ni jn an exbaltsik yab in l kin konoy xitam j jeye, kom in chobichtsik ke jaich an Ajtiklb.
Tayl utey na Jess, in tyna an pan ani in pidha an exbaltsik; anlki jeye tin taja kal an tool.
Jech jaich tin oxtalich ke na Jess in xalkl tinb abal ka chutat kal nin exbaliltsik tam ti ejnekich ti t.

Tam ti okonich ti kapultsik, na Jess in konoy ench na Simn Pedro: —Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, tin kanidhlxe ms ke xi jechtsik? Tkon ench na Pedro: —Tu kanidhl Ajtik, Tat a chob alwa abal tu kanidhl. Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Pos ti kin beletnantsi xita tin belltsik.

Konyat jun tin chabtal: —Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, tin kanidhlxe? Tkoyat ench kal na Pedro: —Tu kanidhl Ajtik, Tat a chob alwa abal tu kanidhl. Utsan ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin beletnantsi xita tin belltsik.

Konyat jun tin oxtal: —Simn, xi chakmlb kal na Jons, tin kanidhlxe? Na Pedro tepin abal xlich ti konyb max in kanidhl na Jess ani tkon ench: —Ajtik, Tat ejtal a chob; a chob abal tu kanidhl. Utsan tm jun ench kal na Jess: —Ti kin beletnantsi xita tin belltsik.

Tsubax tu utsl, ke tam ti ms i kwitle, i xeketlinal ani i kalel xon ti tat ka lena; por tam ki yejchelmch, neech ka dhaya na okb ani keet neech ti ki xeketliy ani neech ti ki jna xon ti yab a l ki kale.
Tam ti na Jess in ulu jech, kwajat in till xan ti neech ka chemech na Pedro ani anchan, kin xalkantsi tin labidh tokt na Dios. Tayl utsan ench na Pedro: —Ti kin wwna!

Tam ti chawkin na Pedro, in chuu abal ta jeye ti tl tin kx an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess. Jech an exbal, jaich xi jedhkakank bin okb na Jess tam ti kwajattsik ti kapul ani in konymal ench: “Ajtik, jita j xi neech ti ki pidhna abal ki chemdh?”
Tam ti na Pedro in chuu jech an exbal, in konoy ench na Jess: —Ajtik, janty jeye neech kin tamu jech an exbal?
Tkoyat ench kal na Jess: —Max u l ka kwajay ejat asta tam Nan kin witsiy, jant neech ka yna? Tat ti kin wwnaich tokot.
Jaxtm ti tlan ban kidhblbtsik, ke jech an exbal yab neech ka chemech. Por xowa in ulmal na Jess jaich jech: “Max u l ka kwajay ejat asta tam Nan kin witsiy, jant neech ka yna?”
Jech an exbal xu kanidhb tajat kal na Jess, jaich xi kwajat in till ejtal jech ani jaj in dhutsmal. Ani i chob ke tsubax xowa in ulal.
Waach jeye yn ms keet xowa in tajmal na Jess. Yn tajat, ke max ka dhutsan juntsik ti juntsik, u chalpayal ke nibal tin putll an kayl yab neech ka exey an dhutsadh wtsik xi ka tajan. Anchan ka tjan.
Pulek Tefilo, ban jidhtal w xi tu dhutsuntsi, u dhutsa ejtal xowa na Jess in taja ani in oktsixna tam ti tujeyki ejtal jech
ani asta tam tin bajaw na kts xowki ti kadhch walki. Tam ti yabl kadhinek walki, in takiy nin abatwlejiltsik xin takwym tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb abal kin chobnatsik xanty neech kin taja.

Tam ti chemdh na Jess ani ejnekich ti t, in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal nin abatwlejiltsik. Tin nakl chab inik a kts, in ntsi kin xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal jajtsik ke tsubax lejtal ti ejnek ti t. U tiltsinaltsik kal na Jess xan tu takix na Dios.

Tam ti bl kwajat junax kal an abatwletsik, utsantsik kal na Jess abal yab ka kaletsik ban bitsow Jerusaln. Ench ti utsantsik: —Ka aytsitsik an Tokat Ejattalb xin ulmal nu Tta ke neech ka tsch, jelt xan ti Nan tu utsmaltsik.
Tsubax kejle, na Juan pjlch kal i ja, por t chb x a kts neech ka bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb.
Konyat tm ench na Jess kal xi ta ti junkunktsik: —Ajtik, xoichxe ti neech ka taja abal yabich ku kwajay taknl kal i pl inik waw xu israelita?
Tkoyattsik ench kal na Jess: —Yab tattsik a lujyal ka chobna xowki o xowa neech kin taja an Ttalb xi tokot Jajki in kool i awiltalb kin taja;

por tam ka bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb, neech ka bachutsik i chplb. Neech ti ki likedha abal ki kaletsik ti kin tila putl Jerusaln, putl ban chabl xi Judea, xi Samaria ani asta ban owdha bitsowtsik xi waach tech ti kayl.
Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, lejat jajtsik kwajat in tell, na Jess dhayan ani jnjich walki; makwchiyat kal jun i tokow ani yabich ms chutat.
Lejat kwajat in telltsik walki tam ti exom ti kadhl na Jess, xalkan jun jiktowl xon ti kwajattsik, chb i iniktsik xeketlidh kal dhakni

ani utsantsik ench kal jachan an iniktsik: —Paylomlbtsik xi Galilea, jantki ta kwajattsik a tell walki? Jaychki jech na Jess xa chuutsik ti kadhl walki, neech ka witsiy jun anlki jelt xan ta chuutsik ti kale.
In jilaichtsik tm an chn xu bijyb Olibos ani witsiytsik Jerusaln. An bl abal ban chn Olibos asta Jerusaln, yab lej nakat; jaich tokot xowa in ulal an takixtalb ka beln tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.

Tam ti ulichtsik ban bitsow, kadhiy ban at xon tu kwajltsik. Jajtsik, jaich na Pedro, na Jakobo, na Juan, na Andrs, na Felipe, na Toms, na Bartolom, na Mateo, na Jakobo xu chakmlb kal na Alfeo, na Simn xu taknal ban junkuntalb xu bijyb kananista ani na Judas, nin kidhb na Jakobo.
Ejtal jajtsik u junkunal echeki abal ka lantsik junax kal nin kidhbtsik na Jess, kal na Mara nin nna na Jess ani kal xi ms an mmlbtsik.
Tam ti jachan i kij, kubey na Pedro junax chejel xon ti kwajat an kidhblbtsik, (nin yanl an kidhblbtsik jaich jn i bo inik kal jun inik i atiklbtsik) ani in utsatsik ench:

—Kidhblbtsik, kool ka tjan xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in ulmal ban Tokat Dhuslab, xi kwnk tin wi na Dabid, kal tin kwenta xowa neech ka tmun kal na Judas. Jech na Judas, jaich xi yan ti lnax kal an iniktsik xi kal ti yakwan na Jess.
Pos na Judas jaich jn ti b xi waw i kidhtal ani in kool jeyewiik xowa yejat kin taja kal jech an tojlb.
Por kale ani in chaay jun i chabl kal an tumn xin ta kal nin walab; tayl kwajlan chepat, pewen ani txin ejtal nin tidhdh.
Ejtal an kwajltsik xi Jerusaln, in chobna ani in bijiytsik jachan an chabl, Asldama, ke jaj tin kwintaltsik in l kin ulu, Xich Chabl.
Abal ban dhutsadh w, an ajatlbtsik in ulal ench: Ka jilkon walbadh nin altjil ani yab ka kwajay ni jun xita taja.  Ani in ulal jeye ench: Ani ka kuxyat kal keet.
Waach tech kal waw i paylomlbtsik xi tu juniknmal echeki tam ti tech ti kwajat kal waw ni Ajtik Jess,
asta tam ti pujyat kal na Juan asta tam ti kadhch walki. Yejat p, ke jn ti b xi jajtsik ka junkun kal waw abal kin tila jeye ke na Jess ejech ti t tam ti chemdh.
Bijyat tm chb xi jajtsik: na Jos, xu bijyb Barsabs ani u bijyb jeye ta Justo ani na Matas.
lantsik tm ench: —Ajtik, Tat xa a exll ejtal an ejattalbtsik, ti ku ltsi xita xi jech chb a takwymal
abal kin taja nin tojlbil jun i abatwle xi na Judas in jila kal nin walab, pos jaj kale xon tin lujyal ka kale.
Ubtintsik tm abal kin chuu xitam j kin lujuy ka jilkon tin kuxl na Judas, ani na Matas, jaich in lujuy ka jilkon. Asta ti tm, na Matas junkunich kal xi lajujn an abatwletsik.
Tam tin bajch nin ktsjil an ajib Pentekosts, ejtal an belomtsik junkunk junini.
Jun jiktowle ti achatm jun xata xi tl walki, jelti tam u wawnal jun i chapik ik ani achatm putlki an alt xon ti buxutsik.
Xalkan tm ba jajtsik in b jun i kamal jomoml.
Ejtal in bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb ani in tujutsik ti kw keetich keetich, xantiki ti tajan ka kwin kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat ti kwajltsik Jerusaln i judotsik xin tajl tajat xan tin ulal nin belomtaltsik, xi tltsik tki tki tin putll an kayl.
Tam ti achatm jachan, junkun jech an atiklbtsik ani nibalich in chobtsik xanty kin chalpay abal in achltsik ti kw an belomtsik keetich keetich jelt xan ti jajtsik u kw.
Labnktsik tajat ani u tsxtsik jn ani jn ench: —Yabxe jaich xu kwajltsik Galilea xi jech kwajat ti tilomtsik?
Jantki p tm ti achltsik ti kw jelt xan ti waw u kw asta tu tsitsik?
Pos tech kwajat i atiklbtsik xi tl Partos, xi Medos, xi Elm, xi Mesopotamia, xi Judea, xi Kapadosia, xi Ponto ani xi tltsik ban chabl xi Asia.

Tech jeye kwajat xi tltsik Frijia, xi Panfilia, xi Ejipto ani xi ban chabltsik xi Afrika xi kwajattsik ms w k Sirene. Tech jeye kwajat i romanotsik xu kwajltsik tech; taltsik xi jajtsik u judo ani taltsik yaba, por in wwnantsmalichtsik tin belomtal an judotsik.
Tech jeye kwajat i atiklbtsik xi tl Kreta ani xi Arabia. Ani ejtal i achltsik ti kw kal waw i kwintal, tam ti kwajattsik in till an pakdha labidhtalb xin tajm na Dios.
Ejtal labnktsik tajat, yabich in chobtsik xanty kin chalpay ani u knx jajkitsik ench: —Janty in l kin ulu ejtal jech?
Por taltsik u labdhnax ani in ulaltsik ench: —U itelkitsik ti kwajat.

Kubey tm na Pedro junax kal xi lajujn an abatwletsik ani in utsa kawidh ench an atiklbtsik: —At judotsik xi ulnek tech Jerusaln ani ejtal xi kwajltsik tech, ka chobnatsik jech ani ka achatsik alwa xanty neech tu utsa.
Jech an atiklbtsik yab u itel jelt xan ta chalpayaltsik, pos xowy belju i dhajaw.
Yab u iteltsik, jech jaich xowa xin ulmal an tiltsix Joel, tam tin ulu ench ijtsidh kal na Dios:

Na Dios in ulu abal ench neech ka tmun tam u kunelich an pakwenib, neech ku abtsi an tu Tokat Ejattal ejtalki an atiklbtsik; an chakmlbtsik neech ti tiltsix, xi yabltsik lej pakdha, neech kin chuu i xalkantsixtalb ani an yejcheltsik neech kin koy i watsib.
Jachan i kij neech ku pidha tajat tu Tokat Ejattal an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik xi tin tjontsal ani neech ti tiltsixtsik.
Ban walki neech ku xalka xowakich i labidh exltsik ani ban chabl neech ku xalka i exltsik: i xich, i kamal ani i paw xi jelti tokow.
Na kts neech ka jikwchin ani na ch neech ka wenkon jelti xich, tam yabl in bajmal an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb, xi jaich na kts xi plek ani labidh.
Ani ejtal xita kin konoy ka lowat kal an Ajtiklb, neech ka loey.

At judotsik, ka acha xanty neech tu utsatsik: Na Jess xi Nasaret, jaich jun i inik xi takudh kal a Dios ta tamt tattsik abal kin taja i pakdha labidhtalb, i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani i exltsik xin taja na Dios ba tattsik kal na Jesski, jelt xan ta chobichtsik alwa.
Por blki, tam ta pidhantsik an ta Jess, jelt xan ti na Dios in koolich kejle chalpadh, a jnatsik ti wiknl ani a pidhna ban atax iniktsik abal ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Por na Dios in ejdha ti t ani in tantsi tin awiltal an cheml. Pos na Jess yab neech ka ejtowat ka t kal an cheml.
A Jess u tilnal kal an pulek takix Dabid tam tin ulu ti weje ench: Echeki u chutal an Okxlb tu tamt; Jaj kwajat tu ejt abal yab ku jikna ni jun xata.
Jaxtm ti kulb tajat nu itsch ani jaxtm tu tila i tilabtsik xi kijidh. Ani jaxtm jeye ti neech kin koych u aytsm ke Jaj ti kin ejdha ti t;
pos Tat, tin Tokat Chakmil, yab neech ka jila nu ejattal bin takixtal an cheml, nibal neech ka walka ka kachey nu tul.
Tin ltsmalich an ti bl abal ku ela an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani neech tajat ti kin kijidhmdha tam kin kwajch xon ta kwajat.
At kidhbtsik, tsubax kejle ke ni weje paklil Dabid chemech ani jolyat, pos an jlimtalb xon ti jolidh, tech bl kwajat kal waw.
Por na Dabid jaich jun i tiltsix ani in chob abal usnk tsubax tajat kal na Dios, ke jn ti b nin kidhtaltsik jaich neech an ti Kristo xi neech ka buxkan ti takix bin tokat kwajtalbil.

Jaxtm na Dabid, kom in chobich xanty usnk kal na Dios, in ulu abal an Kristo neech ka ejech ti t ani in ulu jeye abal nin ejattal yab neech ka jilkon bin takixtal an cheml nibal neech ka odhey nin tul.
Pos na Dios in ejdha ti t jech na Jess ani ejtal jech i chumal ani i ulal abal tsubax lejtal.
Pos Jaj dhayan kal in chp nin ejt kubak na Dios an Ttalb ani pidhan kl an ti Tokat Ejattalb xi usnk neech ku abtsin. Ejtal jech xowa a chumaltsik ani a achmal, tl ban Tokat Ejattalb.
Pos na Dabid yab jaj na kadhiy walki, por jaj in ulu ench: An Okxlb in utsa ench nu Ajtik: “Ki buxkan tu ejt,
asta tu tantsi an ti atiklbtsik xi ti tomnl.”
Ka chobnatsik alwa, atiklbtsik xi Israel, ke jech na Jess xi tattsik a chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te, na Dios in kwajba abal ti Ajtiklb ani ti Kristo.
Tam tin achatsik jech, tepintsik tajat asta tin itsch ani konyat ench na Pedro ani xi ms an abatwletsik jeye: —Kidhblbtsik, janty yejat ki taja?

Tkoyattsik ench kal na Pedro: —Ka jilaichtsik ta walablom ani ka tajaichtsik xowa in l na Dios. Ki pujanichtsik tin bij na Jesukristo abal ki pakwlantsatich an ta walastalbiltsik ani anchan, na Dios neech tm ti pidhaichtsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb.
Jech xowa na Dios in pidhnl, jaich abal tattsik, abal na chakmiltsik ani abal ejtalki jeye xi kwajattsik owdha; jaich abal ejtalkitsik xita ka kanyat kal an Okxlb ni Diosil.
Kal jech an tilabtsik ani chb x ms, na Pedro in tawna ani in takiytsik ench: —Ka bachchtsik an loeltalb ani yabich ki kwajaytsik yab alwa jelti xi keet an atiklbtsik.
Anchan p, xin belatsik jech xowa utsan, pujyattsik. Jachan a kts, belmch ox mil xna i atiklbtsik ms.
Ejtal in ntsi kin bela xowa j u oktsinaltsik kal an abatwletsik, kwajajadhtsik alwa jn ani jn, u ltsik ani u junkunaltsik abal kin kapu an pan.
Ejtal u labnaltsik tajat, kal tin kwenta xi yn an labidh labandhaxtalb ani an exltsik xin tajl an abatwletsik.
Ejtal xi belmmadhichtsik, u junkunal tajat ani u chjwlx xatakich jn ani jn.
In nujwaltsik nin chablil ani ejtal xowa in kooltsik ani in wlchxnltsik an tumn ejtalki ti b xantiki tin kooltsik an yejetalb.
Tsudhey ka tsudhey u junkunaltsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ban attsik abal kin pjtsxna an pan; in kapaltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb ani kal jun in chaat ejattaltsik.
In ajtintsaltsik na Dios ani u kaknbtsik kal ejtal an atiklbtsik. Ani an Ajtiklb in yanedhl an belomtsik tsudhey ka tsudhey xu utelichtsik abal ka loch.
Jun i kij, tam ti xich i wkal, na Pedro ani na Juan kale junax ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jech i ora tmich tin ujnmaltsik ka kalel ti l.

Tsudhey ka tsudhey u kwajl taja jun i inik xu kweche; jech an inik, u kweche ti wachink. U jnb ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani u kwajbb ban wileb xu bijyb ti Labidh abal kin kontsi ti tolmixtalb xu ocheltsik taja.
Tam ti chutat na Pedro ani na Juan kal an kweche ke exomichtsik ti ochel ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, pakabdhaxin an kweche abal ka pidhan ti tolmixtalb.
Teloloyat tm kal na Pedro ani na Juan ani utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Ti ku tela.
Telxin tm an inik abal in chalpay max neech ka pidhan ti tolmixtalb.
Por utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Yab u kool i plata nibal i oro, por neech tu pidha xowa u kool. Tin bij na Jesukristo xi Nasaret, tu utsl ki kubey ani ki beley.
In tyna tm na Pedro an inik bin ejt kubak ani in dhaya; tmki ti likey nin akantsik ani nin mulk nin akantsik jachan an inik.
Tikcholch tm an kweche, kubey ani in tujch tm ti belal. Ochich tm junax kal jajtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, u belal, u tikwnal ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios.
Kal ejtal an atiklbtsik ti chutat ti belal ani ti pubdhantsix tin bij na Dios.
Labnktsik tajat ejtal ani u jikl abal anchan in chuutsik tmun, pos u exlb ke jachan an inik, jaich xu buxkanal ti konox tolmixtalb bin wilbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, xu bijyb ti Labidh.

Yab u jilchowb na Pedro ani na Juan kal an inik xi jeldh; ejtal an atiklbtsik labnk tajat ani adhiktsik ti kale bin chakll an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jech an chak, jaich xu bijyb Salomn. Taja ti kwajattsik na Pedro, na Juan ani an inik xi jeldhats.

Tam ti na Pedro in chuu jech, in utsa ench an atiklbtsik: —Paylomlbtsik xi kwajl Israel, jantki ta labnktsik tajat? Jantki ta kwajattsik tu tell jelti max kal waw i chp o i tokattal ti jeley ani ti beley jech an inik?

Yab anchan, nin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk, na Jakob ani ni weje pakliltsik in pidhmal tin pulek awiltal nin Chakmil Jess. Jachan an inik, jaich xi tattsik a pidhna ban tjodhtsik. Tam ti na Pilato in lena kin walka, tattsik yab a lena.
Tam ti yejat ka konoy abal ka walk jachan an inik xi tokat ani lujat, tattsik, tokot a konoy ki walkantsat jun i chemdhax inik.
Anchan ta chemdhatsik jachan an inik xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Por na Dios in ejdha ti t ani ejtal jech, waw i chumal.

Jaich kal tin bij jech na Jess, o jaich ki ulu, an belomtalb kal Jaj tin bij, jaich kl ti pidhan an ti chplb jech an inik xa chutaltsik ani a exll. Jech an belomtalb kal na Jess, jaich kl ti jeldh, anchan xan ti xo i kwajat a chutaltsik.
Kidhblbtsik, u chob alwa, ke tam ti tattsik ani na oklkiltsik a chemdha na Jess, a tajatsik anchan abal yab a chobtsik xanty i kwajat a tajl.
Por na Dios in taja anchan jelt xan tin ulmich kejle ms okox kal nin tiltsxiltsik, ke an Kristo kool kin watna i yajtsiktalb ani ka chemdh.
Jaxtm xo, ka jilaich ta walablomtsik ani ka belaichtsik na Dios abal ki pakwlantsattsik an ta walastalbil. An Okxlb neech tm kin abna i kij xi alwa,
neech kin aba na Jesukristo, xi takudhich ti weje abal tattsik ki loey.
Por xo, yejat kejle ke na Jesukristo ka kwajay ban walki asta tam na Dios kin lejkch ejtal, jelt xan tin ulmal kal nin tokat tiltsxiltsik xi kwajinektsik ti weje.
Anchan p, na Moiss in utsa ench ni weje pakliltsik: “Na Dios an Okxlb neech kin takuy jun ti b xi tattsik abal ti tiltsix jelt xan ti nan tin takwymal. Ka exbantsitsik ejtal xowa Jaj ti ki utsa.
Pos ejtal xi yab kin taja ti kij jachan an tiltsix, neech ka kibdhtsik ani neech ka wkoyat ban atiklbtsik xin takwymal na Dios.”
Ejtal an tiltsixtsik, asta tam ti xechin na Samuel ani xi ms tayltsik, in tilmal jech an kijtsik.

Xowa na Dios in ulmal kal nin tiltsxiltsik, jaich abal tattsik. Jaich jeye abal tattsik ta alwabl tin tajmal na Dios jun i lejkintalb kal ni weje pakliltsik, tam tin utsa na Abraham ench: “Ejtal xi ka wachintsik tech ti kayl, neech ka lbtjan kal tatki na kidhtaltsik.”
Tam ti na Dios in ejdha ti t nin Chakmil, tu abtsi okox waw abal ti ku lbtaja ani ki jilaich tu walablom.
Tam ti na Pedro ani na Juan bl kwajat in tawnl an atiklbtsik, ulich an pletsik junax kal nin oklkil an belkol pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani kal an saduseotsik.
Jajtsik u chakl tajat abal na Pedro ani na Juan in oktsal an atiklbtsik ani in ulal abal an chemlomtsik u ejel ti t jelt xan ti na Jess ejech ti t.
Jntsik tm ani balyat ban wikaxte asta jun tsudhelom, pos tam ti jachan a kts, wkalich.
Por yn i atiklbtsik belmch xin acha xowa in ulu na Pedro. Nin yanl an atiklbtsik xi belmch, tokot jki ajidh an iniktsik, in bajaw xna wich bo mil.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, junkuntsik Jerusaln an pakdha awiltalbtsik, nin oklkiltsik an judotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
T jeye ti kwajattsik na Ans, xi jaich in oklkil an pletsik, na Kayfs, na Juan, na Alejandro ani ejtal in kidhtaltsik an oklek pletsik.
Abn tm ka iktat na Pedro ani na Juan, kwajbtsik junax chejel ani konyattsik ench: —Kal jantom awiltalb, o kal jita in bij ta tajmaltsik ejtal jech?
Na Pedro, teykmte kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb in utsatsik tm ench: —Oklek atiklbtsik ani oklek judotsik,
kom tattsik tu konyal kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xi tjan ba jun i yaul inik abal a l ka chobnatsik xan ti jeldh,

neech ki ulu ta tamttsik abal kin chobna ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Israel, ke jech an inik xi j kwajat, jelnek tin bij na Jesukristo xi Nasaret. Jech na Jesukristo, jaich xi tattsik a chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani xi na Dios in ejdha ti t.
Jelti jun i kbal at xin kwajba pl jun i tujub abal yab in l kin yna, anchan ta tajatsik kal na Jess, por Jaj in bajaw ka kwajay jelti an tujub xi ultalb.
Ba ni jun xita ms ti neech ki ela i loeltalb; pos na Dios yab xita ms tu bijtsmal tech ti kayl, xi neech kin ejto ti ku loo.

Tam ti an oklektsik in chuu ti kw na Pedro ani na Juan kal ni jun i jkib ani in chobtsik ke jajtsik yab exblommadh, nibal in chobtsik xan tu wilnal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, labantsik tajat ani in ulutsik tm, ke jechtsik jaich xi xechink kal na Jess.
An inik xi jeldhats ta jeye ti kubat junax kal jajtsik, jaxtm an oklektsik ti yab in ejto kin ulu ke yab tsubax.
Utsantsik tm abal ka kalch taja xon ti kwajat an junkuntalb ani jajtsik jilkon ti kwlx.
Ani in ulaltsik ench: —Janty neech ki taja kal jech an iniktsik? Pos ejtal xu kwajltsik Jerusaln in chob abal in tajmal jech an labidh labandhaxtalb ani yab neech ki ejto ki ulu ke yab ani.
Por abal yabich ms ka chobn kal an atiklbtsik jech xowa tmun, wana ki utsatsik abal neech ki atax tajtsitsik abal yabich ms xita kin tiltsitsik an ta Jess.
Kanyattsik tm ani utsantsik abal yabich ka kwin nibal ka oktsixin tin bij na Jess.
Por tkoyattsik ench kal na Pedro ani na Juan: —Ka chalpaytsik max alwa ms tin tamt na Dios ki taja xowa tattsik a l, o ki taja xowa in l na Dios.
Pos waw yab neech ki ejto ki jila ki tila xowa i chumal ani i achmal.

Utsantsik tm ms kal an oklektsik abal neech ka atax tajtsintsik, por walktsik. Yab in ela xantokl ti kin walbindhatsik, pos ejtal an atiklbtsik in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta xowa tmun.
An inik xi jeldh kal tin awiltal na Dios, in koolich chab inik watats i tamub.
Tam ti walkadhichtsik, na Pedro ani na Juan, kaletsik xon ti kwajat nin kidhtaltsik ani in ltsi ejtal xowa utsantsik kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani kal nin oklkil an judotsik.
Tam tin achatsik, ejtal jununl ti lan ani in utsatsik ench na Dios: —Okxlb, Tat ni Dios xa tajmal an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani ejtal xowa waach.
Tat, kal na Tokat Ejattal ani kal nin wi na tjontsixil Dabid, a ulu ti weje ench: Jantki tu pjx an pakdha bitsow ani an atiklbtsik in chalpayal xowa xi yab xata in jalbl?
An pakdha takix ani an oklektsik xi tech ti chabl, junkuntsik abal ti kin pjey ani abal kin pjey jeye an Kristo xu takwym.
Tsubax kejle, na Erodes ani na Ponsio Pilato, junkuntsik ba jech an bitsow kal an pl iniktsik ani kal an israelitatsik abal kin pjey na tokat Chakmil Jess, xi Tat a takwymal.
Kal jech, jajtsik in taja ejtal xowa Tat a ulmal ke anchan neech ka tmun.
Ani xo, Okxlb, ka acha xan tu utsan ke neech ku atax tajtsin, por ti ku pidha ti chplb abal waw xi jaich na tojnliltsik, ki ntsi ki tila na kwintal kal ni jun i jkib.
Kal na awiltal ki jeldha i yaultsik, ki taja i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik tin bij na tokat Chakmil Jess.
Tam ti okonichtsik an ti l, an chabl xon ti kwajattsik, yoyon; likedhantsattsik tin itsch kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani in ntsi kin tilatsik nin kwintal na Dios kal ni jun i jkib.
Ejtal xi belmmadhichtsik, jununltsik ani tin kool nin chalab ani jununltsik nin ejattal. Ni jun xita yab in ulal ke xowa in kool kwetm tin dhabal, tokot in ulal abal ejtalki tin dhabaltsik.
An abatwletsik in ntsal kin tila kal yantam i awiltalb, ke na Jess ejnek ti t ani u lbtajnaltsik tajat kal na Dios ejtalkitsik.
Yab waach kal jajtsik ni jun xita xi watatsich tajat tin yntsal jun xata; pos ejtal xin kool i chabltsik o i attsik, in nujwaltsik, in tsidhl an tumn
ani in pidhl an abatwletsik. An abatwletsik in wlchxliyal xantiki jn tin yntsal.
Anchan jeye tin taja na Jos, jun i lebita xi Chipre tu chakam, an chabl xi kwajat ban ja; bijyat kal an abatwletsik ta Bernab, jech an bijlb in l kin ulu Xu kijidhmdhom.
Jech an inik in nuju jun i chabl xin kool ani in tsidha an tumn abal kin pidha an abatwletsik.
Por jun i inik jeye xu bijyb ta Ananas ani nin tomtal xin bij ta Safira, in nujutsik jeye jun i chabl.
Jech an inik, yab in pidhna ejtal an tumn, in jila w ani xi ms, in pidha an abatwletsik. Por jaj in pidhna jachan an tumn jelti max ejtal xin bachu ani nin tomtal in chob alwa ejtal jech.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ananas, jantki ta walka ti ki tantsi ta itsch an lej atax abal ti taja ka kambiy an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab ka pidhna ejtal in jalbl an chabl xa nujmal?
Yabxe tat a dhabal jachan an chabl? Ani tam ta nujch, yabxe tat a dhabal an tumn xa bachu? Jantki ta chalpay ka taja anchan? Yab a kambiymal i iniktsik, xita a lenmal ka kambiy, a Dios.
Tam tin acha jech, na Ananas kwajlan ani chemech. Ejtal xin chobnatsik jech, jikeytsik tajat.
Ulich tm chb x i kwitl iniktsik, in boliy an chemlom ani in jnatsik kin joliy.
x i ora ms tayl, ochich nin tomtal na Ananas ani jaj yab in chob xanty tmnk.
Konyat ench kal na Pedro: —Ti kin utsa, tsubaxxe lejtal anchan ta nujmaltsik an chabl jelt xan ta ulmaltsik? An mmlb tkon ench: —Anchan.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Jantki ta tajatsik i kw abal a lena ka kambintsi tin Tokat Ejattal an Okxlb? Jachan tl elb xi kaletsik kin joliy na tomkl ani xo, tat teye neech ti ki jna.
Tmki jachan, kwajlan jeye chabl na Safira ani chemech. Tam ti ochich an kwitl iniktsik, chemnekich tin ela; in kldhaichtsik tm ani in jna kin joliy tin wl xon ti jolidh nin tomkl.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu belomich ani ejtal jeye xin chobnatsik jech, jikeytsik tajat.
Yn i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik in tajl an abatwletsik ban atiklb kal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb; ejtal an belomtsik u junkunal ban chak xu bijyb Salomn ani juninitsik nin chalab.
Yab u junkunal kal jajtsik ni jun xita xi yab u belom, por u kaknbtsik tajat kal an atiklbtsik.
Tsudhey ka tsudhey ms u yanel an atiklbtsik xin bellich an Ajtiklb, i paylomlbtsik ani i mmlbtsik.
U kldhb an yaultsik ban bltsik, u kwajbb ban chytsik ani ban chaytetsik abal ka bajwattsik kal nin chalm na Pedro tam ka watey taja.
U ulel jeye i atiklbtsik Jerusaln xu kwajl ban kwentsaltsik xi taja kunat. In tsidhl an yaultsik ani xi kwajattsik jeye ochadh kal i atax ejattalb ani ejtal u jeldhbtsik.
An oklek pletsik ani nin kidhtal an saduseotsik, xi ta ti kwajattsik kal jaj, chakuytsik tajat abal in atl xowa in tajl an abatwletsik
ani in jna abal kin baliy ban wikaxte xon tu balyb ejtalkitsik.
Por tam ti akal, jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb in japiy in wilbil an wikaxte ani in kldhatsik. Tam ti exomich ti kalel, utsantsik ench:
—Ki kalchtsik ani tam i kwajattsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ka tiltsi an atiklbtsik ejtal kal tin kwenta jech an t xechintalb.

Tam tin achatsik jech, jun tsudhelom dhajawe ti ochichtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in tujutsik ti oktsix. Tam ti jachan, ulich an oklek pletsik junax kal xi ta ti kwajattsik kal jaj, in kaniytsik xu takix ban Junkulom Awiltalb ani ejtal jeye nin oklkil an israelitatsik. In abna tm ka iktat ban wikaxte an abatwletsik.
Por tam ti ulich ban wikaxte an belkoltsik, yab in elatsik; ani tam ti witsiytsik,
in ulu ench: —Mapupudh alwa ti ela an wikaxte ani an soldadotsik ta ti kwajat elb ti belkol ban wilebtsik; por tam tin japiy an wilebtsik, yab i ela ni jun xita alt.
Tam tin achatsik jech nin oklkil an pletsik, nin oklkil xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani an ultalb pletsik, u knxtsik xan ti neech ka kale ti oknal jech.
Tmki jachan, ulich jun i inik ani utsantsik kl ench: —An iniktsik xa balymaltsik ban wikaxte, ta kwajattsik in oktsal an atiklbtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Kale tm nin oklkil xu belkoltsik an ti pulek at, kl an ykwaltsik ani in tsidhatsik, por yab xata tin tajtsitsik abal in chejnl ka tujbayat kal an atiklbtsik.
Tam ti uldhtsik, kwajb tin tamt an Junkulom Awiltalb ani utsantsik ench kal nin oklkil an pletsik:

—Waw i ulu alwa abal yabich i l ki chuu ki oktsixintsik tin bij na Jesukristo. Ani janty a tajatsik? Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Jerusaln a oktsmalichtsik kal jachan an oktsixtalb ani a ltsik ti ku walbindha kal nin chemtal jachan an inik.
Tkon tm na Pedro ani xi ms an abatwletsik ench: —Waw i chob alwa ke yejat ki taja xowa in ulal nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios ani yab, xowa in ulal an iniktsik.
Nin Diosil ni weje paklil in ejdha ti t na Jess, xi tattsik a chemdha pajkidh ban peltsidh te.

Na Dios in dhaya tekat, in kwajba tin ejt ani in kwajba ti Okpidh Oklek ani ti Loox. In taja anchan abal kin pidha bl ti kij an atiklbtsik xi Israel abal kin jilatsik ti walablom ani ka pakwlantsat tin walastalbiltsik.
Ejtal jech i chumal weye ani an Tokat Ejattalb jeye. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, jaich xi na Dios in pidhmalich xu axtsinal kl tin tsubaxtalbil.
Tam tin achatsik jech, chakuytsik tajat ani in lenatsik kin chemdha an abatwletsik.

Por taja ban awiltalbtsik, ta ti kwajat jun i fariseo xu bijyb ta Gamaliel, jaich jn ti b an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani u kaknb tajat kal an atiklbtsik. Kubey ani in ulu abal ka kldh junw an abatwletsik.
In utsa tm ench an awiltalbtsik: —Atiklbtsik xi Israel, ka koytsik tajat i kwenta kal xanty a l ka tajtsi jech an iniktsik.

Ka chalpaytsik ke ti wel chabki xechin na Tewdas, xin pjey an lej pulek takix ani in ulu ke jaj jaich jun i pulek inik, wwn kal ch i bo inik i iniktsik. Por chemdh ani ejtal xi kl ti wwnadh, buklantsik ani anchan ti okon.
Ms tayl, tam ti tajan an ajumtalb, xechin jeye na Judas xu kwajl Galilea ani kal yn jeye ti wwn; por chemdh jeye ani ejtal xi wwnaxnk, buklan.
Jaxtm tu utsltsik, jila kwajat jech an iniktsik ani yab xata ka utsatsik. Pos max jech xowa in tajltsik, in chalab i iniktsik, neech ka okon;
por max a Dios in chalab, yab neech ka ejto ka tamkuytsik. Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta; pos yab a chobtsik max exom ta pjx kal i iniktsik o kal a Dios.
