Ejtal in exbaytsik xowa utsan kal na Gamaliel. Kanyat tm an abatwletsik, kwadhan ani utsantsik abal yabich ms ka xechintsik ti kw tin bij na Jess ani walkjichtsik tm.
Kalch tm an abatwletsik xon ti kwajat an awiltalbtsik ani u kulbltsik tajat abal pidhan ti chplb kal a Dios kin watna i tidhetalb kal tin kwentaki in bij na Jess.
Tsudhey ka tsudhey yab in jilltsik kin oktsixna an alwa tilab ani kin tila ke na Jess jaich na takudh kal na Dios. U oktsixtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ban attsik jeye.

Tam ti jachan i kij, kom an belomtsik yanch, an judotsik xu kw griego tujey ti itixbltsik kal an judotsik xu kw ebreo. In ulaltsik xu kw griego ke an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi jaj in kidhtal, yab u lej tajtsinaltsik ti kij tam u pidhnb an kapnl tsudhey ka tsudhey.
Junkuwat tm ejtal an belomtsik kal xi lajuchb an abatwletsik ani utsantsik ench: —Yab in tomnl ki jila ki tila nin kwintal na Dios kal tin kwentaki abal ku kwajay tu pidhnom kapnl.
Jaxtm kidhblbtsik, ka aliy bk i paylomlbtsik xi tattsik a kidhtal, xi alwa iniktsik, xi chalpadhtsik, xi teykmte tajat kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani jaich ka punkuntsitsik jech an ti tojlb.
Waw neech ki ntsi tu l ani ki oktsixna nin kwintal na Dios.

Ejtaltsik in tokoy jech ani takwyat na Esteban, jun i inik xu belom tajat ani teykmte tajat kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Takwyat jeye na Felipe, na Prkoro, na Nikanor, na Timn, na Parmenas ani na Nikols, jun i inik xu kwajl Antioka xin belmal jeyewiik nin belomtal an judotsik.
Tsidhtsik tm xon ti kwajat an abatwletsik, lan an abatwletsik ani in kwajbatsik nin kubak bin b xi takwyattsik.
Nin kwintal na Dios jikat tajat ti bukey ani an belomtsik jikat tajat ti yaney Jerusaln, asta yn in pleiltsik an judotsik belmch.
Na Esteban, jun i inik xin bachmal tajat nin alwatal ani nin chp na Dios, in tajl i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani i exltsik ban atiklbtsik.

Tm, taltsik i atiklbtsik xu taknal ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb xu bijybtsik ti jolib xi walkadhich, junax kal i atiklbtsik xi Sirene, xi Alejandra, xi Silisia ani xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Asia, in tujutsik ti kwlx kal na Esteban;
por yab u ejtowb ka tomn na Esteban abal jaj u kw kal yantam i chalpadhtalb xu pidhnal kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Jalbiyat tm kal jechtsik taltsik i iniktsik abal kin ulu ke in achmal ti odhbjil ta Moiss ani ta Dios.
Anchan ti chakdh an atiklbtsik, nin oklkil an judotsik ani an oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; pjeyat kl na Esteban, yakwan ani jn tin tamt an Junkulom Awiltalb.
Alyat jeye i jnum kwtsik, xin ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik yab u koyol ti odhbjil an ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani an tin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
I achmal jeye tin ulu ke na Jess xi Nasaret neech kin paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani neech kin jalkuy ejtal xowa in jilmal ka tajan na Moiss.
Tam ti an awiltalbtsik ani ejtal xi ta ti buxutsik in tela na Esteban, in chuutsik ke nin wal na Esteban in junwal jelt in wal jun i tokat abatwle.
Konyat tm ench na Esteban kal nin oklkil an pletsik: —Tsubaxxe jech xowa i usnal?

Ani na Esteban tkon ench: —At kidhtaltsik ani ttalbtsik, ka acha xanty neech tu utsatsik: Ni labidh tokat Diosil, in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal ni weje paklil Abraham tam ti kwajat ban chabl xi Mesopotamia, tam ti yabl kalnek ti kwajl Arn
ani utsan ench: “Ka jila na chablil ani ejtal na exlowltsik ani ki kale ban chabl xi neech tu ltsi.”
Kale tm na Abraham bin chablil an kaldeotsik ani kale ti kwajl Arn. Tayl chemech nin tta ani na Dios in tsidha na Abraham ti kwajl tech xon ti tattsik xo i kwajat.

Por yab pidhan kal na Dios tech ni jun peje ti chabl abal kin dhabalna, nibal jun peje ela xon ti kin kuba jun in akan; por utsan abal neech ka pidhan ani ke tayl, tam jaj ka chemchich, nin chakmiltsik jaich neech kin dhabalna; maske tam ti jachan i kij, na Abraham yabl in kool ni jun in chakmil.

Ani utsan jeye ench kal na Dios: “Na kidhtaltsik neech ka kwajay jelti pl iniktsik ba jun i chabl xi yab jajtsik in dhabal, neech ka tajan ti jolibtsik ani neech ka tajtsin xan ti ka len, tin nakl ch i bo inik i tamub.”
Por utsan jeye ench: “Nan neech ku ljundha an yejche bitsow xi kin taja ti jolib na kidhtaltsik ani tayl, na kidhtaltsik neech ka kale taja ani neech ti kin tjontsitsik ba jech an chabl.”

Na Dios in taja jun i lejkintalb kal na Abraham ani utsan kin tajtsal jun i exl bin tul an kwitl chakamtsik abal kin koy ti exl kal tin kwenta an lejkintalb. Jaxtm, tam ti wachin ti chakam na Isk, na Abraham in tajtsi jun i exl bin tul tam tin kidhbch waxik a kts ti wachink ti chakam. Anlki jeye tin taja na Isk kal nin chakmil Jakob ani na Jakob anlki jeye tin taja kal xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik. Jechtsik, jaich ni weje paklil.
Jech ni weje pakliltsik, in ata nin kidhb xin bij Jos ani in nujutsik abal ka jn ban chabl xi Ejipto. Por na Dios taja ti kwajat junax kal na Jos

ani in tolmiy kal ejtal an yajtsiktalb xin tametna. In pidha ti chalab ani in tolmiy abal kin bajaw ka kanidh kal an Faran. Jech an Faran, jaich an pulek takix xi Ejipto, xi kl ti bijyat na Jos ti pulek awiltalb abal ka takxin Ejipto ani abal ka takxin jeye bin kim jech an pulek takix.
Wachin tm i kanab ani jun i yajtsiktalb plek, ban chabl xi Ejipto. Anchan jeye ti tmun Kann ani ni weje pakliltsik yabich in ell xanty kin kapu.
Por tam ti na Jakob in acha abal waach i trigo Ejipto, in aba taja nin chakmiltsik, xi jaich ni weje pakliltsik. Jech jaich an jidhtal bl xin tajatsik.
Tam ti kaletsik jun tin chabtal, na Jos in xalka tinb abal ka exl kal nin kidhbtsik. Anchan tin chobna an pulek takix xi Ejipto xita kl tu kidhtalb jeye na Jos.
In abna tm na Jos ka iktat nin tta Jakob ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik, jajtsik ox inik lajub ti b.
Anchan ti tmun, na Jakob kale ti kwajl Ejipto xon ti chemech ms tayl ani xon ti chemechtsik jeye ni weje pakliltsik.
Ms tayl, jntsintsik an tin beklk Sikm ani joltsin ban jlimtalb xi na Abraham in chaytsmal nin chakmiltsik na Amor ban chabl xi Sikm.
Tam ti kunatich an kij xowki ti neech ka tmun xowa na Dios in lej tsubax utsmal na Abraham, an atiklbtsik xi Israel yanenekich taja Ejipto.
Tujey tm ti takix taja Ejipto jun i pulek takix xi yab u exlb kl na Jos.
Jech an pulek takix, in kambiy ni kidhtaltsik ani tajtsintsik xan ti ka len ni weje pakliltsik. In taja jeye abal kin walba ka chemech nin chakmiltsik xi tsitsik.
Jachan i kij, tm jeye ti wachin na Moiss. Jech an chakam, kulbetn tajat kal na Dios ani tokot beletn x a ch bin kim nin ttatsik.
Por tam ti an ttalbtsik in jila, nin tsidhnil an pulek takix in pena ani in pubedha jelti max jaj in chakmil.
Jaxtm, na Moiss oktsin ejtal xowa in chob an atiklbtsik xi Ejipto in chablil ani in koy tajat i awiltalb kal xowa in tajl ani kal xowa in ulal.
Tam tin koolich chab inik i tamub, na Moiss in lena ka kale kin lna nin at kidhtaltsik, xi jaich an israelitatsik.

Ani in chuu taja ke jun i inik xi Ejipto in chablil exom in atax tajtsal jun i israelita. Abal kin loo ani abal kin tajtsi jaychki xowa exom in tajl, na Moiss in chemdha jachan an inik xi Ejipto in chablil.
Pos na Moiss in chalpayal ke ni at kidhtal, xi jaich an israelitatsik, neech kin exbaytsik ke jaj takudh kal na Dios abal kin walka nin at kidhtal; por yab in exbaytsik.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Moiss in ela chb i at kidhtal ti pjx ani kom in l kin chuu yabich ka pjxintsik, in utsatsik ench: “Tattsik a kidhbkitsik tab; jantki ta atax tjtsxtsik jn ani jn?”
Tm, xi kwajat in chawal nin at kidhtal nixkl kl na Moiss ani utsan ench: “Jita ti kwajbmal ta oklek ani ta ljundhom kal waw?
A lxe neye ti kin chemdha, jelt xan ta chemdha ti wel an inik xi tech Ejipto in chablil?”
Tam tin acha jech na Moiss, jlch ani kale ban chabl xi Madin. Taja ti kwajay jelti jun i pl inik ani in koy chb in chakmiltsik.
Chab inik i tamub ms tayl, tam ti kwajat ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh kunat ban chn xu bijyb Sina, in chuu jun i tokat abatwle bin kamlil jun i kidhadh te xi kwajat ti tal.
Na Moiss laban tajat tam tin chuu jech an xalkantsixtalb ani tam ti utey abal kin chuu ms alwa, in axtsi tin kwintal an Okxlb. Ench tin ulu an Okxlb:
“Nan tin Diosil na weje pakliltsik, nin Diosil na Abraham, na Isk ani na Jakob.” Tujey tm na Moiss ti wipipl kal i jkib ani yab in l kin tela.
Utsan tm ench kal an Okxlb: “Ka kotiy na pajab, pos an chabl xon ta kubat, jaich jun i chabl xi tokat.

Nan u chumalich an yajtsiktalb xi exom in achl Ejipto an atiklbtsik xu takwym, xi jaich na kidhtal, u achmich ti ejltsik ani in painek abal ku kldhaichtsik taja. Pos xo, jalaich, neech tu aba Ejipto.”

Jech na Moiss xi pojk ani utsan ench kal an israelitatsik: “Jita ti bijiy ta oklek ani ta ljundhax?”, jaich aban kal na Dios jelti jun i pulek awiltalb ani i walkax, kal an tokat abatwleki xin chuu ta ti kwajat bin kamlil an kidhadh te xi kwajat ti tal.

Jech na Moiss, jaich xin kldha Ejipto ni weje pakliltsik ani xin taja i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani i exltsik tin nakl chab inik i tamub ba jachan an chabl, ban Chak Pujal ani ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Jech na Moiss jaich xin utsa ench an israelitatsik: “Na Dios neech kin takuy jun i tiltsix xi waw i kidhtal, jelt xan ti nan tin takwymal, ka exbantsitsik xowa jaj ti ki utsatsik.”

Na Moiss kwajay kal an atiklbtsik ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, tam ti junkuntsik ban chn xu bijyb Sina. Taja, utsan na Moiss kal an tokat abatwle kal tin kwenta an xechintalb ani na Moiss, in watbantsi ni weje pakliltsik jech xowa utsan.
Por ni weje pakliltsik yab in lena kin exbay, in pojkatsik tokot ani in ltsikwiik ka witsiy Ejipto,
tam ti kwajat in utsltsik ench na Arn: “I l ti ku tajtsi ti diostsik xi ka okxin, pos yab i chob xanty in tamu na Moiss xi tu kldha ban chabl xi Ejipto.”
In tajatsik tm jun in chilbil i beserro kal i oro, in chemdhantsi ti konltsik abal kin pikbantsi ani kulbtsik tajat kal xowa in tajmaltsik kal in kubak.

Wkon tm na Dios kal jajtsik ani walktsik kin kakna a ttsik xi waach walki. Pos anchan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin dhutsadh wil an tiltsixtsik ke ench ti utsan ni weje pakliltsik kal na Dios: Awxe tattsik, atiklbtsik xi Israel, a chemdhmal i konltsik abal ti kin pikbantsi tin nakl xi chab inik i tamub ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh? Yaba!

Tattsik tokot a xechindhantsitsik tin t padhlil na dios Molok ani nin til na dios Renfn, i chilabtsik xa tajmaltsik abal ka kakna. Jaxtm Nan, neech tu kldhatsik ba na chablil ani neech tu abnatsik ms tuwa k Babilonia.

In ntsi ti kw na Esteban ani in ulu ench: —Taja ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ni weje pakliltsik ta tin kool an t padhel xon tin tapl an tujubtsik xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin takixtal na Dios. Jech tajnk anchan xan ti na Dios tin utsa na Moiss, tam ti utsan kin taja jelt xan ti ltsin.

Ni weje pakliltsik in bachu jech an t padhel jelti jun i jiltsixtalb ani xi tschtsik kal na Josu, in tsidha kal jajtsik tam tin kntsitsik an ti chabl an keet atiklbtsik, jaich xin kldhatsik na Dios abal kin pidha an ti chabl ni weje pakliltsik. Anchan ti tjan asta tam tin bajaw na Dabid.
Na Dios kulb kal an pulek takix Dabid ani na Dabid in lena kin tajtsi jun i at xon ti ka kwajay nin Diosil na Jakob;
por na Salomn jaich nin kubtsi tin kim na Dios.
Por na Dios xi plek tajat, yab u kwajl ba at xi tajadh kal i iniktsik. Jelt xan tin ulu an tiltsix ench:
An walki jaich nu tokat kwajtal ani an chabl, jaich xon tu kubl nu akan. In ulu ench an Okxlb: Janti uwats an at xi neech kin tajtsin? O jn ti neech ku ejto kin koych?
Yabxe Nan u tajmal kal u kubak ejtal jech?

In ntsi ti kw na Esteban ani in ulu ench: —Por tattsik echeki tajat chapik na itsch ani a kooltsik na ochoxtal ani na itsch jelti xi yab in exlltsik na Dios. Echeki a tomnltsik an Tokat Ejattalb. A junwaltsik jelti na weje pakliltsik.
Jowa tiltsix yab atnk kal na weje pakliltsik? In chemdhatsik xi tsinek ms okox kin tila abal neech ka tsch jachan xi lujat tajat ani xo tam ti ulich, a chinat pidhnatsik ani a chemdha.
Tattsik xa bachu an takixtalb kal an tokat abatwleki, yab a tajltsik ti kij.
Tam ti jajtsik in acha ejtal jech, in chakuntsitsik tajat na Esteban ke asta u rechechltsik nin kamab kal i chkub.
Por na Esteban, teykmte kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb, in teloloy walki, in chutsi tin labidh tokt na Dios ani in chuu jeye na Jess tin ejt na Dios.
In ulu tm ench: —Ka telatsik! U chutal jebl an walki ani u chutal na Jess xi aban abal ka wenkon jeye ti inik kwajat tin ejt na Dios.
Por jajtsik in tsutskiy nin xuchun ani u dhajnaltsik kawidh, tujeytsik tm kin nixka na Esteban.
Kldh ban bitsow ani exmch ti tujbayb. An lnaxtsik xin taja jech, in jila nin xekt ka beletnantsat kal jun i kwitl inik xin bij ta Sawlo.
Lejat kwajat ti tujbayb, na Esteban lan ani in ulu ench: —Ajtik Jess, ka bachu nu ejattal.
Tayl tudhlan ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Ajtik, ka pakwlantsitsik an tin walastalbil xi exom in tajl. Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, chemech.

Na Sawlo in ulu jeye abal alwa ka chemdh na Esteban. Tmki jachan a kts, tujey tajat ti atnal an belomtsik xi Jerusaln. Ejtalki an belomtsik atan, jaxtm ti bukeytsik ban chabl xi Judea ani xi Samaria. Tokot an abatwletsik yab atan, jaxtm ti jilkontsik ja Jerusaln.
Taltsik an iniktsik xin wwnltsik tajat xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios, in jna kin joliy na Esteban ani in ukintsitsik tajat abal chemdh.
Tam ti jachan, na Sawlo in ynl an belomtsik, u ochel ban attsik abal kin kldha bodhodhl an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik ani in jnl kin baliy al wikaxte.
Por xi kaletsik ban bitsow Jerusaln, in tilltsik an alwa tilab xontiki ti xeechtsik.
Jn ti b xi jajtsik, xin bij ta Felipe, kale ba jun i bitsow xu taknal Samaria ani in tuju kin tiltsitsik an ta Kristo.
An atiklbtsik u junkunal ani ejtal in achltsik kal yantam i kwenta xowa in ulal na Felipe ani in chutaltsik jeye an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xin tajl jech na Felipe.
Pos yn i atiklbtsik xi ochadh kal i atax ejattalbtsik, u jeldhb ani an atax ejattalbtsik u dhajnal u kalel ba jajtsik ani yn xi yab in ejtowal ka yoyon ani xu kwechetsik, u jeldhb.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow u kulbltsik tajat kal jech xowa in chutal.
Por ta ti kwajat ba jachan an bitsow jun i inik xu bijyb ta Simn. Jech an inik, jaich jun i dhiman ani in kambiyal an atiklbtsik xi taja Samaria. In ulal ke jaj jaich jun i chalpadh inik.
Kal ejtaltsik tu axtsinal xowa jaj in ulal, kal xi tsitsik ani asta kal xi pakdhatsik ani in ulaltsik ench: —Jech an inik, jaich nin pulek chp na Dios.
U beltsinal tajat xowa in ulal ani in tajl, pos kal nin dhimantal, nakatich tajat i kij tin kymal kambidhtsik.
Tam ti na Felipe xeech in till na Jesukristo ani an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios, yn i paylomlbtsik ani i mmlbtsik belmch ani pujantsik.
Na Simn xu dhimanwiik, belmch jeye ani pujan ani xechin kal na Felipe. Tam in chutal an pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb ani an exltsik xu tjnal, u labnal tajat.
Tam ti an abatwletsik xi kwajat Jerusaln in chobna ke xu kwajltsik Samaria in bachmalichtsik nin kwintal na Dios, aban taja na Pedro ani na Juan.
Tam ti na Pedro ani na Juan ulichtsik taja, lantsik kal tin kwenta an belomtsik xi Samaria abal kin bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb.
Pos an belomtsik xi Samaria, yabl in bachmaltsik an Tokat Ejattalb, tokot pujadhtsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess.
Na Pedro ani na Juan in kwajbatsik nin kubak bin b an belomtsik ani in bachu tm an Tokat Ejattalb an belomtsik.
Tam ti na Simn in chuu ke an belomtsik in bachu an Tokat Ejattalb tam ti an abatwletsik in kwajba nin kubak bin b an belomtsik, in lena kin chaay jech an awiltalb,
in ulu ench: —Ti kin pidha neye jachan an ti awiltalb abal tam ku kwajbantsi an tu kubak bin b jun xita, kin bachu jeye an Tokat Ejattalb.
Utsan tm ench kal na Pedro: —Ka kibchon na tumnal junax kal tat abal a chalpayal ke xowa in pidhnl na Dios, neech ka ejto ka chaay kal i tumn.
Tat yab a kool ni jun xata xanty ka chuu kal jech, pos na ejattal yab kwajat lujat tin tamt na Dios.
Ka jilaich jech an walastalb xa kool ani ka pakabdha na Dios abal ka chuu max anchan ti ki pakwlantsi kal xowa a chalpay ta ejattal.
Pos u chutal ke yab tajat alwa na chalab a kool ani i teykmte tajat ta kwajat kal an walastalb.
Tkon tm ench na Simn: —Ti kin kontsintsi neye ban Okxlb abal yab ku tamu ni jun xata xowa i kwajat tin utsl.
Tam ti okonichtsik kin lna ani kin tila nin kwintal na Dios, an abatwletsik kale jeye kin tila an alwa tilab ba yn i kwentsaltsik xi Samaria ani tayl witschtsik tm jun Jerusaln.

Ms tayl, utsan ench na Felipe kal jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb: —Ki chakay ani ki kale all, ka yakwa an bl xi tl Jerusaln ani neech Gasa. Jech an bl, jaich xu watel ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.

Chakay tm na Felipe ani kale; ti bl, in ela jun i inik xu kwajl Etiopa. Jaj jaich jun i inik xu ewnuko. Jech jaich jun i pulek tjodh, pos jaj in belkmtsal tin tumnal na Kandase, an pulek takix mmlb xi Etiopa, jaj kalnek Jerusaln abal kin kakna na Dios.
Jech an inik u witslich bin pulek bitswil, punat bin karretajil ani kwajat in ajyal nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsix Isaas.
Utsan tam ench na Felipe kal an Tokat Ejattalb: —Ki utey ban karreta ani ki beley junax kal jech an inik.
Tam ti utey na Felipe, in acha ke jachan an inik kwajat in ajyal nin dhutsadh wil an tiltsix Isaas ani in konoy ench: —A exbayalxe xowa i kwajat a ajyal?
Tkoyat ench kal an inik: —Janti neech ku ejto ku exbay max yab waach ni jun xita ti kin wiltsi? Ani pakabdh na Felipe kal an inik abal ka kadhiy ani ka buxkan junax kal jaj.

An Tokat Dhuslab xi kwajat in ajyal, jaich jech: Jn abal ka chemdh jelti jun i borrego. Anchan jelti an borrego yab u kuxnal tin tamt an inik xi kl ti kwajat ti kaxwb, anchan jeye Jaj yab kuchun n w abal kin ulu xata.
Tajan jelti max yab xata in y ani yab ljundh jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb. Kom chemdh ani yab in jila ni jun in kuxl, jita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka tilan? Abal nin xechintal wkoyat tech ti kayl.
Konyat tm na Felipe ench kal jachan an tjodh inik: —Tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin utsa, jita kwajat in till jech an tiltsix, jaj in till tinb o keet in till?
In tuju tm na Felipe kin wiltsi xon ti kwajat in ajyal ban Tokat Dhuslab ani in tiltsi an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta na Jess.
Tam ti neechtsik ti belal, ulichtsik xon ti waach i ja ani an tjodh inik in ulu ench: —Tech waach i ja, awxe yab awil kin pujyat neye?
Utsan ench kal na Felipe: —Max a bell lejtal kal ejtal na ejattal na Jesukristo, awil ki pujan. An inik tkon ench: —U bell abal na Jesukristo jaich nu Chakmlb kal na Dios.
In ulu tm ka kubdh an karreta, paay chablam ti b ban ja ani pujyat kal na Felipe.
Tam ti kaletsik ban ja, jnjich tm na Felipe kal nin Tokat Ejattal an Ajtiklb ani yab ms witsiy ka chutat kal jachan an tjodh inik; por u kulbl tajat an tjodh inik tam tin ntsch nin blil.
Tayl, jun jiktowl tin chuu na Felipe abal Asotojich ti kwajat ani watey bitsow ti bitsow ti tiltsix an ti alwa tilab, asta ti ulich Sesarea.
Tam ti jachan, na Sawlo in ntsal kin ulu abal neech kin chemdha xin bellichtsik an Ajtiklb. Jaxtm ti kale kin chuu nin oklkil an pletsik,

abal kin kontsi ti awiltalb ka pidhan ka kale ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb xi Damasko abal kin aliy xin bellichtsik an alwa tilab ani kin tsidha ti wiknl Jerusaln; i paylomlbtsik ani i mmlbtsik.
Por tam ti neech ti bl ani u kunelich ban bitsow xi Damasko, jun jiktowl ti wiliyat kal jun i chaxixl kamal xi tl walki.
Kwajlan tm na Sawlo chabl ani in acha jun i kwintalb, xu kw in ulu ench: —Sawlo, Sawlo, jantki tin atl?

Konoxin jeye tm na Sawlo ench: —Jita p teye, jab? Ani tkoyat ench kal xi kwajat ti kw: —Nan in Jess, xi tat a atl. Exom a yajlombdhl tatki tab, jelt xan tin tajl an konl tam in chochbiyal an chupidh patl.
In ulu tm ench na Sawlo u wipipl kal i jkib: —Ajtik, janty a l ku taja? Utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Ki chakch ani ki ulchich ban bitsow ani taja neech ki utsan xanty yejat ka taja.
An iniktsik xi junax ti neech kal na Sawlo, labnktsik tajat abal in achltsik an kwintalb por yab in chutaltsik xita.
Chakay tm na Sawlo ban chabl xon ti kwachat, por tam tin lama nin wal, yab in chutal ni jun xata. Jaxtm ti lotokn ani jn Damasko.
Kwajay taja x a kts yab u chuux, yab u kapul nibal xata in uchl.
Taja Damasko, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xu belom tajat xu bijyb ta Ananas, xi utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb ba jun i xalkantsixtalb: —Ananas! Ani jaj tkon ench: —Jetm in kwajat, Ajtik.
Utsan tm ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Ki chakay, ki kale ban bl xu bijyb Ejt ani ka konoy bin kim na Judas max ta kwajat taja jun i inik xu bijyb ta Sawlo xu kwajl Tarso. T kwajat ti l
ani ba jun i xalkantsixtalb, in chumal ke jun i inik xin bij Ananas neech ka ochich xon ti jaj kwajat ani neech kin kwajba nin kubak bin b jaj abal ka chuxindh jun.
Tam tin acha jech na Ananas, in ulu ench: —Ajtik, kal ynich tin tiltsidh xanty in tajl jachan an inik ani in tiltsidhich jeye ejtal an ataxtalb xin tajtsal xi ti bellichtsik xu kwajl Jerusaln.
Xo tsinek tech Damasko ani in kontsm ti awiltalb an oklek pletsik abal kin yakwa ejtal xi ti bellichtsik.
Por utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Ki kale, pos Nan u takwymal jachan an inik abal ti kin tila ban atiklbtsik xi yab u judo, ban pulek takixtsik ani ban israelitatsik jeye.
Nan neech ku ltsi ejtal an ti yajtsiktalb xi yejat kin watna kal Nan tu kwenta.

Kale tm na Ananas ban at xon ti kwajat na Sawlo. Tam ti ochich, in kwajba nin kubak bin b na Sawlo ani in utsa ench: —Kidhblb Sawlo, an Ajtiklb Jess, xin xalka tinb ti bl xon ta tl abal ka chuu, tin abmal abal tu chuxindha jun ani abal ka bachu jeye nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
Tmki jachan ti kwajlan jun xata xi pitkan bin wal jelt in otl i tool ani chuxinich tm jun. Chakch tm na Sawlo ani pujyatich jeye tm.
Tayl kapch ani likey tm jun ani kwajay chb x a kts taja kal an belomtsik xu kwajl taja Damasko.
Ms tayl, in tujch tm na Sawlo ti oktsix ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, in ulal ke na Jess jaich nu Chakmlb kal na Dios.

Ejtaltsik xi kl tu axnal, u labnaltsik tajat ani in ulaltsik ench: —Yabxe jaich jech an inik xi xechink Jerusaln in atax tajtsal xin belltsik na Jess? Yabxe jaxtm ti tsinek jeye tech abal kin yakwa an belomtsik ani kin jna abal kin pidhna ban oklek pletsik?
Por na Sawlo u oktsix kal yn ms i awiltalb ani in lnl ke na Jess jaich xi takudh kal na Dios abal ti loox, asta in ukpindhl an judotsik xu kwajl taja Damasko.
Tam ti watenekich yn a kts, an judotsik in taja i kw abal kin chemdha na Sawlo;
por na Sawlo in chobna xanty tu lenb ka tajtsin. Akal i kij an judotsik u kwajl kin aytsi na Sawlo bin wilbiltsik an bitsow abal kin chemdha;
por an belomtsik, in baliy na Sawlo ba jun i toknal plek ani in kldha rechechl bin kx in mapl an bitsow tam ti jikwax. Anchan ti kldh na Sawlo ba jachan an bitsow.
Tam ti na Sawlo ulich Jerusaln, in lena ka junkun kal an belomtsik; por kal ejtaltsik tu jiknb abal yab u belnal max jaj u belomich jeye.

Por jn kal na Bernab abal ka utwat ban abatwletsik. Na Bernab in tiltsitsik xan ti na Sawlo tin chumal an Ajtiklb ti bl, xan ti jeye ti tawn kal an Ajtiklb ani xan ti na Sawlo ti oktsixnk Damasko kal yantam i awiltalb kal tin bij na Jess.
Kwajay tm Jerusaln na Sawlo ani xechin junax kal jajtsik.
U kw kal yantam i awiltalb tin bij an Ajtiklb, u tiloll ani u kwlx kal an judotsik xu tilom griego; por u lenb ka chemdh kal jechtsik.
Tam ti an kidhblbtsik in chobna jech, jn Sesarea na Sawlo ani tam ti tajaich ti kwajat, aban Tarso.

Tam ti jachan, ejtal an belomtsik xi ban chabl xi Judea, xi Galilea ani xi Samaria, kijidhtsik tajat ti kwajat ani u likeltsik. In kooltsik nin belomtal ban Ajtiklb ani kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb, tsudhey ka tsudhey u wachinal ms xin bellich an Ajtiklb.
Tam ti na Pedro xechin ti lnax an ti kidhblbtsik, kale jeye kin lna an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Lida.
In ela taja jun i inik xin bij ta Eneas, xin koolich waxik i tamub ti kwachl, kom yab in ejtowal ti belal.
Ani utsan ench kal na Pedro: —Eneas, na Jesukristo neech ti ki jeldha. Ki chakay ani ka dhaya na waytal. Na Eneas tmki ti chakay
ani chutat kal ejtaltsik xu kwajl Lida ani Sarn, in jilaichtsik tm nin weje belomtalbiltsik ani in belaich an Ajtiklb.

Tam ti jachan i kij, ta ti kwajat ban bitsow xu bijyb Jope jun i mmlb xu belom tajat xu bijyb Tabita, ke ti kwintalb griego, u ulwb Dorkas. Jech an mmlb echeki in tajl xowa alwa ani in tolmiyal an chojontltsik.
Tam ti jachan i kij, yawlch ani chemech. Tam ti okonich ti taknal, kwajb ba jun i alt xi kwajat tekat ba jun i pntsx at.

An bitsow xi Jope, kunat ti kwajat Lida, xon ti kwajat na Pedro tam ti jachan i kij. Kom an belomtsik in chobna abal taja ti kwajat na Pedro, in abna ka pakabdh ench kal chb i iniktsik: —Ki tsch dhubat ban bitsow xi Jope.

Kale tm na Pedro junax kal jajtsik. Tam ti ulchich, jn ban alt xon ti kwajat an chemlom ani kal ejtal an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ti wiliyat, u uknaltsik ani in lnltsik nin lakab ani nin xekttsik xi tajtsidh kal na Dorkas tam ti ejat.

Utsantsik tm kal na Pedro abal ka kaletsik ejtal, tudhlan tm ani lan ani in teltm an mmlb xi chemnek, in ulu ench: —Tabita, ki chakay. In lama tm nin wal an mmlb ani tam ti chutat na Pedro, buxkan an mmlb.
In tyna tm bin kubak ani in dhaya. In kaniy tm an kidhblbtsik ani an chemtsidh mmlbtsik ani chutatich tm abal ejnek ti t jachan an mmlb.
Ejtal jech, chobn putl ban bitsow xi Jope ani kal yn ti belan an Ajtiklb.
Na Pedro kwajay yn a kts ba jachan an bitsow, bin kim jun i inik xin lejkiyal i t, jech an inik, u bijyb ta Simn.
T ti kwajat ban bitsow Sesarea jun i inik xin bij ta Kornelio, jaj jaich jun i oklek xin takyal bo inik i soldadotsik, jech an kwene u bijyb Italiano.

Jaj ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik in kaknl na Dios ani in jiknl abal in chobtsik ke na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja. In pidhnl jeye yandha i tumn abal kin tolmiy an judotsik ani echeki in lantsal a Dios.
Jun i kij, tam ti xich xna i wkal, in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb. Ba jech an xalkantsixtalb, in chuu ke jun in tokat abatwlejil a Dios ochich xon ti jaj kwajat ani utsan ench: —Kornelio!

Na Kornelio jilkon in tell an tokat abatwle kal yantam i jkib ani in konoy ench: —Janty, Ajtik? Utsan tm ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Na Dios in achmalich an lbtsik ani in chumich xowa a tajl jeye abal ka tolmiy an chojontltsik.
Pos ka aba xo i iniktsik ban bitsow xi Jope abal kin kaniy na Simn, xu bijyb jeye ta Pedro.
Jaj ta kwajat bin kim jun i inik xu bijyb jeye ta Simn, an inik xu lejkix t ani in kool nin kim bin wl i pujal. Na Simn Pedro neech ti ki utsa xanty yejat ka taja.

Tam ti kalch an tokat abatwle xi kl ti tawn, na Kornelio in kaniy chb nin tojnliltsik ani in kaniy jeye jun i soldado, jech jaich jun i inik xin bell jeye tajat na Dios jelti na Kornelio ani alwa inik tajat.
In tiltsitsik ejtal xowa in chumal ani in abatsik Jope.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, lejat jajtsik neech ti bl ani exomich ti kunel Jope, na Pedro kadhiy bin b an at tam ti chejelich xna a kts abal ti l.
Kaay tajat ani in lena ti kapul, por lejat kwajat ti lejkintsb xanty kin kapu, in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb.
In chuu jakpin an walki ani in chuu ti pal jun xata xin junwal jelti jun i kudhkum plek xi wikats tamatki.
Ban kudhkum, ta ti kwajat yn i konltsik xi chetsik in akan, i chantsik ani i chichintsik.
In acha jun i kwintalb xi utsan kl ench: —Pedro, ki chakay, ka chemdha ani ka kapu.
Por na Pedro tkon ench: —Yaba, Ajtik; nan yab jayki u kapmal ni jun xata xowa Tat a ulmal ke yab yejat ka kapat.
Tawn tm jun kal jachan an kwintalb ani utsan ench: —Xowa Nan u tokmal, yab yejat ka bijiy atax.
xl tjan jech ani tayl kadhbjich tm jun walki an kudhkum.
Lejat na Pedro kwajat ti chalpax xanty in l kin ulu jachan an xalkantsixtalb, ulich ban wileb nin tojnliltsik na Kornelio, xi tltsik in konwiyal xon ti kwajat nin kim na Simn.
Tam ti ulichtsik, in konoytsik kawidh max ta ti kwajat ba jachan an at jun i inik xin bij Simn ani u bijyb jeye ta Pedro.
Kom na Pedro bl kwajat ti chalpax kal tin kwenta an xalkantsixtalb, utsan ench kal an Tokat Ejattalb: —N kwajat ti ayal x i iniktsik.
Ki paay, ki kale kal jajtsik ani yab ki kwajay ta chalpax, pos Nan u abmaltsik.
Paay tm na Pedro xon ti kwajat an iniktsik xi abnk kal na Kornelio ani in utsatsik ench: —Nanich xita i xeechtsik a ayal. Janty a l ta tsinektsik?

Tkontsik ench: —U tsinek abal u abnk kal an oklek soldadotsik xu bijyb ta Kornelio. Jaj jaich jun i lujat inik xin bell a Dios, xu kaknb ani u kanidhb tajat kal ejtal na at kidhtaltsik. Usnk kal jun in tokat abatwlejil na Dios abal yejat ti kaniy ki kale tin kim ani kin acha xowa neech ka utsa.
Utsantsik tm kal na Pedro abal ka ochichtsik ani taja ti jilkontsik kal jaj jachan i akal. Tam ti tsudhey, na Pedro kalch tm kal jajtsik ani junikn kal chb x i kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Jope.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, ulichtsik Sesarea, xon ti kwajat aytsmte kal na Kornelio junax kal jun kwene in exlowltsik ani nin jabtsik xin kanymal na Kornelio.
Tam ti na Pedro ulich ban at, kale ti bachwb kal na Kornelio, tudhlan tin tamt na Pedro ani in kakna.
Por dhayan kal na Pedro ani utsan ench: —Ki chakay, pos jaychki neye jun i inik jelti tat.
Lejat u tilolltsik, ochich alt ani in ela taja yn i atiklbtsik xi junkunk.

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pedro: —Tattsik a chob ke nin belomtal an judotsik in ulal ke yab alwa ka junkun jun i judo kal jun i pl inik o ka ochich bin kim an pl inik. Por na Dios tin ltsmalich ke yab in tomnl ku bijiy atax o yab alwa ni jun xita.
Jaxtm, tokot tin kanyat, in tsch ani yab in kwajay tin chalpax. Pos xo u l ku chobna xantki tin kanymaltsik.

Tkon tm ench na Kornelio: —In koolich ch a kts, ench xna i ora, in kwajat tin kl tech tu kim ani tin l xin kwenta an wkal ani in xalkantsat abal ku chuu jun i inik xi xeketlidh kal jun i chaxixl kudhkum.
Ani tin utsa ench: “Kornelio, na Dios in achmalich na lbil ani in chumalich xowa a tajl abal ka tolmiy an chojontltsik.

Pos ka aba xo na tojnliltsik ban bitsow xin bij Jope abal kin kaniy na Simn, xu bijyb jeye ta Pedro. T kwajat bin kim na Simn, an inik xu lejkix t, jaj u kwajl bin wl an pujal. Tam ka ulich tech, neech ti kw kal tat.”
Jaxtm tu abna jikatki ki kale ta alyb ani alwa tajat abal i tsch. Xo ejtal tech u kwajat tin tamt na Dios ani i l ki acha ejtal xowa an Ajtiklb ti abmal ti ku utsa.
In tuju tm na Pedro ti kw ani in ulu ench: —Xo ojni u exbch abal na Dios yab u takukl an ti atiklbtsik.
Na Dios in bachwal xitakichki, tokot ka exl ke Jaj ejtal in ejtowal kin taja ani kin tajatsik xowa in l na Dios.

Na Dios in abtsi nin kidhtaltsik na Israel an ti tsubaxtalb. Jech an tsubaxtalb, jaich an alwa tilab xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo ani jech na Jesukristo, jaich nu Ajtiklb kal ejtalkitsik.
A chobtsik alwa xanty tlan bin chablil an judotsik, tujey Galilea, tin kuxmats na Juan tam ti xechin ti tiltsix ani ti pjal.

A chobtsik alwa xan ti na Dios tin pidha na Jess xi Nasaret tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Xan ti na Jess ti xechin jeye in tajl xowa alwa ani in jeldhl ejtal xi kwajat teykmtetsik kal in chp an lej atax. Ejtal jech in tajl abal na Dios ta ti kwajat kal Jaj.
Waw i chumal ejtal jech xowa in tajmal na Jess, ban chabltsik xi Judea ani ban bitsow Jerusaln. Tayl chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Por ejdh ti t kal na Dios tin xlb a kts ani tu xalkantsi an ta Jess abal ki chuu ke Jaj ejnek ti t.
Yab xalkantsat ejtal an atiklbtsik, tokot wawki, xi na Dios in takwymalich kejle okox abal ku xechin tu ltsix. Waw u kapch ani u uchch kal Jaj tam ti ejdhatsich.
Ani tu aba ki tiltsi an atiklbtsik ani ki ltsitsik jeye ke jech na Jesukristo bijidhich kal na Dios abal kin ljundha xi ejattsik ani xi chemnektsik.
Ejtal an tiltsixtsik xi ti weje, in tilmaltsik na Jess, ke ejtal xita kl ti ka belan, neech ka pakwlantsat tin walastalbiltsik.
Lejat na Pedro kwajat ti kw, ulich an Tokat Ejattalb ba ejtal xi kwajat in achltsik nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios.
Ani an judotsik xu belomich, xi tsinektsik junax kal na Pedro, labantsik tajat abal in chuu pidhantsik jeye an ti Tokat Ejattalb xi yabtsik u judo.
Abal in achatsik ti kw kal i keet kwintalbtsik ani ti kaknaxtsik an tin bij na Dios.
In ulu tm ench na Pedro: —Awxe waach jun xita xi neech kin ejto kin tamkuy abal yab ka pujyat jech an atiklbtsik, kom in bachmichtsik jeye xo an Tokat Ejattalb jelti waw?
In ulu abal ka pujyatichtsik tin bij na Jesukristo ani pakabdh na Pedro abal ka kwajay chb x a kts kal jajtsik.
An abatwletsik ani an belomtsik xi kwajat Judea, in acha abal in bachmaltsik jeye nin kwintal na Dios xi yabtsik u judo.
Tam ti na Pedro ulich Jerusaln, kawyat kal taltsik an judotsik xu belomich xin ulal ke yejat jeye ka tajtsintsik an ti exl bin tul xin bellichtsik na Jesukristo.
Konyat ench: —Jantki ta kalnek ka lna xi yab in kooltsik an exl bin tul ani i kapmadh kal jajtsik?
Tiltsintsik tm kal na Pedro asta tin tujtal ejtal xowa tmnk, ench ti utsantsik:

—Tam tin kwajat ban bitsow xi Jope ani in kwajat tin l, u chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb. Ban xalkantsixtalb, u chuu jun xata jelti jun i kudhkum plek xi tl ti pal walki wikats tamatki ani ulich asta xon tin kwajat.
Tam tu tela alwa abal ku chuu xanty ta ti kwajat alkidh, u chuu i konltsik xi chetsik in akan, i padhumtsik, i chantsik ani i chichintsik.
Ani u acha jun i kwintalb xi tin utsa ench: “Pedro ki chakay, ka chemdha ani ka kapu.”
Por u ulu ench: “Yaba, Ajtik, pos yab jayki u kapmal jun xata xowa Tat a ulmal ke yab yejat ka kapat.”
Tin tawna tm jun jachan an kwintalb xi tl walki ani tin utsa ench: “Xowa Nan u tokmal, yab yejat ka bijiy atax.”
xl tjan jech ani tayl kalch tm jun walki.
Tmki jachan, ulich x i iniktsik ban at xon tin kwajat. Jech an iniktsik, tl Sesarea ani tsinek abal ti kin aliytsik.

An Tokat Ejattalb tin utsa abal kin kale kal jajtsik ani yab kin kwajay xata ku chalpay. Kaletsik jeye kal nan jech akak an kidhblbtsik ani ejtal tu b tu ochich bin kim jun i inik xin bij ta Kornelio.
Jech an inik, tu tiltsi xan tin chumal kubl jun i tokat abatwle taja tin kim ani utsan kl ench: “Ka aba i iniktsik ban bitsow xi Jope abal kin kaniy na Simn, xu bijyb jeye ta Pedro,
jaj neech ti ki utsa xan ti neech ka ejto ki loey, tat ani ejtal na kidhtaltsik.”
Tam ti nan u tuju ku tawnatsik, in bachutsik an Tokat Ejattalb, jelt xan ti waw i bachmal ms okox.
U chalpay tm xan tin ulmal an Ajtiklb: “Tsubax kejle ke na Juan pujxin kal i ja, por tattsik neech ka bachu an Tokat Ejattalb.”
Pos max na Dios in pidhatsik jeye jaychki xowa waw tu pidhmal xi belmalich ni Ajtik Jesukristo, janty u y nan abal kin kwajay ku tamkuy na Dios kal xowa in l kin taja?

Tam ti an kidhblbtsik xi Jerusaln in acha ejtal jech, chamkantsik ani kwajay kin kaknatsik na Dios. Ench tin ulutsik: —Tm, in pidhmaltsik jeye na Dios xi yabtsik u judo an ti chalab abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani anchan kin ejtchtsik jeye kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal!

Tam ti chemdhjich na Esteban, tujey jeye ti atnal xi keet an belomtsik ani taltsik kale asta Fenisia, Chipre ani Antioka. Taja, in tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an judokitsik ani xi keet an atiklbtsik, yaba.
Por taltsik an belomtsik xi tl Chipre ani Sirene, ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Antioka ani in tiltsitsik jeye xi yabtsik u judo an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb Jess.
Nin chp an Ajtiklb kwajat kal jajtsik, pos yn xin jila nin weje belomtaltsik ani in belaichtsik an Ajtiklb.
Tam ti an belomtsik xi Jerusaln in acha jech, in aba na Bernab asta Antioka.
Tam ti na Bernab ulich Antioka, in chuu xan ti na Dios tin lbtajmal an belomtsik xi taja ani kulb tajat. In takiytsik ejtal abal kin ntsi kin belatsik an Ajtiklb kal jun in ejattal lujat.
Pos jech na Bernab, jaich jun i alwa inik, teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani u belom tajat. Ani anchan, yn i atiklbtsik in taja abal kin bela an Ajtiklb.
Tayl, na Bernab kale Tarso abal kin aliy na Sawlo. Tam tin ela, in jna Antioka.
Taja ti kwajaytsik kal an belomtsik jun i tamub ani yn i atiklbtsik in oktsi. Taja Antioka ti tujey jidhtal tajat ti bijyb an belomtsik, kristianotsik.
Tam ti jachan i kij, kale Jerusaln chb x i tiltsixtsik ani kaletsik Antioka.

Jn ti b xi jech an tiltsixtsik, xu bijyb ta Agabo, kubey junax chejel xon ti kwajat an kidhblbtsik ani tin ijtsixtal an Tokat Ejattalb, in ulu abal neech ka watey jun i pulek kanab putlki an chabl. Anchan lejtal ti tmun, tam ti an lej pulek takix Klawdio kwajat ti takix Roma.
Tm, an belomtsik xi Antioka in ulu abal neech kin abtsitsik jun i tolmixtalb an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Judea, xantiki kin ejtotsik kin pidhna juntsik ti b.
Anchan tin tajatsik, in abtsitsik jun i tolmixtalb an takix belomtsik xi Judea. Jech an tolmixtalb pidhan kin jna na Bernab ani na Sawlo.
Tam ti jachan i kij, an pulek takix Herodes in tuju kin ata taltsik an belomtsik.
In ulu ka chemdh kal i macht na Jakobo, nin kidhb na Juan
ani kom in chuu ke jech in kulbetna tajat an judotsik xi yab u belom, in abna jeye ka yakwan na Pedro. Jech tmun tam ti exom an ajib xowki tu kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye.

Tam ti yakwan na Pedro, abn ka balyat al wikaxte kal na Herodes, xon ti kwajay belkmte kal ch i kwene i soldadotsik, xi juntsik kwene, chetsik i soldado. In chalpayal kin kldha tin tamt an atiklbtsik tam watenekich an ajib.
Na Pedro u kyb balidh ban wikaxte belkmte tajat alwa, por an belomtsik in ntsaltsik kin kontsintsi na Pedro kal yantam i chplb.

Jachan an akal, tam ti neech ka tsudhch xowki na Herodes ti neech kin kldha na Pedro tin tamt an atiklbtsik, na Pedro kwajat ti wayal junax chejlidh kal chb i soldado ani wikats kal chb i patl ani belkmte nin wilbil an wikaxte kal chb x i soldadotsik.

Jun jiktowle ti ulich jun in tokat abatwlejil an Ajtiklb ani tajkan jun i kamal ba jachan an wikaxte. Takan na Pedro bin chyl kal jachan an tokat abatwle, bakyat ani utsan ench: —Ki chakay jikatki. Wilkan tm an patltsik xi kl ti kwajat wikadh nin kubaktsik na Pedro
ani utsan ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Ka wika na tsukul kal an t ani ka kwajba na pajab. Tam ti na Pedro okon kin taja jech, utsan ench kal an tokat abatwle: —Ka wtna na wt ani ti kin wwna.
Kale tm na Pedro in wewkm an tokat abatwle, maske yab in chob max tsubax o yaba xowa kwajat in tajl an tokat abatwle. Jaj in chalpayal ke kwajat in chutal jun i xalkantsixtalb.

Por wateytsik ban jidhtal belkol ani bin chabtal jeye; tam ti ulichtsik ban patl wileb abal ka kalch ban bl xu kalel ban bitsow, an wileb kwetmtal ti jakpin. Kaletsik tm, ani tam tin belmalichtsik jun peje an bl, jilanich tm kwetm kal an tokat abatwle.

In exbch tm na Pedro ani in ulu ench: —Xo ojni u exbch ke Jaj an Ajtiklb in abmal nin tokat abatwlejil abal ti kin loo kal na Erodes ani kal ejtal xowa nu at kidhtaltsik xi yab u belom in l ti kin tajtsi.
In chalpm jech, na Pedro kale bin kim na Mara, nin nna na Juan, xu bijyb jeye ta Markos; taja, ta ti kwajat yn i atiklbtsik, jech junkunktsik abal ti l.
Tam tin teney an wileb xi kuxtl, jun i tsidhan xu bijyb Rode kale kin chuu xitam j nin tenyal an wileb.
Por tam tin exbay abal a Pedro na kwajat ti tawnax, yab in japiy an wileb, jlch alt kal i kulbxnich abal kin lna ke na Pedro ta ti kwajat ban wileb ti tawnax.
Utsan tm ench: —Tat i olmanal! Por an tsidhan in ulal abal tsubax. Jajtsik in ulal ench: —Yab jaj, i tokat abatwle xi kl tu beletnb.
Por na Pedro in ntsal kin teney an wileb, ani tam tin japiytsik an wileb ani in chuu, labantsik tajat.

Por jaj in utsatsik kal in kubakki abal yab ka kuchuntsik ani in tiltsitsik xan ti kldh ban wikaxte kal an Ajtiklb ani utsantsik jeye ench: —Ka tiltsitsik jech na Jakobo ani an kidhblbtsik. Kale tm ani kale pl.
Tam ti tsudhey, laban tajat an soldadotsik abal yab in chobtsik xanty tmnk kal na Pedro.
Na Erodes in abna ka alyat ani kom yab ejtowat ka elan na Pedro, ejtal an belkol wikaxte ljundh ani abn ka chemdhtsik. Tayl, na Erodes kale Judea ani kale ti kwajl Sesarea.

Na Erodes in chakuntsal an atiklbtsik xi Tiro ani Sidn, por jech an atiklbtsik in taja i kw abal ka kaletsik tin tamt na Erodes. In ejtotsik kin tantsi tin alwatal na Blasto, jun in awiltalbil an pulek takix Erodes ani kal jachanki, an pulek awiltalb in konoytsik i lejkintalb abal xi jechtsik tyki jeye tu tsidhantsbtsik an ti kapnl ban chabl xin takyal an pulek takix.
Bijtsin jun i kij kal na Erodes abal ka kaletsik. Jachan a kts, na Erodes in kwajba nin alwa kudhkmil, buxkan xon tu ljundhom ani kwin.
Tujey tm an atiklbtsik kin ulu kawidh ench: —Xita jech kwajat ti kw yab i inik, i dios!
Tmki jachan, jun in tokat abatwlejil an Okxlb in yaundha na Erodes abal in walka ka kakn jelti max u Dios ani taja ti chemech kapudh kal i dhm.
Por nin kwintal na Dios dhubatki ti bukey putlki ani tki tki tu oktsixnb.
Tam ti na Bernab ani na Sawlo in pidhnmich an tolmixtalb, witsiytsik Antioka ani in jna kal jajtsik na Juan, xu bijyb jeye ta Markos.

Ban belomtsik xi kwajat Antioka ta ti kwajat i tiltsixtsik ani i oktsixtsik. Jaich na Bernab, na Simn (xu bijyb jeye Tunuy), na Lusio xi Sirene, na Manan (xi junax ti pubenek kal na Erodes, an pulek takix xi Galilea) ani na Sawlo.
Jun i kij, tam ti kwajat in kaknltsik an Ajtiklb ani ti kltsik, an Tokat Ejattalb in ulu ench: —Ti kin plmedhantsi an ta Bernab kal na Sawlo abal kin tajatsik an tojlb xowa u utsmaltsik kin taja.
Tam ti okonichtsik ti l ani ti kl, in kwajba nin kubaktsik bin b na Bernab ani na Sawlo ani in utsaichtsik tm ka kalch.
Ms tayl, na Bernab ani na Sawlo kaletsik Selewsia abal abantsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Taja, balintsik ban tan abal ka kale ban chabl xin bij Chipre xi kwajat ban pujal.
Tam ti ulichtsik ban kubtalb xi Salamina, in tujutsik kin tila nin kwintal na Dios ban attsik xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb. Na Juan ta jeye ti xeech kal jajtsik abal ti tolmix.
Xechintsik putlki ba jachan an chabl ani ulichtsik Pafos. In elatsik taja jun i judo xin bij ta Barjess ani jech an inik, u dhiman. U kambix tajat, pos in ulal ke jaj jaich jun i tiltsix.

Jech an dhiman, kwajat junax kal an pulek awiltalb xin bij Serjio Pawlo. Na Serjio Pawlo, jaich jun i inik xi chalpadh tajat. In abna ka kanyat na Bernab ani na Sawlo abal in l jeye tajat kin acha nin kwintal na Dios.
Por jachan an dhiman xin bij Barjess ani u bijyb jeye ta Elimas, yab in walkl na Sawlo ani na Bernab kin oktsi an pulek awiltalb, pos jaj yab in l kin chuu ka belmch an pulek awiltalb.
Na Sawlo, xu bijyb jeye ta Pablo, teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, in teloloy tajat
ani in utsa ench: —Kambix, atax inik, xi chakmlb kal an lej atax ani xi yab a kulbetnl ejtal xowa lujat! Jantki ti yab a l ka jila ta ojtsix tin lujat blil an Ajtiklb?

Pos xo, an Ajtiklb neech ti ki pidha ti yajtsiktalb; neech ki jokolb ani yab neech ka ejto ka chutsi tin tajx na kts w i kij. Tmki tin chuu jikwchin ani yab chuxin; ani in ayal tm jun xita abal ka lotokn kl kom jaj yab u chuux.
Tam ti an pulek awiltalb in chuu jech, belmch, kom u labnal tajat kal an oktsixtalb xin achl kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.
Na Pablo ani nin juniktsik balin ban tan ban chabl xi Pafos ani kaletsik Perje ban chabl xi Panfilia; por jilantsik kal na Juan ani witsiy Jerusaln.

Tayl, na Pablo ani na Bernab, kale Perje abal ka kaletsik ban bitsow Antioka xi kwajat ban chabl xi Pisidia. Tam ti tajaich ti kwajattsik ani in bajaw nin ktsjil an koyxnich, ochichtsik ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani buxkantsik.

Tam ti okonich ti ajyb nin takixtal an Dios xin jilmal dhutsadh na Moiss ani nin dhutsadh wil jeye an tiltsixtsik, an oklektsik xi ba jachan an at in abna ka utsantsik ench na Pablo ani na Bernab: —Kidhblbtsik, max a tsidhl jun i takixtalb abal an atiklbtsik, awil ka ulu.
Chakay tm na Pablo, in kontsi an atiklbtsik kal in kubakki abal ka chamkan ani in ulu ench: —Ka acha paylomlbtsik xi Israel ani tattsik teye xa exll ke na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja:

Ni Diosil xi waw xu Israel, in takuy ni weje pakliltsik ani in taja abal ka wenkon ti yejche bitsow tam ti bl kwajattsik jelti pl iniktsik ban chabl xi Ejipto. Tayl, in kldhatsik ba jachan an chabl kal nin awiltal.
&Na Dios in kuxuy chab inik i tamub ejtal xowa jajtsik in taja ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh
ani in kibdha bk i pakdha bitsow ban chabl xi Kann abal ka pidhantsik an ti chabl ni weje pakliltsik.
Ms tayl, ch i bo inik xna i tamub kal chab inik lju, in koytsik taknl kal i ljundhaxtsik, asta tam tin bajaw xowki ti kwajay an tiltsix Samuel.

In konoytsik tm abal in l ka kwajay taknl kal jun i pulek takix ani pidhantsik kal na Dios an ta Sal abal ti pulek takix chab inik xna i tamub. Jech na Sal, u chakmlb kal na Sis, jun i inik xi tl bin kidhtal na Benjamn.

Ms tayl, na Dios in wkoy ti pulek takix na Sal ani in kwajba na Dabid abal jaich ka kwajay tin pulek takxal an israelitatsik. Na Dios in ulu ench kal tin kwenta na Dabid: “U elmal na Dabid, nin chakmil na Isa, jun i inik xu kulbetnl tajat ani neech kin taja ejtal xowa Nan u l.”
Jn ti b xin kidhtaltsik jech na Dabid, jaich na Jess. Jech na Jess, jaich xi aban kal na Dios abal kin loo an israelitatsik jelt xan ti Jaj tin ulmal.
Tam ti yabl tsinek na Jess, na Juan xechin kin tiltsi ejtal an atiklbtsik xi Israel, in utsl abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani ka pujanichtsik.

Tam tu kunelich an kij xowki ti neech ka chemdh na Juan, in ulu ench: “Yab nan xi tattsik a chalpayal ke nan u y; por tu kuxmats ta tl jn xi ms plek k nan. Plek tajat ke yab xata u y abal kin kutpan ku wiltsi tin wikb nin pajab.”
Kidhblbtsik, xi chakmlb kal nin kidhtaltsik na Abraham ani tattsik teye xa exll abal na Dios ejtal in ejtowal kin taja: kal tattsik ta kwenta tu ulal jech an tsubaxtalb xi kal tin kwenta an loeltalb.

Pos xu kwajltsik Jerusaln ani nin oklkiltsik, yab in exla xitam j jeye na Jess, nibal in exbantsi tin kwintal an tiltsixtsik xu ajyb ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb tam in ktsjil an koyxnich. Jaxtm, tam ti jajtsik in pidhna na Jess abal ka chemdh, in tajaichtsik abal ka tmun jelt xan tin ulmal an tiltsixtsik.
Ani maske na Jess yab eltsin ni jun in walab xantki ti ka chemdh, in kontsitsik na Pilato abal kin abna ka chemdh.
Tam ti okonich ti tajtsinal ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab kal Jaj tin kwenta, pabjich tm ban peltsidh te ani jolyat.
Por ejdh ti t kal na Dios.
Tam ti jachan i kij, ynl in xalka tinb na Jess abal ka chutat kal xi juniknadhtsik kl tam ti kale Galilea ani kale Jerusaln. Xo jaich jajtsik xi xeech in tiltsal an atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta na Jess.
Jaxtm xo, waw exom tu ltsaltsik an ti alwa tilab xi na Dios in utsmal ni weje pakliltsik.

Pos waw, xu kidhtalb kal jajtsik, na Dios tu tajtsch xan tin ulmal abal in ejdha ti t na Jess jelt xan ti kwajat dhutsadh bin chabtsl an ajatlbtsik: “Tat tu Chakmil ani Nan tu pidhmal xo ti xechintalb.”
Na Dios in ulmal abal neech kin ejdha ti t abal yab ka kachey nin tul. Na Dios in ulu ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Neech tu pidhatsik an ti lbtajaxtalb xu utsmal neech ku pidha na Dabid.”
Jaxtm tin ulu jeye ench ba jun i ajatlb: “Yab neech ka walka ka kachey nu tul.”
Tsubax kejle, na Dabid in tjontsi nin kidhtaltsik xi jachan i kij xan ti utsan kal na Dios, tayl chemech, jolyat xon ti jolidh nin ttatsik ani nin tul kachey.
Por nin tul na Jess, xi na Dios in ejdha ti t, yab ja kachey.
Kidhblbtsik, yejat ka chobna, ke an pakwlantsixtalb kal tin kwenta ni walastalbil, neech ki bachu kal tin kwentaki na Jess.
Yejat jeye ka chobnatsik ke xita kin belaich na Jess, neech ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios, pos tokot na Jess in ejtowal kin taja jech. Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss yab in ejtowal.
Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka tamu xowa in jilmal dhutsadh an tiltsixtsik, tam tin ulutsik ench:

Ka koytsik i kwenta, tattsik xa pojkl an tsubaxtalb, ki labantsik ani ki kibchontsik; pos Nan, xin Dios, neech ku taja ba na ktsjiltsik i pakdha labidh labandhaxtalb; jech xowa neech ku taja, max ti ki tiltsi jun xita yab neech ka belatsik.
Tam ti na Pablo ani nin juniktsik kalch ban at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb, pakabdh kal xi yabtsik u judo abal ka tiltsintsik jeye jech tam kin bajaw jun nin ktsjil an koyxnich.

Tam ti buklanichtsik xi ta ti junkunk ba jachan an at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, wwn na Pablo ani na Bernab kal yn i judotsik ani xin bellichtsik jeye nin belomtal an judotsik kal yantam i tsubaxtalb. Na Pablo ani na Bernab in takiytsik tajat abal yejat kin ntsi ka kwajaytsik bin alwatal na Dios.
Tam tin bajaw jun nin ktsjil an koyxnich, junkun jun wich xna ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow abal kin axtsi tin kwintal na Dios.
Por tam ti an judotsik xi yab u belom in chuu yn an atiklbtsik, tujey ti itixbltsik ani tujey ti tomnb na Pablo ani ti odhbijyb.

Na Pablo ani na Bernab, kwintsik tm kal yantam i awiltalb ani in utsatsik ench: —Tsubax kejle ke yejat ki ltsi okox an tin kwintal na Dios an judotsik xi jelti tattsik; por kom yab a l ka bachutsik, a xalklich abal yab a l ka bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jaxtm xo, u nechich abal ki tiltsi xi yabtsik u judo.

Pos anchan tu utsan kal an Ajtiklb tam tin ulu ench: Tat tu kwajbmal jelti jun i tajbaxtalb abal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo ani abal ka ltsi xan ti neech kin ejto ka loey ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl tech ti kayl.

Tam tin achatsik jech, xi yabtsik u judo kulb tajat ani in tujutsik kin ulu ke nin kwintal na Dios alwa tajat. Ejtal belmch xi kwajat takudhtsik abal kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Anchan ti xechin ti tilnal nin kwintal na Dios putl jachan an chabl xi Pisidia.

Por an judotsik xi yab u belom, in pidhkwliy taltsik i mmlbtsik xin tajl tajat xan tin ulal nin belomtal ani u kaknbtsik tajat. Kwin jeye kal an ultalb iniktsik xi ba jachan an bitsow ani in utsatsik abal alwa kin kajna na Pablo ani na Bernab, asta kin kldhatsik ba jachan an chabl.
Na Pablo ani na Bernab, in tiniy tm an pojodh xi palenek ba nin akan abal kin chobna xi tajatsik ke yab alwa tin taja abal in pojkantsi tin kwintal na Dios ani kaletsik ban bitsow xin bij Ikonio.
Por an belomtsik kwajat kijidh ani teykmtetsik kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
Taja ban bitsow xi Ikonio, na Pablo ani na Bernab, ochichtsik ban at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb, tiltsixintsik lujat tajat, jaxtm ti yn belmchtsik, xu judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo.
Por an judotsik xi yab u belom in ojtsi tin chalab xi yabtsik u judo ani in taja abal kin chalpay xowa yab alwa kal jachan an kidhblbtsik.

Por blki kwajaytsik taja nakat i kij na Pablo ani na Bernab ani kwintsik kal yantam i awiltalb abal in chob ke an Ajtiklb kwajat kal jajtsik. An Ajtiklb in xalkl xowa jajtsik in ulal kal tin kwenta nin alwatal na Dios ani u pidhnaltsik ti awiltalb abal kin taja i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik.
Por an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow, kxnktsik, taltsik in tolmintsal an judotsik xi yab u belom ani taltsik in tolmintsal an abatwletsik.
An judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo, in tajatsik tm i kw kal an awiltalbtsik abal kin odhbijiy ani kin tujbay an abatwletsik.
Por na Pablo ani na Bernab, tam tin chobnatsik, chinat kaletsik Listra ani Derbe, an bitsowtsik xi kwajat Likaonia ani putlki an kwentsaltsik xi taja wilill,
xon ti xechintsik jeye kin tila an alwa tilab.
Ban bitsow xi Listra, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xi yab in ejtowal ti belal. Jech an inik kwajat buxl ani yab jayki belnek kom kejle anchan ti wachink ti chakam.
Kwajat in achl xowa na Pablo exom in ulal, na Pablo in teloloy jachan an inik ani in chuu abal in bell tajat ke neech ka jeldh.
Utsan tm kawidh ench kal na Pablo: —Ki kubey. Tikcholch tm an inik, kubey ani in tujch tm ti belal.
Tam ti chutat xowa in taja na Pablo, an atiklbtsik in tuju kin ulu kawidh ench kal i kwintalb xi Likaonia: —I diostsik xi jyki i inik painek asta tech xon tu kwajat!
In ulaltsik ke na Bernab, jaich an dios Jupiter ani ke na Pablo, jaich an dios Merkurio abal jaj nu kw.

Nin pleil na Jupiter, xin kool nin olb atjil bin wilbil an bitsow, in tsidha i torotsik ani i tidhats wich tin tamt an wilebtsik. An ple, junax kal an atiklbtsik in l kin chemdha an torotsik abal kin pikbantsi na Bernab ani na Pablo.
Por tam ti na Bernab ani na Pablo, xi jaich an abatwletsik in acha jech, in michnatsik nin kudhkmil, ochich xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik ani in ulutsik kawidh ench:

—Paylomlbtsik! Jantki ta tajltsik jech? Waw u iniktsik weye jelti tattsik ani u tsinek abal tu ltsitsik ke yejatich ka jila ejtal jech xi yab xata ti alwa. Ka belaichtsik na Dios xi ejat, xin tajmal an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani ejtal xowa waach taja.
Ti wejeich, na Dios in jilmal kejle an atiklbtsik ka xechin xan ti jajkitsik kin lena.

Por blki in xalkl tinb na Dios xitam j jeye, kal an alwatalb xowa u tajtsinaltsik. Jaj tu uldhantsal an ti b, tu labedhantsal an ti kapnl, tu pidhl xowa i yntsal abal ki kapu ani abal ku kwajay kijidh.
Por maske in ulutsik ejtal jech, blki yab in ejto kin kubdha abal yab ka chemdhantsat an ti torotsik abal ka pikbantsat.

Ulich tm chb x i judotsik xi tl Antioka ani Ikonio. In pidhkwliy an atiklbtsik abal ka tujbaxintsik ani tujbayat na Pablo. Tam tin chalpaytsik in chemdhmalich, in kldhatsik bodhodhl ba jachan an bitsow.
Por tam ti an belomtsik junkun wilill xon ti kwajat na Pablo, jaj chakay ani ochich jun ba jachan an bitsow. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, kalch tm junax kal na Bernab ban bitsow xi Derbe.
Tam ti okonich kin tila an alwa tilab ba jachan an bitsow xi Derbe, xon ti belmch yn i atiklbtsik, witsiytsik jun Listra, Ikonio ani Antioka.

Ba jachan an chabltsik, in pakabdha tajat an belomtsik ani in utsa abal kin ntsitsik an belomtalb. In utsltsik jeye, ke abal kin ejto jun xita ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, yejat kin watna yn i yajtsiktalb.

Bijyat jeye putlki ban bitsowtsik xon ti waach i belomtsik, i takixtsik xi neech ti belkol an ti belomtsik. Tam ti okonichtsik ti l ani ti kl, in kawintsitsik abal ka beletn kal an Ajtiklb xu belomichtsik.
Tayl, wateytsik ban chabl xi Pisidia ani ulichtsik ban chabl xi Panfilia.
In tilatsik jeye an alwa tilab ban bitsow xi Perje ani tayl kaletsik ban bitsow xin bij Atalia.
Taja Atalia, balintsik ban tan ani kale Antioka, an bitsow xon ti kontsintsidhtsik an tin alwatal na Dios abal kin ejto kin tajatsik an tojlb xi xo in okch.

Tam ti ulichtsik Antioka, in junku an belomtsik ani in tiltsi ejtal xan ti ynktsik kal na Dios abal kin taja an tojlb xi punkuntsidh ani xan ti tolmiyat jeye kal na Dios xi yabtsik u judo abal ka belmchtsik.
Na Pablo ani na Bernab, kwajaytsik taja nakat i kij kal jajtsik.

Tam ti na Pablo ani na Bernab kwajattsik Antioka, ulich taltsik i iniktsik xi tl Judea. Jech an iniktsik, in tuju kin oktsi an kidhblbtsik ke abal kin ejto ka loeytsik, kool kin tajatsik an exl ba nin tul jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.

Na Pablo ani na Bernab in tujutsik jun i kwlxtalb kal jech an iniktsik ani kwlxintsik tajat. Jaxtm ti utsan na Pablo ani na Bernab ani taltsik an kidhblbtsik xi taja abal ka kaletsik Jerusaln kin lejkiy jech kal an abatwletsik ani an takixtsik xin beletnl an belomtsik.

Xi aban kal an belomtsik, watey ban chabl xi Fenisia ani xi Samaria. Taja, in tilltsik xan ti belmchtsik jeye an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik u kulbl tajat kal jech xowa in achl u tiltsinaltsik.
Tam ti ulichtsik Jerusaln, bachwat kal an belomtsik, kal an abatwletsik ani kal an takix belomtsik. In tiltsitsik xan ti ynktsik kal na Dios kal an tojlb xi punkuntsidh.

Por taltsik an fariseotsik xi belmmadhich jeye, kubeytsik ani in ulu ench: —An belomtsik xi yabtsik u judo, yejat ka tajtsin an ti exl ba nin tul ani kin wwnatsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Junkun tm an abatwletsik ani an takix belomtsik abal kin chalpay xan ti neech kin ejto kin lejkiy jech.

Tam ti okonichtsik ynl ti kwlx, chakay na Pedro ani in utsatsik ench: —Kidhblbtsik, a chobichtsik abal na Dios tin takwymal, xi jaich jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal abal ku ltsitsik an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo ani ka belmchtsik jeye.
Ani na Dios, xin exlantsal tin ejattal ejtalkitsik, in xalka abal in bachu xi yabtsik u judo, tam tin pidhaichtsik an ti Tokat Ejattalb anlki jelt xan ti waw tu pidhmal.
Na Dios yab in pl kldha jajtsik kal waw, nibal waw yab tu pl kldha kal jajtsik, pos in tokedhantsitsik jeye an tin ejattal kal tin kwenta abal belmchtsik.
Ani xo, jantki ti yab a belltsik xowa na Dios in tajmal ani a l ka chuutsik kin taja jech an belomtsik xowa waw nibal ni weje pakliltsik in ejtmal kin taja?
Yab yejat ki taja anchan, tokot yejat ki chalpm abal u loodhich aniki kal nin alwatalbil ni Ajtik Jess jelt xan ti jajtsik loodh.

Chamkantsik tm ejtal ani in achatsik xan ti exmch ti tiltsinaltsik kal na Bernab ani na Pablo an exltsik ani an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xin tajmal na Dios kal jajtsik ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.
Tam ti okonichtsik ti kw na Pablo ani na Bernab, na Jakobo in ulu ench: —Kidhblbtsik, ti kin axtsitsik:
Na Simn Pedro tu tiltsmalich xan ti na Dios tin tuju kin bachu jeye xi yabtsik u judo abal kin dhabalnaich.
Jech tmun anchan abal ka tjan jelt xan tin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik ban Tokat Dhuslab ench:
Tayl neech kin witsiy jun ku kwajba jun i Pulek Takix xin kidhtal na Dabid. Jech an Pulek Takix neech kin taja abal kin kakn jelt tam ti ejat na Dabid.
Anchan neech ku taja abal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi bijidh Nan u dhabal ti kin aliytsik ani xi yabtsik u israelita jeye, xi kwajattsik putlki an kayl, ti kin exlatsik abal Nanich tin Okxlbil.
Anchan tin ulu an Okxlb, xin pidhnmal ka chobn ejtal jech asta ti weje.
Jaxtm, nan u ulal ke yab yejat ki itixbdha xi yabtsik u judo xin bellichtsik na Dios.

Lejat kal ki dhutsuntsi abal ki utsatsik ke yabich kin kapu i kapnl xi pikbantsidh an chilabtsik, ke yabich ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal ani yabich kin kapu i konltsik xi kuchdhatski o putedhatski nibal kin kaputsik i xich.

Pos asta ti weje waach jun xita ban bitsowtsik xin oktsixnl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Jech jaich xu ajyb echeki ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.

An abatwletsik ani an takix belomtsik, junax kal ejtal an belomtsik, in ulu tm abal alwa kin takuy chb x xi jajtsik in kidhtal abal kin abatsik Antioka junax kal na Pablo ani na Bernab. Takwyat na Judas xu bijyb jeye Barsabs ani na Silas. Jech an paylomlbtsik, jaich xi kwajat ultalb tajat kal an kidhblbtsik

ani kal jajtsik, abn jech an dhutsadh w, xin ulal ench: “Waw xu kwajat tu abatwle junax kal an takix belomtsik ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik, i abnl i chapndhomtalb abal ejtal an kidhblbtsik xi yabtsik u judo xu kwajl Antioka ani xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Siria ani Silisia.

I chobnmalich ke taltsik i atiklbtsik xu kwajl tech, kalnektsik tachan, por yab waw i abmal. Jajtsik ti itixbdhmalichtsik kal nin oktsixtal ani ti ukpindhmalichtsik abal ti utsltsik ke yejat ka taja an exl ba na tul ani ka wwnatsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Jaxtm waw, i chalpay ejtal tu b ki takuy taltsik i kidhblbtsik xi waw i kidhtal abal ka kale ti ki lnatsik junax kal na Bernab ani na Pablo, an kidhblbtsik xi waw i kanidhl tajat.
Jech na Bernab ani na Pablo, jaich an kidhblbtsik xi yab tajat in ajyaltsik tinb maske ka chemdh kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Jaxtm, j i abl na Judas ani na Silas xi takwymal, jajtsik neech ti kw kal tattsik abal ti ki wiltsitsik ejtal jech.
Pos an Tokat Ejattalb ani waw weye, i chuu abal alwa, ke yab ms xowa tu utsatsik ka taja, tokot jech xi ms yejat:

ke yab ka kaputsik xowa pikbantsidhich an chilabtsik, yab jeye ka kaputsik i xich, nibal nin tul an konltsik xi kuchdhatski ani yab ki junkuntsik kal xi yab a tomtal. Max yabich ka tajatsik jech, a tajlichtsik xowa alwa. Ki kwajaytsik alwa.”
Anchan p, tam ti abanichtsik, kaletsik Antioka. In junku taja an kidhblbtsik ani in pidha an ti dhutsadh w.
Tam tin ajay jech an dhutsadh w an kidhblbtsik, kulbtsik tajat kal jachan an takixtalb.
Kom na Judas ani na Silas i tiltsixtsik jeye, in takiy ani in pakabdha an kidhblbtsik kal yn i tilabtsik xin ulu.
Tayl, tam ti kwajch na Judas ani na Silas chb x a kts Antioka, chapndhjichtsik tm kal i kijidhtalb kal an kidhblbtsik abal ka witsch xon ti kwajattsik xi kl ti abnktsik.
Por na Silas in ulu abal neech ja ka jilkon taja.
Na Pablo ani na Bernab jilkon taja Antioka ani kal yn ms xi keettsik, in ntsi ti oktsixtsik ani ti tiltsixtsik an ti alwa tilab.
Tam ti ms taylich, na Pablo in utsa ench na Bernab: —Wana jun ki lna ti t an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat putlki an bitsowtsik xon ti tilmalich nin kwintal na Dios abal ki chuu xan ti kwajattsik.
Na Bernab in l kin jna na Juan kal jajtsik, xu bijyb jeye ta Markos;
por na Pablo in chalpayal abal yab alwa max kin jna, pos ms okox, jilnktsik Panfilia ani yab in ntsi an tojlb kal jajtsik.
Kwlxin kal jech tin kwenta ani yabtsik in koy i lejkintalb, jaxtm ti kejtsik ti kale. Na Bernab in jna na Markos. Balintsik ban tan ani kale ban chabl xin bij Chipre xi kwajat ban pujal.
Na Pablo in takuy na Silas abal ka junikn kl. Tam ti okonich ti kontsintsbtsik an tin alwatalbil na Dios kal an kidhblbtsik, kalchtsik tm.
Xechintsik Siria ani Silisia in punkuntsal an kidhblbtsik abal kin ntsaltsik an ti belom.
Na Pablo ani na Silas ulich ban bitsowtsik xin bij Derbe ani Listra, taja, in ela jun i belom xin bij ta Timoteo. Jech na Timoteo u chakmlb kal jun i mmlb judo xu belom, por nin tta i griego.
An kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Listra ani Ikonio in till abal jech na Timoteo, jaich jun i alwa inik.

Na Pablo in lena ka junikn kal na Timoteo, jaxtm tin tajtsi an ti exl bin tul, abal yab kin itixbdha an judotsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsowtsik. Pos kal ejtal ti chobte ke nin tta na Timoteo i griego.
Ba ejtal an bitsowtsik xon tu watel, in ltsal an kidhblbtsik an ti takixtalb xin pidhnmal an abatwletsik ani an takix belomtsik xi kwajat Jerusaln abal anchan ti yejat ka tajan xan tin ulaltsik.
Anchan, an belomtsik u likedhantsb tin itsch ani in ntsaltsik ti belom. Tsudhl u tajkanal u yanel ms an belomtsik.
Yab walk kal an Tokat Ejattalb kin tilatsik an alwa tilab ban chabl xi Asia. Jaxtm, wateytsik ban chabl xi Frijia ani Galasia
ani ulichtsik bin wl an chabl xi Misia. Tam ti taja ti kwajattsik, in chalpay ka ochichtsik ban chabl xi Bitinia, por yab walk kin tajatsik anchan kal nin Ejattal na Jess.
Wateytsik in lujtalki ani yab ochich ban chabl xi Misia, kaletsik ban bitsow xi Troas.

Tam ti taja ti kwajattsik, jun i akal, na Pablo in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb. Ban xalkantsixtalb, in chuu kubl jun i inik xu kwajl Masedonia ani u pakabdhb kl ench: “Ki watey Masedonia ani ti ku tolmiy.”
Tam ti na Pablo in chuu jachan an xalkantsixtalb, u tojojon abal ku kale Masedonia kom i chob alwa ke na Dios jaich xi kwajat tu utsl ku kale taja ki tiltsitsik jeye an ti alwa tilab.
Taja Troas, u balin ban tan ani u kale in lujtal Samotrasia, an chabl xi kwajat ban ja. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, u ulich ban bitsow xin bij Nepolis.
Tam tu kwajatich Nepolis, u kale Filipos. Jech an bitsow Filipos, kwajat Masedonia, an bitsow xi ms ultalb ani Roma tu taknal. U kwajay taja chb x a kts.

Jun i kij, tam ti jaich in ktsjil an koyxnich, u kale ban bitsow ani u kale xon ti kwajat jun i walja, jun i kubtalb xon tu kalel tajat yn ti l. U buxkan taja ani u kwajay ki tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an mmlbtsik xi junkunk taja.

Jn ti b an mmlbtsik xin bij Lidia xu kwajl ban bitsow Tiatira, xin nujwal i kudhkumtsik xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn, ta ti kwajat ti ochwix. Jech an mmlb, in kaknl tajat na Dios ani palmdhantsat tin ejattal kal an Ajtiklb abal kin bela xowa kwajat in ulal na Pablo.

Pujyat tm, kl ejtal nin kidhtaltsik ani tayl tu pakabdha ench: —Max tattsik a chalpayal ke nan tsubax lejtal tu bellich an Ajtiklb, ki kaletsik tu kim abal ki koych taja. Ani tu tajtsi ti chplb abal ku koych bin kim.

Jun i kij, tam tu neech ban kubtalb xon tu kalel tu l, i ela jun i tsidhan xin kool jun i ejattalb xin witl kin exla xowakich. Jech an tsidhan in tl tajat yn i tumn abal nin ajtiktsik kom in witl kin exla xowakich.
Waw ani na Pablo u wwn kal an tsidhan ani kawidh in ulal ench: —Jech an paylomlbtsik, in tojnlil a Dios xi plek tajat ani ti ltsaltsik xan ti neech ki loey.

Yn a kts in taja anchan, asta ke jun i kij na Pablo, itixbdhjich, chawkilch ani in utsa ench an ejattalb xi ta ti kwajat ba jachan an tsidhan: —Tin bij na Jesukristo tu utsl abal ki kale ba jachan an tsidhan. Ani tmki ti kale jachan an ejattalb ban tsidhan.
Por tam ti nin ajtiktsik jachan an tsidhan in chuu abal yabich ms neech kin ejto kin tlomna, in yakwatsik na Pablo ani na Silas ani in jna chejel bitsow xon ti kwajat an awiltalbtsik.
Utwattsik ban awiltalbtsik ani in ulutsik ench xi yakwxink: —Jech an iniktsik, xi jaich i judotsik, exom in pjxlindhl an atiklbtsik xi tech ba ni bitswil
ani exom in oktsixnl xowa jajtsik in ujnmal in tajl, por waw yab alwa ki bachu nibal ki taja, kom u romano.
An atiklbtsik chakuy ani in adhk ti utey ba na Pablo ani na Silas. An awiltalbtsik in abna ka kotsin tin kudhkmil na Pablo ani na Silas ani ka kwadhantsik kal i wichate.
Tam ti okon ti kwadhnaltsik ynl, balyat ban wikaxte ani utsan an belkol wikaxte abal kin beletnatsik tajat alwa.
Tam ti an belkol wikaxte in acha utsan jech, in baliy asta tin okontalich in altjil an wikaxte ani in jila machbintsidhtsik tin akan kal i te.
Por tam ti chejelich i akal, na Pablo ani na Silas kwajattsik ti l ani in ajatnltsik i ajatlb abal a Dios. Xi keet an wiknltsik kwajat in achltsik.
Jun jiktowl ti lwkin chapik tajat an chabl ani in dhiya nin akanlbil an wikaxte. Tmki jachan, jakpin ejtal an wilebtsik ani wilkan an patltsik xi kl ti kwajat wikadh an wiknltsik.
Ejech an belkol wikaxte ani tam tin chuu abal ejtal nin wilbiltsik an wikaxte jakpink, in jixna nin machtil abal kin chemdha tinb kom in chalpayal ke jlmadh ejtal an wiknltsik.
Por tawn kawidh ench kal na Pablo: —Yab xata ka tajtsi tab, pos ejtal tech u kwajat.
In konoy tm jun i tajbaxtalb an belkol wikaxte, ochich adhik alt ani u wipipl kal i jkib tudhlan tin tamt na Pablo ani na Silas.
Kldhtsik tm elb kal an belkol wikaxte ani konyattsik ench: —Jabtsik, janty yejat ku taja abal kin loey neye?
Jajtsik in tkoy ench: —Ka bela an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani neech ki loey tat ani ejtal na kidhtaltsik.
Tiltsin tin kwintal an Ajtiklb ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik jachan an belkol wikaxte, tiltsintsik jeye.
Jachan i ora bl akal, an belkol wikaxte in jna na Pablo ani na Silas abal kin taktsi xon ti chojbdhats kal an wichate. Tayl, pujan an belkol wikaxte ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik.
Ms tayl, an belkol wikaxte in jnatsik tin kim ani in kapundha. An belkol wikaxte ani ejtal nin kidhtaltsik, u kulbl tajat abal in belaichtsik na Dios.
Tam ti tsudhey, an awiltalbtsik in aba dhajawe i ykwaltsik abal ka utsan an belkol wikaxte kin walkaichtsik.
Utsan tm ench na Pablo kal an belkol wikaxte: —An awiltalbtsik in ulal abal tu walkaichtsik; jaxtm, awil ki kalchtsik ani yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax.

Por na Pablo in ulu ench: —Waw xu romano, tu kwadha tin tamt an atiklbtsik maske yab in exbaymaltsik okox xanty i walmal, tu baliy ban wikaxte; ani xo tu walkl chinatki? Pos yaba! Ka tschtsik xo jajtsik ti ku kldha.
An ykwaltsik in tiltsi jech an awiltalbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik jikey tam tin chobnatsik abal na Pablo ani na Silas u romano.
Pos kale tm an awiltalbtsik abal kin kontsi ti pakwlantsixtalb na Pablo ani na Silas. Kldhjichtsik tm ani kontsin ti alwatalb abal ka kalchtsik ba jachan an bitsow.
Tam ti kalchtsik ban wikaxte, kale bin kim na Lidia. Tam tin lnaich an kidhblbtsik ani in utsaich abal yab kin jilatsik ti belom, kalchtsik tm.
Tam ti kalchtsik, na Pablo ani na Silas watey ban bitsowtsik xi Anfpolis, xi Apolonia ani ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Tesalnika. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun i at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb.
Na Pablo, kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb jelt xan tin ujnmalich in tajl ani x i semana kwin kal jajtsik tam in ktsjil an koyxnich.

Anlki xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab, anchan tin wiltsaltsik ke an Kristo kool kin watna i yajtsiktalb, kool ka chemdh ani ka ejech ti t. In ulal ench: —Jech na Jess xin kwajat tu tiltsaltsik, jaich an Kristo.
Belmch tm taltsik an judotsik ani junkuntsik kal na Pablo ani na Silas. Belmch jeye yn i griego xin kaknltsik tajat na Dios ani yn i mmlb xi exlmtetsik tajat.

Por kal jech tin kwenta, an judotsik xi yab belmmadh, tujeytsik ti itixbl ani in junku chb x i iniktsik xi atax xi xeechkitsik ti bl yab xata in tojnl. In tujutsik ti pjex ani in itixbdha an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow. Kaletsik ti pjex bin kim na Jasn, in ayaltsik na Pablo ani na Silas abal kin kldhatsik ani kin pidhna ban atiklbtsik.

Por kom yab elantsik taja na Pablo ani na Silas, in jnatsik bodhodhl na Jasn ani taltsik i kidhblbtsik tin tamt an awiltalbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow ani in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Jech an iniktsik, xi xeech in ojtsal tin chalab an atiklbtsik putl an kayl, tsinekich jeye xo tech.
Jech na Jasn in koydhmal tin kim. Ejtal jajtsik in chikat tajtsal tin takixtalbil an lej pulek takix romano abal in ulaltsik ke waach t i Pulek Takix xu bijyb ta Jess.
Tam tin achatsik ejtal jech, an atiklbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik tujey ti itixbl.
Por na Jasn ani xi keettsik jeye, in pidhnatsik i jalbixtalb abal ka walktsik.
Jikatki ti utsantsik na Pablo ani na Silas kal an kidhblbtsik abal ka kale akal ani ka kalchtsik Berea. Tam ti ulichtsik taja, kaletsik ban at xon ti an judotsik in tajl an junkuntalb.

Jech an judotsik, alwa iniktsik ja ani yab jelti xi Tesalnika. In bachutsik an alwa tilab kal yantam i kulbtalb ani tsudhey ka tsudhey in ajyaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab abal kin chuu max tsubax lejtal xowa u ltsinaltsik kal na Pablo ani na Silas.
Jaxtm, yn belmch xi jajtsik ani an griegotsik jeye. Belmch jeye i mmlbtsik ani i iniktsik xi exlmtetsik tajat.
Por tam ti an judotsik xi Tesalnika in chobna abal na Pablo kwajat in till jeye nin kwintal na Dios ba jachan an bitsow xi Berea, kaletsik jeye taja ani in pjxlindha an atiklbtsik.
Por an kidhblbtsik in aba jikatki na Pablo abal ka kale bin waltsik an pujal. Na Silas ani na Timoteo, jilkontsik Berea.

Jn na Pablo kal nin juniktsik asta ban bitsow xin bij Atenas. Tam ti ulichtsik taja, an junkiltsik witsiy, por utsantsik kal na Pablo abal ka witsiy Berea ani kin utsa na Silas ani na Timoteo abal ka kaletsik dhubat xon ti kwajat na Pablo.
Lejat na Pablo kwajat Atenas in aytsm na Silas ani na Timoteo, u chalpax tajat abal in chutal an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow in kaknltsik tajat i chilabtsik.

Jaxtm na Pablo, u kalel kin tila nin kwintal na Dios ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. U kwajl jeye ti kw kal taltsik xin kaknl a Dios ani tsudhey ka tsudhey in tiltsal tin kwintal na Dios junax chejel bitsow xitaki kin ela.

Taltsik an iniktsik xin wewkmtsal tin oktsixtalbil xu bijyb ti epikreos ani taltsik jeye xin wewkmtsal tin oktsixtalbil an estoikos, in tujutsik ti tiloll kal na Pablo. Taltsik in ulal ench: —Janty awil tu utsl jech an inik xu kw tajat? Ani taltsik in ulal jeye: —In junwal jelti max xeech in lnl i keet diostsik. Jech tin ulaltsik, jaich abal in achltsik ke na Pablo in till an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta na Jess ani abal neech ka ejdh ti t an chemlomtsik kal na Dios.
Jn tm ba jun i kubtalb xu bijyb ti Arepago, xon tin ujnmal u junkunal an takixtsik ani konyat ench: —Alwaxe ki chobna weye jech an t oktsixtalb xi tat a tsidhl?
Pos waw i achl a till xowa yab i exbayal ani i l weye ki exbay xanty in l kin ulu ejtal jech.
Pos ejtal xu kwajltsik Atenas ani an pl iniktsik jeye xu kwajltsik taja, yabtsik ms xowa in chalpayal, tokot kin acha ani kin tila an t tilabtsik xu tilnal taja.
Kubey tm na Pablo junax chejel xon ti jajtsik kwajat ban Arepago ani in ulu ench: —Paylomlbtsik xi kwajl Atenas, nan u chutal ke tattsik a kaknl tajat a diosiltsik.

Abal tam tin xechin tin teloll xon ta tajltsik an kaknaxtalb, u ela ba jn xon ta kwajbltsik an pikbaxtalb i dhuslab xin ulal ench: “Abal na Dios xi yab i exll.” Pos jech na Dios xi tattsik a kaknl maske yab a exll, jaich na Dios xi nan tu tiltsaltsik.
Jech na Dios, jaich xin tajmal an kayl ani ejtal xowa waach; Jaj in dhabal an walki ani an kayl. Yab u kwajl ban pulek at xon ti Jaj u kaknb xi tajadh kal i iniktsik,
nibal in kyal i yejetalb xi neech ka ejtowat ka tajtsin kal i atiklbtsik. Pos Jaj tu pidhl an ti xechintalb, Jaj tu tajl ku dhtsumlch ani Jaj tu pidhl ejtal xowa i yntsal.
Kal jn tokot i inik tin tajmal ejtal an atiklbtsik abal ka kwajaytsik ba putl an chabl. In okox bijtsmalich an ti kij ani an ti chabl xon ti yejat ka kwajaytsik,
abal kin aliytsik na Dios, jelti max baludhki neech kin ejto kin elatsik, maske tsubax kejle na Dios yab w ti kwajat kal waw.
Pos kal tin awiltal na Dios tu xeech, tu yoynal ani tu ejat; jun i chalpadh inik xi tattsik a kidhtal in ulu ench: “Waw u kidhtalb kal a Dios.”
Max waw u kidhtalb kal a Dios, yab yejat ki chalpay ke na Dios in junwal jelti jun i chilab xi tajadh kal i oro, o kal i plata, o kal i tujub, xi tajnk kal i iniktsik xantiki jajtsik kin chalpay.
Na Dios in kuxuy xowa in taja an atiklbtsik xi ti wel chabki abal yab in chob xanty in tajltsik. Por xo, in utsl ejtal an atiklbtsik xi putlki abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom.

Pos na Dios in bijymalich jun i kij xowki neech kin ljundha ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl kal i lujattalb. Neech ka ljundhtsik kal jun i inik xi Jaj in takwymal ani jech, ejtalich in pidhmal kin chobna xita J tam ti Jaj in ejdha ti t.
Tam tin achatsik abal an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh ti t, taltsik labdhnaxin ani taltsik in ulu ench: —Tayl jun neech ki ntsi ki acha jech xowa a till.
Jilanichtsik tm kal na Pablo.
Por wwn kal taltsik i atiklbtsik ani belmchtsik. Jn ti b xi jajtsik, jaich na Dionisio, xu kidhtalb jeye kal xu junkunaltsik ban Arepago. Belmch jeye jun i mmlb xu bijyb Dmaris ani yn ms xita.
Tam ti ms tayl, na Pablo kale Atenas ani kale ban bitsow xin bij Korinto.

Taja, in ela jun i judo xin bij Akila, xu chakam ban chabl xi Ponto. Na Akila ani nin tomtal Prisila tm tajat t ti ulnektsik Korinto. Jajtsik tl ban chabl xin bij Italia, kaletsik ban bitsow xi Roma abal an pulek takix Klawdio in ulu ke yejat ka kale Roma ejtal an judotsik. Na Pablo kale kin lna na Akila ani na Prisila
ani kom na Pablo in witl jeye kin taja xowa jajtsik in tajl, ke jaich an tojmch kudhkum at, kwajay kal jajtsik abal ka tjon junax.
Echeki tam in ktsjil an koyxnich, na Pablo u kalel ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, u kwajl kin tila taja an alwa tilab, in pakabdhl an judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo jeye.
Tam ti ulich na Silas ani na Timoteo xi tltsik Masedonia, na Pablo in ntsch tm kin tila an alwa tilab abal kin lej tsubkantsi an judotsik, ke na Jess, jaich an Kristo xi jajtsik kwajat in aytsm.

Por an judotsik tujey ti itixbl ani ti odhbijixtsik. In tiniy tm nin kudhkmil na Pablo jelti jun i exl abal kin xalkantsitsik ke yab alwa xan tin tajl ani in utsatsik ench: —Tattsik ta walab max ka kibdha na ejattal, nan yabich u kwenta. Xo in nechich abal ku tiltsi an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo.
Kale tm ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kale bin kim jun i inik xin bij Justo. Jech an inik, in kaknl jeye na Dios ani u kwajl tin wl an at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb.
Na Krispo, xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb kl ejtal nin kidhtaltsik, in belatsik an Ajtiklb. Belmch jeye yn i atiklbtsik xi taja Korinto tam tin achatsik jech an alwa tilab ani pujantsik.
Jun i akal, na Pablo in chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb xon ti utsan ench kal an Ajtiklb: —Yab ki jikey, ka ntsi ka tila nu kwintal ani yab ki chamkan.
Nan in kwajat kal tat ani yab xita neech kin ejto ti ki tajtsi jun xata yab alwa, pos u kool yn i atiklbtsik ba jech an bitsow xi neechtsik ti kin bela.
Anchan, na Pablo kwajay taja Korinto jun i tamub kal chejel, in oktsal an atiklbtsik an tin kwintal na Dios.
Por jachan i kij, tam ti na Galin kwajat ti pulek awiltalb Akaya, an judotsik junkun abal kin pjey na Pablo. Jn xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb

ani utsan ench an pulek awiltalb: —Jech an inik xeech in utsl an atiklbtsik ke yejat kin kakna na Dios kal jun i kaknaxtalb xi yab in junwal jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Nechich jeye tajat ka kwin na Pablo, tam ti na Galin in utsa ench an judotsik: —Judotsik, max jaichak jun i walastalb o jun i ataxtalb xowa in tajmal jech an inik, neech tu exbantsitsik xowa ka ulu;
por kom i tilabki ani i bijlbkitsik xowa a kwlxnl ani kal tin kwenta jeye na takixtalbiltsik, awil ka lejkiy tatkitsik, nan yab u l tin ljundhom kal jech xowa tattsik a kwlxnl.
Ani in utsa tm ka kalchtsik elb ejtal ti b.
Na Sstenes, an inik xu oklek ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb yakwan kal xi t ti kwajattsik ani chawat taja tin tamt an pulek awiltalb. Por na Galin yab in taja ti kij ejtal jech.

Na Pablo kwajay bl owat Korinto. Ms tayl, in utsaich tm an kidhblbtsik abal nechich ani balinich tm ban tan abal ka kale ban chabl xi Siria junax kal na Prisila ani na Akila. Ban bitsow xi Senkrea, tam ti yabl balnk ban tan, na Pablo olilin abal kin taja jun xata xowa in ulmal neech kin taja.
Tam ti ulichtsik ban bitsow xi Efeso, na Pablo in jila na Prisila ani na Akila. Kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani kwin kal an judotsik xi taja u junkunal.
Pakabdh kal an judotsik xi taja abal ka kwajay nakat i kij kal jajtsik, por na Pablo yab in lena.

Chapndhomch tokot na Pablo abal nechich ani in utsatsik ench: —Kool kin kale Jerusaln abal ku ajbna an ajib xi exomich ti kunel; por neech jun kin witsiy abal tu lnatsik ti t, max na Dios anchan tin l. Tayl, na Pablo balin ban tan ani kale Efeso.
Tam ti ulich Sesarea, na Pablo paay ban tan ani kale Jerusaln abal kin chapndha an belomtsik. Tayl kale jeye Antioka.
Tam ti kwajch w i kij Antioka, kale jun ani xechin kin loniy juntsik ti juntsik an bitsowtsik xu taknal Galasia ani xi Frijia, in punkuntsaltsik abal yab kin jila ti belom.

Tam ti jachan i kij, ulich Efeso jun i judo xu bijyb ta Apolos, xu chakam ban bitsow xi Alejandra. Jech na Apolos, jaich jun i alwa tiltsix tin kwintal na Dios ani in exll tajat alwa an Tokat Dhuslab.
Jaj oktsidh tajat alwa tin tsubaxtalbil an Ajtiklb, u tiltsix kal yantam i kulbtalb ani u oktsix kal yantam i tajaxtalb kal tin kwenta na Jess, maske jaj tokot in exll nin pujaxtalbil na Juan.
Na Apolos kwajay ti tiltsix ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb kal ni jun i jkib; por tam ti achan kal na Prisila ani na Akila, jn plki ani wiltsin ms tajax tin tsubaxtalbil na Dios.

Tayl, tam ti na Apolos in ulu abal neech ban chabl xi Akaya, tolmiyat kal an kidhblbtsik ani in abtsitsik jun i dhutsadh w abal an belomtsik xi taja, xon tin utsl abal kin bachutsik alwa na Apolos tam ka ulich. Tam ti ulich Akaya, in tolmiy tajat xi belmmadhichtsik kal tin kwenta nin alwatal na Dios.

Na Apolos in xalkl tin tamt an atiklbtsik abal ukpink ti kwajat an judotsik kal tin kwenta na Jess. In xalkantsal kal jun i tsubaxtalb xi yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke yab ani ani in ltsaltsik ban Tokat Dhuslab, ke na Jess jaich an Kristo xi kwajattsik in aytsm.
Lejat na Apolos kwajat Korinto, na Pablo watey ban kwentsaltsik xi kwajat ban chnlom ani ulich Efeso, xon tin ela chb x i belomtsik.
Konyattsik ench kal na Pablo: —A bachutsikxe an Tokat Ejattalb tam ta belmch? Tkontsik ench: —Nibal i achmal ela max waach i Tokat Ejattalb.
Konyattsik tm jun ench kal na Pablo: —Pos, jantom pujaxtalb a bachmaltsik? Jajtsik tkon ench: —Waw u pujan jelt xan tin ulu na Juan.

Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pablo: —Ani kejle, na Juan in pujymal xin jillichtsik ti walablom, por in utsltsik abal yejat kin bela xi neech ka tsch ms tayl k jaj. Jech xi kwajat in till, jaich na Jess, an Kristo.
Tam tin achaichtsik jech, pujyattsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess.
In kwajba tm nin kubak na Pablo bin b jajtsik ani ulich an Tokat Ejattalb ba jajtsik. Kwintsik kal i keet kwintalb ani in tilltsik i tilab xu pidhnal kin ulu kal a Dios.
Lajuchb xna an iniktsik xin exbay xowa utsan kal na Pablo.

Tin nakl x a ch, na Pablo in ntsi ka kale ban at xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb. Taja in will ani in till nin kwintal na Dios kal ni jun i jkib. In pakabdhl an atiklbtsik abal kin exbay xan tu takix na Dios.

Por taltsik in chapikmdha nin itsch ani yab in lenatsik ti belom, tokot in atax tilltsik an t oktsixtalb tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Plm tm na Pablo kal jajtsik ani in jna an belomtsik ba jun i at xon tu tajnal i exblch. Jech an at, in dhabal jun in inik xin bij Tirano ani taja ti oktsixin na Pablo tsudhey ka tsudhey.
Anchan tin ntsi kin taja na Pablo tin nakl chb i tamub, jaxtm ti ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Asia, i judotsik ani i griegotsik, in acha nin tsubaxtalbil an Ajtiklb Jess.
Na Dios in pidhl ti awiltalb na Pablo abal kin taja i pakdha labandhaxtalb.
