Watats tajat, ke asta i panyuelotsik o i kudhkumtsik xin takmal o in wetnmal na Pablo, u jntsinal an yaultsik. Tam kin taka an yaultsik, u jell kal an yawlch xin kooltsik ani an atax ejattalbtsik u kalel jeye.

Por taltsik i judotsik xi xeech ti kldhax atax ejattalb ban atiklbtsik, in lena kin ntsi tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess abal kin kldhaxna. In utsl ench an atax ejattalbtsik: —Tin bij na Jess xi xeech in till na Pablo, tu utsl ki kaletsik.
Jech jaich in tajl xi bk an iniktsik xu chakmlbtsik kal na Eseba, jun i judo xi jaich jn ti b in oklkil an pletsik.
Por tam tin utsatsik anchan, tkoyat ench kal an atax ejattalb: —Na Jess u exll ani u exll jeye xitam j na Pablo; por tattsik, jitatsik teye?
Tmki jachan, an inik xon ti kwajat an atax ejattalb, tikchon xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani kom likat tajat, ttsik ejtal ti b. Chawattsik tajat, chojbdh ani chilim ti kaletsik ti dhil ba jachan an at.
Ejtal an judotsik ani an griegotsik xu kwajl taja Efeso, in chobna jech; jaxtm ti jikeytsik tajat ani in pubdhantsaltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess.
Anl jeye, yn xi belmmadhichtsik, u ulel kin lna an walastalb xin tajmaltsik ti wel chabki.

Xu dhimantsikwiik, in tsidhl nin dhutsadh wiltsik ani in tsikl tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Tam ti kldhantsat xatwa in jalbl jachan an dhutsadh wtsik, in bajaw nin jalbl, chab inik lju mil i tumn xi tajadh kal i plata.
Ani anchan, nin tsubaxtalbil an Ajtiklb neech u bukel u bukel ani u xalkanal nin awiltal.

Tam ti ms tayl, na Pablo in ulu abal neech kin lna an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Masedonia ani xi Akaya ani kin ntsi an bl asta Jerusaln. In ulu jeye ke tam kin lnaich Jerusaln, kool ka kale jeye Roma.
In aba tm Masedonia chb nin tolmiwltsik, na Timoteo ani na Erasto, lejat jaj jilkon bl w i kij Asia.
Tam ti jachan i kij, wachin jun i kwlxtalb plek kal tin kwenta an t oktsixtalb.

Jachan an kwlxtalb, in taja jun i inik xin bij Demetrio xin tajl i chilabtsik kal i plata. Jech an inik in tajl i tsitsik chilab xin junwal jelti an at xon tu kaknb an ajtiklb xu bijyb Diana ani yandha tajat in tl xu tojnaltsik kal jaj.
Pos in junku nin tojnliltsik kl xi keettsik xi jaychki jeye in tojlbil ani in utsatsik ench: —Jabtsik, a chobichtsik ke kal jech an tojlb i tl tajat an tumn;

por xo, a chutaltsik ani a achltsik, ke jech na Pablo xeech in ulal ke an chilabtsik xin tajl an iniktsik, yab i dios. Ynich i atiklbtsik in tajmal kin bela anchan, yab tokot techki Efeso, anl jeye putlki ban chabl xi Asia.

Jech yab tajat alwa abal neech ti ku ojtsi jech an ti tojlb xi kool. Yab tokot jechki, an at xon tu kaknb an ajtiklb xu bijyb Diana, yabich jeye neech ka tajan ti kij tayl. Anchan, neech tm ka pojkantsatich tin publ jech an ajtiklb xu kaknb kal ejtal waw xu kwajl ban chabl xi Asia ani kal xu kwajltsik jeye putlki an kayl.
Tam tin achatsik jech, chakuytsik tajat ani kawidh tin ulutsik ench: —Plek an ajtiklb Diana, xu kaknb kal waw xu kwajl tech Efeso!

Wachin tm i pjxtalb ba jachan an bitsow. Yakwan na Gayo ani na Aristarko, chb i iniktsik xu kwajl Masedonia xi junkmte kl na Pablo ani bodhodhl ti jntsik asta xon tin kyal an junkuntalb an atiklbtsik.
Na Pablo in lwiik ka ochich taja abal ka kwin kal an atiklbtsik, por yab walk kal an belomtsik.
Anl jeye, taltsik nin jab na Pablo xu awiltalbtsik Asia, in abna ka pakabdh na Pablo abal yab ka ochich taja.
Lejat ba jachan an junkuntalb, an atiklbtsik keetich keetich xanty in ulaltsik kawidh abal u chakltsik ani yn an atiklbtsik xi yab in chob xantki ti junkunk.

Por taltsik xi ta ti kwajat taja in ltsi na Alejandro xantki tin kwenta tin tajltsik anchan. Jech na Alejandro, jaich xi nixk ka ochich tin tamt an atiklbtsik kal an judotsik. Na Alejandro in utsa an atiklbtsik kal in kubakki abal ka chamkan kom jaj in l ti kw ani kin ulu ke yab jaj an judotsik in tujm jech.
Por tam ti chutat abal jaj u judo jeye, kwajaytsik ti dhajnal ench chb xna i ora: —Plek an ajtiklb Diana xu kaknb kal waw xu kwajl tech Efeso!

Tam ti an dhutsum xi ba jachan an bitsow in ejtch kin chamka an atiklbtsik, in ulu ench: —Paylomlbtsik xi kwajl Efeso, putl an kayl in chob ke jech an bitsow xi Efeso kwajat punkudh abal kin beletna an at xon tu kaknb an ajtiklb xu bijyb Diana ani ka beletnantsat jeye an tin chilbil xi tl ba na Jupiter.
Kom yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke jech yab ani, ki chamkantsik ani yab xata ka tajatsik max yab a chalpaymaltsik okox alwa.
Pos jech an iniktsik xi tattsik a tsidhmal, yab in odhbijymal nibal in atax tilmal ni ajtik Diana.

Max na Demetrio ani nin tojnliltsik waltsidh kal jun xita, jaxtmich ti waach i ljundhomtsik ban at xon tu tajnal i ljundhaxtalb; awil kin utsbiy taja ani ka lejkintsik alwa jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb.
Ani max a kool bl keet xanty ka lejkiytsik, yejat ka lejkiytsik ba jun i junkuntalb;
yab t ku utsan ke waw i tajl ka pjxin an atiklbtsik kal xowa tmun xo. Pos yab waach ni jun i tsubaxtalb xi neech ki ejto ki ulu max ku konyat xantki tin kwenta ti tjan jech.
Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, in utsa tm an atiklbtsik abal ka kalch.

Tam ti okonich an pjxtalb, na Pablo in kaniy an belomtsik abal kin pidha chb x ti takixtalb. Tayl, tam ti okonich kin pidhna jech an takixtalb, in chapndhaichtsik tm kal jun i muluknaxtalb ani kalch tm Masedonia.
In lna putlki an kwentsaltsik xi ba jachan an chabl, in pakabdhl tajat an kidhblbtsik kal nin kwintal ani ms tayl ulich Gresia.

Kwajay taja x a ch. Tam ti nechich tajat ka balin ban tan abal ka kale Siria, na Pablo in chobna xanty tu lenb ka tajtsin kal an judotsik abal u atnal. Jaxtm tin chalpay abal ms alwa ka witsiy belal ani watey jun Masedonia.

Junikn kal na Spater xu kwajl Berea xu chakmlb kal na Pirro, na Aristarko ani na Segundo xu kwajltsik Tesalnika, na Gayo xu kwajl Derbe, na Timoteo, na Tkiko ani na Trfimo xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Asia.
Jech an kidhblbtsik okxin ani tu aytsitsik ban bitsow xi Troas.
Tam ti okonich an ajib xowki tu kapnal an pan xi yab jilbdhats kal an jilbdhaxtalb koye, u kale Filipos kal i tan ani tin blb a kts, i bajawtsik ban bitsow xi Troas. U kwajay taja bk a kts.
Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, u junkun abal ki pjchxna an pan ani na Pablo in oktsal an belomtsik. Kom tam jun tsudhelom neech ka kalch, in ntsi ti kw asta ti chejlan an akal.
Xon tu junkunk, jaich ba jun i alt xi kwajat ba jun i pntsx at xon ti kwajat letotl yn i tajbaxtalbtsik

ani jun i kwitl inik xu bijyb ta Ewtiko, buxl ban bentana. Kom na Pablo owch tajat ti oktsix, an kwitl in lena tajat ti wayal, wayich ukpidhki ani kwajlan ban pntsx at. Nin tekl, jaich in oxtal in puntsl jachan an at ani chemnek ti dhayan.
Paay tm na Pablo, kwachiy xon ti kwajat an kwitl, in mulukna ani in utsa ench an kidhblbtsik: —Yab ki jikeytsik, yab chemnek.
Kadhiy tm jun na Pablo, in peja an pan, in kaputsik ani in ntsi ti oktsix asta ti tsudhey. Tayl kalch tm.
An kwitl ejat ti jn ani ejtal u kulbltsik ti jilkon.
Waw u okxin ani u kale kal i tan asta Asn abal ki iki na Pablo abal anchan tin ulmal kom jaj belal tin lena ka kale.
Tam tu lxin Asn kal jaj, balin jeye ban tan kal waw ani u kale Mitilene.

U kale taja ani tam ti jun tsudhelom, u watey tin tamt an chabl xin bij Ko. Tam ti jun tsudhelom jun, u ulich Samos, xon tu kubltsik an tan. U koych Trojilio ani tam ti jun tsudhelom tam tu belch putl a kts, u ulich Mileto.

Anchan ti taja abal na Pablo yab ka kwajay nakat i kij Asia. Yab in lena ka kale Efeso, pos jaj in l ka ulich jikat Jerusaln ani max in ejtowalak ka ulich jikat, in l ka kwajay taja tam kin bajaw in ktsjil an Pentekosts.
Tam ti na Pablo kwajat Mileto, in abna ka kanyat an oklek belomtsik xi Efeso
ani tam ti ulichtsik, in utsa ench: —Tattsik a chob alwa xan tin kwajay asta tin ulichki tech Asia.
Echeki in kwajay kal tattsik u tjontsal an Ajtiklb kal yantam i chaattalb, kal yantam i ukil ani kal yantam i taktamixtalb xin tajtsin kal an judotsik abal in l ti kin tajtsitsik xowa yab alwa.
Por yab u jila tu tiltsitsik ni jun xata xowa alwa abal tattsik, tu oktsitsik yanl ta b ani ta kimki jeye.
Xu judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo, u utsmalichtsik ke yejatich kin jila ti walablom, kin alch na Dios ani kin belaichtsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Pos xo, in neech Jerusaln kom anchan tin usnal kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab u chob xanty neech ku tamu taja.
Xowa tokot u chob, jaich ke putlki an bitsowtsik xon ti kin kale, an Tokat Ejattalb tin utsl abal in aytsmte kal i wikaxte ani kal yantam i yajtsiktalb.

Por nan yab in kwajat tin chalpax kal jech nibal u ajyal tub max kin chemdh. Tokot u l ku ejto ku okoy kal yantam i kulbtalb, an tojlb xi tin punkuntsmal an Ajtiklb Jess, xi jaich abal ku tila an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta nin kanidhaxtal na Dios.
Xo in kwajat u chalpayal ke ni jun xita xi tattsik, xi tu tiltsmalichtsik xan tu takix na Dios, yab neech ki witsiy ti kin chuutsik.
Jaxtm, tu utsltsik xo, ke yabich u kwenta max jun xita xi tattsik yab in bela,
pos tu tiltsmalichtsik ejtal xowa in l na Dios kin chuu ka chobnatsik ani yab tu chintsmaltsik ni jun xata.

Jaxtm tu utsltsik ka beletna tab. Ka beletnatsik jeye ejtal an belomtsik xon ta kwajbadh ta oklektsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal ka beletna an kidhblbtsik xin bellich an Ajtiklb, xi Jaj in chaymalich kal nin xichl.
Nan u chob alwa, ke tam kin kalch, neech ka tsch keettsik xi neech kin lena kin ojtsi tin chalab an belomtsik. Jechtsik, in junwal jelti an padhumtsik xin kapal an borrego.
Ani ba tattsik a kidhtal, neech ka kale taltsik xi neech kin oktsixna i kambixtalb abal jajtsik in l ka wwn kal an belomtsik.
Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta, ka chalpay abal tin nakl x i tamub, akal i kij, yab u jilmal tu takiytsik juntsik ta b. Juntsikl asta kal i ukil in kwajl tu takiytsik.

Ani xo kidhblbtsik, tu kwajbltsik bin kubak na Dios ani bin tsubaxtalbil nin alwatal. Na Dios in kool in chp abal ti ki likedhatsik ani abal ti ki pidhatsik teye xowa in ulmal neech kin pidha xu dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj.
Yab u ltendhantsmal tin tumnal nibal tin kudhkmil jun xita, yab u tajmal anchan.
Tattsik a chob alwa ke nan in tjnk neye kal u kubak abal ku koy xowa u yntsal ani abal ku ejto jeye ku tolmiytsik xi kwajat kal nan.
Echeki tu oktsmaltsik ke anchan ti yejat ku tjon abal ki ejto ki tolmiy an chojontltsik. Ka chalpmtsik nin kwintal ni Ajtik Jess, tam tin ulu ench: “Ms tajat kijidh ki pidhna, ke ki bachu.”
Tam ti okonich kin ulu jech, na Pablo tudhlan ani lan kal ejtal jajtsik.
Kal ejtal ti ukintsat tajat na Pablo, mulukn ani chuchbayat.
Tepintsik tajat abal in acha utsan ke yabich ms neech ka witsiytsik kin chuu. Tayl, juniknjich tm asta xon ti kwajat an tan.
Tam ti jilaich an kidhblbtsik, u balin ban tan ani u kale in lujtal Kos. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, u kale Rodas ani tam ti tajaich tu kwajat, u kale Ptara.
Taja Ptara, i ela jun i tan xi neech Fenisia, u balin ba jachan an tan ani u kale.
Tam tu watelich, i chuu an chabl xin bij Chipre xi kwajat ban ja; u chawkin ti ejt ani i ntsi an belch asta Siria. Kom an tan neech kin akiy i kitlb ban bitsow xin bij Tiro, u ochich taja.
Taja Tiro, i ela an belomtsik ani u kwajay bk a kts kal jajtsik. Jajtsik, ijtsidh kal an Tokat Ejattalb, in utsatsik na Pablo abal yab alwa ka kale Jerusaln.
Por tam ti kidhch jachan xi bk a kts, u kale. Ejtal an belomtsik, kl nin tomtaltsik ani nin chakmiltsik, tu junikna asta tu kale ban bitsow. Taja tin wl an pujal, u tudhlan ani u lan.
U chpndhxin tm kal i muluknaxtalb, u kadhch ban tan ani jajtsik, witschtsik jeye tin kim.
U ulich Tolemayda xon ti okch an belch ban ja xi tuju Tiro. Taja Tolemayda, i chapndha an kidhblbtsik ani u kwajay kal jajtsik jun a kts.

Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Pablo ani xi ta tu kwajat kal jaj, u kale ani u kale ban bitsow xin bij Sesarea. Tam ti tajaich tu kwajat, u kale bin kim na Felipe. Jech na Felipe, jaich an tiltsix alwa tilab ani jaj, jaich jeye jn ti b xi bk an tolmix belomtsik. Taja tu koych tin kim.
Na Felipe in kool ch in tsidhniltsik yab tomkidh, jachan an tsidhantsik in till i tsubaxtalbtsik xu ijtsinal kal a Dios.
Tam tu kwajinekich taja chb x a kts, ulich jun i tiltsix xi tl Judea xu bijyb ta Agabo.

Jech an tiltsix, tsinek abal ti ku lna. In tyna an t xi kl tin wikl nin tsukul na Pablo, in wika nin akan ani nin kubak jeye kal jachan an t ani in ulu ench: —An Tokat Ejattalb in ulal abal ench ti neech ka wikan kal an judotsik tuwa Jerusaln xin dhabal jech an t ani neech ka pidhn ban pl iniktsik.
Tam ti acha jech, waw ani xu kwajltsik Sesarea, i pakabdha na Pablo abal yab ka kale Jerusaln.
Por na Pablo tkon ench: —Jantki ta uknaltsik ani tin tepindhltsik? Pos nan u pidhnl tub yab tokotki abal kin wikan, asta abal kin chemdh jeye Jerusaln kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb Jess.
Kom yab i ejto ki tamkuy, yabich ms xata ti utsa. Tokot i utsa ench: —Ka tjan xan tin l an Ajtiklb.
Tam ti watch chb x a kts, u tojojon ani u kalch tm Jerusaln.

U junikn kal chb x i belomtsik xu kwajl Sesarea ani kal jajtsik, ta jeye ti neech jun i inik xi Chipre tu chakam xu bijyb Mnasn. Jech an inik, owenekich ti belmmadh ani taja ti neech ku koych bin kim.
Tam tu ulich Jerusaln, an kidhblbtsik tu bachu kal yantam i kulbtalb.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Pablo junax kal waw, u kale ki lna na Jakobo ani ta jeye ti kwajat taja ejtal an oklek belomtsik.
Chapndhtsik kal na Pablo ani tiltsintsik ejtal xowa in tajmal na Dios kal jaj ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.

Tam tin achatsik, in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios ani utsan ench na Pablo: —Alwaich at kidhb, a chutal ke wachich yn i mil i judotsik xu belomich, por ejtal jajtsik in ntsal kin ulu ke yejat ka ntsin ka wwn nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.

Usnkichtsik ke tat, a oktsal an judotsik xu kwajl ban pl bitsowtsik, ke yabich yejat kin wwna nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Ke a utsltsik jeye ke yabich yejat kin exliy nin chakmiltsik nibal kin wwna xowa in ujnmal in tajl nin weje pakliltsik.
Janty a ulal kal jech? Pos an atiklbtsik neech ka junkun tam kin acha abal tech i ulnek.
Waw i chalpayal abal ms xo alwa ka taja ench: Waach tech kal waw ch i iniktsik xin lej tsubax utsmal a Dios ke neech kin taja xowa in ulmaltsik.

Ka jnatsik kal tat, ka tokedha tab junax kal jajtsik ani tat ka jalbiy xowa jajtsik neech kin paku. Tayl awil ka olilintsik. Anchan, ejtal neech kin chobna ke yab tsubax xowa usnktsik kal tat ta kwenta. Neech kin chuutsik abal a ntsal teye ka wwna nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.

Por kal tin kwenta xi yabtsik u judo xi belmmadhich jeye, i dhutsuntsmalich ke yab yejat ka kwajaytsik ti chalpax kal jech. Tokot yab kin kaputsik in tul i konltsik xi pikbantsidh an chilabtsik, yab kin kaputsik i xich, yab kin kaputsik in tul an konltsik xi kuchdhatski ani yab xita ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal.

In jna tm na Pablo xi ch an iniktsik ani ti jun tsudhelom, in toko tinb junax kal jajtsik. Tayl ochich ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios abal kin ulu xowki ti neech ka okon an tokeltalb. Jech, jaich xowki ti neech kin kwajbatsik an pikbantsixtalb juntsik ti b.
Por tam ti wich u kibel ka kidhey xi bk a kts, chutat na Pablo ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal chb x i judotsik xu kwajl Asia ani in pjxlindha an atiklbtsik. Yakwan na Pablo

ani in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Paylomlbtsik xi Israel, ti ku tolmiy! Jech an inik, jaich xi xeech putlki in oktsal an atiklbtsik abal kin pojka ni at kidhtal, nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Anl jeye, in dhmalich ba jech an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios chb x i griego ani anchan, in choyalich jech an tokat alt.
Jech tin ulutsik anchan, kom chuudh na Pablo ms okox ban bitsow junax kal na Trfimo, xu kwajl Efeso ani in chalpayaltsik ke na Pablo in dhmal ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow, chakay ani jikatki ti tschtsik. Yakwan na Pablo, bodhyat ka kale bin elbil an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani jikatki ti mapyat an wilebtsik.
U lenbich tajat ka chemdh, tam tin chobna an pulek oklek soldadotsik abal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ba jachan an bitsow xi Jerusaln, u chakl ti kwajattsik.

Tam ti an pulek oklek soldadotsik in chobna abal u chakl an atiklbtsik, in junku an soldadotsik ani an oklek soldadotsik jeye ani adhik ti kaletsik xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik. Tam ti chutat an pulek oklek soldadotsik ani an soldadotsik jeye, in kubdhatsik ti pewex an ta Pablo.
Utey tm an pulek oklek soldadotsik, in yakwa na Pablo ani in ulu ka wikan kal chb i patl. Tayl konyatich tm xitam j jeye ani xanty in tajmal.

Por an atiklbtsik keetich keetich xanty in ulaltsik kawidh, jaxtm an pulek oklek soldadotsik yab xata in ejtowal kin exbay abal u xakwakwl tajat an atiklbtsik ani in abna ka jn na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik.
Tam ti ulich bin koybil jachan an at, kitn na Pablo kal an soldadotsik abal an atiklbtsik u chauxichtsik tajat;
kom an atiklbtsik ejtal wwnaxnk ani kawidh in ulaltsik ench: —Ka chemdh!

Tam ti nechich ka dh na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik, in utsa ench an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —Awilxe tu utsa jun xata? Tkoyat ench kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —A ejtowalxe ta kw griego?
Tm, yabxe p tat an inik xi Ejipto in chablil, xi jun i kij in tuju jun i pjxtalb ani in jna ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh che mil i chemdhax iniktsik?
In ulu tm ench na Pablo: —Nan in judo ani in chakam ban yejche bitsow xin bij Tarso. Jech an bitsow u taknal ban chabl xi Silisia. Por tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti kin walka ku tawna an atiklbtsik.

Walk tm ti kw kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik, kubey na Pablo ban koyob ani in utsa kal in kubakki abal ka chamkan an atiklbtsik. Tam ti chamkantsik, in tawnatsik tm kal i kwintalb xi ebreo ani in utsatsik ench:
—At kidhtaltsik ani ttalbtsik, ka acha xowa neech ku ulu abal ku loo tub.
Tam tin achatsik abal kwajat ti tawnb ebreo, chamkantsik ms ani utsantsik ench kal na Pablo:

—Nan in judo. In chakam ban bitsow xin bij Tarso xu taknal ban chabl xi Silisia, por tech tin pubenek Jerusaln ani tam tin exblomch, tin oktsi na Gamaliel. U exbna anchan jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal ni weje pakliltsik. Echeki u tajl an chplb kal ejtal nu ejattal abal ku tjontsi na Dios jelt xan ti tattsik a tajl xo.
Ti wel chabki, u atlwiik xin belltsik an t tsubaxtalb, u yakwl an paylomlbtsik ani an mmlbtsik abal ku baliy ban wikaxte ani taltsik asta u chemdhl.

Nin oklkil an pletsik ani ejtal nin oklkil an judotsik in chob jech. Pos jajtsik tin pidhmal jun i dhutsadh w abal ku pidha an awiltalbtsik xi Damasko ani anchan, ku ejto ku yakwa an belomtsik, ku tsidhatsik tech Jerusaln ani ki baliytsik ban wikaxte.
Por tam tin neech ti bl ani kunatich kin ulich Damasko, chejel kts xna, jun jiktowl tin wiliyat kal jun i tajaxtalb xi tl walki
ani in kwajlan chabl. U acha tm jun i kwintalb xi tin utsl ench: “Sawlo, Sawlo, jantki tin atl?”
U konoy tm ench: “Jita p teye, Jab?” Ani Jaj tin utsa ench: “Nan in Jess xi Nasaret, xi tat a atl.”
Xi ta ti kwajattsik kal nan, in chuu jeye an tajaxtalb ani jikeytsik, por yab in acha an kwintalb xi kwajat tin tawnl.
Nan u utsa tm ench: “Janty yejat ku taja Ajtik?” Ani an Ajtiklb tin utsa ench: “Ki chakay, ka ntsi an bl abal ki ulich Damasko ani taja, neech ki utsan ejtal xowa yejat ka taja.”
Kom tin jokolbdhmal an tajaxtalb, nu juniktsik tin lotokna asta tin ulich Damasko.

Taja Damasko, ta ti kwajat jun i inik xin bij ta Ananas. Jech an inik, in tajl tajat xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani exlmte tajat abal i alwa inik kal ejtal an judotsik xu kwajl taja.
Na Ananas, ulich ti kin lna ani tam ti ulich, tin utsa ench: “Kidhblb Sawlo, ki chuxinich jun.” Tmki jachan tin chuxin jun ani u ejto ku chuu jaj.
Tin utsa tm ench: “Nin Diosil ni weje pakliltsik, ti takwymal abal ti ki pidha ka chobna xanty in l, abal ka chuu an Ajtiklb ani abal ka axtsi tin kwintal.
Pos tat neech ka tila Jaj tin tamt ejtal an atiklbtsik ani neech ka tiltsitsik ejtal xowa a chumal ani a achmal.
Ani xo, janty bl a aytsal? Ki chakch, ki pujanich ani ka kontsi na Jess abal ti ki pakwlantsi an ta walastalbil.”
Tam tin witsiy Jerusaln, in kale tin l ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani lejat in kwajat tin l, u chuu jun i xalkantsixtalb.
Ban xalkantsixtalb u chuu an Ajtiklb ani tin utsa ench: “Ki kale jikatki Jerusaln, pos yab neech ki beltsin tech xowa ka tila kal Nan tu kwenta.”
U utsa neye tm ench: “Ajtik, jajtsik in chob abal nan in kalel ba ejtal an attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, u jnltsik ti wiknl xi ti bell ani u chawaltsik.
Tam ti chemdh jeye na Esteban, na tjontsixil xi ti till, ta neye tin kubat taja kunat ani u ulu abal alwa ka chemdh. Asta u beletnantsmal tin kudhkmil an iniktsik xi chemdhaxin.”
Por an Ajtiklb tin utsa ench: “Ki kalch, pos Nan neech tu aba w xon tu kwajl xi yabtsik u judo abal ka tiltsi an ti alwa tilab.”
Ejtal jech, jaich tokot axtsin ani in tujutsik jun ti dhajnal kawidh ench: —Ka chemdh jachan an inik! Yab in tomnl ka kwajay ejat!
Kom in ntsal ti dhajnaltsik, ti petnax tin kudhkmil ani ti kpul pojodh,
an pulek oklek soldadotsik in ulu ka dh na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik ani in abna ka kwadhan abal kin lna xantki tu atnal anchan kal an atiklbtsik.
Por tam ti wikadhich tu kyb abal neech ti kwadhnal, na Pablo in utsa ench an oklek soldadotsik xi ta ti kwajat taja: —A kooltsikxe i awiltalb ka kwadha jun i romano tam yabl a ljundhmal?
Tam tin acha jech an oklek soldadotsik, kale kin utsa ench an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —Janty neech ka taja? Pos jech an inik jaich jun romano.
Utey tm an pulek oklek soldadotsik ba na Pablo ani in konoy ench: —Tsubaxxe kwa lejtal ke tat i romano? Tkoyat ench kal na Pablo: —Tsubax.
Utsan tm ench kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik: —Nan yn tajat i tumn u pakmal abal kin jin neye tin romano. Ani na Pablo in ulu ench: —Pos nan in romano na asta tin chakam.
Tam tin acha jech xi neechtsik ti kwadhax an ta Pablo, wmtsik; asta an pulek oklek soldadotsik jeye. Tam tin exbchtsik abal na Pablo i romano, jikeytsik abal in wikmal kal i patl.

Tam ti jun tsudhelom, an pulek oklek soldadotsik, kom in l kin exbay xantki tu atnal na Pablo kal an judotsik, in wixkintsi an ti patltsik ani in abna ka junkuwat nin oklkiltsik an pletsik ani ejtal an Junkulom Awiltalb. In kldha tm na Pablo ani in kwajba tin tamt jajtsik.
Na Pablo in teloloy an Junkulom Awiltalb ani in utsatsik ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan in kwajinek asta xo tsububudh u itsch tin tamt na Dios.
Na Ananas, xi jaich nin oklkil an pletsik, in utsatsik tm xi ta ti kwajat kunat ba na Pablo abal kin chaaw bin wi.

Por tkoyat ench kal na Pablo: —Kambix inik, na Dios neech ti ki chaaw tat! I buxl tachan abal ti kin ljundha jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb. Max anchan, jantki p tm ta chikat tajl an takixtalb abal a ulal kin chawat?
Utsan ench na Pablo kal xi ta ti kwajattsik taja: —Jantki ta odhbijyal anchan nin oklek pleil na Dios?
Na Pablo in ulu ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan yab u chob max jaj i oklek pletsik; pos ban Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Yab yejat ka atax kawintsi jun xita xu takix ba na bitswil.”

Tam ti na Pablo in chuu abal taltsik xi kwajat ban Junkulom Awiltalb, jaich in kidhtal an saduseotsik ani taltsik, in kidhtal i fariseotsik, in ulu kawidh ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan in fariseo neye, in kidhtalb kal i fariseotsik ani exomtsik tin ljundhl abal u bell ke an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh ti t.
Tam ti okon kin ulu jech, an fariseotsik ani an saduseotsik in tuju ti kwlx ani kxin xi ta ti junkunk.
Pos an saduseotsik in ulal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, nibal waach i tokat abatwletsik nibal i ejattalbtsik; por an fariseotsik, in bell ja abal waach ejtal jech.

Tujey ti dhajnaltsik kawidh. Chakay tm chb x i oktsixtsik xin will nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xu tolmintsb kl an fariseotsik ani in ulutsik ench: —Jech an inik yab in tajmal ni jun xata walats ani max tawnadh kal jun i ejattalb o kal jun i tokat abatwle, yab yejat ki tomna na Dios.

Kom an kwlxtalb ms chapikmch, an pulek oklek soldadotsik in chalpay max ka atax tajtsin na Pablo. Jaxtm tin aba i soldadotsik abal kin kldha na Pablo xon ti kwajat ani kin jna jun ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik.

Jun tsudhelom, tam ti jikwchinich, an Ajtiklb in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Pablo ani utsan ench na Pablo: —Pablo, ka pubdha na ejattal, pos anchan jelt xan ta tiltsi an atiklbtsik xi tech Jerusaln kal Nan tu kwenta, anchan jeye yejat ka taja Roma.
Tam ti tsudhey, taltsik an judotsik in taja i kw xan ti kin uwa abal kin chemdha na Pablo. In lej tsubax ulutsik kal i ataxtalb abal yab neech kin kaputsik nibal kin ucha xata asta kin chemdha okox.
Watats xna chab inik i iniktsik xin ulu anchan.
Pos jechtsik kale ban oklek pletsik ani bin oklkil an judotsik ani in utsatsik ench: —Waw i lej tsubax ulmal kal i ataxtalb, ke yab neech ki kapu ni jun xata asta ki chemdha okox na Pablo.

Ani xo tattsik, junax kal an Junkulom Awiltalb, ka kontsitsik an pulek oklek soldadotsik abal kalm kin tsidha na Pablo ta tamt tattsik. Ka utsatsik abal a l ka ljundha kal ms i kwenta ani waw neech ku kwajay tojojodh abal ki chemdha ti bl tam u tsidhbich.
Por nin chakmil nin ixm na Pablo in chobna jech ani kale kin ltsi na Pablo ban at xon tu kwajl an soldadotsik.
In tawna tm na Pablo jn ti b an oklek soldadotsik ani in utsa ench: —Ka jna jech an kwitl ban pulek oklek soldadotsik, pos jaj in tsidhl jun xata xanty in l kin utsa.

An oklek soldadotsik in jna tm an kwitl ban pulek oklek soldadotsik ani in utsa ench: —An wiknl xin bij Pablo, tin tawna ani tin pakabdha abal tu tsidhantsi jech an ti kwitl, pos an kwitl in kool jun xata xanty in l ti ki utsa.
Lotokn tm an kwitl kal an pulek oklek soldadotsik, jn plki ani konyat ench: —Janty a l ti kin utsa?
Utsan tm ench kal an kwitl: —An judotsik in tajmal i kw abal ki pakabdh ka jna kalm na Pablo ban Junkulom Awiltalb. In ulaltsik abal neech ti ki utsa ke in l kin ljundha kal ms i kwenta.

Por yab ka beltsitsik, pos watats xna chab inik i iniktsik xi jajtsik in kidhtal neech ka kwajay ti aytsix chinat. Jajtsik in lej tsubax ulmal kal i ataxtalb abal yab neech kin kaputsik nibal kin uchatsik xata asta kin chemdha okox na Pablo. Ani xo, tokot kwajat in aytsmtsik xanty ka ulu.
Tam tin achaich jech, an pulek oklek soldadotsik, in abaich tm ka kale an kwitl; por in utsa abal yab kin tiltsi ni jun xita max an pulek oklek soldadotsik ltsidh jech.

An pulek oklek soldadotsik in kaniy tm chb i oklek soldadotsik jeye ani in utsatsik abal kin tojojoy chb i bo inik i soldadotsik xi kal in akanki, ox inik lju xi kal i bitsim ani chb i bo inik xi kal i chupidh patltsik abal ka kaletsik Sesarea tam jaykich belju i akal.
In ulu jeye abal ka tojojoyat i bitsim xi neech kin pna na Pablo. In ulu abal ka beletn alwa ani ka uldh alwa asta ban pulek awiltalb Flix.
Ani in abna jech an dhutsadh w kal jajtsik xin ulal ench:
“Nan, xu bij Klawdio Lisias, tu abtsal ti chapndhomtalb. Tu abtsal jech an ti dhutsadh w, pulek awiltalb Flix.
An judotsik in yakwmal jech an inik ani neechwiik kin chemdha, por tam ti nan u chobna abal jaj i romano, in kale kal nu soldadojiltsik ani u loo.
Kom u lena ku chobna xantki tu atnal, u jna bin Junkulom Awiltalbil an judotsik.
Taja u acha ke u atnal abal in chikat tajl nin takixtalbil an judotsik, por yab in tajmal ni jun xata xin tomnl kin jalbiy kal i cheml, nibal abal ka kwajay balidh ban wikaxte.
Por kom u chobna abal an judotsik in kool chalpadh kin chemdha, j tu abtsal ani u kontsmal jeye xi kl tu atnal abal ka kale tachan kin lejkiytsik xanty in kool kal jaj.”
Tam ti an soldadotsik in achaich xan ti utsan, in kldha na Pablo ani jikwax tin jnatsik asta Antpatris.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, an soldadotsik xi belal, witsiy ban at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani xi punattsik kal an bitsim, in ntsi an bl junax kal na Pablo.
Tam ti ulichtsik Sesarea, in pidhatsik an ti dhutsadh w an pulek awiltalb ani in pidha jeye an ta Pablo.
Tam ti an pulek awiltalb okon kin ajay an dhutsadh w, in konoy xon tu kwajl na Pablo. Tam tin chobnaich abal Silisia u kwajl,
in utsa ench: —Neech tu ljundha asta tam ka tsch xi ti utsbiyaltsik. An pulek awiltalb, in ulu tm abal ka beletn na Pablo ban at xon tu ljundhom na Erodes.

B a kts ms tayl, ulich Sesarea na Ananas, nin oklkil an pletsik. Ulich jeye kal jaj chb x in oklkil an judotsik ani jun i kawintsix xin bij Trtulo. Jechtsik, kale tin tamt an pulek awiltalb abal kin utsbiy na Pablo.

Tam ti uldh na Pablo, na Trtulo, tujey kin lna ban pulek awiltalb. Ench tin utsa na Flix: —Juntam jalbintsch tajat pulek awiltalb abal u kwajat kijidh ani yab u kwajat tu pjx. Ejtal kwajat belkmte alwa kal tat na chalpadhtal.
Pulek awiltalb Flix, ejtal jech echeki i bachwal putlki kal yantam i jalbintsixtalb.
Por abal yab ms tu lej tojliy owat, tu kontsal ti alwatalb abal ti ku exbantsi junw xowa neech ki ulu.
Pos waw i chumalich abal jech an inik, exom in ojtsal tin chalab an atiklbtsik. Putlki tech an chabl exom in tajl ka kxin an judotsik ani jaj, u oklek kal an junkunltsik xu bijyb ti nasareno.
Asta in lenmal kin chikat taja an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Jaxtm ti yakwa ani i lena ki ljundha jelt xan tin ulal ni takixtalbil;
por ochich an pulek oklek soldadotsik xin bij Lisias ani tu kntsi kal yantam i chplb.
In ulu abal an utsbixtsik yejat ka tsch tech kal tat. Tat neech ka ejto ka ljundha ani ka chobna xantki tin kwenta ti utsbiyal.
An judotsik xi ta jeye ti kwajat, in ulal abal ejtal jech tsubax.

An pulek awiltalb in utsa tm na Pablo kal in kubakki abal ka kwin ani na Pablo in ulu ench: —Kal yantam i kulbtalb neech kin kwin ta tamt abal ku loo tub, pos u chob abal ynich i tamub ta ljundhom ba jech an chabl.
Pos jelt xan ti neech ka acha, in koolich lajuchb a kts, in kale Jerusaln abal ku kakna na Dios.
Yab in elnk tin kwlx kal ni jun xita, nibal u pjxlindhmal an atiklbtsik ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, nibal ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb, nibal ba jachan an bitsow.
Yab jeye neech kin ejto kin ulutsik ke tsubax xowa tin utsltsik u tajmal.

Por xowa neech tu utsa jaich jech: Nan u tjontsal nin Diosil nu weje paklil jelt xan tin ulal an t tsubaxtalb xi jajtsik in utsl ke yab tsubax. Pos nan, u bell ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban takixtalb ani xowa in dhutsmal jeye an tiltsixtsik.
Nan jaychki neye u bell xowa jajtsik in bell, ke na Dios neech kin ejdha ti t an chemlomtsik, xi alwa iniktsik ani xi yab alwa iniktsik.
Jaxtm tu l ku koy tsububudh nu itsch echeki tin tamt na Dios ani tin tamt an iniktsik.
Tam tin xechinich chb x i tamub pl chabl, in witsiy ba nu chablil abal ku pidhna i tolmixtalb ani i pikbantsixtalb.

Jaich in kwajat u tajl jech, tam tin elan ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal chb x i judotsik xi tl Asia. Jechtsik, tin ela tam tin oknkich ku taja an tokeltalb jelt xan ti yejat ka tajan. Por yab kal yn i atiklbtsik nibal kal i pjxtalb.
Jaich jachan xi yejat ka tschtsik ani ka utey kin ulu max ani lejtal tu waltsmaltsik.
Ani max yaba, ke xi jech kwajattsik kin ulu max in eltsin tu walab tam tin ljundh tin tamt nin Junkulom Awiltalbil an judotsik.
Nan tokot u ulmal kawidh ench: “Tattsik exom tin ljundhl abal u bell ke an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh ti t.”

Tam tin achaich na Flix ejtal jech, kom ltsidhich alwa xan ti kwajat jech an t tsubaxtalb, in jila jech abal kin lejkiy tayl ani in utsatsik ench: —Tam ka tsch na Lisias, nin pulek oklkil an soldadotsik, tm neech ku okoy tu lejkintsitsik an ti utsbixtalb xa tsidhl.
Utsan tm an oklek soldadotsik kal na Flix abal yab kin walka na Pablo ani kin belkm, por kin walka ka ln ani ka tolmiyat kal nin jabtsik.

Tam ti watenekich chb x a kts, ulich jun na Flix, junax kal na Drusila, nin tomtal. Jech na Drusila, i judo jeye. Na Flix in abna ka kanyat na Pablo abal ka tiltsin an ti belomtalb kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo.

Por tam ti na Pablo in tiltsi abal yejattsik kin tajl echeki xowa alwa, kin kuxyal xowa in lenl nin tul ani kal tin kwenta jeye an ljundhaxtalb xi neech ka wachin tin okontal an kij, jikey tajat na Flix ani in utsa ench na Pablo: —Xo ki kalch. Tam kin jolkan, tm jun neech ku abna ki kanyat.
Na Flix ynl tajat in abna ka kanyat na Pablo ani u kw kal jaj abal in l kin chuu max ka pidhan ti tumn kal na Pablo ani anchan, ka walk na Pablo.
Chb i tamub ms tayl, kale ti pulek awiltalb na Flix ani ochich na Porsio Festo. Kom na Flix in l ka jilkon alwa kal an judotsik, yab in walka na Pablo.
Ulich tm na Festo ban chabl xi Sesarea abal ka ochichich an ti pulek awiltalb ani x a kts ms tayl, kale Sesarea abal ka kale Jerusaln.
Taja Jerusaln, an oklek pletsik ani an judotsik xi ms ultalb, kaletsik ba na Festo kin kwajba jun i utsbixtalb abal na Pablo.
Pakabdh na Festo abal kin abna ka iktat na Pablo ani ka tsidh Jerusaln. Por xowa jajtsik in kool chalpadh, jaich ke in l kin abna ka chemdh ti bl na Pablo.
Na Festo in tkoytsik abal na Pablo kwajat ti wiknl Sesarea ani ke jaj neech ka kale taja kunat i kij.
In utsatsik jeye ench: —An awiltalbtsik xi tattsik a kidhtal, awil ka kale Sesarea kal nan xita kin ejto ani max jachan an inik in walm, awiltsik ka utsbiy taja.
Na Festo kwajay Jerusaln waxik o lju xna a kts ani tayl, witsiy Sesarea. Tam ti jun tsudhelom ti ulnek Sesarea, buxkan ban kwajtalb xon tu buxkanal an ljundhom ani in abna ka iktat na Pablo.
Tam ti ochich na Pablo, utey an judotsik xi tl Jerusaln ani in ulutsik abal na Pablo yn i pakdha walastalb in tajmal. Por ni jun xata xowa kwajattsik in ulal, yab in ejto kin xalka max tsubax.

Na Pablo in ulu tm ench abal kin loo tinb: —Nan yab u tajmal ni jun xata walats ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios. Yab u chikat tajmal nin takixtalbil an judotsik, nibal nin takixtal an lej pulek takix romano.
Por kom na Festo in l ka jilkon alwa kal an judotsik, in konoy ench na Pablo: —A lxe ki kale Jerusaln abal tu ljundha taja?

Na Pablo tkon ench: —In kwajatich tin tamt an awiltalb xu taknal kal an lej pulek takix romano xon ti yejat kin ljundh. Pos jelt xan ta a chobich alwa, nan yab u waltsmal ni jun xata nu at kidhtaltsik.

Max u tajmalak jun i walastalb xi yejat ku jalbiy kal i cheml, awil kin chemdh; por xo, kom yab tsubax xowa kwajat tin usnal, ni jun xita yab in kool i awiltalb ti kin pidhna kal jajtsik. Nan u l ke jaj tajat an lej pulek takix romano ti kin ljundha.

Na Festo in konoy tm okox nin tolmiwltsik xanty kin taja. Tam ti okon ti tilolltsik, in utsa ench na Pablo: —Kom a konyal abal a l ki ljundh kal jaj tajat an lej pulek takix romano, pos taja neech tu aba.
Chb x a kts ms tayl, an pulek takix Agripa ani na Berenise, ulichtsik Sesarea abal kin chapndha na Festo.
Kom kwajaytsik taja yn a kts, na Festo in tiltsi an pulek takix romano xowa waach kal tin kwenta na Pablo. Ench tin utsa: —Tech kwajat jun i inik ti wiknl xi jiladh al wikaxte kal na Flix.
Tam tin kale Jerusaln, an oklek pletsik ani nin oklkil an judotsik tin kwajbantsitsik jun i utsbixtalb kal tin kwenta jech an inik, tin utsltsik abal ku ulu ka chemdh.
Nan u tkoytsik ke an awiltalb xi Roma yab in ujnmal kin pidhna ka chemdh ni jun xita, max yab ka walk okox kin loo tinb tin tamt an utsbixtsik kal tin kwenta xantokl tu utsbiyb.
Jaxtm, tam ti jajtsik tsch tech, yab in kwajay owat tin chalpax. Tmki jun tsudhelom tin buxkan ban kwajtalb xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani u abna ka iktat jachan an inik.
Por xi ulichtsik ti utsbix, yab in ulu ni jun xata xi kalpidhich tajat ti walats jelt xan ti nan u chalpaymal.
Xowa tokot in ulaltsik, jaich kal tin kwenta in belomtaltsik ani in tilltsik jun i inik xin bij ta Jess xi chemnekich, por na Pablo in ulal abal ta kwajat ejat.
Kom yab u chob xanty ku taja kal jun xata jelti jech, u konoy na Pablo max in l ka kale Jerusaln abal ka ljundh taja kal jech tin kwenta.
Por kom na Pablo in konoy abal in l ka ljundh kal an lej pulek takix romano Awgusto, u ulu abal ka kyat ban wikaxte asta ku abna taja.
Utsan tm ench na Festo kal na Agripa: —U l neye ku acha xanty in ulal jachan an inik. Tkoyat ench kal na Festo: —Kalm neech ka acha.

Tam ti jun tsudhelom, na Agripa ani na Berenise ulichtsik tojojodh ani ochich ban alt junax kal nin oklkiltsik an soldadotsik ani kal an ultalb iniktsik xu kwajl ba jachan an bitsow. Na Festo in abna ka iktat na Pablo

ani in ulu tm ench: —Pulek takix Agripa ani paylomlbtsik xi junkunk tech kal waw, j kwajat jech an inik. Yn an judotsik tin utsl ke jaj yab i alwa inik. Anchan in ulal an judotsik xu kwajl Jerusaln ani xi techtsik Sesarea. Yab in kubdhltsik kin ulu ke yejat ka chemdh jech an inik.
Por nan yab u eltsal ni jun i walastalb plek xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml. Kom tin kontsmal abal in l ka ljundh kal na Awgusto, an lej pulek takix romano, u ulmalich abal neech ku abna taja.

Ani kom yab u kool chalpadh xanty ku dhutsuntsi nu ajtik an lej pulek takix romano kal tin kwenta na Pablo, u tsidhmal ta tamttsik. Tat, pulek takix Agripa, awil ka ljundha abal ku chuu max anchan ku ela jun xata xanty ku dhutsuntsi an lej pulek takix romano.
Pos yab u achl alwa ku abna jun i wiknl, max yab ku dhutsa xantom walastalb in tajmal.
Utsan tm ench na Pablo kal na Agripa: —Awil ki kwin abal ka loo tab. In dhaya tm nin kubak na Pablo ani in tuju ti kw ench abal kin loo tinb:
—In kulbl tajat abal neech ku ejto tin kw ta tamt pulek takix Agripa abal ku ejto ku loo tub kal ejtal xowa in usnal kal nu at kidhtaltsik.
Pos tat a exll ejtal xowa in ujnmal kin taja an judotsik ani kal tin kwenta jeye xowa u kwajat xo i kwlxnl. Jaxtm tu kontsal abal ti kin axtsi kal i kaymtalb.
Ejtal an judotsik, xi jaich nu kidhtaltsik, in chob xan tin xechink ba nu chablil ani Jerusaln tam tin kwitle.
In chobtsik jeye jech ani neech kin ejto kin ulu abal tsubax, max in l. Ke nan in fariseo neye asta tin kwitle ani in kidhtalbwiik kal an junkunl xi ms lujattsik tin beldhl an belomtalb.
Xo in tsidhats tech abal kin ljundh kal tin kwenta abal u bell ke na Dios neech kin ejdha ti t an chemlomtsik, jelt xan tin utsmal ni weje pakliltsik.

Xi lajuchb an kidhtalb xi Israel xi waw i kidhtal, in aytsm kin taja na Dios xan tin ulmal. Jaxtm tin kaknltsik na Dios ani in tjontsal akal i kij. Jaich kal jech an aytsixtalb, pulek takix Agripa, tin utsbiyaltsik xo nu at kidhtaltsik.
Awxe tattsik yab a bell ke na Dios in ejdhl ti t an chemlomtsik?
Nan u chalpayalwiik ke yejat ku taja yn xata abal ku tamkuy xin bellichtsik na Jess xi Nasaret.
Jech u taja jeye anchan ban bitsow Jerusaln. Kal tin takixtal an oklek pletsik, yn i belom u baliy al wikaxte. Tam u chemdhb an belomtsik, u ulal neye abal alwa.

Ynl u atax tajtsmaltsik abal u l ku taja kin odhbijiy na Jess. Jech u tajmal putlki ban attsik xon tu tajnal an junkuntalb ani u atltsik tajat ke asta in kalel ku aliy pl bitsow abal ku atax tajtsitsik.
Kal jech tin kwenta tin neech ban bitsow xi Damasko, in abnk ani in pidhnk ti awiltalb kal nin oklkiltsik an pletsik.
Por ti bl, pulek takix Agripa, tam ti chejelich xna a kts, u chuu jun i tajaxtalb xi tl walki. Jech an tajaxtalb ms tajax ke nin tajx na kts ani tu wiliy kal nin tajx.

Ejtal tu b u kwajlan chabl ani u acha tin tawnb ench kal jun i kwintalb xi ebreo: “Sawlo, Sawlo, jantki tin atl? Exom a yajlombdhl tatki tab, jelt xan tin tajl an konl tam in chochbiyal an chupidh patl.”
U ulu tm ench: “Jita p teye, Jab?” An Ajtiklb tin utsa ench: “Nan nin Jess, xi tat a atl.
Por ki chakch ani ki kubey, pos Nan u xalkm tub ti kin chuu abal tu utsa ti kin tjontsi ani ka tila xowa exom a chutal xo ani xowa neech jeye ka chuu ku taja ms tayl.
Xo neech tu aba ka tiltsi xi yabtsik u judo an ti tsubaxtalb xi kal Nan tu kwenta. Neech tu beletna abal yab xata ki tajtsin kal an judotsik ani kal xi yabtsik u judo jeye.

Tu abl taja abal ka lamtsitsik an tin wal ani yabich ms ka xechintsik ban jikwaxtalb. Ka xechinichtsik jeye ban tajaxtalb abal kin belaichtsik na Dios ani yabich ka kwajaytsik teykmte kal nin chp an lej atax. Ti kin belaichtsik abal ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbil ani kin bachutsik jeye xowa neech ka pidhan kal na Dios junax kal xu dhabalbich kal Jaj.”
Jaxtm, pulek takix Agripa, yab u chikat taja xowa in utsan kal an Ajtiklb ban xalkantsixtalb xi tsch walki.

Okox tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an atiklbtsik xu kwajl Damasko. Tayl u tiltsitsik xi Jerusaln, xi putlki ban chabl xi Judea ani xi yabtsik u judo jeye. U utsltsik abal kin jilaichtsik ti walablom ani kin belaich na Dios, kin tajaichtsik xowa alwa abal kin xalka ke in jilmalichtsik ti walablom.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta nu at kidhtaltsik tin yakwmal ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani in ltsik ti kin chemdha.

Por kal tin tolmintsixtal na Dios u ntsal ku tila jech asta xo. Ejtalkitsik u tiltsal an ti alwa tilab, tsitsik ani pakdha. Yab u jalkuntsal ni jun xata xowa an tiltsixtsik ani na Moiss in ulmaltsik ke neech ka tmun.
Jajtsik jaich nin ulmal ke an Kristo neech ka chemdh ani ke jaich xi neech ka okxin ka ejech ti t abal kin tiltsi xan ti neech ka loey ni kidhtaltsik ani xi keet jeye an atiklbtsik.
Tam ti na Pablo in ulu ejtal jech abal kin loo tinb, na Festo kawidh tin ulu ench: —Pablo, Tat i olmanal! A ntsmalich tajat ta exbal, jaxtm ta olmankich.
Por na Pablo tkon ench: —Yab in olmanal, pulek awiltalb Festo; lujat ani tsubax xowa in kwajat u ulal.
J kwajat an pulek takix Agripa, xin exll alwa ejtal jech. Jaxtm tin kwajat tin kw tin tamt jaj kal ni jun i jkib. U chob alwa ke jaj in chob alwa ejtal jech, pos yab chinat ti tmnk.
Pulek takix Agripa, a bellxe jech xowa in ulmal an tiltsixtsik? Nan u chob alwa abal a bell.
Utsan tm ench kal na Agripa: —Wichwiik tajat ti kin taja ku bela neye na Kristo.

In ulu tm ench na Pablo: —Pos max wich o yaba, u lak max na Dios kin lena ke yab tatki, ejtal xi kwajat in achl xowa u ulal, ka belmchaktsik jeye jelti nan maske yabtsik ja wikadh kal jelti jech an patltsik.
Tam ti na Pablo in okoy kin ulu jech, chakay an pulek takix ani an pulek awiltalb jeye. Chakay jeye na Berenise ani ejtal xi t ti buxutsik,
kale pl abal kin tilatsik jech. Ani u tsxtsik ench jajkitsik: —Jech an inik yab in tajmal ni jun xata xi yejat kin jalbiy kal i cheml, nibal ela yejat ka kyat balidh ban wikaxte.
Ani na Agripa in utsa ench na Festo: —Awilichakwiik ka walk jech an inik max yabak in konymal ka ljundh kal an lej pulek takix romano.

Tam ti ulwatich abal neech ku abn Italia, na Pablo ani xi keet jeye an wiknltsik, pidhn ba jun i oklek soldadotsik xu bijyb ta Julio, xin takyal jun kwene i soldadotsik. Jech jun kwene an soldadotsik, u bijyb Awgusto.
Pos u balin ba jun i tan xi tl ban bitsow xu bijyb Adramitio, xi neech ban bitsowtsik xi Asia. T jeye ti kwajat na Aristarko kal waw, jaj u kwajl Tesalnika, an bitsow xu taknal Masedonia.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, u ulich ban bitsow xi Sidn. Taja, kyat na Pablo kal na Julio kal yantam i kaknaxtalb, pos walk ka kale kin lna nin jabtsik abal ka tolmiyat kal jajtsik.
Tam tu kalch Sidn, i jila ti kwatab an chabl xi Chipre kom an ik, ti tamt tu wawnal.
I watna an pujal tin tamt in waltsik an ja xi Silisia ani xi Panfilia ani u ulich ban bitsow xin bij Mira, jun i bitsow xu taknal Lisia.
An oklek soldadotsik in ela taja jun i tan xi tl Alejandra ani neech Italia. Taja tu utsa ku balin abal ki ntsi an bl.
Yn a kts tu belal kaymki ani kal yantam i tojlb tu ulich tin tamt an bitsow xi Gnido. Kom bl ti tamt tu wawnal an ik, u watey tin tamt Salmn ani i malintsi an chabl xi Kreta.
I ntsi tu belal kal i chplb tin waltsik an ja, u ulich ba jun i kubtalb xin bij Buenos Puertos, kunat ban bitsow xi Lasea.
Kom i kibdhmalich tajat yn i kij ani kakadhich tajat ku beley ban pujal abal exomich ti kunel nin chamy, jaxtm na Pablo in takiytsik
ani in utsatsik ench: —Jabtsik, nan u chutal abal jech an belch neech tajat ka kakadhm, neech ki kibdha an tan ani an kitlbtsik. Yab tokot jki, asta t weye ku chemech.
Por an oklek soldadotsik ms in exbantsi an dhabal tan ani an beldhom k xowa in ulu na Pablo.

Kom ba jachan an kubtalb yab alwa abal kin watna taja nin chamy, yn an atiklbtsik xin chalpay abal ms alwa ku kale taja ani ki chuu max ki ejto ku ulich Fenise, jun i kubtalb xi Kreta xi kwajat in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts ani ki watna taja nin chamy.
Kom tujey tm ti wawnal kaym an ik xi tl all, in chalpaytsik abal alwa ki ntsi an belch. Pos u kale ani i ntsi tu belal tin waltsik an ja xi Kreta.
Por lej w ms tayl, tujey ti wawyb an tan kal jun i chapik ik xu bijyb Ewroklidn, xi tl ebl.
Jech an ik, tujey kin jna an tan. Kom yab i ejtowal ku beley abal tu tamkuyal an ik, i walka ti ku jna.
U watey tin kx jun i chakam chabl xu bijyb Klawda, taja yab lej kalpidh chapik ti waudh an ik ani kal yn i tojlb ti ejto ki kadhba an chakam tan xu tl i kinkm.

Tam tu okonich ki kadhba an chakam tan, malyat an tan abal ka likey ani yab ka pakchun. Kom i chejnl ka xakpan an tan ban kidhiblom xu bijyb Sirte, pabantsat an ti kudhkum xi kl tu beldhb an tan ani in walkatsik ka jn kal an ik.
Tam ti jun tsudhelom, kom bl tajat chapik an ikladh b, in tujutsik kin petna ban pujal an kitlb xin nedhl an tan.
Tin xlb a kts, i petna jeye kal i kubak ejtal xowa u ynb ban tan.
Owch tajat yab u xalkanal na kts nibal na ttsik ani kom in ntsal an ikladh b, yabich i chalpayal max neech ki ejto ku loey.

Kom nakatich i kij yab xata i kapmal, kubey na Pablo junax chejel xon ti jajtsik kwajat ani in ulu ench: —Jabtsik, msakwiik alwa max tin exbantsmalaktsik ani u jilkonkak Kreta. Anchan yabak i tammal ejtal jech, nibalak i kibdhmal an kitlb.
Por xo, tu utsltsik abal yab ka jila tab, pos ni jun xita xi tattsik yab neech ka chemech, tokot neech ka kibchon an tan.
Pos jech i akal, u chuu jun in tokat abatwlejil na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi nan u kaknl ani u tjontsal.

An tokat abatwle tin utsa ench: “Pablo, yab ki jikey, pos tat kool ki utey ban lej pulek takix romano ani kal tatki ta kwenta, na Dios yab neech kin walka ka chemech ni jun xita xi kwajat junax kal tat ban tan.”
Jabtsik, jaxtm tu utsltsik abal yab ka jila tab, pos nan u beltsal xowa in ulal na Dios ani u chob alwa abal anchan neech ka tmun jelt xan tin utsa an tokat abatwle.
Kool ki ela jun i chakam chabl tech ban pujal.

Jun i akal, tam tin chblbich i semana tu belal, u kwajat ban pujal xu bijyb Adritico ani u jnb tki tki kal an ik. Tam ti chejelich i akal, an iniktsik xu tojnal taja ban tan in chuutsik abal exomich tu ulel ba jun i chabl.
In lejbantsitsik nin wtsk an ja ani in chuu abal jun inik lajuakak i metro in kool. Ms tayl in lejbantsitsik jun ani in chuu abal jun inik bkich tm i metro in kool.
Kom in chejnltsik kin tamu an pakdha tujub, in baliy ban ja tin kx an tan, ch i patltsik xin kubdhl kl an tan ani kom u jikltsik, in lich tajat kin chuutsik ka tsudhey.
Por an iniktsik xi taja u tojnal ban tan, in chalpayaltsik ka jlch, jaxtm tin tujutsik kin paba an chakam tan ban ja, in wynltsik jelti max exom in balyal an patltsik xi okox xi kl tin kubdhl an tan.
Por na Pablo in ltsi an oklek soldadotsik ani an soldadotsik jeye. Ench tin utsatsik: —Max jechtsik ka kale, yab neech ka ejto ki loeytsik.
An soldadotsik in kotsi tm tin wikb an chakam tan ani in walka ka kwajlan ban ja.
Tam ti exomich ti tsudhl, na Pablo in utsatsik ejtal abal ka kapch. Ench tin ulu: —In koolich chb i semana ke tattsik yab i wayal nibal a kapmaltsik xata.
Jaxtm, tu kontsaltsik ti alwatalb abal ka kapu ela wetsik i kapnl abal tattsik ta alwabl. Pos ni jun xita yab neech kin kibdha ni jun in xil xin kool bin k.
Tam ti na Pablo in ulu jech, in tyna an pan ani in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios tin tamt ejtal xi ta ti kwajattsik. In pejaich tm ani in tuju kin kapu.
Ejtal in pubdhatsik nin ejattal ani kapchtsik jeye.
Nin yanl xi taja tu kwajat ba jachan an tan, chb i bo inik kal ox inik lajuakak i atiklbtsik.
Tam ti ajwchtsik, in petnatsik an trigo ban pujal abal ka ikowm an tan.

Tam ti tsudhey, an iniktsik xu tojnal ban tan, yab in exlatsik an chabl xin chutal. Por in chuutsik jun i kubtalb ba jachan an ja xon ti yab lej owtsik ani in ulu abal neech kin chuutsik max kin ejto kin utu taja an tan.

In kotsi tm tin wikb an patl xin kubdhl kl an tan ani taja tin jilatsik alkidh ban ja. In polkantsi an ti xaltsixtalb xu ynal abal ka beldh kl an tan. In paltsi jeye tekat an tan an ti kudhkum xi okox abal ka wawyat kal an ik ani in tujch tm ka utey an tan xon ti yab owtsik an ja.
Por ulich asta xon tu tmx an ja xu dhil ani taja ti xakpan ban kidhiblom. Nin k an tan jilkon xapat ban kidhiblom, nibal ela u ejtowb ka yoywat ani nin kx, tujch ti pakwb kal in chp an mlk ja.
An soldadotsik in lena tm kin chemdha an wiknltsik abal yab ka jlchtsik kowal.
Por an oklek soldadotsik, kom in l kin loo na Pablo, yab in walka kin tajatsik anchan, tokot in ulu ke xin witltsik ti kowal, ka okxintsik kin petna tinb ban ja abal ka ulich kowal asta ban chabl.
Ani xi yab in witltsik ti kowal, in utsa ka puneytsik ba okcha o bin pejmats an tan. Anchan ti ulichtsik ejtal juntam aniki ban chabl.
Tam tu loenekich ejtal tu b, i chobna ke jachan an chabl in bij Malta.
An kwajltsik xi taja, tu bachutsik tajat alwa; pos in jokpatsik i kamal abal exom an b ani chamay ani tu kaniy ejtal tu b ku utey tu dhilal.
In pena tm na Pablo w i waynek dhi ani kwajat in umtsal an kamal, por jun jiktowl ti kale jun i chan kal in kkl an kamal ani palkan bin kubak na Pablo.

Tam ti an atiklbtsik xu kwajl taja in chuu palat an chan bin kubak na Pablo, tsxintsik ench: —Jech an inik i chemdhax inik xna, pos maske in jeka an cheml ban pujal, blki neech ka chemech abal chikan kal an chan.
Por in tinna an chan ban kamal ani na Pablo yab xata in tamu.

Ejtaltsik kwajat in aytsm kin chuu ka mlin o jun jiktowl ka kwajlan chemnek; por tam ti owch ti aytsixtsik ani in chuu abal yab xata in tamu, in jalkuytsik nin chalab ani in tuju kin ulutsik ke na Pablo jaich jun i dios.
Kunat ba jachan an kubtalb xon tu kwajat, ta ti kwajat nin chablil na Publio, an ultalb inik xi ba jachan an chabl xi Malta. Jaj tu bachu ani tu koydha x a kts tin kim.

Tam ti jachan i kij, nin tta na Publio ta ti kwachat abal u kakl ani in kool i kotox tsukl. Kale ti lnb kal na Pablo; tam ti na Pablo okon kin kontsintsi, in kwajba nin kubak bin b an yaul ani in jeldha.
Tam ti an atiklbtsik in acha jech, ulich jeye ba na Pablo an yaultsik xu kwajl ba jachan an chabl ani jeldhtsik.
Yn xowa alwa u tajtsin kal jachan an atiklbtsik. Ms tayl, tam tu balinich jun ban tan, u pidhan kidhat xowa neech ki yntsi abal an belch.
Tam tu kwajch x a ch ba jachan an chabl, u balin ba jun i tan xin watnmal taja nin chamy; jachan an tan, jaich jun i tan xi Alejandra ti tl ani in kool chilbadh an diostsik xu bijyb Kstor ani Plux.
Tam tu ulich ban bitsow xi Sirakusa, u kwajay taja x a kts.
Tam tu kale Sirakusa, i ntsi an belch tin waltsik an ja asta tu ulich Rejio. Tam ti jun tsudhelom, waun an ik xi tl all ani tin chblb a kts u ulich Puteoli.
Taja, i ela chb x i kidhblbtsik xi tu pakabdha abal ku kwajay kal jajtsik jun i semana; ms tayl, u kalch tm Roma.

An kidhblbtsik xi Roma, in achmalichtsik abal neech ku ulich; jaxtm ti kaletsik abal ti ku tamu ban bitsow xin bij Foro de Apio ani ban kubtalb jeye xu bijyb Tres Tabernas. Tam ti na Pablo in chuutsik, in pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani in acha abal likedhantsat tajat tin ejattal.
Tam tu ulich Roma, an oklek soldadotsik in pidhna an wiknltsik bin oklkil xu belkoltsik an ti wikaxte, por na Pablo walk ja ka kwajay pl, belkmte kal jun i soldado.

Tam tin xlbich a kts ti ulnek na Pablo, in abna ka kanyat an judotsik xi ms ultalb xi taja Roma ani tam ti junkuntsik, in utsa ench: —At kidhtaltsik, nan yab xata tu waltsmal an judotsik nibal u chikat tajtsmal tin takixtal ni weje pakliltsik, por in pidhn Jerusaln abal kin wikan kal an romanotsik.
Tam ti okon ti kin ljundhatsik, in lwiik ti kin walka abal yab tin eltsitsik ni jun i walastalb xi yejat ku jalbiy kal i cheml.
Por an judotsik yab in lena. Jaxtm tu konoy abal kin ljundh kal an lej pulek takix romano, por yab abal u kool jun xata xantokl ti ku utsbiy nu kidhtaltsik.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu kanymaltsik. Abal tu chuutsik ani abal ku tilololch. Pos tech in kwajat wikadh kal i patl kal tin kwentaki an aytsixtalb xi kool, waw xu israelita.
Utsan tm ench: —Waw yab i bachmal ni jun i dhutsadh w xi tl Judea abal ku ltsin xanty waach kal tat ta kwenta, nibal tsinek ni jun i judo xi tuwa abal ti ku tiltsi max tat i utsbidh.
Por i l ki acha xanty a chalpayal kal tin kwenta jech an t junkuntalb, pos i achmalich abal putlki tu atnal.

Anchan p, bijtsin jun i kij xowki ti neech ka tiltsin xowa nin l kin chobnatsik ani junkun yn i a atiklbtsik xon ti kwajat na Pablo. Dhajaw tin tuju ti tiltsix kal tin kwenta xan tu takix na Dios asta dhamuy. In tiltsaltsik an ta Jess ani in ltsaltsik xan tu tilnal bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani bin dhuslbil an tiltsixtsik.
Taltsik in bell xowa in ulal na Pablo ani taltsik, yaba.
Ani kom yabtsik jununl nin chalab, in tuju ti kaleltsik. Utsantsik tm ench kal na Pablo: —Tsubax tajat ti utsan kal an Tokat Ejattalb ni weje pakliltsik, tam ti utsantsik ench kal an tiltsix Isaas:
Ki kale ani ka utsa ench n na at kidhtaltsik: Neech ka achatsik, por yab neech ka exbay; neech ka chuutsik, por jelti max yab a chutal.

Abal nin itsch jech an atiklbtsik, in chapikmdhmal tajat, wetsik tajat tin achltsik kal nin ochoxtal. Mututsik tin kool nin wal; abal yab ka chuxintsik kal nin wal, nibal ka ochxintsik kal nin ochoxtal. Yab kin exbaytsik kal in itsch, nibal ka uteytsik kal Nan abal ku jeldha.
Ka chobnatsik p, ke xo, jech nin looxtalbil na Dios neech ka tiltsin xi yabtsik u judo ani neech ja kin exbaytsik.
Tam ti na Pablo in okoy kin ulu jech, kale an judotsik ani u kwlxtsik tajat jajkitsik.
Kwajay na Pablo ba jachan an matidh at, chb i tamub ani in bachwal ejtaltsik xu ulel ti lnax.
Kal ni jun i jkib tin ltsal an atiklbtsik xan tu takix na Dios, in oktsaltsik kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani yab u tamkuyb kal ni jun xita.
Nan, xu bij Pablo, in kwajat u tjontsal na Jesukristo. Na Dios tin kanymal ani tin plmdhmal abal ti kin kwajba tin abatwlejil. In taja anchan abal ku tila nin alwa tilbil.
Na Dios in pidhnmal ka chobn jech an tsubaxtalb asta ti weje. Jech in pidhna ka chobn ban Tokat Dhuslab kal nin tiltsxiltsik.
Jech an alwa tilab, jaich kl tu tilnal ni Ajtik Jesukristo, nin Chakmil na Dios. Jaj na Jesukristo in koy jeye in tul jelti waw, u kidhtalb kal an pulek takix Dabid.
Kal tin kwenta nin tokattal ani tam ti ejdh ti t, tmich ti xalk abal tsubax lejtal u Chakmlb kal na Dios ani pidhan ti chplb.

Kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, i bachu an alwatalb ani u pidhan kal na Dios ku kwajay tu abatwle. U pidhan ku kwajay tu abatwle abal ki oktsi an atiklbtsik xi putl an kayl abal kin bela na Jesukristo ani yab kin chikat taja na Dios.

Kal jech an atiklbtsik, ta teye ta kwajat, tattsik xi kwajl Roma. Na Dios ti kanidhltsik, ti kanymaltsik abal ki kwajch kal na Jesukristo ani abal ki kwajchtsik i tokat. Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ni ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Okox, u l tu utsatsik abal u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb nu Diosil kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo. Jech an jalbintsixtalb u pidhnl kal tattsik ta kwenta abal putlki tu tilnal xan ta belltsik na Jesukristo.
Na Dios, xi nan in kwajat u tjontsal kal ejtal nu ejattal abal ku tila an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil, in chob alwa abal tu kontsintsaltsik tajat tam in l.
Echeki u pakabdhl na Dios abal ku ejto kin kale tu lnatsik, max Jaj anchan tin l.
Pos nan u l tu chuutsik ani tu tolmiytsik ka bachu xowa in l ti pidha an Tokat Ejattalb ani anchan ki belmchtsik ms
abal ku lkdhntsxin ti itsch jn ani jn kal an belomtalb xi kool.

Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik abal ynlich tajat u lenmal kin kale tu lnatsik, por asta xo yab u ejtmal kin kale. U lenl kin kale tachan abal kin tjon ani ka wachin ms i belom kal tattsik, jelt xan ti tmnk kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u judo xi kwajattsik pl bitsow.
Pos nan kool ku tiltsi an ti alwa tilab an griegotsik ani xi yab u griegotsik, xi chalpadhtsik ani xi yab chalpadhtsik.
Jaxtm, nan u lenl tajat kin kale tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab, tattsik xi kwajl Roma.

Yab u tidhenl ku tila an alwa tilab, pos an alwa tilab, in chp na Dios. Jech an alwa tilab, kl tu tilnal na Jesukristo; ani xita kin bela na Jesukristo, neech ka loey. Jech an alwa tilab okox ti tiltsin an judotsik ani tayl xi yabtsik u judo.

Pos ban alwa tilab, na Dios tu xalkantsalich xan tu kwajbl alwa kal Jaj kal an belomtalb ani tokot kal an belomtalbki. Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Max jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios abalki u belom, yabich jayki neech ka chemech.”
Nin kakadh yajtsiktalbil na Dios tl walki abal ejtalki xin tajl xowa yab alwa. Kal nin ataxtal, jech an atiklbtsik yab in walkl ka exl an tsubaxtalb.
In exllichtsik alwa xowa u exlantsb na Dios, kom xalkantsidhichtsik kal na Dios.

Na Dios yab tejwa, por in xalkl xan ti jeye Jaj kal xowa in tajmal. Tam tin taja an walki ani an chabl, in xalka ke Jaj tsubax lejtal u Dios ani in kool in chp xi yab jayki in kool in okontal. Jaxtm, an atiklbtsik xin tajl xowa yab alwa, yab neech kin ejto kin ulu ke yab in exll.

Maske in exlltsik na Dios, yab in kaknmaltsik xan tu kaknb na Dios, nibal in pidhmaltsik ti jalbintsixtalb. In ntsal tokot kin chalpaytsik xowa yab xata in jalbl ani nin itsch xi yab tajat xata in l kin exbay, jilkonk jelti max ban jikwaxtalb.
Jilkontsik yab xata in exbayal abal in chalpay ke jajtsik chalpadh tajat.
In jalmaltsik nin labidh tokt na Dios xi yab jayki u chemel, kal in chilbil i iniktsik xu chemel, kal in chilbil i chichintsik, i chantsik ani kal i konltsik xi ch in akan.
Jaxtm na Dios tin walkmalichtsik kin ntsi kin taja xowa atax, xowa in kulbetnltsik tin itsch ani anchan, in tajtsalich nin tul xowa yab alwa jajkitsik tinb.
In jalmaltsik nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios kal i kambixtalb, in kaknmaltsik ani in lantsmaltsik xowa na Dios in tajmal. Na Dios jaich nin tomnl ka kakn malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti walktsik kal na Dios kin taja xowa tidhetl; pos asta an mmlbtsik in jalkuy nin chalab, yabich u kwajl xan ti yejat ka kwajay, u junkunal i mmlb kal in at mmlb.

Anl jeye an iniktsik, in jila ti kwajltsik kal i mmlb; in jalkuytsik nin chalab ani in taja xowa tidhetl. Junkun i inik kal in at inik ani anchan in bachwaltsik i yajtsiktalb bin tul kal tin kwenta xowa in tajltsik.
Kom yabich in lena kin exbantsitsik na Dios, jaxtm ti walktsik kal na Dios kin koy i chalab xi yab alwa abal kin tajatsik xowa yab yejat kin taja.

In tajltsik tajat xowa yab lujat, u junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, in tajltsik xowa atax ani chenetsik tajat. In chakuntsaltsik xitakichki kal tin kwenta xowa in chutal in kool, u chemdhaxtsik, u pjextsik ani u kambixtsik.
In till yab alwa xi keettsik, in janwaltsik i kw, in atltsik na Dios, u odhbijixtsik ani in tekltsik tinb. In kldhltsik i chalab xi yab alwa, in chikat tajltsik nin tta ani nin nna.
Yabtsik jeye in l kin exbay xata, yabtsik in tajl xowa lujat, yabtsik xita in kanidhl ani yabtsik in kool i yajnantsixtalb.

Jajtsik, maske in chobich abal neech ti ljundhbtsik kal na Dios ani in chobtsik jeye ke xita nin tajltsik ejtal jech in tomnl ka chemdh, blki in ntsal kin tajatsik ani asta alwa in achl tam kin chuu ke jun xita in tajl jeye anchan.

Jaxtm tat, xa teltsal xanty in tajl xi keettsik, yab a kool i pakwlantsixtalb, yab neech ka dh ti kwenta xitam j teye. Pos tam i kwajat a teltsal xanty in tajl jun xita, a walbindhl tab, pos tat xi kwajat a teltsal xanty in tajl xi keet, jaych teye a tajl.
Por i chob abal na Dios u ljundhax kal i lujattalb tam in ulal ke walbidhtsik xin tajltsik jech.
Ani tat, xi kwajat a teltsal xanty in tajl xi keettsik ani jaychki teye a tajl, a chalpayalxe ke neech ka ejto ka chinkontsi nin ljundhaxtal na Dios?
O a pojkantsal nin pulek alwatal ani nin chaattalbil na Dios ani yab a chutal abal jaich nin alwatalbil xi exom ti tajl ka jila ta walablom?

Por tat, kom watats ti chapik na itsch ani yab a l ka jila ta walablom, jaxtm ti exom a yanedhl abal ka bachu ms yn i yajtsiktalb tam kin bajaw xowki ti neech ka chakuy na Dios. Jachan i kij, tm neech ka xalkan ke na Dios u ljundhom in lujtalki.
Tm jeye ti neech ka pidhan an atiklbtsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmaltsik.
Neech kin pidhatsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xita in tajmal xowa alwa abal kin bachu an labidh tokattalb, an kaknaxtalb ani ejtal xowa yab in kool in okontal.
Por neech kin pidhatsik ti kakadh yajtsiktalb xita in tajltsik i pjxtalb ani yab in tajltsik ti kij an tsubaxtalb, tokot in tajltsik xowa yab lujat.
Neech ka pidhantsik kal na Dios ti kakadh yajtsiktalb ejtalki xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa, okox abal an judotsik ani tayl abal xi yabtsik u judo.
Por xita in tajltsik xowa alwa, neech ka pidhan kal na Dios ti labidh tokattalb, ti kaknaxtalb ani ti kijidhtalb, okox abal an judotsik ani tayl, abal xi yabtsik u judo.
Pos na Dios yab in dhl ti kwenta xitam j kin wala o kin taja xowa alwa.

Ejtal xu walbinaltsik maske yab in exll nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, neech ka kibey maske yabtsik in exll jachan an takixtalb. Ani xu walbinaltsik maske in exll jech an takixtalb, neech ka ljundh anchan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an takixtalb.
Pos yabtsik kwajat alwa kal na Dios xin achlkitsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tokot kwajattsik alwa kal na Dios, xin tajltsik xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb.
Tam xi yabtsik u judo, xi yabtsik in exll nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kin taja jajki tin chalab xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb, u kalelich jelti max in exll.
Kal xowa in tajltsik, in xalkl ke in kooltsik an takixtalb tin itsch. Kal xowa in chalpayal, kl tu xalkanal jech. Ani kal xowa in achl tin ejattal, kl ti neech ka walbiyat o ka lowat.
Tam kin bajaw an kij, na Dios neech kin ljundha kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo xowa in chinat chalpayal tin ejattal an atiklbtsik. Anchan neech ka tmun jelt xan tu utsmaltsik in ulal an alwa tilab.
Tat a ulal abal i judo, a ynl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani a tekl tab abal a ulal i exlmte kal a Dios.
A exll xowa in l na Dios ani jech an takixtalb, ti oktsal ka takuy xowa ms alwa.
A chalpayal tajat abal neech ka ejto ka oktsi xi keet, xi kwajattsik jelti max u jokol ani a chalpayal ke a tajbayal xi kwajat ban jikwaxtalb jelti max tat i tajaxtalb.

A chalpayal ke a chob xan ti neech ka takiy xi yab u witomtsik ani xan ti neech ka oktsi xi yabtsik bl in lej exlmal nin kwintal na Dios. A tajl anchan abal a kool ban takixtalb an chalpadhtalb ani an tsubaxtalb xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Pos max tat a oktsal xi keettsik, jantki ti yab a oktsal tab? Max a ulal ke yab yejat xita ka kwlch, jantki ta kw?

Max a ulal ke yab xita yejat ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal, jantki ta junkunal kal xi yab a tomtal? Max a atl tajat an chilabtsik, jantki ta kwyal xowa u pikbantsb ban at xon tu kaknb jech an chilabtsik?
A tekl tab abal a ulal a exll nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, por a chikat tajl na Dios abal yab a tajl xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb.
Jaxtm tin ulal ench an Tokat Dhuslab: “U odhbijyb na Dios kal xi yabtsik u judo kal tatkitsik ta walab.”

Tsubax kejle ke an exl xin tajl an israelitatsik bin tul, alwa, max kin taja xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; por max yab kin taja ti kij jachan an takixtalb, jyki max yab in kool jachan an exl bin tul.
Por xi yab in kool an exl bin tul ani in tajl xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, u kalelich tm jelti max jaj in kool jachan an exl.

Xi yab in kool an exl bin tul, por in tajl xowa in ulal an takixtalb, neech kin chuu ke yab alwa xowa in tajl an israelitatsik. An israelitatsik in kool an exl bin tul ani in exll an takixtalb, por yab in tajl xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb.
Jun i judo yab jaich ti exlmte kal na Dios abalki u judo, nibal abal in kool an exl bin tul.

Exlmte kal na Dios, xita tsubax lejtal tin tajl xowa in l na Dios ani exlidhich kal an Tokat Ejattalb bin itsch, yab xan tin ulalki an takixtalb. An kaknaxtalb xi neech kin bachu xi kwajattsik anchan, yab tl ban iniktsik, tl ba Dios.
Jant ti alwa max jn u judo o jant tu ynal max in kool an exl bin tul?
Kal yn xowa tu ynal. Jidhtal, pidhan an judotsik kal na Dios an ti takixtalb.
Ani jant jeye max taltsik xi jajtsik yab u belom? Abal yab u belom, neechxe kin taja ka kwajay yab lujat na Dios? Yaba!
Na Dios echeki in tajl xowa lujat ani ejtal an iniktsik u kambix; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Abal ki xalk i lujat kal xowa a ulal ani ka ta tam ki ljundh.
Ani max kal xowa yab alwa i tajl, i xalkl ke na Dios lujat, janty neech ki chalpay? Ke na Dios yab lujat xowa in tajl tam in pidhnl an yajtsiktalb? (Exom tin kw jelt xan tu kw jun i ani inik.)
Pos max na Dios yabak lujat, jan ti neech kin ejto kin ljundha xi kwajattsik ban kayl?
Por max nu kambixtal alwa abal kin xalka ms nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios ani anchan kin koy ms nin labidh tokt, jantki p tm na Dios tin chutal ke in walablom tam kin kambixin?

Max anchanak, jantki ti yab i tajl xowa yab alwa abal ki bachu xowa alwa? Jech jaich xowa taltsik in ulal, ke nan u oktsixnl abal ti kin walbindha. Jachan an atiklbtsik in tomnl ka kwajb abal ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb.
Awxe ki ulu ke waw xu judo ms wa u alwa k xi yabtsik u judo? Yaba! Pos i chobnmalich ke maske i judo o yab i judo, walbidhtsik.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Yab waach ni jun xita lujat, nibal ela jn;
yab waach ni jun xita xin exbayal, yab waach ni jun xita xin ayal a Dios.
Ejtaltsik in yakwa i bl xi yab alwa, ejtaltsik in taja xowa atax. Yab waach ni jun xita xin tajl xowa alwa, yab waach nibal ela jn.
Atax tajat xowa in ulal, in junwal jelt in kaxy i chemlom; u kambixtsik tajat. Atax ejtal xowa in ulaltsik, in junwal jelt in itlbil i chan.
U odhbijixtsik tajat ani in ulaltsik tajat i kw xi atax.
U dhiltsik abal ka kale kin chemdha in at inik;
in tajltsik i cheml ani in wachindhltsik i chojontltalb xon ti xeechtsik
ani yabtsik in exll an kijidhtalb.
Nibal in chalpayal kin jiknatsik na Dios.

I chob ke ejtal xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in ulal abal xi kwajattsik taknl kal jech an takixtalb. Jech tin ulal, jaich abal ejtal ka chamkantsik ani ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl ka ljundhtsik kal na Dios.
Ni jun xita yab neech ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios abal in tajmalki xowa in ulal an takixtalb, pos an takixtalb tokot alwa abal ti ku xalkantsi ke waw u walablom.
Por xo, maske i tajlich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, na Dios tu xalkantsi xan ti neech ku kwajay alwa kal Jaj. Jech ln kal an takixtalb ani kal an tiltsixtsik.
Na Dios tu kwajblich alwa kal Jaj, kal tin kwenta abal i bellich na Jesukristo; pos na Dios yab kwajat ti takukl xita neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj.
Kom ejtal walbidh, yabtsik kwajat kal nin labidh tokt na Dios.
Na Dios u kwajbax alwa kal Jaj aniki, kal nin alwatalki, kal tin kwenta an cheml xin watna na Kristo.

Na Dios in taja ke nin xichl na Kristo, xin wakla tam ti chemdh, ka kwajay jelti jun i jalbixtalb abal ku pakwlantsat. Jech an pakwlantsixtalb neech ki bachu max ku belmch ani in xalkl ke na Dios lujat. Ani max in pakwlantsi xita in walmaltsik ti weje,
jaich abal Jaj yab jikpadh. In xalkl jeye ke na Dios lujat xo ani echeki lujat, abal in pakwlantsmalich xin bellichtsik na Jess.
Jn ti jilkon xin ynl an atiklbtsik abal kin teka tinb? Wixkiyat. Kal jowa takixtalb? Kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Yaba! Wixkiyat kal an belomtalb xin kool kal na Kristo.
Pos tm, i chuch ke na Dios in kwajbl alwa kal Jaj xita xu belomich ani yab in dhl ti kwenta max in tajmal o yaba xowa in ulal an takixtalb.
Awxe na Dios tokotki u Dios abal an judotsik ani yab abal xi yabtsik u judo? Yaba! U Dios jeye abal xi yabtsik u judo.
Jn tokot a Dios waach; ani jech na Dios, jaich xin kwajblich alwa kal Jaj xita kin bela na Kristo, yab in dhl ti kwenta max in kool an exl bin tul o yaba.
Tm, exomxe i ynl an belomtalb abal ki jila yab xata in jalbl an takixtalb? Yaba! Exom i xalkl abal an takixtalb in jalbl tajat.
Janty neech ki ulu kal tin kwenta na Abraham, ni weje paklil?
Max na Abraham kwajbadhak alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki xowa in taja, neech kin ejto kin teka tinb, por yab tin tamt na Dios.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani kal nin belomtalki, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.”
Por max jun xita kin taja jun i tojlb, an jalbixtalb yab u pidhnal jelti jun i chejwalixtalb, u pidhnal jelti jun xata xu jntsinal.
Por max jun xita, maske yab xata in tajmal, kin bela abal na Dios in kwajbl alwa kal Jaj an walablomtsik, u kwajbbich alwa kal na Dios kal nin belomtalki.
Na Dabid in tila an kijidhtalb xin bachwal jun xita tam ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios, maske yab xata in tajmal abal ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios.
Ench tin ulu: Kijidh abal xita xu pakwlantsb tin walab kal na Dios.
Kijidh abal xita xi yab u dhantsb ti kwenta kal an Okxlb xantom walastalb in tajmal.

Awxe jech an kijidhtalb tokot neech kin ejto kin bachutsik xin kool an exl bin tul, o neech jeye kin bachutsik xi yab in kool jech an exl? Pos i ulal abal na Dios in bachmal na Abraham ti lujat inik kal nin belomtalki.
Chutatxe na Abraham ti lujat inik kal na Dios tam ti tajtsidhich an ti exl bin tul, o tam ti yabl tajtsidh? Yaba! Chutat ti lujat inik, tam ti yabl tajtsidh an ti exl.

Tajtsin na Abraham an ti exl bin tul, jelti jun i chomaxtalb; jelti jun i exl abal bachudhich kal na Dios ti lujat inik kom belmch tam ti yabl in kool an exl. Anchan, na Abraham jilkonich tm jelti ttalb kal ejtal xu belomich maske yab in kooltsik an exl bin tul; abal anchan, ka kwajbjichtsik jeye alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal.
Na Abraham u ttalb jeye kal xin kooltsik an exl bin tul ani u belomtsik. U belomtsik jelt xan ti belmch ni weje paklil Abraham tam ti yabl tajtsidh an exl bin tul.

Pos na Dios in utsmal na Abraham ani nin kidhtaltsik ke neech kin bachutsik an chabl ti jiltsixtalb; por jech xowa utsan na Abraham, utsan abal in bela na Dios ani bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik, yab abal yab in chikat taja an takixtalb.

Pos max xin tajltsik xowa in ulal an takixtalb, jaichkijak in bachwaltsik xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna, tm, an belomtalb yab xata ti neech ka yan ani xowa in ulmal na Dios, yab xata neech kin jalblna.
An takixtalb, in tajl i chkub; por xon ti yab waach i takixtalb, yab u xalkanal an walastalb.

Jaxtm, kom i bell na Dios ani kal tin kwenta nin alwatal, tu pidhl xowa in ulmal ke neech ti ku pidha. I bachwal, max i bell na Dios jelt xan ti belmch na Abraham ani nin kidhtaltsik. Jech xowa in ulmal na Dios neech kin pidhna, yab tokotki neech kin bachu xin tajltsik xan tin ulal an takixtalb, neech jeye kin bachutsik xu belom jelt xan ti belmch na Abraham. Na Abraham u ttalb kal ejtal waw,

jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Tu tajmal ki kwajay ta ttalb kal yn i atiklbtsik.” Kwajb na Abraham kal na Dios jelti ttalb, abal belmch. Jech na Dios, jaich nin ejdhl an chemlomtsik ani in bijyal xowa yab waach jelti max wachich.

Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani in koy i aytsixtalb maske yabich waach ni jun i aytsixtalb. Anchan tin bajaw ka kwajay jelti “ttalb kal yn i atiklbtsik”, jelt xan ti usnk ench: “Yn neech ka koy a kidhtaltsik.”
Maske na Abraham in koolich kunat bo inik i tamub ani kwajat jelti max chemnekich, ani na Sara uxkweich ani yab u knal, na Abraham yab in jila kin bela xowa utsan kal na Dios.
Na Abraham yab kwajay ti chalpax, tokot in bela xowa utsan kal na Dios, in likedha nin ejattal kal nin belomtal ani in pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios.
Anchan tin taja abal in chob alwa ke na Dios in kool i awiltalb kin taja ejtal xowa in ulmal.
Jaxtm, kal nin belomtalki, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.
Jech xowa dhutsan kal tin kwenta na Abraham, ke jaj bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik, yab dhutsan kal jajki tin kwenta;
dhutsan jeye kal waw ti kwenta. Pos kal tin kwentaki abal i bellich na Dios, tu bachwalich weye tu lujat inik. Jech na Dios, jaich xin ejdha ni Ajtik Jess tam ti chemdh.
Na Jess jaich xi pidhn ka chemdh kal tin kwentaki ni walab ani ejdh abal ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
Kom na Dios tu kwajbmich alwa kal Jaj, kal tin kwentaki ni belomtal, u kwajatich kijidh kal Jaj kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ani abal u belomich, i ejtowalich ku utey ba na Dios ani u kwajatich junini bin alwatal. U kulbl abal i kool an aytsixtalb ke neech ku kwajay bin labidh tokt na Dios.
Ani yab tokot kal jechki, u kulbl jeye kal an yajtsiktalb xi bachwal; pos i chob ke an yajtsiktalb, tu tolmiyal ki koy i chaattalb.
An chaattalb in xalkl abal likat ni ejattal ani max likat ni ejattal, i kool an aytsixtalb ke neech ku kwajay xan ti kwajat na Dios.
Ani jech an aytsixtalb xi kool, yab aniki, pos i chob abal neech ku kwajay kal na Dios, kom Jaj yab u kambix. Pos na Dios in xalkl abal tu kanidhl tajat kal an Tokat Ejattalb xi tu pidhmal.
Kom waw yab neech ki ejto ki loo tib, tam tin bajaw an kij, na Kristo in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal tin kwenta an walablomtsik.

Yab junwki neech kin lena ka chemdh jun xita abal kin loo keet, nibal abal kin loo jun xita xi lujat tajat; por abal kin loo jun xita xin tajl tajat xowa alwa, t xna kejle kwajat xi neech kin pidhna tinb ka chemdh.
Por na Dios in xalkl abal tu kanidhl, pos na Kristo chemech kal waw ti kwenta maske tam ti jachan i kij, waw bl u walablom.
Ani xo, kom u kwajbadhich alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwenta an cheml xin watna na Kristo, ms xo neech ku lowatich kal na Kristo tam ka tsch an kakadh yajtsiktalb, tam kin bajaw an pakwenib.

Tam ti waw yab u kwajat alwa kal na Dios, tu kwajba alwa kal Jaj, kal tin kwentaki nin chemtal nin Chakmil. Max in taja anchan, xo kom u kwajatich alwa kal Jaj, ms neech ku lowatich kom na Kristo ejech ti t.
Ani yab tokot jechki, u kulbl jeye kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo; pos kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, u kwajatich alwa kal na Dios.
Kal jnki i inik ti tujey an walastalb tech ban kayl ani kal tin kwenta an walastalb, wachin an cheml. Kom ejtal walbin, jaxtm xo ti ejtal u chemel.
Tam ti yabl waach nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kejle wachich an walastalb ban kayl; por xon ti yab waach an takixtalb, yab u walbiyb ni jun xita maske walbidh.

Por an cheml kejle waach asta tam ti xechin na Adn, asta ti wachin na Moiss. U chemel xitakichki ka walbin jelt xan ti walbin na Adn. Anchan xan ti na Adn in wala ani wachin an cheml, anchan jeye ti tsch na Kristo abal kin pidhna an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Nin chejwalixtal na Dios yab in junwal jelti nin walab na Adn. Pos max kal nin walab jachan jn an inik, yn chemech, nin alwatal ani nin chejwalixtal na Dios yaney tajat ani yn xita nin bachu kal nin alwatalki jun i inik, na Jesukristo.

Nin walab xi jech jn an inik, yab in junwal nin chejwalixtal na Dios. Pos kal jun an walastalb, wachin an kibeltalb; por nin chejwalixtal na Dios, kl tu ejtowbich ka kwajb alwa an inik kal na Dios, maske in tajmal yn i walastalb.

Pos max kal nin walab jachan jn an inik wachin an cheml, ms tajat neech ka kwajay ejat kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo xita xin bachwaltsik tajat an alwatalb ani an chejwalixtalb abal ka kwajch alwa kal na Dios.

Pos anchan, kal tin kwentaki nin walab jun i inik, jilkon walbidh ejtal an atiklbtsik, anchan jeye kal tin kwentaki xowa lujat in taja na Jesukristo, tjan ke ejtal an atiklbtsik kin ejtch ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios ani kin kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Anchan, kal tin jekomtalki jun i inik, ejtal an atiklbtsik xalkan u walablom tin tamt na Dios; anchan jeye, kal tin kwentaki abal na Jesukristo in taja xowa in l na Dios, ejtal an atiklbtsik kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kwajb abal ka xalkan ke waach tajat an walastalb; por tam ti xalkan ke waach tajat an walastalb, ms tajat wachin nin alwatal na Dios.

Pos anchan xan ti an walastalb in tajl abal ka chemech an atiklbtsik, anchan jeye nin alwatal na Dios tu kwajblich alwa kal na Dios abal ki kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech u tmnal kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Tm, janty neech ki ulu? Neechxe ki ntsi ki wala abal na Dios ti ku xalkantsi ms tin alwatal? Yaba!
Pos xu kwajatich jelti max chemnek abal an walastalb, jantki ti kool ku kwajay bl i wall?
Yabxe a chobtsik ke tam ti bachu na Kristo Jess, in junwal jelti max u chemech junax kal Jaj tam tu pujan?

Tam tu pujan, i junwal jelti max u chemech ani u jolyat junax kal na Kristo. Pos anchan xan ti na Kristo ejech ti t abal kin xalkantsi tin labidh tokt an Ttalb, anchan weye waw yejat ku xechinich lujat ani yabich ki tajl i walastalb.
Kom jelti max u chemech junax kal na Kristo, anchan jeye ti neech ku ejech ti t jelt xan ti Jaj ejech.

I chobich ke an weje chalab xi koolwiik, jelti max pajkiyat jeye junax kal na Kristo. Anchan ti tmun abal ka wixkiyat an walastalb, xi kwajat jelti max i ajtiklb. Anchan yabich yejat ki wala jelti max exom i tjontsal bl jech an ajtiklb.
Pos xi chemnekich, yabich neech ka ejtowat ka kyat taknl kal an walastalb.
Kom jelti max u chemech junax kal na Kristo, i chob jeye ke neech ku kwajay ejat kal Jaj.
I chobich ke tam ti na Kristo ejdhjich ti t, yabich jayki neech ka chemech; an cheml yabich in kool i awiltalb kal Jaj.
Pos tam ti chemech na Kristo, chemech kal tin kwenta an walastalb jnlki abal echekijich; por tam ti ejdh ti t, ejdh abal ka kwajay ejat abal a Dios.
Anchan teye tattsik, ki kwajaytsik jelti max i chemnek abal an walastalb, por i ejattsik abal na Dios kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Jaxtm, yabich ka walkatsik kin koy i awiltalb an walastalb ba na tul xu chemel. Yabich ka tajl xowa in kulbetnl na tul.

Yab ka pidhnatsik tab ki yntsik kal an walastalb abal ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, ka pidhnatsik tab ba na Dios, jelti jun xita xi chemnekich ani ejdhatsich ti t. Ka pidhnatsik tab ba na Dios abal ki yntsik ka taja xowa lujat.
Yabich ki kwajaytsik taknl kal an walastalb, pos yabich i kwajattsik taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, i kwajattsik bin alwatal na Dios.
Janty ki taja? Ki ntsi ki wala abal u kwajatich bin alwatal na Dios ani yabich u kwajat taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Yaba!

A chobtsik alwa ke max ka pidhna tab abal ki kwajay ta jolib ba jun i ajtiklb, kool ka taja xowa kin ulu jachan an ajtiklb. Ani anchan, max i kwajat a tjontsal an walastalb jelti jun i ajtiklb, jech neech ti ki jna ban kibeltalb; por max a tjontsal na Dios, neech ki kwajay lujat.
Por u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta, xi kwajattsikwiik jelti max i jolib kal an walastalb ani xo a exbaymalichtsik kal yantam a itsch an alwa tilab xi oktsidhichtsik.
Tam ta kldhjichtsik ta jolib ban an walastalb, i kwajbjichtsik abal ka tajl xowa lujat.

(Exom tin kw jelt xan tu kw jun i inik xi tech ti kayl, kom tattsik yab a lej ejtowal ka exbaytsik alwa jech.) Anchan jelt xan ta pidhnmaltsik tab ki yn kal an ataxtalb ani kal xowa yab alwa, anchan jeye xo ti ka pidhnatsik tab abal ki tokedhjichtsik ani anchan ka tajlichtsik xowa lujat.
Tam ta kybtsik ta jolib kal an walastalb, yab a tajltsik xowa lujat;
por jantom alwatalb a kymaltsik kal jachan xowa yab alwa a tajmaltsik ani xo bl ti tidhebdhltsik? Pos tokot u jnax ban kibeltalb.
Por xo, kom i kldhatsichtsik ta jolib ban walastalb ani i kwajbadhichtsik abal ka tjontsi na Dios, a koolichtsik an tokattalb ani anchan, a koolichtsik jeye an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Xita in tajl i walastalb, tayl neech ban kibeltalb; por nin chejwalixtal na Dios, jaich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Neech tin kw kal xin exlltsik an takixtalb. Kidhblbtsik, yabxe a chobtsik ke an takixtalb in kool i awiltalb ba jun i inik tam jachan an inik bl kwajat ejat?

An mmlb xi tomkidh, jyki max wikadh tu kyb kal an takixtalb bin tomkl, lejat nin tomkl kwajat ejat; por max ka chemech nin tomkl, an mmlb u jilkonalich walkadh kal an takixtalb xi kl tu kyb jelti max wikadh bin tomkl.

Jaxtm, max an mmlb ka junkun kal i keet inik tam bl ejat nin tomkl, u wenkonalich tm ti junkux inik; por max ka chemech nin tomkl, an mmlb u jilkonalich tm walkadh kal jech an takixtalb. Ani max ka tomkin kal keet i inik, yabich u kalel i junkux inik.
