Kidhblbtsik, anchan teye tattsik, tam ta bachu na Kristo, jelti max i chemechtsik abal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Anchan yabich i kwajat taknl kal jech an takixtalb, i kwajatich taknl kal na Kristo xi chemdh ani ejech ti t abal ka tajlich xowa in l na Dios.

Tam tu kwajatwiik tokot i tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, i tajl xowa yab alwa. Jech an atax chalab u ejdhantsat kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Ejtal jech an atax chalab xi tajl kal ni tul, tu jnl ban kibeltalb.

Por xo, yabich u kwajat taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kom u kwajatich jelti max chemnek abal jech an takixtalb xi tu takyalwiik. Jaxtm, kom yabich xo u kwajat taknl kal jech an takixtalb, ki tjontsch an Tokat Ejattalb xi xo u takix ani yabich ki tjontsi an weje takixtalb xi tu takyalwiik.

Tm, janty neech ki ulu? Ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, i walastalb? Yaba! Por max yabak wachink jech an takixtalb, yabak u exlmal an walastalb. Yabak u exlmal max walats ku ltendha xowa in kool keet, max an takixtalb yabak in ulmal ench: “Yab neech ka ltendha xowa in kool keet.”
Por an walastalb in yna an takixtalb abal ti kin kwajbantsi bu chalab an ti ltendhaxtalb. Pos max yabak waach an takixtalb, yabak jeye waach an walastalb.
Tam ti yab u exll an takixtalb, u chalpay abal neech kin kwajay ejat kal na Dios; por tam tu exla an takixtalb, u chuu abal in walbidh ani u chobna abal yab neech ku ejto kin kwajay kal na Dios.
U chobna ke an takixtalb xin pidhnl i xechintalb, tin xalkantsi abal in neech ban kibeltalb.
Por an walastalb in yna an takixtalb abal ti kin kambiy ani u chobna abal neech kin kale ban kibeltalb.
Tsubax kejle ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tokat; ani xowa in ulal ka tajan, tokat, lujat ani alwa.

Tm, jech an takixtalb xin ulal ka tajan xowa alwa, neech ti kin jna ban kibeltalb? Yaba! An walastalb, abal ka xalkan ke yab alwa, tin xalkantsi abal in neech ban kibeltalb kal xowa alwa in ulal ka tajan jech an takixtalb. Anchan, an takixtalb in xalka ke an walastalb yab tajat alwa.
I chob ke an takixtalb a Dios tu pidhm, por yab u ejto ku taja xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb kom in kwajat taknl kal an walastalb.
Yab u chob xanty u tamwal, pos yab u ejto ku taja xowa u l ku taja, tokot u tajl xowa u pojkl.
Ani max tokot u tajl xowa yab u l ku taja, u ulalich tm ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, alwa.
Anchan, yabich nan nu tajl an walastalb; xita nin tajl, jaich an walastalb xu kokm tin kwajat.
U chob ke ba nan, yab waach xata alwa; pos u l ku taja xowa alwa, por yab u ejtowal ku taja.
Pos yab u tajl xowa alwa xu l ku taja, tokot u tajl xowa yab alwa xi yab u l ku taja.
Ani max u tajl xowa yab u l, yabich nan u tajl; in tajl an walastalb xu kokm.
Anchan p, tam u l ku taja xowa alwa, tokot u tajl xowa yab alwa xu kokm.
Tu ejattal, u kulbetnl ku taja xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
U l ku taja xowa in ulal ka tajan nin takixtal na Dios, por waach bu tul nin chp an walastalb xi tin tamkuyal. Jech nin chp an walastalb xi kwajat bu tul, jaich tin tajl ku wala.
Chojontl u chubl! Jita neech ti kin wixkintsi an ti walastalb xu tajl bu tul xi tin nedhl ban kibeltalb?

U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, ke tokot ni Ajtik Jesukristo neech kin ejto tin wixkintsi an ti walastalb. Jaxtm, kal nu chalab u tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios, por kal nu tul, u tajl an walastalb.
Pos xo, yabich waach ni jun i walbixtalb abal xi kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo Jess, yabich waach ni jun i walbixtalb, kal xi kwajatichtsik xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab xan tin kulbetnl nin tul.
Pos nin takixtal an Tokat Ejattalb xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess, tin kldhmalich bin takixtal an walastalb ani ban kibeltalb.

Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, yab in ejto kin wkoy an walastalb xi tajl kal ni tul, kom yab in kool in chp. Jaxtm na Dios tin aba nin Chakmil jelti jun i inik xu walablom kal tin kwentaki an walastalb abal ti ku wkontsi an ti walastalb xi tajl kal ni tul.

Jech in taja abal ka xalkan jelti max i tajlich xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, pos waw yabich u kwajat jelt xan tin kulbetnl ni tul, u kwajat jelt xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb.
Xin tajltsik tokotki xowa in kulbetnl nin tul, tokot in chalpmtsik xowa in kulbetnl nin tul; por xin tajltsik xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb, tokot in chalpmtsik xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb.

Max ki chalpm tokot ki tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, neech ku kale ban kibeltalb; por max ki tajl tokot xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb, neech ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani an kijidhtalb.
Xin chalpmtsik tokot kin taja xowa in kulbetnl nin tul, u kalelich in pojkl na Dios; pos yabtsik in l nibal in ejtowal kin taja xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
Jaxtm, xi kwajattsik tokot in tajl xowa in kulbetnlki nin tul, yab neech kin ejto kin tajatsik xowa in l na Dios.

Por tattsik yabich i kwajat xan tin kulbetnl na tul, i kwajatichtsik xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb, max nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios kwajatich kal tattsik. Xita yab in kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Kristo, yab u dhabalb kal na Kristo.

Por max na Kristo kwajatich kal tattsik, ni ejattal in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal abal u kwajbadhich alwa kal na Dios; por ni tul kwajat jelti max chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb.

Ani max nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, xin ejdha ti t na Jess, kwajat kal tattsik, jaychki jech na Dios neech kin pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal na tul xu chemel, kal tin kwentaki abal nin Tokat Ejattal kwajat kal tattsik.
Anchan p, kidhblbtsik, kool ku kwajay jelt xan tin l na Dios ani yab jelt xan tin kulbetnl ni tul.

Pos max tattsik tokot i kwajltsik jelt xan tin kulbetnl na tul, neech ki kaletsik ban kibeltalb, por max kal tin kwentaki an Tokat Ejattalb, ka jilatsik ka taja xowa in kulbetnl na tul, neech ka koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Ejtal xi kwajattsik taknl kal nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, u chakmlb kal na Dios.

Pos an Tokat Ejattalb xa bachmal, xi xo kwajat a tjontsaltsik, yab jaich abal ki kwajaytsik jun i jikl. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb ti tajl ki kwajch ta chakmlb kal na Dios. Jaxtm ti neech ki ejto ki kawidh ulu ench kal ni jun i jkib: “Tat tu Tta.”
Jech an Tokat Ejattalb in xalkantsal ni ejattal ke waw u chakmlb kal na Dios.

Max u chakmlbich kal na Dios, neech ki bachu xowa u bijtsidh neech ku pidhan. Neech ki bachu xowa in ulmal na Dios neech ti ku pidha ani neech ki koy xowa na Kristo in kool. Anchan neech ka tmun, max ki watna an yajtsiktalb jelti xin watna na Kristo ani max ki watna jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ki koy an labidh tokattalb jelti xin kool na Kristo.
Nan u chob ke an yajtsiktalb xi xo i achl, yab neech kin junu jelti an labidh tokattalb xi neech ku tejwamdhantsat tayl.
Ejtal xowa in tajmal na Dios xi kwajat walki ani chabl, in aytsm tajat kin bajaw xowki neech ka tejwamdhantsat an ti labidh tokattalb nin chakmiltsik na Dios.
Ejtal xowa na Dios in taja, jilkon jelti max yab xata ti alwa, por yab abal xowa xi tajadh, anchan tin lena. Anchan ti tjan kom na Dios anchan tin lena ani kom in chob ke tayl neech jun kin lejkiy.
Ejtal xowa tajadh kal na Dios, neech ka kldh abal yabich ka kwajay xon ti yab alwa ani abal kin bachu jeye an labidh tokattalb tam ka tejwamdhantsat tin labidh tokt nin chakmiltsik na Dios.
I chob alwa ke xowa na Dios in tajm, asta xo jelti max u ejl jelti tam jun i mmlb in achl i chukuxtalb tam nechich kin wachiy jun i chakam.

Anl weye waw, xi koolich an Tokat Ejattalb jelti jun i okxintsixtalb kal tin kwenta xowa neech ki bachu ms tayl, u ejl weye ti itsch. U kwajat i aytsm xowki na Dios neech tu kwajba tu okodh chakmlb kal Jaj ani anchan, tu kldhaich bin takixtal an walastalb.
Tam ti na Dios tu loo, i tuju ki aytsi xowa in ulmal neech ti ku pidha. Max ki chuch xowa i aytsal ki chuu, jant bl ku kwajay ki aytsm ki chuu?
Por max u kwajat i aytsm xowa yabl i chutal, i aytsm kal i kaymtalb.
An Tokat Ejattalb jaich xi tu tolmintsal an ti ejattal tam u l. Tam yab i chob xan ti ku lan, an Tokat Ejattalb jaich xi tu kontsintsal xowa i yntsal kal jun i kwintalb xi tokotki na Dios in exbayal.
Por na Dios, xi tu exlantsal an ti itsch, in chob xanty in ulal an Tokat Ejattalb. Pos an Tokat Ejattalb in kontsintsal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, xantiki tin kulbetnl na Dios.
I chob ke xita in kaknlich na Dios, ejtal xowa in tamwal, u tolmiyb kl abal ka likey ms nin itsch. Anchan u tmnal kal xita kanidhtsik xantiki tin lenmal na Dios.
Xita in okox takuy, in okox bijtsi abal ka kwajay jelti nin Chakmil Jesukristo. In taja anchan, abal jech na Jesukristo, ka kwajay ti jidhtal Chakmlb.

Xita nin takuy, jaich nin okox bijtsi abal ka kwajch jelti nin Chakmil ani xita nin takuy, in kwajba abal ka kwajch alwa kal Jaj. Ani xita in kwajba abal ka kwajch alwa kal Jaj, in pidha ti awiltalb abal kin bachutsik an labidh tokattalb.
Pos janty neech ki ulu kal jech tin kwenta? Max na Dios kwajat kal waw, jita neech kin ejto ti ku tajtsi xowa yab alwa?
Max na Dios yab in kanidha kin pidhna nin Chakmil abal ka chemdh kal waw ti kwenta, awxe yab neech ti ku pidha kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ejtal xowa i yntsal?
Jita kl ti neech ka walbiyat xi takudhtsik kal na Dios? Na Dios jaich nin ulal abal yab walbidhtsik;
jita neech ti walbix? Na Kristo jaich na chemech ani ejech ti t. Jaich xi kwajat tin ejt na Dios ani jaich jeye xi kwajat tu kawintsal.

Pos jita neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Kristo? Awxe neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Kristo an yajtsiktalb, an tepintalb, an odhbijixtalb, an kanab, an chojontltalb, an kakadhtalb, o an cheml?
An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Kal tatki ta kwenta u aytsmte kal an cheml putl a kts; u tajtsinal jelt xan tu tajtsinal an borregotsik tam u jnb xon tu chemdhb.
Por kal ejtal jech, i tmalich tu kwajat kal tin kwentaki na Kristo xi tu kanidhmal tajat.

Jaxtm, nan u chob alwa ke yab waach ni jun xata xi neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Dios. Nibal an cheml, nibal an xechintalb, nibal an tokat abatwletsik, nibal an ajtiklbtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki, nibal an chplbtsik, nibal xi xo, nibal xi tayl,
nibal xi tekat, nibal xi owtsik. Ni jun xata xowa tajadh kal a Dios neech kin ejto kin taja ke yab ku kwajay kn kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Tsubax in kw kom u bellich na Kristo ani yab in kambix; pos nu chalab, kom teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, tin ltsal abal tsubax xowa neech ku ulu.
In tepinal tajat tin kwajat ani echeki u achl i yajal tu itsch kal tin kwenta nu at kidhtal.
Pos asta nan u lak max in bijtsidh kin kale ban kibeltalb ani yabak ku bela na Kristo, max jech alwaak abal nu at kidhtaltsik.

An israelitatsik, xi jaich nu at kidhtaltsik, jaich xi kwajattsik ti chakmlb kal na Dios. Jaich jeye xi neech kin bachutsik an labidh tokattalb, an lejkintalb ani nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. An israelitatsik jaich punkuntsidh kin tjontsi na Dios ban at xon ti Jaj u kaknb ani jaich jeye xi usnktsik ke neech kin bachu xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna.

An okox ttalbtsik, u kidhtalb jeye kal an israelitatsik ani na Kristo, xi wachin jelt xan tu wachinal jun xita tech ti chabl, u kidhtalb jeye kal an okox ttalbtsik. Jech na Kristo, jaich na Dios xin takyal ejtal xowa waach, lbtajadh ti kwajat malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
Yab neech ki ejto ki ulu ke nin kwintal na Dios yab tjan xan tin ulal, pos yab ejtal xu wachinal ban israelitatsik u israelita.
Yab ejtal nin kidhtaltsik na Abraham u chakmlbtsik kal jaj; pos usnk kal na Dios ench: “Kal na Isk, yn tajat neech ka koy a kidhtaltsik.”
Jech tu tolmiyal ki exbay ke ni jun xita yab u chakmlb kal a Dios kal tin kwentaki an kidhtalb xon tu wachinal; u chakmlbtsik kal na Dios xita nu wachinal xantiki na Dios tin ulmal.
Pos xowa utsan na Abraham kal na Dios jaich jech: “Tam kin bajaw an kij, neech kin tsch ani na Sara, neech kin wachiy jun i chakam.”
Ani yab tokot jki jech. Chablam nin chakmil na Rebeka, u chakmlbtsik kal jnki tokot i inik xi jaich ni weje paklil Isk.

Tam ti xi jech chb an chakamtsik yabl wachink ti chakam ani nibal bl in tajltsik xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa, utsan ench na Rebeka kal na Dios: “Xi okox neech kin tjontsi xi tayl.” Jech anlki jeye tu kalel xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “U kanidha na Jakob, por u pojka na Esa.” Anchan, xalkanich abal na Dios in kool i awiltalb kin takuy xita Jaj in kulbetnl; xita Jaj in l kin kaniy ani yab in dhl ti kwenta xanty in tajmaltsik.
Pos janty neech ki ulu? Ke na Dios yab lujat? Yaba!
Pos utsan ench na Moiss kal na Dios: “Neech ku kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb xita Nan u l ku kontsi ani neech ku kontsi ti kaknaxtalb xita Nan u l ku kontsi.”
Anchan p, yab jaich abal wawki ki lena o ki taja i chplb, tokot na Dios xu kontsix ti yajnantsixtalb, jaich nin chob.
Pos ban Tokat Dhuslab, na Dios in utsa ench an pulek takix xi Ejipto: “Tu kwajbmal ta pulek takix abal ku xalka ba tat nu chp ani abal kin exlomn putlki an chabl.”
Jaxtm tu xalkanalich ke na Dios in kontsal ti yajnantsixtalb xita Jaj in l kin kontsi ani in chapikmdhantsal tin itsch xita in l kin chapikmdhantsi.
Por tm neech ti kin utsa ench: “Max anchan, jantki p tm na Dios tin walbiyal an iniktsik? Pos, jita neech kin ejto kin tomna na Dios?”
Por paylomlb! Janty teye a y abal ki kwajay ta kwlx kal a Dios? Awxe an pats neech kin ejto kin utsa ench xi kl ti tajadh?: “Jantki tin tajmal anchan?”
Pos an tojom in kool i awiltalb kin taja kal an kut xan ti jaj kin lena; neech kin ejto kin taja kal jachan an kut jun i pats xi exbadhki ti neech ti ynal ani jn, xi neech ti ynal echeki.
Ani jant max na Dios, abal kin xalka w an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna ani kin xalka nin chp, in kuxuy kal yantam i chaattalb xowa in tajl xin tomnltsik kin bachu an yajtsiktalb ani ka kibdhtsik?

Pos in taja anchan abal kin pidhna ka exlantsat tin publ nin labidh tokt, jelt xan ti tmun kal waw. Jaj tu kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ani tu tojojoy abal ki ejto weye ki bachu jachan an labidh tokattalb.
Jech xita na Dios in takwymal, jaich wawich, yab i judokitsik, in takwymal jeye xi yabtsik u judo.
Pos na Dios in ulal ench ban Tokat Dhuslab xin dhutsm na Osas: An atiklbtsik xi yabwiik u dhabal, neech ku ulu ke u dhabal; ani xi yabwiik u kanidhl, neech ku ulu ke u kanidhl.
Ani tyki xon ti utsantsik ench: “Tattsik yab i dhabalb kal Nan”, taja neech ki bijyattsik ta chakmlb kal na Dios xi ejat.
Por kal tin kwenta an israelitatsik, na Isaas in ulu ench: “Maske nin kidhtal an israelitatsik yn tajat jelti an kidhib xi waach ban pujal, tokot neech ka jilkon jun kwene xi neech ka lowat,
pos an Okxlb neech kin taja tech ban chabl xan tin ulmal, neech kin taja kidhat ani jikat.”
Jelt xan tin ulmal ms okox na Isaas ench: Max an Okxlb yabak tu jiltsmal ti kidhtaltsik, i tammalak weye jelt xan ti okodh kibdh an atiklbtsik xi Sodoma ani xi Gomorra.
Janty neech ki ulu? I ulal ke xi yabtsik u judo, xi yab in ayaltsik ka kwajbjichtsik alwa kal na Dios, in bajawtsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal.
Por an israelitatsik, xin wwnmaltsik jun i takixtalb xin chalpayaltsik ke kl ti neech ka kwajbtsik alwa kal na Dios, yab in bajawtsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios.

Jantki ti yab in bajawtsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios? Abal in ayaltsik ka kwajb alwa kal na Dios kal xowa in tajl ani yab abal u belom. In junwal jelti max tadhkun kal jun i tujub; jech xin junwal jelti an tujub, jaich na Kristo.
Ban Tokat Dhuslab kwajat dhutsadh ench: Neech ku kwajba Sin jun xita xin junwal jelti jun i tujub xu tadhkundhax ani u kwajlax; xita kl ti ka belan Jaj, yab neech ka tidhebdh.
Kidhblbtsik, xowa u l tu itsch ani xowa u kontsal na Dios kal tin kwenta an israelitatsik, jaich ke ka loeytsik jeye.
Nan u ulal ke jajtsik in l kin taja xan tin ulal na Dios, por yabtsik in tajl xan ti yejat.
Kom yabtsik in chob xan ti na Dios tu kwajbax alwa kal Jaj ani kom yabtsik in tajl xan ti na Dios tin ulal, jaxtm ti tokot in ayal jajkitsik xan ti ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
Ejtal xita kin bela na Kristo, u kwajbbich alwa kal na Dios ani yabich yejat kin taja xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Por kal tin kwenta abal jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal a Dios kal an takixtalbki, na Moiss in dhutsa ench: “Xita kin ejto kin taja ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb, neech ka kwajay alwa.”
Por kal tin kwenta abal jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki abal u belom, in ulal ench: “Yab ka ulu ench ta ejattal”, jita neech ka kadhiy walki abal kin utsa ka paay na Kristo?
O jita neech ka paay asta chaat xon ti kwajat an chemlomtsik abal kin utsa ka kale na Kristo?
Pos, janty p tm nin ulal? “An alwa tilab kunat ti kwajat, kunat ti kwajat ba na wi ani ba na itsch.” Jech an alwa tilab, jaich ni till abal ka belan.
Max ka ulu kal na wi ke na Jess jaich an Ajtiklb ani ka bela ta itsch ke na Dios in ejdhmal ti t tam ti chemdh, neech ki loey.
Pos kal ni itsch ti yejat ku belmch abal ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios ani kal ni wi ti yejat ki ulu ke na Jess jaich an Ajtiklb abal ku loch.
An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Ni jun xita xi kl ti ka belan yab neech ka tidhebdh.”
Pos na Dios yab in dhl ti kwenta max i judo o yaba; pos Jaj xu Ajtiklb kal ejtalki, alwa tajat kal xitakichki ti ka tawn.
“Ejtal xita kl ti ka tawn an Ajtiklb neech ka loey.”
Por, jan ti neech kin tawnatsik an Ajtiklb max yab in belmal? Jan ti neech kin bela max yab tiltsidhtsik? Jan ti neech kin achatsik an alwa tilab max yab waach xita kl ti ka tiltsintsik?
Ani jan ti neech ka kale jun xita kin tila an alwa tilab max yab ka aban? An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Kijidh tajat tam ka ulich jun xita xin tsidhl an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an kijidhtalb!”
Por yab ejtalki in bachwal an alwa tilab abal kin taja xan tin ulal, pos na Isaas in ulal ench: “Okxlb, jita in belm xowa i lnmal?”
Pos anchan, xowa i bell jaich xowa i achl, xowa i achl jaich in kwintal a Dios.

Por nan u konyal: Awxe yab in achmaltsik an tsubaxtalb? In achmaltsik! An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Nin kwintal an tiltsixtsik achatmenek putl an chabl ani nin tilbiltsik, in bajmal putlki xon ti kwajtsidh an chabl.

Por u konyal jun: Awxe an israelitatsik yabl in exbaymal? Por na Moiss in ulal ench tin jidhtal: Neech ku taja ki itixbtsik kal tin kwenta i atiklbtsik xi yab u takwymal; neech ku taja ki chakuytsik kal tin kwenta an atiklbtsik xi yab in exll nu kwintal.
Ani ms tayl, na Isaas in taja jeye kin ulu ench: Xi yab tin ayaltsik, tin ela; ani u xalka tub abal kin chutat kal xi yab xeech tin konwiyaltsik.
Por kal tin kwenta an israelitatsik, in ulu ench: “Putl a kts in kwajay tin tawnax an ti atiklbtsik xi yab u tajax ti kij ani u tomnax.”

Pos xo u ulal ench: Awxe na Dios in okodh pojkmalich an israelitatsik, an atiklbtsik xi Jaj in takwymal? Yaba! Pos nan in israelita neye, u kidhtal na Abraham ani in kidhtalb kal nin kidhtaltsik na Benjamn.

Na Dios yab in okodh pojkmal an israelitatsik. Jech an israelitatsik, jaich xi Jaj in okox takwymal. Yabxe a chobtsik xanty in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab kal tin kwenta an tiltsix Elas, tam ti jaj in lna ba na Dios, an israelitatsik? Ench tin utsa na Dios:
“Okxlb, an israelitatsik in chemdhmal na tiltsxiltsik ani in pakmal xon ta kwajbantsb an ti pikbantsixtalb; tokotich nan in jilkonal ani in lenb neye kin chemdh.”
Por tkoyat ench kal na Dios: “U plmdhmalich abal Nan buk mil i iniktsik xi yab tudhenektsik abal kin kakna nin chilbil an dios Baal.”
Anlki jeye xo jech i kij jilkonk jun kwene an israelitatsik xin takwymal na Dios kal nin alwatal.
Ani max takudh kal tin kwentaki nin alwatal na Dios, yabich jaich tin kwenta kal xowa jn in tajl; pos max anchanak, nin alwatal na Dios, yabich tm u kalel i alwatalb.
Pos janty neech ki ulu? Yab ejtal an israelitatsik in bajaw ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios, tokot in bajawtsik ka kwajat alwa kal na Dios, xi takudh. Xi keettsik chapikmdhantsattsik tin itsch,

jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Pidhantsik kal na Dios tin ejattal xi yab tajat xata in exbayal, tin wal xi jelti max yab u chuux ani tin xuchun xi jelti max yab u ochox. Asta xo, anchan ti kwajattsik.”
Na Dabid in ulal ench: Ke nin ajbaltsik ka wenkon jelti paltsixtalb, ani jelti max ka tadhkuntsik kl ani taja kin bachutsik nin jalbl nin walab.
Ka kwajaytsik jelti max jokolbdhats abal yab ka chuxin ani ka ktandhatsik abal echekijich.

Pos xo u ulal ench: Awxe tam ti an israelitatsik in chikat taja na Dios, okodh pojktsik kal na Dios? Yaba! Por kal tin kwentaki nin walab, lowat xi yabtsik u judo abal an israelitatsik kin lena jeye ka lowat.

Kal tin kwentaki nin walab an judotsik, lowat an atiklbtsik xi putl an kayl. Ani tam ti pojk an judotsik kal na Dios, lowat xi yabtsik u judo. Jaxtm, tam ka bachwat jun an judotsik kal na Dios, ms plek an lbtajaxtalb neech kin bachu an atiklbtsik.
Neech tu utsatsik jun xata tattsik xi yabtsik i judo: Nan in kwajat tin abatwle abal xi yabtsik u judo ani in tojnal chapik abal ku taja jech an tojlb.
Anchan tu tajl abal nu at kidhtaltsik kin lena jeye ka lowattsik, jelt xan ti tattsik i loodh.

Pos max tam ti pojk an judotsik kal na Dios, kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios an atiklbtsik xi putl an kayl, janty neech ka tmun tam an judotsik ka bachwattsik jun? Neech ka pidhantsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xi kwajattsik jelti max chemnek.
Max an jidhtal pan xu tajnal jaich abal a Dios, ejtal an xokadh cheedh trigo, jaich jeye abal Jaj. Ani max an iblab jaich abal a Dios, ejtal an kwelek, jaich jeye abal Jaj.

An judotsik, in junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo ani xi yabtsik u judo, in junwal jelti nin kwel an dhimaln olibo. Taltsik an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, wkoyat ani tat, xa junwal jelti nin kwel an dhimaln olibo, i chatan xon ti jajtsik wkoyat. Anchan, a bajawtsik ki kwajay teykmte kal nin ibl ani nin xichl an lej olibo.
Yab ka ulu ke tattsik ms i alwa ke an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo. Yab ka ulutsik anchan, pos yab tattsik a teykm nin ibl jachan an lej olibo, tattsik ni teykmte kl.
Neech xna ka ulu ench: “Ani kejle, por an kwelabtsik takyat abal kin chatan nan ba jachan an lej olibo.”

Ani kejle; por an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, wkoyattsik abal yab u belom ani tattsik, i chatan xon ti jajtsik wkoyat kal tin kwentaki abal i belom. Yab ka tekatsik tab abal anchan, tokot ka koytsik i kwenta.
Pos max na Dios yab in pakwlantsi an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, yab teye neech ti ki pakwlantsitsik.

Na Dios i alwa inik tajat, por chapik jeye tajat u tawnax. Chapik tajat in tawnl an judotsik xin jila ti belom; por kal tattsik, alwa inik tajat max ka ntsi ki kwajay bin alwatal, max yab ka ntsi ki kwajay bin alwatal, neech teye ki wkoyat.
Max ka belmchtsik jun an judotsik, neechtsik jun ka chatan xon ti wkodh; pos na Dios in kool i awiltalb abal kin chatatsik jun xon ti wkodh.

Tattsik xi yab i judo, xa junwal jelti nin kwel an dhimaln olibo, na Dios ti chata ban lej olibo maske yab in tomnl. Max na Dios in taja anchan kal tattsik, an judotsik xin junwal jelti nin kwel an lej olibo, ms ja in tomnl ka chatan ban lej olibo.

Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik xowa na Dios in koolwiik yab tejwa abal yab ka ulu ke tattsik i chalpadh tajat: na Dios in chapikmdhantsi tin itsch taltsik an israelitatsik, por yab abal echeki, tokot asta tam ka loch xi yab u israelitatsik xi kwajat takudh abal ka loey.

Tayl, tam ka loch xi yab u israelitatsik xi kwajat takudh abal ka loey, ejtal an israelitatsik neech ka lowat; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Ban bitsow Sin ti neech ka tsch an Loox. Neech kin wkontsi ejtal an ti walastalb nin kidhtaltsik na Jakob.
Ani jech jaich an lejkintalb xi neech ku koy kal jajtsik, tam Nan ku wkontsi an tin walastalbiltsik.

An israelitatsik in pojkl an alwa tilab ani anchan in pojklich na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta. Por u kanidhbtsik kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin weje pakliltsik xi takudh kal na Dios abal ka dhabalntsik kal Jaj.
Pos xowa na Dios in pidhnl, yab in kniyal ani yab in jalkuyal nin chalab tam kin takuy jun xita abal kin dhabalnaich.
Ti wel chabki a chikat tajltsik na Dios, por xo, i kontsidhichtsik ti yajnantsixtalb kal tin kwenta abal an israelitatsik in chikat taja na Dios.
Anchan jeye xo, an israelitatsik in chikat tajmal na Dios abal kal tin kwentaki an yajnantsixtalb xi kontsattsik, ka kontsattsik jeye.
Pos na Dios in walka ke ejtal ka chikat tajxin abal kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ejtalkitsik.
Yn tajat nin alwatal na Dios ani nin chalpadhtal! Na Dios xowakichki in exbayal. Yab i ejtowal ki wila xowa Jaj in ulal, nibal i ejtowal ki exbantsi xowa in tajl.
Pos, “jita in exbantsmal xowa in chalpayal an Okxlb? O jita kl ti takidh?
Jita in pidhmal okox jun xata an Okxlb abal tayl ka pidhan jun xata jelti jun i jalbintsixtalb?”
Pos ejtal xowakich ba Dios ti tl, kal Jaj ti tajadh ani abal Jaj. Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy na Dios malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhl kal tin yajnantsixtal na Dios abal ka pidhnatsik tab jelti jun i pikbantsixtalb xi ejat ani tokat, xan tin kulbetnl na Dios. Jech jaich an tsubax kaknaxtalb.

Yabich ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tu kwajl xi yab u belom; ka jalkchtsik na xechintal kal tin kwentaki abal i tmdhantsidhich an ta chalab. Anchan neech tm ka bajawtsik ka chuu alwa xowa j in l na Dios, xowa in kulbetnl ani xowa lujat.

Kal an punkuntsixtalb xi tin pidhmal na Dios kal nin alwatal, tu utsltsik ke ni jun xita yab yejat kin teka tinb, tokot ka kwajay xan ti yejat. Ms alwa ke juntsik ta b ka ynatsik an alwa chalab, xantiki ta pidhnktsik ki belmch kal na Dios.
Pos anchan jelti ni tul yn i pejetsik in kool ani keetich keetich xanty in tajl,
anchan weye waw, maske yn tu b, jun tokot tu ynal jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo. Juntsik tu b i junwal jelti jun peje nin tul na Kristo.

Na Dios tu pidhmal ti awiltalb juntsik tu b, xantiki Jaj tin lenmal kal nin alwatal, por yejat ki yna alwa xowa tu pidhmal. Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb kal na Dios ti tiltsix, kin taja jech an tojlb xantiki ti pidhnk kin bela.
Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti tjontsix, ka tjontsixin alwa; xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti oktsix, ka oktsixin alwa.

Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti takix, ka takxin xan ti yejat; xita in pidhnl xata, kin taja kal yantam i kulbtalb. Xita pidhnk ti awiltalb ti oklek belomtsik, yejat kin taja kal yantam i kwenta ani xita pidhnk ti awiltalb kin tolmiy an chojontltsik, kin taja kal yantam i kulbtalb.
Yab ki kndhxintsik eb itschki. Yab ka tajltsik xowa yab alwa, tokot ka tajltsik xowa alwa.
Ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn jelt xan ti yejat ka kndhxin xin bellichtsik na Kristo. Kal tin kwenta an kknxtalb, ki kknxintsik jn ani jn xan ti yejat.
Ka tajltsik xowa yejat ka taja, yab ka betna. Ka tjontsaltsik an Ajtiklb kal yantam a ejattal.
Ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal tin kwenta an aytsixtalb xa kooltsik; ka kuxyal kal i chaattalb xowakichki an yajtsiktalb ka tamu ani ki lantsik echeki.
Ka tolmiyal an belomtsik kal xowa in yntsal; ka bachwaltsik alwa xita u ulel ti ki lna.
Ka lbtajltsik xi ti atl. Ki lbtajxintsik ani yab ki odhbijxintsik.
Ki kulbtsik teye kal xu kulbltsik ani ki ukintsik teye kal xu uknaltsik.
Ka koytsik junini na chalab jn ani jn. Yab ka tekltsik tab, ki junkuntsik kal xi chojontltsik. Yab ka wyna ke i chalpadhtsik tajat.
Max jun xita ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa, yab ka witsbantsi. Ka tajtsal echeki xowa alwa an atiklbtsik.
Ka tajltsik an chplb asta xon ti ka ejto abal ki kwajay kijidh kal ejtalkitsik.

Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, max jun xita ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa, yab ka witsbantsi, ka jila abal ka pidhan an ti kakadh yajtsiktalb kal na Dios; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Nan u lujyal tin ljundhax, Nan neech ku pidha xowa in lujyal kin bachu. Anchan in ulal an Okxlb.”
Ani in ulal jeye ench: “Max xi ti atl, ka kaay, ka kapundha; ani max ka tsikey, ka pidha ti ja kin ucha. Pos max ka taja anchan, neech ka tidhebdha tajat.”
Yab ka walka ki t kal xowa yab alwa, ka ta xi yab alwa kal xowa alwa.
Ni jun xita yab yejat kin chikat tajl an awiltalbtsik. Pos yab waach ni jun i awiltalb xi yab kal a Dios ti kwajbadh; ejtal an awiltalbtsik xi waach, kal a Dios ti kwajbadh.
Jaxtm, xita kin tomna an awiltalb, u kalelich in tomnl na Dios. Ani xu tomnaxtsik, jajich in ayal xan ti kin walbindha tinb.

Xita in tajl xowa alwa, yab in chejnl an awiltalbtsik; por xita in tajl xowa yab alwa, in chejnl an awiltalbtsik. Max yab a l ka chejna an awiltalbtsik, ka tajl xowa alwa. Anchan, neech tm ki chutat kal an awiltalbtsik ke i alwa inik.

Pos an awiltalbtsik kwajat in tjontsal na Dios abal tattsik ta alwabl. Por max a tajl xowa yab alwa, ka chejna; pos yab aniki tin kool an awiltalb abal ti ki yajlombdha. Pos jajtsik kwajat in tjontsal a Dios abal kin ljundha ani kin yajlombdha xin walltsik.
Jaxtm, yejat ki exbantsal xowa kin ulu an awiltalbtsik, yab abal yabki ku yajlombdh, ki taja anchan abal yab ki acha ke u walbidh.
Jaich jeye kal jech tin kwenta ta pidhnltsik an jalbixtalbtsik, pos an awiltalbtsik kwajat in tjontsal a Dios ani jaich jech nin tojlbiltsik.
Ka pidha an awiltalbtsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu. Ka pidhl ti jalbixtalb an awiltalbtsik, xin lujyal kin bachu i jalbixtalb; ka kaknl jeye an awiltalbtsik xan ti yejat ka kakn.
Yab ki kwajay a jntsal ni jun xita, tokot yejat ki kwajay i kndhx jn ani jn; pos xita in kanidhl xi keet, in tajlich xan tin ulal an takixtalb.

Jech an takixtalb in ulal ench: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal, yab ki chemdhaxin, yab ki kwlch, yab ka jantsi ti kw ni jun xita, nibal ka ltendha xowa a chutal in kool keet”; pos jech ani xi keet jeye an takixtalb, tokot enchki tu exbayb: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.”
Xita in kanidhl xi keet, yab in tajtsal xowa yab alwa; jaxtm, xita in kanidhl xi keet, in tajlich xan tin ulal an takixtalb.
Ka tajatsik ejtal jech a chalpm ke u kunelich xowki ti neech ka tsch na Kristo. Yabich ki kwajaytsik jelti max i wayal, pos ms xo kunatich ti kwajat an loeltalb k tam tu belmch.

Xo exomich tajat ti kunel an kij jelti max akalich tajat tu kwajat ani jelti max nechich ka tsudhch, kom nechich ka tsch na Kristo. Jaxtm ti yejatich ki jila ki taja xowa yab alwa ani ki tajaich xowa alwa.
Ku xechin alwa, xan ti yejat ku xechin. Yab ki bela tu ajblom nibal tu uchl. Yab ku junkun kal xi yab i tomtal nibal ki taja xowaki i kulbetnl. Yab ku kwajay tu pjx nibal tu tx.
Tokot, ku kwajay u mkmte kal ni Ajtik Jesukristo jelti max Jaj u xeketlb ani yab ki chalpm ki taja xowaki in kulbetnl ni tul.
Max jun xita yabl u lej belom, ka bachutsik ani yab ki kwajay ka kwlxnatsik xata.
Waach taltsik xin chalpayal ke alwa ka kapat kidhat; por waach taltsik xi yabtsik u lej belom, xi tokot in kapal i akwl.
Xita in kapal kidhat, yab yejat kin pojka xi yab in kapal kidhat ani xi yab in kapal kidhat, yab jeye yejat kin lbna xin kapal kidhat, pos na Dios in bachmalich chablamki.

Pos tat janty a y abal ki kwajay ka lbna xi kwajat in tjontsal jun xita? Max kin taja xowa alwa o xowa yab alwa, yab tat a kwenta, in kwenta xi kwajat in tjontsal. Por yab neech kin taja xowa yab alwa, pos an Ajtiklb in kool i awiltalb abal kin tolmiy kin taja xowa alwa.
Waach taltsik xin ulal ke waach taltsik a kts ms uluts ke xi keet ani waach jeye taltsik xin ulal ke jaychki ejtal na ktstsik. Juntsik tu b yejat ki chobna alwa max alwaich xan ti chalpayal.

Xin pakwlantsal taltsik a kts, in tajl abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb ani xin ulal ke jaychki ejtal na ktstsik, in tajl jeye abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb. Xita u kapul, in tajl abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb, pos in pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani xita yab u kapul, in tajl jeye abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb, pos in pidhl jeye ti jalbintsixtalb an Ajtiklb.
Ni jun xita xi waw yab kwajat ejat abal jajki in l ka kwajay ejat ani ni jun xita yab u chemel, abal jajki in l ka chemech.
Pos max u kwajat ejat, u ejat abal an Ajtiklb ani max ku chemech, u chemel abal an Ajtiklb. Anchan p, max u kwajat ejat o u chemnek, u dhabalb kal an Ajtiklb.
Na Kristo chemech ani ejech jun abal ka kwajay ti Ajtiklb kal xi chemnektsik ani kal xi ejattsik.
Por tat, jantki ta lbnl na at kidhb? O jantki ta pojkl? Pos ejtal neech ku utey xon ti na Kristo neech ti ljundhom.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Anchan jelt xan ti Nan in kwajat ejat abal echeki, tsubax u ulal ke ejtal an atiklbtsik neech ka tudhlan tu tamt ani ejtal neech kin ulutsik ke Nanich nin Dios.
Anchan p, juntsik tu b neech ki ltsi na Dios xanty i tajmal.
Jaxtm, yabich yejat ku lbnxin jn ani jn. Tokot, ki aliy xan ti ki uwa abal yab ki taja ka walbin ni at kidhb.
Nan u chob alwa tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess, ke yab waach ni jun xata atax. Xita xin chalpayal ke atax jun xata, atax abal jaj.

Por max kal tin kwenta xowa a kapal, a tepindhl na at kidhb, tm, u kalelich jelti max yab a kanidhl. Yab ka taja ke kal tin kwentaki xowa a kapal, kin jila ti belom jun xita xi loodhich tam ti chemech na Kristo.
Yab p ki taja ka tilan yab alwa an walkadhtalb xi kool abal i bellich na Kristo.

Pos xon tu takix na Dios, yab u dhb ti kwenta xanty u kapnal o xanty u uxnal. Xon tu takix na Dios tokot u dhb ti kwenta an lujattalb, an kijidhtalb ani an kulbtalb xi kool kal tin kwenta an Tokat Ejattalb.
Xita in tjontsal anchan na Kristo, in tajlich xowa in l na Dios ani u kldhb ti alwa kal an atiklbtsik.
Anchan p, ki ntsi ki taja xowa tu tolmiyal abal ku kwajay kijidh ani anchan, ku tlmxin jn ani jn abal ku belmch ms.
Yab ki odhiy xowa in tajl na Dios kal tin kwentaki xowa i kapal. Tsubax kejle ke ejtal an kapnl, tokat; por xowa yab alwa, jaich tam ki kapu jun xata ani ki taja kl kin jila ti belom xi keettsik.
Ms alwa yab ki kapu i tulek, nibal ki ucha i yajtsik uxnl, abal yab ki itixbdha kl, nibal ki taja kin weka ti belom o kin jila ti belom ni at kidhb.
Max a bell ke alwa xowa a tajl, anchan ti ka bela tin tamt na Dios. Kijidh tajat abal jun xita xi yab in walbindhl tinb kal tin kwenta xowa in tajl!
Por xita xin kapal jun xata ani u jilkonal ti chalpax, jajki in walbindhl tinb abal yab tsububudh in itsch tin kapal. Ejtal xowa ki taja yab tsububudh i itsch, walats.
Max u belomich lejtal tajat, yejat ki tolmiy an kidhblbtsik xi yab u lej belom ani yab ki tajl xowa wawki i kulbetnl.
Juntsik tu b xi waw, yejat ki tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni at kidhb ani anchan, ki tolmiy ka belmch ms.
Pos nibal na Kristo yab in taja xowa Jajki in l; yab in taja anchan, tokot in tamu jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Nin odhbijixtal xi ti odhbijyaltsik, Nan u bachu.”
Pos ejtal xowa dhutsadh ms okox ban Tokat Dhuslab, dhutsan abal ki chobna. Ani kal tin kwenta an chaattalb ani an kijidhtalb xi ell ban Tokat Dhuslab, ki koy i aytsixtalb.
Ke na Dios, xin pidhnl an chaattalb ani an kijidhtalb, ti ki tolmiytsik abal ki kwajay alwa jn ani jn jelt xan tin l na Kristo Jess.
Ani anchan, ejtal junini, kal jnki tokot i kwintalb ka ajtintsitsik na Dios nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Anchan p, ku bchxin jn ani jn, jelt xan ti na Kristo tu bachmal, max ki taja anchan, neech tm ka pubdhantsat tin bij na Dios.
Pos xowa nan u ulal, jaich ke na Kristo tsch abal kin tjontsi an judotsik ani ka tjan xan ti usnk ni weje pakliltsik ani abal ka xalkan jeye ke na Dios tsubax xowa in ulal.

Tsinek jeye abal kin taja ke xi yab i judotsik kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin yajnantsixtalbil, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Neech tu tila ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo ani neech ku ajatna i ajatlbtsik abal tat ta alwabl.
Ani pl in ulal jeye ench: Ki kulb atiklbtsik xi yab i judo, kal xu dhabalbtsik kal na Dios.
Ani pl in ulal jun ench: Ka kakn an Okxlb kal ejtal xi yabtsik u judo ani ka pubdhantsat tin bij kal ejtal an atiklbtsik.

Na Isaas in dhutsmal jeye ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: Neech ka wachin jun xita xu kidhtalb kal na Isa, neech ka kwajay ti Pulek Takix kal an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo; jajtsik neech kin koy an aytsixtalb kom neech ka lowattsik kal Jaj.

Na Dios, xi tu tajl ki koy an aytsixtalb abal ki bachu xowa in ulmal neech ti ku pidha, ti ki pidhatsik tajat ti kulbtalb ani ti kijidhtalb abal i belomich. Anchan neech ka koytsik ms i aytsixtalb kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
Kidhblbtsik, u chob alwa ke i alwa inikichtsik tajat, i chalpadhichtsik tajat ani neech ka ejtch ki tkxin jn ani jn.

Ba jech an w xi tu dhutsuntsaltsik, tu dhutsuntsmal taltsik an takixtalbtsik kal yantam i tsubaxtalb ani yab tu chintsmaltsik ni jun xata. U taja anchan abal yab ka uktsitsik xowa tu oktsmal. Jech u tajl kal tin kwenta nin punkuntsixtal na Dios xi tin pidhmal kal nin alwatal

abal ku tjontsi na Jesukristo ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo. An tojlb xu tajl, jaich ku tiltsi an tin alwa tilbil na Dios xi yabtsik u judo. Jech u tajl abal ku ututsik ba na Dios xi yabtsik u judo jelti jun i pikbantsixtalb xi Jaj kin kulbetna, xi tokodh kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Abal u bellich na Kristo Jess u kool tajat xantokl ti kin kulb abal in kwajat u tjontsal na Dios,
pos tokot u l ku tila xan ti na Kristo tin ynmal abal kin taja jeye xowa in l na Dios xi yabtsik u judo. Jech tjan kal xowa u ulmal ani xowa u tajmal,

kal an pakdha exl ani an labidh labandhaxtalbtsik xu taja kal tin kwentaki nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Anchan tu tila putlki nin alwa tilbil na Kristo, u tuju Jerusaln ani u bajaw asta ban chabl xi Ilriko.
Anchan tin xechin ku tila an alwa tilab xon ti yabl jayki tiladh na Kristo abal yab kin xechin tin oktsix xon ti oktsixnkich keet.
Yab u taja anchan, u taja jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: Neech ka chutat kal xi yab jayki usnktsik xata kal tin kwenta na Kristo; ani neech ka exl kal xi yab jayki in achmal ti tilnal.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti yab u ejtmal kin kale tu lnatsik, maske ynlich tajat u lenmal kin kale.
Por xo, kom u okch nu tojlbil ba jech an chabltsik ani kom ynich tajat i tamub tin exl kin kale tu lnatsik,
neech ku chuu max ku ejto kin watey tu lnatsik tam kin kale Espanya. Ani tam tu chuchtsik, u lak max ti kin tolmiytsik abal kin kale na Espanya.
Por xo in neech Jerusaln, u nedhl w i tolmixtalb abal an kidhblbtsik xi taja.
Pos an kidhblbtsik xi Masedonia ani Akaya, in chalpaymaltsik kin junku i tolmixtalb abal kin abtsi an kidhblbtsik xi chojontl xu kwajltsik Jerusaln.
Jajtsik in chalpaymal abal alwa kin tajatsik jech; ani alwa tajat, pos in tomnl xna kejle kin tolmiy kal xowa in yntsaltsik jelt xan ti jajtsik xi yabtsik u judo, tolmiyat ka belmch.
Jaxtm, tam ku pidhnaich jech an tolmixtalb xin punkuntsidh ku akiy, neech ku ntsi an bl abal Espanya, por okox neech kin watey tu lnatsik.
Nan u chob alwa ke tam kin ulich tachan, neech tajat ki bachu an lbtajaxtalb kal tin kwenta nin alwa tilbil na Kristo.
Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani kal tin kanidhaxtal an Tokat Ejattalb, ki lantsik teye kal nan abal ki kontsi na Dios ti kin tolmiy.
Ka kontsitsik na Dios abal ti kin loo kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom xu kwajltsik Judea. Ani ke jech an tolmixtalb xu nedhantsal an kidhblbtsik xi Jerusaln, ka bachwat alwa.
Max na Dios anchan tin l, neech kin ulich kijidh ani neech kin koych tachan kal tattsik.
Ke na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik. Anchan ka tjan.
Tu punkuntsaltsik ka bachu ani ka tolmiy an kidhblb xin bij Febe. Jech an mmlb, kwajat in tjontsal an belomtsik xu kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Senkrea.

Ka bachutsik tin bij an Ajtiklb, jelt xan ti yejat ka bachwat kal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Ka tolmiytsik kal xowakich kin yntsi, pos jaj ynich tajat xita in tolmiymal, asta nan neye tin tolmiymal.
Ka chapndhatsik na Prisila ani na Akila, xi tin tolmiyaltsik ku tjontsi na Kristo Jess.
Jajtsik yab in ajymal tinb abal ti kin tolmiy; jaxtm tu pidhltsik ti jalbintsixtalb. Yab tokot nanki, u pidhnal jeye ti jalbintsixtalb kal ejtal an kidhblbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.

Ka chapndhatsik jeye an kidhblbtsik xu junkunal bin kim na Prisila ani na Akila. Ti kin chapndhantsi an ta Epeneto, an kidhblb xu kanidhl tajat. Jech an kidhblb u kwajl ban bitsow xin bij Akaya ani jaich xin jidhtal tajat in bela na Kristo.
Ka chapndha na Mara, xi tjnkich tajat kal tattsik.
Ka chapndhatsik nu at kidhtaltsik xin bij ta Andrniko ani ta Junias, xu kwajinek junax ban wikaxte. Jajtsik u kanidhbtsik tajat, u abatwletsik ani okox tin belmaltsik na Kristo k nan.
Ka chapndha na Amplias, an kidhblb xu kanidhl tajat abal in bellich an Ajtiklb.
Ka chapndha na Urbano, an kidhblb xi tu tolmiyal ki tjontsi na Kristo Jess ani na Estakis jeye, an kidhblb xu kanidhl tajat.
Ka chapndha na Apeles, xi tsubax lejtal tin bell na Kristo. Ka chapndhatsik jeye nin kidhtaltsik na Aristbulo.
Ka chapndha nu at kidhtal xin bij ta Erodin. Ka chapndhatsik jeye nin kidhtaltsik na Narsiso xin bellichtsik an Ajtiklb.
Ka chapndhatsik na Trifena ani na Trifosa, xi kwajat in tjontsaltsik chapik an Ajtiklb. Ka chapndha an kidhblb Prsida, an mmlb xin tjontsmalich tajat an Ajtiklb.
Ka chapndha na Rufo, an kidhblb xi takudh abal kin bela an Ajtiklb. Ka chapndha jeye nin nna, xi kwajat jelti max u nna neye.
Ka chapndhatsik na Asnkrito, na Flegonte, na Ermas, na Patrobas, na Ermes ani an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat kal jajtsik.
Ka chapndhatsik na Fillogo, na Julia, na Nereo ani nin ixm; ka chapndha jeye na Olimpas ani ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios xi kwajat kal jajtsik.
Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb. Ejtal xin bellichtsik na Kristo, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb.
Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhl abal ka chuutsik xitam j nin tajltsik i kxtalb ani in tajl ke taltsik kin jila kin bela an tsubaxtalb xi tattsik i oktsidh. Yab ki junkun kal xin tajltsik anchan,
pos jech an atiklbtsik yab kwajat in tjontsal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Jajtsik tokot in tajl xowa jajki in kulbetnltsik ani in kambiyaltsik kal i labidh tilab an atiklbtsik xi yab u lej belom.
Kal ejtal ti chobte ke a tajltsik xan tin ulal nin kwintal na Dios; jaxtm tin kulbl ani u l ku chuu ka witatsik ms ka taja xowa alwa ani yab, xowa yab alwa.
Na Dios neech ti ki tolmiytsik abal ka okodh ta an lej atax. Jech na Dios, jaich nin pidhnl an kijidhtalb. Ka bachutsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Ti abtsal ti chapndhomtalb na Timoteo, an kidhblb xi tin tolmiyal kal jech an tojlb. Ti chapndhltsik jeye nu at kidhtal xin bij ta Lusio, na Jasn ani na Sospater.
Nan, xu bij Tersio, xin kwajbadh ku dhutsa jech an w, tu abtsal neye ti chapndhomtalb tin bij an Ajtiklb.

Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb an kidhblb xin bij Gayo. Jech na Gayo, jaich xi tin matintsmal jun i alt xon ti kin koych ani jaich jeye xin matintsal ti alt an kidhblbtsik tam u junkunal. Ti chapndhltsik jeye na Erasto, xin kool an punkuntsixtalb ti tapax tumn ba jech an bitsow. Ti chapndhltsik jeye an kidhblb xin bij Kwarto.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.

Ani xo, ki pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios, xin ejtowal ti ki likedhantsitsik ta itsch abal yab ka jilatsik ta belom, jelt xan tin ulal an alwa tilab xi nan u lnl ani an tiltsixtalb kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo. Jech an alwa tilab, jaich xi na Dios in koolwiik chinat asta ti weje.

Por xo in pidhnmalich ka chobn kal an Tokat Dhuslab xin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik xantiki ti utsan kal na Dios xi kwajat ejat malill i kij. Jech xowa na Dios in koolwiik chinat, pidhnatsich xo ka chobn abal ejtalki an atiklbtsik kin bela ani kin taja xan tin ulal jech an alwa tilab.
Ke na Dios, xi junkax ani chalpadh, kin koy an labidh tokattalb malill i kij kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo! Anchan ka tjan.
Nan, xu bij Pablo, in takudh abal kin kwajay tin abatwle kal na Jesukristo. Tin takuy na Dios kom Jaj anchan tin lena.

Nan ani an kidhblb Sstenes, i dhutsuntsal jech an ti w xu kwajltsik Korinto xin bellich na Dios. Jechtsik u dhabalbich kal na Dios abal kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo Jess. Takudhichtsik kal na Dios abal ka kwajch tokat junax kal ejtal xi kwajattsik tki tki xin tawnltsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Jech na Jesukristo jaich ni Ajtik ani in Ajtiktsik jeye.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Echeki u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta ani kal tin kwenta jeye an lbtajaxtalb xi ti pidhltsik. Jech an lbtajaxtalb, ti pidhltsik na Dios kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess.

Pos abal i kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo Jess, na Dios ti pidhmalichtsik xowakichki ti alwatalb. Na Dios ti pidhmaltsik ti awiltalb abal ka ejtotsik ka exbantsi alwa an tin kwintal ani abal ka ejtotsik ka wila.
Anchan p, xowa u tilnal kal tin kwenta na Kristo, xalkankich ba tattsik abal tsubax.
Jaxtm ti ejtal a ejtowaltsik ka taja xowa in l na Dios. Jaich ka tajltsik lejat i kwajat a aytsm kin bajaw xowki ti neech ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Jaj jaich xi neech ti ki kontsitsik junini an ta chalab asta tin okontal an kij abal yab xita ti ki walbindha kal ni jun xata tam ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Na Dios echeki in tajl xowa kin ulu. Jaj jaich xi ti kanymaltsik abal ki kwajch junax kal nin Chakmil Jesukristo, xi jaich ni Ajtik.
Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo abal ka koytsik junini na chalab ani yab ki kwajay ta kxtsik. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, tokot ka koytsik juniniki na chalab.
Kidhblbtsik, u ulal jech kom tin tiltsmal xu kwajltsik bin kim na Klo ke a kyaltsik tajat i kxtalb.

Kal jech u l ku ulu, ke juntsik ta b keetich keetich xowa a ulaltsik; taltsik in ulal ench: “Nan u wwnl a Pablo”; taltsik in ulal: “Nan u wwnl a Apolos”; xi keettsik in ulal: “Nan u wwnl a Pedro”; ani xi keettsik in ulal: “Nan u wwnl a Kristo.”
Awxe peje ti peje ti kwajat na Kristo? Awxe pajkiyat na Pablo ban peltsidh te abal tattsik ta alwabl? O i pujadhtsikxe tin bij na Pablo?
U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, ke nan yab u pujymal ni jun xita xi tattsik, tokot u pujymal na Krispo ani na Gayo;
pos anchan, yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke pujadh kal nan tu bij.
U pujymaltsik jeye nin kidhtaltsik na Estfanas, por yab u chalpayal max u pujymal jun xita ms.
Pos na Kristo yab tin abmal tin pjal. Tin abmal abal ku tila an alwa tilab, por yab kal i chalab xi techki ti kayl abal yab ka kale yab xata in jalbl an cheml xin watna na Kristo ban peltsidh te.

An atiklbtsik xi neech ban kibeltalb, in achltsik jelti max i tntotalb an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta nin chemtal na Kristo ban peltsidh te; por abal waw xu loenekich, i chobich ke jech an tsubaxtalb, in chp a Dios.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Neech ku kibdhantsi tin chalpadhtal an chalpadhtsik, ani neech ku taxkantsi tin witomtal an witomtsik.

Jn xo ti kwajat an chalpadhtsik? Jn xo ti kwajat xin willtsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Jn xo ti kwajat xin witltsik kin kwlxna xowakichki xi tech ti kayl? Yabxe ojtsidh kal na Dios tin chalab an chalpadhtsik xi tech ti kayl?

Na Dios, xin chob xanty in tajl, yab in walka ka exl kal xi techtsik ti kayl kal jajkitsik tin kwetm chalab. Xowa Jaj in lena, jaich kin loo an belomtsik kal tin kwentaki nin chemtal na Kristo, maske jech xowa in taja na Dios, u chutb jelti jun i tntotalb.
An judotsik in l kin chuu i labidh exltsik ani an griegotsik in ayal i chalpadhtalb;
por waw i till a Kristo, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Abal an judotsik, jech jaich jelti jun i tamkuntalb abal yab ka loeytsik ani abal an griegotsik, in achl jelti jun i tntotalb.
Por abal xi takudhtsik kal na Dios, i judotsik o i griegotsik, na Kristo jaich nin chp ani nin chalpadhtal na Dios.
Pos xowa an iniktsik in chutal jelt in tonto chalbil a Dios, ms ja tekat an chalab k in chalab an iniktsik; ani xowa in chutaltsik yab likat, ms ja likat k nin chp an iniktsik.
Kidhblbtsik, yejat ka exbaytsik ke na Dios ti takwymaltsik maske w tajat xi chalpadhtsik, jelt xan tin ulal xi yabtsik u belom. W jeye xin kooltsik i awiltalb o u kidhtalbtsik kal i ultalb kidhtalb.

Por na Dios in takwymal xu chutbtsik yab chalpadh kal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl abal kin tidhebdha xi chalpadhtsik; ani in takwymal xu chutbtsik yab likdha kal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl abal kin tidhebdha xi likdhatsik.
Na Dios in takwymal xu chutb kal xi techtsik ti kayl ke yab xata in jalbl ani pojkantltsik. Na Dios in takwymal jechtsik abal kin kwajbantsi tin okontal xu usnal ke ultalbtsik.
Anchan, yab xita neech kin ejto kin teka tinb tin tamt na Dios.

Por Jaj tajat na Dios ti tajmaltsik ki kwajay kal na Kristo Jess. In tajmal jeye ke na Kristo ka kwajay jelti ni chalpadhtal ani ke kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios. Ku kwajch juniniki abal na Dios ani loenekich.
Anchan p, kom anchanich tu kwajat kal an Ajtiklb, ki tajlich jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Max jun xita in l kin teka tinb, kin teka tinb kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.”
Kidhblbtsik, por tam ti nan in kale abal tu tiltsitsik tin tsubaxtalbil na Dios, yab in kwin jelt xan tu kw jun i chalpadh inik, nibal kal i tekdha tilabtsik.
Pos tam tin kwajay kal tattsik, yab xata u lena ms ku chobna, tokot na Jesukristo, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Tam tin ulich kal tattsik abal tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab, yab in likat ani in wipipl kal i jkib.

Ani tam tu tawnatsik ani tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab, yab u lena tu tantsitsik ta ejattal kal i kwintalb jelt xan tu kw i chalpadh iniktsik abal ki belmch. Yab u taja anchan, tu tantsitsik an ta ejattal kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani kal nin chp a Dios.
Anchan tu taja abal na belomtal ka kwajay teykmte kal in chp na Dios ani yab kal in chalab i iniktsik.

Por kal an atiklbtsik xu belomich tajat, i ynl ja i kwintalb jelt xan tu kw i chalpadh iniktsik. Por jech an chalpadhtalb, yab j xi tech ti kayl, nibal in chalab i takixtsik xi tech ti kayl xu kibchonal.
Xowa waw i till, jaich chalpadhtal na Dios xi yab tejwa, xin kool chalpadh tam ti yabl in tajmal an kayl abal ki bachu an labidh tokattalb.
Ni jun i takix xi tech ti kayl yab in ejtmal kin exbay jech; pos max in exbaymalak, yabak in chemdhmaltsik pajkidh ban peltsidh te an labidh tokat Ajtiklb.
Por tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: Na Dios in tojojoymal yn xata abal xi kltsik tu kaknb. Jech xowa in tojojoymal, yab xita in chumal, yab xita in achmal, nibal ela in chalpaymal.
Jech jaich xowa na Dios tu pidhmal ki chobna kal nin Tokat Ejattalki, pos an Tokat Ejattalb, ejtal in ejtowal kin chuu, asta xowa na Dios in kool ms chinat.

Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin chobna xanty waach bin itsch jun i inik, tokot an ejattalb xi kwajat ba jachan an inik. Anchan jeye, ni jun xita yab in chob xowa in kool chinat na Dios, tokot nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.
Ani waw yab i bachmal an ejattalb xi tech ti kayl, i bachmal an Tokat Ejattalb xi tl ba na Dios abal ki chobna xanty tu pidhmal na Dios kal nin alwatal.

Waw i till ejtal jech kal an tilabtsik xi tu oktsmal an Tokat Ejattalb, yab kal i tilabtsik xi witmal kal wawki ti kwetm chalab. Anchan ti wiltsaltsik xowa yab tejwa xin koolichtsik an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch.

Xita yab in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch, yab in ejtowal kin bachu xowa tl bin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, pos jaj in chalpayal ke i tntotalb. Yab in ejtowal kin exbay, pos jech tokot in exbayal xita in koolich an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch.
Por xita in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch, in ejtowal kin exbay xowakich. Ani yab xita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka utsan ke yab alwa xowa in tajl.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Jita in exbaymal xowa in chalpayal an Okxlb? Jita neech kin ejto kin oktsi?” Por waw i kool nin chalab na Kristo.

Kidhblbtsik, yab u ejto tu tawnatsik jelt xita xin koolich an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch, tokot tu tawnatsik jelt xita yab in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch. Tu tiltsitsik an ta Kristo jelt xan tin tomnl ka tiltsin i chakamtsik.

Tu oktsitsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo xowa xi yab lej tojlb, jelt xan ti jun i chakam u tsutsdhbki ani yab u pidhnal ti kapnl xin kapal xi pakdhaichtsik. Abal tam ti jachan, yab neech ka ejtotsik ka exbay xowa xi tojlb kal tin kwenta na Kristo, jelt xan ti jun i chakam yab jeye neech kin ejto kin kapu i kapnl xin kapal xi pakdhaich. Ani asta xo, yab a ejtotsik,

kom yabtsik bl a walkl ki takyat kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Max bl waach kal tattsik i txtalb, i pjxtalb ani i kxtalb, jaich abal yabtsik a walkl ki takyat kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani bl i kwajattsik jelt xan tu kwajl an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom.
Abal tam jun xita kin ulu ench: “Nan u wwnl na Pablo” ani jn kin ulu: “Nan u wwnl na Apolos”, yabxe exomich a tajltsik jelti xi yabtsik in kool an Tokat Ejattalb tin itsch?

Pos, janty u y nan ani janty in y na Apolos? Waw i tjontsalki na Dios, ani kal waw ta tiltsintsik an ti tsubaxtalb abal ki belmch. Ani juntsik tu b, i taja an tojlb xantiki tu pidha ti awiltalb an Ajtiklb.

Nan tu tiltsitsik an ti tsubaxtalb jelt xan ti jun i m in tayl an iyalb, na Apolos ti tolmiytsik abal ka exbay jelt xan ti jun xita xin waktsal an tayablb; por na Dios jaich ti tajatsik ki belmch ms, jelt xan tin pakedhl an tayablb.
Jaxtm, nibal xu m, nibal xu waktsix, yab xata in y; pos na Dios jaich nin tajl ejtal, Jaj nin pubedhl an tayablb.
Xu m ani xu waktsix, u tojnalkitsik, maske juntsik ti b neech kin bachu tayl xowa in lujyal kal tin kwenta an tojlb xowa in tajmal.
Pos waw i tjontsalki na Dios ani tattsik, a junwal jelti an chabl xon ti na Dios exom ti tojnal. A junwaltsik jeye jelti jun i yejche at xi exom in kubl na Dios.
Nanich nin kwajat jelti an kbal at xi na Dios kal nin alwatal, tin walka ku kubtsi tin akan jech an at, ani keet exom in tekbl. Por juntsik tu b yejat ki chuu xan ti exom i tekbl jech an at.
Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin kwajbantsi keet tin akan k xi kwajbantsidhich. Jech xi kwajat jelti nin akan an at, jaich na Jesukristo.
Por neech ka ejtowat ka tekb jech an at kal i oro, kal i plata, kal i labidh tujubtsik, o kal i te, kal i kudhey ani kal i waynek chojl.

An tojlb xi jun xita kin taja, neech ka chutat max alwa; pos tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, kal i kamal ti neech ka chutat max alwa. Xowakich an tojlb xi jun xita in tajmal, kal i kamal ti neech ka chutat max alwa.
Max yab ka taay an tojlb xi jun xita in tajmal, neech kin bachu xowa in lujyal.
Por max ka taay xowa in tajmal, neech kin kibdha xowa in tajmal, maske jaj ka loey, jelti jun xita xu kalel adhik abal yab ka taay.
Yabxe a chobtsik ke a junwal jelti an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios ani ke nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios, kwajat ba tattsik?
Max jun xita kin paku an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, jech xita kin taja anchan, neech ka kibdh kal na Dios; pos an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, tokat ani jachan an pulek at, jaich tatichtsik.

Yab xita kin kambiy tinb. Max jun xita in chalpayal ke chalpadh kal an chalpadhtalb xi tech ti kayl, kin taja jelti max yab xata in chob ani anchan, neech tm kin bajaw kin koy an chalpadhtalb xi tsubax.
An chalpadhtalb xi tech ti kayl, i tntotalb abal na Dios, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Na Dios in tajl ke an chalpadhtsik ka kwajl kal nin chalpadhtal.”
In ulal jeye: “An Okxlb in chob abal nin chalab an chalpadhtsik, yab xata in jalbl.”
Jaxtm, yab xita yejat kin teka tinb kal tin kwenta xita in wwnl; pos ejtal xowa waach, tattsik a dhabal.
Nan, na Apolos ani na Pedro, u dhabalb kal tattsik. An kayl, an xechintalb, an cheml, xi xo, xi tayl, ejtal tattsik a dhabal.
Ani tattsik, kal na Kristo ta dhabalbtsik ani na Kristo, kal a Dios tu dhabalb.
Jaxtm, an atiklbtsik yejat kin chalpay ke waw i tjontsal na Kristo ani u punkuntsidh abal ki tila xowa in koolwiik yab tejwa na Dios.
Pos alwaich, xin kool jun i punkuntsixtalb, yejat kin xalka ke neech lejtal kin taja xowa u punkuntsb.
Nan yab u dhl ti kwenta xanty ti kin chalpantsitsik, nibal xowa ti kin utsa jun i awiltalb xi tech ti kayl. Nibal in kwajat u tell tub.
Maske in kwajat tsububudh u itsch, jech yab in l kin ulu ke in lujatich tajat. An Ajtiklb jaich nin chob xan tin kwajat.

Jaxtm, yab ti kin okox chalpantsitsik max in alwa tojnal o yaba, ka aytsitsik asta ka tsch an Ajtiklb. Jaj, jaich xi neech kin xalka xowa kwajat chinat ban jikwaxtalb ani kin xalka xanty i chalpayal ti itsch. Jachan i kij, na Dios neech tm kin ulch max alwa o yab alwa xowa i tajmal.

Kidhblbtsik, tu tiltsaltsik jech abal tattsik ta alwabl, u kwajbl jelti ltsixtalb na Apolos ani nan neye. U ulal jech abal kal ni oktsixtalki, ka chobnatsik ke yab ms yejat xowa ka taja, tokot xowa kwajat dhutsadh ani abal ni jun xita yab kin teka tinb kal tin kwentaki xita in wwnl ani kin pojka keet.
Pos, jita ti tajl ki kwajay ms alwa k xi keettsik? Janty a kool ke yab kal a Dios ta pidhnk? Ani max Jaj ti pidhmal, jantki ta tekl tab jelti max xowa a kool tatki a bajmal ka koy ta kwetm chalab?

Xo i kwajatichtsik tajat alwa jelti max a kooltsik kidhat. A achltsik jelti max i pakdha takixich ani waw yabich tu tajl ti kij. I lak lejtal max i pakdha takixich abal ku takxin weye junax kal tattsik!

Pos u chutal ke waw xu kwajat tu abatwle, na Dios tu tajmal jelti max yab u lej uluts. I junwal jelt xita xi bijtsidhich ke neech ti chemdhb; i bajmalich ku kwajay jelti jun xata labidh xu telnal kl an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl. Anchan tu chutb kal an atiklbtsik ani kal an tokat abatwletsik.

U usnal ke waw yab u chalpadh abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo ani ke tattsik a exbayal xowakichki xi kal tin kwenta na Kristo. U usnal ke yab u likat ani ke tattsik, i likat tajat; waw u atnal kal an atiklbtsik ani tattsik i kaknb tajat.
Asta xo i watnl i kanab ani i tsiknib; i yntsal i kudhkmil, u atax tajtsinal, yab i kool i kim
ani u chekel tu tojnal kal ni kubak. U odhbijyb kal an atiklbtsik, por waw i lbtajltsik. U atnal, por i kuxyal.
U jantsinal ti kw, por waw yab u tknal kal i chkub. Asta xo, u tajnal jelti max u aml ani jelti max u jilkomastalb.
Yab tu dhutsuntsaltsik anchan abal tu tidhebdhatsik, tu dhutsuntsaltsik abal tu pidhatsik jun i takixtalb jelt u chakmiltsik xu kanidhl tajat.

Maske tattsik ka koy lju i mil i oktsixtsik xi ti oktsitsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo, yab yn a ttatsik a kool. Kom nan tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an loeltalb, jyki max tin ttatsik kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xa kooltsik ba na Kristo Jess.
Anchan p, tu pakabdhltsik abal ti kin wwnantsi an tu oktsixtal.

Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu abtsaltsik an ta Timoteo, xu kanidhl tajat ani u chutal jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta abal i bellich an Ajtiklb. Jaj, neech ti ki chalpantsitsik xan tin kwajl neye abal u bellich na Kristo, anchan xan tin oktsix putlki xon ti waach i belomtsik.
Taltsik xi tattsik a kidhtal, in tekltsik tajat tinb abal in chalpayal ke yabich neech kin kale tu lnatsik.
Por u chalpayal kin kale jikat tu lnatsik, max an Ajtiklb anchan tin l. Neech tm ku chuu xanty in ejtowaltsik kin taja jachan xin tekltsik tajat tinb ani yab tokotki xowa in ulaltsik.
Pos xan tu takix na Dios, yab kal i tilabki; u takix kal in chp.
Janty a kulbetnltsik ms? Kin kale tu lna abal tu kwiyatsik, o kin kale tu lna abal tu tawnatsik kal i kanidhaxtalb ani i chaattalb?
U tilnal ke jn ti b xi tattsik, in kool tin tomtal nin chab nna. Jech jaich jun i walastalb plek ke nibal ela tomnl ka tajan kal xi yabtsik in exll na Dios.
Maske anchan ta kwajattsik, blki tajat a tekltsik tab! Yabxe ms in tomnl ki kwajaytsik i tepinal jelti max chemnek jun xita? An inik xin tajmal jech, yabich yejat ka walkatsik ka junkun kal tattsik.
Maske yab in kwajat nan tajat kal tattsik, in kwajat kal u ejattalki; ani u ulmalich abal walats xowa in tajl jachan an inik, jelti max ta tin kwajat kal tattsik.
Tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ki junkun tatkitsik ani nan neech neye kin kwajay kal tattsik kal nu ejattalki. Kal tin chp an Ajtiklb Jesukristo,

ka pidhnatsik jachan an inik ban lej atax abal ka yajlombdhantsat tin tul ani yabich kin taja xowa in kulbetnl nin tul. Max kin jila kin taja jech an walastalb, neech tm ka lowat tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb Jess.
Yab in tomnl ka tekatsik tab abal a chalpayaltsik ke i tokat. Yabxe a chobtsik ke w i jilbdhaxtalb koye in jilbdhl yn i koye max ka xukyat?

Ka ajatsik p jachan an inik xin junwal jelti an jilbdhaxtalb koye abal ki kwajaytsik i tokat jelti an t koye. Tattsik a junwal jelti an pan xi yab u jilbdhb xu kapnal tam u ajbnb an paskwa. Na Kristo chemdh abal ka pikb kal waw ti kwenta. Jaj in junwal jelti an borrego xin chemdhl an israelitatsik tam in ajbnl an paskwa.

Jaxtm ti yejatich ki ajbna an paskwa kal i lujattalb ani i tsubaxtalb, xin junwal jelti an pan xi yab jilbdhats; yab ki ajbna kal i ataxtalb nibal kal xowa yab alwa, xin junwal jelti an weje jilbdhaxtalb koye.
Ban jidhtal dhutsadh w xi tu abtsitsik, tu utsa abal yab ki junkun kal xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal.

Yab exom tu utsltsik ke yabich ki junkun kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom xi kwajattsik tech ti kayl, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, xi chenetsik, xu kwtsik, o xin kaknltsik i chilab. Yab jaich exom tu utsltsik, pos abal yabich tajat ki junkun kal jajtsik, kool ki wkontsik tech ti kayl.

Xowa tu utsltsik, jaich ke yab ki junkun kal xin ulal ke u kidhblb ani u junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal, chene, in kaknl i chilab, tilma, u uchal ani u kw. Kal xi anchan ti kwajat, yab yejat nibal ki kapch kal jaj.

Pos yab nan u lujyal ku chuu xanty in tajl xi yabtsik u belom, kal na Dios ti neech ka ljundhtsik. Por tattsik, kool ka chuu xanty in tajl xu belomtsik. Jaxtm, ka aja jachan an walablom xi kwajat kal tattsik.

Tam jun xita xi tattsik ka waltsin ani kool ka kale ti utsbix, jantki tu kalel ti utsbix ba jun i awiltalb xi yab u belom? Jantki ti yab in konyal ka tajtsin ti lejkintalb kal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios?

Yabxe a chobtsik ke xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, jaich neech kin ljundha an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom? Ani max an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom, tattsik neech ka ljundha, yabxe neech ka ejtotsik ka lejkiy xowa yab lej kalpidh tojlb?
Yabxe a chobtsik ke waw xu dhabalbich kal na Dios, neech ki ljundha an tokat abatwletsik? Pos max anchan, neech ki ejto ki lejkiy xowakichki xi tech ti kayl!
Pos max a pjxnltsik jun xata tech ti kayl, jantki ta kwajbltsik kin lejkiy xi yabtsik u belom?
Jech u ulal abal ki tidhebtsik. Awxe yab waach ni jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal xi neech kin ejto kin lejkiy jun xata kal nin at kidhbtsik?
Awxe in tomnl ke jun i kidhblb ka kale kin utsbiy in at kidhb ba jun i awiltalb xi yab u belom?
Pos max i pjxtsik kal na at kidhb, walatsich xowa a tajltsik. Yabxe ms alwa ka kuxuy max i atax tajtsinaltsik? Yabxe ms alwa ka kuxuy max i kwybtsik?
Por tattsik yab anchan ta tajl, tokot a tajtsaltsik xowa yab alwa ani a kwyaltsik na at kidhb.

Yabxe a chobtsik ke xin tajl xowa yab alwa, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios? Yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik, pos yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, xu xechinaltsik yab exbadh, xin kaknltsik i chilab, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, i iniktsik xu junkunal kal in at inik ani i uxumtsik xu junkunal kal in at uxum. Yab jeye neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, an kwtsik, an chenetsik, an uchltsik, an odhbijixtsik ani an kambixtsik.
Anchanwiik ti kwajat taltsik xi tattsik; por xo, i pakwlantsidhichtsik ani i tokodhichtsik. I kwajbadhichtsik alwa kal na Dios tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess ani kal nin Tokat Ejattal ni Diosil.
Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab ejtal alwa. Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab neech ku walka ti kin ta xowa u tajl.

An kapnl jaich abal ni tsukul ani ni tsukul abal an kapnl; por chablam jech, neech kin wixka na Dios. Na Dios tu pidhmal an ti tul, por yab abal ku kwajay yab exbadh. Tu pidhmal an ti tul abal ki ejto ki tjontsi kl an Ajtiklb; ani an Ajtiklb, jaich tu belkmtsal an ti tul.
Ani anchan xan ti na Dios tin ejdha ti t an Ajtiklb, anchan weye ti neech ti ku ejdha ti t kal nin chp.
Yabxe a chobtsik ke ni tul kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo? Awxe alwa ku ntsi jun peje tin tul na Kristo abal ku chatbiy kal in tul jun i junkux inik uxum? Yaba!
O yab a chobtsik ke tam jun i inik ka junkun kal jun i junkux inik uxum, jech chablam jnkijich in tul tu ynal? Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
Por xita kwajatich kal an Ajtiklb, xi jech chb, jnkijich in ejattal tu ynal.
Yabtsik p ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal. Xowakichki i walastalb xi kin taja jun xita, yab in waltsal nin tul; por xita xu junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal, in waltsal nin tul.

Yabxe a chobtsik ke ni tul yab waw i dhabal? Jech ni tul kwajat jelti an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xon tu kwajl jeye an Tokat Ejattalb. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba ni itsch, a Dios tu pidhmal.
Pos kajbidh tu chaidh kal na Dios. Jaxtm, yejat ki kakna na Dios kal ni tul ani kal ni ejattal abal chablam jech, kal a Dios tu dhabalb.
Kal tin kwenta an konoxtalb xi tin tajtsitsik tam tin abtsi an dhutsadh w, neech tu utsatsik. Alwa tajat max jun i inik yab ka tomkin;
por kom waach tajat xin kulbetnltsik ka xechin yab exbadh, jaxtm ti ms alwa ka tomkin an iniktsik ani an mmlbtsik.
An inik xi tomkidh, yejat ka kwajay alwa kal nin tomtal. Ani an mmlb xi tomkidh, yejat ka kwajay alwa kal nin tomkl.
An mmlb xi tomkidh, yabich jaj in dhabal nin tul, u dhabalb kal nin tomkl. Anl jeye, an inik xi tomkidh, yabich jeye jaj in dhabal nin tul, u dhabalb kal nin tomtal.

Yab ki kejtsikmtsik kal na tomtal. Ki kejtsikmtsik, max ka tajatsik i kw ke yab neech ki junkun w i kij abal jachan an kij, ka ynatsik abal ka ntsi ta l. Tayl ki junkuntsik jun abal t yab ka kuxuytsik ani ti ki walbindhatsik an lej atax.
Jech an takixtalb tu pidhltsik kal nanki tu kwetm chalab, yab in takixtal an Ajtiklb.

Nan u lak max ejtal ka kwajaytsik jelti nan; por na Dios keetich keetich tin pidhmaltsik an ti awiltalb, taltsik in pidhmal ti awiltalb ka tomkin ani taltsik, in pidhmal ti awiltalb abal kin ejto ka kwajay kwetm.
An kwetm iniktsik ani an chemtsidh mmlbtsik, u utsltsik abal alwa tajat max yab ka tomkintsik.
Por max yabtsik in achl neech kin ejto ka kwajay kwetm, awil ka tomkin; pos ms alwa ka tomkin k ka kwajay in kuxyalki.
An mmlbtsik xi tomkidh, u utsltsik abal yab kin jila nin tomkl. Jech an takixtalb, yab nanki u kldhmal tu kwetm chalab, in ulal an Ajtiklb.

Por max jun i mmlb xi tomkidh kin jila nin tomkl, yab yejat ka tomkin ti t ani max yab in l ka kwajay kwetm, ka pkwlntsxin ani ka junkuntsik jun. Anchan jeye, an inik xi tomkidh, yab jeye yejat kin jila nin tomtal.
Xi keettsik u utsltsik jech kal nanki tu kwetm chalab, yab kal tin takixtal an Ajtiklb. Max jun i inik xu belom in kool in tomtal yab u belom, por kwajat alwa kal jaj, yab yejat kin jila.
Ani max jun i mmlb xu belom in kool in tomkl yab u belom, por kwajat alwa kal jaj, yab yejat kin jila.

Pos an inik xi yab u belom, neech ka tolmiyat ka belmch kal nin tomtal; ani an mmlb xi yab u belom, neech ka tolmiyat ka belmch kal nin tomkl. Max yabak anchan, nin chakmiltsik neech kin junu jelti xi yabtsik u belom; por xo, kwajattsik tokodh kal na Dios.
Por max in l ti jilax xi yab u belom, awil ka jilxin. Pos yab yejat ka kwajay junax kal i chplb an mmlb o an inik xu belom, pos na Dios tu kanymal abal ku kwajay kijidh.
Pos mmlb xi belom, a chobxe max neech ka ejto ka tolmiy ka loey na tomkl? O inik xi belom, a chobxe max neech ka ejto ka tolmiy ka loey na tomtal?
Juntsik ta b yejat ki kwajay xantiki ti pidhmal ki kwajay an Ajtiklb ani anchan xan ta kwajatwiik tam ti na Dios ti kaniy. Jech jaich u takixnl putlki xon ti waach i belomtsik.
Max na Dios kin kaniy jun xita xin kool an exl bin tul, yejat ka kwajay anchan ani max kin kaniy jun xita xi yab in kool an exl bin tul, yab yejat kin taja an exl bin tul.
Yab xata tu ynal max in kool an exl bin tul o yaba; xowa na yejat, kin tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
Juntsik ta b, yejat ki kwajay anchan xan ta kwajattsikwiik tam ti na Dios ti kaniy.
Max i jolib ta kwajat, yab ki kwajay ta chalpax; por max ka ela xan ti ka uwa abal ka ejto teye ki kwajay yab i jolib, awil ka jila ta jolib.

Pos xi kwajat ti jolib tam ti kanyat abal kin belaich an Ajtiklb, xo kwajatich walkadh abal in bellich an Ajtiklb; anchan jeye, xi yab u jolib tam ti kanyat abal kin belaich an Ajtiklb, xo u jolibich abal na Kristo.
Na Dios kajbidh ti chaymaltsik; yab ki kwajaytsik ta jolib abal an atiklbtsik.
Kidhblbtsik, juntsik ta b yejat ki kwajay jelt xan ta kwajatwiik tam ta kanyattsik kal na Dios.

Kal tin kwenta xi yab tomkinktsik, yab u kool ni jun i takixtalb xi tl ban Ajtiklb. Kom u bajmalich neye kin kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal an Ajtiklb ani u chalpayal abal in tomnl neye kin beltsin, neech neye ku ulu xowa u chalpayal kal jech tin kwenta.
Nan u chalpayal ke ms alwa max an inik yab ka tomkin kal tin kwenta an yajtsiktalb xi waach jech i kij.
Max i tomkidhich ta kwajat, yab ki jlxin. Ani max yab i tomkidh, yab ki tomkin.

Por max jun i kwitl ka tomkin, yab walats. Ani max jun i tsidhan ka tomkin, yab jeye walats xowa in tajl. Por xu tomkinaltsik, neech kin watna i yajtsiktalb ba jech an xechintalb ani nan u lak ku chuu max yab ka tomkintsik abal yab kin watnatsik jech an yajtsiktalb.
Kidhblbtsik, neech tu utsatsik jech: Wich tajat an kij i kool. Jaxtm, xita kwajattsik tomkidh, yejat ka kwajaytsik jelti max yab tomkidh.
Kom wich tajat an kij i kool, xu uknaltsik, yejat ka kwajaytsik jelti max yab u uknal; xu kulbltsik, jelti max yabtsik u kulbl ani xu chaumtsik, jelti max yab jajtsik in dhabal xowa in chaymal.
Xita in kulbetnltsik xowa waach tech ti kayl, ka kwajaytsik jelti max yab in kulbetnltsik; pos ejtal xowa waach tech ti kayl, neech ka taley.
U lak ku chuu max yab ki kwajaytsik ta chalpax kal ni jun xata. Tam jun i inik yab tomkidh, tokot in chalpm kin tjontsi ani kin taja xowa in l an Ajtiklb.
Por xi tomkidh, in chalpm tokot xowakich xi tech ti kayl ani xan ti kin kulbdha nin tomtal.

Anchan jeye u tmnal kal an mmlb xi tomkidh ani kal an tsidhan. An tsidhan, tokot in chalpm kin tjontsi an Ajtiklb abal ka kwajay tokat nin tul ani nin ejattal; por xi tomkidh, tokot in chalpm xowakich xi tech ti kayl ani xan ti kin kulbdha nin tomkl.
Tu utsltsik jech abal tattsik ta alwabl, yab abal nanki u l ku chuu yab ki tomkintsik. Jech tu utsltsik abal ka taja xowa alwa ani lujat. Ani abal ka ejtotsik ka exla ms alwa an Ajtiklb.
Por max jun xita in kool jun in tsidhnil ani in chalpayal abal exomich ti watel in tambil abal ka tomkin ani in chalpayal ke yejat kin tomkiy, yab walats max kin tomkiy.
Anl jeye, max jun xita in kool jun in tsidhnil ani in chalpaymalich junax ke ms alwa yab ka tomkin an tsidhan, alwa max yab kin tomkiy.
Jaxtm, xin pidhnl nin tsidhnil abal ka tomkin, alwa xowa in tajl. Ani xi yab kin pidhna, ms alwa xowa in tajl.

An mmlb xi tomkidh, u kyb kal an takixtalb jelti max wikats bin tomkl, lejat nin tomkl kwajat ejat; por max ka chemech nin tomkl, an mmlb awil ka tomkin ti t xita kl kin lena, tokot yejat kin chuu ke jachan an inik, u belom jeye.
Por nan u ulal ke ms kijidh neech ka kwajay an mmlb max yabich ka tomkin ti t. Anchan tu ulal kom u chalpayal ke u koolich tu itsch nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.

Kal tin kwenta an kapnl xu pikbantsb an chilabtsik, u chalpayal abal i chobich xanty yejat ki taja. An chalpadhtalb kal tin kwenta jech an kapnl, tu tajl ki teka tib, por an kanidhaxtalb, tu tolmiyal abal ku belmch ms.
Ani max jun xita in chalpayal ke in chob jun xata, yabl in bajmal kin chobna xan ti yejat kin chobna.
Por max jun xita in kaknl na Dios, u exlb kal na Dios.

Kal tin kwenta an konoxtalb xi tin tajtsitsik max alwa o yab alwa ka kapat an kapnl xu pikbantsb an chilabtsik, neech tu utsatsik. Jun i chilab xu kaknb jelti a Dios, yab xata in y tech ti kayl. Pos i chobich ke jn tokot a Dios waach.
Maske waach ban walki ani ban chabl taltsik xu bijyb ti diostsik (jelt xan ti chobich ke yn i diostsik ani i ajtiklbtsik waach),

abal waw, jn tokot a Dios waach. Jech na Dios, jaich an Ttalb xon ti tl ejtal xowa waach ani waw, taja weye tu tl. Jn jeye tokot i Ajtiklb waach, xi jaich na Jesukristo. Jech na Jesukristo, jaich xin tajmal ejtal xowa waach, asta waw weye.

Por yab ejtalki in chob jech. Taltsik, xin kaknlwiik an chilabtsik, in kapaltsik an kapnl jelti max pikbantsidh an chilabtsik; ani kom yabtsik u lej belom, in chalpayaltsik ke u walbinal kal xowa in kapal.
An kapnl yab in tajl abal ku kwajch ms kunat kal na Dios; pos yab neech ki ejto ki tokedha ms tib max ku kapch, nibal neech ki walbindha tib max yab ku kapch.
Por ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka walbindha xi yabtsik u lej belom, pos a chobichtsik ke an kapnl yab tu tokedhl nibal tu walbindhl.

Pos ka achatsik jech. Max tat xa chob jech, ki buxkan ta kapul xon tu pikbantsb xata an chilabtsik ani ki chutat taja kal jun i kidhblb xi yabl u lej belom, yabxe neech kin lena jeye kin kapu xowa u pikbantsb an chilabtsik?
Ani anchan, tat xa chobich ke an kapnl yab tu tokwal nibal tu waltsal, a tajlich ka kibchon na at kidhb xi yabl u lej belom. Pos na Kristo chemech abal ka loey jeye jech an kidhblb.
Pos anchan, tam ka ojtsitsik an tin chalab an kidhblbtsik xi yabl u lej belom, a waltsalich na Kristo.
Jaxtm, max u walbindhl nu at kidhb kal tin kwentaki xowa u kapal, ms xna alwa ke yabich jayki ku kapu i tulek abal yab ku walbindha.
Nan yab in kwajat taknl kal i iniktsik, u kool i awiltalb xin kool jun i abatwle. Pos u chumal na Jess ni Ajtik ani tattsik a xalklich abal in kwajat u tjontsal an Ajtiklb.
Max taltsik yab tin chutal tin abatwle, abal tattsik in abatwle; pos kom tattsik a bellich an Ajtiklb, jaich nin xalkl ke nan tsubax lejtal in abatwle.
Jech jaich xowa neech ku utsa xi tin kawyaltsik:
Yabxe in tomnl ku kapundh ani ku pidhan xowa ki ucha kal an belomtsik?
Yabxe in tomnl ku tomkin weye kal jun i mmlb xu belom jelti xi keet an abatwletsik, nin kidhbtsik an Ajtiklb ani na Pedro?
O a chalpayaltsik ke tokot nan ani na Bernab yab yejat ku koych tu tojnal?
Jita kwajat ti soldado ani jaj in chayal ejtal xowa in yntsal? Jita in tayl i uba ani yab in kaptsal tin wall? Jita in beletnl i borregotsik ani yab in uchl i leche xin watsal?
Nankixe tu kwetm chalab tu ulal jech? Yabxe jaich in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss?
Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss in ulal ench: “Yab ka busliy an konl xi exom ti kwdhal.” Na Dios yab in ulmal jech abal tin alwabl an konltsik,
jech tin ulal abal ki chobna ke xi xeech in till an alwa tilab, yejat ka tolmintsat kal xin tiltsaltsik. Anchan jelt xan ti jun xita u tojnal bin ale in aytsm ka labey xowa in tayl.
Max waw i tilmal an alwa tilab ba tattsik, yabxe in tomnl ti ku pidha weye xowa i yntsal tech ti chabl?
Max a tolmiyaltsik xi keet, xi xeechtsik in till an alwa tilab, yabxe ms in tomnl ti ku tolmiy waw? Por yab i tajmal anchan, tokot exom i kuxyal ejtal abal ka belan nin alwa tilbil na Kristo.

Yabxe a chobtsik ke xu tojnal ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ke tajaich jeye tu kalel abal ka kapch? O yabxe a chobtsik ke xu tojnal xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, jachich jeye in kapal xowa u pikbantsb na Dios?
Anchan jeye, an Ajtiklb in ulu ench: Xita xeech in till an alwa tilab, taja jeye ti yejat ka kale abal ka kapch.
Por nan yab jayki u tajmal anchan kal tattsik, nibal exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech abal ka tajatsik anchan kal nan. Ms alwa kin chemech k ti kin kntsi jun xita jech an kijidhtalb xu kool!
Pos nan yab u achl ku teka tub abalki in xeech u till an alwa tilab, pos yejat ku tila. Chojontl u chubl max yab ku tila jech an alwa tilab!
Jaxtm, max u tajl jech kal yantam u kulbtal, neech ku bachu an jalbixtalb; por max u tajl kal i chplb, blki jaich jun i punkuntsixtalb xi tin pidhmal na Dios.

Anchan p, an jalbixtalb xu bachwal, jaich an kulbtalb xu achl abal in xeech u till jech an alwa tilab ani yab in tlom. Neech ku ejto ku konoy kin tolmiyat abal in xeech u till an alwa tilab, por yab u tajl anchan.
Maske yab in kwajat taknl kal i iniktsik, u lenmal ku tjontsitsik abal ku ejto ku taja ke yn kin belatsik na Kristo.

Tam in kwajat ban judotsik, in wenkonal jelti an judotsik, abal ku ejto ku taja ka belmchtsik. Tam in kwajat kal xi taknltsik kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in kwajl jelti jajtsik, abal ku ejto ku taja ka belmchtsik. Maske nan yab in taknl kal jech an takixtalb.

Tam in kwajat kal xi yab taknltsik kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in kwajl jelti jajtsik abal ku taja ka belmchtsik. Maske in kwajat taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios, abal in kwajatich bin takixtal na Kristo.
Tam in kwajat kal xi yab u lej belomtsik, in kwajl jelti jajtsik abal ku tajatsik ka belmch ms. Kal ejtalki in kwajl jelt xan tu kwajltsik abal ku ejto ku tiltsi taltsik xan ti neech ka loey.
Ejtal jech u tajl kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab abal ku bachu neye an alwatalb xin kool jech an alwa tilab.
Tattsik a chobich ke tam an ubttsik u dhil abal ti tx, ejtaltsik u dhil; por jn tokot xi neech kin ta xowa u tb. Ki jlchtsik p abal ka ejtotsik ka bachu xowa u tb.

Ejtal xu exbaltsik abal ti tx ba jun i ubtnich, yab in tajl xata xowa in chalpayal ke neech ka waltsin kl. Jajtsik in tajl anchan abal kin ejto kin ta jun i kwetsotsl dhipadh chojl xu kachel. Por waw i tajl an chplb abal ki ta jun xata xi yab jayki neech ka kachey.
Nan, yab in dhil jelti max mututsik u wal; yab in knx jelti max in kwajat u wiwl nu kubak aniki.
Yab u tajl anchan, nan u yajlombdhl tub ani in kwajl tin tjontsix, kom yab u l ke tayl, ka kale yab xata in jalbl nu tojlbil.
Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik, ke ni weje pakliltsik kwajinek tin l jachan an tokow ani ejtaltsik in watna an Chak Pujal.
Anchan, jelti max pujyattsik ejtal ban tokow ani ban pujal junax kal na Moiss.
Ejtaltsik jeye in kapu an kapnl xi tsch walki.
Ani ejtaltsik in ucha an ja xi kldhantsat ban tujub kal na Dios. Pos in uchmaltsik an ja xi kldhantsat kal na Dios ban tujub xi kl ti wewkmtetsik. Jech an tujub, jaich na Kristo.
Por yn an israelitatsik yab in taja xowa in l na Dios ani jaxtm ti jilkontsik chemnek ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Ejtal jech, tmun jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal waw abal yab ki ltendha xowakich xi yab alwa, jelt xan ti jajtsik in ltendha.
Yab ka kaknatsik i chilab jelt xan tin taja taltsik xi jajtsik, xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “An atiklbtsik buxkan ti kapul ani ti uchal ani tayl, in tajatsik i ajib.”
Yab ku junkun kal xi yab i tomtal, jelt xan tin taja taltsik xi jajtsik ani chemech jun inik ox mil i atiklbtsik xi jnki a kts.
Yab ki taktamiy an Okxlb jelt xan tin taja taltsik xi jajtsik ani chemech chikadh kal i chan.
Nibal ki itixbtsik kal na Dios jelt xan tin tajmal taltsik xi jajtsik ani chemdhtsik kal an abatwle xu chemdhax.
Ejtal jech xowa in tamu ni weje pakliltsik, tmun abal ka kwajay jelti jun i oktsixtalb. Ani kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab abal ti ku tawna, waw xu kwajat jech tin okontalich an kij.
Anchan p, xin chalpayal ke kwajat alwa kal na Dios, kin koy tajat i kwenta abal yab kin wala.

An taktamixtalb xa achltsik, jaychki an taktamixtalb xin achl xitakichki. Por yejat ka belatsik na Dios, pos Jaj yab neech kin walka ka koytsik ms plek i taktamixtalb, tokotki xowa neech ka ejto ka kuxuytsik. Tam ki taktamiyat, na Dios neech ti ki ltsi xan ti ka uwa abal ka watna ani ka ejto ka kuxuy jech an taktamixtalb.
Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhl tajat, yab ka kaknatsik i chilab.
Exom tu tawnl jelti atiklbtsik xi chalpadh ani ka chalpaytsik max alwa o yab alwa xowa tu utsltsik.

Tam i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an yajtsik uxnl, yabxe jaich abal ki junkulom ucha jech an yajtsik uxnl jelti nin xichl na Kristo? Ani an pan jeye xi pjchxnl, yabxe jaich abal ki junkulom kapu jelti nin tul na Kristo?
Jn tokot an pan xi muwal ani yn tu b ti kapal, ejtal waw yn tu b, por jelti max jn tokot tu kwajat, jelti nin tul na Kristo.
Ka chuu an atiklbtsik xi Israel; tam in kapaltsik xowa u pikbantsb na Dios, yabxe u junkunalich kal xon tu kwajbantsb ti pikbantsixtalb na Dios?
Yab exom u ulal ke an chilab in kool jeye in y, nibal exom u ulal ke an tulek xi pikbantsidh jun i chilab, ms alwa k keet i tulek.
Xowa exom u ulal, jaich ke tam xi yab in exlltsik na Dios in pikbl jun xata, in pikbantsal an atax ejattalbtsik ani yab a Dios. Yab u l ku chuu ka koytsik i junaxtalb kal an atax ejattalbtsik.

Yab neech ka ejto ka uxtsitsik an ti yajtsik uxnl xin pidhnl an Ajtiklb ani ka uxtsitsik jeye an ti yajtsik uxnl an atax ejattalbtsik. Yab neech ka ejto ki kapchtsik bin mesajil an Ajtiklb ani ki kapchtsik jeye bin mesajil an atax ejattalbtsik.
O a l ki chakdha an Ajtiklb? Awxe ms wa u likat k Jaj?
