Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab ejtal alwa. Neech ku ejto ku taja xowa ku lena, por yab ejtal u tolmix abal kin belmch ms.
Ki taja xowa alwa abal tin alwabl xi keettsik, yab abal wawki ti alwabl.
Ka kaputsik xowakichki an tulek xu nujnal, yab ki kwajay ka konkomiy max alwa o yab alwa ka kapat;
pos an chabl ani ejtal xowa waach taja, kal an Ajtiklb tu dhabalb.
Max ki kanyat ta kapul kal jun xita xi yab u belom ani a ltsik ki kale, ka kaputsik ejtal xowa ki pidhan. Yab ki kwajaytsik ka konkomiy max alwa o yab alwa ka kapat.
Por max jun xita ti ki utsatsik ench: “Jech an tulek pikbantsidh an chilabtsik”, max anchan, yab ka kaputsik abal yab ka walbindha xin ulal anchan ani yab ka jilkon ti chalpax.
Exom u till xowa neech kin chalpay na jn, yab xowa tat neech ka chalpay. Pos jantki ti yejat ki exbantsi jun xita kal tin kwenta max alwa o yab alwa xowa i kapal?
Ani max u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta xowa u kapal, jantki tin kawyb abal u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an kapnl?
Pos max i kapultsik, o a uchltsik xata, o a tajltsik keet xowa, ka taja ejtal abal tin kaknabl na Dios.
Yab ka tajatsik ka walbin an judotsik, nibal xi yabtsik u judo, nibal xin bellichtsik na Dios.
Anchan neye nan, yab u tajl xowa yab in kulbetnl an atiklbtsik, nibal u tajl xowa nanki neech ti kin tolmintsi. U tajl xowa kl ti neech ka tolmintsat an atiklbtsik abal kin ejtotsik jeye ka loey.
Ki kwajaytsik teye jelt xan ti nan in kwajat, anchan xan ti nan in kwajat jelt xan ti kwajay na Kristo.
Kidhblbtsik, tu kaknltsik tajat abal echeki tin chalpayaltsik ani abal a ntsal ka wwnatsik an oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik.
Por u l ka exbaytsik ke na Kristo, jaich na kwajat jelti nin k an inik; an inik, jelti nin k nin tomtal ani na Dios kwajat jelti nin k na Kristo.
Max jun i inik kin putsuy nin k tam u l o tam exom in lnl i tsubaxtalb xin bachmal ba Dios, tidhetl abal jaj.
Por max jun i mmlb yab kin putsuy nin k tam u l o tam exom in lnl i tsubaxtalb xin bachmal ba Dios, tidhetl abal jaj; in junwal jelti max kaxudh.
Max jun i mmlb yab kin putsuy nin k, tm, ms alwa ka kaxun. Por max in achl tidhetl ka kaxun o ka olin, kin putsuy nin k.

An inik yab yejat kin putsuy nin k, pos jaj in junwal jelt xan ti jeye na Dios ani u takix jeye jelt xan ti na Dios u takix. Kom an inik in takyal an mmlb, jaich tu xalkanal abal an inik in kool i awiltalb.
Pos tam ti na Dios in taja an inik, yab in kldha ban mmlb, an mmlb jaich na kldh ban inik.
Ani yab jeye tajan an inik abal tin kwenta an mmlb, an mmlb jaich na tajan abal tin kwenta an inik.
Jaxtm, an mmlb yejat kin putsuy nin k abal kin xalkantsi an tokat abatwletsik ke jaj kwajat taknl kal an inik.
Jaxtm, waw xi bellich an Ajtiklb, i chob ke an inik in yntsal an mmlb ani an mmlb in yntsal an inik.
Pos anchan xan ti an mmlb ban inik ti kldhats, anchan jeye, an inik ban mmlb tu wachinal, por ejtal jech, ba Dios ti tl.
Ka ulu tattsik max in tomnl ke an mmlbtsik ka lan yab putsudh in k.
Ni chalab tu utsl abal tidhetl ke jun i inik kin walka ka nakey nin xil.
Por labidh u xalkanal max jun i mmlb nakdha in xil; pos jaich ti pidhnk kin koy nakdha nin xil abal kin putsuy kl nin k.
Por max jun xita in l kin kwlxna jech, yejat kin chobna ke ejtal xin bellichtsik na Dios, i ujnmalich ke an mmlbtsik kin putsuy nin k tam u l ani tam in lnl i tsubaxtalb xin bachmal ba Dios.
Por kal jech xowa neech tu utsatsik, yab jaich abal tu kldhatsik ta alwa, pos tam a kyaltsik an junkuntalb, yab i junkunaltsik abal ka taja xowa alwa, i junkunaltsik abal ka taja xowa yab alwa.
Pos jidhtal, neech tu utsatsik jech: In usnal ke tam ki junkuntsik ta l, u wachinal i kxtalb ani u chalpayal ke tsubax xna xowa in usnal.
Pos, in tomnl xna kejle ki kxintsik abal ka xalkan xita j na tsubax lejtal tu belom.
Xowa u tmnal kal jech an kxtalb, yabich i junkunaltsik abal ka kapu nin tokat kapchil an Ajtiklb.
Pos tam i junkunaltsik abal ki kapch junini, xi keet u okxinal ti kapul ani lejat taltsik u jilkonal ti kal, taltsik asta u itelml.

Yabxe a kooltsik a kim xon ti ki kapch ani ki uchch? Tam a tajltsik anchan, a pojklichtsik xin bellich na Dios ani a tidhebdhlichtsik xi yab xata in kool. Janty yejat tu utsatsik? Yejatxe tu kldhatsik ta alwa abal a tajltsik anchan? Yaba!
Pos nan ban Ajtiklb tu bachmal jech an oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik: Ke jachan i akal tam ti an Ajtiklb Jess pidhn abal ka chemdh, in tyna an pan

ani tam tin pidhmalich ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, in peja ani in ulu ench: “Ka bachu ani ka kapu, jech jaich nu tul xi neech ku pidhna ka chemdh abal tattsik ta alwabl. Ka tajltsik jech abal ti kin chalpay.”

Anchan jeye, tam ti okonich an kapch, in tyna jun i lejab baltsidh ti yajtsik uxnl ani in ulu ench: “Jech an yajtsik uxnl, jaich nu xichl xi neech ku wakla ban peltsidh te. Kal tin kwenta nu xichl, na Dios neech kin taja jun i t lejkintalb kal an atiklbtsik. Ka tajltsik jech abal ti kin chalpay.”
Jaxtm, tam a kapaltsik jech an pan ani tam a uchltsik jech an yajtsik uxnl, a chalpayaltsik xan ti chemdh an Ajtiklb. Ka tajltsik jech asta kin bajaw xowki ti ka tsch jun.
Anchan p, xita kin kapu an pan o kin ucha an yajtsik uxnl xin pidhnl an Ajtiklb ani yab kwajat alwa tin ejattal, in waltsalich nin tul ani nin xichl an Ajtiklb.
Jaxtm, xita neech kin kapu jech an pan ani kin ucha jech an yajtsik uxnl, yejat kin chalpay okox max kwajat alwa tin ejattal.
Xita kin ani kapuki jech an pan ani kin ani uchaki jech an yajtsik uxnl ani yab kin chalpay ke jaich nin tul an Ajtiklb, in kapal ani in uchl jech abal kin bachu i yajtsiktalb.
Jaxtm, yn xi tattsik a kidhtal u yaultsik, yn xi yabtsik likdha ani yn xi chemnekichtsik.
Por max waw ki chuu okox max u kwajat alwa ti ejattal, yab neech ku pidhan ti yajtsiktalb kal an Ajtiklb.
Por an Ajtiklb tu chutsal xowa i tajl ani max tu pidhl ti yajtsiktalb, jaich abal yab ku kale ban kibeltalb junax kal xi yabtsik u belom.
Anchan p, kidhblbtsik, tam ki junkuntsik abal ka kapu nin tokat kapchil an Ajtiklb, ki ytsxintsik jn ani jn.
Max jun xita u kal, ka kapch okox tin kim abal yab ki walbintsik tam i junkunal abal ka kapu nin tokat kapchil an Ajtiklb. Ejtal xowa bl u kibel ku lejkiy, neech ku lejkiy tam kin kale tu lnatsik.
Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik ke juntsik tu b u pidhnk kal an Tokat Ejattalb ti awiltalb abal ki taja jun xata.
A chobtsik alwa ke tam ti yabl i belomtsik, a wwnltsik i chilab xi yab u kw.

Jaxtm, xo u l ka chobnatsik ke ni jun xita xin ulal ke “na Jess yab tajat i alwa inik”, kwajat ti kw kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Ani ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin ulu ke “na Jess jaich an Ajtiklb”, max yab kwajat ti kw kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
Keetich keetich an awiltalb xu pidhnal juntsik tu b, por an Tokat Ejattalb xin pidhnl an awiltalb, jn tokot.
Yn waach xan ti ki tjontsi an Ajtiklb, por an Ajtiklb, jn tokot.
Ani yn waach xan ti ki taja jech an tojlb, por na Dios, xi tu tolmiyal abal ki taja jech an tojlb, jn tokot.
Juntsik tu b u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal ki ejto ki taja xata ani kl tu xalkanal abal i koolich an Tokat Ejattalb ti itsch. Jech an awiltalb, tu pidhl abal tin alwabl ejtalki.
Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb kal an Tokat Ejattalb, abal ka kwin kal i tekdha chalab. Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin exbay xowakichki, xantiki tin l an Tokat Ejattalb.
Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal ka belmch ms ani taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin jeldha i yaultsik.

Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb ani taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios. Taltsik u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin exla i ejattalbtsik xi alwa ani xi yab alwa. Taltsik, u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal ka kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb ani taltsik, u pidhnal ti awiltalb abal kin wila xowakichki i kwintalb.
Por ejtal jech, tokot Jajki an Tokat Ejattalb in tajl. Juntsik tu b, tu pidhl an ti awiltalb xan ti Jaj in l.
Anchan jelt xan ti ni tul yn i peje ti kwajat por jn tokot tu ynal, anchan jeye, ejtal waw xu belomich, jnki tokot tu ynal kom i bellich na Kristo.

Pos ejtal waw, maske u judo o u griego, u jolib o yaba, tam ku pujyatich, i bajwalich ku kwajay jelti max jnki tokot, kom jn tokot an Tokat Ejattalb ani ejtal waw, jaychki an Tokat Ejattalb i kool ti itsch.
Ni tul yn i peje ti kwajat, yab jnki.
Max ni akan kin ulu ke yab u kubaklek, kal jech, yab exom in ulal ke ni akan yab u kidhtalb kal ni tul.
O max ni xuchun kin ulu ke yab u walek, kal jech, yab exom in ulal ke ni xuchun yab u kidhtalb kal ni tul.
Pos max ejtalak ni tul u walek, jan ti neech ku ochxin? O max ejtalak ni tul u xuchunlek, jan ti neech ku jikxin?
Por na Dios in taja ni tul xan ti Jaj in lena.
Max jnkijak i peje ti kwajat ni tul, yab neech ka xalkan ke jaich in tul jun i inik.
Por xo, maske yn i peje in kool ni tul, jn tokot tu ynal.
Ni wal yab neech kin ejto kin utsa ni kubak ke yab in yntsal; nibal ni k yab neech kin ejto kin utsa ni akan ke yab in yntsal.
Yab anchan ti kwajat, nin pejtal ni tul xu xalkanal ms yab likat, jaich na ms i yntsal.
Nin pejtal ni tul xu xalkanal ke yab i lej yntsal, jaich ni kudhkumliyal ms alwa. Ani nin pejtal ni tul xi yab lej alabl, jaich na ms i beletnl alwa.
Nin pejtal ni tul xi alabl, jaich na ms yab i beletnl alwa. Anchan tin lejkiy na Dios ni tul abal xi yab i lej kanidhl, ka kwajay ms ultalb.
In taja anchan, abal yab ka wachin i kxtalb ba ni tul, tokot ka tlmxintsik jn ani jn.
Max jun peje ni tul in achl i yajtsiktalb, ejtal xi ms in achltsik jeye ani max jun peje ni tul u kaknb, ejtal xi ms u kulbltsik jeye.
Anchan jeye, ejtal waw xi bellich na Kristo, u kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo ani juntsik tu b i junwal jelti jun peje nin tul na Kristo.

Na Dios in takwymal taltsik ban belomtsik abal kin pidha ti awiltalb: Jidhtal, in kwajbmal i abatwletsik; in chabtal, i tiltsixtsik; in oxtal, xin oktsixnltsik nin kwintal na Dios. Taltsik in pidhmal ti awiltalb abal kin tajatsik i labidh labandhaxtalb ani taltsik abal kin jeldha i yaultsik. In jilmal jeye xu tolmixtsik, xu oklektsik ani xin bachmal i awiltalb ti kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb.
Yab ejtalki i abatwletsik, nibal ejtalki i tiltsixtsik. Yab ejtalki in oktsixnl nin kwintal na Dios, nibal ejtalki in ejtowal kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb.

Yab ejtalki in kool i awiltalb kin jeldha i yaultsik, nibal ejtalki in kool i awiltalb ti kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb. Yab ejtalki in ejtowal kin wila xowa in ulal jun xita tam ka kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb.
Pos ka aliytsik p xan ti ka uwa abal ka ejto ka bachutsik an awiltalb xi ms alwa. Xo, tu ltsaltsik jun i bl xi ms alwa.
Max u witlak tin kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb xi tech ti chabl ani xi walki, por yab in kanidhax, u junwal jelti nukub xu tenyb o jelti patl xu tsimbix.

Max u koolak i awiltalb ku lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, max u exbayalak ani u chobak ejtal xowa kwajat yab tejwa ani max in belomak tajat ke asta u utsl an chntsik ka yoyon, por yab in kanidhax, yab xata u y.
Max ku pidha ejtal xowa u kool an chojontltsik, o ku pidhna tub kin tsikan kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, por yab in kanidhax, ejtal jech, yab xata ti alwa.
Xita u kanidhax, in kool i chaattalb, alwa inik, yab in chakuntsal ni jun xita kal tin kwenta xowa in kool ani yab in tekl tinb.
In lujtalki u kw ani yab in ayal xata abal jajki tin alwabl; yab u chakulom nibal u jilkonal ti chakl max ka tajtsin xata yab alwa.
Yab u kulbl max kin chuu jun xita in wall, u kulbl tam kin chuu u tajnal xowa alwa.
Xita u kanidhax, in kontsal ti chaattalb xi keet; in bell xowa ka utsan ani in aytsal kin jila kin taja xowa yab alwa xi keettsik. In kuxyal jeye ejtal max ka tajtsin xata yab alwa.

An kanidhaxtalb yab jayki in kool in okontal. Neech kin bajaw an kij tam yabich neech ka ln i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, nibal xita neech ka kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb ani yabich jeye neech ka yntsin i chalpadhtalb.
Pos ejtal jech, w ti exll ani w jeye ti lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios;
por tam ki exlaich ejtal, xi w, neech ka wkon.
Tam ti nan in chipl, in kw, in chalpax ani u tajl xowakich jelti jun i chakam; por tam tin inikbch, u jila tu kx ejtal xowa u tajl tam tin chipl.

Anchan jeye, xo i tell na Dios, por jelti max yab i chutal alwa. I chutal jelti jun xata xu xalkanal ba jun i podhenek lam, por neech kin bajaw xowki neech ki chuu alwa. Xo tokot w u exll, por neech ku exla alwa, jelt xan ti na Dios tin exll nan.
Anchan p, an belomtalb, an aytsixtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb, neech ka kwajay echeki; por xowa ms plek kal xi jech x, jaich an kanidhaxtalb.

Yab ka jilatsik ta kndhx jn ani jn ani ka kontsitsik na Dios ti ki pidha ti awiltalb abal ka ejto ka taja xowakichki. Ka kontsitsik ms abal ti ki pidha ti awiltalb ka ejto ka lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Jaj.
Xita u kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb, a Dios in tawnl, yab i atiklbtsik; pos yab u exbantsb kal ni jun xita. Xowa in ulal, kal an Tokat Ejattalb tu pidhnal kin ulu ani jaich xowa yabl tejwa.
Por xin lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, yab ja anchan; in tawnl xi keettsik abal kin tolmiy ka belmchtsik ms, abal kin takiytsik ani abal kin kijidhmdhatsik.
Xu kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb, jajki in tolmiyal tinb abal ka belmch ms, por xin lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, in tolmiyal an belomtsik abal ka belmch ms.

Nan u lak ke ejtal tattsik ka koy i awiltalb ta kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb, por ms u l ka koytsik i awiltalb abal ka lnatsik i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios. Ms alwa ka koytsik jech an awiltalb k ki kwintsik kal xowakichki i kwintalb. Alwa kejle ki kwin kal xowakichki i kwintalb, por max neech ka wilan xanty a ulal; abal anchan, ka tolmiy an belomtsik ka belmch ms.

Kidhblbtsik, yab neech ti ki tolmiy max tu tawnatsik kal keet i kwintalb xi yab a exbayal tam kin kale tu lnatsik. Ms neech ti ki tolmiytsik, max tu tiltsitsik xowa tin xalkantsmal na Dios ani tu ltsitsik an ti tsubaxtalb. Neech jeye ti ki tolmiytsik max tu ltsitsik ti tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ani max tu oktsitsik an tin kwintal na Dios. Ejtal jech, jaich neech ti ki tolmiytsik.
Ki kwajba ti oktsixtalb xowa u tenyb xi yab ejat, jelti an chl o an arpa; max yab ka tenyat xan ti yejat, yab xita neech kin exbay xanty u tenyb.
Tam waach i pjxtalb, max yab ka jutsyat an korneta xan ti yejat, yab xita neech ka tojojon abal ka kale ti pjx.
Anchan jeye u tmnal kal tattsik: max kal an kwintalb xa ynl, ka ulu i tilabtsik xi yab exbantl, jan ti neech ki exbantsat xanty i kwajat a ulaltsik? In junwal jelti max aniki i kwajat ta tilomtsik!
Yn i kwintalb waach tech ti kayl ani ejtal exbantl.
Por max yab u exbayal xan ti kwajat ti kw jun xita, abal nan, in junwal jelti max pl chabl ti tl ani jaj, anlki jeye ti neech ti kin chuu.

Anchan p, kom tattsik a l tajat ka bachu i awiltalb xin pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb abal ka ejto ka taja xowakichki, ka tajatsik an chplb abal ka ejto ka koy ms i awiltalb xowa kl ti ka ejto ka tolmiy ka belmch ms xu belomich.
Jaxtm, xita xu kw kal jun i kwintalb xi yab exbantl, kin kontsi na Dios abal ka pidhan ti awiltalb kin wila xowa in ulal kal jachan an kwintalb.
Pos max kin lan kal i kwintalb xi yab exbantl, u ejattalki u l, yab xata neech ku exbay.
Pos janty p tm yejat ku taja? Yejat kin lan kal nu ejattal, por ku exbay xanty u ulal. Yejat ku ajatna i ajatlbtsik kal nu ejattal, por ku exbay xanty u ajatnl.
Abal max i kwajat a pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal na ejattalki, an kidhblb xi kwajat ta wl, yab neech kin ejto kin ulu “anchan ka tjan” kom yab in exbayal xanty a ulal.
Alwa xna kejle tajat xan ta pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, por an kidhblb xi kwajat ta wl, yab u tolmiyb abal ka belmch ms.
U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios abal ms na u ejtowal tin kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb k tattsik.
Por ban junkuntalb xon tu junkunal an belomtsik, ms u achl in tomnl ku ulu b i kw xi exbantl, abal ku oktsitsik jeye xi keettsik k ku ulu, lju i mil i kw xi yab exbantl.
Kidhblbtsik, ka koytsik na chalab jelti jun xita xi plekich, yab jelti jun i chakam. Kal xowa yab alwa, ka junu jelti an chakamtsik; por kal xowa alwa, ka junu jelti xi pakdha.

An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Neech ku yna i pl iniktsik abal ku tawna an atiklbtsik xi jech i kij kal i kwintalb xi yab in exbayal, por nibal anchan yab neech ti kin exbantsitsik. Anchan tin ulu an Okxlb.”

Jaxtm, an awiltalb xu pidhnal jun xita abal ti kw kal jun i kwintalb xi yab exbantl, alwa abal ti exl kal xi yabtsik u belom ani yaba, abal xu belomichtsik. Por an awiltalb xu pidhnal jun xita abal kin lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, alwa abal ti exl kal xu belomtsik ani yaba, abal xi yabtsik u belom.
Max tam ka junkun an belomtsik, ejtal ka kwin keetich keetich, ani ka ochich jun xita xi yab xata in chob o yab u belom, yabxe neech kin ulu ke i olmanaltsik?

Por max ejtaltsik kwajat in lnl i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ani ka ochich jun xita xi yab xata in chob o yab u belom, neech kin acha abal walbidh ti kwajat. Ani neech kin chalpay tin itsch xan ti kwajat, tam kin acha xowa i kwajattsik a ulal.
Anchan, xowa in kool chinat tin itsch, neech ka xalkan, neech ka tudhlan kin kakna na Dios ani neech kin ulu ke na Dios tsubax lejtal kwajat kal tattsik.

Kidhblbtsik, tam i junkunaltsik, max jun xita in l kin ajatna jun i ajatlb, o in kool jun i oktsixtalb, o in l kin lna jun xata xi pidhnk kin chobna kal na Dios, o in l ti kw kal i keet kwintalb, o in l kin wila xowa u ulwb kal jech an kwintalb, alwa tajat. Por ejtal jech, ka yan abal ka tolmiyat ka belmch ms an belomtsik.
Tam u kw xita kal i keet kwintalb, ka kwin chb o asta x; ani yab junaxki ka kwin, kejtsik. Tm jun, yejat ke jun xita kin wila xowa u ulwb kal jachan an kwintalb.
Por max yab waach ni jun xita xi neech kin ejto kin wila, ms alwa yab xata ka ulwat kal i keet kwintalb ban junkuntalb, tokot ki kwin kal i keet kwintalb abal tatki ani abal na Dios.
Anchan jeye, max neech ka ln i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, ka kwin chb o x; ani xi keettsik, kin exbay xanty u ulwb.
Por max jun i kidhblb xi kwajat buxl, ka pidhan kin chobna jun xata kal na Dios, xi jidhtal, yejat tm kin kubdha ti tilom abal ka kwin jech an kidhblb.
Anchan ejtal tattsik xa bachwal i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, neech ka ejtotsik ta kw juntsik ti juntsik abal ejtaltsik kin wita ani ka tolmiyattsik ka belmch ms.
Xin lnltsik i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, yejat kin ejto kin kubdha tinb ani kin aytsi asta xowki in lujyal ka kwin.
Pos na Dios, yab u ukpindhax, tokot in pidhnl i kijidhtalb. Ka tajatsik xan tin tajl ejtalki xu dhabalbich kal na Dios.
Ke an mmlbtsik yab ka kwin xon tu junkunal an kidhblbtsik ti l, pos jech yab in tomnl kin taja. Yejat kin tajatsik xowa ka utsan, jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
Max in l kin chobna jun xata, kin konoy nin tomkl, por tin kim; pos yab u xalkanal alwa ke jun i mmlb, ka kwin xon tu junkunal an kidhblbtsik ti l.
Yejat ki chobna ke nin kwintal na Dios yab kal tattsik ti tujenek, nibal tatkitsik a bachmal.

Max jun xita in chalpayal ke in kool i awiltalb kin lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios, o in chalpayal ke teykmte tajat kal an Tokat Ejattalb, yejat kin chobna ke xowa in kwajat tu dhutsuntsaltsik, in takixtal an Ajtiklb.
Por max yab in l kin exbay ke jaich in takixtal a Dios, jila kwajat.
Anchan p, kidhblbtsik, ka aliytsik xan ti ka uwa abal ka koy i awiltalb ka lna i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ani yab ka taxkantsitsik xu kw kal xowakichki i kwintalb.
Por ka tajatsik ejtal in tsubtalki ani in lujtalki.
Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chalpaytsik an alwa tilab xi tu tiltsmaltsik. Jech jaich an alwa tilab xa bachmalichtsik ani jaich xa ntsaltsik ka bela.
Anl jeye, kal tin kwentaki jech an alwa tilab, i loodhichtsik. I loodhichtsik max ka ntsi ka bela xowa tu tiltsmaltsik ani max yab i ani belmmadhki.
Tin jidhtal, tu oktsitsik xowa nan in oktsink. Tu oktsitsik ke na Kristo chemech kal tin kwenta ni walab, jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab.
In ulal jeye an Tokat Dhuslab, ke jolyat ani ke tin xlb a kts, ejech ti t;
ke in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Pedro ani tayl abal ka chutat kal xi ms an abatwletsik.
Tayl in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal b i bo inik i kidhblbtsik jun kallki ani yn xi jachan an kidhblbtsik, xo bl kwajat ejattsik, por taltsik chemnekich.
Tayl in xalka tinb abal ka chutat kal na Jakobo ani ms tayl abal ka chutat kal xi ms an abatwletsik.
Tin okontal, tam ti ejtal jech in chumalichtsik, in xalka tinb abal ku chuu neye ani ku bela maske taylich. Jelt xan ti jun i chakam xu wachinal tam watenekich i kij.
Pos nan jaich xi ms kuxlek kal an abatwletsik ani nibal in tomnl kin bijyat tin abatwle, pos u atax tajtsmaltsik tajat xin belltsik na Dios.

Por xo, u bajmalich kin kwajay xan tin kwajat kal nin alwatalki na Dios; ani an alwatalb xi tin kontsi, yab jilkon jelti max yab xata in jalbl. Nan ms in tjnk k xi ms an abatwletsik; maske xowa u tajmal, yab kal nanki u chp tu tajmal, na Dios, xi kwajat kal nan, jaich nin tajmal kal nin alwatal.
Por yab yejat ki dha ti kwenta xita tjnk, max nan o jajtsik; xowa na uluts, jaich ke i tilmal an alwa tilab ba tattsik ani a belmalichtsik.
Por max waw i oktsixnl ke na Kristo ejnek ti t, jantki p tm taltsik xi tattsik in ulal abal yabich u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik?
Pos max an chemlomtsik yabak u ejeltsik ti t, yabichak jeye ejnek ti t na Kristo.
Ani max na Kristo yab ejnek ti t, u kalelich jelti max yab xata in jalbl xowa i oktsixnl ani xowa a belltsik jeye.

Max anchan, u kalelich tm yab tsubax xowa i oktsixnl kal tin kwenta xowa na Dios in tajm. Pos in ulal ke na Dios in ejdhmal ti t na Kristo ani max yabich u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik, u kalelich tm yab tsubax ke na Dios in ejdhmal ti t na Kristo.
Max an chemlomtsik yabichak u ejel ti t, nibal na Kristo yabichak ejnek ti t;
ani max na Kristo yab ejnek ti t, an belomtalb xa kooltsik yab xata in jalbl, blki i walbidhtsik ta kwajat.
Ani max anchan, xi chemnekichtsik ani in belmal na Kristo, kibchonk jeye ti kwajattsik.
Max tokotki tam tech u kwajat ejat ti kool an aytsixtalb ba na Kristo, ms wa chojontl i chubl k xi keettsik.

Por xowa tmnk, jaich ke na Kristo ejech ti t tam ti chemdh; Jaj jaich na jidhtal xi ejech ti t abal kin xalka ke xi chemnektsik neech ka ejech ti t. Anchan, in junwalich jelti nin jidhtal wall jun i tayablb.
Pos anchan xan ti an cheml kal tin kwentaki jun i inik ti tujey ban kayl, anchan jeye kal tin kwentaki jun i inik ti neech ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik.
Anchan jelti ejtal xu kidhtalb kal na Adn u chemel, anchan jeye, ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Kristo neech ka ejdh ti t.
Neech ka ejdh an chemlomtsik xowki tin lujyal ka ejdh. Okox ejdh na Kristo abal ka kwajay jelti nin jidhtal wall jun i tayablb; ani tayl, tam ka tsch na Kristo, neech ka ejdh xu dhabalbtsik kal Jaj.
Tam na Kristo kin wkch ejtal an takixtsik, an awiltalbtsik, an chplbtsik ani tam kin watbantsch ti takix na Dios an Ttalb, tm neech ka tsch an pakwenib.
Pos na Kristo neech ti takix tam ka tantsatich kal na Dios xita kl tu atnal.
Xi neech ka wixk tin okontalich, jaich an cheml.

Pos na Dios in kwajbmalich ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo. Por tam an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ke ejtalich kwajbadh abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo, jech yab in l kin ulu ke na Dios kwajat jeye taknl kal na Kristo. Pos Jaj jaich nin kwajbmal ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo.

Por tam ejtalich kwajat taknl kal na Kristo, Jaj, xu Chakmlb kal na Dios, neech jeye tm ka kwajch abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Dios, abal na Dios ka kwajay kal ejtalki ani abal ejtalki. Jech na Dios, jaich nin kwajbmal ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo.
Anl jeye, waach taltsik xu pujnaltsik kal tin kwenta xi chemnekichtsik, jantki tin tajltsik jech? Max an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, jantki tu pujnaltsik kal jajtsik tin kwenta?
Max an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, jolatki i watnl i yajtsiktalb.
Kidhblbtsik, tsudhey ka tsudhey i tametnl an cheml. Jech tsubax tajat, jelti an kijidhtalb xu achl kal tin kwenta abal a bellichtsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo.

Tam tin kwajat Efeso, in pjxnk kal an iniktsik xi ataxtsik tajat, xin junwal jelti an padhumtsik; por, janty u tmal kal jech? Max tsubax lejtal ke an chemlomtsik yabich u ejel ti t, u kalelich tm tsubax xin ulaltsik ench: “Wana tu kapul ani tu uchal, ke kalm neech ku chemech.”
Yab ka kambiytsik tab, xita u junkunal kal xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa, neech jeye ka chilkoyat.
Ka koytsik na chalab alwa ani lujat, yabich ka walatsik. Pos taltsik xi tattsik yab in exll na Dios, u ulal jech abal ki tidhebtsik.
Por neech xna ka konoxin jun xita ench: “Jan tu ejel ti t an chemlomtsik? Janti uwats nin tul neech kin koy?”
Xita in konyal anchan, yab lej chalpadh, pos tam u taynal jun i iyalb, jachan an iyalb kool ka chemech abal ka ixkan.
Max ka tayan i idhidh, yab jaich an idhidh neech ka kale, neech ka kale an m o xowa ka tayan.
Por na Dios in pidhl tin akan an tayablb xan ti Jaj na Dios tin l; ani ejtal an iyalbtsik, keetich keetich in akan u pidhnal.
Ejtal xin kool in tul tech ti chabl, yab jununl ani; nin tul an iniktsik, keetich jeye; nin tul an konltsik, keetich jeye; nin tul an tooltsik, keetich jeye ani nin tul an chichintsik, keetich jeye.
Waach xin kool in tul abal ka kwajay walki ani waach xin kool in tul abal ka kwajay tech ti chabl; por keetich jeye nin labdh xi walki ani keetich jeye nin labdh xi tech ti chabl.
Nin tajx na kts, yab in junwal jelti nin tajx na ch, nibal in junwal jelti nin tajx na ttsik. Na ttsik, keetich keetich tin kool nin tajx.
Anchan jeye u tmnal tam u ejel ti t an chemlomtsik. U jolyb i tul xu kachel ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi yabich u kachel.
U jolyb i tul xi pojkantl ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi labidh. U jolyb i tul xi yab likat ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi likat.

U jolyb i tul xu pidhnk abal ku kwajay tech ti chabl ani tam ku ejech ti t, u ejel kal jun i tul xi jaich abal ku kwajay walki. Max waach i tul xi jaich abal ku kwajay tech ti chabl, waach jeye i tul xi jaich abal ku kwajay walki.

An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ke an jidhtal inik xin bij Adn, tajan ani pidhan tin ejattal. Por na Kristo, xin junwal jeye jelti na Adn, in kool in ejattal xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Na Dios tu pidhmal okox ti tul abal ku kwajay tech ti chabl ani tayl neech ti ku pidha ti tul abal ku kwajay walki.
An jidhtal inik xi tajadh kal i kut, techki ja ti chabl; in chabtal an inik, xi jaich an Ajtiklb, walki Ja ti tl.
Nin tul an iniktsik xi tech ti chabl, in junwal jelti an inik xi tajadh kal i kut; por xita kin bela na Kristo, neech kin koy in tul jelti na Kristo.
Anchan xan ti kool ni tul xi tech ti chabl, anchan jeye ti neech ki koy ni tul xi tl walki.
Kidhblbtsik, tu utsltsik, ke ni tul yab neech ka ochich xon tu takix na Dios; pos xu kachel yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay xon ti kwajat xi yab jayki u kachel.
Neech tu utsatsik jun xata xi kwajat yab tejwa: Yab ejtal neech ku chemech; por ejtal neech ku jalkuyat.

Neech ku jalkuyat jikatki tajat, jelt tam ki mutna ani ki lamna ni wal, tam ka achatm ti jutsyb an korneta tin okontal. Neech ka jutsyat an korneta ani an chemlomtsik neech ka ejdh abal yabich ms jayki ka chemech ani waw, neech ku jalkuyat.
Pos ni tul xu kachel, kool ka jalkuyat kal xi yab jayki u kachel; ani ni tul xu chemel, neech ka jalkuyat kal xi yab jayki u chemel.

Tam ni tul xu kachel ka jalkuyatich kal xi yab jayki u kachel ani tam ni tul xu chemel, ka jalkuyatich kal xi yab jayki u chemel, tmunich tm xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench: “Wkontsat tin awiltal an cheml.
An cheml yabich xo in kool in awiltal abal ti ku yajlombdha ani yabich jayki neech kin ejto ti ku ta.”
Xowa kl tu pidhnal ti awiltalb an cheml abal ti ku yajlombdha, jaich kal an walastalb. Ani an walastalb, u pidhnal tin chp kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Por ki pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, xi tu tolmiyal ki ta jech kal tin kwenta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.

Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, yab ka jilatsik ka bela an Ajtiklb ani yab ka jlkkliytsik na chalab. Ka ntsitsik ka tjontsi echeki an Ajtiklb, pos a chobichtsik ke an tojlb xa tajl abal an Ajtiklb, yab jolatki.
Kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb abal an belomtsik xi chojontl, ka tajatsik anlki jelt xan tu utsmaltsik an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Galasia.
Tin jidhtal ktsjil an semana, juntsik ta b yejat ka plmdhl w an tolmixtalb. Ka plmdhl w, xantiki ta tmaltsik; ka tapatsik, abal yab tam kin kale tu lnatsik, tm ka junkutsik i tolmixtalb.
Tam kin ulich tachan, neech ku aba Jerusaln an kidhblbtsik xi tattsik a takwym. Neech ku abatsik abal kin jntsi an ti tolmixtalb ani ti dhutsadh w, an kidhblbtsik xi taja.
Ani max yejat neye kin kale, in neech neye kal jajtsik.
Tam kin kale tachan Korinto, neech kin watey ban chabltsik xi Masedonia ani tayl, tm neech kin ulich kal tattsik.
Yab u chob max kin jilkon w i kij kal tattsik o tachan ku watna nin chamy, ani tayl ti kin tolmiytsik abal ku ntsi an bl xon ti yejat kin kale.
Yab u l kin kale tu lnatsik junwki, u l kin kwajay w i kij kal tattsik, max an Ajtiklb anchan kin lena.
Por neech kin kwajay tech Efeso asta ka watey nin ajb an Pentekosts.
Pos u chutal ke alwa tajat ku taja nin tojlbil an Ajtiklb ani neech tajat ka kale alwa, maske yn tajat waach xu tamkuxtsik abal yab ki taja jech an tojlb.
Max ka ulich tachan na Timoteo, ka bachutsik alwa abal ka kwajay kijidh ani yab ka kwajay u chalpax, pos jaj in tjontsal jeye an Ajtiklb jelti nan.
Jaxtm, yab ka pojkatsik, ka tolmiytsik tokot abal ka tsch kijidh xon tin kwajat, pos in kwajat u aytsm junax kal xi ms an kidhblbtsik.
Kal tin kwenta an kidhblb Apolos, u pakabdha tajat abal ka kale ti ki lnatsik junax kal an kidhblbtsik, por yab in lena ka kale xo; por neech ka kale tam ka jolkan.
Yabtsik ki kwajay ukpipidh ani yabtsik ka jila ta belom. Ka likedhatsik tab.
Ejtal xowa ka tajatsik, ka tajatsik kal i kanidhaxtalb.
Kidhblbtsik, a chobichtsik ke nin kidhtaltsik na Estfanas, jaich xi okox ti belmchtsik. Jajtsik u kwajl ban chabl xi Akaya ani xo, kwajatichtsik in tjontsal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
Tu pakabdhltsik abal ka exbantsi xowa ti ki utsatsik. Yab tokot jajkitsik, ka exbantsitsik jeye xin junwal jelti jajtsik, xi ti tolmiyaltsik ani ti tjontsaltsik.
In kulb tajat abal tsch na Estfanas, na Fortunato ani na Akaiko, pos jajtsik in tajmal xowa yab a ejtowaltsik ka taja, kom yabtsik tech i kwajat.
Jajtsik tin likedhantsitsik an tu ejattal ani ti likedhantsitsik teye. Jelti jech an kidhblbtsik, yejat ki kanidha.
An belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Asia, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Na Akila ani na Prisila, ani an kidhblbtsik xu junkunal bin kim, ti abtsaltsik tajat ti chapndhomtalb tin bij an Ajtiklb.
Ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb ejtal an kidhblbtsik. Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb.
Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti chapndhomtalb kal nan tajat u kubak.
Max jun xita yab in kaknl an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, ka kwajb abal ka kale ban kibeltalb. Ajtik, ki tschich!
Ke nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik.
Ejtal tattsik tu kanidhltsik tajat tin bij na Kristo Jess. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, kom na Dios anchan tin lenmal. Nan ani an kidhblb Timoteo, i dhutsuntsal jech an ti w xu kwajltsik Korinto xin bellich na Dios ani ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios xu kwajltsik putl ban chabl xi Akaya.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Ki pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, pos Jaj, jaich ni Tta Dios xi tu kontsal an ti yajnantsixtalb ani xi echeki tu kijidhmdhl.

Na Dios tu kijidhmdhl tam i watnl xowakichki i yajtsiktalb abal ki ejto weye ki kijidhmdha xi exom in watnltsik xowakichki i yajtsiktalb. Ki kijidhmdha kal jaychki an kijidhtalb xu pidhnal kal na Dios.
Anchan xan ti watnl yn i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta abal i bellich na Kristo, anchan jeye ti bachwal yn i kijidhtalb abal i bellich na Kristo.

Por max waw i watnl i yajtsiktalb, jaich abal ki kijidhmdhtsik ani ki lowat; max u kijidhmdhb, jaich abal ki kijidhmdhtsik ani ki lowat. Anchan, neech ka ejto ka kuxuy kal i chaattalb an yajtsiktalb jelti xi waw i watnl.
Ke anchan jelt xan ta bachwaltsik an yajtsiktalb jelti waw, anchan jeye ti neech ki kijidhmdhtsik.

Kidhblbtsik, i l ka chobna ke i watna tajat i yajtsiktalb ban chabl xi Asia. Plek tajat an yajtsiktalb xi watna ke nibalich i achl max neech ki ejto ki kuxuy; ani i chalpay ke yabich neech ki ejto ku kale ejat taja.

I acha jelti max u bijtsidhich ke neech tu chemel. I tamu anchan, abal ki kwajba ni itsch ba na Dios ani yab ki chalpay ke neech ki ejto ki watna kal wawki i chp. Jech na Dios, jaich xin ejdhl ti t an chemlomtsik.
Na Dios tu loo tam ti walmich ku chemdh. Max tu loo tam ti tamu anchan, neech kin ntsi ti ku loo.

Na Dios neech kin ntsi ti ku loo, kom tattsik i l kal waw ti kwenta. Ani kom yn xita tu kontsintsal, kal yn jeye ti neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an chejwalixtalb xi Jaj tu pidhl.

Xantki tu kulbl, jaich kal jech tin kwenta: I chob abal u xechink lujat tin tamt na Dios ani yab i tekmal tib; anchan tu xechink kal ejtalki ani ms kal tattsik. Yab i ynmal wawki i chalab, i ynmal nin alwatal na Dios.
Kal tin kwenta xowa tu dhutsuntsaltsik, yab tu dhutsuntsaltsik keet, tokot xowa a ajyal ani a exbayaltsik; ani u l ka exbay alwa asta tin okontal xowa tu dhutsuntsaltsik.
Anchan xan ta exbaymalichtsik ban w xi tu dhutsuntsmal, ke tattsik i kwajat i kulbl kal waw ti kwenta, anchan weye ti neech ku kwajay u kulbl kal tattsik ta kwenta, tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jess.
Kom nan u chalpayal ke anchan ta kwajattsik, u chalpayal kin kale okox tu lnatsik ani ki kulbtsik abal tu lnmaltsik chbl.
U chalpaymwiik kin kale tu lnatsik tam kin kale Masedonia ani tayl, tam kin witsiy na Masedonia, kin watey jun tu lnatsik ti t. Anchan, neech ka ejtotsik ti kin tolmiy ku ntsi an bl abal Judea.
Awxe yabki u chalpaymal alwa tam tu chalpay jech? O a chalpayaltsik ke xowa u chalpayal ku taja, nanki u chalpayal tu kwetm chalab abal u ulal “neech” ani tayl “yaba”?
Por na Dios in chob alwa ke yab i jlkkliyal ni chalab kal xowa tu utsltsik.
Pos na Jesukristo, nin Chakmil na Dios, xi na Silbano, na Timoteo ani nan i tilmal ba tattsik, yab in jlkkliymal nin chalab. Ejtal xowa in ulmal, ejtal tsubax.
Pos kal Jajki na Kristo tu tjnal ejtal xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin taja. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tam i pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios, i ulal “anchan ka tjan”, tin bij na Jesukristo.
Na Dios jaich xi tu takwymal ani xi tu tajl abal ku kwajch kal na Kristo.
Jech na Dios, jaich xi tu exliymalich ani tu kwajbantsmalich an ti Tokat Ejattalb ba ni itsch jelti jun i okxintsixtalb kal xowa neech ki bachu.
Por max yabl in kalnek Korinto jelt xan tu chalpaymal, na Dios in chob alwa ke jaich abal tattsik ta alwabl. Max in kambix, u pidhnl tub abal kin chemdh.
Yab abal ka chalpaytsik ke i l tu tajtsitsik ti chplb kal xowa yejat ka bela, pos alwaich xan ta belomichtsik. Xowa i l, jaich ke tattsik ki kwajay ms kijidh.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti yab u lena kin kale tu lnatsik abal yab u l tu tepindha.
Pos max tu tepindhatsik, tm, jita neech ti kin kijidhmdha? Tokot tattsik, xi tu tepindhmal.

Jaxtm tu dhutsuntsitsik, pos yab u lena kin kale tu lnatsik abal ti kin tepindha. U l tu lnatsik abal ti kin kijidhmdha, pos u chob alwa ke max nan in kwajat kijidh, ejtal tattsik neech teye ki kwajaytsik kijidh.
Tam tu dhutsuntsitsik jech an ti w, in uknal tin kwajat kal tin kwenta an tepintalb xu achl tu itsch. Yab tu dhutsuntsitsik abal ki tepin, tu dhutsuntsitsik abal ka chobna ke tu kanidhltsik tajat.
Por max jun xita tin tepindhmal, yab nanki tin tepindhmal, ti tepindhmaltsik teye w. U ulal “w”, abal yab ka lej achatsik kalpidh.
An kwiyaxtalb xi tattsik a pidhmal ban junkuntalb jachan xin walmal, lejat kl.
Jaxtm, awilichtsik ka pakwlantsi ani ka tolmintsi abal yab ka lej tepin ani ka ukpindh kal jachan an tepintalb.
Tu pakabdhltsik abal ka xalkantsi ke tsubax lejtal ta kanidhltsik.
Tu dhutsuntsmaltsik jeye jech, abal u l ku chuu max a tajltsik lejtal xowa tu utsa.
Xita tattsik ka pakwlantsi, u pakwlantsal neye. Pos xita u pakwlantsmalich, u pakwlantsmalich tin tamt na Kristo abal tattsik ta alwabl.
Anchan ti yejat ki taja abal an lej atax yab ti ku ta, pos i chobich xan tu kambix.
Tam tin ulich ban bitsow xi Troas abal ku tila nin alwa tilbil na Kristo, in tolmiyat tajat kal an Ajtiklb ku taja jech an tojlb kal ni jun i tamkuxtalb.
Maske anchan ti tmun, blki yab tsubax nu ejattal abal yab u ela an kidhblb Tito. Jaxtm, u utsatsik abal in nechich ani in kale ban chabl xi Masedonia.

Por i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, xi echeki tu tolmiyal ki ta xowa yab alwa, kom u kwajatich kal na Jesukristo. Na Dios tu ynl abal ki buku an alwa tilab, jelt xan tu bukel in niwy jun i niwiytalb.
Pos waw i junwal jelti jun i niwiytalb xi na Kristo in pidhl na Dios ani u bukel putlki xon ti kwajat xi loodhichtsik ani xi kibchonkichtsik.

Abal xi kibchonkichtsik, jech an niwiytalb in junwal jelti max jaich jun i niwiytalb xu chemdhax; por abal xi loodhichtsik, in achltsik jelti max jaich jun i niwiytalb xin pidhnl i xechintalb. Ani abal ki taja jech, jita kwajat tojojodh?

Waw yab i junwal jelti xi xeechtsik in janwal an alwa tilab abal kin ejto kin tlomna. Yab i tajl anchan, waw u kw kal yantam i tsubaxtalb tin tamt na Dios, kom tu abatwlejil na Dios ani tu tojnlil na Kristo.
Tam i ulal jech, a chalpayaltsikxe ke i tujwalich jun ki tila tib alwa? O yejat tu ltsitsik jun i dhutsadh w xi tu till alwa o tu kontsitsik jelti jech an dhutsadh w jelt xan tin tajl taltsik? Yaba!

Pos tatichtsik ni kwajat jelti an dhutsadh w xi tu till alwa, xi waw i yntsal; i kwajattsik ba ni itsch jelti max i dhutsadh. Ani ejtalki neech kin ejto kin exbay ani kin chuu ke anchan, kal tin kwentaki xan ta kwajattsik.

Tattsik jaich an dhutsadh w xi tu till alwa xin dhutsmal na Kristo, tam ti waw i tila an alwa tilab ba tattsik. Jech an dhutsadh w, dhutsadh kal nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios xi kwajat ejat, yab dhutsadh kal i dhutsumtalb; yab dhutsadh ba tujub, dhutsadh bin itsch an iniktsik.
I chob alwa ke na Dios in chutal abal alwa xowa i tajl, kom na Kristo tu tolmiyal.
Yab ki ulu ke waw u awil ki taja jun xata kal wawki ti kwetm chalab; pos yab ani, ejtal xowa i tajl, a Dios tu tolmiyal ki taja.

Na Dios tu pidha ti awiltalb abal ki tila jun i t lejkintalb xi yab kwajat dhutsadh; jech an t lejkintalb tl ban Tokat Ejattalb. Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, yab in pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, an Tokat Ejattalb jaich nin pidhnl.

Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, dhutsan ba lemdha tujubtsik. Tam ti na Moiss kale kin bachu jech an takixtalb, chaxixl tajat ti witsiy ke nibal u ejtowb ka teltsin tin wal kal an israelitatsik. Por jachan an chaxixltalb potey kaym ti kaym. Pos max ulich kal yantam i labidh tokattalb jachan an takixtalb xi yab in pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal,
awxe yab ms plek nin labidh tokt neech kin koy an tsubaxtalb xin pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb?
Max nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss xi tu xalkantsal ke u walbidh, ulich kal i labidh tokattalb, ms plek an labidh tokattalb neech kin xalka na Dios tam tu kwajbaich alwa kal Jaj.
Pos an okox takixtalb in kool jeye nin labidh tokt. Por jech an labidh tokattalb, yab in junwal jelti nin labidh tokt an t lejkintalb.
Jaxtm, max xi yab neech ka owey, in koy in labidh tokt, ms ja plek nin labidh tokt in kool, xi neech ka kwajay malill i kij.
Kom i chob ke jech an t lejkintalb neech ka kwajay malill i kij, jaxtm ti till kal ni jun i jkib.
Yab jelti na Moiss, xin putsuy nin wal kal jun i kudhkum abal an israelitatsik yab kin chuu ti tepel jachan xi yab neech ka owey.

Por an israelitatsik yab in exbay, pos asta xo, tam kin ajaytsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in junwal jelti max putsudh nin wal kal an kudhkum xin yna na Moiss. Jachan an putsuxtalb yab wkontsidh, pos tokot u wkoyb kal na Kristo.
Asta xo, tam kin ajaytsik nin dhutsadh wil na Moiss, yab in exbayaltsik; pos kwajattsik jelti max putsudh nin chalab kal jun i putsuxtalb.
Por tam kin belaichtsik an Ajtiklb, u wixkintsbich jachan an ti putsuxtalb.
Ani an Ajtiklb, jaich an Tokat Ejattalb; ani xita in koolich tin itsch an Tokat Ejattalb, kldhatsich ban walastalb.

Jaxtm, ejtal waw, kom yabich putsudh ni wal kal an putsuxtalb, i junwal jelti jun i lam xin xalkl nin labidh tokt an Ajtiklb. Anchan, kaym ti kaym exomich i bajwal ku kwajay jelt xan ti na Kristo jeye. Jech jaich nin tajl an Ajtiklb, xi jaich an Tokat Ejattalb.
Jaxtm, yab jayki i jill tib, pos na Dios kal nin kanidhaxtal tu punkuntsmal jech an ti tojlb.
Yabich i tajl xowa u tajnal chinat ani xowa xi tidhetl; yab u xeech tu kambix nibal i jalkuyal nin kwintal na Dios. Yab i tajl anchan; tin tamt na Dios, ejtaltsik in chob ke tokot i ulal xowa tsubax.
Max taltsik yab in exbayal an alwa tilab xi till, jaich abal neechtsik ban kibeltalb.

Pos kom jajtsik yab u belom, jelti max paxkintsidhichtsik tin chalab kal an lej atax xu takix jech i kij. Anchan ti tajtsintsik kal an lej atax abal yab kin chutsi tin tajx an alwa tilab xon tu tilnal nin labidh tokt na Kristo. Jech na Kristo, jaich nin xalkl xan ti jeye na Dios.

Tam i till an alwa tilab, yab u xeech i till tib, tokot i till na Jesukristo ke jaich an Ajtiklb. Pos waw, u kwajat tu tjontsix abal tattsik ta alwabl, kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xi kool abal i bellich na Jesukristo.

Na Dios, xin taja ka wachin i tajaxtalb ban jikwaxtalb, jaich jeye xi jelti max in taja ka wachin i tajaxtalb ba ni itsch. Anchan tin taja abal ki ejto ki chutsi tin labidh tokt na Dios xi kwajat bin wal na Kristo.
I kool nin tajx na Dios ba ni itsch jelti max balidh ba jun i balixtalb xi tajadh kal i kut. Jech jaich abal ka xalkan ke an pulek chplb tl ba na Dios ani yab wawki i chp.
I kyal xowakichki i yajtsiktalb, por yab u jikl; i kyal xowakichki i yejetalb, por yab u chalpax.
U atnal, por yab u walbadh; u kwajladh, por yab u kibdhats.
Xontiki ku kale, u lenb ku chemdh jelt xan ti chemdh na Jess; kom na Jess tu beletnl, u xalkanalich ke Jaj kwajat ejat.
Lejat tech u kwajat ejat, echeki waach xita in l ti ku chemdha kal tin kwenta abal i bellich na Jess. Jech u tmnal anchan abal ka xalkan ba ni tul xu chemel, ke na Jess kwajat ejat.
Echeki i tametnl an cheml kal tin kwenta abal i till an alwa tilab ani tattsik, a koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwenta abal a bachwaltsik an alwa tilab.
I till an alwa tilab kom tsubax ti bell. I till jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “U bela, jaxtm tu tila”; anchan weye waw, kom tsubax ti bell, jaxtm ti till.
Ani i chob ke na Dios, xin ejdha ti t ni Ajtik Jesukristo, neech weye ti ku ejdha ti t kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo; ani neech ti ku jna tin tamt junax kal tattsik.
Ejtal jech xowa i tamwal, jaich abal tattsik ta alwabl. Pos tam yn xi kin bachutsik nin alwatal na Dios, kal ms yn ti neech ka pidhan ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios ani neech ka pubdhantsat tin bij.
Jaxtm, yab jayki i jill tib. Pos maske ni tul u kejmlich, ni ejattal u tmdhb tsudhl u tajkanal.
Pos an yajtsiktalb xi achl tech ti kayl yab lej kalpidh ani jikat u watel; ani kal tin kwenta jech an yajtsiktalb, i tlich jun i pulek labidh tokattalb xi yab jayki in kool in okontal.
Yab ki aliy xowa xi tejwa, ki aliy xowa xi yab tejwa. Pos xowa xi tejwa, yab in kuxyal owat; por xi yab tejwa, yab jayki in kool in okontal.

I chobich ke max ka kibchonich ni tul, xin junwal jelti jun i at xi jikat u pakchunal xon ti kwajat ni ejattal, na Dios tu kontsalich tojojodh t walki jun i at xi yab jayki neech ka pakchun. Jech an at yab tajadh kal i iniktsik, tajadh kal a Dios.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu itixbdhl ni tul xi kool tech ti chabl ani i lakich max na Dios ti ku jalkuntsch an ti tul kal xi tl walki.
Jech ni tul xi tl walki, jaich xon ti neech ka kwajay ni ejattal abal yab ka kwajay anchanki.

Pos anchan p, xu kwajat ba jech ni tul xin junwal jelti jun i at, u itixbl ani u tepinal. I lak max yab ku wkontsat jech an ti tul, por i l jeye ku pidhanich an ti tul xi tl walki abal anchan, ka wixkiyatich ni tul xu chemel ani ki kch ni tul xi neech ka kwajay malill i kij.
Na Dios tu tajmal anchan abal ki ejto ki bachu ni t tul xi tl walki ani tu pidhmalich an ti Tokat Ejattalb jelti jun i okxintsixtalb kal xowa neech ki bachu tayl.
Anchan p, echeki u kwajat tsububudh i itsch. I chob ke lejat u kwajat ba jech ni tul, yabl u kwajat xon ti kwajat an Ajtiklb;
ani jech i chob abal anchan, kom i bell, yab kal xowaki i chutal.
Por u kwajat tsububudh i itsch ani i lakich max ki jilaich jech ni tul xu chemel abal ku kalch tu kwajl kal an Ajtiklb.
Jaxtm, maske u kwajat ba ni tul o u kwajat kal an Ajtiklb, ki tajl echeki xowa Jaj in l.
Pos ejtal waw, kool ku utey xon ti na Kristo neech ti ljundhom. Pos juntsik tu b, kool ki bachu xowa i lujyal kal tin kwenta xowa alwa o yab alwa i tajmal tam tu kwajat ba ni tul.
Jaxtm, kom i kontsal jun i pulek kaknaxtalb an Ajtiklb, i pakabdhl an atiklbtsik abal kin bela an alwa tilab. I chob alwa ke na Dios in chob xanty i y ani i l ka chobnatsik teye xanty i y.

Yab exom i tujwal ki tila tib alwa, xowa i tajl, jaich abal ka ejtotsik ka exla xanty i y ani ki kulbtsik kal jech. Anchan, neech tm ka ejto ka tkoytsik xin tekltsik tinb kal xowaki in chutal ani yab kal xowa waach tin itsch.
Max u kwajat jelti max yab u chalpadh, u kwajat anchan abal a Dios; max u chalpadh, u kwajat anchan abal tattsik ta alwabl.
Ejtal xowa i tajl, i tajl kom tu kanidhl na Kristo. Pos i chalpayal jech: ke max jn chemech abal ejtalkijich, tm, jelti max ejtal chemech.
Na Kristo chemech abal xi xo kwajattsik ejat, yabich ka kwajaytsik ejat abal jajki, ka kwajaytsik ejat abal na Kristo. Jech na Kristo, jaich xi chemech ani ejech ti t abal jajtsik tin alwabl.
Jaxtm, xo yabich i chutal ni jun xita jelt xan tu chutb techki ti kayl; ani max na Kristo i exlmal xantiki tu exlb jun xita xi techki ti kayl, xo yabich anchan ti exll.
Jaxtm, max jun xita kwajatich kal na Kristo, in junwal jelti max wachinkich ti t: Ejtal xan ti xeechwiik, xo yabich anchan ti xeech. Xo, tich i xechintalb in kool.
Ejtal jech, a Dios in tajl. Jech na Dios, jaich xi tu kwajba alwa kal Jaj kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ani tu punkuntsi abal ki ltsi an atiklbtsik xan ti neech kin ejto ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios.

Na Dios in kwajbl alwa kal Jaj an atiklbtsik kal tin kwentaki na Kristo ani yab in dhantsal ti kwenta nin walastalbiltsik. Jech na Dios, tu punkuntsmal abal ki ltsi jech an ti kw an atiklbtsik abal ka kwajchtsik alwa kal Jaj.
Waw u tl jelti jun xita xi abadh kal na Kristo, jelti max Jaj tajat na Dios ti pakabdhltsik kal tin kwenta xowa i lnl. Tu pakabdhltsik tin bij na Kristo abal ki kwajaytsik alwa kal na Dios.

Na Kristo yab in tajmal ni jun i walastalb; por kal wawki ti kwenta, tajan kin kitna kal na Dios ejtal ni walastalbil abal tam ku kwajch kal na Kristo, ku kwajch alwa kal na Dios tin kwentaki na Kristo.
Kom i tjontsalich na Dios, tu pakabdhltsik jeye abal yab ka tajatsik jelti max yab xata in jalbl nin alwatal na Dios xa bachwaltsik.
Pos Jaj in ulal ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: Tam tin bajaw an kij, tu axtsi; tam tin bajaw xowki neech tu lootsik, tu tolmiy. Xo jachich jech an kij; xo jachich xowki na Dios tu loox.
Yab i kwajbantsal ni jun xita ti tojlixtalb abal yab ka tilan ke yab alwa xowa i tajl.

Tokot i l ki xalka kal ejtal xowa i tajl abal u kwajat i tjontsal a Dios. Pos kal yantam i chaattalb ti kuxyal xowakichki i yajtsiktalb. I kuxyal jeye tam i kool xowakichki i yejetalb ani i tepintalb.
Waw u lekbadh ani u balidh al wikaxte, i tametnmal i pjxtalb ani i altsik tojlb, i ejmal i akal ani i watnmal i kanab.

I xalkl ke i tjontsal na Dios, abal u xechich tokat ani abal i exll an tsubaxtalb. Abal i kool i chaattalb ani i alwatalb. Anl jeye, abal tsubax lejtal ti kanidhl ejtalki ani abal i koolich an Tokat Ejattalb ti itsch.
I till an alwa tilab kal tin chp na Dios. I ynl an lujattalb jelti jun xata xu ynal abal tu pjx. I ynl abal ku pjxin ani abal ki loo tib.
Juntsikl i bachwal i kaknaxtalb ani juntsikl i odhbijixtalb; juntsikl u tilnal alwa ani juntsikl u tilnal yab alwa. Juntsikl u usnal abal u kambix maske tsubax xowa i ulal.
Juntsikl u tajnal jelti max yab u exlb ani juntsikl jelti max u exlb; juntsikl i kunuknlich tajat an cheml, por yab xata i tamwal; u tajnal ki watna i yajtsiktalb, por yab u chemdhb.
Maske i watnl i tepintalb, por echeki u kwajat u kulbl; maske u chojontl, por yn xita i tajl kin bachu i lbtajaxtalb tam ki tiltsi an ti alwa tilab; maske yab xata i kool, jyki max kidhat i kool.
Kidhblbtsik xi kwajl Korinto, tu tawnmalichtsik kal yantam i tsubaxtalb; tu pidhmalichtsik ka chobna xan ti waw tu kwajat.
Tattsik a chob alwa ke tu kanidhltsik, por tattsik yab anchan ta kwajat kal waw.
Tu pakabdhltsik jelt xan ti jun i ttalb in pakabdhl nin chakmiltsik. Ti kin ltsi xan ta kwajattsik teye jelt xan ti nan u tajl kal tattsik.
Yabtsik ka koy i junaxtalb kal xi yabtsik u belom, pos jantom junaxtalb neech kin ejto kin koy xi lujat kal xi yab lujat? Neechxe kin ejto ka kwajay junax an tajaxtalb kal an jikwaxtalb?
Jantom junaxtalb neech kin ejto kin koy na Kristo kal an lej atax? O jantom junaxtalb neech kin ejto kin koy jun i belom kal xi yab u belom?

Awxe neech kin ejto kin koy i junaxtalb an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios kal an chilabtsik? Pos tattsik i kwajat jelti an pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios xi ejat, jelt xan ti na Dios in ulu ench: Neech kin kwajay ani neech kin xechin kal jajtsik; Nan neech tin Dios kal jajtsik ani Nan neech ku dhabalnatsik.
Jaxtm, in ulal jeye ench an Okxlb: Yabich ka koytsik i junaxtalb kal jajtsik, yabich ka tajltsik jaich, yabich ka takatsik xowa atax; ani neech tm tu bachch abal tu dhabalnaichtsik,
neech kin kwajay tin Ttalb kal tattsik ani tattsik neech ki kwajay ta chakmlb kal Nan. Anchan tin ulal an Okxlb xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.

Anchan p, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, jech jaich xowa u usnk neech ki bachu. Jaxtm ti yejatich ki jila xowa tu walbindhl, ki jilaich xowa yab alwa xi tajl kal ni tul o kal ni ejattal. Ani kal tin kwenta abal i kaknl na Dios, ki ntsi ki tokedha tib abal ku dhabalnjich kal Jaj.
Yabich ti ku chakuntsi, ti ku kanidhaich. Pos yab xita i waltsmal, yab xita i tajtsmal xowa atax ani yab xita i kambiymal.
Yab exom tu utsltsik jech abal tu walbiy. Pos tu utsmalichtsik abal i kwajat ba ni itsch. Yab neech tu uktsitsik, maske u kwajat ejat o u chemnek, echeki neech ki kwajaytsik ba ni itsch.
U chob alwa ke i alwa iniktsik; nan tu tilltsik alwa tin tamt an atiklbtsik. Kijidh tajat tin kwajat ani in kulbl tajat maske u watnl i yajtsiktalb.
Asta tu ulnek Masedonia, yab i ejtmal tu koyol, pos i tametnl tajat i yajtsiktalb. I watnmal i pjxtalb ani i kymal i jkib ti itsch.
Por na Dios, xin kijidhmdhl xin chakltsik tinb, tu kijidhmdha kal tin kwenta abal ulich na Tito.

Yab tokot u kijidhm abal ulich na Tito, u kijidhm abal i acha ke tattsik a kijidhmdhmal jaj. Jaj tu ltsi abal a ltsik tajat ti ku chuu, tu ltsi abal i tepinaltsik ani abal i chalpaxtsik kal waw ti kwenta. Tam tu acha jech, ms in kulb tajat.
Maske an dhutsadh w xi tu abtsi ti tepindhatsik, yab in kwajat tin chalpax. Ani max in kwajay tin chalpax ti okox, abal u chuu ke jachan an dhutsadh w ti tepindhatsik w i kij,

xo in kulbl; yab abal i tepinktsik, in kulbl abal jachan an tepintalb ti tajatsik ka jilaichtsik ta walablom. An tepintalb xi tattsik a watna, jaich abal na Dios anchan tin lena, yab a watnatsik jech, abal wawki i l ki chuu ka watna.

Tam jun xita in watnl i tepintalb abal na Dios anchan tin l, u tajnal kl abal kin jilaich ti walablom ani in bajwalich an loeltalb; tam ki tamu anchan, yab yejat ku kwajay tu chalpax. Por an tepintalb xi yab Jaj na Dios in l kin chuu ki watna, u jnax ban kibeltalb.

Tattsik a kuxuy an tepintalb xi na Dios in lena kin chuu ka watna ani, ka chuutsik xo xanty tmun! Ti tajatsik ka chalpay alwa jech ani ka lna xanty a tajmaltsik; ti chakdhatsik ani ti jikdhatsik jeye. Tayl a lenatsik ti kin chuu ani a ulutsik abal neech ka yajlombdha xita nin walmal. Kal ejtal jech, tattsik a xalka ke yab a kooltsik a walab kal jech.

Anchan p, tam tu dhutsuntsitsik jachan an ti w, yab jaich abal in kwajat u chalpm jachan xita nin walmal o xita xi waltsidh; u taja anchan abal ka xalkan tin tamt na Dios, ke tattsik i chalpax tajat kal waw ti kwenta.
Jaxtm ti achl u kijidh. Yab tokotki u kulb kal jech tin kwenta, u kulb jeye tam ti chuu abal u kulbl tajat na Tito; pos tattsik a tajmal abal ka kwajay tsububudh in ejattal.

Yab in kale yab alwa tam tu utsa na Tito, ke tattsik i alwa inik. Anchan jelt xan ta chobichtsik ke tokot tu utsltsik xowa tsubax, anchan jeye ti kale tsubax xowa u utsa na Tito kal tattsik ta kwenta.
Ani jaj, ms tajat ti kanidhltsik tam in chalpayal abal a tajatsik xowa jaj ti utsa; ani xan ta bachutsik kal i chaattalb ani kal i kaknaxtalb.
In kulbl tajat abal u chob alwa ke tattsik i alwa inik kal xowakichki.
Kidhblbtsik, i l tu tiltsitsik xan tin xalkmal nin alwatal na Dios ban belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Masedonia.
Maske pakdha i yajtsiktalb in watnmaltsik, blki kijidh tajat ti kwajattsik; ani maske chojontltsik tajat, in pidhnltsik xowa in kool kal yantam i kulbtalb jelti max jajtsik tumnladh tajat.
Nan u chumal, ke kal yantam i kulbtalb tin pidhnltsik i tolmixtalb; ani juntsikl, yandha tajat in pidhnl maske jajtsik ka jilkon yab xata in kool.
U pakabdh tajat kal an kidhblbtsik xi Masedonia abal ki walkatsik jeye kin pidha ti tolmixtalb an kidhblbtsik xi chojontl xu kwajl Jerusaln.
In tajatsik ms k xowa i chalpaymal, pos okox, in pidhnatsik tinb abal kin tjontsi an Ajtiklb xan ti yejat; ani tayl, in pidhnatsik tinb kal waw abal ka tolmixintsik jeye kom na Dios anchan tin l.
Jaxtm ti pakabdhmal na Tito abal ka kale tachan kal tattsik kin junku an tolmixtalb xin tujmal kin junku ms okox.

Tattsik i tax tajat kal xowakichki: i belomtsik tajat, i awiltsik tajat ta oktsix, i chalpadhtsik tajat; i ikaxtsik tajat ka tjontsi an Ajtiklb ani a kooltsik tajat i kanidhaxtalb kal waw. Anchan jeye ti ka tajatsik kal an tolmixtalb.

Yab exom tu utsltsik jech abal ka tajatsik kal i chplb. Tu utsltsik jech abal ka chobna ke xi keettsik in pidhnl an tolmixtalb kal yantam i kulbtalb. Anchan teye ti ka tajatsik abal ka xalkan ke tsubax lejtal ta kanidhaxtsik.

Tattsik a exlantsmalich an tin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Kom ti kanidhltsik tajat, in jila ejtal xowa in kool t walki ani tsch chojontl tech ti chabl. Jaj chojontlb abal tattsik ka bachu yn i alwatalb.

Neech tu utsatsik xanty u chalpayal kal jech tin kwenta abal tattsik ta alwabl. Tattsik alwa ta tujutsik ti jun tamub, yab tokotki abal a junkuwaltsik jech an tolmixtalb, anl jeye abal a tajltsik kal i kulbtalb.
Pos xo, ka ntsitsik asta ka okoy kal jaychki an kulbtalb xa koytsik tam ta tuju, ka pidhnltsik xantiki ta kool.
Abal max jun xita tsubax lejtal tin lenl kin pidhna i tolmixtalb, na Dios in bachwal an tolmixtalb xantiki jn tin kool; Jaj yab in konyal xowa jn yab in kool.
Yab ka ulutsik ke waw i l ki chuu ka watnatsik i kanab kal tin kwentaki abal a pidhnl i tolmixtalb.

Yab jaich i l, xowa i l, jaich ke ki kwajaytsik junax aniki. Xo tattsik a kool abal ka pidha xowa jajtsik in yntsal; tayl jajtsik jeye neech ti ki pidha xowa tattsik ka yntsi. Ani anchan jununlich tm neech ki kwajaytsik,
jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Xita in koy yn, yab in jila; ani xita in koy w, yab in watna i yejetalb.”
U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios abal in kwajbantsi bin itsch na Tito jaychki an kanidhaxtalb jelti xi nan u kool kal tattsik.
Jaj neech ti ki lnatsik, por yab abal nanki u abmal; kom ti kanidhltsik tajat, jaxtm ti neech ti ki lnatsik, por kal jajki tin kwetm chalab.
I aba jeye junax kal na Tito jun i kidhblb xu exlb kal an belomtsik abal alwa inik tajat. Jaj exom tajat ti tojnal alwa abal kin tila an alwa tilab.

Ani yab tokot jechki, takwyat jech an kidhblb kal an belomtsik abal ka kale kal waw ani ka tolmixin kal jech an tojlb. Exom i tajl jech an tojlb abal tin kaknabl an Ajtiklb ani abal ki xalka ke tattsik a kulbetnl tajat ta tolmix.
Max ka kale jun xita kal waw, yabich tm xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke yab i kidhat pidhnmal an tolmixtalb.
Pos exom i tajl jech in lujtalki, yab tokotki tin tamt an Ajtiklb, tin tamt jeye an atiklbtsik.
I aba jeye kal jajtsik jun i kidhblb, xin kulbetnl tajat kin tjontsi an Ajtiklb kal xowakichki. Jaj in kulbetna tajat ka kale ti ki lnatsik kom in chob abal neech ka pidhnatsik an tolmixtalb.

Max jun xita ti ki konoytsik xitam j jeye na Tito, ka utsatsik abal nan u junik ani u tolmiwl abal tu tjontsitsik. O max jun xita ti ki konoytsik kal tin kwenta xi keet an kidhblbtsik, ka utsatsik abal abnkki kal an belomtsik ani in kaknltsik jeye na Kristo.
Jaxtm, ka bachutsik kal yantam i kaknaxtalb abal anchan, ka xalkantsi an belomtsik ke tsubax lejtal ta kanidhaxtsik jelt xan ti waw ti tiltsmaltsik.
Kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb abal an kidhblbtsik, yabich xna yejat tu dhutsuntsitsik;

pos tu exlantsalichtsik an ta alwa ejattal. Echeki u utsl an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xi Masedonia, ke tattsik xi kwajl ban chabl xi Akaya i kwajatich tojojodhtsik asta ti jun tamub abal ka pidhnatsik an tolmixtalb. Kal jech tin kwenta ti yn xu kwajltsik Masedonia in lenmaltsik ti tolmix tam tin acha ke tattsik i tolmix kal yantam i kulbtalb.

Por blki u abl jech an kidhblbtsik abal yab t ka kale yab tsubax xan tu tilmaltsik kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb. U abl jech an kidhblbtsik abal kin chuu max tsubax lejtal i kwajat tojojodhichtsik jelt xan tu ulmal;

yab telab ke taltsik xi Masedonia ka kale kal nan ani yabtsik tojojodh ki elan. Max yab ki elan i tojojodhtsik, tidhetlich tm abal waw ani abal tattsik teye, kom i ulmalich ke i kwajat tojojodhichtsik.

Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu utsa an kidhblbtsik ke yejat ka okxin abal ti ki tolmiytsik ka tojojoy an tolmixtalb xa ulmaltsik ti okox ke neech ka pidhna. U l ke jech an tolmixtalb xi tattsik neech ka pidhna, ka pidhnatsik abal tsubax ta l ta tolmixtsik ani yab kal i chplb.
Tu utsltsik jech: Xita w kin taya, w jeye neech kin junku; ani xita yn kin taya, yn jeye neech kin junku.
Juntsik ta b yejat ka pidhna xan ta chalpayal ta itsch; yab kal i tepintalb nibal kal i chplb, pos na Dios in kanidhl xin pidhnl kal i kulbtalb.
Na Dios in kool i awiltalb abal ti ki pidha yandha xowakich i alwatalb. Anchan, neech tm ka koytsik echeki xowa a yntsal ani neech jeye ka koytsik tajat abal ki tolmixin kal xowakichki i yejetalb.
An Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: In pidhmal yn an chojontltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb ani xowa in tajl lujat, u jilkonalich abal echeki.

Na Dios, xin pidhl ti iyalb an m, in pidhl jeye ti kapnl abal kin kapu. Anchan jeye neech kin taja kal tattsik, neech ti ki pidhatsik yn xowa ka chejwalixna jelt xan tu pidhnal yn ti iyalb jun i m; ani neech ti ki yanedhantsi an ti chejwalixtalb, jelti tam an m kin junkch xowa in taymal.

Anchan, neech ka koytsik yn xowakichki abal ka ejto ka pidhnatsik kal yantam i kulbtalb. Ani kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb xa junkmaltsik abal ki jntsi an kidhblbtsik, neech kin pidhatsik ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios tam kin bachu.
Abal tam ki pidhaichtsik jech an ti tolmixtalb an kidhblbtsik, yab tokotki i pidhl xowa in yntsaltsik, i tajlich jeye abal jajtsik kin pidha tajat ti jalbintsixtalb a Dios.

Jajtsik neech kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios, pos kal jech an tolmixtalb, u xalkantsbichtsik abal a tajl xan tin ulal nin alwa tilbil na Kristo. Neech jeye kin pubdhantsitsik tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta an tolmixtalb xi tattsik ka pidhna abal jajtsik ani abal ejtalkitsik.
Ani jajtsik neech ti ki kontsintsitsik ani neech ti ki kanidhatsik tajat kal tin kwenta abal i kwajatichtsik tajat bin alwatal na Dios. Kom i kwajatichtsik bin alwatal na Dios, jaxtm ta tolmixtsik.
I pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tin kwenta an chejwalixtalb xi Jaj tu pidhl xi yab neech ki ejto ki wila!
Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu pakabdhltsik kal nin chaattalbil ani nin alwatal na Kristo. In usnal ke u chakl tajat tub tam in kwajat kal tattsik, por in pojkax kwa tajat tam in kwajat w.

Pos tu pakabdhltsik abal tam kin kale tachan, yab ti kin tajatsik ku yna an pojkaxtalb kal taltsik na kidhtaltsik xi tin utsl ke xowa u tajl, nanki u tajl tu kwetm chalab; pos yab u jiknl ku tametna xin ulaltsik anchan.
Tsubax kejle ke waw u inik weye, por yab u pjx jelt xan tu pjx xi techtsik ti kayl.
Pos an ylbtsik xi ynl tu pjx, yab j jelti xi waach tech ti kayl. An ylbtsik xi ynl, in kool in chp na Dios abal kin ta xowakichki i tamkuxtalb.

Kal jech an ylb, i pakwal xowakichki i chalab ani i tamkuxtalb, xin kwajbl xin tekltsik tinb abal yab ka exl na Dios. I kwajbl jeye ba na Kristo xowakichki in chalab an iniktsik abal kin tajatsik xowa in l na Kristo
ani tam ka tajlichtsik xowa in l na Kristo, waw u kwajat tojojodh abal ki pidha ti yajtsiktalb xita kin chikat taja na Kristo.
Tattsik a tell jun xata xantiki ti tejwa. Max jun xita in achl abal kwajatich kal na Kristo, yejat jeye kin chalpay ke waw u kwajatich weye kal na Kristo.

Maske ku teka w tub kal tin kwenta an awiltalb xi tin pidhmal an Ajtiklb, yab u kool xantki ti kin tidheb; pos an Ajtiklb tu pidhmal jech an ti awiltalb abal tu tolmiy ki belmchtsik ms ani yab abal ki kaletsik ban kibeltalb.
Yab u l ka chalpaytsik ke u l tu jikdha kal i dhutsadh w.
In usnal ke tam u abnl i dhutsadh w, chapik kwa tajat in tawnax ani in kwiyax; por nan tajat, in chaatki kwa tajat ani pojkantl kwa tajat in kw.
Por xita in ulal jech, yejat kin chobna ke anchan xan ti dhutsl an tilab tam u kwajat w, anlki jeye neech ki taja tam u kwajat kal tattsik.

Waw yab i ulal ke i junwal nibal i junbayal tib kal taltsik xin kulbetnl kin tila alwa tinb. Jajtsik in xalkl ke yab chalpadh abal in tilltsik alwa tinb ani abal in jnbxliyaltsik tinb kal xi keettsik.
Waw yab neech ki lej teka tib kal tin kwenta an tojlb xi tajl. Na Dios jaich nin lnl xon talat in bajwal ni tojlbil ani Jaj tu walkmal ku ulich Korinto asta xon ti tattsik i kwajat.

Jaxtm, yab exom tu kalel xon talat i lujyal tu tojnal. Max yabakwiik bl u ulnek kal tattsik, jeltich tm max exomich tu kalel xon talat i lujyal tu tojnal. Por yab anchan, pos waw u okxink ki jna nin alwa tilbil na Kristo asta xon ta kwajattsik.
Yab exom tu kalel xon talat u bijtsidh ku tjon, nibal i ulal ke waw u tjnk xon ti keet tjnk. Yab anchan, tokot i l ki chuu ki belmchtsik ms abal ki ejto ku tjon ms kal tattsik.
Tayl i l ki tila pl an alwa tilab ms w k xon ti tattsik i kwajat. Por yab i l ki taja jech an tojlb xon ti exomich ti tojnal keet, nibal i l ki teka tib kal tin kwenta i tojlb xi keet in tajmal.
Max jun xita in tekl tinb, kin teka tinb kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.
Abal an inik xu kldhb ti alwa, yab jaich xi jajki in till tinb alwa, an inik xu kldhb ti alwa, jaich xu chutb ti alwa inik kal an Ajtiklb.
U lak max ti kin axtsitsik w xowa neech ku ulu xu usnal ke i tntotalb! Ti kin axtsitsik.
Nan tu kanidhltsik tajat, kal jun i kanidhaxtalb xi tl ba Dios; pos tu pidhnmalichtsik ba na Kristo ani u l tu ututsik kal Jaj, jelti jun i tsidhan xi neech ka tomkin kal jnki tokot i inik.
Por u chejnl ki kambiyattsik jelt xan ti kambiyat na Eba kal an chan ani ki plmdhantsattsik an ta chalab abal yabich ka ntsi ka bela na Kristo in lujtalki.

Pos tattsik a bachwal max jun xita ka ulich in till keet a Jess k xi waw i tilmal ba tattsik. A bachwaltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb jun i ejattalb xi yab jaich an Tokat Ejattalb xa bachmalichtsik; ani a bachwaltsik jeye jun i oktsixtalb xi yab jaich xa bachmalichtsik.
U chalpayal ke nan yab ms w u jalbl k jachan xu bijyb ti “pakdha abatwle.”
Maske yab u lej ejtowal tin kw alwa, por u kool an chalab; jelt xan ti xalkmalich kal ejtalki ani xantikichki.
Awxe walats xowa u taja tam tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab ani yab tu utsatsik ti kin jalbiy? Yab walats xowa u taja tam ti nan u chaka tub abal tattsik ki tekb.
U bachkuntsmal ti tumn keet an belomtsik abal ku koy xowa u yntsal; ani anchan, ku ejto tu tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab.

Tam tin kwajay kal tattsik ani u koy i yejetalb, yab u kontsi xata ni jun xita. Pos an kidhblbtsik xi ulich xi tl Masedonia, tin pidhatsik xowa u yntsal. Yab tu kontsitsik xata, nibal jayki neech tu kontsitsik.

Anchan jelt xan ta chobich alwa ke u exllich nin tsubaxtalbil na Kristo, anchan jeye tu chob ke ni jun xita xu kwajl ban chabl xi Akaya, yab neech kin ejto ti kin wixkintsi jech an ti kijidhtalb xu kool.
Jantki tin kw anchan? Awxe yab tu kanidhltsik? Na Dios in chob alwa abal tu kanidhltsik.
Por neech ku ntsi ku taja xowa u tajl abal yab ku walkatsik xi xeech in ayal xan ti kin koytsik jun i kijidhtalb jelti xi waw i kool.
Pos jechtsik i kambix abatwletsik, u kambixtsik. In wynltsik ke u abatwle kal na Kristo.
Ani jech yab yejat ki lbna, pos an lej atax u xechinal jeye jelti tokat abatwle xu dhabalb kal a Dios.

Jaxtm ti yab yejat ki lbna, ke nin tojnliltsik u xechinal jeye jelti iniktsik xin tajl xowa lujat. Por tam kin bajaw an kij, neech kin bachutsik xowa in lujyal kin bachu kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal.
U witskowal jun ku ulu jech: ke ni jun xita kin chalpay ke nan yab in chalpadh, por max anchan ta chalpayaltsik, ti kin walkatsik tin kw jelti max yab in chalpadh abal ku ejto neye ku teka w tub.
Xowa neech ku ulu yab Jaj an Ajtiklb tin pidhl ku ulu, jech u ulal jelt xan tu kw jun xita xi yab chalpadh ani in l kin teka tinb.
Pos kom yn waach xin tekltsik tinb kal jajki tin kwetm chalab, neech neye ku teka tub.
Kom a chalpayal ke i chalpadhtsik tajat, a kuxyaltsik kal yantam i kulbtalb xi yabtsik chalpadh.
Pos a kuxyaltsik max jun xita ti ki jolibna, max ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa ani max ti ki kwey. A kuxyaltsik jeye max ki tajan jelti max yab xata a jalbl ani maske ki pikyat.

Maske tidhetl ku ulu, waw yab tajat i toknmal ki taja xowa in tajl taltsik! Por xowa keettsik in toknl kin taja, neech neye ku tokna ku taja, maske jech xowa u ulal, u ulal jelt xan tu kw jun xita xi yab chalpadh.
Jajtsik u ebreo? Nan neye. U israelitatsik? Nan neye. U kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham? Nan neye.

U tjontsixtsik ta Kristo? Nan ms k jajtsik. Exom tin kw jelt xan tu kw jun xita xi yab chalpadh. Pos nan ms in tjnkich k jajtsik, ms in kwadhnkich k jajtsik, ms ynlich tin balyb ban wikaxte ani yantalich tajat u tametnmal an cheml k jajtsik.
Botalich u bachwal jun inik lajubelju i wichate tam in lekbayb kal an judotsik.
Oxtalich in wisidh kal i te ani juntal, in tujbadh. Oxtalich tin luychinal kal i tan ani jun i kij u watna jun i akal ani jun a kts chejel pujal.

In belnekich tajat ynl; u watnmalich tajat i kakadhtalb ban waljatsik ani i kakadhtalb kal i kwtsik. In kajnadh kal nu at kidhtaltsik ani kal xi yab u at kidhtaltsik. U watnmalich i kakadhtalb ban bitsow, ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ban pujal ani in tajtsidh xowa yab alwa kal xin kambixnltsik ke u belom.
U kymal tajat i tojlb ani in chekenek; ynlich tajat u ejmal i akal; u watnmal i kanab ani i tsiknib; ynlich tajat in klnk; u watnmal in chamy ani u yntsmal u kudhkmil.
Ani yab tokot jki u watnmal jech, tsudhey ka tsudhey in chalpax kal tin kwenta ejtal an belomtsik.
Max jun xita kwajat yab lej likat, jyki max nan na yab in likat. Max ka walbindh jun xita, tidhetl u achl ani in chaklml kal xu walbindhax.
Max yejat ki teka tib, nan neech ku teka tub kal tin kwenta tam tu acha yab in likat.
Na Dios, nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, xin tomnl ka kakn malill i kij, in chob abal tsubax xowa u ulal.
Tam tin kwajay Damasko, an pulek awiltalb xi kwajat in tjontsal an pulek takix xin bij Aretas, in kwajba i belkoltsik bin wilbil an bitsow abal kin yakwan ani kin jn tin wiknl;
por in pab kal jun i toknal bin bentanajil in mapl an bitsow ani anchan tu ejto ku chinkontsi.
Yab xata neech ku ta max kin xechin ku tila alwa tub. Por neech ku tila an xalkantsixtalb xi tin pidhmal ku chuu an Ajtiklb.
U exll jun i inik xin bell na Kristo. In koolich lajuch i tamub, jech an inik jn asta tin xlb an walki. Yab u chob max jn kl in tul o yaba; por na Dios in chob.
Por u chob abal jachan an inik, kl in tul o yaba, jachan yab u chob, tokot na Dios in chob,
jn ban kijidhtalb xon tin acha i tilabtsik xi yab xita in achmal jayki ani yab u walkb ke jun xita kin ulu.
Nan neech ku ejto ku tila alwa jech an inik, por nan yab neech ku ejto ku teka tub, tokot neech ku ejto ku teka tub kal tin kwenta tam ku acha yab in likat.

Por max nan u l ku teka tub, jachan, yab jaich jun i tntotalb, pos tokot neech ku ulu xowa tsubax; por yab u tajl anchan abal ni jun xita yab kin chalpay ke nan ms in plek tin kwajat k xan tin chutaltsik o xowa in achltsik u ulal.

Na Dios tin xalkantsi yn xata labidh, por abal yab ku lej teka tub, in yajlombdh kal jun i yajal xi jyki jelti max in xikan kal jun i kdh bu tul. Jech, tsch jelti jun in yamtal an lej atax abal ti kin yajlombdha.
Oxtalich u pakabdhmal an Ajtiklb abal ti kin wixkintsi jech an ti yajal;

por an Ajtiklb tin utsmal ench: “Nu alwatal jaich tokot na yntsal; pos nu chp u xalkanal ms alwa tam jun xita yab lej likat.” Jaxtm tin kulbl tajat kom yab in lej likat abal ka xalkan ba nan nin chp na Kristo.

Jaxtm, kal tin kwentaki abal u bellich na Kristo, in kulbl tajat abal yab in lej likat. In kulbl tam in odhbijyb, tam u kool i yejetalb, tam in atnal ani tam in tepinal. Abal tam ku acha yab in likat, tmich ti ms in likat.

Nan u junwal jelti jun xita xi yab chalpadh abal in kwajay ku teka tub, por tattsik tin tajmal ku taja anchan. Pos tattsik nin tomnl ti kin tila alwa; pos kal ni jun xata ti w u jalbl k jachan xin ulal ke jajtsik u pakdha abatwle maske nan yab xata u jalbl.
Kal an tojlb xu taja kal tattsik kal yantam i kaymtalb, xalkan kal i exltsik ani i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ke tsubax lejtal tin abatwle.
Kal jantokl tu tajmal ms w a jalbl k xi keet an belomtsik? Tokot abal yab tu kontsmaltsik ti kin tolmiy. Ti kin pakwlantsi abal yab tu kontsitsik ti kin tolmiy!

Xo in kwajatich tojojodh abal kin kale tu lnatsik tin oxtsl ani yab in neech abal tu tojliytsik. Pos yab u ayal xowa a kooltsik, tu ayal tattsik; pos an ttalbtsik jaich na yejat kin junku an tumn abal an chakamtsik ani yab an chakamtsik abal an ttalbtsik.
Nan neech ku paku kal yantam i kulbtalb xowa u kool, asta neech ku pidhna tub kal tin alwabl na ejattaltsik; maske lejat nan tu kanidhltsik ms, tattsik ms wich tin kanidhltsik.
Por taltsik, maske in chob abal yab xata tu kontsmaltsik, in ulaltsik ke nan tu kambiymaltsik.
Awxe u ynmal jun xita xu abmal abal tu kambiytsik?
U pakabdha na Tito abal ka kale ti ki lnatsik ani u aba jeye kal jaj na jn an kidhblb. Awxe ti kambiytsik na Tito? Yabxe tsubax ke nan ani na Tito, jaychki an chalab i kool ani jaychki ni ejattal?

Kal jech xowa i ulal, a chalpayaltsikxe ke i l ki kldha tib tu alwa kal tattsik? Yaba! Exom tu kw tin tamt na Dios tin bij na Kristo. Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, ejtal jech xowa tu dhutsuntsaltsik, jaich abal ki belmchtsik ms.

Abal u chejnl ke tam kin kale tu lnatsik, t yab tu elatsik xan ti nan u l ani tattsik, yab teye ti kin chuu xan ti tattsik a l. U chejnl max ku ela i pjxtalb, i tlxtalb, i chkxtalb, i kxtalb, i dhbjxtalb ani i tlxtalb. U chejnl tu elatsik yab i kwajajadh alwa ani ka tekltsik tab.

U chejnl jeye ke tam kin kale jun tu lnatsik, na Dios ti kin tidhebdha kal tattsik ta kwenta; ani kin ukin kal tin kwenta xi yn xi tattsik xin walmtsik ms okox ani asta xo yab in jilmaltsik ti kwajl yab exbadh. Bl u junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal ani in ntsal kin tajatsik xowa in kulbetnl nin tul.
Jech jaich tin oxtalich tin neech tu lnatsik. Ejtal neech ka lejkin kal tin kwintal chb o x i lnaxtsik.
Tam tin kwajat kal tattsik, u utsa xin walltsik ani xo u utsltsik jun ani xi keettsik jeye, ke tam kin kale jun tu lnatsik, yab neech tu kontsitsik ti yajnantsixtalb.
Anchan, neech tm ka chuchtsik ke na Kristo xi kwajat tu itsch, jaich nu kw. Ani na Kristo neech Ja ti ki tawnatsik chapik, pos Jaj yab Ja neech ti ki tawnatsik kal i chaattalb.

Na Jesukristo pajkiyat ban peltsidh te tam ti xechin kal in tul jelti xi waw i kool; por xo, kwajat ejat kal tin chp na Dios. Anchan weye waw, i junwal jelti Jaj tam ti pajkiyat ban peltsidh te, por u kwajat ejat jelti Jaj kal tin chp na Dios abal tu tolmiytsik.
Ka chuutsik tab max tsubax lejtal ta belomich, ka exlatsik alwa tab. Yabxe a chobtsik ke na Jesukristo kwajat ba tattsik, max tsubax lejtal ta belomtsik?
Nan u l ku chuu ka exbaytsik ke waw yab u kambix.
I kontsal na Dios abal yab ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa, yab abal waw ku kldh tu alwa, i tajl anchan abal ka tajatsik xowa alwa, maske waw yab ku kldh tu alwa.
Pos yab neech ki ejto ki tomna xowa in ulal an tsubaxtalb, tokot neech ki ejto ki tolmiy abal ka tajan xowa in ulal.
Jaxtm tu kulbl tam i achl yab u likat abal tattsik ki likey; ani neech ki ntsi ki kontsi na Dios abal ka lujkutsik ms tab.

Tu abtsaltsik okox jech an ti w abal ka lejkiytsik tab. U tajl anchan abal tam kin kale tu lnatsik, yab tu chapik tawnatsik kal an awiltalb xi tin pidhmal an Ajtiklb. Jech an awiltalb xi tin pidhmal an Ajtiklb, jaich abal tu tolmiytsik ms ki belmch ani yab abal tu kibdhatsik.

Ani xo kidhblbtsik, ki kwajaytsik i kulbl, ka aliytsik xan ti ki kwajay ms lujat, ki kjdhmdhxin, ka koytsik junini na chalab ani ki kwajaytsik kijidh. Ani na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb, neech ka kwajay kal tattsik.
Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb.
Ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo ani nin kanidhaxtal na Dios. Ani ke an Tokat Ejattalb ka kwajay echeki kal tattsik. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, in abatwle, yab in abnk nibal in bijidh kal i iniktsik; in bijidh ani in abnk kal Jaj tajat na Jesukristo ani kal na Dios an Ttalb. Jech na Dios, jaich xin ejdha ti t na Jesukristo tam ti chemdh.
Nan ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat kal nan, i dhutsuntsal jech an ti w an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabl xin bij Galasia.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Dios an Ttalb ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.

Jech na Jesukristo, jaich xin pidhna tinb ka chemdh abal ti ku wixkintsi an ti walastalbil ani ti ku loo kal xowa yab alwa xi waach tajat xo jech i kij. Anchan ti tjan kom ni Tta Dios anchan tin lena.
Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy na Dios malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
In labnal tajat abal exom a jilltsik jikat na Dios, xi ti kanymaltsik kal tin kwenta nin alwatal na Kristo ani exom a wwnltsik jun i keet oktsixtalb.
Yab abal ki ulu ke waach keet i alwa tilab. Xowa u tmnal, jaich ke waach taltsik xi ti ojtsaltsik ta chalab ani in ltsik kin jalkuy nin alwa tilbil na Kristo.

Por max jun xita ti ki oktsi jun i oktsixtalb ani ka achatsik abal yab j an alwa tilab xa achmalichtsik, ke jachan an inik ka kwajb abal ka kale ban kibeltalb, yab ka dhatsik ti kwenta maske jachan an inik jaich nan o jun i tokat abatwle xi tl walki.
Jelt xan ti ulmalich okox, xo i witskowal jun ki ulu: Max jun xita ti ki oktsitsik jun i oktsixtalb ani yab j xa bachmalichtsik, ke jachan an inik ka kwajb abal ka kale ban kibeltalb.

Tam u ulal jech, awxe jaich abal u l kin kldh tin alwa kal an atiklbtsik o abal u l kin kldh tin alwa kal na Dios? Awxe jaich abal u l kin jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik? Yaba! Max u lenlkijak lejtal kin jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik, yab neech ku ejto ku tjontsi na Kristo.
Kidhblbtsik, ka chobna ke an alwa tilab xu till, yab in chalab i iniktsik.
Yab u bachmal nibal in oktsidh kal ni jun i inik; xita tin oktsmal, jaich na Jesukristo.

Tattsik a achmal xan tin kwajatwiik tam ti nan u wewkmtsal tin belomtal an judotsik. Ani a chobichtsik jeye xan tu atax tajtsmal xin belltsik na Dios abal u lenl ku taxkantsi an ti belomtalb xin kool.
Kal nin belomtal an judotsik, nanwiik na ms okox tajat tin kwajat tam ti jachan i kij k nu kidhtaltsik; pos nan mswiik u kulbetnl tajat ku taja alwa xowa tu jiltsmal ki taja ni weje pakliltsik.
Por na Dios tin takwymal tam ti yabl in wachink tin chakam ani Jaj tin kanymal kal tin kwenta nin alwatal. Jaxtm, tam ti Jaj anchan tin lena,
tin taja ku exlantsi an tin Chakmil abal kin xechin ku tila ban atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo. Tam ti nan u tamu jech, yab in kale ku konoy ni jun xita xanty yejat ku taja,
nibal in kale Jerusaln abal ku chuu xi kejle u abatwlejichtsik tam ti nan yabl. Tokot in kale ban chabl xu bijyb Arabia ani tayl in witsiy jun Damasko.
Tayl, tam ti watenekich x i tamub, tm tin kale Jerusaln; u exla na Pedro ani in kwajay kal jaj lajub a kts.
Por yab u chuu ni jun xita ms xu abatwletsik jeye, tokot u chuu na Jakobo, nin kidhb an Ajtiklb.
Tu utsltsik tsubax tin tamt na Dios, ke jech xowa exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik, ejtal tsubax.
Ms tayl, in kale ban chabl xin bij Siria ani ban chabl xin bij Silisia.
Xin bellichtsik na Kristo, xu kwajltsik ban chabl xin bij Judea, yabtsik tin exll.

Tokot in achltsik u tilnal ench: “Xi tu kajnlwiik tajat abal ti ku atax tajtsi, xo jaj xeech in ulal ke yejat ka belan na Kristo. Jech xi xo in ulal anchan, jaich xi ti wel chabki in lenlwiik kin taxka an belomtalb.”
Ani in pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios tam tin achatsik xanty in tajmal kal nan.
Tam ti nan u belaich na Jesukristo ani watch lajuch i tamub, in kale jun Jerusaln kal na Bernab ani u jna jeye na Tito kal nan.

In kale taja, abal na Dios tin ltsi kin kale. Taja Jerusaln, u junkun wawki kal an ultalb abatwletsik xi exlmte ti oklektsik ani u ltsitsik an ti alwa tilab xu tiltsal xi yabtsik u judo. U taja jech abal yab u l ke xowa u tajmalich ani xowa in kwajat u tajl, ka jilkon jelti jun xata xi yab in jalbl.
Por nibal na Tito, xi ta jeye ti kwajat kal nan, maske u griego, yab tajtsin ti chplb abal kin taja an exl bin tul jelt xan tin tajl an israelitatsik.

T jeye kejle ti kwajat xin ani ulal ke u kidhblbtsik, xi ochenektsik chinatki kal waw. Jechtsik in l kin chuu xantki ti yabich i wwnl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess, pos jajtsik in l kin chuu ku jolibn kal jachan an takixtalb.
Por yab i walka nw ti ku kambiytsik kom yab i l ki chuu ka kibdhatsik an tsubaxtalb xa bachmalich kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab.
Por yab tin pidhatsik ni jun i t chalab xi kwajattsik exlmte ti ultalb abatwletsik; (maske nan yab kejle xata ku yna xanty in y jajtsik, pos na Dios yab kwajat in tell max jun xita ms ultalb o yaba).

Jajtsik yab in ejto ti kin pidhatsik t ti chalab, tokot in exbaytsik abal a Dios tin punkuntsmal jech an ti tojlb abal kin xechin ku tiltsi jech an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo, jelt xan ti na Pedro punkuntsidh abal kin taja jech an tojlb ban judotsik.
Jech na Dios xin kwajbmal na Pedro ti abatwle ban judotsik, jaychki xi tin kwajbmal neye tin abatwle abal xi yabtsik u judo.

Jaxtm, na Jakobo, na Pedro ani na Juan, xu bijyb kal an belomtsik ti oklek, in exbaytsik abal a Dios tin pidhmal jech an ti alwatalb. Nan ani na Bernab u chapndha kal jajtsik jelti jun i exl abal ki chuu ke jajtsik tu kulbetnl weye tin at abatwle ani in ulutsik abal alwa ku xechin ki tiltsi an ti alwa tilab xi yabtsik u judo, lejat jajtsik neech kin taja jech an tojlb ban judotsik.
Tokot tu punkuntsitsik abal yab ki uktsi ki tolmiy an chojontltsik; ani anchan u tajl, yab u uktsal an chojontltsik.
Por tam ti na Pedro tsch ban bitsow xin bij Antioka, u kwiya tin tamt abal xowa xin taja, yab alwa.

Pos jidhtal, jaj u kapulwiik kal xi yabtsik u judo, por tam ti ulich chb x i iniktsik xi abnk kal na Jakobo, in tuju tm ti wml ani in jila ti kapul kal xi yabtsik u judo. Pos in jiknl jachan an iniktsik xin kool an exl bin tul kom u judotsik.
Tam ti na Pedro chutat in tajl anchan, in taja jeye xi keet an judotsik xu belomich, asta na Bernab in taja jeye anchan.

Por tam ti nan u chuu abal yab in tajl xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb xi kwajat ban alwa tilab, u utsa ench na Pedro tin tamt ejtal an belomtsik: “Max tat, xi jaich jun i judo, i kwajl jelt xan tu kwajl xi yabtsik u judo, jantki ta utsltsik ka kwajay jelti judo xi yabtsik u judo?”
Waw kejle u judo asta tu chakam ani yab u lej walablom jelt xi keet an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik u judo.

Por i chobich alwa ke na Dios yab neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj ni jun xita, abalki in tajmal xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; tokot neech kin kwajbl alwa kal Jaj, xita kin bela na Jesukristo.
