Jaxtm waw, i belmalich weye na Jesukristo abal ti ku kwajbaich alwa na Dios kal Jaj tin kwentaki jech an belomtalb ani yab abalki yab i chikat tajmal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Pos na Dios, yab neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj ni jun xita abalki yab in chikat tajmal jech an takixtalb.
Ani xo, max waw ki lena ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, u xalkanalich tm jelti max waw weye u walbinalich, awxe jech in l kin ulu ke na Kristo tu tajl ku walbin? Yaba!
Pos max ku paku jun xata ani tm ku taja jun, in kalelich tm in walbidh.

Abal jachan nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tin taja kin chemech ani xo yabich neech kin ejto tin takiy jachan an takixtalb; xo, neech ku ejtch kin kwajay ejat ani tokot ku tjontsal na Dios.

Nan in kwajat jelti max in chemnekich pajkidh ban peltsidh te junax kal na Kristo. Jaxtm, xi xo kwajat ejat, yabich nan; jaich na Kristo xi kwajat ejat ba nu ejattal. Ani xi xo kwajat ejat ba nu tul, jaich an xechintalb xu bachu tam tu belaich nin Chakmil na Dios. Jech nin Chakmil na Dios, jaich xi tin kanidhl tajat ani in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal nan tu kwenta.

Yab u l ku pojkantsi tin alwatal na Dios; pos max jun xita neechak kin ejto ka kwajch alwa kal na Dios abalki yab in chikat tajmal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tm, yabich xata ti neech ka yan an cheml xin watna na Kristo.

Chojontl a chubl atiklbtsik xi Galasia, yabtsik tajat a exbayal! Awxe jun xita ti dhimkaymaltsik abal yabich ka ejto ka exbaytsik an tsubaxtalb? Kal an tiltsixtalb xi waw i tajmal, tu ltsmalichtsik ta tamt, Jaj tajat na Jesukristo, xi chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Ti kin utsatsik p xo jech: A bachmaltsikxe an Tokat Ejattalb abal yab a chikat tajmaltsik nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss o abal a belmal xowa a achmaltsik?
Jantki awil ti yabtsik tajat a exbayal? A chalpayaltsikxe ka kidhbay kal tatkitsik a chp xowa a tujmaltsik kal an Tokat Ejattalb?
Yn i yajtsiktalb a watnmaltsik kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, ani yab xata ta ynmaltsik? Yabich tajat in tomnl max anchan!

Tam na Dios ti ki pidhatsik an tin Tokat Ejattal ani kin taja i labidh labandhaxtalb ba tattsik, jantki tin tajl? Yab in tajl abal yabtsik a chikat tajl nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in tajl, abal a belltsik xowa a achmal.
Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani kal nin belomtalki, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.
Jaxtm, yejat ka chobnatsik ke xu kidhtalbtsik kal na Abraham, jaich xu belomtsik.

Dhutsadh ti kwajat ban Tokat Dhuslab ke na Dios neech kin kwajba alwa kal Jaj xi yabtsik u judo kal nin belomtalki, jaxtm na Dios tin okxintsm kin utsa jech an ti alwa tilab na Abraham: “Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti kayl, neech ka lbtjan kal tatki ta kwenta.”
Jaxtm, xita ka belmch, u lbtjnalich jeye tm junax kal na Abraham xi belmmadh.

Xin kwajbltsik nin belomtal bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kibchonktsik ti kwajat. Abal an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Xita yab kin taja ejtal xowa kwajat bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, kibchonktsik ti kwajat.”

Tejwaich p tajat, ke ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay alwa kal na Dios abalki in tajmal xowa kwajat bin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Max jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios abalki u belom, yabich jayki neech ka chemech.”
Ani nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, yab jaich abal ki kwajba taja ni belomtal, tokot in ulal ench: “Xita kin ejto kin taja ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb, neech ka kwajay alwa.”

Na Kristo tu loo kal nin xichl abal yabich ku kwajay ban kibeltalb xin pidhnl jachan an takixtalb, pos na Kristo, tajan jelti jun xata kibenek kal wawki ti kwenta, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Kibenek tajat xita ka pajkiyat ba jun i te.”

Jech tmun abal kin bachutsik an lbtajaxtalb xi yabtsik u judo xi usnk neech ka pidhan na Abraham kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess ani ki ejto jeye ki bachu ejtal tu b, an Tokat Ejattalb xin ulmal na Dios neech ti ku pidha kal tin kwentaki ni belomtal.

Kidhblbtsik, tu kwajbantsal jun i ltsixtalb xi kldhats ban xechintalb xi techki ti kayl: Tam jun i inik kin taja jun i lejkintalb ani kin jila dhutsadh nin bij, ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin paku nibal kin puntsiy jachan an lejkintalb.

Pos xo, xowa na Dios in utsm neech kin pidha na Abraham, utsan jeye nin kidhtal. An Tokat Dhuslab yab in ulal: “kidhtalbtsik” jelti max yn i atiklbtsik, tokot in ulal: “ani na kidhtal.” Jech in l kin ulu jnki tokot i inik, jaich na Kristo.

Xowa u ulal jaich jech: Na Dios in tajm jun i lejkintalb kal na Abraham ani in lej tsubka. Jaxtm nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, xi ulich ch i bo inik kal jun inik lju i tamub ms tayl, yab neech kin ejto kin wkoy jachan an lejkintalb ani kin jila yab xata in jalbl xowa in ulmal na Dios.

Pos max an jiltsixtalb xi neech ku pidhan kal na Dios, tokot neech ku pidhan abalki i tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, tm, yabich neech ki bachu abalki i bell xowa na Dios in ulmal; por na Abraham pidhan aniki tajat jachan an jiltsixtalb kal na Dios tam tin bela xowa utsan kal Jaj.

Pos tm, jant ti alwa nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss? Kwajb taylich abal ka xalk an walastalb xin tajl an atiklbtsik. Tokotki neech ti ynal asta ka ulich jachan an “kidhtalb” xi usnk neech ka pidhan xowa in ulmal na Dios. An takixtalb tiladh kal i tokat abatwletsik ani na Moiss yn abal kin ltsi jachan an takixtalb an atiklbtsik.
Por yab yejat ni jun i ltsix tam jnki tokot i inik, pos na Dios, jn tokot.

Awxe jech in l kin ulu ke nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss yab in junwal kal xowa in ulmal na Dios? Yaba! Pos max pidhnatsak jun i takixtalb xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, neech tm ki ejto ku utey abal ku kwajch alwa kal na Dios abalki i tajl xowa in ulal an takixtalb.

Por xowa in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab jaich jech: ejtal i wiknl ta kwajat kal an walastalb; anchan tin ulal abal an belomtsik kin ejto kin bachu xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna, kal tokotki kin bela na Jesukristo.
Tam ti yabl ulnek an belomtalb, u wiknl tu kyb kal an takixtalb, i aytsm ka pidhn ka chobn an belomtalb.

Jaxtm waw, u kwajatwiik u belkmte kal an takixtalb jelti max u tsitsik chakam abal ti ku oktsi asta tam ka ulich na Jesukristo ani kal tokot ki bela Jaj, ki ejto ku utey abal ku kwajch alwa kal a Dios.
Ani xo, kom ulnekich an belomtalb, yabich u kwajat bin takixtal jachan nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Pos kal tin kwentaki abal i belomich, ejtal tattsik i chakmlbich kal na Dios abal i kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
Ejtal tattsik xi kwajatich kal na Kristo abal i pujadhichtsik, i kwajatich i mkmte kal Jaj jelti max Jaj, u xeketlb.
Yabich yejat max u judo o u griego, u jolib o yaba, inik o i uxum; pos max i kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess, ejtal tattsik jn tokot ta ynal.
Ani max i dhabalbichtsik kal na Kristo, tm, i kidhtalbichtsik teye kal na Abraham ani neech ka bachutsik jelti jun i jiltsixtalb xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidhna.

Xowa u l ku ulu jaich jech: Max jun i chakam xi neech kin bachu jun i jiltsixtalb chipl bl, in junwal jelti jun i jolib xi kwajat ti tjontsix ba jun i at maske jaj in dhabal ejtal xowa waach taja ba jachan an at.
Waach taltsik xin beletnl i chakamtsik ani in beletnl jeye xowa neech ka jiltsin asta xowki kin ulu an ttalb abal ka pidhanich.
Anchan jeye u tmnal kal waw. Tam ti waw u xeech jelti max u tsitsik chakam, u kwajinek belkmte kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani kal xowakich an belomtalb xi waach tech ti kayl.
Por tam tin bajaw xowki na Dios tin ulmal, in aba nin Chakmil, xi wachin ba jun i tsidhan mmlb ani ulich jelti jun i judo, taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Nin Chakmil na Dios, tsch abal ti ku kldha bin takixtal jachan an takixtalb ani ti ku bachch na Dios jelti max tu chakmil.
Ani abal ti ki xalkantsitsik ke i chakmlbich kal Jaj, na Dios ti abtsi an tin Tokat Ejattal nin Chakmil ba na itsch. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba na itsch in ulal kawidh ench: “Tat tu Tta!”
Anchan p, tat jaich jn xu chakmlbich kal na Dios ani yabich i jolib. Kom i chakmlbich kal Jaj, na Dios neech ti ki pidha an ti jiltsixtalb xin ulmal neech kin pidhna.
Ti wel chabki, tam ti yabltsik a exll na Dios, i kyb ta jolib kal i chilabtsik.

Por xo, kom a exllichtsik na Dios, o ms alwa ki ulu, ke na Dios ti exllichtsik xo, jantki bl ta chalpayaltsik ki witsiy kal jachan an chalab xi yab xata in jalbl ani yab alwa abal ki kyattsik jun kal jachan an takixtalb jelti jun i jolib?
Tattsik bl a pakwlantsal taltsik a kts, a ch, in ajumtal a ch ani i tamubtsik.
In kwajl tajat tin chalpax abal u chejnl max an tojlb xu tajmal ba tattsik, yab xata in jalblnmal.

Kidhblbtsik, tu punkuntsal abal ki kwajaytsik jelt xan ti nan in kwajat; pos nan in kwajatwiik in taknl kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, por xo yabich, xo in wenkonkich jelti jn ti b xi tattsik. Yab abal ki ulu ke tattsik tin tajtsmal jun xata yab alwa.
Pos jelt xan ta chobichtsik, tam ti jidhtal tu tiltsitsik jech an alwa tilab, jaich abal in yawlch.

Ani jachan an yawlch xu koy, jaich abal ki chutat xantitsik teye; por ibch abal a chuutsik anchan, tin pojkmalak o yabak tin bachmaltsik. Yab a dhatsik ti kwenta max anchan, ms tokot tin bachutsik alwa jelti max nan tin tokat abatwlejil a Dios, jelti max nanich nin Jesukristo.
Janty tmun kal jachan an kijidhtalb xa achatsik? Tsubax u ulal, ke max a ejtowalaktsik ka jixa na wal, a jixmalaktsik ani tin pidhmalak.
Ani xo, awxe ka ulutsik tu atlki abal tu ltsaltsik an ti tsubaxtalb?
Jachan an atiklbtsik in l tajat kin chuu ki junkun kal jajtsik, por yab abal ta alwabltsik. Xowa jajtsik in l, in l kin chuu ki wkon kal waw ani ki kaletsik kal jaj.
Pos alwaich, alwa kejle ki kaniy jun xita abal ka junkun kal waw, por ki taja abal tin alwabl ani echeki, yab tamki nan in kwajat kal tattsik.

Tsitsik chakmil, u achl jun i yajtsiktalb kal tattsik ta kwenta jelti an yajal xin achl jun i nnalb tam nechich kin wachiy jun i chakam; ani neech ku ntsi ku acha jech an yajal, asta ku chuu ke a junwalichtsik jelti na Kristo.
U lak max in kwajat xo kal tattsik abal ku ejto tu tawnatsik alwa; pos yabich u chob xanty ku chalpay kal tattsik ta kwenta!
Tattsik, xa lenl ka ntsi ka wwna nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, ti kin utsatsik jech: Yabxe a achmaltsik xowa in ulal jachan an takixtalb?
Pos in ulal ke na Abraham in kymal chb in chakmiltsik: jn kal nin jolbal ani jn kal nin tomtal; nin tomtal, yab ja i jolib.
Nin chakmil nin jolbal, wachin jeye ti chakam jelt xan tu wachinal ejtalkitsik ti chakam; por an chakam xin koy nin tomtal na Abraham, wachin ti chakam abal ka tjan xowa in ulmal na Dios.

Jech jaich jelti jun i ltsixtalb. Xi jech chb an mmlbtsik, in l kin ulu xi chb an lejkintalb. Xi jn an lejkintalb, jaich xi tajan ban chn xu bijyb Sina ani jaich nin l kin ulu na Agar; xu wachinaltsik kal jachan an lejkintalb, u wachinal tech ti kayl abal ti jolibtsik.
Pos na Agar jaich in l kin ulu an chn xu bijyb Sina xi kwajat Arabia ani jech, jaich an Jerusaln xi xo, pos jech an bitsow ani nin atiklbiltsik, kwajat jelti jolibtsik.
Por an Jerusaln xi walki, yab ja u jolib ani waw kl tu chakmlb.

Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Ki kulb, mmlb xi yab i knal; ki dhjan kal i kulbtalb, tat xi yab jayki a achmal ni jun i yajal xu axnal tam u wachiyb jun i chakam. Abal an mmlb xi jilnk, neech kin koy ms in chakmiltsik k an mmlb xi kwajat kal in tomkl.
Kidhblbtsik, tattsik a junwal jelti na Isk; tattsik jaich an chakmlbtsik xi na Dios in ulmal.
Por anchan jelt tam ti jachan i kij, an chakam xi wachin jelt xan tu wachinal ejtalki an chakamtsik in atl an chakam xi wachindh kal an Tokat Ejattalb, anlki jeye xo tu tmnal.
Por janty in ulal an Tokat Dhuslab? In ulal ench: “Ka aja an jolib kl nin chakmil, pos nin chakmil an jolib, yab ja neech kin bachu xowa neech kin bachu nin chakmil an mmlb xi yab u jolib.”
Anchan p kidhblbtsik, waw yab i junwal jelti nin chakmil an mmlb xu jolib, waw i junwal jelti nin chakmil an mmlb xi yab u jolib.

Na Kristo tu kldha abal yabich ku kwajay taknl kal jachan nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss abal ku kwajch walkadh. Pos ka ntsitsik p ki kwajay ba jachan an walkadhtalb ani yabich ka witsintsitsik ki kyat jelti jolib kal jachan an takixtalb.
Ti kin axtsitsik. Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu utsltsik ke max ka walkatsik ki tajtsin an ti exl ba na tul, yabich tm xata ti neech ka yna na Kristo.
U ulal jun, max jun i inik ka tajtsin an ti exl bin tul, jachan an inik, kool tm kin taja ejtal xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.
Tattsik xa ulal abal i kwajatich alwa kal na Dios abal a tajltsik xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban takixtalb, i wmenekich kal na Kristo; yabich i kwajat bin kanidhaxtal na Dios.
Pos waw, tin kwentaki an Tokat Ejattalb ani an belomtalb xi kool, i kool jun i aytsixtalb abal ku kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios.
Max u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess, yabich tm xata ti neech ka yn max i kool an exl o yaba. Xowa nin jalbl, jaich ku belmch ani ke jech ni belomtal, kin taja ku kwajay u kndhx jn ani jn.
Alwaichwiik tajat ta neechtsik. Jita p ti tajatsik abal ka chikat taja an tsubaxtalb?
Na Dios xi ti kanymaltsik, yab Jaj ti tajmal ka jila ka bela an tsubaxtalb.
Yab ka uktsitsik ke “w i jilbdhaxtalb koye in jilbdhl yn i koye max ka xukyat.”

Nan u chob alwa ke an Ajtiklb yab neech ti ki walkatsik ka jalkuy na chalab; por na Dios neech kin pidha ti yajtsiktalb jachan an atiklbtsik xi xeech ti kambiyal ani yab neech kin dha ti kwenta xitam j.

Kidhblbtsik, max nan blak u ulal ka tajan an exl ba ni tul, an judotsik yabak tin atl; max anchanak, an tsubaxtalb xu till kal tin kwenta an peltsidh te xon ti pajkiyat na Kristo, yabak neech ka chakdhtsik kl.
Por xi xeechtsik ti itixbdhl kal tin kwenta an exl ba na tul, alwaak kin taj kotna nin tul!
Kidhblbtsik, tattsik i kanidh abal ki kwajay walkadh. Tokotki, maske i kwajattsik walkadh, yab ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tin kulbetnl na tul; ms alwa ki tlmxintsik jn ani jn abal i kndhxichtsik.
Abal ejtal an takixtalb, ench tokot tu exbayb: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab.”
Por max ki tujeytsik ta pjx ani ki ktxintsik jn ani jn jelti an konltsik, ka koy i kwenta abal yab t ki kbdhxin tatkitsik.
Xowa tu utsltsik jaich jech: Ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tin l an Tokat Ejattalb ani yab ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tin kulbetnl na tul.

Abal xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, yab alwa abal nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios ani an Tokat Ejattalb, in pojkl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul. Yab u kalel alwa ki taja chablamki, jaxtm yabich neech ka ejto ka tajatsik xowa tatkitsik a kulbetnl.
Por max jachich an Tokat Ejattalb xi ti junkmtsik, yabich tm i kwajattsik i teykmte kal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.

Yab tojlb ki exla xowa in tajl xi tokot in tajltsik xowa in kulbetnl nin tul: u junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, u ani junkunalkitsik maske yab tomkidh, in tajltsik xowa yab alwa ani xowakich xi tidhetl,

in kaknltsik xowakich i chilabtsik ani u dhimkaxtsik. U txtsik tajat, u pjxtsik ani tokot jajki in l ka kakn kal xi keettsik. Jikatki tajat u chakltsik, yab in l kin chuu ka tajan xowa in l xi keettsik ani in kxliyal i atiklbtsik.

In chakuntsal xi keettsik kal xowaki kin chuu in kool, u uchaltsik, in tajltsik xowa yab alwa ba jun i ajib ani yn ms xowa in tajltsik jelti jech. Tu ltsaltsik jun jelt xan tu utsmalich okox, ke xin tajltsik jelti jech, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajaytsik taknl kal na Dios.
Por xowa in pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb, jaich an kanidhaxtalb, an kulbtalb, an kijidhtalb, an kaymtalb, an alwatalb, an belomtalb,
an chaattalb ani ki ejto ki kuxuy abal yab ki taja xowa yab alwa. Yab waach ni jun i takixtalb xi neech kin ejto kin ulu ke ejtal jech, yab alwa.
Por xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Jesukristo, in junwal jelti max chemnekich nin tul pajkidh ban peltsidh te junax kal Jaj; ani xo yabich in tajltsik xowa yab alwa xin kulbetnl nin tul.
Anchan xan tu kwajatich kal an Tokat Ejattalb, anlki jeye ti yejat ki exbantsi an Tokat Ejattalb xowa ti ku utsa ki taja.
Yab yejat ku kwajay jelti pojkax atiklbtsik, chkntsx jn ani jn ani yab ku kwajay ki chakuntsi xi keettsik kal xowaki i chutal in kool.

Kidhblbtsik, max ka chuu jun a at kidhb kwajlank kal i walastalb, tattsik xi teykmtejich kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, yejat ka tolmiy abal yabich ms kin wala. Por yejat ka tajatsik kal i chaattalb ani ka koytsik i kwenta, yab telab t teye ka tamu anlki.
Ki tlmxintsik jn ani jn kal xowakichki jelt xan ti tajl tam i dhayl jun xata altsik. Max ka tajaichtsik anchan, a tajlichtsik tm jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb xin jilm na Kristo.
Max jun xita in ulal ke plek ti kwajat ani yab xata in y, jajki in kambiyal tinb.
Juntsik tu b kool ki chalpay max alwa xowa i tajl, max alwa xowa i tajl, awilich tm ku kulb kal xowa i tajl ani yab yejat ki chuu max xowa i tajl ms alwa k xowa in tajl xi keettsik.
Pos juntsik tu b kool ki kuxuy ejtal xowa yejat ki watna.
Xita in bachwal jun i oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab, yejat jeye kin pidha nin oktsxal wetsik xowa jaj in kool.
Yab ka kambiytsik tab, yab xita kl ti neech ka ejtowat ka ubtn na Dios. Xowa kin taja an inik, jaich neech kin chuu.

Max jun xita kin taja tokot xowa jajki in kulbetnl, kal jachan xowa in tajl, kl ti neech ka jn ban kibeltalb. Por max kin taja xowa in l an Tokat Ejattalb, neech ka pidhan kal an Tokat Ejattalb an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Yab ki jila ki taja xowa alwa; pos max yab ki jila ki taja xowa alwa, tam kin bajaw an kij, neech weye ki bachu mapal alwatalb.
Jaxtm, tam yejat ki taja, ki tajtsi ti alwatalb ejtalkitsik ani ms xu belomichtsik jeye jelti waw.
Ka telatsik kal xowa i pakdha dhuslab ti exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik kal nan tajat u kubak.

Xita xin l ti ki tajtsitsik ti chplb abal ka taja an exl ba na tul, in tajltsik abal ka jilkon alwa kal an atiklbtsik ani yabtsik in l ka atan kal tin kwenta na Kristo xi chemdhats pajkidh ban peltsidh te.

Pos nibal xin kooltsik an exl bin tul in tajltsik ejtal xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Por in ltsik kin chuu ke tattsik ka koy teye an exl ba na tul abal in l ka utsan ke pakdhatsik ti kwajat, abalki ti tajmaltsik ka koy an exl ba na tul jelti an israelitatsik.

Por nan, yab u ulal ke in plek tin kwajat kal jun xowa, tokot in plek tin kwajat kal an cheml xin tamu na Kristo ban peltsidh te. Pos kal tin kwentaki an cheml xin tamu na Kristo ban peltsidh te, ejtal xowa yab alwa xu tajlwiik, chemech jeye pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Ani nan, jyki neye max yabich tech in kwajat ban kayl.
Pos max u kwajatich junax kal na Kristo Jess, yabich xata in jalbl max i tajmal an exl ba ni tul o yaba; xowa in jalbl, jaich ke waw i bellich na Kristo ani jyki jelti max tich tu wachink.
Pos ka bachch p an kijidhtalb ani an yajnantsixtalb ejtal xi kwajatichtsik jelt xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb ani ejtal jeye, xi na Dios in chutal jelti an lej bitsow Israel.
Ani xo, nibal tayl, yabich u l ke ni jun xita ti kin pidha jun i tojlixtalb; pos xowa xin tajtsidh yab alwa ba nu tul, in xalkl abal nan in kwajat u tjontsal na Jesukristo.
Kidhblbtsik, ka bachwaltsik echeki ni alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, kom na Dios anchan tin lena. Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl ban bitsow xi Efeso, xa bellichtsik na Kristo Jess ani i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Ki pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, pos kom u kwajatich junax kal na Kristo, na Dios tu lbtajmalich kal i tokat lbtajaxtalb xi tl walki.
Na Dios tu takwymal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo tam ti yabl in tajmal an walki ani an chabl abal ku utey tin tamt u tokat ani yab u walbidh.
Kal nin kanidhaxtal tu takwymalich asta ti weje abal ku kwajch jelti max u chakmlbich kal Jaj kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, anchan xan ti Jaj tin kulbetna kin taja.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti echeki i pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin tokat labidh kanidhaxtal, xi kl tu lbtajl tam ku kwajch kal nin Chakmil xin kanidhl tajat.
Na Kristo tu jalbintsi an ti walab kal nin xichl xin wakla tam ti chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te ani tu pakwlantsi ejtal an ti walastalbil, kom plek tajat nin alwatal.
In taja abal ki bachu tajat i alwatalb kal yantam i chalpadhtalb.
Tu pidhmalich ki exla xowa in koolwiik yab tejwa, jaich xowa Jaj in kool chalpadh ke neech kin taja kal nin alwatal.
Jech xowa na Dios in kool chalpadh, jaich ke kin pidha na Kristo kin takiy ejtal xowa waach walki ani xowa waach ban kayl tam kin bajaw an kij.
Na Dios tu takwymal asta ti weje abal ku kwajch kal na Kristo ani anchan, ki bachu an chejwalixtalb xi na Dios neech kin pidhna. Ejtal jech, anchan tin taja kom anchan tin chuu alwa.
Anchan tin taja abal waw xu judo, xu okxin ki bela na Kristo, ku kwajay i pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kom Jaj plek Ja tajat.

Anl teye tattsik xi yab i judo, tam ta achatsik an tsubaxtalb, tam ta tiltsintsik an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta an loeltalb ani a belatsik na Kristo, i exliyattsik abal i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Jech an exlixtalb, jaich an Tokat Ejattalb xi na Dios in ulmal ke neech ka bachutsik.

Na Dios tu pidhmal an ti Tokat Ejattalb abal ki chobna ke neech lejtal ki bachu an chejwalixtalb xi Jaj in ulmal neech ti ku pidha. Jech an chejwalixtalb neech ti ku pidha, tam kin okch kin kldha ban walastalb an atiklbtsik xi Jaj in dhabal abal ka pubdhantsat tin bij kom plek Ja tajat.
Jaxtm, tam ti nan u chobna neye abal a belltsik ni Ajtik Jess ani a kanidhltsik ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios,
yab u jill ku pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios tam kin lan kal tattsik ta kwenta.
U kontsal nin Diosil ni Ajtik Jesukristo, an labidh tokat Ttalb abal ti ki pidhatsik ti chalpadhtalb ani anchan, ka ejtotsik ka exla alwa Jaj.

U kontsal jeye ti ki pidha ti chalab abal ka chobnatsik an aytsixtalb xa kool kom Jaj ti takwymalichtsik. Abal ka chobnatsik jeye xan tin publ nin jalbl an jiltsixtalb xi neech ka pidhan xu dhabalbich kal Jaj.
Ani ka chobnatsik jeye xan tin publ an chplb xi waw i kool abal u belomich. Jech in xalka kal nin pulek chp.
Jech an chplb, xalkan ba na Kristo tam ti na Dios in ejdha ti t ani in buxka tin ejt t walki.
In pidha ms plek ti awiltalb k an ajtiklbtsik, an awiltalbtsik, an chplbtsik, an takixtsik ani ni jun xita yab neech kin bawtsi an ti awiltalb xin kool na Kristo, yab tokot xoki, anl jeye tayl.
Ejtal xowa waach, na Dios in kwajba bin takixtal na Kristo ani na Kristo, kwajb abal ka kwajay jelti nin k an belomtsik.
Pos an belomtsik, jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo ani na Kristo, jaich nin teykm ejtal xowa waach.
Na Dios ti pidhatsik ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, maske i kwajattsikwiik jelti max i chemnek kal tin kwenta xowa yab alwa a tajl ani an walastalbtsik.

I kwajattsikwiik jelti max i chemnek kom a wewkmtsik an oktsixtalb xi tech ti kayl ani a tajmaltsik xowa in kulbetnl an lej atax xin takyal ejtal an atax ejattalbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl. Jech an lej atax, jaich kl ti teykmte an iniktsik xi yab in tajl ti kij nin kwintal na Dios.

Ejtal waw anchanwiik weye tu kwajat ti wel chabki, i wewkm tokot xowa i kulbetnl ani tokot i tajl xowa in kulbetnl ni tul ani xowa i chalpayal. Jaxtm, in tomnlwiik ki bachu an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin abna na Dios, jelt xi neech kin bachutsik xi yab in tajl ti kij nin kwintal na Dios.
Por na Dios xi plek tajat in yajnantsixtal in kool, xi tu kanidha tajat kal nin pulek kanidhaxtal,
tu pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, maske u kwajatwiik jelti max u chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb xi tajl. Pos anchan p, u lowat kal nin alwatal na Dios.
Na Dios jelti max tu ejdhmalich weye junax kal na Kristo Jess jelt xan ti Jaj ejdh ani tu buxka junax kal na Kristo t walki.
Jech in taja abal ti ku xalkantsi ms tayl an ti pulek alwatalb xi tu kontsal, kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess.
Pos kal tin alwatalki na Dios i loodhichtsik, kal tin kwentaki abal i belmchtsik. Jech an loeltalb yab a bachmaltsik abal a tajmal jun xata, pos a Dios ti chejwaliyamaltsik.
Yab xita neech kin ejto kin ta an loeltalb kal xowaki in tajl abal yab kin teka tinb.
Pos na Dios tu tajmal kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess abal ki taja xowa alwa. Na Dios in okox tajmalich jech abal ku kwajay i tajl echeki xowa alwa.

Anchan p, ka chalpaytsik xan ta kwajatwiik. Yabtsik a kidhtal an judotsik ani jaxtm an judotsik, xin tajtsal ti exl bin tul an iniktsik ani in bijyaltsik tinb abal exlidh, ti utsltsik abal yab i exlidh.

Tam ti jachan i kij, yabtsik a exll na Kristo. Kom yabtsik i judo, yab a exll an lejkintalb kal tin kwenta xowa in ulmal na Dios neech kin pidhna. Tech ta kwajattsik ban kayl, por yabtsik a kool ni jun i aytsixtalb nibal a exlltsik na Dios.
Por xo, kom i kwajatich junax kal na Kristo Jess, tattsik xi yabwiik a exlltsik, i pidhnkich xo ka exla kal tin kwentaki an cheml xin watna na Kristo.
Na Kristo jaich xi tu tajl ku kwajay kijidh. Jaj in taja kal an judotsik ani kal xi yabtsik u judo jn tokot i bitsow, in wixka xowa in tajl ku kwajay kejtsik.

Na Kristo in wixka kal an cheml xin watna, an chkxtalb kal tin kwenta an takixtalb xin ulal xowa yejat ka tajan. Anchan, in taja abal xi chablam an bitsow ka kwajay jnki tokot, jelti max jnki tokot i inik. Anchan tin taja abal ku kwajay kijidh.

Ani anchan, kal tin kwenta an cheml xin watna ban peltsidh te, na Kristo in kubdha an pjxtalb xi waachwiik kal an judotsik kal xi yabtsik u judo ani in kwajbaichtsik alwa kal na Dios, jilkonich tm jn tokot i bitsow.
Na Kristo tsch ani in tila an alwa tilab abal ku kwajay kijidh. In tiltsi xi yabtsik u judo xi kwajat jelti max w kal na Dios ani an judotsik xi kwajat jelti max utat kal na Dios.
Pos kal tin kwentaki na Kristo, ejtal maske u judo o yaba, ku utch ban Ttalb kal an junkax Tokat Ejattalb.
Jaxtm, tattsik yabich i pl iniktsik, nibal i kwajattsik ba jun i chabl xon ti yab taja i taknal. Tattsik i kidhtalbich xo kal xi tokattsik ani i kidhtalbich kal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
Tattsik a junwal jelti jun i pulek at; i kwajattsik i teykmte kal jun in akan xin kwajbmal an abatwletsik ani an tiltsixtsik. Na Jesukristo, jaich na kwajat ti ultalb tujub kal jachan in akan an at.
Bin b jachan in akan an pulek at, ke jaich na Kristo, exom ti pubel ms jech an pulek at, lejkidh alwa abal ka kwajay ti pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Anchan jeye tattsik, junini kal na Kristo, i junkunaltsik abal ka bajaw ki kwajay jelti jun i pulek at xon ti na Dios kwajat kal nin Tokat Ejattalki.
Jaxtm kal jech tin kwenta, nan, xu bij Pablo, in kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess abal tattsik ta alwabl xi yabtsik i judo.
A chobichtsik xna ke na Dios, kal nin alwatal, tin punkuntsmal jech an ti tojlb abal tattsik ta alwabl.
Pos na Dios tin ltsi an ti chalab xin koolwiik yab tejwa, jelt xan tu dhutsmal w ms okox.
Tam ka ajaytsik, neech ka chuu abal nan u exllich xowa na Kristo in koolwiik yab tejwa.

Jech xowa in koolwiik yab tejwa na Kristo, jaich xowa an iniktsik yab pidhnk kin exla asta ti weje; por xo, na Dios in xalkantsmalichtsik nin abatwlejiltsik ani nin tiltsxiltsik kal nin Tokat Ejattalki,

ke kal tin kwentaki max kin bela an alwa tilab, xi yabtsik u judo neech jeye kin bachu jaychki an chejwalixtalb xi neech kin bachu an judotsik. Jnki tokot i bitsow ti neech ka jin an judotsik ani xi yabtsik u judo ani neech jeye kin bachutsik xowa in ulmal neech kin pidhna na Dios kal tin kwenta na Kristo Jess.
Nan in kwajbadh tin tjontsix kal jech an alwa tilab kal tin kwentaki nin alwatal na Dios, xin pidhan kal Jaj nin chp.
Nan, xi ms w u jalbl k xi ms chipl xu dhabalbich kal na Dios; in pidhan an ti alwatalb ku tiltsi an ti alwa tilab kal tin kwenta nin yanl nin alwatal na Kristo xi yabtsik u judo.
Ani tin punkuntsmal abal tu pidhatsik ka chobna xowa j an chalab xi asta ti weje, tawiik tin kool yab tejwa na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xin tajmal ejtal xowa waach.
Anchan ti tmun, abal xo, kal tin kwentaki an belomtsik, ejtal an ajtiklbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik xi kwajattsik walki kin bajaw kin exlantsi tin publ nin chalpadhtal na Dios.
Na Dios in taja kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo, jech xowa in kool chalpadh asta ti weje.
Ani kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, i ejtowal ku utey ba na Dios abalki i bell na Kristo.
Jaxtm, tu kontsaltsik abal yab ka jalkuy na chalab kal xowa a chutaltsik exom u tamwal kal tattsik ta kwenta. Pos ejtal jech, u tamwal kal tattsik ta alwabl, jaxtm ti yejat ki kwajaytsik i kulbl.
Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta, tin tudhlanal tin tamt nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Jaj u Ttalb kal ejtal xu kwajltsik chabl ani xu kwajltsik jeye walki.
U kontsal an Ttalb abal kal nin tokat alwatal, ti ki pidhatsik ti chplb ani ti likattalb ba ejattal, kal nin Tokat Ejattalki,
ani ke na Kristo, ka kwajay ba na itsch kal tin kwentaki an belomtalb xa kooltsik. Anchan, tam i kwajattsik alwa ani i kanidhaxichtsik tajat,
neech tm ka ejtch ka exbay kal ejtal an belomtsik xan tin publ nin kanidhaxtal na Kristo.
Pos u konyal ka exlatsik jech an kanidhaxtalb abal ki kwajaytsik i teykmte tajat kal na Dios. Nin publ jech an kanidhaxtalb, yab in junwal ni jun xata xowa i exll.
Ani xo, ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy na Dios, xin kool an awiltalb abal kin taja yn xata ms k xowa i konyal o i chalpayal. Jech an awiltalb, jaich xi kwajat jeye kal waw.
Ke na Dios ka pidhan kal an belomtsik ti labidh kaknaxtalb malill i kij kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess. Anchan ka tjan.
Nan, xin kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb, tu pakabdhltsik abal ki kwajay alwa xan ti yejat ka kwajaytsik xi takudhich kal na Dios.
Ka chakatsik tab, ki kntsxintsik ti chaattalb jn ani jn kal i kanidhaxtalb.
Ki kwajaytsik echeki junini, kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb abal ki kwajaytsik echeki kijidh ani junini,
jelti max jnki tokot ani jnki jeye tokot an Tokat Ejattalb, anchan xan ti na Dios ti takwymaltsik abal ki kwajchtsik a kool jn tokot i aytsixtalb.
Jn jeye tokot i Ajtiklb waach, jn i belomtalb, jn i pujaxtalb,
jn a Dios waach xi jaich nin Tta ejtalkitsik. Jaj kwajat ultalb kal ejtal, in xalkl nin awiltal kal ejtalki ani kwajat kal ejtalki.
Por Jaj tu pidhmal juntsik tu b an ti alwatalb, xantiki na Kristo tin lenmal ti ku pidha.
Jaxtm an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Kadhiy walki, tam tin tmich xita kl tu tomnb ani in pidha ti awiltalb an iniktsik.
Ani janty in l kin ulu ke Jaj “kadhiy?” In l kin ulu ke okox paay asta xon ti ms chaat an chabltsik.
Xi paay, jaychki jeye xi kadhiy xon ti ms tekat an walki abal ka kwajay putlki.

Jaj jaich xi tu pidha ti awiltalb juntsik tu b, taltsik in pidha ti awiltalb kin tjontsitsik ti abatwle, xi keet abal ti tiltsix, xi keet abal kin tila an alwa tilab, xi keet abal kin wila an alwa tilab ani xi keet abal ti oktsix.
Anchan tin taja abal ku oktsin waw xu dhabalbich kal na Dios abal ki ejto ki tjontsi na Dios ani ku belmch ms xu kwajatich jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo,
asta ki ejto ki bajaw ku kwajay junini kal tin kwenta ni belomtal ani ki exla alwa nin Chakmil na Dios. Anchan neech tm ku kwajch lujat jelt xan ti jeye na Kristo.

Yabich tm neech ki junu jelti an chakamtsik, xi yab tajat tojlb u jalkuntsb tin chalab, xin bachwaltsik xowakichki i oktsixtalb, tam ka kambiyattsik kal i iniktsik xu kambix. Jechtsik in ynl ejtal xowa yab alwa abal ka kambixin.
Alwa ms, ki ntsi ki wwna an tsubaxtalb ani tu kndhx abal ku kwajay ms utat kal na Kristo, xi kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik.
Ani kal tin kwenta na Kristo, ejtal an belomtsik kwajat alwa ani junini kal Jaj, tin kwenta an junaxtalb xin kool an belomtsik. Ani tam an belomtsik kwajat alwa, u yanel ms ani u kanidhaxtsik ms.

Pos jech jaich tu utsltsik ani tu punkuntsaltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb: yabich ki kwajaytsik ms jelt xan tu kwajltsik xi keet xi yab in exlltsik na Dios, xu kwajltsik xantiki kin chalpay kal an chalab xi yab xata in jalbl.
Nin chalab kwajat jelti max ban jikwaxtalb. Yabtsik in kool an xechintalb xi tl ba na Dios kom yabtsik xata in chob ani kom chapiktsik tajat nin itsch.
Yabich in achl tidhetl tam in tajl xowa yab alwa ani in tajltsik i ataxtalb xowakichki kin chalpay.
Por tattsik yab anchan ta oktsinktsik ka taja kal na Kristo,
max ani lejtal ta axtsmalichtsik ani i oktsidhichtsik kal Jaj xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb xi kwajat ba na Jess.
Ani kal tin kwenta an weje chalab xan ta kwajattsikwiik, ka jilaich, pos i odhitstsikwiik ta kwajat kal an ataxtalb xa kulbetnltsik.
Ka jalkchtsik na ejattal ani na chalab.
Ka bachchtsik an t chalab xi kwajat tajadh xan ti na Dios tin l. Jech an t chalab, u xalkanal tam ku kwajch tsubax, in lujtalki ani tokat.
Jaxtm, yabich yejat ki kmbxintsik; ki kwintsik tsubax kal na at kidhbtsik abal ejtal ni at kidhbtsik i kidhtal tu kwajat.
Max ki chakuytsik, yab ka wala ani yab ki kwajaytsik i chakl putl a kts.
Yab ka walkatsik ti ki ta an lej atax.
Xu kwwiik, kin jilaich ti kw ani ka tjonich; kin taja kal nin kubak jun i alwa tojlb abal anchan, kin koy xanty kin chejwaliy an chojontltsik.
Yab ka ulutsik i tilab xi yab alwa, tokot ka ynatsik jun i kwintalb alwa abal anchan, ka tolmintsi ms kin bachu xowa alwa xita kin acha.
Yab ka tepindhantsi tin Tokat Ejattal na Dios. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, kl ta kwajat i exlidh abal ki xalkantsik ke i dhabalbichtsik kal a Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech ki okonich ta lowb.
Ka jilaichtsik an tepintalb, an chkub, an chapik kwintalb ani an atax kwintalb.
Ki tjtsxintsik xowa alwa, ki yjnntsxintsik ani ki pkwlntsxintsik jn ani jn jelt xan ti na Dios ti pakwlantsitsik kal tin kwentaki na Kristo.
Pos kom i chakmlbichtsik kal na Dios, xi kanidhbtsik tajat, yejat ka tajltsik xowa Jaj in tajl.
Ki kndhxintsik, jelt xan ti na Kristo tu kanidha ani in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal waw ti alwabl, jelt tam u chemdhb jun i borrego abal ka pikbantsat na Dios tsikadh ani kin jiktsi tin niwy.
Kom i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, yabich yejat ka wachin kal tattsik nw xita xu kwajltsik yab exbadh, ni jun xata xowa atax, nibal i chenetalb.
Yab ka tilatsik ni jun xata xi yab tsubax, nibal xowa xi yab a exlltsik; yab jeye ki odhbijxin, pos ejtal jech yab alwa. Alwa ms ki pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.

Pos a chobichtsik alwa, ke max jun xita u junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal o in tajl xowa yab alwa, yab neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo ani kal na Dios. Xita chene tajat, in junwal jelti max in kaknl i chilabtsik, yab jeye neech kin ejto ka kwajay taknl kal na Kristo ani kal na Dios.

Yab ka walkatsik ti ki kambiy ni jun xita kal i ani tilabtsik. Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu tjnal xowa yab alwa ani jaich ti neech ka tsch an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin abna na Dios abal an atiklbtsik xi yab u tajnal kl ti kij na Dios.
Pos yabtsik ka wwna xowa a chutal in tajltsik.

Tattsik i kwajatwiik jelti max ban jikwaxtalb kal tin kwenta an walastalb xa tajltsik. Por xo, kom i kwajatichtsik junax kal an Ajtiklb, i kwajatichtsik jelti max ban tajaxtalb. Ki kwajaytsik jelt xan tu kwajl an atiklbtsik xi kwajattsik ban tajaxtalb.
Pos ban tajaxtalb tu tsiil ejtal an alwatalb, an tsubaxtalb ani an lujattalb.
Ka tajltsik echeki xowa in l an Ajtiklb.
Yab ka tajltsik xowa xi yab xata in jalbl jelt xowa in tajl xi yabtsik u belom xi kwajattsik jelti max ban jikwaxtalb; ms alwa ka xalkantsitsik abal kin chuutsik ke yab alwa.
Pos tidhetl tajat ki tila asta xowa jajtsik in tajl chinat;
por tam ka xalkantsat ban tajaxtalb ejtal xowa in tajltsik, ejtal u jilkonal tejwa, pos an tajaxtalb in xalkl ejtal.
Jaxtm tu ulwb ench: Ki ejchich, tat xi kwajat ta wayal; ki chakch xon ta kwajat ban chemlomtsik ani na Kristo neech ti tajbch.
Jaxtm, ka chuutsik alwa xan ta kwajattsik. Yab ki kwajaytsik jelti xi yab chalpadh, ki kwajaytsik jelti xi chalpadh.
Ka ynatsik alwa an kij, pos an kij yab echeki alwa.
Yabtsik ka junu jelti xi yab chalpadh; ka exbaytsik alwa xowa in l ka tajan an Ajtiklb.
Yab ki uchchtsik, pos jech yab alwa, u jnax ban kibeltalb; ms alwa ka aliytsik xan ti ki kwajay teykmte tajat kal nin chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
Ka ajatnatsik i ajatlbtsik ani i ajatlbtsik xi ijtsinal kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Ka ajtintsitsik ani ka kakna kal ejtal na itsch an Ajtiklb.
Ka pidhltsik echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios an Ttalb kal ejtal xowa a tajltsik, tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Ki kknxintsik jn ani jn abal ka xalkan ke yabich a chikat tajltsik na Dios.
An tomkidh mmlb yab yejat kin chikat tajl nin tomkl, pos jaich in l an Ajtiklb.

Abal an tomkidh inik, jaich kwajat jelti nin k nin tomtal, anchan jelti na Kristo kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik. Na Kristo jaich jeye nin Loxil an belomtsik ani an belomtsik jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo.
Pos anchan xan ti an belomtsik yab in chikat tajl na Kristo, anchan jeye an tomkidh mmlbtsik yab yejat kin chikat taja nin tomkl.
Tomkidh iniktsik, ka kanidha na tomtal, jelt xan ti na Kristo tin kanidha an belomtsik ani in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal tin alwabl an belomtsik.
Jech in taja abal kin toko an belomtsik. In toko kal an alwa tilab ani in toko jelti max kal i ja,
abal kin utu tin tamt Jaj jelti jun i labidh tokat belomtsik, yab choodh, alabl, tokat ani lujat tajat.
An tomkidh inik, yejat kin kanidhl nin tomtal, jelt xan tin kanidhl tinb. Xita in kanidhl nin tomtal, in kanidhl tinb.
Pos ni jun xita yab in pojkl tinb, tokot in kapundhl ani in beletnl tinb. Na Kristo, anchan jeye tin tajl kal an belomtsik;
pos an belomtsik, jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul na Kristo ani waw jaych i kidhtal jachan nin putll nin tul na Kristo. U tajadh kal jaych nin tul ani kal jaych nin beklk.
“Jaxtm, an inik neech kin jila nin tta ani nin nna abal ka kwajay kal nin tomtal ani xi jech chb, jn tokot ti neech ka jin.”
Jech jaich jun xata plek xi kwajatwiik yab tejwa; por nan in kwajat u till na Kristo ani an belomtsik.
Por jech in ulal jeye ke juntsik ta b yejat ka kanidha na tomtal jelt xan ta kanidhl tab ani an tomkidh mmlb, yab yejat kin chikat taja nin tomkl.
Chakamtsik, yab ka chikat tajl na ttatsik abal i belomich, pos jech jaich na lujat.
An jidhtal takixtalb xin ulal abal neech ki bachu jun xata alwa, in ulal ench: “Ka kakna na tta ani na nna,
abal ki kwajay alwa ani nakat i kij tech ti kayl.”
Ani tattsik, ttalbtsik, yab ka chakdhl na chakmiltsik, tokot ka takyaltsik abal kin tajl xowa alwa xan tin ulal nin takixtal an Ajtiklb.
Jolibtsik, yab ka chikat tajltsik na ajtik xi tech ti kayl, ka exbantsitsik xowa ti ki utsa kal yantam i kaknaxtalb ta itsch ani kal yantam i chaattalb.

Ka tjontsitsik alwa, yab tokotki tam kwajattsik ti tell abal a l ki utsan ke i alwa tjontsixtsik. Ki tjontsixin jelt in tjontsixil na Kristo, ka tajatsik an tojlb kal yantam i kulbtalb, pos na Dios anchan tin l kin chuu ka tajl.
Ki tjontsik kal yantam i kulbtalb, jelti max exom a tjontsal an Ajtiklb ani yab i iniktsik.
Pos a chobichtsik ke maske jn u jolib o yaba, max kin taja xowa alwa, neech jeye ka pidhan xowa alwa kal an Ajtiklb.

Ani tattsik, ajtiklbtsik, anlki teye ka taja jelti na tojnliltsik, yab ka jikdhatsik. Ka chalpay abal tattsik ani na tojnliltsik a kool jun a Ajtik xi kwajat walki, pos abal Jaj, an atiklbtsik ejtal jaychki in jalbl.
Ani xo kidhblbtsik, ka likedhatsik tab abal i kwajatichtsik junax kal an Ajtiklb ani kal nin pulek chp xi Jaj in kool.
Jelt xan ti an soldadotsik in kool kidhat xowa in ynl ti pjx, anchan teye ti ka koytsik xowa in pidhnl na Dios abal ka ejto ki kwajaytsik alwa ani yab ki kambiyattsik kal an lej atax.

Pos yab exom tu pjx kal i iniktsik, exom tu pjx kal i ajtiklbtsik, kal xitakichki xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki, kal an takixtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowa yab alwa ani kal in abatwlejiltsik an lej atax xi kwajat al ik.
Jaxtm, ka ynatsik ejtal xowa in pidhnl na Dios abal ka ejtotsik ka kuxuy jachan an kij xi yab alwa. Ani tam ka ejtchtsik ka kuxuy, ka koytsik junini na chalab.

Ka koytsik p junini na chalab, ka ynatsik an tsubaxtalb jelt xan ta ynltsik an t xa wikl kl na tsukul. Ka ynatsik jeye an lujattalb jelti jun i dhabuxtalb, jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl kin dhabuy kl nin tamt.
Ki kwajaytsik tojojodh abal ka tila an alwa tilab xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb.
Ka ynatsik an belomtalb abal ka tamkuy kl ejtal xowa in l ti ki tajtsi an lej atax, jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl abal kin tamkuntsi kl tin kwiixtal xita kl tu atnal.
Ka ynatsik an loeltalb jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl kojlb abal kin kojna ani nin kwintal na Dios ka koytsik jelti jun i macht xi ti pidhl an Tokat Ejattalb.
Ki lantsik echeki, ka pakabdhl ani ka kontsal na Dios kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Yab ka uktsitsiytsik ta l ani ka kontsintsitsik jeye xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
Ti kin kontsintsitsik neye abal na Dios ti kin pidha ti tilabtsik tam kin kwin ani kin kwin kal ni jun i jkib tam ku tila an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta xowa na Dios in koolwiik chinat.

Na Dios tin abmal abal ku tila an alwa tilab ani jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin kwajat tin wiknl. Ti kin kontsintsi abal ku ejto ku tila jech an alwa tilab kal ni jun i jkib, pos anchan ti yejat ku taja.
Na Tkiko, an kidhblb xi kanidhl tajat, xi jaich jun i alwa tojnal xin tjontsal an Ajtiklb, neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xan tin kwajat neye ani xanty u tajl.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu abl tachan xon ta kwajattsik abal ti ki utsatsik xan tu kwajat tech ani ti ki kijidhmdhantsitsik ta itsch.
Ke na Dios an Ttalb ani an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, ti ki pidhatsik ti kijidhtalb. Ti ki pidhatsik jeye ti kanidhaxtalb ani ti tolmiytsik ki belmch ms.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios ejtal tattsik xa kanidhlich ni Ajtik Jesukristo kal jun i alwa kanidhaxtalb. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, junax kal na Timoteo, u kwajat i tjontsal na Jesukristo. I dhutsuntsal jech an ti w ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios abal in bellichtsik na Kristo Jess. I dhutsl jeye jech an w abal an oklek belomtsik ani an tolmix belomtsik xu kwajl ban bitsow Filipos.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Echeki tam tu chalpaytsik, u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb nu Diosil.
Echeki tam kin lan, tu kontsintsal ejtal tattsik kal i kijidhtalb;
pos i tolmixnktsik teye abal ka tilan an alwa tilab. Jech a tujutsik ka taja asta tam ta tiltsintsik an ti alwa tilab ani asta xo.
U chob alwa abal na Dios, xin tujm kin taja an alwa tojlb ba tattsik, neech kin okoy tam kin bajaw xowki ti neech ka tsch jun na Jesukristo.

In tomnl tajat ku chalpay anchan kal tattsik ta kwenta, kom tu kanidhltsik tajat. Anl jeye kom a bachwaltsik jaychki an alwatalb xi nan u bachwal kal tin kwenta tam in balidh ban wikaxte ani tam in kwajat tin tamt i awiltalbtsik abal ku ulu ke an alwa tilab, tsubax.
Na Dios in chob alwa abal tu kanidhltsik tajat kal jun i kanidhaxtalb jelti an kanidhaxtalb xin kool na Jesukristo.
U kontsal na Dios abal ki kndhxintsik ms, kal yantam i chalpadhtalb ani ka ejto ka exbaytsik xowakichki,
abal ka witatsik ka exla xowa na ms alwa. Anchan, neech ki xechintsik alwa ani yab neech ka wachin ni jun xata xantokl ti ki walbiyat tam ka tsch jun na Kristo.
Max a bellichtsik na Jesukristo, neech ka ejtotsik ka taja yn xowa alwa abal tin kaknabl na Dios ani abal kin bachu an labidh tokattalb.
Kidhblbtsik, u l ka chobnatsik ke ejtal xowa u tammal, tin tolmiymal abal ku tila ms an alwa tilab.
Jaxtm, ejtal an soldadotsik xi kwajat ban at xon tu tajnal an ljundhaxtalb ani ejtal xi ms, in chobtsik abal nan in kwajat tin wiknl abalki u bell a Kristo.
Ani abal in chutb ke in kwajat tin wiknl, yn an kidhblbtsik in kubmal tinb abal ka xechin kin tila an alwa tilab kal ni jun i jkib.
Tsubax kejle ke taltsik in till na Kristo abal in chakuntsal o abal in ulaltsik ke yab tsubax xowa u ulwb kal tin kwenta na Kristo, por taltsik, xeech in tilltsik in tsubtalki.
Taltsik in tilltsik na Kristo, abal in atl ani yab kal i tsubaxtalb. Jech tin tajltsik anchan abal in l kin chuutsik ku watna ms i yajtsiktalb tech ban wikaxte.
Por xi keettsik, in till na Kristo kom u kanidhaxtsik, pos in chobtsik ke nan in kwajat tin wiknl abal ku ulu ke an alwa tilab, tsubax.
Por, jant ki yna? Maske alwa o yab alwa, in tilltsik a Kristo ani jech, tin kijidhmdhl. Ani ms neech kin kijidhm,
kom u chob ke kal ejtal jech xowa exom u tamwal neech kin kale alwa, kal tin kwenta an kontsintsixtalb xa tajltsik ani kal an tolmixtalb xi tin pidhl nin Tokat Ejattal na Jesukristo.

Pos xowa u aytsal ani xowa u l, jaich ke yab kin tidheb. U l ku ejto kin kwin kal ni jun i jkib, abal anchan jelti xo ani echeki, ka xalkan ms ba nan nin publ na Kristo. U l ka xalkan ba nan nin publ na Kristo, maske in kwajat ejat o in chemnek.
Pos abal nan, max in kwajat ejat, in ejat abal ku tjontsi a Kristo ani max kin chemech, ms alwa, kom neech kin kalch tin kwajl kal Jaj.
Pos max techki neye bl in xeech juntam aniki ani alwa ku tjontsi an Ajtiklb, tm, yab u chob xowa ku takuy.
Tojlb tajat ku takuy xowa ms alwa kal jech chablam: pos u lak max kin chemchich abal kin kalch tin kwajl junax kal na Kristo, pos jech alwa tajat abal nan;
por u chalpayal abal ms alwa abal tattsik max yabl kin chemech.
Ani kom u chob abal anchan neech ka tmun, bl neech kin kwajay kal tattsik abal ta alwabl ani abal ki kijidhmtsik kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xa kooltsik.
Anchan, tam kin kale jun tu lnatsik, ki kijidhmtsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo Jess.

Tokot tu pakabdhltsik abal ki kwajay jelt xan tin ulal nin alwa tilbil na Kristo. Anchan, maske kin kale tu lna o in kwajat w, ku acha ke i kwajajadhtsik alwa, junini a chalab, a tilltsik an alwa tilab abal ka belan

ani yab ka walka ti ki jikdhatsik xin atl an alwa tilab. Jech xowa tu kontsal ka tajatsik, jaich jun i exl abal kin chuu ke jajtsik neech ban kibeltalb, por jaich jeye jun i exl abal tattsik i loodhich ani jech, ba Dios ti tl.
Pos kal tin kwenta na Kristo, i takudhtsik abal ki belmch ani yab tokot jechki, anl jeye abal ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta na Kristo.
Tattsik ani nan u kwajat i watnl jaychki jech an yajtsiktalb. A chumichtsik xan tu watnmal i yajtsiktalb ms okox ani asta xo, a achltsik abal u ntsal ku watna.
Jaxtm, max na Kristo ti kijidhmdhl ani ti kanidhl, max nin Tokat Ejattal kwajat kal tattsik, max i kknxtsik ani i kntsxtsik ti yajnantsixtalb,
ka koytsik junini na chalab, ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn, ki kwajajantsik junini abal ti kin kijidhmdhatsik ms.
Yab ka tajatsik xata abal ki kwajaytsik ta tmnx, nibal abal ka tekatsik tab. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, ka chakatsik tab ani ka kakna xi keet jelti max jaj ms ultalb k tattsik.
Yab ka aliytsik xata abal tatkitsik ta alwabl, ka aliytsik xata abal ejtalki tin alwabl.
Ka koytsik teye jaychki an chalab xin koy na Kristo Jess.
Pos maske Jajich nu Dios, yab in taja i chplb abal ka exl ke Jaj u Dios.
In jila ejtal xan ti Jaj jeye ani wenkon ti tjontsix, tam ti wachin tech ti chabl jelt xan tu wachinal ti chakam jun i inik.

Ani tam ti kwajay jelti inik, in chaka tajat tinb ani in taja xowa utsan kal na Dios tam ti utsan abal yejat ka chemech, maske jaich jun i cheml xi tidhetl tajat, kom neech ka chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Jaxtm na Dios tin kwajba na Jess ms ultalb k ejtal xowa waach ani in kwajbantsi tin bij xi ms uluts k ejtal an bijlbtsik,
abal tam ka ulwat nin bij na Jess, ejtal xi kwajattsik walki, ban chabl ani alkidh ban chabl, ka tudhlantsik.
Ani ejtaltsik kin ulu ke na Jesukristo jaich an Ajtiklb abal tin kaknabl na Dios an Ttalb.

Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, anchan xan ta tajmaltsik tajat xowa tu utsmal tam tin kwajat kal tattsik, anlki ti ka tajatsik xo maske in kwajat w kal tattsik. Kom i loodhichtsik, ka tajltsik xowa in l na Dios abal yab ka kibdhatsik an loeltalb.
Pos na Dios jaich ti pidhltsik ka chalpay xowa alwa ka taja ani ti tolmiyal abal ka tajatsik, xantiki Jaj tin l.
Ka tajatsik ejtal kal yantam i kulbtalb ani yab kal i itixbltalb,

abal ni jun xita yab ti ki eltsi ta walab ani anchan, ka xalkan ke i chakmlbichtsik kal a Dios, maske i kwajattsik ban walablom atiklbtsik, yab neech ki kwajay i choodhtsik. Tattsik i kwajat kal jajtsik jelti a t xin tajbayal an kayl,

abal a tiltsaltsik an ti alwa tilab xi kl ti neech kin exla xan ti neech kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Ani anchan, tam ka tsch na Kristo, nan neech ku acha i kijidhtalb kal tattsik ta kwenta, kom neech ka xalkan ke yab in xechink tin ani tojnalki.

Neech kin kulb maske kin chemdh kom neech ku pidhna tub jelti max in pikbaxtalb. Neech ku pidhna tub abal ku kidhbay an pikbantsixtalb xa kwajbantsaltsik na Dios abal i belomichtsik. Jaxtm ti awil ku kulb.
Ki kulbtsik teye jelt xan ti nan in kulbl.
Max an Ajtiklb Jess anchan tin l, u chalpayal tu abtsitsik jikat an ta Timoteo abal ti ki lna ani kin kulb tam ku acha xan ta kwajattsik.
Pos yab waach xita jelti na Timoteo xin chalpayal jelt xan ti nan u chalpayal ani ka kwajay lejtal ti chalpax in tsubtalki kal tattsik ta alwabl.
Pos ejtaltsik in ayal xowa jajkitsik in l ani yab xowa in l na Kristo Jess.
Por tattsik a chobichtsik xan ti na Timoteo tin xalkmal xowa in ejtowal kin taja ani xan tin tolmiymal abal kin xechin ku tila an alwa tilab, jelt xan ti jun i chakmlb tin tolmiyal nin tta.
Ani jaxtm tu chalpayal ku aba ti ki lnatsik, tam ku chobnaich xan ti neech an yejetalb xu kool tech ban wikaxte;
maske u chob alwa abal an Ajtiklb neech ti kin tolmiy abal kin kale tu lnatsik kunat i kij.
Por u chutal yejat tu abtsitsik an kidhblb Epafrodito, xi tin tolmiyal ani tin juniknl an tin tojnal. Jech an kidhblb, jaich xi tattsik tin abtsmal abal ti kin tolmiy kal an yejetalbtsik.
Pos jaj in l tajat ti ki chuu ejtal tattsik ani tepin tajat abal a achmaltsik ke jaj u yaul.
Yawlmadh kejle ani walmich tajat ka chemech; por kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios. Yab tokot jajki, nan neye. Tmun anchan abal yab ms ku koy i tepintalb k xu koolich.
Jaxtm tu l ku aba jikat ti ki lnatsik abal ki kulb tam ka chuu jun ani abal yabich neye ms kin lej tepin.
Ka bachutsik kal yantam i kulbtalb, kom i at kidhbich abal i bell an Ajtiklb ani ka kakna tajat an kidhblbtsik xi jelti Jaj.
Pos jaj walaich tajat ka chemech kal tin kwentaki ti tjontsix an ta Kristo. Jaj yab in ajay tinb tam ti tsch ti kin tolmiy kal an tojlb xu kool kom tattsik yab a ejto ti kin tolmiy.
Ani xo kidhblbtsik, ki kulbtsik abal a bellich an Ajtiklb. Pos abal nan yab i itixtalb max tu witskontsitsik tu dhutsuntsi, pos alwa tajat abal tattsik.
Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta kal an atiklbtsik xu usnal ke in junwal jelti an piko, kal an atiklbtsik xin oktsixnl xowa yab alwa ani kal an atiklbtsik xin l kin chuu ka tajatsik an exl ba na tul.
Pos xi tsubaxich lejtal exlidh, jaich waw, xi kaknlich na Dios kal i ejattal ani u kulbl abal u dhabalbich kal na Kristo Jess. Yabich i dhl ti kwenta max i kool an exl ba ni tul o yaba.
Maske nan neye u kool kejle xantki ti ku bela jech. Max jun xita in chalpayal ke yejat kin bela jech, nan ms;

pos tin waxiklb a kts tin wachink tin chakam in exliyat bu tul kom in israelita neye ani in kidhtalb kal nin kidhtaltsik na Benjamn. Nan in ebreo asta tin chakam ani nu ttatsik, u ebreotsik jeye. U tajmal tajat jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss jelt xan tin wwnl an fariseotsik.

Kom anchan tu wwnmal jech an takixtalb, u atmal tajat xin belltsik na Kristo. U tajmal in lujtalki xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, ke ni jun xita yab in ejtmal ti kin utsa xata.
Por ejtal jech xin jalbl tajatwiik abal nan, xo u ulal abal yab xata in jalbl, kal tin kwentaki abal u exla na Kristo.

Ani yab tokot jki jech, anl jeye ejtal xowa ku ejto ku koy, yab u ajyal max in jalbl, ms yn in jalbl abal u bajmalich ku exla nu Ajtik Jesukristo. Kal tin kwentaki na Kristo u tokoy ku jila ejtal ani u ajyal jelti aml abal u l kin dhabalnjich kal na Kristo.

Anchan, neech kin kwajch junini kal Jaj, yab abalki yab u chikat tajmal an takixtalb, jaich abal u koolich an lujattalb xin pidhl na Dios xita kin belaich na Kristo. Jech jaich jun i lujattalb xi neech ki koy tam ku belmchich.
Nan u l ku exla na Kristo ani ku acha nin chp na Dios xi kl ti ejdh ti t tam ti chemdh. Ku acha jeye an yajtsiktalb xi Jaj in achmal ani ku watna neye an cheml xi jelti Jaj in watnmal,
abal ku koy neye an aytsixtalb kin ejdh tam ka ejdh ti t an chemlomtsik.
Yab exom u ulal ke u bajmalich ejtal jech, nibal u l ku ulu ke in lujatich tajat; por u ntsal abal ku ejto ku bajaw xantki tin takwymal na Kristo Jess.
Kidhblbtsik, nan yab exom u ulal ke u bajmich jech; por xowa u tajl, jaich ku uktsch xu jilmich tu kx ani u tajl i chplb abal ku bajaw xowa kwajat tu tamt.
Anchan, neech tm ku ejto ku bajaw xon ti yejat kin ulich ani ku ta an chejwalixtalb xi tu kanl ki bachu na Dios t walki abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
Jaxtm, ejtal xu kwajatich lujat, yejat ki chalpay jech; ani max keet xanty a chalpayaltsik, na Dios neech jeye ti ki pidhatsik ka chobna.
Por asta xon ti bajmalich ki lujku tib, yab ku jilkon tajaki, ki ntsi ki lujku tib ani ki koy junini ni chalab.
Kidhblbtsik, ka wwna nu oktsixtal ani ka chuutsik jeye xu kwajlichtsik anlki jelt xan tu oktsmaltsik.

Ynlich tajat tu utsmaltsik ani bl tu witskontsaltsik asta kal jamatsik u wal, ke bl tajat waach yn xita xi yab in l ka tilan ke na Kristo chemdhats pajkidh ban peltsidh te kal tin kwenta ni walastalbil.

Por tam kin bajaw an pakwenib, jechtsik, neech ka kibdh. Pos jajtsik tokot in bell xowa in kulbetnl ani in tekltsik tinb kal xowa xi yejat ka tidhebtsik kl. Tokot in chalpayaltsik xowa waach tech ti chabl.
Por waw, ni chablil jaich an walki ani u kwajat i aytsm ke taja ban walki ka tsch jun ni Loxil, xi jaich an Ajtiklb Jesukristo.
Jaj neech ti ku jalkuntsi jech an ti tul xu chemel abal ki koy jun i labidh tul xi jelti Jaj in kool. Jech neech kin taja kal jaych an chplb xin kool, xi kl ti neech kin takiy ejtal xowakich.
Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat ani xu l tajat kin kale tu lnatsik, kal tattsik ta kwenta tin kwajat in kijidh ani tatichtsik ni kwajat jelti nu chejwalb. Ka ntsi ka belatsik an Ajtiklb.
U pakabdhl na Ebodia ani na Sntike abal kin koytsik junini nin chalab kom in bellichtsik an Ajtiklb.

Ani tat, Ssigo, xi tin juniknmal tajat kal jech an tojlb, tu kontsal abal ka tolmiy jech an kidhblbtsik. Pos jajtsik, na Klemente ani xi keettsik jeye, tjnktsik junax kal nan abal ki tila an alwa tilab. Nin bij xi jechtsik kwajat dhutsadh ban dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh xin koolichtsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Ki kwajaytsik echeki i kulbl abal a bellichtsik an Ajtiklb. Tu witskontsaltsik jun: Ki kulbtsik tajat!
Ke ejtal ti ki exlatsik abal i alwa iniktsik. An Ajtiklb kunat i kij neech ka tsch.
Yab ki kwajay ta tepinaltsik kal ni jun xata, ka ltsal na Dios ejtal xowa a yntsal. Ka ltsal kal i lb, kal i pakabdhaxtalb ani ka pidhl jeye ti jalbintsixtalb.

Neech tm ki pidhantsik kal na Dios an ti kijidhtalb, xi jaich jun i kijidhtalb xi plek tajat, ke yab xita in ejtowal kin exbay. Jech an kijidhtalb neech ti ki beletnantsitsik an ta itsch ani neech ka koytsik junini na chalab kom a bellichtsik na Kristo Jess.
Kidhblbtsik, tin okontal, tu kontsal abal ka chalpaytsik tokotki xowa tsubax, xowa xu kaknb, xowa lujat, xowa tokat ani xowa alwa. Ka chalpaytsik tokotki xowa alwa ani xin tomnl ka kakn.
Ka tajatsik xowa tu oktsmaltsik, xowa a achmaltsik u ulmal ani xowa a chumaltsik u tajmal. Ki kwajaytsik xan tu takymaltsik ani na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb, neech ka kwajay kal tattsik.
In kulbl tajat tin bij an Ajtiklb abal tin chalpaymalichtsik jun. Yab exom u ulal ke tin uktsmalichtsik, xowa u ulal, jaich ke yab a kymaltsik xan tin tolmiytsik.
Yab u ulal jech abal u yntsal tajat xata, pos u witmalich kin kwajay kal xowaki u kool.

U witl kin kwajay jelti jun i chojontl ani u witl jeye kin kwajay jelti jun xita xin kool kidhat. U witmal ku tametna xowakich i yejetalbtsik, ku watna i kanab o kin kwajay in ajuts, ku koy yn xata o kin kwajay mapats.
Ejtal u ejtowal ku taja kom na Kristo tin pidhl ti chapiktalb.
Por tu utsltsik ke alwa tajat xan ta tajl abal tin tolmiyaltsik kal ejtal xowa exom u watnl.

Jelt xan ta chobich tattsik xi kwajl Filipos, ke tam tin kale Masedonia abal ku tila an alwa tilab, ejtal an belomtsik yab tin tolmiy, tokot tatkitsik. Jech ta tajltsik anchan, jaich abal tu tolmiymaltsik ki belmch.
Pos tam tin kwajat Tesalnika, ynl tin abtsi ti tolmixtalb abal ku yna kal xowa u yntsal.
Nan yab in kwajat u chalpm kin chejwaliyat, xowa nan u l, jaich ke tattsik ka koy ms i alwatalb xon tu takix na Dios.

Pos nan u bachmalich ejtal ani watatsich. Kal xowa tin abtsitsik kal na Epafrodito lejat kl u koolich. Xi tin abtsmaltsik in junwal jelti niwiy ikbaxtalb, jun i pikbantsixtalb xin bachwal na Dios kal yantam i kulbtalb.
Pos nu Diosil, neech ti ki pidhatsik ejtal xowa a yntsal. Yn i alwa chejwalixtalb in kool ani neech ti ki pidhatsik kom a bellich na Kristo Jess.
Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy malill i kij ni Tta Dios! Anchan ka tjan.
Ti kin chapndhantsitsik tin bij na Jesukristo, ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. An kidhblbtsik xi tech kwajat kal nan, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb.
Ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios xi techtsik u kwajl, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Ti abtsaltsik jeye ti chapndhomtalb, xi kwajattsik bin kim an lej pulek takix romano.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, kom na Dios anchan tin lenmal. Nan, junax kal an kidhblb Timoteo, tu chapndhltsik.

Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl ban bitsow Kolosas, xa bellich tsubax na Kristo ani i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Echeki i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios, nin Tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo, tam ku lan kal tattsik ta kwenta.
Pos waw i achmalich xan ta belltsik na Kristo Jess ani xan ti jeye ta kanidhltsik xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
Ejtal jech, a tajltsik abal neech ka bachutsik an chejwalixtalb xi ta kwajat tapadh t walki. A bajawtsik ki kwajay a aytsm jech an chejwalixtalb, tam ta achatsik an tsubaxtalb xin lnl an alwa tilab.

Jech an alwa tilab xi tiltsinktsik, jaich xi exom ti bukel ani exom tajat ti jalkuntsb kl tin chalab an atiklbtsik putlki an kayl, anchan xan ti tmun kal tattsik tam ta tiltsin tin alwatal na Dios ani a chobnatsik ke jech an alwatalb, tsubax lejtal.
Jech ti oktsmaltsik an kidhblb Epafras xi waw i kanidhl tajat ani xi tjnk jeye junax kal waw. Jaj, jaich jun in alwa tojnlil na Kristo abal tattsik ta alwabl.
Na Epafras jaich tu tsidhantsmal jech an ti tsubaxtalb ani tu utsa abal i pidhnktsik tajat an ti kanidhaxtalb kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Jaxtm, tokotki ti chobna jech, yab i jilmal tu l kal tattsik ta kwenta. I kontsal na Dios abal ti ki pidhatsik ka chobna alwa kal jun i chalab xi tl ban Tokat Ejattalb xanty in l.
Anchan neech tm ka ejtch ki kwajaytsik xan ti yejat ka kwajay jun xita xu dhabalbich kal an Ajtiklb, ka tajltsik echeki xowa Jaj in l, ka tajltsik tokot xowa alwa ani ka ntsal ka exla alwa na Dios.
I kontsal abal Jaj ti ki likedhatsik kal nin tokat labidh chp abal ka ejtotsik ka kuxuy xowakich kal yantam i chaattalb,
ani kal i kulbtalb ka pidhltsik ti jalbintsixtalb an Ttalb xi tu tokedhantsmalich ti ejattal abal ki ejto ki bachu ban tajaxtalb xowa neech ti ku pidha abal Jajich tu dhabal.
Na Dios tu kldha bin takixtal an lej atax xon tu kwajatwiik ani tu kwajba bin takixtal nin Chakmil xin kanidhl tajat.
Jech nin Chakmil, jaich xi tu loo kal nin chemtal ani tu pakwlantsi an ti walastalbil.

Na Kristo, xi jaich nin Chakmil na Dios, tu xalkantsal xan ti jeye na Dios xi yab i ejtowal ki chuu. Jaj kejlejich Ja ta ti kwajat tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajmal ani Jaj, jaich na ms ultalb kal ejtal xowa.

Na Dios junax kal nin Chakmil, in taja ejtal xowa waach ban chabl ani ban walki, ejtal xowa xi tejwa ani xi yab tejwa, in jila jeye an pakdha takix, an awiltalbtsik, an ajtiklbtsik ani xitakichki xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakich, ejtal kal Jaj ti tajadh ani abal Jaj.
Jech an Chakmlb kejlejich Ja ta ti kwajat tam ti ejtal jech yabl tajadh ani Jaj in teykm ejtal xowa tajadh.

Ani yab tokot jechki, Jaj jaich ni oklkil waw xu belomich. Jaich na kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik ani an belomtsik jaich na kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul. Jaich jeye xi tu pidhl an ti xechintalb ani jaich xi okxinkich ka ejech ti t abal ka kwajay ultalb kal ejtalki.
Pos na Dios in kulbetna abal ban Chakmlb ka xalkan ejtal xan ti jeye Jaj.
Na Dios in taja ka lejkin kal Jaj ejtal xowa waach ban chabl ani ban walki. Jech an lejkintalb in taja kal tin kwenta nin xichl nin Chakmil xin wakla tam ti chemech ban peltsidh te.
Tattsik yabwiik i dhabalb kal na Dios ani a pojkltsikwiik ta itsch. A tajltsik an walastalb, por xo, na Dios ti kwajbmalichtsik alwa kal Jaj
kal tin kwenta an cheml xin bachu na Kristo bin tul. Jech in taja anchan na Dios abal ti ki ututsik i tokat tin tamt, yab i walbidh ani kal ni jun xata xantokl ti ki walbiyattsik.

Por yejat tajat ka ntsi ta belomtsik kal ejtal na ejattal ani yab ka jilatsik an aytsixtalb xa kool kal tin kwenta an alwa tilab xa achmalichtsik. Jech an alwa tilab, jaich xu tilnal putlki an kayl; ani nan, xu bij Pablo, tin kwajba na Dios abal kin xechin neye tin tolmix ka tilan jech an alwa tilab.

Xo in kwajat in kulbl abal u achl an yajtsiktalb kal tattsik ta alwabl, pos anchan, exom u kidhbayal ba nu tul an yajtsiktalb jelti xin achmal na Kristo kal tin alwabl an belomtsik, ke jaich xi kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul.
U bajmalich kin kwajay tin tjontsix an ti belomtsik, kal tin kwenta an punkuntsixtalb xi tin pidhmal na Dios abal tu tiltsitsik kidhat an ti alwa tilab kal ta alwabltsik.
Jech an alwa tilab xi na Dios in koolwiik yab tejwa asta ti weje, jaich xi xo in pidhmalich kin exla xu dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj.

Na Dios in pidhatsik kin chobna xu dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj, ke an tokat tsubaxtalb xi ta tin koolwiik yab tejwa, jaich jeye abal xi yabtsik u judo. Ani jachan xowa ta tin koolwiik yab tejwa na Dios, jaich jech: ke na Kristo kwajat ba na itsch ani anchan a chobichtsik alwa abal neech ka bachutsik nin tokat labidhtalbil.
Waw i till na Kristo, i tawnl ani i oktsal ejtalkitsik kal yantam i chalab abal kin exbaytsik alwa ani ka kwajaytsik alwa juntsik ti b kal na Kristo.
Nan jaich tin tojnal kal jech tin kwenta, in tojnal kal ejtal an chplb ani an awiltalb xi tin pidhl na Kristo.
U l ka chobnatsik ke nan u tajl an chplb tu kontsintsi abal ki tolmiyattsik kal na Dios, abal ka tolmiyattsik jeye xu kwajltsik Laodisea ani ejtal xi yabl tin chumaltsik.

Tu kontsintsaltsik abal ki likedhantsat ta itsch kal na Dios ani ki kwajaytsik junini i kndhx. Anchan neech ka exbaytsik alwa an tsubaxtalb ani neech jeye ka exlatsik xowa xin koolwiik yab tejwa na Dios, ke jaich na Kristo.
Pos ba na Kristo tu tsiil ejtal an chalab xi alwa ani Jaj, jaich jeye xin pidhnl ka exbayat ejtal xowa alwa.
Jech xowa tu utsltsik, jaich abal yab ti ki kambiytsik ni jun xita kal i labidh tilabtsik.
Pos maske nan yab in kwajat kal tattsik, ka tajatsik jelti max tachan in kwajat. In kulbl tajat abal u achl i kwajattsik alwa ani a ntsaltsik ka bela na Kristo.
Jaxtm, anchan jelt xan ta bachmalichtsik na Jesukristo abal ta Ajtik, anchan ti yejat ki kwajaytsik junini kal Jaj.
Ka koytsik na ejattal kwajat alwa ba na Jesukristo, ka belatsik Jaj in tsubtalki jelt xan ta oktsidhtsik ani ka pidhltsik echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.

Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta, yab ka exbantsitsik xin l ti ki kambiytsik kal i tilabtsik ani i chalabtsik xi yab tsubax; jajtsik yab ba Kristo tin kldhl xowa in oktsixnltsik, pos tokot in wewkm in oktsixtal i iniktsik ani i chalab xi techki ti kayl.
Pos ejtal xan ti jeye na Dios, kwajat ba na Kristo.
Tattsik a koolich ejtal xowa a yntsal abal ki kwajaytsik alwa kal na Dios kom i kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo. Jaj jaich na ms ultalb k an ajtiklbtsik ani xitakichki xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakich.

Anl jeye, abal i kwajatichtsik kal na Kristo, i exlidhichtsik; por yab kal i exl jelti xu tajtsinaltsik an israelitatsik bin tul. Jech an exl xi na Kristo in pidhnl, jaich ke ti jalkuymalichtsik xan ta xeechtsikwiik.
Pos tam ta pujantsik, in junu jelti max i jolyatichtsik junax kal na Kristo ani jelti max i ejdhtsik teye ti t junax kal Jaj, abal a belatsik ke kal nin chp na Dios ti ejdh ti t na Kristo.

Ti wel chabki, i kwajattsikwiik jelti max i chemnek kal tin kwenta an walastalb xa kool ani abal yab i exlidh kom yab i judotsik; por xo, na Dios ti ejdhmalichtsik ti t jelt xan tin ejdha na Kristo ani ti pakwlantsmalichtsik ejtal an ta walab.

Na Dios in paku ni jntsixtal xi koolwiik kal Jaj. Jech an jntsixtalb, jaich ke yab i ejtmal ki taja xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios ani jech an jntsixtalb, pkun tam ti na Kristo chemech pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Tam ti na Kristo chemech ban peltsidh te, in ta an ajtiklbtsik ani an awiltalbtsik xi teykmte kal an lej atax. In kntsi an tin awiltaltsik ani anchan tin tidhebdha.

Jaxtm xo, yabich ka tajltsik ti kij xita ti kawyaltsik kal tin kwenta xowa a kapal o kal xowa a uchl, kal tin kwenta i ajibtsik, tam u witsl a ch ani kal tin kwenta jeye xanty yejat ka tajan tam in ktsjil i koyxnich.
Ejtal jech, jaich jelti jun in chalm xi kwajat kejle neech ka tsch, por xowa nin lejtal, jaich na Kristo.

Yab ka walkatsik ki kntsin an ti chejwalixtalb xa koolichtsik tadh kal an oktsixtsik xin wynl in chakltsik tajat tinb. Jajtsik in kaknl i tokat abatwletsik, in ulal ke in chumaltsik i xalkantsixtalb ani in tekltsik tajat tinb kal an chalabtsik xi jajkitsik in kldhl.

Jech an oktsixtsik yab kwajat kal a Kristo. Na Kristo jaich na kwajat jelti nin k an belomtsik ani waw xu belomich, jaich nu kwajat jelti nin putll nin tul. Na Kristo jaich nin tajl abal ku belmch ms, tu likedhantsal ti ejattal ani in tajl abal ku kwajay junini i chalab, anchan xan ti na Dios in l kin chuu ku kwajay.

Tattsik i kwajat teye jelti max i chemnekich kal na Kristo, abal a jilmalichtsik an chalab xi yab alwa ani xowa a tajltsikwiik. Pos max anchanich ta kwajattsik, jantki p tm bl ta exbantsaltsik tin takixtal an oktsixtsik
xin ulaltsik ench: “Yab ka takatsik jachan, yab ka kaputsik jachan, yab ka tynatsik jachan”?
Ejtal jech xowa in ulaltsik, neech ka taley, pos yab xata in y, in cha oktsixtal i iniktsik.

Tsubax kejle, ke ejtal jech u xalkanal jelti jun i alwa chalab abal in ulaltsik ke yejat ka wwnl jun i belomtalb, ka koy i chaattalb ani ka yajlombdhl tab. Por ejtal jech, yab xata ti alwa, pos yab neech ka ejto ka kubdhatsik kl xowa in kulbetnl na tul.
Jaxtm, kom i kwajat teye jelti max i ejdhatsichtsik ti t junax kal na Kristo, ka aliytsik tokot xowa waach walki, xon ti kwajat na Kristo buxl tin ejt na Dios.
Ka chalpaytsik xowa waach walki ani yab tokot xowa waach ban kayl.
Pos kom jelti max i chemechtsik junax kal na Kristo, xo a koolichtsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal chinat junax kal Jaj ba na Dios.

Na Kristo jaich xi ti pidhltsik an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Ani tam Jaj ka tsch, neech ka xalkanich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xa koolichtsik ani neech jeye tm ki kwajaytsik junax bin labidh tokt.

Jaxtm, kom jelti max i chemech ani i ejech ti t junax kal na Kristo, yejatich ka jilatsik ka taja an walastalbtsik xi jelti jech: Yabich ki kwajaytsik yab exbadh, yabich ka taja xowa atax, yabich ka taja xowa a achl in kulbetnl na tul ani nibal xa chalpayal xowa yab alwa. Yabich jeye ki cheneb, pos jech in junwal jelti max a kaknl i chilabtsik.
Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu tsiil an yajtsiktalb xi tl ba na Dios abal an atiklbtsik xi yab in tajl ti kij an takixtalb;
ani tattsik jaichwiik a tajl ejtal jech ti wel chabki.
Por xo, ka jilaichtsik jeye ejtal jech: an chkub, an chkxtalb, an atax chalab, an odhbijixtalb ani an atax tilab xa ulaltsik.
Yabich ki kmbxintsik jn ani jn kom a jilmalichtsik an weje chalab xi yab alwa ani xowa jeye a tajltsikwiik.
Pos xo a bachmalichtsik an t chalab xin pidhnl na Dios. Jech an t chalab, a Dios in tajmal ani exom in tmdhl ba tattsik asta ka exla alwa Jaj.

Yab in dhl ti kwenta max i griego o i judo, max i exlidh o yaba, max i pl inik xu kwajl kunat o i pl inik xu kwajl w, i jolib o i ajtiklb; pos na Kristo jaich na ms ultalb ani Jaj, kwajat bin itsch ejtalki xita kl ti ka bachwat.
Na Dios ti kanidhltsik ani ti takwymaltsik abal Jaj tiki dhabalna. Jaxtm, ki kwajchtsik i kntsx ti yajnantsixtalb, ti alwatalb ani i chaattalb; ka kuxuy xowakichki ani yabich ki pojkaxmtsik.
Ki kntsxintsik ti chaattalb jn ani jn ani ki pkwlntsxin jn ani jn max ki wltsxin. Anchan jelt xan ti na Kristo ti pakwlantsmaltsik, anchan teye ka tajatsik.
Ani ki kndhxintsik tajat, pos jech jaich nin tajl ka koytsik junini na chalab kal ejtal xowakichki.

Ke nin kijidhtalbil na Dios ka kwajay ba na itsch abal ti ki ltsitsik xan ti yejat ki kwajay, pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti kanymaltsik na Dios abal ki kwajch jelti max jn tokot. Ani ka pidhltsik tajat ti jalbintsixtalb.

Ke nin kwintal na Kristo ka koytsik tajat ba na itsch. Ki ktsxintsik ani ki pkbdhxintsik jn ani jn kal yantam i chalab. Ka ajatnatsik i ajatlb ani i ajatlbtsik xi ijtsinal kal an Tokat Ejattalb. Ka ajtintsitsik na Dios kal yantam i kaknaxtalb xi tl ba na itsch.
Ani ejtal xowa ka taja o ka ulu, ka tajatsik tin bij an Ajtiklb Jess, ka pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios an Ttalb tin bij na Jess.
Tomkidh mmlbtsik, yab ka chikat taja na tomkl, pos jech jaich yejat ka tajatsik kom a bellich an Ajtiklb.
Tomkidh paylomlbtsik, ka kanidha na tomtal ani yab ka chakuntsi.
Chakamtsik, ka exbantsi ejtal xowa kin ulu na tta ani na nna, pos jech jaich nin l an Ajtiklb.
Ttalbtsik, yab ka chakdha na chakmiltsik abal yab kin jilatsik kin taja xowa alwa.

Tjontsixtsik, ka exbantsitsik xowa kin ulu na ajtik xi tech ti kayl, yab tokotki ki tjon tam kwajat ti telltsik, abal a l ki chutat ke i alwa tojnaltsik. Ki tjontsik kal jun a itsch tsubax abal ka tajatsik xowa in l na Dios.
Xowakich ka taja, ka tajatsik kal yantam i kulbtalb, jelti max i kwajat a tjontsal na Ajtik ani yab i atiklbtsik.
Pos a chobichtsik ke na Kristo jaich an Ajtiklb xi kwajat a tjontsal ani Jaj neech ti ki pidhatsik an ti chejwalixtalb xa lujyaltsik ka bachu.
Por xita in tajl xowa yab alwa, neech ka pidhan kal na Dios an ti yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal; pos na Dios yab kwajat ti takukl an ti atiklbtsik.
Ajtiklbtsik, ka tajatsik xowa alwa ani lujat kal na tojnliltsik. Pos yejat ka chalpay abal a kooltsik teye jun a Ajtik xi kwajat walki.
Ki lantsik echeki, yab ki bemtsik ta l ani ka pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.

Ti ku kontsintsi weye abal an Ajtiklb ti ku tolmiy ki ela xan ti ki tila an alwa tilab. Anchan, neech tm ki ejto ki pidhna ka chobn xowa kwajatwiik yab tejwa kal tin kwenta na Kristo, pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin kwajat tin wiknl.
Ti kin kontsintsi abal ku ejto ku tila tajax jelt xan ti yejat ku taja.
Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta kal xowa a tajl ani ki kwajaytsik alwa kal an atiklbtsik xi yab u belom abal ka ejto ka tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab tam waach xan ti ani xontiki ti ka ejto.
Yejat ki kwintsik kal i chaattalb abal kin acha alwa xita na tolmiyal ti tilom ani yejat ka chobnatsik xan ti neech ka tkoyal jun xita.
Na Tkiko, an kidhblb xi kanidhl tajat, neech ti ki ltsitsik ejtal xan tin kwajat neye. Jech an kidhblb, jaich jun i alwa tojnal xin tjontsal an Ajtiklb junax kal nan.
Jaxtm tu aba tachan xon ta kwajattsik abal ti ki ltsi xan tu kwajat weye ani abal ti ki kijidhmdhantsitsik ta itsch.

Na Onsimo, an kidhblb xu belom jeye in lujtalki, xi waw i kanidhl tajat, neech jeye kal na Tkiko. Jech na Onsimo, jaich jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal. Jajtsik neech ti ki tiltsi ejtal xowa u tmnal tech.

Na Aristarko, xi kwajat ban wikaxte junax kal nan, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Markos, nin chejel kidhb na Bernab. Nan tu utsmalichtsik abal ka bachu alwa na Markos max ka kale ti ki lna.
Ti abtsaltsik jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Jess, xu bijyb jeye ta Justo. Jechtsik, jaich an judotsik xi belmch ani u tojnal junax kal nan abal ki tila xan tu takix na Dios ani tin kijidhmdhltsik tajat.

Ti abtsaltsik jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Epafras, jn ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal xi kwajat jeye in tjontsal na Kristo. Jaj echeki tajat in tajl an chplb abal ti ki kontsintsitsik ki kwajay tsububudh a itsch ani ki kwajaytsik in lujtalki a tajl tokot xowa in l na Dios.
Pos nan u chutal xan tu kwajl tajat ti l na Epafras kal tattsik ta kwenta ani kal tin kwenta jeye an kidhblbtsik xu kwajl ban bitsowtsik xin bij Laodisea ani Ierpolis.
Na Lukas, an illix xi waw i kanidhl tajat, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb ani na Demas jeye.
Ti kin chapndhantsitsik an ti kidhblbtsik xu kwajl Laodisea. Ti kin chapndhantsitsik an ta Ninfas ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik xu junkunal bin kim jech an kidhblb.

Tam ka okchtsik ka ajay jech an dhutsadh w, ka abna Laodisea abal ka ajintsattsik jeye an belomtsik xi taja. Ani an dhutsadh w xu abtsm an belomtsik xi Laodisea, neech jeye ti ki abtsi abal ka ajaytsik.
Ka utsatsik na Arkipo abal kin taja ejtal an tojlb xi punkuntsidh kal an Ajtiklb.
Jech an chapndhomtalb, tu dhutsuntsmaltsik kal nan tajat u kubak ani u dhuslbil. Ka chalpaytsik abal nan in kwajat tin wiknl. Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, junax kal na Silbano ani na Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl Tesalnika, xi kwajatichtsik junini kal na Dios an Ttalb ani kal an Ajtiklb Jesukristo. Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Echeki i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta ani tam ku lan, tu kontsintsaltsik teye.

I till tajat tin tamt ni Tta Dios xowa alwa a tajltsik abal i belomich. I till jeye an tojlb xa tajltsik kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xa kooltsik ani kom i kwajattsik a aytsm ni Ajtik Jesukristo, jaxtm ta kuxyal xowakichki.
Kidhblbtsik xi kanidhbtsik kal na Dios, i chob abal Jaj ti takwymaltsik.

Pos tam ti waw i uldha ba tattsik an alwa tilab, yab ulich kal i tilabki, ulich kal yn in chp, kal an Tokat Ejattalb ani kal yantam i belomtalb kom waw i chobich alwa, ke jech jaich an tsubaxtalb. Pos a chobtsik alwa xan tu kwajinek ba tattsik abal ta knltsik.
Ani tattsik, a wwna ni xechintal ani nin xechintal an Ajtiklb; a bachutsik an alwa tilab kal jun i kulbtalb xin pidhnl an Tokat Ejattalb, maske a watnatsik kejle tajat yn i yajtsiktalb.
Ani anchan a bajawtsik ki kwajay jelti jun i oktsixtalb abal ejtal an belomtsik xu kwajl ban chabltsik xi Masedonia ani xi Akaya.

Pos kal tattsik ti tujey ani xo bukenekich, yab tokotki Masedonia ani Akaya, bukenekich putlki nin alwa tilbil an Ajtiklb. Ani chobte jeye xan ta belltsik na Dios, pos asta waw i chutal ke yabich yejat ki tila xata.
Pos jajtsik in till xan tu bachwat kal tattsik ani xan ti jeye ta jilatsik ka kakna an chilabtsik abal ka belaichtsik na Dios ani anchan, ka tujchtsik ka tjontsi jech na Dios xi ejat ani tsubax.

Ani in tilltsik jeye xan ta kwajattsik a aytsm tam ka witsiy jun na Jess xi kwajat walki. Jech na Jess, jaich nin Chakmil na Dios xi chemdh ani na Dios in ejdha ti t. Jaj jaich xi tu lowal abal yab ki bachu an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech ka tsch tayl.
Kidhblbtsik, pos a chobtsik alwa, ke yab jolatki an lnaxtalb xi taja tachan.

Pos anchan jelt xan ta chobichtsik, tam ti ms okox u kale ban bitsow Filipos. Taja u odhbijyat ani u tajtsin xan ti ku len, por na Dios tu tolmiy abal ki tila ba tattsik nin alwa tilbil kal ni jun i jkib, maske u atnal tajat chapik.
Pos yab u ukpink tu kwajat tam tu xechin tu tawnax, nibal u tiltsixnk kal i ataxtalb, nibal abal ku kambixin.
Anchan tu kwin, kom na Dios tu kldha tu alwa ani tu punkuntsmal abal ki tila an alwa tilab. Yab i taja xowa in kulbetnl an atiklbtsik, i taja xowa in l na Dios, xin ejtowal ti ku chutsi an ti itsch.
Anchan jelt xan ta chobichtsik, yab jayki i tawnmal ni jun xita kal i labidh tilabtsik abal ki kambiy, nibal i kambixnmal jun xata abal ki ta i tumn. Na Dios in chob alwa jech.
Yab jayki i alymal ku kakn kal an atiklbtsik, nibal kal tattsik, nibal kal xi keettsik, maske neech kejlewiik ki ejto ki ulu ku tolmiyat kom tu abatwlejil na Kristo, por yab i taja anchan.
I koy tajat i kanidhaxtalb kal tattsik, jelt xan ti jun i nnalb in tsutsdhl ani in beletnl nin chakmiltsik.
Tu kanidhltsik, ke i lak max yab tokot jki tu pidhatsik an tin alwa tilbil na Dios, tu pidhatsik jeye an ti ejattal; pos i bajmalich ki koy tajat i kanidhaxtalb kal tattsik.
Kidhblbtsik, tattsik a tlm xan tu tjnk ani tu chekenek abal ki ejto ki watba tib. Akal i kij u tjnk abal yab ki tojliy ni jun xita xi tattsik tam tu xechin ki tila nin alwa tilbil na Dios.
Tattsik a chob ani na Dios jeye, abal u kwajinek tokat ani lujat kal tattsik xi belomichtsik, abal yab xita kin ejto ti ku walbindha kal ni jun xata.
Ani a chobtsik jeye xan ti pakabdhmaltsik ani i kijidhmdhmaltsik juntsik ti b xi tattsik a kidhtal, jelt xan tin tajl jun i ttalb kal nin chakmiltsik.
Tu punkuntsmaltsik abal ki kwajaytsik xan ti yejat ka kwajay xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, xi ti takwymalich abal ki kwajaytsik teye ba nin takixtal ani bin labidh tokt.

Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti echeki i pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios; pos tam ti tattsik a acha nin alwa tilbil na Dios, xi waw i tila, yab a bachutsik jelt in kwintal i iniktsik. Jech nin alwa tilbil na Dios, jaich xi ti tajltsik ka jalkch na chalab, tattsik xa bellich.

Kidhblbtsik, tam ta atan kal na at kidhtaltsik, jaychki teye a tamutsik jelt xan tin tamu an belomtsik xin bellichtsik na Dios xi kwajattsik Judea xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Kristo Jess, pos anchan jeye ti atantsik kal nin at kidhtaltsik.
Jech an judotsik, jaich nin chemdha an Ajtiklb Jess; anchan jelt xan ti ms okox, in chemdhmal an tiltsixtsik ani waw tu aja ku kale. Yab in kaknltsik na Dios ani in atl an atiklbtsik,

pos tam i l ki tawna xi yabtsik u judo abal ka loeytsik jeye, yab tu walkl ki taja. Anchan, ms u walbinalichtsik. Por xo, exomich in bajwal xowki nin kakadh yajtsiktalbil na Dios neech ka ulchich ba jajtsik.
Kidhblbtsik, tam ti waw u kale w i kij xon ti tattsik i kwajat, maske yab tu chutaltsik, echeki i kwajattsik ba ni ejattal ani i l tajat ku kale jun tu lnatsik.
I exmalich ku kale; nan, xu bij Pablo, ynlich u exmal kin kale, por echeki tin tamkuyal an lej atax.
Pos, jowa j ni aytsixtal, ni kijidhtalbil ani xantki tu kwajat u kulbl ani kijidh? Yabxe jaich tattsik tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo?
Tsubax, tattsik jaich ni kijidhtalbil ani xantki tu kwajat u kulbl.
Ani tm, kom yabich ms i ejto ki kuxuy, i chalpay ku jilkon Atenas wawki kwetm

ani ki aba an kidhblb Timoteo abal ti ki takiytsik ani ti ki pakabdhatsik ka ntsi ta belom. Jech na Timoteo, jaich jeye jun in tjontsixil na Dios xi tjnk junax kal waw abal ka tilan an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta na Kristo.
Pos yab i l ki chuu ke ni jun xita kin jila tinb kal tin kwentaki an taktamixtalb xi kin acha. Tattsik a chob alwa ke kool ki watna ejtal jech.
Pos tam ti tachan bl tu kwajat kal tattsik, i ulu abal neech ki watna i yajtsiktalb ani anchan ti tmun, jelt xan ta chobichtsik.

Ani jaxtm nan, kom yabich ms u ejto ku kuxuy, u abna ki konyattsik xan ta kwajat kal tin kwenta an belomtalb, pos u chejnl ke an lej atax ti ki jnatsik xon ti yab alwa ani ke ni tojlbil ka kale jelti max yab xata in jalbl.

Por xo, na Timoteo witsenekich ani tu tsidhantsi ti tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta an belomtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb xa kooltsik. Tu ltsi jeye abal tattsik echeki tu chalpayal kal yantam i kanidhaxtalb ani ke tattsik a lakich tajat max ti ku chuch, anlki jelt xan ti waw i achl.
Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik, tam ti chobna ke a ntsaltsik ta belom, i bachu tajat i kijidhtalb maske exom i watnl i yajtsiktalb ani i taktamixtalb.
Tam ti chobna ke tattsik a ntsal ka bela an Ajtiklb, u likedhantsat tajat an ti ejattal.
Kidhblbtsik, Janti neech ki ejto ki pidha ms ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta ani kal tin kwenta an kijidhtalb xi tattsik tu pidhmal tin tamt Jaj?
