Akal i kij i pakabdhl na Dios abal ti ku walka ku kale tachan tu lnatsik ani tu ltsitsik xowa bl u kibel abal ka ejto ki belmchtsik xan ti yejat.
I l ke ni Tta Dios ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ti ku tolmiy abal ki ejto ku kale tachan tu lnax.
Ani ke an Ajtiklb ti ki tolmiytsik abal ka koy ms plek an kndhxtalb jn ani jn ani kal ejtalkitsik, jelt xan ti waw ti kool an kanidhaxtalb kal tattsik.
Ti ki tolmintsitsik jeye an ta itsch abal ki kwajaytsik juniniki, tokat ani yab i walbidh tin tamt ni Tta Dios tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jess kal ejtal xi Jaj in tokmal.
Ani xo, kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik ani tu punkuntsaltsik jech tin bij an Ajtiklb Jesukristo: anchan xan tu ltsitsik ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios, anchan ka ntsi ka tajatsik echeki.
Tattsik, a chob xowa j an takixtalb xi tu pidhatsik kal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb Jess.
Xowa na Dios in l, jaich ke tattsik ki kwajch i tokat; ke yabich xita ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal,
ke an paylomlbtsik kin wita ka kwajay tokat kal nin tomtal ani kin kaknl.
Yab kin tajtsi xowa yab alwa nin tomtal, jelt xan tin tajl an atiklbtsik xi yab in exll na Dios.
Ke ni jun xita yab kin kambintsi tin tomtal nin at kidhb, pos xita kin taja anchan, neech ka pidhan plek ti yajtsiktalb kal an Okxlb, jelt xan tu utsmalichtsik ms okox.
Pos na Dios yab tu takwymal abal ku kwajay kibenek, tu takwym abal ku kwajay tokat.
Pos anchan p, xita kin chikat taja jech an oktsixtalb, yab exom in chikat tajl jun i ani inik, exom in chikat tajl a Dios, xi tu pidhmal tin Tokat Ejattal.
Kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb kal na at kidhbtsik, yab yejat tu dhutsuntsitsik, pos na Dios ti oktsmalichtsik abal ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn.
Ani anchan jeye ta kanidhltsik ejtal an kidhblbtsik xu kwajltsik putl Masedonia. Kidhblbtsik, por tu pakabdhltsik abal bl ka pubdhatsik ms na kanidhaxtal.
Ki kwajajantsik alwa ani ka ntsi na tojlbiltsik, ki tjontsik kal na kubak jelt xan tu punkuntsmaltsik,
abal ki kakn kal xi yabtsik u belom ani abal ka koytsik ejtal xowa ka yntsi.
Kidhblbtsik, i l ki chuu ka chobnatsik xanty neech ka tmun kal an kidhblbtsik xi chemnekich abal yab ki kwajaytsik i tepinal jelti xi keettsik xi yab in kool ni jun i aytsixtalb.
Anchan xan ti bell ke na Jess chemech ani ejech ti t, anlki jeye ti neech ka ejdh kal na Dios an kidhblbtsik xi chemnekichtsik ani neech ka jn xon ti kwajat na Jess.
Jech xowa tu utsltsik, jaich xowa tu utsmal an Ajtiklb: ke ejtal waw xu belom, xi ku jilkon ejat asta tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb, yab neech ku jn okox ani tayl xi chemnektsik.

Pos Jaj tajat an Ajtiklb neech ka paay tuwa walki xon ti kwajat ani kal in chapik tawnaxtal, kal jun i kwintalb jelt xan tu kw in oklkil i tokat abatwletsik ani kal in kornetajil a Dios, neech ti tawnax. Tm, xi chemnekichtsik ani in belmal na Kristo, neech ka ejdhtsik okox.
Tayl, waw xi bell na Kristo xu jilkonk ejat, neech ku jn junax kal jajtsik ban tokow abal ku lxin taja tekat kal an Ajtiklb. Ani anchan neech tm ku kwajch malill i kij kal an Ajtiklb.
Jaxtm, yejat ki pbdhntsxintsik ta ejattal jn ani jn kal jech xowa tu tiltsaltsik.
Kidhblbtsik, por kal tin kwenta an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb, yab yejat tu dhutsuntsitsik.
A chobichtsik alwa, ke tam kin bajaw jachan an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb, neech ka tsch jun jiktowle tam yab xita in tlm; neech ka tsch jelt xan tu ulel jun i kw tam akal.

Tam an atiklbtsik kwajat in ulaltsik ench: “Ejtal kwajat alwa ani kijidh”, tmich ti neech ka ulich jun jiktowle an pakwenib. Jelt xan ti an mmlb xi kwajat kodh in achl jun jiktowle an yajal abal neech kin wachch an chakam, anchan jeye ti neech kin tamu jech an atiklbtsik. Ani yab neech kin ejtotsik kin jeka.

Kidhblbtsik, por tattsik yab i kwajat ban jikwaxtalb ani yab neech ki yakwantsik ukpidh tam kin bajaw jachan na kts xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb. Yab neech ki yakwantsik ukpidh, jelt xan ti jun i kw u yakwax ukpidhki.
Pos ejtal tattsik a junwal jelti an tajaxtalb ani jelti tam kij. Yab i junwal jelti an jikwaxtalb nibal jelti tam akal.
Jaxtm ti yab yejat ku xechin ukpipidh jelti xi keettsik. Ku kwajay echeki tojojodh ani lej inik.
Xu wayaltsik, tam akal tu wayaltsik ani xu uchaltsik, tam akal tu uchaltsik.

Por waw, xu kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb, yejat ku kwajay echeki lej inik. Ki yna jelti i dhabuxtalb an belomtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb, jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynal jun i patl kin dhabuy kl nin tamt. Ani jelt xan ti jun i soldado in ynl jun i patl kojlb abal kin kojna, anchan ti ki yna an loeltalb xu kwajat i aytsm.
Pos na Dios yab tu takwymal abal ki bachu i yajtsiktalb, tu takwymal abal ki bachu i loeltalb kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Na Jesukristo chemech kal waw ti kwenta abal ki ejtch ku kwajay junax kal Jaj, maske u kwajat ejat o u kwajat chemnek.
Jaxtm tu utsltsik abal ki pkbdhxintsik ani ki pbdhntsxintsik ta itsch jn ani jn, anchan jelt xan ta tajlichtsik.
Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik abal ka kakna xu tojnaltsik tachan kal tattsik; xi ti belkmtsik ani ti takyaltsik tin bij an Ajtiklb.
Ka kaknatsik ani ka kanidhatsik tajat, kal tin kwenta an tojlb xi exom in tajltsik. Ki kwajaytsik kijidh.
Kidhblbtsik, tu pakabdhltsik jeye abal ka tawnatsik xi yab in l ti tojnaltsik, ka pubdhantsi tin ejattal xin jilltsik tinb ani ka tolmiytsik xi yab likdha. Ka koy i chaattalb kal ejtalkitsik.
Ka koytsik i kwenta kal jech; max jun xita ka tajtsin xata yab alwa kal jun xita, yab kin witsbantsi. Ka tajtsaltsik tokot echeki xowa alwa xi keettsik, ejtalki, yab takudhki.
Ki kwajaytsik kijidh echeki.
Ki lantsik putl i kij.
Ka pidhltsik ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal ejtalki xowakich. Pos jaich jech in l kin chuu na Dios ka tajltsik abal a bellichtsik na Kristo Jess.
Yab ka tepdhatsik nin kamlil an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ta itsch.
Yab ka pojkantsi xowa in ulal an tiltsixtsik xu kw ijtsidh kal a Dios.
Ka chuutsik xowa alwa ani xowa yab alwa ani ka jilatsik ta itsch tokot xowa alwa.
Ejtal xowa yab alwa, yab ka taja.
Ke na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ti ki tokedhatsik. Ani ke Jaj ti ki alwa beletnantsi an ta ejattal, an ta xechintal ani na tul, abal yab ki elan i walbidh tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Xi ti kanymaltsik, lujat Ja tajat ani anchan neech kin taja jelt xan tin ulmal.
Kidhblbtsik, ti ku kontsintsi weye tam ki lantsik.
Ka chapndhatsik ejtal an kidhblbtsik kal jun i tokat kanidhaxtalb.
Tu punkuntsaltsik, kal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb abal ka ajintsattsik jech an ti dhutsadh w ejtal an kidhblbtsik.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, junax kal na Silbano ani na Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, kidhblbtsik xi kwajl Tesalnika, xi kwajatichtsik xo juniniki kal na Dios an Ttalb ani kal an Ajtiklb Jesukristo.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Kidhblbtsik, yejat ki pidhl echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta, kom anchan tin tomnl. Abal tsudhl u tajkanal a belltsik ms an Ajtiklb ani exom a kyaltsik ms i kndhxtalb jn ani jn.

Jaxtm waw i till tajat kal yantam i kulbtalb tin tamt xi keet an belomtsik xan ti teye tattsik. I tiltsal xan ta belomtsik ani xan ti jeye ta kooltsik an chaattalb tam a kuxyal xowakichki i yajtsiktalb ani tam i atnal jeye.
Kal jech, na Dios in xalkl abal ejtal lujat xowa in tajl. Pos Jaj ti chutal ke in tomnl ki kwajaytsik taknl kal Jaj. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti exom a kuxyaltsik an yajtsiktalb.
In tomnl ka pidhantsik ti yajtsiktalb kal na Dios xi ti atax tajtsaltsik abal kin achatsik jeye an yajtsiktalb.
Ani tattsik xi exom a watnl an yajtsiktalb, ti ki pidhaich ti kijidhtalb junax kal waw tam ka tsch an Ajtiklb Jess t walki junax chejlidh kal i kamal ani kal nin likdha tokat abatwlejiltsik.
Neech ka tsch abal kin pidha ti yajtsiktalb xi yab in lenatsik kin exla na Dios ani nibal in tajl ti kij an alwa tilab kal tin kwenta ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Na jechtsik, neech ka yajlombdh ban kibeltalb malill i kij. Yab neech ka walk ka kwajay xon ti kwajat an Ajtiklb ani yab jayki neech kin chutsi tin labidh tokat chp.

Tam an Ajtiklb ka tsch jachan a kts, jaich abal ka kakn kal ejtal, kal tin kwentaki xi Jaj in tokmal ani abal ka chutat kal ejtal an belomtsik, ke labidh; tattsik a belmal kom a belatsik xowa tu ltsi.

Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti waw echeki tu kontsintsaltsik, i kontsal ni Diosil abal ki kwajaytsik xan tin tomnl kom Jaj ti takwymal. I kontsal jeye ke Jaj ti ki tolmiytsik kal in chp, abal ka tajltsik xowakich xi alwa ani an tojlb kal tin kwenta abal i belomichtsik.
Ani anchan, nin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo neech ka kaknantsat kal tin kwenta na alwa xechintaltsik ani neech teye ki kakntsik kal tin kwenta nin alwatal ni Diosil ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Ani xo, kidhblbtsik, kal tin kwenta tam neech ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo, tam neech ku lxinich kal Jaj, tu pakabdhltsik

abal yab ka jalkuytsik junwki an chalab xa kool, nibal ka walkatsik ki jikdh max ki utsan ke wachinkich jun i xalkantsixtalb kal tin kwenta abal tsinekich an Ajtiklb. Yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik kal i ani tilab nibal maske ki utsan ke waw i dhutsmal abal xo in bajmalich an kij xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb.

Yab ka walka nwki tajat ki kambiyattsik. Pos jech yabl neech ka tmun, asta ka wachin okox xi neechtsik kin pojka tajat na Dios ani tam ka xalkanich jeye an atax inik xi kwajatich bijtsidh abal neech ban kibeltalb.

Jachan an atax inik, jaich xi neech kin pojka ejtal xu bijyb ti Dios ani ejtal xowa xu kaknb. Neech ka buxkan ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios jelti max jajich nu Dios ani neech kin kambixna ke jajich nu Dios.
Yabxe a tlmtsik abal tu utsmalichtsik jech tam tin kwajat tachan kal tattsik?
Ani xo a chobtsik xantokl tu kubdhb abal yabl ka xalkan, por tam kin bajaw an kij, neech ka xalkan.
Jech an atax inik tujenekich ti tojnal chinatki ani tam ka wkoyatich xantokl ti kwajat tamkmte, neech tm ka xalkanich.
Neech tm ka xalkanich jachan an atax inik. Jech an atax inik neech ka chemdh kal nin jajchixtal an Ajtiklb Jess ani neech ka kibdh kal nin tajx an Ajtiklb tam ka tsch.
Jachan an atax inik neech ka tsch kal tin awiltal an lej atax. Neech kin koy tajat i chplb, neech kin taja i exltsik ani i pakdha labandhaxtalb; por ejtal jech, i kambixtalb.
Neech kin yna xowakichki i ataxtalb abal kin ejto kin kambiy xi neechtsik ban kibeltalb, pos jajtsik yab in lena kin taja ti kij an tsubaxtalb abal ka ejtowat jeye ka lowat.
Jaxtm tu walkanal kal na Dios kin belatsik an kambixtalb kal yantam in ejattal
abal ka jilkontsik walbidh ejtal xi yab in lena kin bela an tsubaxtalb, pos ms in kulbetna kin tajatsik xi yab alwa.

Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat kal an Ajtiklb. Waw kool ki pidha echeki ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios kal tattsik ta kwenta abal ti takwymal ki loey tam ti yabl tajadh an walki ani an kayl. Xo i loenekichtsik abal a belmalich an tsubaxtalb ani i tokedhantsidhichtsik an ta itsch kal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti kanymaltsik na Dios, tam ti waw i tila an alwa tilab ba tattsik abal ka ejto teye ka bajawtsik ka koy an labidh tokattalb jelti xin kool ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Kidhblbtsik, jaxtm tu utsl ki kwajajantsik lujat ani yab ka uktsi an oktsixtalb xi tu watbantsmaltsik tam tu oktsi ani tam tu abtsmal jeye dhutsadhki.
Ke Jaj tajat ni Ajtik Jesukristo ani ni Tta Dios, xi tu kanidhl, xi tu pidhl ti kijidhtalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani tu pidhl jeye jun i aytsixtalb kal nin alwatal,
ti ki likedhantsitsik ta itsch. I kontsal jeye ti ki tolmiytsik ki kwajay lujat ani ti ki tolmiytsik kal ejtal xowa alwa a ulal ani a tajl.

Kidhblbtsik, tin okontal tu kontsaltsik abal ti ku kontsintsi weye tam ki lantsik. Ka kontsitsik na Dios abal ka bukey jikat nin alwa tilbil an Ajtiklb ani ka bachwat kal yantam i kaknaxtalb jelt xan ti tmun kal tattsik.
Ka kontsitsik jeye na Dios abal yab xata ku tajtsin kal an atiklbtsik xi yabtsik alwa inik ani ataxtsik, pos yab ejtalki bijidh neech ka belmch.
Por an Ajtiklb lujat Ja tajat ani in tajl xan tin ulal. Neech ti ki tolmiy abal ka koytsik junini na chalab ani neech ti ki beletna abal yab ki t kal an lej atax.
Ani i bell tin bij an Ajtiklb, ke tattsik a tajl xowa tu punkuntsmaltsik ani neech ka ntsi ka tajatsik.
Ke an Ajtiklb ti ki tolmintsitsik ms an ta itsch abal ka exbantsitsik ms an tin kanidhaxtal na Dios ani ka koytsik jeye an chaattalb jelti xin koy na Kristo tam tin kuxuy ejtal an yajtsiktalb.
Kidhblbtsik, tin bij an Ajtiklb Jesukristo tu utsltsik jech: yab ki junkun kal an kidhblb xi be ani yab in l ka kwajay jelt xan ti oktsmal.
Pos a chobichtsik xan ti yejat ki kwajay abal ki kwajay jelt xan ta chuu u kwajay. Tam ti waw u kwajay kal tattsik, u tjnk
ani yab xita i kaptsmal ti kapnl aniki. U tjnk chapik akal i kij abal yab ki tojliy ti kapundhom ni jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal.
In tomnl kejlewiik ki konoy ke tattsik ti ku tolmiy, por yab i taja anchan kom i l ki chuu ka exbaytsik ni oktsixtal ani ka taja jelt xan ta chuutsik i tajl.
Pos tam ti waw u kwajay kal tattsik, tu pidhatsik jech an ti takixtalb: max jun xita yab in l ti tojnal, yab jeye ka kapch.
I achmalich ke taltsik xi tattsik a kidhtal xeechki, yabtsik u tojnal; xeechkitsik ti ochom kal xowakich xi yab in kwenta.
Jachan, xin tajltsik anchan, i utsltsik ani i punkuntsal tin bij ni Ajtik Jesukristo abal ka tjontsik jeye kal i chaattalb ani anchan kin ejtotsik kin ta xan ti ka kapch.
Kidhblbtsik, yab ka jila ka taja xowa alwa.
Max jun xita yab kin taja ti kij xowa i ulal ba jech an dhutsadh w, ka chuutsik alwa xitam j ani yab ki junkuntsik kal jaj abal ka tidheb.
Por yab ka koytsik jelti jun a atwl, tokot ka takiy jelt xan tu takyb jun i kidhblb.
Ke Jaj an Ajtiklb xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb ti ki pidhatsik echeki ti kijidhtalb xantikichki ti ka yntsi. Ke an Ajtiklb ka kwajay echeki kal ejtal tattsik.
Nan, xu bij Pablo, tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti chapndhomtalb kal nan tajat u kubak ani u dhuslbil. Anchan tu dhutsl abal ka exla ke tsubax lejtal nan tu abtsaltsik jech an ti dhutsadh w.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, in abadh kal tin abaxtal na Dios ni Loxil ani kal ni Ajtik Jesukristo, jaich xi waw u kwajat i aytsm kin okoy ti ku loo.

Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xi kool. U l ka bachwal an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Anchan xan tu pakabdha tam tin nechich Masedonia, kool ki jilkon ban bitsow xi Efeso abal ka takiy taltsik i atiklbtsik ke yab kin oktsixna i chalabtsik xi yab alwa

ani yabich ka kwajay kin achamiytsik in ani tilbil i wejlbtsik, nibal kin chalpm xitam j nin weje pakliltsik. Ejtal jech yab xata ti alwa, tokot in tajl i kwlxtalb xi yab xata tu ynal ani yab tu tolmiyal ki taja xowa na Dios tu jiltsmal ki taja, xi jaich kal i belomtalbki. Xo anlki jun tu pakabdhl.
Yejat ka takyaltsik anchan abal u l ku chuu ka kndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i kndhxtalb xi tl ba jun in alwa ejattal, ba jun in chalab xi alwa ani ba jun i belomtalb xi tsubax.
Taltsik in jilmalich kin taja anchan abal kin kwlxna xowa yab xata in jalbl.
In l ti oktsixtsik jelti max in witltsik kin wila nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, por nibal jajtsik yab in exbayal xanty in ulal ani xanty in oktsixnltsik kal yantam i belomtalb.
I chob abal an takixtalb alwa, max jun xita kin yna in lujtalki.

Yejat ki chobna ke ni jun i takixtalb kwajbadh abal xin tajltsik xowa lujat; an takixtalb kwajbadh abal xu tomnaxtsik ani xi yabtsik u tajax ti kij, abal xi yabtsik in l xata kal a Dios ani xu walablomtsik; abal xi yabtsik in kaknl a Dios ani ni jun i belomtalb, abal xin chemdhltsik nin tta ani nin nna ani abal ejtalki an chemdhaxtsik.

Kwajbadh jeye abal xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, abal xu junkunaltsik kal in at inik, abal xin yakwltsik jun xita abal kin nuju, abal xu kambixtsik ani abal xin lej tsubax ulal jun xata, por u kambixki. Ani an takixtalb kwajat jeye abal ejtalkitsik xin atl an alwa oktsixtalb.
Jech an alwa oktsixtalb, anlki jeye tin ulal jelti an labidh tokat alwa tilab xi tin punkuntsmal na Dios xi alwa tajat.

U pidhl yn ti jalbintsixtalb ni Ajtik Jesukristo, xi tin pidha ti chalpadhtalb abal ku lna an alwa tilab, kom Jaj in chuu abal yab neech ku jila jech an tojlb, jaxtm tin pidha jech an ti punkuntsixtalb.

Tin tajtsmal ejtal jech maske ti wel chabki u odhbijymal, u atax tajtsmal an belomtsik ani u utsmal ti tilabtsik xi yab alwa. Por na Dios tin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb, abal tam ti jachan i kij, nan yabl in belom ani yab u chob xanty u tajl.
An alwatalb xi tin pidhm ni Ajtik, plek tajat, anl jeye an belomtalb ani an kanidhaxtalb xi koolich abal u kwajatich junini kal na Kristo Jess.
Jech tsubax tajat ani ejtaltsik yejat kin bela: ke na Kristo Jess tsch ban kayl abal kin loo an walablomtsik, kal jech an walablomtsik, nanwiik na ms in walbidh.

Jaxtm na Dios tin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb kal jech tin kwenta, abal ba nan, xi mswiik in walbidh tajat, na Jesukristo kin xalka nin chaattalbil. Anchan ti tmun, abal xi keettsik xi neech kin belatsik na Jesukristo ani kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, kin chuutsik xowa na Dios tin tajtsi.

Ka kakn ani ka pubdhantsat tin bij kal ejtalki malill i kij an Pulek takix xi yab jayki in kool in okontal, xi yab jayki neech ka chemech nibal u ejtowb ka chutat, na Dios xi junkax ani chalpadh. Anchan ka tjan.

Timoteo, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta an belomtalb, tu punkuntsal jech an ti takixtalb abal ka lika anchan xan ta utsan kal an kidhblbtsik xi kwin ijtsidh kal a Dios ani ka ejto ka ta an atax jelti jun in alwa soldadojil an Ajtiklb.
Por ka kokm an belomtalb ani an alwa chalab. Taltsik xi yab in taja ti kij nin alwa chalbil, in kibdhmalichtsik nin belomtal.
Anchan tin tamutsik na Imeneo ani na Alejandro, xi nan u pidhnatsik ban lej atax abal ka tajtsin kl xowa yab alwa ani anchan kin witatsik yab kin odhbijiy na Dios kal nin kwintaltsik.
Tu utsltsik tajat abal yejat ki taja i pakabdhaxtalb, i lb, i kontsintsixtalb ani ki pidha jeye ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios abal ejtalki an atiklbtsik.
Anchan jeye yejat ki taja kal an pakdha takix ani kal ejtal an awiltalbtsik, abal ki ejto ku kwajay alwa ani tsububudh i itsch, tokat tin tamt a Dios ani kaknantl kal ejtalki.
Ejtal jech alwa ani in kulbetnl na Dios ni Loxil,
pos Jaj in l, ke ejtaltsik ka loey ani kin bajawtsik kin exla an tsubaxtalb.
Jn tokot a Dios waach ani jn tokot i kawintsix waach abal ka pakwlantsat an iniktsik kal na Dios: Na Jesukristo, xi wenkonk jeye ti inik.
Na Jesukristo in pidhna tinb ka chemdh abal anchan kin jalbiy nin jalbl an loeltalb abal ejtalki. Jech xowa in taja na Jesukristo, pidhn ka chobn tam tin bajch an kij.

Jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin bijidh tin ltsix ani tin abatwle, abal ku oktsixna an belomtalb ani abal ku pidhatsik kin chobna an tsubaxtalb xi yabtsik u judo. Kom u bellich na Kristo, u ulal an tsubaxtalb ani yab in kambix.
Jaxtm tu l ke putlki, ka lan an iniktsik, kin dhaya nin kubaktsik abal in chobtsik ke kwajat alwa kal na Dios, yab chakulomtsik nibal in tajltsik i kwlxtalb.

Ani an mmlbtsik, ka kudhkumlintsik in lujtalki xan ti yejat, yab ka kudhkumlin abalki ka telan kal an atiklbtsik; ka tojojontsik, por yab kin jikpa an tsitsbaxtalb nibal an kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro o kal i perlatsik, nibal tokotki kin lena kin yna i kajbidh xeketlbtsik.
Kin yna jelt in kudhkmil ani tin kwajbaxtal, an alwatalb xin tajltsik, jelt xan ti yejat kin taja an mmlbtsik xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
An mmlbtsik yejat kin acha an takixtalb chamamadh, kal yantam i chaattalb.
Pos an mmlb yab ja u walkl ti oktsix ba jun i junkuntalb, nibal kin koy taknl ni jun i inik, yejat ka kwajay echeki chamamadh.
Pos na Dios okox tin taja na Adn ani tayl tin taja na Eba;
ani na Adn yab ja kambidh, kambiyat an mmlb ani tam ti kambiyat, kwajlan ban walastalb.
Por an mmlbtsik neech ka loey, max kin tajl xowa yejat kin taja jun i nnalb, kin ntsi ti belom, ti kanidhax ani ti tokel kal i chaattalb.
Jech tsubax tajat: max jun xita in l ti oklek belomtsik, alwa tajat an tojlb xin l kin taja.

Por an inik xin l ti oklek belomtsik, yab yejat kin koy ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyan. Yejat ka kwajay tomkidh ani in tsubtalki kal jnki i mmlb. Kin jna jun i xechintalb chaatki, kin chobna xowa in tajl ani kaknantl. Yejat kin bachwal alwa an toneltsik xu ulel tin kim, yejat u awil ti oktsix alwa;
yab jun i uchl inik nibal i kunux inik, nibal xin lenl i tumn xi yab tadh alwa. Yejat kin kaknl xitakichki, kin jna jun i chaattalb ani yab chene.
Kin chobna ti takix alwa tin kim ani kin chobna jeye kin takiy nin chakmiltsik abal ka kaknaxintsik;
pos xi yab in ejtowal kin takiytsik xi kwajat tin kim, jan ti neech kin ejto kin takiy xin bellichtsik na Dios?
Yab yejat ka bijyat ti oklek belomtsik jun i kidhblb xi t bl ti belmmadh, abal yab telab t kin teka tinb jelt xan tin taja an lej atax ani ka tajtsin jeye xan ti tajtsin an lej atax.
Yejat jeye ka exlomn kal xi yabtsik u belom, ke jaj jaich jun i alwa inik, abal yab ka kwajlan ba jun i tidhetalb ani bin tamkuxtal an lej atax.
Anl jeye, an tolmix belomtsik yejat ka bijyat xi alwa iniktsik; xi yab in jlkkliyal xowa in ulal, nibal i uchl inik, nibal xin lenl i tumn xi yab tadh alwa.
Yejat ka kwajaytsik jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb xi twiik tin kool yab tejwa na Dios ani xo i bellich ani in chobm abal kwajat alwa tin tamt na Dios.
Yejat ka chobn okox max jechtsik lujat ti xeech ani max neech kin tjontsi; ani max yab walbidhtsik, neech tm kin tjontsi an ti tolmix belomtsik.
Anl jeye, an mmlbtsik yejat xu kaknbtsik, xi yab in janwaltsik i kw, xin tsubtalki ti xeech ani lujattsik kal xowakich.
An tolmix belomtsik yejat ka kwajay tomkidh ani in tsubtalki kal jnki tokot i mmlb, kin chobna kin takiy alwa nin chakmiltsik ani ejtal xi kwajattsik bin kim.
Abal an tolmix belomtsik xi kin taja alwa nin tojlbil, in tlichtsik jun in tj xi ms kaknantl ani in likedhltsik nin ejattal abal kin tila xan ti jajtsik tin bell na Kristo Jess.
U l kin kale jikat tu lna; por tu dhutsuntsal jech

abal max yab kin kale jikat, ka chobna xan ti yejat ki kwajay ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, ke jaich xin bellichtsik na Dios xi ejat. Jech an belomtsik, jaich nin lowal ani in tajl abal xi keettsik kin exla jeye ke jaich an tsubaxtalb.

Tsubax tajat ke plek xowa yab i chobnmal ti weje kal tin kwenta an lujat xechintalb tin tamt na Dios: Na Dios in xalka tinb jelti jun i inik; Jaj ln kal an Tokat Ejattalb abal lujat, chutat kal an tokat abatwletsik. Tilan ba putlki an atiklbtsik, belan putlki an kayl ani bachwat walki kal i labidh tokattalb.

Por an Tokat Ejattalb tajax tajat tin ulal ke tam in okontalich jech an kij, taltsik neech kin jilatsik an ti belom, neech kin exbantsi i ejattalbtsik xu kambix ani i oktsixtalbtsik xi tl ban atax ejattalbtsik.
Jech an oktsixtalb, neech ka oktsixn kal i atiklbtsik xi yab in kool i chalab alwa ani u kambixtsik, jyki max tsiktsidhichtsik an tin chalab kal jun i kk patl.

Jech an atiklbtsik, neech kin ulu ke yab alwa ka tomkin xu belomich, neech jeye kin ulu ke yab alwa ka kapat taltsik i kapnl; maske a Dios in jilmal jech an kapnl abal kin kapu an belomtsik xin exlltsik an tsubaxtalb ani kin pidha ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios.
Pos ejtal xowa in jilmal na Dios, alwa ani yab yejat ki pojka xata, max ki kapal ani ki pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb.
Pos nin kwintal na Dios ani an lb in tokwal.
Max ka oktsi jech an kidhblbtsik, i kalelich tm abal tat, jaich jun in alwa tjontsixil a Jesukristo, xi pubenek kal an alwa tilab xi tin kwenta an belomtalb ani kal an alwa oktsixtalb xa wewkm.
Yab ka taja ti kij i ani tilabtsik ani in tilbil i wejlbtsik. Ka taja i chplb abal ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios.

Ki likedha ni tul kal an ubtnich, alwa kal taltsik xowa; por max ka taja an chplb abal ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios, kal ejtalki ja ti alwa. Pos max ki taja anchan, neech ki bachu xata alwa ba jech an xechintalb ani ban xechintalb jeye xi neech ka tsch tayl.
Jech tsubax tajat ani ejtal yejat kin bela.
Pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta tu kwajat tu tojnal ani i achl i odhbijixtalb, abal i kwajbmalich ni aytsixtal ba na Dios xi ejat, xi jaich nin Loxil ejtalki an atiklbtsik ani ms, xu belomichtsik.
Ejtal jech, jaich ka ulu ka tajan ani jaich ka oktsixna.

Yab ka walka ki pojk abal tat bl i kwitle; ki kwajay jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an belomtsik, xan ta kw, xan ta kwajat, xan ta kanidhax ani xan ta belom. Ka koy a ejattal jelt xan tin l na Kristo ani ka koy jeye na itsch tokat.
Lejat kin ulich, ka ntsal ka ajay an Tokat Dhuslab ban junkuntalbtsik, ka takiy ani ka oktsi an kidhblbtsik.

Yab ka jila ka yna an awiltalb xa kool, xi ti pidhmal na Dios tam ti an pakltsik xin takyal an belomtsik, ijtsin kal na Dios ti ki puntsi tin kubak ta b ani ti utsa abal neech ka koy jech an awiltalb.
Ka pidhodhoy ta ejattal abal ka taja jech an tojlb, jaichki tokot ka tajl abal kin chuu xi keettsik ke ani lejtal ti exom ms a witl ki kwajay xan tin l na Dios.

Ka beletna tab ani ka koy i kwenta kal xowa a oktsixnl, yab ka jlkkliy na chalab kal ni jun xata. Max ka taja jech, neech tm ka bajaw an loeltalb xi tin okontal ani xita ti ki axtsi, neech jeye ka loey.
Yab ka kwiya an yejcheltsik, ka takiy tokot jelti max a tta; ani an kwitltsik, ka taja jelti max a kidhbtsik.
An slbtsik, ka taja jelti max a nna ani an tsidhantsik, jelti max a ixmtsik, por kal yantam a tokat itsch.
Ka tolmiy an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi tsubax lejtal ti kwetm.

Por max jun i chemtsidh mmlb in kool in chakmiltsik o in momobtsik, jajtsik yejat okox kin exla xanty yejat kin taja kal nin pakliltsik. Anchan, neech tm kin ejto kin jalbintsitsik an ti kanidhaxtalb xi kontsidh kal nin ttatsik, pos jech jaich na alwa ani jaich nin kulbetnl na Dios.
Por an chemtsidh mmlb xi tsubax lejtal ti kwetm ani yab xita in kool, in kwajbl nin aytsixtal ba na Dios ani yab in jill kin pakabdha. U l akal i kij.
An chemtsidh mmlb xi ka kwajay yab exbadh, kwajat ejat, por jyki jelti max chemnek.
Ka oktsitsik jeye jech, abal yab ka wachin ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyantsik.
Pos max jun xita yab in tajl ti kij nin kidhtaltsik ani ms, xu kwajltsik bin kim, in pojklich an belomtalb ani jech, u kalelich ja ms walbidh k jun xita xi yab u belom.
Ban w xon ti dhutsadh nin bij an chemtsidh mmlbtsik, tokot yejat ka kwajay dhutsadh xin koolichtsik watats ox inik i tamub ani tokot xi kwajinek alwa kal nin tomkl.

Yejat ka exlomn kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xin tajmal; jelti tam in pakedhmal i chakamtsik, max in bachmal alwa an toneltsik xi ulnek tin kim, max in tjontsm kal i chaattalb an belomtsik, jelti tam jun xita in taktsal tin akan nin at kidhb, max in tolmiymal xi xeechtsik ti chojontlbl o max in tajmal jeye keet xowakich xi alwa.
Por yab ka dhutsa an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi bl tajat tsidhan; pos jachantsik, tam kin jalkuytsik nin chalab, u wmdhb kl ba na Kristo ani in lenl jun ka tomkintsik ti t.
Anchan, u jilkonalich tm walbidhtsik abal yab in ejtowal kin taja xan tin ulmal.
Tm jun, u xechinaltsik tki tki ban attsik. Anchan, u bemltsik; yab tokotki u bemltsik, u tilmabltsik, u ochomtsik kal xowakich ani u xechinaltsik kin tila xowa yab yejat.

Pos nan u l ku chuu ke an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi bl tajat tsidhan ka tomkintsik, kin koy i chakamtsik ani kin beletnatsik alwa nin kim. Max kin taja anchan, yab neech ka tilan yab exbadh kal xi yabtsik u belom.
Taltsik an chemtsidh mmlbtsik, in jilmich kin bela na Kristo ani in wwnmalich an lej atax.

Max jun i inik o i mmlb xu belomich, in kool jun i chemtsidh mmlb bin kidhtal, yejat kin tolmiy; anchan, yabich tm yejat ka tolmiyat kal an belomtsik. An belomtsik neech tm kin ejto kin tolmiy ms alwa an chemtsidh mmlbtsik xi tsubax lejtal ti kwetm.
An yejcheltsik xin takyal alwa an belomtsik, yejat kin bachu i kaknaxtalb, i tolmixtalb ani ms, xin willtsik nin takixtal na Dios ani u oktsixtsik.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Yab ka busliy an konl xi exom ti kwdhal.” Ani in ulal jeye: “An tojnal in tomnl kin bachu nin jalbl.”
Yab ka taja ti kij tam kwajat ti lnb jun i takix belomtsik, max yab waach chb o x xu lnaxtsik.
Por an takix belomtsik xin ntsal kin wala, ka kwiya tin tamt ejtal an kidhblbtsik abal xi keet an takix belomtsik, kin jikna jeye kin walatsik.

Tu punkuntsal tin tamt na Dios, tin tamt an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ani tin tamt jeye nin tokat abatwlejiltsik xin takwymal abal ka yna jech an takixtalb. Yab ka walbiy ni jun xita tam yabl a chob max walbidh ani ka yna an takixtalb kal ejtalkitsik, yab kal taltsikki.
Yab ka ani puntsiki ta kubak jun xita abal ka pidha jun i punkuntsixtalb ban belomtsik, abal yab t ki kale teye i walbidh kal nin walastalbil xi keettsik. Yab ka taja xowa yab alwa.
Kom tyidh i yaulml kal na tsukul ani kal keet jeye an yawlchtsik, yab ka ucha tokotki i ja, ka ucha jeye w i yajtsik uxnl abal ti illki.
Nin walastalbil xi taltsik, tejwa tajat maske yabl jnadh xon ti neech ti ljundhb; por nin walastalbil xi taltsik, yab u tejwaml asta tam oknkich ti ljundhb.
Anchan jeye, max ka tajan xowa alwa, tejwa tajat; ani maske yab tejwa, yab neech ka jilkon echeki chinat.
An jolibtsik, yejat tajat kin kakna nin ajtik abal yab ka odhbijyat na Dios nibal an oktsixtalb.

Ani an jolibtsik xin kool in ajtik u belom, yejat ms kin kakna abal in at kidhbich kal an belomtalb. Yejat kin tjontsi ms alwa, pos xita exom in tjontsal u belom ani yejat ka kanidh. Jech jaich ka oktsaltsik ani jaich ka utsa kin tajatsik.
Max jun xita in oktsixnl i chalab xi yab alwa ani yab in junwal an alwa oktsixtalb xin oktsixnmal ni Ajtik Jesukristo ani nibal j an oktsixtalb xi tu oktsal xan ti ku kwajay alwa tin tamt na Dios,

jachan, jaich jun xita xin tekl tinb ani yab xata in chob. In kulbetnl tajat ti kwlx por nibal in chob xanty in ulal. Jaich kal jech tu tujl an txtalb, an chkxtalb, an odhbjxtalb ani yabich tm u bltsxtsik xata.
In tajl jeye ka kwajay echeki u pjx an iniktsik abal yabtsik alwa nin chalab, yab in exlltsik an tsubaxtalb ani in chalpayal ke an belomtalb, alwa abal kin ta kl i tumn. Yab ka wwnatsik xi anchan.
Tsubax kejle, ke max ku kwajay alwa tin tamt na Dios, in junwal jelti jun xata xi kajbidh in jalbl max ku kwajay u kulbl kal xowaki tokot i kool.
Pos tam tu ulich tu chakam tech ti kayl, yab xata i tsidhmal ani yab jeye xata neech ki ejto ki jna tam ku chemech;
por max i kool i kapnl ani i kudhkmil, yab yejat ku kwajay tu chalpax.

Por xin ltsik ka kwajay tumnladh, yab in ejtowal kin kuxuy jachan an jiklomtalb; anchan, u kwajlanal bin kambixtal an atax ani in ltendhl xowa yab yejat ani yab alwa. Kal jech, u kibdhb kl, u chojontlbdhb ani u jnb ban kibeltalb.
Pos an lelomtalb kal an tumn, jaich xon tu tujl ejtal xowa yab alwa; waach taltsik, abal in ltendhlki an tumn, in jilmalich ti belom ani in tamu yn xata yajtsik.

Por tat, xa belmalich na Dios, yab ka taja ni jun xata jelti jech xowa yab alwa. Ka taja xowa lujat, ki kwajay jelt xan tin l na Dios, ka bela na Dios, ki kanidhaxin, ki kaknaxin ani ka kuxuy ejtal xowakich.

Ka taja an chplb abal ka ntsi ka bela na Dios; ka chobna alwa abal a kool an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, pos jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti kanymal na Dios ani a lej tsubkmalich tin tamt yn i atiklbtsik abal a belmalich ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Xo, tin tamt na Dios, xin tajl abal ka kwajay ejat ejtal xowa waach ani tin tamt jeye na Jesukristo, xin lej tsubka tin tamt na Ponsio Pilato ke Jaj u Chakmlb kal na Dios, tu utsl
ka taja xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb, yab ka jalkuy abal yab ti ki kawiy ni jun xita, anchan ka tajl asta kin bajaw xowki ti ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo.

Neech ka tsch tam kin bajaw xowki tin chalpaymal na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi alwa tajat ani tokot Jajki in kool an awiltalb. Jaj jaich jeye nin Pulek Takxal an pakdha takix ani in Ajtik an ajtiklbtsik.

Tokot Jaj nin kool an awiltalb kal cheml ani Jaj kwajat ba jun i tajaxtalb xon ti yab xita u utel. Yab jayki chuudh kal ni jun xita ani nibal u ejtowb ka chutat. Tokot Jaj kin bachu an kaknaxtalb ani Jajki kin koy an awiltalb malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.

An tumnladh iniktsik xi kwajat ba jech an kayl, ka utsatsik abal yab kin teka tinb, nibal kin chalpaytsik ke neech ka lowat kal xowa in kool, pos jachan xowa in kool, yab neech kin ejto kin chapkna. Ms alwa kin kwajbatsik nin aytsixtal ba na Dios xi kwajat ejat, pos Jaj tu pidhl yandha ejtal xowakich abal ti alwabl.
Ka utsa kin tajatsik xowa alwa, kin tajtsi yn ti alwatalb an chojontltsik ani jaich kin koy jelti an tumnladhtalb. Ka chejwalixintsik ani yab ka cheneb.
Anchan, in junkuwalich tm yn xata alwa tin tamt na Dios abal tayl, kom in chobichtsik alwa abal in koolich an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Timoteo, ka taja ejtal xowa tu punkuntsmal. Yab ki kwajay ka achamiy i tilabtsik xu tilnal tech ti kayl xi yab xata in jalbl, nibal ka taja ti kij an tmnxtalb xin tajl taltsik kal tin kwenta xu bijyb ti alwa chalpadhtalb ani yab tsubax;
pos taltsik xin wwnl jelti jech an chalab, in jilmalichtsik ti belom. Ka bachwal echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, in abadh abal na Dios anchan tin lena. Anchan xan tin ulmal na Dios ke neech ti ku pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xi xo i koolich abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
Timoteo, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil. U l ka bachwal an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Dios an Ttalb ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Echeki tam tu chalpayal bu lbil akal i kij, u pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb na Dios xin kwajat u tjontsal kal jun u alwa chalab jelt xan tin tajmal nu weje pakliltsik.
Tam u chalpayal nin jaml na wal, u l tajat tu chuu abal kin kijidhm.
Pos u chalpayal na tsubax belomtal xa kool. Na pulek, xin bij Loyda ani na nna Ewnise okoxtsik tin bachmal jech an belomtalb ani u chob alwa ke tat anchan teye ta belom.
Jaxtm tu takyal abal ka ntsi ka yna ms chapik an awiltalb xi ti pidhmal na Dios tam tu kwajbantsi an tu kubak ba na b.
Pos na Dios yab tu pidhmal jun i ejattal jikelom, tu pidhmal an ti Tokat Ejattalb abal ku likey, ku kanidhaxin ani abal ki ejto jeye ki kuxuy xowa in lenl ni tul.

Yab ka tidhena ka tila an Ajtiklb tin tamt an atiklbtsik, nibal ki tidheb kal nan tu kwenta abal in kwajat tin wiknl kal Jaj tin kwenta. Alwa ms ki xechin ka tila an alwa tilab maske ka bachu i yajtsiktalb jelti xi nan u bachwal, xantiki ti ki pidha ti chplb na Dios.

Na Dios tu loo ani tu kaniy abal ki jnaich jun i xechintalb tokat, yab abal waw i tajmal jun xata alwa. Tu kaniy abal Jaj anchan tin lena ani kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xi tu pidha kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess. Na Dios tu pidhmal an ti alwatalb asta tam ti yabl tujenek jech an kayl.

Por xo, in xalkmich jech an alwatalb tam tin aba ka tsch ni Loxil Jesukristo, xin tantsi tin chp an cheml. Ani kal an alwa tilabki, tu pidha ki chobna abal neech ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yabich neech ku kachey.
Jaich kal tin kwenta jech an alwa tilab tin bijymal na Dios tin ltsix, tin abatwle ani abal ku oktsi xi yabtsik u judo.

Jaxtm ti exom u achl ejtal jech an yajtsiktalb kal jech tin kwenta. Por yab u tidhenl, pos u chobich xita nu belmal ani u chob alwa ke Jaj in kool i awiltalb abal tin beletna asta kin bajaw xowki Jaj ti ka tsch jun.
Ka ntsi ka yna an alwa oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmal, ka ntsi ta belom ani ta kanidhax abal i kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
Kal nin tolmixtal an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba waw, ka beletna xowa ti punkuntsmal na Dios.
Jelt xan ta achmalich, ejtal xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi Asia tin jilatsik; kal jajtsik ta ti kwajat na Fijelo ani na Ermjenes.
Ke an Ajtiklb kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb na Onesforo ani nin kidhtal jeye, abal jaj ynl tajat tin kijidhmdhmal ani yab in tidhena tin lna maske in balidh ban wikaxte.
Yab in tidhena, xowa in taja tokot tam ti tsch Roma, in ntsi tin aliy, asta tin ela.
Ke an Ajtiklb kin walka kin ela an yajnantsixtalb tam kin bajaw jachan an kij xowki ti ka tsch jun. Tat a chob alwa xan tin tolmiy tam tin kwajay Efeso.
Ani tat Timoteo, xi tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil, ka bachu an chplb xi tl ba na Kristo Jess kal tin kwenta an alwatalb xi ti pidhmal.
Xowa xa achmal u ulal tin tamt yn an atiklbtsik, jaich jech ka punkuntsi an paylomlbtsik xi alwa iniktsik, xa chutal ke neech kin tjontsi abal kin oktsi jeye keettsik.
Por tat xi exom a tjontsal na Jesukristo, ka kuxuy an yajtsiktalb jelti jun i alwa soldado.
Ni jun i soldado xi kwajat in tjontsal in oklkil in tajl keet i tojlb xi yab ka utsan kal jaj, pos tokot kool kin exbay xowa ka utsan kal nin oklkil.
Anl jeye, max jun xita kwajat ti ubt, yab neech kin ejto kin ta xowa u tb, max yab ka ubtin xan ti yejat kin taja.
Xu tojnal ba jun i alelb, jaj okox in tomnl kin bachu xowa in lujyal xanty ka labey ba jachan an alelb.
Ka chalpay alwa xowa tu utsl ani neech ki pidhan ka exbay ejtil kal an Ajtiklb.
Ka chalpay na Jesukristo, xi wachin bin kidhtal an weje pulek takix Dabid ani ejech ti t tam ti chemdh. Anchan xan tin ulal an alwa tilab xu till.
Kal tin kwentaki jech an alwa tilab u achl yn i yajtsiktalb, asta in kyb wikats jelti jun i inik xi atax, por nin kwintal na Dios yab ja kwajat wikats.

Jaxtm tu kuxyal ejtal jech abal tin alwabl xi takudhichtsik kal na Dios, abal kin bachutsik jeye an labidh tokat looxtalb xi yab jayki in kool in okontal, xi neech ki bachu abal u kwajatich kal na Kristo Jess.
Jech tsubax tajat: Max u kwajatich jelti max u chemnek junax kal Jaj, neech jeye tm ku kwajay kal Jaj;
max ki acha i yajtsiktalb kal Jaj tin kwenta, neech weye tu takix kal Jaj. Max ki ulu ke yab i exll, Jaj neech jeye kin ulu ke yab tu exll.
Max waw yab ki taja xowa i ulal, Jaj echeki Ja in tajl xowa in ulal, pos Jaj yab jayki u jalkunal xan ti jeye.

Ka witskontsitsik jech ani ka punkuntsi tin tamt an Ajtiklb abal yab ka kwajay ti kwlxtsik kal tin kwentaki i tilabtsik. Pos jech an kwlxtalb yab xata tu ynal, in ojtsalki tin chalab xin achltsik jech.
Ka taja alwa na tojlbil, abal ki ulich tin tamt na Dios jelti jun i alwa tjontsix, xi yab in kool ni jun xata xantokl ti ka tidheb, abal in ynl in lujtalki an tsubax oktsixtalb.
Yab ka taja ti kij i tilabtsik xu tilnal tech ti kayl ani i ani tilabtsik xi yab xata in jalbl. Pos xin tajltsik anchan, yab in ejtowaltsik ka kwajay xan tin l na Dios
ani nin oktsixtal xi jechtsik, in junwal jelti an kacheltalb xi neech u kachel u kachel ms. Jaich jech in tajltsik na Imeneo ani na Fileto,
xin jilatsik kin bela an tsubaxtalb abal in ulaltsik ke an ejexnich watenekich ani anchan, exom in ojtsal tin belomtal xi taltsik.

Por na Dios in kwajbmalich jelti jun i likat akanlb, an lej tsubaxtalb xin kool jun i exl xin ulal ench: “An Ajtiklb in exlltsik xi Jaj in dhabal.” Ani “ejtal xin lantsalichtsik na Jesukristo, yabich yejat kin tajatsik i walastalb.”
Ba jun i at plek, yab tokotki waach xata xi tajadh kal i oro o kal i plata, waach jeye xata xi tajadh kal i te o kal i kut; taltsik exbadhki xowki tu ynal por taltsik abal ka yn echeki.
Anchan jeye, abal jun xita ka yn jelti alwa tojnal juniniki abal an Ajtiklb, yejat ka kwajay tokat ani yab yejat kin taja xowa yab alwa; anchan neech tm ka ejtowat ka yn kal xowakichki xi alwa.

Ka kuxuy jeye xanty in chalpayal yab alwa tam jn bl kwitle, ka ntsi ka taja xowa lujat, ka ntsi ka bela na Jesukristo, ka kanidha xi keettsik ani ki kwajay alwa kal xin lantsaltsik an Ajtiklb kal jun in ejattal tokat.
Yab ka taja ti kij i kwlxtalb xi yab xata ti alwa nibal xata in jalbl; a chobich abal jachan, in tajl i pjxtalb.
Pos jun in tojnlil an Ajtiklb yab yejat ka xechin ti pjx, yejat kin kakna ejtalkitsik, u awil ti oktsix ani kin kuxuy xowakich.
Kin tawna kal jun i chaat ejattalb xu tomnaxtsik abal kin chuu max na Dios, kin pidhaichtsik jeye kin chalpch kin jila ti walablom ani kin exbaytsik an tsubaxtalb,
abal anchan, kin lamaichtsik nin wal ani ka kalch xon tu kyb wikats kal an lej atax ti tajtsinal kl xan ti ka len.
Yejat jeye ka chobna ke tam in okontalich jech an kij, neech ka wachin i kijtsik xi yajtsik.

An atiklbtsik tokot neech kin kanidha jajkitsik tinb, neech ti chenetsik, neech kin tekatsik tinb kal tin kwenta xanty in y ani neech kin pojka xi keettsik. Neech jeye kin odhbijiytsik na Dios ani an iniktsik, yab neech kin taja ti kij nin ttatsik, yabtsik neech kin pidhnl i jalbintsixtalb ani yabtsik neech kin lena kin taja xowa in l na Dios.

Yab neech kin kanidha nin at kidhbtsik, yab neech ti pakwlantsix nibal neech kin walka ka pakwlantsat, neechtsik ti jnum kw, yab neech kin ejto kin kuxuytsik xowa in lenl, neech ka ataxmtsik tajat ani neech kin pojkatsik ejtal xowa alwa.

Neech jeye kin chinat lna xowa in utsmal jun xita ke yab neech kin lna, yabtsik neech kin chalpay okox xowa in tajl, neech kin tekatsik tajat tinb, tokot neech kin aliytsik xowaki jajtsik in kulbetnl ani yabtsik neech kin aliy a Dios.
Neech kin wynatsik ke in tajl xowa in l na Dios, por neech kin pojkantsi tin awiltal. Yab ki junkun nw kal jachan an atiklbtsik.
Taltsik xi jech in kidhtaltsik, u ochel ban attsik ani in kambiyal an uxumtsik xi walbidhtsik tajat ani xin lenl tajat xowakich xi yab alwa.
Jech an uxumtsik echeki in l kin witatsik xowa u oktsixnb, por yabtsik in ejtowal kin exbay an tsubaxtalb.

Ani anchan, jelti an dhimantsik xu bijyb ta Janes ani ta Jambres in tomnatsik na Moiss, anchan jeye jech an iniktsik tin pojkltsik an tsubaxtalb. Jech an iniktsik yab alwa in chalab in kool ani xalktsik kal na Dios abal yab tsubax tu belomtsik.
Por yab neech kin ejto kin taja xata lej yn, kom neech ka chutattsik kal an atiklbtsik xu kwajl ban kayl ke yabtsik chalpadh, anchan jelt xan tin tamu xi chb an dhimantsik xi tomn kl na Moiss.
Por tat Timoteo a wwnmal alwa nu oktsixtal, xan ta chutal in kwajl, xowa nu l ka tajan, xan tin belom, xan tu kool an chaattalb, xan tin kanidhax ani xan tu kuxyal xowakich.
Ani a chob jeye xan tin kajnadh ani xan tu achmal i yajtsiktalb, jelti an yajtsiktalb xu tamu ban bitsowtsik xi Antioka, xi Ikonio ani xi Listra, por an Ajtiklb tin tolmiy ku kuxuy ejtal jech.
Anl jeye, ejtaltsik xin l ka kwajch jelt xan tin l na Kristo Jess, neech jeye ka atantsik;
por xi ataxtsik ani u kambixtsik ms ja kibenek xowa neech in tamwal, neech ti kambixtsik ani neech jeye ka kambiyattsik.
Por tat, ka ntsi ki kwajay jelt xan ta ejtmalich, kom a chobich ke jaich na tsubax ani a chob alwa xita ti oktsmal.
A exll jeye an Tokat Dhuslab asta ta chipl, xi neech kin ejto ti ki chalpadhmdha abal ka bajaw an loeltalb ke jaich kal tin kwentaki na belomtal xa kool ba na Kristo Jess.
Ejtal xowa kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab, a Dios in chalab ani alwa abal ka oktsixn, abal ka tawnaxn, abal ka kwiyaxn ani abal ka takixn ani anchan, ka jnjich jun i xechintalb lujat,
pos xitaki xin bellich na Dios, kin chobna kidhat abal kin wita kin taja ejtal xowa alwa.
Tin tamt na Dios ani an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, xi neech ka tsch jelti jun i Pulek Takix abal kin ljundha xi chemnektsik ani xi ejattsik, tu punkuntsal tajat
ka tila an alwa tilab; ka witskontsaltsik tam waach xan ti ani xontiki ti ka ejto. Ki kwiyxin, ki tawnaxin ani ki takxin kal yantam i chaattalb ani i oktsixtalb.
Pos neech kin bajaw an kij tam an atiklbtsik yab neech kin lena kin achatsik an alwa oktsixtalb, tokot neech kin aliytsik yn i oktsixtsik abal ka oktsin xowa jajkitsik in kulbetnl kin acha.
Neech kin kuxuknatsik an tsubaxtalb ani neech kin belatsik ms xowakichki in ani tilbil i wejlbtsik.
Por tat Timoteo, yab ka kibdha ni jayki na alwa chalab, ka kuxuy ejtal an yajtsiktalb, ka ntsi ka tila an alwa tilab ani ka ntsi ka taja alwa nin tojlbil na Dios.
Pos exomich ti kunel xowki ti neech kin kwajb jelti jun i pikbantsixtalb abal a Dios; exomich in bajwal an ora xowki ti neech kin chemdh.
U tajmalich alwa an tojlb xowa tin punkuntsmal na Dios, jelt xan tin tajl nin tojlbil jun i alwa soldado; u okymalich ejtal xowa yejat ku taja ani yab u jilmal tin belom.

Ani xo, tin aytsmich xowa u tmal abal in kwajinek in lujtalki, xi neech kin pidhan tam kin bajaw an kij kal an Ajtiklb xu ljundhom in lujtalki. Ani yab tokot nanki neech ti kin pidha, neech jeye ka pidhantsik ejtal xi kwajattsik in aytsm kal yantam i kanidhaxtalb tam ka tsch jun.
Ka taja abal ki tsch jikat ti kin lna;
pos na Demas tin jilmal abal in lena ms xowa waach tech ti kayl ani kale ban bitsow xi Tesalnika. Na Kresente kale ban chabl xi Galasia ani na Tito ban chabl xi Dalmasia.
Tokot na Lukas tech kwajat kal nan. Ka aliy na Markos ani ka tsidha jeye, abal jaj neech kin ejto ti kin tolmiy kal nin tojlbil na Dios.
Na Tkiko u aba ban bitsow xi Efeso.
Tam ki tsch, ti kin tsidhantsi an tu wt xu jilmal Troas bin kim na Karpo; ti kin tsidhantsi jeye an ti dhutsadh wtsik, por u yntsal ms ti kin tsidhantsi an ti ttsik xi dhutsuntsidh.
Na Alejandro, an lejkix patltsik, tin tajtsmalich tajat yn xata yab alwa; por neech ka pidhan kal an Ajtiklb xowa in lujyal kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal.
Ka koy teye tajat i kwenta kal jaj, pos jaj yab tajat in l kin chuu ki tila an tsubaxtalb.
Tam ti jidhtal in kwajay ku loo tub tin tamt an awiltalbtsik, ni jun xita yab tin tolmiy; ejtaltsik tin jiloloy kwetm. Nan u konyal abal ka pakwlantsattsik kal na Dios abal anchan tin tajatsik.

Por an Ajtiklb kwajay kal nan ani tin pidha ti chplb abal ku ejto ku okoy ku tila an alwa tilab ani kin achatsik jeye ejtal xi yabtsik u judo. Anchan tin loo an Ajtiklb abal yab xata kin tajtsin kal an atax, maske in kwajay jelti max kunatich tajat bin wi an padhum.
Ani neech jeye ti kin loo kal ejtal xowa yab alwa ani neech ti kin belkm abal kin kwajay neye walki xon ti neech ti takix. Ke an labidh tokattalb kin koy Jajki malill i kij! Anchan ka tajan.
Ti kin chapndhantsi an ta Priska ani na Akila. Ti kin chapndhantsi jeye ejtal xu kwajltsik bin kim na Onesforo.
Na Erasto jilkon ban bitsow xi Korinto ani na Trfimo u jila u yaul ban bitsow xi Mileto.
Ka taja abal ki tsch tam yabl chamay. Ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb na Ewbulo, na Pudente, na Lino, na Klawdia ani ejtal an kidhblbtsik.
Ke an Ajtiklb Jesukristo ka kwajay kal tat ani ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, tin tojnlil na Dios ani tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo, abal ku tolmiy ka belmchtsik xi takudh kal na Dios ani kin exlatsik an tsubaxtalb xi neech ka tolmiyattsik kl abal ka kwajchtsik xan tin l na Dios.

Tam kin belaichtsik ani kin exlaichtsik jech an tsubaxtalb, neech ka tajantsik kl abal kin koy an aytsixtalb kal tin kwenta an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Na Dios xi yab jayki u kambix, in ulmal abal neech ti ku pidha jech an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal asta tam ti yabl tujenek jech an kayl;
ani tam tin bajch an kij, in pidhna ka chobn nin kwintal kal tin kwenta an tiltsixtalb xi na Dios ni Loxil tin punkuntsi kal Jaj tin abaxtal.

Tito, tu dhutsuntsal jech an ti w, xi nan tu chutal jelti jun u chakmil abal chablam tu b jaich i bell. U l ka bachwal an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo ni Loxil.
Tam tu jila ban chabl xi Kreta, tu jila abal ka lejkiy xowa bl u kibel ka lejkiyat ani abal ka bijiy i takix belomtsik xi neech ti belkol belomtsik bin bitswiltsik, anchan jelt xan tu punkuntsmal.

Jun i takix belomtsik yab yejat kin koy ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyan, yejat ka kwajay tomkidh ani in tsubtalki kal jnki i mmlb, yejat kin koy in chakmiltsik u belom ani ke nin chakmiltsik yab ka exlomn kal tin kwenta xowa kibenek in tajltsik ani abal u tomnaxtsik.

Pos xi kwajattsik ti oklek belomtsik, xi kwajattsik in belkmtsal xowa in dhabal na Dios, yab yejat kin koy ni jun xata xantokl ti ka kwiyan, yab yejat kin tekatsik tinb, nibal u chakulom. Yab jun i uchl inik, yab jun i kunux inik, nibal xin lenl i tumn xi yab tadh alwa.

Jun i oklek belomtsik yejat kin bachwal alwa an toneltsik xu ulel tin kim, kin kulbetnl kin taja xowa alwa, kin jna jun i xechintalb chaatki, kin tajl xowaki xi lujat, ka kwajay juniniki abal a Dios ani yab u tnal kal xowa yab alwa.

Yejat kin kokm tin itsch nin kwintal na Dios in lujtalki jelt xan ti oktsixnadh, abal kin ejto jeye kin tawna an kidhblbtsik kal an alwa oktsixtalb ani anchan, kin taja jeye abal kin bela an tsubaxtalb xu tomnaxtsik.
Bl tajat waach xu tomnaxtsik, xin tilltsik xowa yab xata in jalbl ani yab tsubax ani ms, xin ulaltsik ke yejat ka tajtsin an ti exl bin tul an iniktsik.

Xi jachantsik, yejat ki chamkatsik an ti tilom, pos in ojtsal tin chalab an atiklbtsik xontiki ka oktsixin abal in oktsixnltsik xowa yab yejat kin oktsixna. In tajltsik anchan abal kin ta i tumn maske yab tadh alwa.
Jn ti b xi jajtsik in tiltsxil, in ulu ench: “An atiklbtsik xi Kreta echeki u kambixtsik, in junwal jelti an padhumtsik, kutma ani be.”
Jech xowa ulwat kal jajtsik tin kwenta, tsubax tajat. Jaxtm ti yejat tajat ka kwiyatsik chapik abal ka belmchtsik in lujtalki
ani yabich kin tajatsik ti kij in ani tilbiltsik in wejlbil an judotsik, nibal xanty in takixnl ka tajan xin kuxuknltsik an tsubaxtalb.

Xitatsik in kool in chalab tokat, ejtal xowa kwajat ba jajtsik, tokat; por abal xi yabtsik u belom nibal nin chalab yab tokat, yab waach xata tokat ba jajtsik; pos asta nin chalab ani nin chalpaxtal choodhich kal xi yab alwa.
In ulaltsik abal in exll a Dios, por kal xowa in tajltsik u xalkanal ke yab ani; pos ataxtsik tajat ani u tomnax. Yabtsik in ejtowal kin taja ni jun xata alwa.
Por tat Tito, kool ki oktsixin jelt xan tin ulalki an alwa oktsixtalb.
Ke an yejcheltsik kin jna jun i xechintalb chaatki, kaknantltsik, kin chobna xowa in tajl, ka belmchtsik in tsubtalki, ka kanidhaxintsik ani kin kuxyaltsik xowakichki.
Anl jeye, an slbtsik ka kwajay xan ti yejat ka kwajay xin bellich na Dios, yab kin janwaltsik i kw, yab ka uchlmtsik. Yejat kin oktsixnatsik ka tajan xowa alwa,
kin oktsi an tsidhan mmlbtsik kin kanidha nin tomkl ani nin chakmiltsik.

Kin oktsi jeye abal kin chobnatsik xowa in tajl, ke yab ka junkun kal i keet iniktsik, kin beletnatsik alwa nin kim, ka kaknaxintsik, kin exbantsi xowa in ulal nin tomkl abal anchan, yab ka odhbijyat nin kwintal na Dios kal ni jun xita.
Ka takiy an kwitltsik abal kin chalpaytsik alwa xan ti ka kwajay,
ka taja tat tajat xowakich xi alwa abal kin chuutsik ani kin tajatsik jeye. Tam ka oktsitsik, ka taja kal yantam i tsubaxtalb,
ki kwin alwa abal yab ka wachin ni jun xata xantokl ti ki kawyat. Anchan neech tm ka tidheb xita xin lenl ti ki tomna ani yab neech kin ela ni jun xata yab alwa abal ti ki tila kal jech tin kwenta.
Ka takiy an jolibtsik abal kin exbantsitsik ejtal xowa u usnal kal nin ajtiktsik; kin taja ejtal xowa u usnal ani yab ti tokokltsik.
Yab kin kwey nin ajtik, ka kwajaytsik alwa ani lujat kal ejtalki xowa, abal anchan, ka chutattsik kal xi ms ani ka exl jeye ke an oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta na Dios ni Loxil, labidh tajat.
Pos na Dios tu xalkantsmich an tin alwatal, abal kal jaich, kin ejto ka loey ejtalki an atiklbtsik.

Jachan nin alwatal na Dios tu oktsal abal ki jilaich ki taja xowa yab alwa, ki jilaich an chalabtsik xi yab alwa ani ki jnaich ba jech an kayl jun i alwa xechintalb, in lujtalki ani tokot xan tin l na Dios.
Tu oktsal jeye abal ku kwajay i aytsm kin bajaw jachan an kij xi kijidh xowki neech ka tsch jun kal ejtal nin labidh tokt ni pulek Diosil ani Loxil Jesukristo,
xin pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal wawki ti kwenta abal ti ku loo kal ejtal xowa yab alwa ani ti ku dhabalnaich, abal ku kwajch i l tajat ki tajl echeki xowa alwa.
Jech jaich ka tila, jaich ka ulu ka tajan ani ki tawnaxin kal yantam i awiltalb. Yab ka walka ki pojk kal ni jun xita.
Ka witskontsaltsik abal yejat kin exbantsi xowa in ulal an pakdha awiltalb ani xi keet jeye an awiltalbtsik, yab kin chikat tajatsik ani ka kwajaytsik echeki in lenl kin taja xowa alwa.
Ke yabtsik kin jantsal ti kw ni jun xita, yab ka pjexintsik, ka kaknaxintsik, kin koytsik i chaattalb kal ejtalki an atiklbtsik.

Pos waw, anl weyewiik yab u chalpadh ani yabwiik i tajl ti kij na Dios; kibchonkwiik tu xeech ani u kybwiik taknl kal ejtal xowa in kulbetnl ni tul ani kal xowakich i lelomtalb. I atax tajtsalwiik xitakichki ani i atl xitakich kal tin kwentaki xowa i chutal in kool; u pojkantlwiik tajat ani u pjkx jeye jn ani jn.
Por tam ti na Dios ni Loxil in xalka nin alwatal ani nin kanidhaxtal abal an atiklbtsik,

tu loo, yab abal i tajmal jun xata lujat; in taja anchan, abal tu kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb. Na Dios tu loo tam tu pakwlantsi an ti walastalbil jelti max tu tajtsi jun i tokedhaxtalb ani tu pidha jun i t xechintalb kal nin Tokat Ejattal.
Kal tin kwentaki ni Loxil Jesukristo, na Dios tu pidhm yn tajat an ti Tokat Ejattalb,
abal kal nin alwatalki ti ku bachu ani anchan ki bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal xu kwajat i aytsm.
Jech tsubax tajat ani jaich u l tajat ka lna, abal xin bellichtsik na Dios, kin ntsi kin tajatsik xowa alwa. Ejtal jech alwa ani alwa tajat abal ejtalki an atiklbtsik.

Por yab ka taja ti kij i kwlxtalb xi yab xata in jalbl, nibal an kwlxtalb kal tin kwenta an weje pakltsik, nibal an kwlxtalb ani an pjxtalb xi kal tin kwenta nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss. Pos ejtal jech yab xata in jalbl ani yab xata tu ynal.
Max jun xita in tajl i kxtalb ban belomtsik, ka tawna jnl o chbl ani max yab ti ki taja ti kij, yabich ka walka ka junkun kal an belomtsik.
Pos kal jachan, a exlaich abal in kibdhmalich an alwa bl ani u walablomich abal in tajl xowa in chob ke yab alwa.
Tam tu abtsi an ta Artemas o na Tkiko, ka taja abal ki tsch jikat ti kin lna ban bitsow xi Nikpolis, pos u ulmalich abal taja neech ku watna nin chamy.
Ka tolmiy kal ejtal xowa ka ejto na Senas, an oktsix xin will an takixtalb ani na Apolos jeye, abal tam kin ntsitsik an bl, yab xata kin yntsitsik.
Ani ke an kidhblbtsik kin wita jeye kin tajatsik an alwatalb ani ka tolmixintsik max waach i yejetalb abal ka yan jeye nin xechintalbiltsik.
Ejtal xi kwajattsik kal nan ti abtsal ti chapndhomtalb. Ka chapndhatsik ejtal ni jabtsik xi tu kanidhl abal u belomichtsik jeye. Ke nin alwatal na Dios ka bachwal ejtal tattsik. Anchan ka tjan.
Nan, xu bij Pablo, xin kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess, u dhutsl jech an w junax kal an kidhblb Timoteo. I dhutsl jech an w abal tat Filemn, xi tu tolmiymal teye kal jech an tojlb.
Abal an belomtsik jeye xu junkunal ta kim, abal an kidhblb Apia xi kanidhl tajat ani abal an kidhblb Arkipo xi tu tolmiyal jeye kal jech an tojlb.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb ani an kijidhtalb xi tl ba ni Tta Dios ani ba ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
U pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb nu Diosil ani tu kontsintsal teye echeki tam in l.
Pos u achmalich xan ta kanidhl ani xan ta bell ni Ajtik Jess ani xan ti jeye ta kanidhltsik xu dhabalbich kal na Dios.
U kontsal na Dios ke tat xi belom teye jelti waw, ka bajaw ka exla alwa an lbtajaxtalb xi kool abal i bellich na Kristo Jess.
Pos in kwajat kijidh tajat ani in kulbl kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xa kool. Kidhblb, kal tatki ta kwenta, an belomtsik kijidhmenekichtsik ms.
Jaxtm, maske u kool i awiltalb tu utsa xowa ka taja abal tin abatwlejil na Kristo, yab neech ku taja anchan.
Tokot tu pakabdhl kal jun i alwatalb ench: Nan, xu bij Pablo, xin yejchelich ani in kwajat tin wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess,

tu kontsal jun i alwatalb abal na Onsimo, xi tech jeye balidh ban wikaxte junax kal Nan. U tolmintsi abal kin bela jeye na Kristo ani xo in bajmalich ka kwajay jelti jun u chakmil kal tin kwenta an belomtalb.
Ti wel chabki, yab xata ta ejtmal ka yna; por xo, yejat tajat abal tat ani abal nan.
J xo tu abtsal ti t ani tu kontsal ka bachu jelti max nan exom tin bachwal.
U lak max ka jilkon tech kal nan ban wikaxte abal ti kin tolmiy ku lna an alwa tilab jelt xan ti tat tin tolmiymal.
Por yab u lena ku taja xata max tat yab ka chobna okox abal an alwatalb xowa ti kin tajtsi, yab u l ti kin tajtsi kal i chplb, u l ka taja kal tatki tajat a kulbtal.
Pos nan u chalpayal abal jaich ti plmenek w i kij na Onsimo abal tayl ka witsiy ti kwajl echekijich kal tat.
Yabich jelti jun i jolib, ka koy jelti jun i kidhblb xa kanidhl tajat. Nan u kanidhl tajat, por tat yejat ms ka kanidha, yab jelti jun i ani inikki, ka kanidha jelti jun i kidhblb.
Anchan p, max tin exll abal tu jab, ka bachu jelti max nan tin bachwal.
Max ti waltsmal kal jun xata, o max ti jntsal jun xata, nan neech kin lejkin kal tat.

Nan, xu bij Pablo, u dhutsl jech kal nan tajat u kubak, nan neech kin lejkin kal tat; maske neech ku ejto tu chalpantsi ke tat tin jntsal teye, pos nan tu ltsi an tin kwintal na Dios abal ki loey teye.
Kidhblb, ti kin tajtsi jech an ti alwatalb kom waw i bellich an Ajtiklb; ti kin kijidhmdha, kom i bellich an Ajtiklb.
Tu dhutsuntsal abal u chob alwa ke anchan neech ka taja ani u chob abal ms neech ka taja k xowa tu kontsal.
Anl jeye tu kontsal abal ti kin tojojontsi jun i alt xon ti neech kin koych; pos u chob alwa ke na Dios neech kin tkoy an kontsintsixtalb xa tajltsik ani neech ti kin walka kin kale jun tu lnatsik.
I abtsinal ti chapndhomtalb kal na Epafras, xi junax tu kwajat tu wiknl kal tin kwentaki na Kristo Jess.
Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Markos, na Aristarko, na Demas ani na Lukas, xi tin tolmiyaltsik kal nin tojlbil an Ajtiklb.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
Ti wejeich, na Dios in tawnmal ynl ni weje pakliltsik ani keetich keetich xan tin tawnmal kal nin tiltsxiltsik.
Xo, tin okontal jech a kij, tu tawnl kal nin Chakmil. Na Dios in taja an kayltsik kal tin kwenta jech nin Chakmil ani Jaj in jiltsmal xowakich xi waach.

Na Jess jaich nin tajax labidh tokt na Dios ani tu xalkantsalich xan ti jeye na Dios. Jaj, jaich nin teykm ejtal xowa waach kal nin chp nin kwintal. Tam ti okon ti ku wixkintsi an ti walastalbil, buxkan tin ejt nin tokat kwajtalbil na Dios t walki.
Nin Chakmil na Dios in bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb k an tokat abatwletsik; pos Jaj, kom u Chakmlb kal a Dios, in bachmal jun i awiltalb ms plek k an tokat abatwletsik.

Na Dios yab jayki in utsmal ni jun i tokat abatwle xan tin utsa na Kristo ench: Tat tu Chakmil; Nan tu utsmalich xo abal tu Chakmil;  nibal in ulmal jayki ench kal tin kwenta jun i tokat abatwle: Nan neech kin kwajay tin Ttalb abal jaj ani jaj neech ka kwajay ti chakmlb kal Nan.
Por tam ti na Dios in xalka nin okox Chakmil ban kayl, in ulu ench: Ka kakn kal ejtal nu tokat abatwlejiltsik.
Kal tin kwenta an tokat abatwletsik, na Dios in ulu ench: U tajl ke nu tokat abatwlejiltsik, ka wenkon jelti ik ani nu tjontsixiltsik, ka wenkon jelti kamal.
Por kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil, in ulal ench: Dios, Tat neech ta takix malill i kij; ani Tat in lujtalki i takix.
A kanidhmal xi lujat ani a pojkmal xi yab alwa; jaxtm na Dios, na Diosil ti takwymal Tat ani ti pidhmal ta ms ti kijidhtalb k na juniktsik.
In ulal jeye ench: Tat Okxlb, tam ti tujey ejtal, a kwajba nin tujtal an chabl ani kal na kubak ta taja ejtal an walki.
Jechtsik neech ka okon, por Tat neech ki jilkon malill i kij. Ejtal jechtsik, neech ka kejm jelti kudhkum;
neech ka paka ani neech ka jalkuy jelti jun i xeketlb. Por Tat, malill i kij yab i jalkunal ani yab jayki neech ka koy a okontal.
Na Dios, yab jayki in utsmal ni jun i tokat abatwle xan tin utsa na Kristo ench: Ki buxkan tu ejt, asta ke Nan tu tantsi ejtal xi ti atl.
Ejtal an tokat abatwle, i ejattalbkitsik, xi kwajat ti tjontsix ta Dios, abadh abal kin tolmiytsik xi neech kin bachu an loeltalb.
Jaxtm ti yejat tajat ki exbay xowa i achmalich abal yab ki kibdha an bl.

Nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios xi tiladh ti weje kal an tokat abatwletsik, jaich jun i pulek takixtalb. Xi walbintsik ani in chikat taja jech an takixtalb, pidhantsik ti yajtsiktalb xan tin tomnl kin bachu.

Pos jan ti neech ki ejto ki jeka an yajtsiktalb max yab ki beletna jech an pulek loeltalb? Pos Jaj an Okxlb in okox tilmal jech an loeltalb ani tayl, xin achatsik jech an tsubaxtalb, in exbaytsik ani tu watbantsi weye.
Anl jeye, na Dios in lej tsubkmal kal i exltsik, kal i labidhtalbtsik, kal yn i labidh labandhaxtalbtsik ani kal xowa an Tokat Ejattalb tu pidhmal keetich keetich, jelt xan ti Jaj in lena.
Na Dios yab in kwajbmal bin takixtal i tokat abatwletsik jachan an kayl xi neech ka wachin tayl, xi xo in kwajat u till.
Por jun xita in ulu ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: Dios, janty in y an inik abal ki kwajay ta chalpax kal jaj tin kwenta? Janty in y an inik xu chemel, abal a beletnl?
A kwajbmal w i kij ms chaat k an tokat abatwletsik, por a pidha an ti labidh tokattalb, an ti kaknaxtalb ani an ti awiltalb ba ejtal xowa a tajmal.

Ejtal a kwajba ba jaj in takixtal.  Jaxtm, tam ti kwajb ejtal abal ka kwajay taknl kal an inik, na Dios yab in jila ni jun xata xi yab neech ka kwajay taknl kal an inik. Por blki i chutal abal kal yab ejtalki tu tajnal ti kij.

Por i chutal na Jess, xi na Dios in kwajba w i kij ms chaat k an tokat abatwletsik. Na Dios, kal nin kanidhaxtal, in walka ka chemech abal ejtaltsik tin alwabl; ani xo, in koolich an labidh tokattalb ani an kaknaxtalb kal tin kwenta an cheml xin tamu.

Ejtal xowa waach, kwajat abal a Dios ani abal Jajki tin kwenta. Na Dios in l ke ejtal nin chakmiltsik, ka kwajay jeye ba nin tokat labidhtalbil. Jaxtm na Dios ti kool kin tojojoy, kal an yajtsiktalb xin bachu na Jesukristo xi jajtsik nin Loxil.
Abal xu tokwbtsik ani xu tokox, jaychki tu dhabalb kal jachan an Ttalb. Jaxtm nin Chakmil na Dios yab u tidhenal kin bijiy tin at kidhbtsik,
tam in ulal ench an Tokat Dhuslab: Neech tu tila ba nu at kidhbtsik ani neech tu ajatnantsi ti ajatlb ban junkuntalb.
In ulal jeye ench: Nan neech ku ntsi ku bela na Dios.  Ani in witskowal kin ulu ench: Tech in kwajat, kal an chakamtsik xi tin pidhmal na Dios.

Xu chakmlbtsik ba jun i kidhtalb, jununl ani nin tul ani nin xichl; anchan jeye na Jess, nin tul ani nin xichl jyki jelti waw abal kin ejto ka chemech ani anchan, kin kibdha jachan xin kool an awiltalb ti chemdhax, xi jaich an lej atax.
Anchan tin loo xu kybtsik jelti jolib kal an lej atax abal in jiknltsik an cheml.
Pos tsubax, Jaj yab tsinek abal kin tolmiy i tokat abatwletsik, tsinek abal kin tolmiy nin kidhtaltsik na Abraham.

Ani abal kin taja jachan, yejat kin junu jelti nin kidhbtsik abal kin bajaw ka kwajay jelti jun i lujat ani i yajnantsix oklek pletsik tin tamt na Dios ani abal kin wkontsi ti walastalb an atiklbtsik, kal tin kwentaki an cheml xin tamu.
Ani anchan jelt xan ti Jaj in acha i yajtsiktalb ani taktamiyat, xo in kool i awiltalb abal kin tolmiy ejtal xu taktamiybtsik jeye.
Kidhblbtsik xi tokodhich, kom tattsik jaich xi kanidhich kal na Dios abal ki dhabalnjich kal Jaj, ka exla alwa na Kristo Jess, an abatwle ani an lej oklek ple kal ni belomtalbil.
Pos na Jess yab jayki in chikat tajmal na Dios, xi kl ti bijidh abal kin taja jech an tojlb, jelt xan ti na Moiss kwajay jeye ti tjontsix in lujtalki ba putl nin kim na Dios.
Na Jess yejat ms ka kakn k na Moiss, jelt xan ti jun i kbal at in bachwal ms i kaknaxtalb k an at xin kubl.
Ejtal an attsik yejat ka kwajay kubadh kal jun xita; por na Dios jaich nin tajmal ejtal xowa waach.
Anchan p, na Moiss kwajay ti tjontsix in lujtalki ba putl nin kim na Dios; nin tojlbil, jaich kin tila ejtal xowa na Dios neech kin ulu ms tayl.

Por na Kristo, kwajat lujat jelti an chakmlb ba jachan nin kim na Dios. Jech nin kim na Dios, jaich wawich, xu kwajat jelti jachan an at, max ki ntsch ku kwajay in lujtalki ani ki bela asta tin okontal ani u kulbl kal tin kwenta an aytsixtalb xi kool.
Jaxtm, xan tin ulal ench an Tokat Ejattalb ban Tokat Dhuslab: Max ka achatsik xo ti tawnl na Dios,
yab ka chapikmdhatsik na ejattal jelt xan tin tajmaltsik xi tomnaxnk ani in taktamiymal na Dios ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Taja, tin taktamiytsik na weje pakliltsik, maske tin nakl chab inik i tamub in chuu xowakich xi Nan u taja.
Jaxtm tin chakuy kal jachan an atiklbtsik ani u ulu ench: “Echeki xeechtsik kibchonk nin ejattal ani yab in lenmal ti kin exlantsi an tu blil.”
Jaxtm tin chakuy kal jajtsik ani u lej utsatsik tsubax, ke yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych kal Nan.
Kidhblbtsik, ka koy tajat i kwenta abal ni jun xita xi tattsik, yab kin koy in ejattal yab alwa ani yab u belom xi ka plmdh kl ba na Dios xi ejat.

Ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka tamu anchan, ki twnxintsik jn ani jn tsudhey ka tsudhey, lejat u kwajat jech an kij, abal ni jun xita xi tattsik, yab ka kambiyat kal an walastalb ani ka pojkaxm nin ejattal.
Pos max ki ntsi ku kwajay junini ni chalab asta tin okontal, kal an belomtalb xi kym asta tin tujtal, neech tm ki koy weye xowa in kool na Kristo.
Ench tu ulwb: Max ka achatsik xo ti tawnl na Dios, yab ka chapikmdhatsik na ejattal jelt xan tin tajmaltsik xi tomnaxin.
Jita p xin axtsitsik tin kwintal na Dios ani tayl tomnaxintsik? Jaich jachan ejtal xi kldhtsik kal na Moiss ban chabl xi Ejipto.
Ani kal jita kl ti kwajay na Dios u chakl chab inik i tamub? Jaich kal xin walatsik; xi chemechtsik ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh.
Ani jita na Dios in lej utsa tsubax ke yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych junax kal Jaj? Jaich xi yabtsik tajxin ti kij.
Pos i chutal ke yabtsik in ejto ka ochich abal ka koych kal na Dios kom yabtsik belmch.
Jaxtm, lejat xo bl i kool xowa in ulmal na Dios abal ku ochich tu koyol kal Jaj, yejat ki koy i kwenta abal yab telab t yab kin ejto ka ochich taltsik xi tattsik a kidhtal.
Pos waw, u tiltsidhich weye an ti tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta an loeltalb jelti jajtsik; por jajtsik yab xata tin yna tam tin acha jachan an tsubaxtalb, abal in achatsik ani yab in bela.

Por waw xi belmalich, jaich xi exomich tu ochel ba jachan an koyxnich. Por kal tin kwenta xi yabtsik in bela na Dios, in ulmal ench: Jaxtm tin chakuy kal jajtsik ani u lej tsubax utsa, ke yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych kal Nan.  Por na Dios kejle in okymalich nin tojlbil asta tam tin tajmal an kayl;
pos ta kwajat ban Tokat Dhuslab xon tin ulal ench kal tin kwenta in ktsjil an koyxnich: Na Dios koych tin bklb a kts, kal ejtal an tojlb xin taja.
Ani in ulal jun an Tokat Dhuslab ench: Yab neech ka ochichtsik abal ka koych kal Nan.
Por bl u kibel taltsik ka ochich ba jachan an koyxnich; ani xi jidhtal in achmaltsik jech an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwenta an loeltalb, yab ochich abal in chikat tajatsik.

Jaxtm, na Dios tin bijymal jun jun i kij: jaich jechich i kij. Pos na Dios tu tawnl kal xowa in ulu na Dabid ms taylich, ban Tokat Dhuslab xin ulal ench: Max ka achatsik xo ti tawnl na Dios, yab ka chapikmdhatsik na ejattal.
Max pidhnkak an israelitatsik jachan an ti koyxnich kal na Josu, na Dios yabichak in witskmal kin bijiy keet i kij.
Anchan p, bl waach jun i tokat koyxnich abal xin bellichtsik na Dios;
pos xu ochelich ti koyol kal na Dios, u koyolich kal nin tojlbil jelt xan ti na Dios ti koych kal nin tojlbil.
Yejat p ki taja an chplb ku ochich ba jachan an koyxnich, pos yab telab t kin wwna jun xita xowa in tajmal xi yabtsik belmch.

Pos nin kwintal na Dios ejat ani in kool i awiltalb. Ms ja chupidh k jun i macht xi tamatki ti wiidh; u ochel asta ms alkidh ba ni itsch ani ba ni ejattal. Tu exlantsal xowa i chalpayal ani xowa i lenl ki taja ti itsch.
Yab waach ni jun xata xowa xi tajadh kal a Dios, xi neech ka ejtowat ka chinkontsat kl; ejtal kwajat tejwa ani in tell jachan xi neech ti ku ljundha tayl.
Na Jess, nin Chakmil na Dios, jaich ni lej oklek pleil xi ochenekich tin tamt na Dios. Jaxtm ti yejat ki ntsi ku kwajay juniniki kal ni belomtal.
Pos ni lej oklek pleil, in ejtowal ti ku kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb kal tin kwenta abal waw yab u lej likat, pos Jaj jeye tajat, in achmal xowakich i taktamixtalb jelti waw, por yab Ja walbin.
Jaxtm, ki kontsch p kal yantam i belomtalb ni Diosil xu kanidhax tajat abal ti ku kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb ani ti ku tolmiy kal nin alwatal, xowakichki i kij ti ki yntsi.
Jun i lej oklek ple, u takwyb ban iniktsik ani u bijyb abal ka kwajay ti oklek atiklbtsik tin tamt na Dios ani abal kin pidhna an pikbantsixtalb kal tin kwenta an walastalbtsik.
Kom an lej oklek ple u tb jeye kal an taktamixtalb, in kyal i chaattalb kal xi yabtsik lej chalpadh ani kal xi kibchonktsik ti xeech;
ani kal tin kwenta abal jaj u walbinal jeye, kool kin pidhna i pikbantsixtalb kal tin kwenta nin walastalbil ani kal tin kwenta nin walastalbil an atiklbtsik.
Ni jun xita yab neech kin ejto kin bijiy tinb ti lej oklek ple; tokot kal a Dios ti neech ka ejtowat ka takwyat ani ka pidhan jech an ti punkuntsixtalb jelt xan ti tmun kal na Arn.

Anchan jeye u tmnal kal na Kristo; yab Jajki tin kwetm chalab tin bijymal tinb ti lej oklek ple, kal a Dios ti pidhan jachan an ti punkuntsixtalb, jelt xan ti usnk ench: Tat tu Chakmil ani Nan tu pidhmal xo ti xechintalb.
Jelt xan tin utsmal jeye tyki ban Tokat Dhuslab ench: Tat i ple malill i kij, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.

Tam ti na Kristo kwajay tech ti kayl, in tajtsi ti konoxtalb ani ti pakabdhaxtalb na Dios, kal kawidh i kwintalb ani kal yantam in jaml in wal. Jech xita in tajtsi an ti konoxtalb ani an ti pakabdhaxtalb, jaich xin kool i awiltalb abal ka lowat kal an cheml xi kwajatich neech kin tamu. Axtsin an tin kwintal kal na Dios, kom Jaj tokot in tajl xowa in l na Dios.
Ani anchan, maske Jaj u Chakmlb kal a Dios, in wita kin taja xowa utsan kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki an yajtsiktalb xin watna.
Ani kom anchan ti tajadh lujat tajat, in bajaw ka kwajay ultalb kal an loeltalb xi malill i kij abal kal ejtalki xita kl ti ka exbantsat xowa Jaj in ulal.
Pos bijyat kal na Dios ti lej oklek ple anlki jelti na Melkisedek.
U kool tajat yn xata ku tila kal jech tin kwenta, por tojlb tajat ku wila abal kaymtsik tajat ta exbayal.

Kal tin naklki an kij xi watenekich, in tomnlichak max i oktsixichtsik; por bl a yntsaltsik ki wiltsin ti t xowa yab lej tojlb nin kwintal na Dios. A junwaltsik bl jelti tele xi tokot in uchltsik i leche, tam yejatich ka kaputsik i kapnl xi yab tumax.
Ani xi tokot in uchltsik i leche, in junwal jelti tele, pos yabl in bajmaltsik kin exbay xanty in y an lujat xechintalb.
Por an kapnl xi yab tumax, jaich abal xi pakdhaichtsik. Anchan jeye in junwal xin witlichtsik kin chuu xowa alwa ani xowa yab alwa abal in witlichtsik kin exbay.

Anchan p, ki ntsi ki taja an chplb abal ki lujku tib, ki jilaich an jidhtal oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta na Kristo. Yabich ki till an jidhtal oktsixtalb, jelti tam i ntsal ki tila abal ki jilaich tu walablom xi neech ti ku jna ban kibeltalb ani kal an belomtalb tin kwenta na Dios.

Anl jeye, jelti an oktsixtalb kal tin kwenta an pujaxtalb, an kwajbantsixtalb an ti kubaklek bin k an belomtsik, kal tin kwenta tam ka ejech ti t an chemlomtsik ani kal tin kwenta an ljundhaxtalb xi neech ka tsch tayl.
Pos neech ki ntsi ki taja an chplb ki lujku tib, max na Dios anchan tin l.
Waach xin bachmalichtsik an tajaxtalb jun i kij ani in exllich xowa na Dios in pidhnl. In bachmalich jeye an Tokat Ejattalb,
in exlmalich nin alwa tsubaxtalbil na Dios ani nin awiltal an kayl xi neech ka tsch tayl.

Max ka kuxkulchtsik, yabich neech ka ejtowat ka tajan jun kin jila ti walablom; pos max kin taja anchan, u kalelich tm jelti max jajtsik tajat exom in pajkiyal ti t ban peltsidh te nin Chakmil na Dios ani in labdhnl tin tamt an atiklbtsik.
In junwalich tm jelti an chabl xin dhikedhl an ja echeki tam u ulel an b: max jachan an chabl in labedhantsal an ti tayablb xu tojnaltsik taja, lbtajadh ti kwajat kal na Dios;
por max tokot in labedhl i kdh o i ani chojltsik, yab xata ti alwa; yabich neech ka lbtajan kal na Dios ani tayl neech ka tsikan.
Kidhblbtsik, por maske nan anchan in kw, u chob alwa ke tattsik a tajl xowa alwa kom i loodhichtsik.
Pos na Dios, lujat Ja tajat ani yab neech kin uktsi xanty a tajmaltsik kal tin kwenta an kanidhaxtalb xa xalkantsitsik na Dios tam ta tolmiy an belomtsik, jaich xi xo bl i kwajat a tajltsik.
Por nan u l ku chuu ke ejtal tattsik, ka ntsi ka taja anchan kal yantam i ikaxtalb asta tin okontal abal ka tjan kidhat xowa i kwajat a aytsmtsik.
Yab u l ku chuu ki bemtsik, ms alwa ka ntsi ka wwnantsi tin oktsixtal xi kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal ani nin chaattalbil, exom in bachwaltsik an jiltsixtalb xi usnktsik neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.

Tam ti na Abraham utsan kal na Dios abal neech ka pidhan jun i jiltsixtalb, na Dios in lej tsubax ulu kal Jaj tinb kom yab waach ni jun xita ms plek k Jaj xi neech kin ejto kin ynantsi tin bij abal kin lej tsubax ulu kl.
Ench tin ulu: “Tsubax ti neech tajat tu lbtaja ani neech tu pidha yn ta kidhtaltsik.”
Na Abraham in aytsi kal i kaymtalb ani anchan tin bachu xowa usnk neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
Tam kin lej tsubax ulu jun xata an iniktsik, in lej tsubax ulal kal in bij jun xita xi ms plek k jaj ani tam kin lej tsubax ulu jun xata kal jun i lej tsubkaxtalb, yabich ms yejat xata kin kwlxna.

Jaxtm na Dios tin tsubka kal i lej tsubax uluxtalb xowa in ulal ke neech kin pidhna. In taja anchan abal in lena kin xalkantsi tajax tajat xi neechtsik kin bachu xowa Jaj in ulmal ke neech kin pidhna. Ani ke Jaj, yab neech ka kuxkulch ani yab neech kin jalkuy ni jun xata xowa in ulmal.

Anchan p, waach chb xata xi yab neech ka ejtowat ka jalkuyat, xon ti na Dios yab neech kin ejto ka kambixin; ani kal jachantsik, na Dios tu pidhl jun i lujat kijidhmdhaxtalb, waw xi ayal nin beletnaxtal ani i belmalich an aytsixtalb xi Jaj tu pidhmal.

Jech an aytsixtalb, tu kontsal in lujtalki ani in tsubtalki an ti ejattal, jelti an patltsik xu paltsinal an tan abal ka kyat kubat juniniki. Jech an aytsixtalb xi kool, xi jaich jelti an patl kubdhaxtalb, kwajat wikadh alwa tin kx in dhabl an Lej Tokat Alt xi kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios t walki,
xon ti ochich na Jess kal waw ti kwenta abal ti ku japtsi an ti bl. Anchan, na Jess in bajmalich ka kwajay malill i kij ti lej oklek ple, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.

Jech na Melkisedek, kwajinek ti takix ban bitsow xi Salem ani ti ple abal na Dios xi plek tajat. Tam ti na Abraham witsch an ti pjx xon tin ta an pakdha takix, kale ti bachwb kal na Melkisedek ani lbtajan.

Pidhan w na Melkisedek xowa na Abraham in ta ban pjxtalb. An bijlb Melkisedek, in l kin ulu okox “lujat pulek takix”; ani kom u pulek takix Salem, xin l kin ulu “kijidhtalb”, in ulalich tm, “kijidh pulek takix.”

Yab u xalkanal max ttalidh ani max nnalidh, nibal u xalkanal max in kool in weje pakliltsik. Yab u tilnal xowki tu chakam nibal xowki ti chemech. Anchan, u xalkanalich jelti max u Chakmlb kal na Dios, jun i ple, xi kwajat malill i kij.
Pos alwaich, ka exlantsitsik xo tin publ na Melkisedek, pos ni weje paklil Abraham in pidha w xowa in kntsmal an pakdha takix ban pjxtalb.

Nin takixtal na Dios xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss in ulal ench: an pletsik xu kidhtalb kal na Leb in kool i awiltalb kin kontsi an atiklbtsik wetsik ejtal xowakich, maske in jab, pos u kidhtalbtsik jeye kal na Abraham jelti jajtsik.

Por na Melkisedek, maske yab u kidhtalb kal na Leb, in bachkuntsi xi w na Abraham. Jech na Abraham, jaich xi usnk ke neech ka pidhan jun xata kal na Dios. Anchan ti lbtajan na Abraham kal na Melkisedek;
ani yab xita neech kin ejto kin ulu ke xu lbtajax, ms ja chipl k xu lbtajnal.
Wawki tech, xin bachwaltsik xi jech wetsik, jaich i iniktsik xu chemel; por kal tin kwenta na Melkisedek, an Tokat Dhuslab in till jelti jun xita xi bl ta kwajat ejat.
Ani neech ki ejto ki ulu ke na Leb ani ejtal an pletsik xu kidhtalb kal jaj, xi xo in bachwaltsik jech wetsik, in pidhmaltsik jeye wetsik na Melkisedek tmki jachan tam ti na Abraham in pidhna;
abal tam ti tm, bl taja ti kitmtetsik bin tul na Abraham tam ti na Abraham kale ti bachwb kal na Melkisedek.

An atiklbtsik xi Israel, in bachu an takixtalb tin kubak an lebitatsik xu ple, xu kidhtalbtsik kal na Arn. Por xo, max jechtsik tsubax lejtal tin tajmaltsik ka lujkun xin wwnltsik jech an takixtalb, tm, yabichakwiik yntsidh ka wachin t i ple xi jyki na Arn, tokot xi jyki na Melkisedek.
Pos tam ka jalkuyat an pletsik, yejat jeye ka jalkuyat an takixtalb;
ani ni Ajtik, xin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench kal Jaj tin kwenta: keet jeye i kidhtalb xi tl tyki ba na Israel, xon ti yab jayki kalnek ni jun i ple.
Abal chobte alwa, ke ni Ajtik tl bin kidhtal na Jud; ani na Moiss, yab in tila ni jun xata kal tin kwenta jech an kidhtalb tam tin tila an pletsik.
Ani jech, ms tejwaich tajat tam ti an t ple xi xalkan, in junwal jelti na Melkisedek.
Yab in bajmal ti ple abalki an takixtalb in ulmal ke yejat ka tsch ba jun i kidhtalb, in bajmal ti ple, kal tin chp jun i xechintalb xi yab neech ka ejtowat ka kibdh.
Pos jech, jaich xowa in ulal na Dios kal Jaj tin kwenta: Tat jaich jun i ple xi neech ki kwajay malill i kij, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.
Jaxtm, an jidhtal takixtalb wkoyat abal yab tajat likat ani yab xata ti alwa;
pos an takixtalb xin jila dhutsadh na Moiss yab xata in lujku. Ani xo, tin kuxl, i kool jun i aytsixtalb ms alwa, xi kl tu utelich weye ba na Dios.
Na Dios, jaich in taja jech kal jun i lej tsubax uluxtalb.

Xi keet an pletsik, yab bijidh kal ni jun i lej tsubax uluxtalb, por kal tin kwenta jech an ple, bijyat kal jun i lej tsubax uluxtalb; pos ban Tokat Dhuslab u usnal ench: An Okxlb in lej tsubax ulmal ani yab neech kin jalkuy: “Tat jaich jun i ple xi neech ki kwajay malill i kij, anlki jelti na Melkisedek.”
Jaxtm, na Jess jaich nin lej tsubkl jun i lejkintalb ms alwa k xi okox.
Xi keet an pletsik, yaneytsik tajat; kom u chemeltsik, jaxtm ti yab in ejtowal kin ntsi.
Por kom na Jess yab Ja u chemel, yab in watbantsal keet an ti pletalb.
Jaxtm tin ejtowal kin loch abal malill i kij, xu utelichtsik ba na Dios kal Jajki tin kwenta. Pos Jaj, kwajat ejat malill i kij abal kin pakabdhl na Dios kal tin kwenta xu utelichtsik kal Jaj.
Anchan p, na Jess jaich an lej oklek ple xi kejle i yntsal tu kwajat. Jaj tokat Ja tajat, yab in kool ni jun xata xowa yab alwa nibal walbidh, wkodh ban walablomtsik ani kadhbats ms tekat k an walki.

Yab in junwal jelti xi keet an oklek pletsik, xi kool kin chemdha i konltsik ani kin pikba tsudhey ka tsudhey, okox kal tin kwenta jaj nin walabtsik ani tayl, kal tin kwenta nin walab an atiklbtsik. Na Jess yab Ja anchan tin taja, tam tin pidhna tinb abal ka chemdh, in kwajbaich an pikbantsixtalb jnlki tokot abal ejtalichkitsik.

An takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss, in bijyal ti oklek pletsik i iniktsik xi yabtsik lujat; por nin lej tsubax uluxtalbil na Dios, xi ulich ms tayl k jech an takixtalb, in bijiy ti lej oklek ple nin Chakmil, xi tajadh lujat abal malill i kij.
Xowa xi ms uluts xi xo in kwajat u till, jaich abal ni lej oklek pleil anchan Ja ani buxkank bin ejt nin tokat kwajtalbil na Dios t walki.
Kwajat ti lej oklek ple bin lej tokat altjil na Dios, xi tajadh kal an Okxlb ani yab kal i iniktsik.
Ejtal an oklek pletsik u bijyb abal kin kwajba i chejwalixtalb ani i pikbantsixtalb; jaxtm na Jesukristo, yejat jeye kin koy xata xowa kin pikba.
Max Jaj techak kwajat chabl, nibalak ela u ple; abal tech, bl waach i pletsik xin pidhnl i pikbantsixtalb jelt xan tin ulal an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss.

Por jech an pletsik, kwajat ti tjontsix kal xowa xi jelt in chilbil ani in chalm xowa waach t walki. I chob abal i chilabki, pos tam ti na Moiss nechich kin tajtsi tin tokat altjil na Dios, utsan ench kal na Dios: “Ka chuu alwa ani ka taja anchan jelt xan tu ltsi t ban chn.”
Por ni lej oklek pleil in bajmal ka kwajay ti kontsintsix ba jun i tjontsixtalb xi ms alwa, pos Jaj kwajat ti kawintsix ba jun i lejkintalb xi ms alwa, xi kldhats ban chalabtsik xi ms alwa.
Abal max an jidhtal lejkintalb yabichak xata in kibdhl, yabichak yntsidh t i lejkintalb.

Por na Dios in chuu abal yab kwajat alwa jachan an atiklbtsik, jelt xan tin ulu ench ban Tokat Dhuslab kal jajtsik tin kwenta: Neech kin bajaw i kijtsik xowki neech ku taja t i lejkintalb kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel ani xi Jud.

Yab jelti an lejkintalb xu tajmal kal nin weje pakliltsik tam tu lotoknatsik abal ku kldha ban chabl xi Ejipto; pos in chikat tajatsik jachan an lejkintalb ani jaxtm tu walbatsik, ench tin ulu an Okxlb.

An lejkintalb xi neech ku taja kal an atiklbtsik xi Israel tam ka watch jachan an kijtsik, ench ti neech ka tjan, in ulu an Okxlb: Neech ku kwajba nu takixtal ba jajtsik nin chalab ani neech ku dhutsa bin itsch. Nanich tm tin Diosiltsik, ani jajtsik jachich tm nu bitswil.
Ni jun xita yab yejat kin oktsi xata xi keet; nibal nin junik, nibal nin kidhb abal kin exla an Okxlb, pos ejtal neech ti kin exlatsik, asta xi ms chipl ani asta xi ms plek xi jajtsik.
