Neech ku pakwlantsi xowa yab alwa in tajmaltsik ani yab jayki neech kin witsiy ku chalpay nin walastalbiltsik.
Tam na Dios in till jun i t lejkintalb, jaich abal in ulalich ke kejmch xi jidhtal an lejkintalb. Ani xi ka kejmch ani yabich xata ti alwa, kunatich i kij neech ka wixk.
Pos alwaich, an jidhtal lejkintalb in kymal an takixtalb xan ti yejat ka tajan an kaknaxtalb ba jun in tokat altjil na Dios xi tech ti kayl.

Nin tokat altjil na Dios ench ti kwajat tajadh: ban ultalb alt xu bijyb ti Tokat Alt, taja ti kwajat in kb an bla ani an mesa kal an tokat pan. Ba jachan nin tokat altjil na Dios, utat tin tamt in chabtal an dhabuxtalb, ta jeye ti kwajat xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb xi tajadh kal i mapal oro abal ka tsikan taja an ikob. Tin kx jachan an dhabuxtalb, taja ti kwajat na jn an alt xu bijyb ti Lej Tokat Alt. Taja, ta ti kwajat jun i kajn bolidh putlki kal i mapal oro xon tu tapb an lejkintalb. Alkidh ba jachan an kajn, ta ti kwajat jun i mul xi tajadh kal i oro baltsidh ti man ani ta jeye ti kwajat nin kwayab na Arn xi pudhnk ani an tujubtsik xon ti dhutsadh an tilabtsik kal tin kwenta an lejkintalb.

Tin b jachan an kajn, ta ti kwajat chb in chilbil i tokat abatwletsik xi sutsutslidh xu belkol, xin l kin ulu ke taja ti kwajat na Dios. Jech an abatwletsik, in dhabyal kal nin sutsts xon tu wadhyb kal an xich abal ka pakwlantsat an walastalbtsik. Por xo, yab ms neech ku ejto ku ntsi ku tila ejtal jech.
Tam tojojodhich anchan ejtal jech, an pletsik u ochel tyidh bin jidhtal altjil nin tokat altjil na Dios abal kin tajatsik an kaknaxtalb.
Por bin chabtal an alt, tokot u ochel an lej oklek ple jnl ti tamub; ani tam u ochel, kool kin jna in xichl i konltsik abal kin pikba kal tin kwenta nin walastalbil ani nin walastalbil an atiklbtsik.
Kal jech, an Tokat Ejattalb tu pidhl ki exbay, ke lejat nin jidhtal altjil nin tokat altjil na Dios u ynal abal ka tajan an kaknaxtalb, an bl abal ban Lej Tokat Alt, yabl japidh.
Ejtal jech jaich jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an kij xi xo; pos an chejwalixtalb ani an pikbantsixtalb xi taja u pidhnal na Dios, yab u ejtowb ka lujkuntsat kl tin chalab xu ocheltsik ti kaknax anchan.

Pos ejtal jech, jaich i takixtalbtsik xi techki ti kayl, ke jaich tokot i kapnltsik, i uxnltsik ani xowakitsik in ujnmal in tajl abal ka tokeytsik. Jech, jaich tokot xi neech ka yan asta tam na Dios kin jalkch ejtal.

Por tsinekich na Kristo ani xo, Jajich nu lej oklek ple kal ejtal xowa alwa xi tsinek. Nin tokat altjil na Dios xon ti na Kristo kwajat ti ple, alwa ja tajat, ms ja lujat ani yab tajnk kal i iniktsik; yab jaich in tokat altjil na Dios xi tech ti kayl.

Na Kristo ochenekich ban Lej Tokat Alt, yabich abal kin pikba in xichl i borrego o i beserro. Ochenek abal kin pikba Jaj tajat nin xichl; anchan ti ochenek jnlki abal ejtalich ani tu bawtsmalich an ti loeltalb xi yab jayki in kool in okontal.
Tsubax kejle ke nin xichl an toro ani an chibo ani nin kwixx an baka xu tal xon tu tajnal an pikbaxtalb, xu wadhybtsik kl xi kwajattsik yab tokat, in kool i awiltalb ka tokedhaxin, por eblidhki.

Por max anchan, awxe yab in kool ms i awiltalb nin xichl na Kristo? Pos kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat malill i kij, na Kristo in pikba tinb abal a Dios jelti jun i pikbaxtalb xi yab choodh ani kal nin xichl, tu wixkintsal an ti chalab xi tu jnl ban cheml abal ki ejto ki tjontsi na Dios xi ejat.

Jaxtm, na Jesukristo jaich ni kawintsxil ban t lejkintalb o jiltsixtalb. Nin chemtal na Kristo, tjan abal ka pakwlantsat an walastalbtsik xi tjnk bin takixtal an jidhtal lejkintalb ani abal xi kanidhtsik kal na Dios kin ejto kin bachu an jiltsixtalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xi Jaj in ulmal ke neech kin pidhna.
Tam waach jun i bijtsixtalb, yejat ka chobn okox max chemnekich xin tajmal jachan an bijtsixtalb abal ka tujch ti ynal jachan an bijtsixtalb.
Pos jachan an bijtsixtalb, yabl in jalbl max bl kwajat ejat xin tajmal; tokot neech kin jalblna, tam chemnekich an tojom.
Jaxtm, wakl jeye i xich tam ti tjan an jidhtal lejkintalb.

Na Moiss in tiltsi ejtal an atiklbtsik ejtal xowa in ulal jachan an takixtalb. Tayl, in tyna an lana xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani jun kwelek i chojl xin bij isopo, in axdha bin xichl an beserro ani an chibo xukudh kal i ja, in wadhiy an dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh an takixtalb ani in wadhiy jeye ejtal an atiklbtsik.
In utsatsik ench: “Jech jaich an xich xin tsubkl an lejkintalb xi na Dios in pidhnmal abal tattsik.”
In wadhiy jeye na Moiss nin tokat altjil na Dios kal an xich ani ejtal xowakich xu ynal abal an kaknaxtalb.
An takixtalb in ulal ke ejtal kool ka tokedh kal i xich ani yab waach i pakwlantsixtalb max yab ka wakl i xich.

Anchan p, yntsink ejtal jech an pikbantsixtalb abal ka tokedh ejtal jachan xowakich xi jaich in chilbil xowa waach walki; por ejtal jachan xowa waach walki, in yntsal ms alwa i pikbantsixtalb k xi jechtsik.

Pos na Kristo yab ochich ba jachan nin tokat altjil na Dios xi tajadh kal an iniktsik, xi jaich tokot jun in chilbil nin lej tokat altjil na Dios. Na Kristo ochich ban walki tajat, xon ti kwajat xo tin tamt na Dios abal ti ku kawintsi.
An lej oklek ple, u ochel ban Lej Tokat Alt jnl ti tamub abal kin pikba i xich xi yab jaj in xichl; por na Kristo yab in pikba tinb ynl.

Pos max anchanak, yejat tmwiik ka chemech ynl asta ti tujenek an kayl. Por xowa u tmnal xo, tam exomich ti kidhel an kijtsik, na Kristo xalkan jnl tokot abal ejtalichki ani in pikba tinb abal kin wkoy an walastalbtsik.
Anchan, jelt xan ti ejtal kool ka chemechtsik jnl ani tayl, tl an ljundhaxtalb,

anchan jeye na Kristo ti pikb jnlki abal kin wkontsi yn xita tin walastalbiltsik. Tayl neech jun ka xalkan tin chabtsl, yabich abal kin wkoy i walastalbtsik, tl abal kin lootsik xi kl ti kwajat aytsmte.

Abal an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss jaich tokot jelti jun in chalm xi xowakich alwa neech ka tsch ani yab jaich xin lejtalich. Jaxtm, jachan an takixtalb yab jayki neech kin lujku xu uteltsik ba na Dios kal tin kwentaki jachan an pikbantsixtalb xu tajnal tamub ti tamub.
Pos max an takixtalb u lujkuxak, jachan an pikbantsixtalb neech ka jilan ti tajnal; pos xin tajltsik, tam ka pakwlantsatich tin walastalbil, yabich neech kin acha ke walbidh u jilkonaltsik.
Por xo, jech an pikbantsixtalbtsik xin tajltsik, u tajnal kin chalpay kl nin walastalbiltsik tamub ti tamub,
pos nin xichl an toro ani an chibo yab jayki neech kin ejto kin wkoy an walastalb.
Jaxtm na Kristo, tam ti ulich tech ti kayl, in utsa ench na Dios: Yabich a l i pikbantsixtalb nibal ki pikbantsat ti konltsik, jaxtm tin tojojontsmal jun u tul.
Yabich a l ki pikbantsat an ti tsikadh konltsik, nibal an pikbantsixtalbtsik xu tajnal abal ka wkoyat an walastalbtsik.
U ulu tm ench: “Dios, jetm in kwajat abal ku taja xowa Tat a le, anchan xan ti kwajat dhutsadh kal Nan tu kwenta ban dhutsadh w.”

Jidhtal, na Kristo in ulu ke na Dios yabich in l nibal in kulbetnl ka chemdhantsat ani ka pikbantsat ti konltsik; nibal i tsikadh konltsik nibal i pikbantsixtalbtsik abal kin wixka i walastalb, maske jech jaich xowa in ulal ka tjan an takixtalb.
Ani tayl in ulal jeye ench: “Dios, jetm in kwajat abal ku taja xowa a l.” Jech jaich in ulal ke na Dios in wkch jachan an weje pikbantsixtalbtsik ani in kwajbaich jech keet an pikbantsixtalb.
Na Dios tu tokmal abal na Jesukristo in taja xowa na Dios in lena tam tin pikba Jaj tajat nin tul jnlki abal echekijich.
Ejtal xu pletsik, u kubl tsudhey ka tsudhey ani in ntsal kin taja ynl jaychki an pikbantsixtalbtsik, maske jech an pikbantsixtalbtsik yab jayki neech kin ejto kin wixka an walastalbtsik.
Por na Jesukristo jn tokot an pikbantsixtalb in taja abal kin wixka an walastalb abal echekijich ani tayl buxkan tin ejt na Dios.
Taja kwajat in aytsm asta ka tantsat xita kl tu atnal,
abal kal jnki tokot i pikbantsixtalb xin pikbantsi na Dios, in lujkuwalichtsik abal echekijich xi Jajich in dhabal.
Ani an Tokat Ejattalb, jaychki jech tu utsl abal jidhtal in ulal ench:
An lejkintalb xi neech ku taja kal jajtsik tam ka watch jachan an kij, ench ti neech ka tjan, in ulal an Okxlb: Neech ku kwajba nu takixtal ba nin itsch ani neech ku dhutsa ba nin chalabtsik.
Ani tayl in ulal jeye: Yab ms jayki neech ku chalpay nin walastalbiltsik nibal xowa yab alwa in tajmaltsik.
Anchan p, tam an walastalbtsik pakwlantsidhich, yabich ms yejat i pikbantsixtalb abal an walastalbtsik.
Kidhblbtsik, jaxtm xo ti ejtowalich ku ochich ban Lej Tokat Alt kal ni jun i jikltalb kal tin kwentaki nin xichl na Jesukristo,

tokot ki ntsi an t bl, an bl xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xi kwajatwiik dhabudh ani tu japtsi kal Jaj nin tul. Jelti max u watelich xo bin dhabl an Lej Tokat Alt xi kwajat ban pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios.
Na Jess jaich ni pulek pleil bin kim na Dios;

jaxtm, ku utch ba na Dios kal jun i ejattal lujat ani kal jun i belomtal plek. Pos Jaj tu tokedhantsmalich an ti ejattal abal yabich ki acha u walbidh kal an walastalbtsik ani ni tul takadhich kal i ja xi alwa.
Ki ntsi ki koy junini ni chalab ban aytsixtalb xi till ba ni belomtal, yab ki jlkkliy ni chalab, pos na Dios neech kin taja jelt xan tu utsmal.
Ani yejat ki aliy xan ti ku tlmxin jn ani jn, abal anchan, ku kndhxin ms ani ki tajl xowa alwa.
Yab yejat ki wwnantsi tin oktsixtal xin ujnmaltsik yab u kalel xon ti tajl an junkuntalb. Yejat ku pkbdhxin jn ani jn ani xo ms, kom i chutal ke exomich ti kunel xowki ti neech ka tsch an Ajtiklb.
Pos max ki ntsal ki taja an walastalb abalki i jila ki bela jech an tsubaxtalb maske i exllich, yabich waach ms i pikbantsixtalb xowa ka pikb abal ku pakwlantsat an ti walastalbil.
Tokotich tm u jilkonal ki aytsm an kakadhtalb tam ka tsch an ljundhaxtalb ani an kamal xi kwajat jomoml xon ti neech ka petn xin tomnltsik na Dios.
Tam jun xita kin chikat taja an takixtalb xin jilm dhutsadh na Moiss ani waach chb o x i lnaxtsik xin ulal abal ani, u pidhnb abal ka chemdh jachan an walablom kal ni jun i yajnantsixtalb.

Pos, yabxe a chalpayaltsik ke ms plek i yajtsiktalb in tomnl kin bachutsik xita in chikat tajtsal tin Chakmil na Dios, in pojkantsal tin xichl ani in odhbijtsal tin Tokat Ejattal na Dios xu kanidhbtsik kl? Jachan an xich, jaich nin tsubkl an lejkintalb ani xi kl ti tokedhatstsik.
I chob abal an Okxlb in ulmal ench: “Nan u lujyal ku pidhatsik an ti yajtsiktalb; Nan neech ku jalbiytsik.” Ani in ulu jeye ench: “An Okxlb jaich neech kin ljundha an atiklbtsik xi kl tu belnal.”
Kakadh tajat ku kwajlan kal i walastalb tin kubak na Dios xi kwajat ejat!
Por ka chalpaytsik an kij xi watenekich, tam ti tm tajat ta bachutsik an tajaxtalb ani a kuxuy kal yantam i chaattalb an yajtsiktalb tam ta pojktsik kal tin kwentaki na Kristo.
Taltsik xi tattsik, odhbijyat ani tajtsin xan ti ka len tin tamt an atiklbtsik ani taltsik, in bachu jeye an yajtsiktalb abal in tolmiy xi tajtsinktsik anchan.

Taltsik a kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb xi kwajattsik ban wikaxte ani asta kal i kulbtalb ta kuxymaltsik ki kntsin xowa tattsik a dhabal abal a chobtsik ke t walki a kool jun xata xi ms alwa ani yab jayki u tall.
Pos yabtsik p ka kibdha jachan na belomtal, abal kal jachan an belomtalb, neech ki tsidhantsat jun i pulek chejwalixtalb.
Yejat ka koytsik i chaattalb abal ka taja xowa in l na Dios ani tayl, ka bachu xowa Jaj in ulmal neech kin pidhna.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Kunatich tajat i kij, neech ka tsch xi bijidh neech ka tsch ani yabich neech ka owey.
Max jun xita ka kwajbjich alwa kal na Dios abalki u belom, yabich jayki neech ka chemech; por max ka kuxkulch, neech kin chakuy kal jaj.
Por waw yab jaich i kidhtal jelti xu kuxkultsik ani u kibdhbtsik, waw i kidhtal xu belomtsik ani anchan, i belkmich ni ejattal.
Pos max u belomich, i chobich tm alwa ke neech ki bachu xowa nu kwajat i aytsm ani ki bela lejtal ke jun xata xowa yab i chutal, jaich an tsubaxtalb.
Ni weje pakliltsik kldh ti alwa abal belmchtsik.
Kal ni belomtal, i chob abal na Dios in tajmal kal nin kwintalki an kayl ani ejtal xowa waach. Jaxtm, xi xo i chutal, yab tajnk kal jun xata xi kwajat kejle tejwa.

Kal nin belomtal, na Abel in pikbantsi na Dios jun i pikbantsixtalb ms alwa k xin pidhna na Kan. Jaxtm ti bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik ani bachkuntsat an tin pikbantsixtal. Ani jaxtm, maske na Abel chemnekich, in ntsal ti kw kal tin kwenta an belomtalb xin koy.

Kal nin belomtal, na Enok ejat ti jn ban t xechintalb ani yabich chemech. Yabich jayki elan kom jn kal na Dios. Ani an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal, ke tam ti bl tech ti xeech ti kayl, na Enok kulbetn tajat kal na Dios.
Por na Dios yab in kulbetnl max waw yab i bell, pos abal ku utey ba na Dios, yejat ki bela ke na Dios ta kwajat ani ke Jaj, in chejwaliyaltsik xu alyb kl.

Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na No ltsin kal na Dios abal neech ka watey xatakich xi tam ti jachan yab tejwa, in exbantsi xowa in ulu na Dios ani in taja an pulek tan at abal kin loo nin kidhtaltsik. Kal nin belomtalki, in xalkantsi abal u walablom xi yabtsik u belom ani na No kldh ti alwa kal na Dios kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal.
Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Abraham kanyat kal na Dios, in exbantsi ani kale abal ka kale ban chabl xi utsan neech ka chejwaliyat kal na Dios. Kale bin chablil maske yab in chob xon ti neech.

Kom u belom, na Abraham kwajay ban chabl xi usnk neech ka pidhan kal na Dios, jelti jun i pl chabl xi yab jaj in dhabal. Kwajay ba attsik xin tajl kal i kudhkumki ani anlki jeye tin tajatsik na Isk ani na Jakob, xi usnktsik jeye kal na Dios jelt xan ti usnk na Abraham.
Pos na Abraham kwajat in aytsm jachan an bitsow xin kool kubat alwa nin akantsik. Jech, jaich xi tajadh ani kubadh kal na Dios.
Kal nin belomtal, anl jeye na Sara, maske uxkweich tajat ani yab u knal, in bachu i chplb abal kin koy i chakam; pos in wachiy jun in chakmil abal in bela ke na Dios neech kin taja xowa in ulmal.

Jaxtm na Abraham, maske u kunelich tajat an kij xowki ti neech ka chemech, in koy in kidhtaltsik yn tajat jelti na ttsik xi waach walki ani jelti an kidhib xi waach tin waltsik an pujal, xi yab neech ka ejtowat ka ajyat.

Ejtal jech an atiklbtsik, chemech maske yab in bachutsik xowa usnk neech ka pidhan kal na Dios; por kom u belomtsik, in chob alwa abal neech kin bachutsik tayl ani in aytsitsik kal yantam i kulbtalb maske in w telaki. Anchan, in xalklichtsik ke u watelkitsik tech ti kayl ani yab techtsik;
pos xu kwtsik anchan, in xalkltsik tajat ke xeech bl in ayaltsik jun in chablil.
Max in chalpmaktsik tokot nin chablil xon ti kalnek, neech kin ejto ka witsiytsik tyki.
Por in ltsik jun i chabl ms alwa, jaich ki ulu, an chabl xi walki. Jaxtm na Dios yab in tidhenl ka utsan ke Jaj nu Dios kal jajtsik, pos in koolich tojojontsidh jun i bitsow.
Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Abraham taktamiyat kal na Dios, in jna na Isk abal kin pikba. Jaj yab kwajay ti chalpax, tokot in ulu abal neech kin pikba nin junkax chakmil maske usnk kal na Dios ench:
“Kal tin kwentaki na Isk neech ka koy yn a kidhtaltsik.”
Jaich abal na Abraham in chob alwa ke na Dios in kool i awiltalb abal asta kin ejdha i chemlomtsik; pos na Abraham, in bachu jun nin chakmil ani anchan, jilkon jelti max chemech ani ejdhantsat ti t.
Kal nin belomtal, na Isk in lbtaja na Jakob ani na Esa kal tin kwenta xan ti neech ka kaletsik tayl.
Ani kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Jakob nechich ka chemech, in lbtaja juntsik ti juntsik nin chakmiltsik na Jos ani in kakna na Dios, in liklm bin tsm nin kwayab.
Kal nin belomtal, tam ti na Jos nechich ka chemech, in ulu abal an israelitatsik neech ka kale ms tayl ba jachan an chabl xi Ejipto ani in jila uludh xanty ka tjan kal nin beklk.

Kal nin belomtal nin ttatsik, tam ti wachin ti chakam na Moiss, chinan kal jajtsik x a ch, abal in chuutsik ke jaich jun i chakam xi alabl tajat. Yab in jiknatsik an takixtalb xin pidhnmal an pulek takix ke yejat ka chemdh an tsitsik kwitl.
Ani kal nin belomtal, tam ti inikbch na Moiss, yab in lena ka bijyat ke jaj u chakmlb kal nin tsidhnil an pulek takix xi Ejipto,
ms in kulbetna ka tajtsin xan ti ka len junax kal an atiklbtsik xin bell na Dios ani yab in lena ka kwajay kijidh w i kij ban walastalb.
In acha abal ms alwa kin bachu i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta na Kristo k ka kwajay Ejipto ban tumnladhtalb; pos jaj tokot in lenl kin bachu an chejwalixtalb xi neech ka pidhan kal na Dios.
Kal nin belomtal, na Moiss kale ban chabl xi Ejipto, yab abal in jiknantsi tin chkub an pulek takix, pos in ntsi kin taja xowa in chalpaymal jelti max in teltm na Dios xi yab tejwa.

Kal nin belomtal, na Moiss in tuju kin taja an ajib paskwa ani in abna ka wadhyat an wilebtsik kal i xich, abal an tokat abatwle xi pidhnk ti awiltalb ti chemdhax, yab kin taktsi tin jidhtal chakmil an israelitatsik.
Ani kal in belomtal, an israelitatsik watey ban Chak Pujal jelti max i waynek chabl; ani tam ti an atiklbtsik xi Ejipto in lena kin taja anlki, lupuntsik.
Kal nin belomtal an israelitatsik, julpan nin mapl an bitsow xi Jerik, tam ti jajtsik okon kin wilintsi taal bk a kts.
Ani kal nin belomtal, na Rb, an junkux inik uxum, yab chemech junax kal xin chikat tajatsik an takixtalb kom jaj in bachm alwa an kwchixtsik xi Israel.
Janty ms neech ku ulu? Nibal neech ka kidhey an kij abal ku tila na Jeden, na Barak, na Sansn, na Jeft, na Dabid, na Samuel ani an tiltsixtsik.

Kal tin kwentaki nin belomtal, jechtsik in kniymal i pakdha bitsow, takxinktsik in lujtalki ani in bachutsik an tolmixtalb xi usnktsik neech ka pidhantsik kal na Dios. In paxkintsmal tin wi an padhumtsik,
in tepdhmal i pakdha kamal, in jekmaltsik tam ti neechwiik ka chemdh kal i macht. Xi yabtsik likdha, likeytsik; awilmtsik tajat ban pjxtalb ani in tatsik xin tolmiy.
Wachink i mmlbtsik xi ejdhantsidh ti t tin chakmiltsik. Taltsik, chemech kal i yajtsiktalb ani yab in tokoytsik ka walk, abal anchan, kin ejto kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Keet, in watnmaltsik i labdhnaxtalb ani kwadhnktsik. Asta balidhtsik al wikaxte ani wikadhtsik kal i patl.

Taltsik chemdhats kwiidh kal i tujub, kotbadh junax chejel, taktamidhtsik, chemdhats kal i macht. Xechintsik tki tki bolidhki tokot kal in otl i borrego ani kal in otl i chibo; chojontltsik, u tepinal ani u yajlom.

Jech an alwa iniktsik, xin tomnlakwiik ka kwajaytsik xon ti alwa ani yab ba jech an walbidh kayl, xechinktsik ti belal ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, ban chnlom, ban cholax chntsik ani bin choltltsik an chabl.
Ejtal jajtsik, maske kldhats ti alwa abal u belomtsik, yab in bachu xowa na Dios in ulmal ke neech kin pidhna;
pos na Dios tu tojojontsmalich jun xata ms alwa, abal jajtsik tokot ka lujkuwattsik jeye, tam waw ki bachch weye xowa in ulmal neech kin pidhna na Dios.

Jaxtm waw, kom u kwajat wilidh kal an atiklbtsik xin xalkmalich nin belomtal, ki jilaich xowa tu tamkuyal abal ku belmch. Ki jilaich an walastalb xi tu dhumkuyal ani ki ntsi kal i kaymtalb an belch xi yejat ki taja.

Ki chalpm echeki na Jess, xon ti tl ni belomtal, pos Jaj, jaich xita tu tujtsi ani tu lujkuntsi an ti belomtal. Na Jess in acha an yajtsiktalb ban peltsidh te ani yab in dha ti kwenta an tidhetalb xin kool jachan an cheml. Pos in chob alwa ke tam kin watnaich jachan an yajtsiktalb, neech kin koy i kulbtalb, i kijidhtalb ani neech ka buxkan tin ejt nin tokat kwajtalbil na Dios.
Ka chalpaytsik nin oktsixtalbil na Jess, xi yantam yajtsiktalb in bachu tin kubak an walablomtsik; jaxtm, yab ki chekeytsik nibal ka jilatsik tab.
Pos tattsik yabl a bajmal ka bachu i cheml abalki yabich a l ka tajatsik i walastalb.

A uktsmalichtsikxe an takixtalb xi ti pidhl na Dios abal ti chutal jelti max ti chakmiltsik? Ench tin ulal ban Tokat Dhuslab: Chakam, yab ka pojka an yajtsiktalb xi ti pidhl an Okxlb abal ka lejkiy tab, nibal ka walba tab tam ti ki kwiya.
Pos an Okxlb in takyal xin kanidhl ani in pidhl ti yajtsiktalb abal kin lujku xi Jaj in bachwal jelt in chakmil.
Ka kuxuytsik an yajtsiktalb kom na Dios ti kooltsik jelti max ti chakmil. Awxe waach jun i ttalb xi yab in takyal in chakmil?
Por max na Dios yab ti ki takiytsik, tm, yab i lej chakmlb kal Jaj, i ani chakmlbki.
Pos anl jeye, ni ttatsik xi tech ti kayl, tu takyal ani i exbantsal xowa ti ku utsa. Pos ms alwa ki exbantsi ni Tta xi walki abal anchan, ki kch an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Ni ttatsik xi tech ti kayl, tu takyal abal ki ejto ku kwajay alwa tech ti kayl xan ti jajtsik tin chutal alwa; por na Dios, tu takyal kal waw ti alwabl abal ti ku toko jelt xan ti Jaj tokat.

Tsubax kejle ke ni jun i yajtsiktalb yab neech ki kulbetna tam ki bachuki, tokot neech ki yajna; por xin lejkiyaltsik tinb kal tin kwentaki an yajtsiktalb xin bachwal, tayl in kyalichtsik tm jun i xechintalb lujat ani kijidh.
Anchan p, ka likedhatsik ti t na kubak xi chekenekich, na akan xi palmenekich
ani ka aliytsik an bl xi lujat. Neech tm ka jeley na akan xu kweche ani yabich ms neech ka tawkin.
Ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal ejtalkitsik, ka jnatsik jun i tokat xechintalb; pos max yab ka tokedhatsik tab, yab neech ka ejtotsik ka chuu an Okxlb.
Ka koytsik i kwenta abal ni jun xita yab kin jila kin bachu an tolmixtalb xin pidhnl na Dios; ke ni jun xita yab kin junu jelti jun i tsaik tayablb, xin tajl yab alwa ani yn u tnal kl.
Ke ni jun xita xi tattsik ka junkun kal xi yab in tomtal, nibal kin pojka xowa tokat; pos jech jaich in taja na Esa, ke kal jn tokot i kapnl, in nuju an awiltalb xin kool jun i okox chakmlb.
Ani tattsik a chob ke tayl, tam ti na Esa in lena kin bachu nin lbtajaxtal nin tta, pojk; ani maske ukin tajat, yabich in ela xan ti kin uwa abal kin jalkuy xowa in tajmal.
Tattsik, yab i utenek jelti an israelitatsik, ba jachan an chn xi kwajat jomoml jelti kamal ani u taknal, xon ti waach i jikwaxtalb ani i ikladh b.
Yab a achmaltsik ti jutsyb an korneta nibal nin tawnaxtal na Dios xi kl ti tawnadh an israelitatsik. Xin achmaltsik jachan an tawnaxtalb, in pakabdhatsik abal yabich ka tawntsik ms.
Jachan tin tajatsik anchan, jaich abal yabich in kuxyal xan ti kwajat ti usnaltsik ench: “Max jun i konl o jun xita kin kuba nin akan ba jech an chn, yejat ka chemdh tujbadhki o kal i chupidh patl.”
Jikentl tajat xi t ti tejwa, ke asta na Moiss in ulu ench: “In wipipl tin kwajat kal i jkib.”
Por tattsik i utenek ban chn xi Sin ani bin bitswil na Dios xi ejat, jaich ki ulu, an Jerusaln xi walki. I utenekichtsik xon ti kwajat yn i tokat abatwletsik

junkunk abal kin kaknatsik na Dios ani bin junkuntal nin chakmiltsik na Dios xi kwajattsik dhutsadh nin bij t walki. I utenekichtsik ba na Dios, nin Ljundhaxil ejtalki ani bin ejattal an iniktsik xi alwa, abal lujkudhichtsik kal na Dios.
U utenekich jeye ba na Jess, an kawintsix ban t lejkintalb ani ba nin xichl xin wakla xi kl tu tokmalich. Jech tu tawnl ms alwa k nin xichl na Abel.

Jaxtm, ka koytsik i kwenta abal yab ka pojka xi tu tawnl. Pos yabtsik loey xin pojka na Dios tam ti tawntsik tech ti kayl; ani waw ms yab neech ki ejto ku loey, max yab ki exbantsi xi tu tawnl t walki.
Nin tawnaxtal na Dios, in taja ka yoyon an chabl tam ti jachan an kij; por xo in ulal: “Neech jun ku taja ka yoyon ani yab tokotki an chabl, an walki jeye.”
Tam tin ulu “neech jun”, i exbayal jelti max in ulal abal neech kin wkoy ejtal xowa xu yoynal xin tajmal na Dios abal ka jilkon tokotki xi yab u ejtowb ka yoywat.
Nin takixtal na Dios xi tu pidhl, yab neech ka ejtowat ka yoywat. Pos ki pidha ti jalbintsixtalb kal jech tin kwenta ani ki kakna na Dios kal yantam i tokattalb ani i chaattalb xi Jaj in kulbetnl;
pos ni Diosil, in junwal jelti kamal xu kibdhax.
Yab ka jilatsik ta kndhx jn ani jn jelti a kidhbtsik.
Yab ka uktsitsik ka bachu alwa xu uleltsik ta kim, pos taltsik xin tajl anchan, in koydhmaltsik i tokat abatwletsik maske yab in chob.
Ka yajnantsi jeye xi kwajattsik ti wiknl, jelti max tattsik i kwajat teye ta wiknl junax kal jajtsik. Ka yajnantsi jeye xi atax tajtsidhtsik, pos neech teye ki ejtowat ki atax tajtsintsik anlki.
Ke ejtal xi tomkidhtsik ka kakn kal ejtalki; pos na Dios neech kin ljundha xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal ani xu walbinaltsik kal i uxmbetalb.
Yab ki chenebtsik; ki kwajaytsik kijidh kal xowaki a kool, pos na Dios in ulmal ench: “Yab jayki neech tu jila nibal neech tu walba.”
Jaxtm ti neech ki ejto ki ulu ench kal yantam i belomtalb: An Okxlb jaich xi tin tolmiyal; yab neech ku jikna xowa neech kin ejto ti kin tajtsi jun xita.
Ka chalpaytsik na oklkiltsik xi ti tiltsmal an tin kwintal na Dios; ka chalpaytsik xan ti xechin ani ka ntsi ka wwnantsi an tin belomtal.
Na Jesukristo yab u jalkunal malill i kij.

Yab ka walka ki kambiyattsik kal i keet oktsixtalb xi yab i oktsink kal na oklkiltsik. Ms alwa ke ni ejattal kin bachu i chapiktalb xi tl bin kanidhaxtal na Dios k i takixtalb kal tin kwenta i kapnltsik; pos yab jayki kldhats xata alwa ba jech an oktsixtalb xin wwnltsik.
Waw i kool xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb; taja, yab in tomnl ka kapch xu pletsik bin weje tokat altjil na Dios.

Pos xu lej oklek ple, in dhl in xichl an konltsik ban Lej Tokat Alt ti pikbantsixtalb abal kin wixka an walastalb; por nin tul jachan an konltsik, yab u tsiknal xon tu kwajl an israelitatsik. U kldhb elb abal ka tsikan.
Anchan jeye, na Jess kldh ban bitsow abal ka chemdh ani anchan, kin toko an atiklbtsik kal tin kwentaki nin xichl.
Wanch p ba na Jess, tyki elb abal ku atan weye jelt xan ti Jaj in tamu.
Pos tech ti kayl yab i kool ni jun i bitsow xi neech kin ejto ka kwajay malill i kij, tokot exom i ayal an bitsow xi neech ka tsch tayl.
Jaxtm ti yejat echeki ki pubdhantsal tin bij na Dios kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo. Jech an ajtintsixtalb, jaich an pikbantsixtalb xi yejat ki pidhna. Ki ajtintsch p an Okxlb!
Ani yab ka uktsi ka tajatsik xowa alwa ani ka chejwaliyal jeye xowa a kool xi keettsik; pos jech, jaich an pikbantsixtalb xin kulbetnl na Dios.

Yab ka chikat taja xi ti oktsaltsik ani ka exbantsi xowa jajtsik in ulal; pos jajtsik ti belkmtsal ta ejattal ani in chob abal neech ka ljundhtsik kal na Dios. Ka tolmiytsik abal tam ka ljunhd kal na Dios kin achatsik i kijidhtalb ani yab i tepintalb, pos max yab ka tajatsik anchan, yab xata ti neech ka yna xowa ti oktsaltsik.
Ti ku kontsintsi weye, i chalpayal ke u kwajat alwa abal i l ki taja ejtal alwa xan ti yejat.
Tu lej pakabdhltsik ki lan kal nan tu kwenta abal na Dios ti kin walka kin witsiy jikat kal tattsik.
Na Dios xin pidhnl an kijidhtalb, jaich nin ejdha ti t ni Ajtik Jesukristo, an pulek Belkol borregotsik xin lej tsubka kal nin xichl an lejkintalb xi malill i kij.

Ke Jaj ti ki tajatsik ki lujkun ani ki alwamtsik kal ejtal xowakich abal ka ejto ka tajatsik xowa Jaj in l. Ani ke Jaj, kin taja kal ejtal waw xowa Jaj kin lena, kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo. Ke na Kristo kin koy an labidh tokattalb malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
Kidhblbtsik, tu kontsal abal ka koy i chaattalb kal jech an takixtalb xi tu utsltsik, pos yab lej plek an dhutsadh w xi jech tu dhutsuntsmaltsik.
Ka chobnatsik abal an kidhblb Timoteo, walkadhich; max ka ulich jikat, neech jeye ku jna kal nan tam kin kale tu lnatsik.
Ka chapndha ejtal na oklkiltsik ani ejtal an belomtsik. Ti abtsal ti chapndhomtalb xu kwajltsik Italia.
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal na Dios. Anchan ka tjan.
Nan, xu bij Santiago, xin kwajat u tjontsal na Dios ani an Ajtiklb Jesukristo, u chapndhl nin kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel xi kwajattsik tki tki ban kayl.
Kidhblbtsik, yejat ki kulbtsik tajat tam exom a watnltsik xowakichki i yajtsiktalb.
Pos a chobichtsik, ke tam a watnltsik i yajtsiktalb abal ki chutat max tsubax lejtal ta belom, neech ka ejtotsik ka koy ms an chaattalb.
Por in tsubtalki lejtal ti ka koytsik jachan an chaattalb; anchan, neech tm ka likey ms na ejattal abal ka ejtotsik ka kuxuy xowakichki i taktamixtalb.
Max jun xita xi tattsik u kibel i chalab, kin kontsi na Dios, pos Jaj in pidhnl xowakichki ka kontsin. In pidhl ejtalkitsik yandha an ti chalab ani yab xata kwajat in utsl xita kl ti ka kontsin.
Por yejat kin konoy kal yantam i belomtalb ani yab yejat kin jlkkliy nin chalab; pos xita in tajl anchan, in junwal jelti an ja xu mlk xu jnb tki tki kal an ik.
Xita xin jlkkliyal nin chalab, yab yejat kin chalpay ke neech ka pidhan xata kal an Ajtiklb.
Xita xi xo in l jun xata ani kalm keet, yab in kool lujat nin chalab.
An kidhblb xi chojontl, yejat ka kulb tam kin chalpay ke plek tin tamt na Dios,
ani xi tumnladh, yejat jeye ka kulb tam kin chalpay ke yab xata in y nin tumnladhtal tin tamt na Dios. Abal xi tumnladh tajat, in junwal jelt in wichl an chojltsik, xi yab u lej owel.
Tam ka eblin na kts ani ka yajb tajat an kakal, u wayl an chojl, u chujkanal nin wichl ani u tall nin labdh. Anchan jeye ti neech ka okon an tumnladh inik lejat in ntsal ti tojnal.

Kijidh tajat xita xin kuxyal kal i chaattalb, an yajtsiktalb; abal tam kin kuxch jachan an yajtsiktalb, neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech jaich xowa na Dios in ulmal neech kin pidha xi kl tu kaknb.
Tam jun xita kin acha u taktamiyb, yab yejat kin chalpay ke kal a Dios tu taktamiyb; pos na Dios yab u taktamiyb kal xowa yab alwa, nibal in taktamiyal ni jun xita.
U kwajlanal ban taktamixtalb jun xita, tam ka kambiyat kal xowa yab alwa xi jajki in kulbetnl.
Tam kin taja jech xowa yab alwa in kulbetnl, tmich tu walbinal. Ani kal tin kwentaki jech an walastalb, u jnb ban kibeltalb.
Kidhblbtsik xi nan tu kanidhltsik tajat, yab ka kambiytsik tab.

Ejtal xowa alwa ani lujat xi bachwal, tl tekat ba ni Tta Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xin tajmal an tajbaxtalbtsik xi waach walki. Malill i kij na Dios jaychki Ja, Jaj yab jayki u jalkunal jelti an tajbaxtalbtsik xi waach walki.
Tu pidha ti t xechintalb kal tin kwentaki tam ti bela an alwa tilab. Anchan tin taja abal ki junu jelti an okox wallb xu pikbantsb na Dios, pos Jaj anchan tin lenmal.
Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, juntsik ta b yejat ki kwajaytsik tojojodh abal ka achatsik nin kwintal na Dios; por yejat ka koy i chaattalb abal ki kwin ani yab ki chaklml jikatki.
Abal tam jun xita u chakl, yab neech kin ejto kin taja xowa lujat tin tamt na Dios.

Pos anchan p, ka jilaichtsik ejtal xowa yab alwa ani ejtal an ataxtalb xi waach tajat. Ka bachutsik kal i chaattalb an alwa tilab xi kwajbantsidh ba na itsch; pos jech an alwa tilab, in kool i awiltalb abal ti ki lotsi ta ejattal.
Por ka tajatsik xan tin ulal an alwa tilab, yab ka achakitsik, pos max ka achakitsik, tatkitsik a kambiyal tab.
Xita xin achlki an alwa tilab ani yab in tajl ti kij, in junwal jelti jun xita xin tell tinb ba jun i lam.
In chutal tinb xan ti jeye jaj ani tam ka wixkinich ban lam, in uktsal xan ti jeye jaj.

Por xita yab in uktsal kin taja xan tin ulal an takixtalb; an takixtalb xi lujat ani in pidhnl an walkadhtalb, tokot kwajat lujtalki in tajl xan tin ulal jech an takixtalb, neech ka kwajay kijidh kal ejtal xowa in tajl.
Max jun xita in chalpayal ke u belom tajat, por yab in ejtowal kin kubdha ti kw yab alwa, jajki in kambiyal tinb ani nin belomtal yab xata in jalbl.

An belomtalb xi alwa, xi na Dios an Ttalb in chutal abal tokat, jaich jech: ki tolmiy an chemtsiwletsik ani an chemtsidh mmlbtsik kal an yajtsiktalb xin watnltsik ani yab ku chon kal an walastalb xi waach ban kayl.
Kidhblbtsik, kom a bellichtsik ni tokat labidh Ajtik Jesukristo, yab takudhki xita yejat ka kaknltsik.
Max ka ochich xon ta junkunaltsik jun i inik xin kwajbm jun i aniyo xi tajadh kal i oro ani in kwajbm i alwa kudhkum; ani ka ochich jeye jun i chojontl xi xeketlidh kal i kej kudhkum,
ani ka bachutsik alwa xi xeketlidh kal an alwa kudhkum ani ka utsa: “Ki buxkan tech ban alwa koytalb”, por an chojontl ka utsa: “Tat n ki kale ta kubl, o ki buxkan tech chabl”,
yabxe exomichki a takwyal xita ka kaknl? Max anchan ka tajltsik, yab lujat na chalab.

Kidhblbtsik xi nan tu kanidhltsik tajat, ka achatsik jech: Na Dios in takwymal xi chojontltsik tech ti kayl abal ka belmchtsik ani abal kin bachutsik jelti jun i jiltsixtalb xowa Jaj in ulmal ke neech kin pidhatsik xi kl tu kaknb.
Por tattsik a tidhebdhl an chojontltsik. Yabxe jaich an tumnladh iniktsik xi ti tajtsaltsik yab alwa ani ti utwaltsik ban awiltalbtsik?
Yabxe jajtsik nin atax till na Jesukristo xa bachmaltsik ani xo a kool ta itsch?
Max a tajlaktsik lejtal jelt xan tin ulal nin takixtal an Ajtiklb Jess xin ulal ench ban Tokat Dhuslab: “Ka kanidha xi keettsik jelt xan ta kanidhl tab”, alwaich ta tajl.
Por max takudhki xita a kaknl, i walbinalichtsik tm ani nin takixtal na Dios, ti xalklichtsik abal yab a tajltsik xan tin ulal.
Max jun xita in tajl ejtal xowa in ulal an takixtalb, por yab kin taja jn xowa in ulal jech an takixtalb, u kalel jelti max in chikat tajl ejtal.

Pos na Dios xin ulu ench: “Yab ki junkun kal xi yab a tomtal”, in ulu jeye: “Yab ki chemdhaxin.” Jaxtm, max jun xita yab u junkunal kal xi yab in tomtal por u chemdhax, in chikat tajlich an takixtalb.
Ka chobnatsik ke neech ki ljundh kal an takixtalb xi ti tajl ki kwajay walkadh, jaxtm ti yejat ka tilltsik ani ka tajltsik xowa alwa.

Pos xita xi yab in kontsm ti yajnantsixtalb xi keettsik, yab jeye neech ka kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb; por xin kontsm ti yajnantsixtalb xi keettsik, neech jeye ka kontsat ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb.
Kidhblbtsik, jant ti alwa max jun xita kin ulu ke u belom ani yab in tajl ni jun xata xi alwa? Awxe neech ka ejtowat ka lowat kal jachan an belomtalb xin kool?
Ka chalpaytsik ench: Max jun i kidhblb i inik o i mmlb yab in kool in kudhkmil nibal i kapnl xan ti kin watna jachan a kts,
ani ke jn ti b xi tattsik kin utsa ench: “Ka watna alwa na kts, ki wtin ani ki kapch”, por yab kin pidha xowa in yntsal nin tul, jant ti alwa xowa in utsa?
Anchan u tmnal kal an belomtalb; max jun xita yab kin xalka nin belomtal kal xowa alwa in tajl, yab tsubax tu belom.

Por max jun xita kin ulu ench: “Tat i belom ani nan u tajl xowa alwa.” Pos ti kin xalkantsi p plki an ti belomtalb xa kool ani yab junax kal xowa alwa a tajl; ani nan neech tu xalkantsi abal in belom junax kal xowa alwa u tajl.
Tat a bell ke jn tokot a Dios waach ani anchan alwaich ta tajl. Anchan jeye tin bell an atax ejattalbtsik ani u wipipltsik kal i jkib.
Por yejat ka chobna, inik xi yab i chalpadh, ke max an belomtalb xi jun xita in kool yab kin xalka kal an alwatalb xowa xin tajl, yab xata in jalbl nin belomtal.
Ni weje paklil Abraham bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik kal xowa in taja tam tin pikba nin chakmil Isk.
A chutalich ke nin belomtal na Abraham, in xalka kal xowa xin taja ani anchan, in xalka ke tsubax lejtal tu belom.
Anchan ti tmun jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: “Na Abraham in bela na Dios ani kal nin belomtal, bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat inik.” Ani bijyat tin jab a Dios.
Pos a chutalichtsik, ke na Dios in bachwal jeye jun xita ti lujat inik kal xowa alwa in tajl abal u belom ani yab tokot, abal u belomki.
Anlki jeye tmun kal na Rb, an junkux inik uxum; bachwat kal na Dios ti lujat mmlb kal xowa alwa in taja tam tin chinat bachu tin kim nin abatwlejiltsik na Josu ani tayl in tolmiy abal ka kale pl bl.
Pos anchan jelti ni tul max yab in kool an ejattalb, chemnek ti kwajat ani yabich xata ti alwa, anchan jeye, yab xata ti alwa max tokot u belom ani yab i tajl xowa alwa.
Kidhblbtsik, yab yejat ka wachin ba tattsik yn xita xin lenl kin oktsixna nin kwintal na Dios, pos a chobichtsik ke nan ani xi ms xu oktsixtsik jeye, ms chapik ti neech tu ljundhb.
Ejtal i tajl xowa yab alwa. Max jun xita yab in ulal xowa yab alwa, jachan jaich jun i lujat inik, xi neech jeye kin ejto kin kubdha nin tul tam in l kin taja jun xata xi yab alwa.
Tam ki kwajbantsi ti freno bin wi an bitsim, neech tm ki ejto ki jna xon ti ki lena.
Anchan jeye an pakdha tan, maske pakdhatsik tajat ani chapik tajat tu wawyb kal an ik, an beldhom, in ejtowal kin jna xon ti jaj kin lena kal jun in chakam chawtsl.
Anlki jeye u tmnal kal ni wi; jaich jun peje in putll ni tul, por u tjnal xowakich pakdha kal tin kwentaki xowa ki ulu. Jelti w i kamal in tsikl i pakdha telom, anchan jeye u tmnal kal ni wi.

Ani ni wi, in junwal jelti jun i kamal. Ni wi, kwajat bin putll ni tul ani tu choyal tam ki ulu xowa yab alwa. In junwal jelti an ataxtalb xu tjnal ban kayl. An lej atax, jaich xi tu tajl ki ulu xowa yab alwa ani anchan, i choyalich ejtal xowa i tajl ba ni xechintal.
An inik in ejtowal kin mxubdha xowakichki i padhumtsik, i chichintsik, i chantsik ani i konltsik xi waach ban pujal;
por yab xita in ejtmal kin taja ke nin wi kin ulu tokot xowa alwa. Jech jaich jun i ataxtalb xi yab in walkl tinb ka kubdh kal ni jun xita; in junwal jelti itlab xu chemdhax.
Kal jaych jech ni wi, i kaknl na Dios an Ttalb ani kal jaychki jeye ti odhbijyal an iniktsik, xin tajmal na Dios jyki jelti Jaj.
Ba ni wi u kalel i kaknaxtalb ani tyki u kalel i odhbijixtalb. Kidhblbtsik, yab yejat ki taja anchan.
Awxe ba jun in kalemtal i ja neech ka kale i ja xi alwa ani i ja xi tsaik? Yaba!
Kidhblbtsik, awxe jun in akan i lanx neech kin koy i itadh, o jun in akan i uj kin koy i lanx? Pos ba jun in kalemtal i ja yab jeye neech ka kale i ja xi chapu ani xi alwa.
Max kal tattsik ta kwajat jun xita xi chalpadh ani in exbayal xowakich, kin xalka kal xowa alwa in tajl ani kal an chaattalb xin kool kal tin kwenta jachan an chalpadhtalb.

Por max tattsik a chakuntsal jun xita kal tin kwenta xowa in kool ani a pjxnl abal ka bajaw ki kwajay ms plek, yab yejat ka tekatsik tab kal jachan an chalab xa kooltsik, pos anchan, i kambixichki ani yab a ynltsik an tsubaxtalb.
Pos jech yab jaich an chalpadhtalb xi tl ba na Dios, jech an chalpadhtalb jaich xi techki ti kayl. Yab j xi tl ban Tokat Ejattalb, jech an chalpadhtalb tl ban atax ejattalbtsik.
Pos xon ti waachtsik xita xin chakuntsal xi keet kal tin kwentaki xowa in kool ani in pjxnltsik abal kin bajaw ka kwajay ms plek, taja waach xowa xi yab exbadh ani xowakichki i ataxtalb.

Pos xin kooltsik an chalpadhtalb xi tl ba na Dios, jachan in kooltsik jun i xechintalb tokat. Yabtsik pojkax, alwa iniktsik, in exbayaltsik xowakich. In yajnantsal jeye nin at kidhbtsik ani in tajltsik xowa alwa; yab exbadhki xita in kaknltsik ani yab u kambixtsik.
Xita in ayal an kijidhtalb, in tajl abal ka wachin i kijidhtalb ban atiklbtsik ani anchan, neech kin bachutsik an lujattalb.
Jn tu tsiil an pjxtalb ani an knxtalb xi tattsik a kyal? Yabxe taja tu tsiil ban lelomtalb xi kwajat in tajl i chplb alkidh ba na ejattal?

A ltendhltsik xata ani yab a ejto ka koytsik. I chemdhaxtsik abal a ltsik ka koy xowa a chutal in kooltsik xi keet ani kom yab a ejtowal ka koytsik, tmich ta pjxtsik. Yab a ejtowal ka koytsik xowa a l, kom yab a kontsaltsik na Dios.
Ani max a kontsaltsik, yab i pidhnal kom yab alwa ta konyaltsik; pos a konyaltsik abal ka yna kal xowaki in kulbetnl na tul.

Tattsik a jilmal na Dios jelt xan ti jun i mmlb in jill nin tomkl abal ka junkun kal i keet inik. Yabxe a chobtsik ke max ka kanidha xowa waach yab alwa tech ban kayl a pojklich na Dios? Max jun xita kin kanidha xowa waach yab alwa tech ban kayl, u kalelich in pojkl a Dios.
O a chalpayaltsik ke an Tokat Dhuslab in ani ulalki ench: “An Tokat Ejattalb xi tu kwajbantsmal na Dios ba ni ejattal tu kanidhl tajat ani in l kin chuu ke tokotki ki kanidha na Dios”?
Por na Dios tu tolmiyal ms kal nin alwatal; pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Na Dios in pojkl xin tekltsik tinb, por in tolmiyal kal nin alwatal xin chakltsik tinb.”
Pos ka walkaichtsik p ki takyattsik kal na Dios. Yab ka walka ti ki tantsi an ta chalab an lej atax. Pos max yab ka walka ti ki tatsik an lej atax, an lej atax neech ka wkon kal tattsik.

Ki utchtsik ba na Dios ani Jaj neech ka utey kal tattsik. Max i walbinal, ka jilaichtsik an walastalb; ani tattsik xa lenl ka kakna na Dios ani a kanidhl jeye xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, yabich ka tajatsik anchan. Ka kaknatsik tokot na Dios ani anchan, neech ka tokedhatsik na ejattal.
Ki tepintsik, ki ukintsik ani ka yajnantsitsik tab. Ka jalkuytsik an tenich kal i ukil ani an kijidhtalb kal i tepintalb.
Ka chakatsik tab tin tamt an Okxlb ani Jaj neech ti ki tekbatsik.

Kidhblbtsik, yab ki tlxintsik yab alwa jn ani jn. Xita in till yab alwa jun in at belom, o kin teltsal xowa in tajl, u kalelich tm jelti max exom in till yab alwa an takixtalb ani in ulalich abal yab xata ti alwa. Por max tat a ulal ke yab xata ti alwa an takixtalb, u kalelich tm jelti max tat ms a kool i awiltalb ka ulu xowa yejat ka tajan k an takixtalb.
Na Dios jaich nin pidhnmal an takixtalb ani tokot Jaj neech kin ejto ti loox o ti kibdhax. Por tat, janty a y abal ki kwajay ka teltsal xowa in tajl jun xita?
Xo ka achatsik jech, xa ulaltsik ench: “Xo o kalm neech ku kale ba tuwa o ba jech i bitsow; ani taja neech ku kwajay jun i tamub, neech ki taja i limtal ani neech ki ta yn i tumn”,
por nibal ela a chobtsik xanty neech ka tmun kalm. Pos janty in y nin xechintal jun xita? In junwal jelti an jl xu xalkanal junwki ani junwki u pakwel.
Xowa yejat ka ulutsik jaich jech: “Max an Okxlb anchan tin l, neech ku kwajay ejat ani neech ki taja jech o jachan.”
Por tattsik a inikbdhltsik tajat tab ani anlki jeye i kwtsik; ejtal jech an iniktalb, yab alwa.
Xita xin chob kin taja xowa alwa ani yab kin taja, u walbinalich.
Ka achatsik jech, neech ku tila an tumnladhtsik xi yab u belom. Ka ukintsik ani ka dhjantsik kal tin kwenta an yajtsiktalb xi neech kin achatsik tayl.
Nin tumnal kachenekich ani nin alwa kudhkmil, exomich ti kapnal kal an takl.

Nin orojil ani nin platajil exomich ti bokmanal ani jachan nin bokom, jaich neech ka kwajay jelti jun i lnax kal jajtsik ani neech ka tsikantsik kl jelt xan tu tsikax an kamal. Yn i tumn in junkmal jech tin okontalich an kij.

An jalbixtalb xi jajtsik yab in kidhat pidhm an tojnaltsik xi tjnk ti junkux tin wall an tayablbtsik, exom in kwnltsik xo ani an Okxlb xin takyal ejtal an tokat abatwletsik, in achmich xanty in kwnl jachan an tojnaltsik.
Tech ti kayl in kymaltsik jun i xechintalb xan ti jajtsik in lenmal, kotsenektsik jelti an konltsik xi neech ti chemdhb; ani xo, exomich in bajwal xowki neech kin jalbiytsik nin walab.
Jajtsik in walbiymaltsik ani in chemdhmaltsik xi yab xata in walmal ani yab tomnadhtsik.

Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik, yejat ka koytsik i aytsixtalb asta ka tsch an Ajtiklb, jelt xan ti an tojnal xin l kin junkuntsi yn tin wall an tayablb kool kin koy i aytsixtalb asta ka ulich an jidhtal b ani xi tayl.
Ka koytsik teye i aytsixtalb jelti jech an tojnal ani yabtsik ka jila tab, pos exomich ti kunel xowki ti neech ka tsch jun an Ajtiklb.
Kidhblbtsik, yab ki kwajay ta chkxtsik jn ani jn abal yab ki elan i walbidh tam ki ljundh; pos an Ljundhom, kunatich i kij neech ka tsch.
Ka ynatsik jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an yajtsiktalb ani an chaattalb, an tiltsixtsik xi xechinktsik ti tiltsix kal tin kwenta an Ajtiklb.

Pos i chob abal kijidh neech kin acha xita kin ejto kin kuxuy i yajtsiktalb kal i chaattalb. A achmaltsik xan ti na Jb tin kuxymal kal i chaattalb an yajtsiktalb xin watna ani a achmaltsik jeye xan ti lbtajan kal an Okxlb ms tayl; pos an Okxlb u kontsix tajat ti yajnantsixtalb ani u kanidhax.

Kidhblbtsik, ka exbaytsik alwa jech xowa neech tu utsa: Yab ka yna an walki, nibal an chabl ani ni jun xata abal ki beltsintsik xowa a ulal. Tam ka ulutsik ke “Ani”, anchan ti ka ulu max anchan ti yejat; ani tam ka ulutsik ke “Yaba”, anchan ti ka ulu max anchan ti yejat, abal yab ki kwajlan tayl kal i walastalb.
Max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal kwajat kal jun i yajtsiktalb, yejat ka lan. Max jun xita kwajat u kulbl, kin ajatnantsi ti ajatlbtsik na Dios.
Max jun xita kwajat u yaul, yejat ka kantsin an ti takix belomtsik abal ka kontsintsat jachan an yaul ani ka majuyat kal i asyte tin bij an Ajtiklb.
Ani tam ka tajatsik i kontsintsixtalb kal yantam i belomtalb, an yaul neech ka jeley abal neech ka jeldh kal an Ajtiklb; ani max in tajmal i walastalb, neech ka pakwlantsat.
Jaxtm, ki ltsxintsik an ti walastalb xa kooltsik jn ani jn ani ki kntsntsxintsik jn ani jn abal ki jeldhtsik. Nin chapik kontsintsixtal jun i lujat inik in kool tajat i awiltalb.
An tiltsix Elas jaich jun i inik jelti waw; ani tam ti lan chapik abal yab ka ulich i b, yab ulich i b ban kayl x i tamub kal chejel.
Ani tayl, lan jun abal ka ulich an b ani ulich. Ani an chabl in labedha jun an kapnl.
Kidhblbtsik, max jun xita xi tattsik a kidhtal kin jila kin bela an tsubaxtalb ani ka tolmiyat kal jun xita abal kin bela jun,

ka chobnatsik ke xita kin taja kin jila ti walablom jun xita, neech kin lotsi tin ejattal jachan an walablom abal yab ka kale ban kibeltalb ani neech kin taja abal ka pakwlantsat yn tin walastalbil. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Pedro, tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo. U dhutsuntsal jech an ti w an judotsik xu belomich, xi ajnktsik ani kale ti kwajltsik ban chabl xi Ponto, xi Galasia, xi Kapadosia, xi Asia ani xi Bitinia.

Jechtsik, takudh kal na Dios an Ttalb anchan xan tin kool kejle chalpadh tam ti yabl tujenek an kayl. Takudhtsik kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb abal kin exbantsitsik an tin takixtal ani abal ka tokedhtsik kal nin xichl na Kristo. Ka bachwaltsik yn i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb.

Ki kakna na Dios nin tta ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Na Dios, kal nin pulek yajnantsixtal, tu jalkuntsmal an ti chalab tam tin ejdha ti t na Jesukristo. Kom ejech ti t na Jesukristo, jaxtm ti chobich abal neech ku kwajay walki kal na Dios.
Jech an aytsixtalb, neech ti ki tajatsik ka bachu an jiltsixtalb xi na Dios ti kontsaltsik tapadh t walki. An jiltsixtalb, jaich jun xata xi yab u kachel, yab choodh ani yab u batel jelti an wich.
Ani kom a bellichtsik na Dios, Jaj ti beletnltsik kal nin chp abal ka bajawtsik an loeltalb xin kool tojojodh xi neech kin pidhna ka chobn tin okontal an kij.
Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ta kwajattsik i kulbl, maske yejat xna kejle ka watna i yajtsiktalb w i kij.

Pos an belomtalb xa kooltsik in junwal jelti an oro: yejat ka kwajb ban kamal abal ka chutat max jaich xi alwa. Tam jun xita ka taktamiyat ani yab kin jila ti belom, nin belomtal ms in jalbl k an oro, pos an oro u tall ja. Jaxtm, tam ki taktamiyatichtsik ani yab ka jilatsik ta belom, neech tm ki kldhjichtsik ta alwa ani in tomnlich tm ka bachutsik an labidh tokattalb ani an kaknaxtalb tam ka tsch ni Ajtik Jesukristo.
Tattsik a kaknl na Jesukristo maske yab a chumal ani a belltsik, maske xo yabl a chumal. Jaxtm ta kulbltsik kal jun i kulbtalb plek ani labidh, ke yab neech ka ejto ka ulu kal i tilabki.
Ani kal tin kwentaki abal a belmichtsik na Jesukristo, i lotsidhichtsik an ta ejattal ani a bachwalichtsik xowa a lujyal ka bachu.
Ti wejeich, an tiltsixtsik in alimaymal ani in chobnmaltsik kal tin kwenta an loeltalb ani in tilmaltsik xowa na Dios in ulmal neech ti ki pidhatsik kal nin alwatalki.

An tiltsixtsik u pidhnal kin chobna kal nin Tokat Ejattal na Kristo, ke na Kristo neech kin watna i yajtsiktalb ani ke tayl neech ka tsch an labidh tokattalb. Jajtsik in alimay abal kin chobna xitam j ani xowki ti neech ka tsch xu ltsinal kal jachan an ejattalb xi ta ti kwajat kal jajtsik.

Por pidhan kin chobnatsik kal na Dios abal an tojlb xi kwajattsik in tajl, yab abal jajtsik tin alwabl, jachan an tojlb xin tajatsik, jaich abal waw ti alwabl. Pos xo, jaich jech xowa i tiltsidhichtsik kal jajyki xi ti tiltsmaltsik an ti alwa tilab kal tin chp an Tokat Ejattalb. Jech an Tokat Ejattalb, tl walki. Ejtal jech in lenmal jeye kin chuu an tokat abatwletsik.
Jaxtm, ka chalpaytsik alwa xanty neech ka taja ani ka ynatsik na alwa chalab. Ka kwajbatsik na aytsixtal kal xowa na Dios neech ti ki pidha kal nin alwatal, tam ka tsch na Jesukristo.
Kom i chakmlbichtsik kal na Dios, yabich ki kwajaytsik jelt xan ta kwajatwiik tam ti yabl a exlmaltsik na Dios.
Yabich ki kwajaytsik jelt xan ta kwajatwiik, ki kwajaytsik alwa ani tokat; pos na Dios, xi ti takwymaltsik, tokat Ja tajat.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: “Ki kwajaytsik tokat, anchan xan ti Nan in tokat.”
Max tattsik a bijyal “Tta” na Dios, xin ejtowal kin chuu alwa jun xita ani yab u takukl an ti atiklbtsik, yejat ki jikna echeki, lejat tech u xeech ti kayl.
Pos na Dios ti kldhmalichtsik ban xechintalb xi yab alwa, xi ti jiltsmal na weje pakliltsik ani a chobtsik alwa ke nin jalbl jachan an looxtalb, yab jaich jun xata xu kachel jelti an oro o an plata,
jalbidh kal nin labidh xichl na Kristo. Jech na Kristo, kwajb ti pikbaxtalb jelti jun i borrego xi tokat.
Tam ti yabl tajadh an kayl, na Dios in bijymalich ke neech kin aba na Kristo abal ka chemdh kal tin kwenta ni walab. Por yab tsch ms okox, tsch xoichki jech i kij abal tattsik ta knl.

Kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, a belltsik na Dios. Na Dios, jaich xin ejdha ti t na Jesukristo tam ti chemdh ani in kwajbmal abal ka kakn. Jaxtm tattsik, a kwajbmalichtsik na belomtal ani na aytsixtal ba na Dios.

Ani xo tattsik, kom a tajlichtsik xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb kal tin kwentaki an Tokat Ejattalb, a tokchtsik na ejattal abal ka kanidha in tsubtalki na at kidhbtsik. Jaxtm ti yejat ki kndhxintsik jn ani jn kal ejtal na tokat itsch.

Tattsik i jalkuntsidhichtsik an ta chalab jelti max i wachinkichtsik ti t, por yabich jelt xan tu wachinal xu chemeltsik, i jalkuntsidhichtsik an ta chalab kal nin kwintal na Dios. Jech nin kwintal na Dios, yab jayki neech ka okon.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Ejtal an atiklbtsik in junwal jelti an chojltsik, ani nin labdh, in junwal jelti nin wichl an chojl. An chojl u wayl ani an wich u chujkanal;
por nin kwintal an Okxlb, yab jayki neech ka okon.  Ani jech nin kwintal an Okxlb, jaich an alwa tilab xi tiltsidhichtsik.

Jaxtm, ka jilaichtsik ejtal xowa yab alwa, yabich ki kambixintsik ani yabich ka taja xata eb itschki. Yabich yejat ka chakuntsi ni jun xita kal tin kwentaki xowa in kool ani yabich ka tila yab alwa ni jun xita.
Anchan jelt xan ti jun i chakam xi t ti wachink ti chakam, in l tajat i leche, anchan teye ti ka lenatsik nin kwintal na Dios abal ka exlatsik ms na Dios ani ki loeytsik.
Ka tajatsik anchan, max ani lejtal ta bajmalichtsik ka exlantsi tin alwatal an Okxlb.
Pos ki utchtsik p ban Ajtiklb, jelti max exomtsik ta utel ba jun i tujub xi ejat. An iniktsik in pojka, por abal na Dios, jaich jun i tujub xi takudh ani kajbidh in jalbl.

Tattsik teye, xa junwaltsik jelti an tujub xi ejat, ka walkatsik ti ki yna na Dios abal kin taja kal tattsik jun i pulek at xon ti Jaj u kaknb. Abal ti ki kwajbatsik jeye ta ple xu dhabalbich kal Jaj, xin kwajbantsal ti pikbantsixtalb na Dios xi tl bin ejattal. Jech in tajltsik kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo.

Ani jaxtm an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Neech ku kwajba Sin jun xita xin junwal jelti an ultalb tujub xi kl ti tajadh an at, jun i tujub xi takudh ani kajbidh in jalbl; xita kl ti ka belan, yab neech ka tidhebdh.

Abal tattsik xi belomich, jech an tujub kajbidh tajat in jalbl; por abal xi yabtsik u belom, u tmnalich jelt xan tin ulal an Tokat Dhuslab ench: An tujub xi pojk kal an kbal attsik, jaich nin bajaw ka kwajay ms ultalb.

Ani u tmnalich jeye jelt xan tin ulal ench: Jun i tujub xu tadhkux ani u kwajlax. Pos jajtsik jelti max u tadhkunalichtsik abal yabtsik in tajl ti kij an tsubaxtalb.  Pos jaich abal jech ti takudhtsik.

Tattsik i takudh kal na Dios, i kwajattsik ta ple abal ka tjontsi an Pulek Takix, i kidhtalbichtsik xi tokat ani i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. I takudhtsik kal na Dios abal ka tila xowa labidh xin tajl na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi ti kldhatsik ban jikwaxtalb xon ta kwajattsikwiik ani ti kwajbatsik bin labidh tajx.
Tattsik yabwiik i exlbtsik kal na Dios, por xo, i dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj. Yabwiik a chobtsik max i kontsinal ti yajnantsixtalb kal na Dios, por xo, a chobichtsik.

Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, tattsik a junwal jelti atiklbtsik xu watelki ani kwajat ba jun i chabl xi yab jajtsik in dhabal. Tu pakabdhltsik abal yab ka walka ki ttsik kal xowa xin kulbetnl na tul, xi kwajat jelti max u pjx kal na ejattal.

Ki kwajaytsik echeki alwa kal xi yabtsik in exll na Dios. Anchan, maske xo ti tilltsik jelti max i atax iniktsik, tayl neech kin chuu an alwatalb xa tajltsik ani neech kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios tam kin bajaw xowki neech ti ljundhbtsik.
Kom i kanidhbichtsik kal an Okxlb, yabich ka chikat tajatsik ni jun i awiltalb xi tech ti kayl. Yab ka chikat tajatsik an pulek takix, kom plek in tj in kool tech ti kayl.
Yab jeye ka chikat tajatsik an pakdha awiltalb xu takyb kal an pulek takix abal kin yajlombdha xi atax iniktsik ani abal kin taja ka kakn xin tajltsik xowa alwa.
Pos na Dios in l kin chuu ka tajatsik xowa alwa abal yab ti ki tilatsik yab alwa xi yabtsik xata in chob ani yabtsik chalpadh.
Ki kwajaytsik jelti atiklbtsik xi walkadh, por yab ka ynatsik an walkadhtalb abal ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa. Yab ka tajatsik anchan, tokot ka tjontsaltsik na Dios.
Ka kaknatsik xitakichki, ka kanidha na at kidhbtsik, ka jiknatsik na Dios ani ka kaknatsik an pulek takix.
Tjontsixtsik, ka exbantsitsik xowa kin ulu na ajtiktsik, yab tokotki xi alwa iniktsik ani u chalpantsix. Ka exbantsitsik jeye xi yabtsik alwa inik.
Pos alwa tajat max jun xita kin kuxuy i yajtsiktalb maske yab in walmal, kal tin kwentaki abal in kaknlich na Dios.

Pos max ka tajatsik jun xata yab alwa ani ki yajlombdhtsik kal jachan tin kwenta, jantom alwatalb neech ka bachutsik maske ka kuxuy kal i chaattalb? Por max ki yajlombdhtsik abal a tajmal jun xata alwa, jech alwa tajat tin tamt na Dios max ka kuxuy kal i chaattalb.
Na Dios ti takwymaltsik abal ki xechintsik teye xan ti xechink na Kristo, pos na Kristo in watna i yajtsiktalb kal tattsik ta kwenta. Kal jech, ti pidhatsik jun i oktsixtalb abal jaich ka wwnatsik.
Jaj yab in tajm ni jun i walastalb nibal in kambiymal ni jun xita;
tam ti odhbijyat, yab tkon kal i odhbijixtalb; tam ti yajlombdh, yab tomnaxin, tokot in kwajba nin ejattal ba na Dios, xu ljundhom kal i lujattalb.
Na Kristo in jna ni walab tam ti chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te abal ku kwajch jelti max chemnek abal an walastalb ani ku kwajch lujat. Jaj in watna i yajtsiktalb abal ki wkontsatichtsik an ta walab.
Pos tattsik i xeechwiik jelti borregotsik xi kibchonk, por xo, i utenekichtsik ba na Kristo xi ti belkmichtsik jelt xan tu belkol jun i belkol borrego ani ti belkmtsaltsik jeye ta ejattaltsik.
Anchan teye tomkidh mmlbtsik, yab ka chikat tajatsik na tomkl. Yab ka chikat tajatsik maske yab in bell an tsubaxtalb, yab telab ka belmch jeye tam kin chuu xan ta kwajltsik maske yab ka tiltsitsik.
Neech ka belmchtsik tam kin chuu ke i kwajattsik tokat ani xitakichki a kaknltsik.
Yab tokotki ka eblidh tojojoy tab kal i alwa tsitsbaxtalb, kal i kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro o kal i kajbidh xeketlb abal ki chutat i alabl.
Yab ka tajatsik anchan. Ka koytsik ta itsch jelti jun i kwajbaxtalb xi yab jayki u kachel, an chaattalb ani an kaknaxtalb. Jech, jaich xowa in jalbl tin tamt na Dios.
Pos anchan jeye ti xechink ti wel chabki an mmlbtsik xi takudh kal na Dios; in beltsmaltsik na Dios ani yab in chikat tajmaltsik nin tomkl.
Anchan tin taja na Sara, yab in chikat taja nin tomkl Abraham ani in bijiy tin ajtik. Neechtsik teye ka bajaw ki kwajay jelti jaj max ka tajatsik xowa alwa ani yab ki kwajaytsik ta jikl.

Tomkidh paylomlbtsik, ki kwajaytsik kal na tomtal xan ti yejat ani in tsubtalki; ka kaknatsik na tomtal, yab tokotki abal jajtsik yab likdha. Ka kaknatsik abal jaychki jeye nin ejattaltsik in kool jelti xi tattsik ti pidhmal na Dios kal nin alwatalbil. Anchan ka tajatsik abal yab xata ti ki tamkuytsik tam ki kwajay ka kontsi jun xata na Dios.
Ki kwajaytsik kijidh ani ki kknxintsik jn ani jn; ki kndhxintsik jelti max a kidhbkitsik. Ki kndhxintsik ani ka koytsik i chaattalb.

Max jun xita ti ki tajtsi xowa yab alwa, yab ka witsbantsi; max jun xita ti ki odhbijiy, yab ka witsbantsi. Yab ka witsbantsal, tokot ka lbtajltsik, pos na Dios ti takwymaltsik abal ka bachu i lbtajaxtalb.
Pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Xita in kanidhl nin xechintal ani in l ka kwajay kijidh, yejat kin exbay xan ti ka kwin ani yab ka kambixin.
Yejat kin jila kin taja xowa yab alwa ani kin tajaich xowa alwa, kin aliy an kijidhtalb ani jaich kin wwna.
Pos an Okxlb in beletnl xi lujattsik ani in axtsal tam ka kontsin jun xata, por in pojkl xin tajltsik xowa yab alwa.
Jita neech kin ejto ti ki atax tajtsitsik, max tokot a tajltsik xowa alwa?
Por maske a watnltsik i yajtsiktalb kal tin kwenta abal a tajlichtsik xowa lujat, kijidh neech ki kwajaytsik. Yab xita ka jiknatsik, nibal ki jikeytsik,

tokot ka kaknatsik an Ajtiklb Jesukristo kal ejtal na itsch. Ki kwajaytsik echeki tojojodh abal ka tkoytsik xitakichki tam ki konyat kal tin kwenta an aytsixtalb xa kool kal na Kristo, por ka tajatsik kal yantam i chaattalb ani i kaknaxtalb.
Ki kwajajantsik alwa ani tsububudh a ejattal. Anchan, xi xeechtsik ti atax till kal tin kwenta xowa alwa a tajl abal a bellichtsik na Kristo, ka tidhebdh kal xowa in ulaltsik.
Max na Dios anchan tin l, ms alwa ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb abal a tajltsik xowa alwa k abal a tajltsik xowa yab alwa.

Pos na Kristo chemdh kal tin kwenta ni walab, jnlki abal malillich i kij. Jaj, jaich jun i lujat inik, por in watna i yajtsiktalb kal waw ti kwenta xi yab u alwa inik. In watna jech abal ti ku jna ba na Dios. Chemdh, por ejech ti t nin ejattal.
Nin ejattal kale jeye kin tiltsitsik an ti alwa tilab an ejattalbtsik xi kwajat ti wiknl.

Jechtsik jaich xin chikat tajmaltsik na Dios ti weje, tam ti xechin na No. Na Dios in koy nakat i aytsixtalb, lejat kwajat ti tajnal an tan at, xon ti loey chb x an atiklbtsik. Waxik xi lowat abal yab ka lupun tam ti juchuwat putl an chabl.

Jajtsik lowat kal an ja ani xo, waw u lowb kal tin kwentaki abal na Dios in ejdha ti t na Jesukristo. Kal an pujaxtalb, u xalkanal abal u loodhich ani u tokedhantsidhich ti itsch. An pujaxtalb yab jaich abal ti ku tokedhantsi ti tul, jaich abal ki kontsi na Dios ku kwajay kijidh ti ejattal.
Na Jesukristo kadhiy walki ani xo kwajat buxl tin ejt na Dios; ani kl tu takybtsik xo an tokat abatwletsik, an awiltalbtsik ani an pakdha chplb.

Jaxtm, anchan xan ti na Kristo in watna i yajtsiktalb bin tul, anchan teye ti yejat ki kwajaytsik tojojodh abal ka watna i yajtsiktalb. Pos xin bachmalich i yajtsiktalb bin tul, in jilmalich an walastalb
abal ka kwajch xan tin l na Dios ani yabich xan tin kulbetnl nin tul.

Yabich ms ka tajatsik xowa yab alwa xa tajltsikwiik xin kulbetnl tajat xi yabtsik in exll na Dios. Tam ti jachan i kij, i kwajinek xan ta lenmaltsik, a kymaltsik i chalab xi yab alwa, i uchmadhtsik ani a kymaltsik i ajib xi yab alwa, a watpiymaltsik ta uchl ani a kaknmaltsik i chilab.
Jajtsik u labnal abal in chutal xo ke yabich a tajltsik xowa yab alwa xi jajtsik in kulbetnl tajat kin taja, jaxtm xo ti atax tilltsik.
Por jajtsik neech kin pidhna nin walab ba na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi neech kin ljundha xi ejattsik ani xi chemnektsik.

Pos xi kwajattsik chemnek, tiltsidhtsik jech an ti alwa tilab abal ka kwajay ejat nin ejattal jelt xan ti na Dios kwajat ejat, maske neechwiik ka ejtowat ka ljundh ba tech an kayl jelti ejtal an iniktsik xi kwajat ejat.
An pakwenib exomich ti kunel. Jaxtm, ki kwajaytsik alwa ani ka ntsitsik ta l.
Ki kndhxintsik tajat jn ani jn, pos xita xu kanidhax, in pakwlantsal xowakichki yab alwa ka tajtsin.
Ki bchxintsik alwa ta kim jn ani jn.
Ki tlmxintsik jn ani jn xantiki ti pidhmaltsik ti awiltalb na Dios, jelti jun i alwa inik xin ynl alwa ejtal nin pakdha alwatal na Dios.

Max jun xita ka kwin, kin ulu xowaki u pidhnal kin ulu kal na Dios. Max jun xita ka tjontsixin, ka tjontsixin kal an chplb xu pidhnal kal na Dios. Ejtal xowa ka taja, ka taja tin bij na Jesukristo abal tin kaknabl na Dios xu takix malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhltsik tajat, yab ka lbnatsik an pakdha taktamixtalb xa achltsik, jelti max exom a tamwaltsik jun xata xi yab a exbayal.
Yab ka lbnatsik, tokot ki kulbtsik abal exom teye a watnltsik an yajtsiktalb xin watnmal na Kristo; abal ki kulbtsik jeye tajat, tam ka chutsitsik an tin labidh tokt tam tl.
Max ki atax tilantsik kal tin kwenta na Kristo, kijidhtsik tajat abal tattsik; pos nin labidh Tokat Ejattal na Dios kwajat kal tattsik. Jajtsik in odhbijyal a Dios, por tattsik a kaknl.
Jaxtm, ke ni jun xita xi tattsik kin watna i yajtsiktalb, abal u chemdhax, abal u kw, abal atax o abal xeech ti ochom kal xowa yab in kwenta.
Por max jun xita kin watna i yajtsiktalb abal in wwnl na Kristo, yab yejat ka tidheb, yejat tokot kin pubdhantsi tin bij na Dios kal jachan tin kwenta.
Pos in bajch an kij xowki neech ti ljundhb nin chakmiltsik na Dios. Ani max an ljundhaxtalb okox u tujl kal waw, ms ja neech tajat ti ljundhb xi yabtsik in tajl ti kij nin alwa tilbil na Dios.
Ani max xi lujattsik, tojlb ti neech ka loey, janty neech ka tmun kal xi ataxtsik ani u walablom?
Jaxtm, xi watnl i yajtsiktalb abal na Dios anchan tin l, yejat ki ntsi ki taja xowa alwa ani ki kwajba ni ejattal tin kubak na Dios. Jech na Dios, jaich xi tu tajmal ani Jaj, lujat Ja tajat.

Kom nan in takix belom neye, neech tu pidhatsik chb x ti tsubaxtalb xi kwajattsik teye ta takix belomtsik. Anchan jelt xan ta lnltsik ke na Kristo in watnmal i yajtsiktalb, anchan neye tu lnl kom u chumal. Ani neech neye ku bachu junax kal tattsik, an labidh tokattalb xi neech ka xalkan tayl.

Tu pakabdhltsik abal ka beletna alwa an belomtsik xa takyal; ka taja kal yantam i kulbtalb jelt xan ti na Dios in l. Yab ka tajatsik kal i chplb nibal abal a ltsik ka ta i tumn. Ka tajatsik jech kal yantam i kulbtalb,
yab jelti max tattsik a dhabal xi kwajat a belkmtsik, tokot ki kwajaytsik jelti oktsixtalb abal an belomtsik.
Anchan, tam ka witsiy na Jesukristo, xi jaich nin Takxal an takix belomtsik, neech ka bachutsik jun i tokat labidh chejwalixtalb xi yab in junwal jelti an kwetsotsl dhipadh chojl xu kachel.

Anl teye kwitltsik, ka exbantsitsik xowa ti ki utsa an takix belomtsik. Ejtal yejat ki kntsxintsik ti chaattalb jn ani jn, ka chakatsik tab, pos an Tokat Dhuslab in ulal ench: Na Dios yab in kulbetnl xin tekltsik tinb, por in tolmiyal kal nin alwatal, xin chakltsik tinb.
Ka chakatsik tab tin tamt na Dios, xin koolich ejtal tin chapni kubak abal Jaj ti ki tekbatsik, tam kin bajaw an kij.
Ka kwajbatsik tin kubak na Dios ejtal xowa a yntsal, pos Jaj ti kanidhltsik tajat.
Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta ani yab ki kwajaytsik ukpidh; pos an lej atax xeech jelti jun i kailom padhum in ayal xita kin kapu.
Ka kuxyaltsik ani yab ka jilatsik ka bela na Dios. Pos a chobichtsik ke na at kidhbtsik xi kwajat putlki an kayl, jaychki jeye in watnltsik.

Por tam tattsik ka watnaich w an yajtsiktalb, na Dios neech ti ki lujkutsik, neech ti ki tolmiytsik abal yab ka jila ta belom, neech ti ki likedhantsitsik an ta ejattal ani neech ti ki tolmiytsik abal ki kwajay tsububudh a itsch. Jech na Dios, xi plek tajat in awiltal in kool, tu kanymal abal ki bachu weye tin kwentaki na Jesukristo, an labidh tokattalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Jaj kin koy an labidh tokattalb ani Jaj ka takxin malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, junax kal na Silbano, xu exll abal jaich jun i kidhblb xi lujat tajat, tu dhutsuntsmaltsik jech an ti w abal tu takiytsik ani abal tu tiltsitsik ke jech xa bachmalichtsik, jaich nin tsubax alwatal na Dios. Ani jaich ka ntsitsik ka bela.
An belomtsik xi kwajat Babilonia, xi takudh jeye kal na Dios jelti tattsik, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Ti abtsal jeye ti chapndhomtalb na Markos nu chakmil.
Ki chpndhxintsik jn ani jn kal jun i tokat chapndhomtalb abal ka xalkan ke i kndhxtsik. Ki kwajaytsik kijidh ejtal tattsik xi kwajatich kal na Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xu bij Simn Pedro, tin tojnlil ani tin abatwlejil na Jesukristo. Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w, tattsik xa bajmalichtsik ka koy jun i belomtalb xi labidh tajat jelti xi waw i kool kom ni Diosil ani ni Loxil Jesukristo, lujattsik Ja tajat.
Ka bachwaltsik yn i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb kal tin kwenta abal a exlmalichtsik na Dios ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo.

Na Dios tu pidhmalich kal nin chp, ejtal xowa i yntsal, abal ku kwajay alwa ani abal ki kakna Jaj. U pidhnkich jech, kal tin kwenta abal tu tajmalich ki exla xi tu kanymal kal nin publ ani kal nin labidh tokt.

Kal tin kwentaki jech, u usnkich xanty neech ku pidhan, pakdha tajat ani labidh. Abal kal tin kwentaki xanty u usnk neech ku pidhan, ki bajaw ku kwajay jelti na Dios, tam i ejtmalich ki jila xowa yab alwa xi waach tech ti kayl xin kulbetnl ni tul.
Jaxtm, kom u belomich, ki taja an chplb abal ku xechin alwa; tam u xechich alwa, ki taja an chplb abal ki exla ms na Dios.

Tam i exllich ms na Dios, yejat ki taja an chplb abal ki ejto ki kuxuy xowa in lenl ni tul; tam i ejtowalich ki kuxuy xowa in lenl ni tul, ki koy an chaattalb; tam i koolich an chaattalb, ki kaknl na Dios.
Tam i kaknlich na Dios, ku kndhxin jn ani jn kal ni at kidhbtsik ani tam u kndhxich, ki kanidha jeye xitakichki.
Max i koolich ejtal jech ani jaich i tajl tajat, yab neech ku jilan ku kwajay aniki. Ani neech ka xalkan an alwatalb xi tajl kal tin kwenta abal i exllich an Ajtiklb Jesukristo.
Por xi yab in kool ejtal jech, in junwal jelti jun i jokol o jelti jun xita xi yab u chuux owdha; in uktsmalich abal wkontsidhich tin weje walastalbiltsik.
Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik, kom na Dios ti kanymalichtsik ani ti takwymalichtsik, ka tajatsik an chplb abal ki kwajajantsik anchan. Max ka tajatsik anchan, yab jayki neech ka jilatsik ta belom.
Anchan yabich tm neech ka koytsik ni jun i tamkuntalb abal ki ochichtsik xon tu takix ni Ajtik ani Loxil Jesukristo.
Jaxtm, yab neech ku jila tu witskontsitsik jech, maske a chobichtsik ani a bellichtsik an tsubaxtalb xi xo a kool.
Nan u chalpayal abal alwa, ke lejat xo bl in kwajat ejat, tu pidhatsik jech an ti tawnaxtalb,
pos ni Ajtik Jesukristo tin ltsmalich ke kunat i kij neech ku jila jech an kayl.
Por neech ku aliy xan ti ku uwa, abal maske in chemnekich, blki ka chalpayaltsik echeki ejtal jech.

An oktsixtalb xi tu pidhmaltsik kal tin kwenta nin chp ani xan ti neech ka tsch jun ni Ajtik Jesukristo, yab i ani tilabki xi wawki i chalpaymal, pos waw tajat i chumal kal ni wal nin labidh tokt an Ajtiklb.

I chumal tam ti na Dios an Ttalb in pidha ti kaknaxtalb ani ti labidh tokattalb; ani i axtsmal tin tokat kwintal na Dios tam tin ulu ench: “Jech jaich nu Chakmil xu kanidhl tajat ani in kwajat in kulbl tajat kal Jaj.”
Waw i achmal jachan an kwintalb xi tl walki, pos junax tu kwajat kal an Ajtiklb ban tokat chn.

I kool jeye jun xata xi ms tsubax, jaich xowa in dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik. Alwaich ta tajltsik abal a kulbetnl ka acha jech. Jech xowa in dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik, in junwal jelti jun i tajbaxtalb xi kwajat ban jikwaxtalb, asta kin bajaw an kij tam jelti max nechich ka tsudhch, kom an Ajtiklb xi kwajat jelti na pulek t, neech ti ku tajbantsch ti itsch.
Por ka exbaytsik okox alwa jech: Ke ni jun i tilab xin dhutsmal an tiltsixtsik ban Tokat Dhuslab, yab neech kin ejto kin wila jun xita kal jajki tin kwetm chalab.
Pos an tiltsixtsik yab jayki kwnktsik kal tin kwetm chalab. Kom u dhabalbtsik kal na Dios, in lnmalichtsik i tsubaxtalb xi tl ba Dios ijtsidh kal an Tokat Ejattalb.

Por anchan xan ti wachink i kambix tiltsixtsik ban atiklbtsik xi Israel, anchan jeye ti neech ka wachin kal tattsik i oktsixtsik xu kambix. Jech an oktsixtsik, neech kin chinat oktsixna jaluts xowa in ulal na Dios, asta neech kin kuxukna an Ajtiklb xi kl ti loodhtsik; ani jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti jikat neech ka kibdhtsik.
Kal yn ti neech ka wwnantsat an tin oktsixtaltsik ani kal jajkitsik tin kwenta, neech ka atax tilan an tsubaxtalb.
Kom jiklomtsik tajat kal an tumn, neech ti ki oktsitsik xowa yab lujat abal kin ejto ti ki kweytsik. Por jajtsik aytsmtejichtsik tajat kal an kibeltalb, kom bijtsidhich abal tajatsik neech.
Na Dios yab in pakwlantsi an tokat abatwletsik xin wala, in petnatsik ban kibeltalb ani in baliy ti wiknl ban jikwaxtalb. Taja kwajattsik in aytsm kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb.

Yab jeye in pakwlantsi an atiklbtsik xi ti weje, tokot in abtsi an ti chapik bal kij abal ka lupundh jachan an atax iniktsik. Tokot in loo na No kl xi bk nin kidhtaltsik. Jech na No, jaich xi xechin kin tila an lujat xechintalb.

Na Dios yab jeye in pakwlantsi an atiklbtsik xi kwajinek ban bitsowtsik xi Sodoma ani Gomorra. In tsika asta ti jilkon mapal jltey. Jech in taja anchan, abal ka jilkon jelti jun i ltsixtalb abal an atiklbtsik xin kulbetnl kin taja xowa yab alwa xi neech ka kwajaytsik tayl.
Por in loo na Lot, jun i lujat inik xi kwajat u tepinal tajat abal in chutal an walastalbtsik xin tajl jachan an atiklbtsik.
Tsudhey ka tsudhey jech an lujat inik, xi taja jeye ti kwajat kal jajtsik, u tepinal tin ejattal tam in chutal ani in achl an ataxtalb xin tajl jech an atax iniktsik.

An Okxlb in ejtowal kin loo an atiklbtsik xi kl tu kaknb abal yab kin watna i taktamixtalb; por an atiklbtsik xi atax, u kybichtsik tojojodh abal ka kale ban kibeltalb tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb.

Na Dios, ms neech kin pidhatsik ti yajtsiktalb ejtal xin tajltsik tokot xowa in kulbetnl nin tul, xin tajltsik xowa atax ani in pojkantsal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb. Tanchutsik tajat ani yabtsik tajat tidhelom; yabtsik in jiknl kin odhbijiy an ajtiklbtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki.
Ms an tokat abatwletsik, maske in kool ms i chplb ani i awiltalb, yabtsik in odhbijyal tin tamt an Okxlb an ajtiklbtsik xin kool i awiltalb kal xowakichki.

Por jech an atax iniktsik, in junwal jelti konltsik xi yab chalpadh, xi kwajat ani ejatkitsik ani u wachinal abal ka yakwan ani ka chemdhtsik. Jech an atax iniktsik in till yab exbadh xowa nibal jajtsik yab in exbayal, por neech ka chemechtsik jelt xan tu chemel an konltsik.

Neech ka pidhantsik kal na Dios xowa in lujyal, kal tin kwenta xowa yab lujat in tajmaltsik. In chalpayal ke kijidh ti kwajattsik kal xowa in tajltsik. Jajtsik jaich jun i tidhetalb ani i itixbdhomtalb tam ttsik jeye kwajat xon ta junkunaltsik ta kapul kom a bellichtsik an Ajtiklb, kom jajtsik in kulbetnl kin taja xowa in kulbetnl nin tul.
Yab neech kin ejto kin chuu jun i mmlb max yab kin lena; yab in jilltsik ti walablom. In kambiyal xi yabtsik bl u lej belom, in kulbetnltsik tajat ti chene ani ataxtsik tajat.

Kibchonktsik tajat ti xeech abal in jilmaltsik an alwa bl. In wwnantsmaltsik tin oktsixtal an tiltsix xin bij Balm, xu chakmlb kal na Beor. Jech na Balm, in lena kin taja xowa yab alwa abal kin ta i tumn; ani kwiyan kal jun i uxum burru xi m, abal jaj neech kin taja xowa yab alwa.
Tawn kal jech an konl jelt xan tu kw jun i inik ani yab walk kin taja xowa in chalpaymal.
Jech an atax iniktsik, in junwal jelti mom xi yab in kool i ja ani jelti tokow xu jnb kal i ik; jajtsik bijtsidhich abal neech ka kwajay malill i kij ban jikwaxtalb xi tunuy tajat.
Kal an tilabtsik xi yab alwa ani yab xata tu ynal, kal tin kwentaki xowa in ujnmalich kin taja ani xowa in kulbetnltsik nin tul, in kambiyal xi belmmadhichtsik ani in jilmalich ti walablom.

In utsltsik abal neech ka kwajay alwa xita kin wwna xowa in oktsixnltsik, por nibal jajtsik yab kwajat alwa, kom u kybtsik jelti max u jolib kal an walastalb. Pos an iniktsik u kyb jelti jolib kal xantokl ti ka t.

Por xita in exlmalich an Ajtiklb Jesukristo xi jaich ni Loxil ani in jilmalich an walastalb xi waach ban kayl, por tayl kin walka jun ka kambiyat kal an walastalb ani ka tantsat an tin chalab kal jech, u jilkonalich ms kibenek k tam ti kwajatwiik.
Pos msakwiik alwa abal jajtsik max yabak in exlmal an lujat bl k abal in exla ani tayl in jila kin taja xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios.
Pos tmunich kal jajtsik jelt xan tin ulal jun i tilab ench: “An piko u witsl kin chab kapu nin x ani an olom, tam ka okonich ti atsim, u tlk jun ban kut.”
Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, jech jaich in chabtal an dhutsadh w xi tu abtsaltsik. Kal chablam an dhutsadh w, tu takyaltsik abal ka koy alwa na chalab.
Ka chalpaytsik xowa in ulmal ms okox an tokat tiltsixtsik ani xowa ti oktsmal an abatwletsik kal tin kwenta nin takixtal an Ajtiklb xi jaich ni Loxil.
Ka exbchtsik okox alwa, ke tam exomich in bajwal xowki ti neech ka tsch jun an Ajtiklb, neech ka wachin i atiklbtsik xi neech ti labdhnax, xi neech ka xechin xan ti jajkitsik in kulbetnl
ani neech kin ulutsik ench: “Janty tmun kal xowa xin ulu na Kristo, ke Jaj neech jun ka tsch? Pos asta ti chemnek ni weje pakliltsik, yab xowa jalkunk, bl ani asta ti tajadh an kayl.”
Jech tin ulaltsik anchan, jaich abal yab in l kin exbaytsik ke an walki kejlejich ja kwajat asta ti weje ani kal tin kwintalki na Dios, eblin an chabl ban ja ani jilkon junax chejel.
Anl jeye, an ja xi kl ti luychiyat putl an chabl ani lupundh an atiklbtsik xi ti weje, tyki jeye ti tl ban ja.

Por an walki ani an kayl xi xo kwajat, bijtsidhich abal neech ka tsikan kal an kamal, kal tin kwintalki jeye na Dios. Kal jachan an kamal, kl ti neech ka tsikan an walki ani an kayl tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb, tam an atiklbtsik xi atax neech ka kibdhtsik.
Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, ka chobnatsik ke abal an Okxlb, xi jun a kts, abal Jaj, jyki max mil i tamub; ani xi mil i tamub, abal Jaj, jyki max jun a kts.

An Okxlb yab exom in owedhl xowa in ulmal neech kin taja, jelt xan ti taltsik in chalpayal. In owedhl, kom tu kontsal ti yajnantsixtalb; pos Jaj yab in l kin chuu ke ni jun xita ka kale ban kibeltalb, in l kin chuu ke ejtal kin jila ti walablom.

Por an Ajtiklb neech ka tsch tam yab xita in tlm, jelt xan tu ulel jun i kw tam akal. Neech tm ka pakchun an walki kal jun i kakadh kawidhtalb ani ejtal xowa waach, neech ka taay. Neech jeye ka taay an chabl ani ejtal xowa waach taja.
Kom i chobich abal ejtal neech ka taay, yejat ku kwajay tokat ani ki tajl xowa in l na Dios.

Lejat u kwajat i aytsm an kij xowki na Dios neech kin taja ejtal jech, ku kwajch alwa abal kin bajaw jikat jech an kij. Tam kin bajaw jech an kij, an walki neech ka tsikan ani ejtal xowa waach, neech ka mukan kal an kamal;
por waw u kwajat i aytsm an t walki ani an t chabl xi na Dios in ulmal neech ti ku pidha. Taja, tokot waach xowa lujat.
Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, lejat i kwajattsik a aytsm ejtal jech, ka ntsitsik ka taja xowa alwa abal na Dios ti ki elatsik tsububudh a itsch ani yab i walbidh.

Ka exbaytsik ke an aytsixtalb xi tu kontsal an Ajtiklb, jaich abal waw ku loey. Anchan jeye ti dhutsuntsmaltsik na Pablo, an kidhblb xi waw i kanidhl tajat. Ti dhutsuntsmaltsik xantiki ti pidhnk ti chalpadhtalb kal na Dios.

Ba nin dhutsadh wiltsik, ti tiltsmaltsik jaychki jech, maske taltsik tojlb tajat ka exbayat; jaxtm, taltsik xi yab u witom ani xi yabtsik u lej belom, in janwal an tsubaxtalb xin dhutsmal na Pablo, anchan jelt xan tin janwal jeye an tsubaxtalb xi kwajat dhutsadh ban Tokat Dhuslab. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti neechtsik ban kibeltalb.
Jaxtm, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, kom a okox chobnmalich ejtal jech, ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab ki kambiyat kal xi ataxtsik ani anchan, ka jilatsik ta belom.
Yab ka walkatsik ki kambiyat, tokot ka aliytsik xan ti ka bachu ms an alwatalb ani xan ti ka exla ms ni Ajtik ani Loxil Jesukristo. Ke Jajki kin koy an labidh tokattalb malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.

U dhutsl jech an dhutsadh w abal ka chobn ke jachan xu bijyb tin kwintal na Dios kejle tich ti kwajat tam ti yabl tajadh an chabl ani an walki. I axtsmal an tin kwintal, i chumal kal waw tajat i wal ani i takmal kal waw tajat i kubak. Jaj, jaich xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Jech xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xalk. Waw i chumal ani i lnmal, ke jech xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, kwajatwiik kal an Ttalb ani u xalkantsat.
I lnlich xo xowa i chumal ani i achmal abal ki kwajaytsik junini kal waw, jelt xan ti waw u kwajatich lejtal junini kal na Dios an Ttalb ani kal nin Chakmil Jesukristo.
Anchan p, tu dhutsuntsaltsik ejtal jech abal ki kwajay echeki i kulbltsik.
Jech jaich an tsubaxtalb xi tu oktsi na Jesukristo ani xo tu oktsaltsik teye: ke na Dios jaich na kwajat jelti an tajaxtalb ani yab waach ni w i jikwaxtalb ba Jaj.
Max ki ulu ke u kwajatich kal Jaj, por blki i tajl xowa yab alwa, u kambixichki tm ani yab tsubax xowa i tajl ani xowa i ulal.
Por max u kwajatich ban tajaxtalb jelt xan ti na Dios kwajat ban tajaxtalb, tsubax tm u kwajatich junini jn ani jn ani nin xichl nin Chakmil Jesukristo, tu wkontsal ejtal an ti walastalb.
Max ki ulu ke yab u walbidh, wawki i kambiyal tib, yab tsubax xowa i tajl ani xowa i ulal.
Por max ki ltsi na Dios ni walastalbil, neech ti ku pakwlantsi ani neech ti ku wkontsi ejtal an ti walastalb. Jaj in tajl Ja xowa kin ulu ani lujat Ja tajat.
Max ki ulu ke yab i walmal, i tajlich tm na Dios jelti max u kambix ani yabich i tajl jelt xan tin ulal nin kwintal.
Tsitsik chakmil, tu dhutsuntsal jech abal yab ka walatsik. Por max jun xita kin wala, i kool jun i kawintsxil tin tamt an Ttalb, jaich na Jesukristo, xi lujat Ja tajat.
Na Jesukristo, jaich an pikbantsixtalb abal ku pakwlantsat an ti walastalbil ani yab tokot xi wawki ni walastalbil, nin walabtsik jeye ejtal xi kwajattsik ban kayl.
Max i tajlich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios, tsubaxich tm ti exllich.
Por max jun xita in ulal: “Nan u exllich”, por yab in tajl xan tin ulal an takixtalb, u kambixki ani yab tsubax xowa in tajl ani xowa in ulal.
Por max i tajlich xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios, i bajmalich kin kakna na Dios in lujtalki; kal jech, i chobnl ke u kwajatich junini kal Jaj.
Xita in ulal ke kwajatich junini kal na Jess, yejat ka kwajay jelt xan ti Jaj xechin.

Kidhblbtsik, yab exom tu dhutsuntsaltsik jun i t takixtalb; tu dhutsuntsaltsik jaychki an takixtalb xa achmal tam ta tuju ka belatsik na Kristo. Jech an weje takixtalb, jaychki an takixtalb xa achmalichtsik tam ta tuju ta belom.
Por blki tu dhutsuntsaltsik jun i t takixtalb, xi tsubax abal na Kristo ani abal tattsik, pos an jikwaxtalb exomich ti wkwnal ani exomich ti tajkanal an tsubax tajaxtalb.
Xita in ulal ke kwajatich ban tajaxtalb, por in atl nin at kidhb, bl kwajat ban jikwaxtalb.
Xita in kanidhl nin at kidhb, kwajatich ban tajaxtalb ani yabich waach ni jun xata xantokl ti ka walbindh.
Por xin atl nin at kidhb, kwajat ani xeech ban jikwaxtalb ani yab in chob xon ti neech abal jokolbdhatsich kal an jikwaxtalb.
Tsitsik chakam, tu dhutsuntsal abal na Dios ti pakwlantsmalichtsik an ta walastalbil kal tin kwentaki na Jesukristo.

Ttalbtsik, tu dhutsuntsal abal a exllichtsik xi kejle tich ti kwajat tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajmal. Kwitltsik ani tsidhantsik, tu dhutsuntsal abal a tmalichtsik an lej atax. Tsitsik chakam, tu dhutsuntsal abal a bajmalichtsik ka exla an Ttalb.

Ttalbtsik, tu dhutsuntsmal abal a bajmalichtsik ka exla xi kejle tich ti kwajat tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajmal. Kwitltsik ani tsidhantsik, tu dhutsuntsmal abal i likdhatsik ani a bachmalichtsik ta itsch nin kwintal na Dios ani abal a tmalichtsik an lej atax.
Yab ka kanidhltsik xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, nibal ka ltendha xowa waach taja. Max jun xita in kanidhl xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, yabich tm u kalel in kaknl na Dios an Ttalb;
pos ejtal xowa waach yab alwa ban kayl, jelti xowa in kulbetnl ni tul, xowa i ltendhl ani xin tekltsik tinb, yab tl ban Ttalb, tl techki ban kayl.
An kayl neech ka okon kl ejtal an atax chalab xi waach taja; por xita in tajl xowa in l na Dios, neech ka kwajay malill i kij.

Tsitsik chakam, exomich in bajwal xowki neech ka witsiy na Jesukristo. A achmaltsik abal neech ka tsch jun xita xu atnal kl na Kristo; pos kom xo wachich yn xita kl tu atnal na Kristo, i chob abal exomich in bajwal xowki neech ka witsiy na Jesukristo.

Jajtsik ba waw i kidhtal ti kalnek, por yab tsubax waw i kidhtal; pos max wawak i kidhtal, in ntsmalak jeye kin belatsik na Kristo jelti waw. Por yab anchan ti tmun abal ka xalkan ke yab ejtalki waw i kidhtal.
Por tattsik i takudh abal ka bachu an Tokat Ejattalb ani a chobichtsik ejtal xowakich.
Tu dhutsuntsmaltsik abal a exllich an tsubaxtalb, yab abal yabtsik a exll ani a chobtsik, ke ni jun i kambixtalb u kalel ban tsubaxtalb.
Xu kambix, jaich xin ulal ke na Jess yab j an Kristo. Jech jaich xita kl tu atnal na Kristo, pos xi yab in bell an Ttalb yab jeye in bell an Chakmlb.
Ejtal xita yab in bell an Chakmlb, yab jeye in bell an Ttalb; por xita in bell an Chakmlb, in bell jeye an Ttalb.

Jaxtm, yab ka jilatsik an tsubaxtalb xa achmal tam ta tujutsik ta belom. Max yab ka jilatsik an tsubaxtalb xa achmal tam ta tujutsik ta belom, neech tm ki kwajaytsik teye echeki kal an Chakmlb ani kal an Ttalb.
