Ani na Jesukristo in ulmal abal neech ti ku pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Tu dhutsuntsmaltsik jech abal ka koy i kwenta kal xu kambixtsik.

Por tattsik a bachmalich an Tokat Ejattalb xi ti pidhmal na Jesukristo ani kwajat kal tattsik. Jaxtm ti yabich yejat ke ni jun xita ti ki oktsitsik; pos ejtal xowakich, Jaj an Tokat Ejattalb neech ti ki oktsi ani ejtal xowa in oktsixnl, tsubax, yab i kambixtalb. Pos ka ntsi ki kwajaytsik kal na Kristo jelt xan ti oktsal an Tokat Ejattalb.
Pos xo tsitsik chakam, ka ntsi ki kwajay kal na Kristo abal yab ku jikey tam Jaj ka xalkan ani yab ku tidheb tam ka tsch jun.
Ani max a chobichtsik ke na Jesukristo lujat Ja tajat, yejat jeye ka chobnatsik ke ejtal xita xin tajl xowa lujat, u chakmlbtsik kal a Dios.
Ka chuutsik xan tu kanidhb kal an Ttalb, ke asta u bijyb tu chakmlb kal Jaj. Jaxtm, xi yabtsik u belom, yab tu exll; pos yabtsik bl in exlmal na Dios.

Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, waw u chakmlbich kal na Dios ani yabl u xalkantsidh xan ti neech ku kale tayl. Por i chobich ke tam na Jesukristo ka xalkan, neech weye ki junu jelti Jaj, pos neech ki chuu xan ti jeye Jaj tajat.
Ejtal xita nin kool jech an aytsixtalb ba na Kristo, exomich in tokwal tinb, anchan xan ti Jaj tokat.
Ejtal xita in wall, in chikat tajtsalich tin takixtal na Dios, pos max ki wala, i chikat tajlich an takixtalb.
A chobichtsik ke na Jesukristo tsinek ban kayl abal ti ku wixkintsi an ti walastalbil ani Jaj yab in kool ni jun i walastalb.
Ejtal xi kwajatichtsik kal na Jesukristo, yabich in tajl an walastalb; por ejtal xin tajltsik an walastalb, yabl in chumal nibal in exlmal.
Tsitsik chakam, yab ka walka xita ti ki kambiy; xita in tajl xowa lujat, lujat jeye jaj, jelt xan ti na Jesukristo lujat.

Por xita in tajl i walastalb, jachan jaich xi teykmte kal an lej atax, pos an lej atax, jaich jun i walablom asta tam ti na Dios yabl xata in tajm. Jaich kal jech tin kwenta ti tsch nin Chakmil na Dios abal kin pakwtsi xowa in tajmal an lej atax.
Ejtal xu chakmlbich kal a Dios, yabich in tajl i walastalb, pos xu kidhtalbich kal na Dios, kwajatich kal Jaj. Yabich yejat kin tajl i walastalb kom u chakmlbich kal na Dios.
Tejwa xita j nu chakmlb kal na Dios ani tejwa jeye xita j nu chakmlb kal an lej atax; ejtal xita yab in tajl xowa lujat o yab in kanidhl nin at kidhb, yab u chakmlb kal a Dios.
An tsubaxtalb xa achmaltsik tam ta tujutsik ta belom, jaich jech: ku kndhxin jn ani jn.
Yab yejat ki taja jelti na Kan, xu kidhtalb kal an lej atax ani in chemdha nin kidhb. Ani jantki tin chemdha? Pos jaich abal xowa in tajl na Kan, yab alwa ani xowa in tajl nin kidhb, lujat.
Kidhblbtsik, yab ki laban max i atnal kal xi yab u belom.

Waw i chobich abal i jilmalich ti kx an cheml ani i bajmalich ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, pos i kanidhlich ni at kidhbtsik. Xita yab in kanidhl nin at kidhb, kwajat jelti max chemnek.
Ejtal xin atltsik nin at kidhb, in junwal jelti jun i chemdhax; ani a chobtsik ke ni jun i chemdhax, yab neech kin ejto kin koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Kal jech ti exll an kanidhaxtalb xi tu kontsal na Kristo, pos Jaj in pidhna tinb ka chemdh kal waw ti kwenta; anchan weye waw, yejat ki pidhna tib ku chemdh kal tin kwenta ni at kidhbtsik.

Por xita in kool xowa yejat tech ti kayl ani kin chuu nin at kidhb in yntsal xata ani yab kin kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb, jan ti neech kin xalka ke tsubax lejtal tu kanidhax jelt xan tu kanidhax na Dios?
Tsitsik chakmiltsik, max u kanidhax, yab yejat ki uluki; yejat ku kndhxin in tsubtalki ani ki xalka kal xowa i tajl.
Ench ti exll abal u kwajatich lejtal ban tsubaxtalb ani i chobich abal u kwajat kal na Dios.
Pos max i achl ti itsch ke yab u kwajat alwa, na Dios ms Ja plek ke ni itsch ani Jaj, in chob ejtal.
Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, max i achl ti itsch abal u kwajat alwa, ki chobna abal u kwajat alwa kal na Dios.
Jaj neech ti ku pidha ejtal xowa ki kontsi kom i tajl xowa in ulal nin takixtal ani abal i tajl jeye xowa Jaj in l.
Jech jaich xowa Jaj tu utsl ki taja: Ki bela nin Chakmil Jesukristo ani ku kndhxin jn ani jn jelt xan ti Jaj tu utsmal.
Xita in tajl xan tin ulal nin takixtal, kwajat kal na Dios ani na Dios kwajat kal jaj. I chob ke na Dios kwajat kal waw abal nin Tokat Ejattal xi tu pidhmal, kwajat kal waw.

Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, yab ka beltsitsik xitakichki xin ulal ke u kw ijtsidh kal a Dios, ka exlatsik okox alwa max ba Dios ti tl xowa in ulal o yaba. Pos exomich tajat ti wachinal ban kayl i kambix tiltsixtsik, xin ulal ke u kwtsik ijtsidh kal a Dios.
Ench ti neech ka ejtotsik ka exla xin kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios: ejtal xin ulal ke na Jesukristo tsinek tech ti kayl jelti jun i inik, jaich xin kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.

Por xin ulaltsik ke na Jesukristo yab tsinek jelti jun i inik, yab in kool nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios; jech jaich xi kl tu atnal na Kristo. A achmaltsik abal neech ka tsch ani xo kwajatichtsik ban kayl.
Tsitsik chakam, tattsik kal a Dios ta dhabalb ani a tmalichtsik jachan an kambixtsik; pos an Tokat Ejattalb xi kwajat ba tattsik, ms ja plek i awiltalb in kool k an ejattalb xi kwajat ban kambixtsik.
Jajtsik ban kayl tu kidhtalb, jaxtm ti tokot in tilltsik xowa waach ban kayl ani u axtsinaltsik kal xu kwajltsik ban kayl.
Por waw kal a Dios tu dhabalb. Xin exll na Dios, tu axtsal; por xi yab u kidhtalbtsik kal a Dios, yab tu axtsal. Kal jech ti neech ki ejto ki exla xita nin kool an Tokat Ejattalb ani xita nu kambix.
Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, yejat ku kndhxin jn ani jn; pos an kanidhaxtalb, ba Dios tu tsiil. Ejtal xu kanidhaxtsik, kal a Dios tu chakmlb ani in exll na Dios.
Xita yab u kanidhax, yabl in exlmal na Dios, pos na Dios, i kanidhax.
Na Dios in xalka abal tu kanidhl. Pos in aba nin junkax Chakmil ban kayl, abal kal tin kwenta nin junkax Chakmil, ki ejto ki koy an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
An kanidhaxtalb ench ti kwajat: yab waw i kanidhmal na Dios, Jaj tu kanidhmal ani in aba nin Chakmil ti pikbaxtalb abal anchan ku pakwlantsat an ti walastalbil.
Kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, max na Dios tu kanidhmal anchan, yejat weye ku kndhxin jn ani jn.
Na Dios yab jayki chuudh kal ni jun xita; por max ku kndhxin jn ani jn, na Dios kwajatich kal waw ani Jaj, jaich tu tolmiyal abal ku kndhxin ms.
I chob abal u kwajatich kal na Dios ani Jaj, kwajat kal waw abal tu pidhmalich an tin Tokat Ejattal.
Waw i chumal ani i ulal ke an Ttalb in aba nin Chakmil abal kin loo xi kwajattsik ban kayl.
Ejtal xita kin ulu ke na Jess jaich in Chakmil na Dios, kwajat kal na Dios ani na Dios kwajat kal jaj.
Anchan, i bajmalich ki exla ani ki bela ke na Dios tu kanidhl. Na Dios u kanidhax ani xita u kanidhax, kwajat kal a Dios ani na Dios kwajat kal jaj.
I bajmalich tajat ku kanidhaxin, jaxtm ti yabich u kwajat tu chalpax kal tin kwenta tam kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundhaxtalb; pos waw u kwajat tech ban kayl jelt xan ti jeye na Jesukristo.

Xon ti waach i kanidhaxtalb, yab waach i jkib. An kanidhaxtalb, in wixkiyal an jkib ba ni ejattal; pos an jkib, i yajtsiktalb. Jaxtm, max jun xita u jikl, jaich abal yabl in bajmal ti kanidhax xan ti yejat.
Waw i kanidhl na Dios abal Jaj tu kanidhmal okox.

Por max jun xita kin ulu: “Nan u kanidhl na Dios”, por in atl nin at kidhb; jachan, jaich jun i kambix. Pos max jun xita yab in kanidhl nin at kidhb xin chutal, jan ti neech kin ejto kin kanidha a Dios xi yab in chutal?
Jaj tu pidhmal jech an ti takixtalb: Xita in kanidhl na Dios, yejat jeye kin kanidha nin at kidhb.
Ejtal xita in bell ke na Jess jaich an Kristo, u chakmlb kal a Dios ani max in kanidhl an Ttalb, neech jeye kin kanidhantsi tin Chakmil.
Max i kanidhl na Dios ani ki tajl xowa Jaj tu utsl ki taja, i chobich tm abal i kanidhl xu chakmlbtsik kal Jaj.
Pos max i kanidhl na Dios, yejat ki axtsi an tin takixtal ani yab lej tojlb xowa tu utsl ki taja.
Ejtal xu chakmlbich kal na Dios, yab u tb kal xowa yab alwa tech ti kayl; nin belomtal jaich kl tu tolmiyb abal yab ka t kal xowa yab alwa tech ti kayl.
Xita in bell ke na Jess u Chakmlb kal a Dios, jaich nin ejtowal kin ta xowa yab alwa tech ti kayl.

Na Jesukristo jaich na tsch tech ti chabl ani pujan. In wakla jeye nin xichl ban peltsidh te. Yab tokotki pujan, in wakla nin xichl tam ti chemdh pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Anchan tu xalkb kal an Tokat Ejattalb, pos an Tokat Ejattalb echeki in xalkl xowa tsubax.
Waach x t walki xin xalkl ejtal jech: an Ttalb, xu bijyb tin Kwintal na Dios ani an Tokat Ejattalb; jech oxlam, jn tokot tu ynal.
Ani x jeye waach ban chabl xin xalkl jech: an Tokat Ejattalb, an pujaxtalb xin bachu na Jesukristo ani an cheml xin watna; jech oxlam, in lnl abal na Jesukristo u Chakmlb kal a Dios.
Max i beltsal xowa in ulal an iniktsik, ms ja yejat ki beltsi xowa in ulal na Dios, pos jech xowa in ulal na Dios, jaich kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil.

Xita in bell nin Chakmil na Dios, in beltsal xowa in ulal na Dios. Xita yab in beltsal na Dios, in tajlich ka xalkan jelti max u kambix abal yab in bell xowa na Dios in ulal kal tin kwenta nin Chakmil.
Jech jaich xowa in ulal na Dios: Ke Jaj tu pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani jech an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, kwajat ba nin Chakmil.

Xita in bachmalich nin Chakmil na Dios, in koolich jech an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal; por xita yabl in bachmal nin Chakmil na Dios, yab in kool jech an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech xa bellichtsik nin Chakmil na Dios abal ka chobna ke a koolichtsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
I chobich abal u kwajatich kal na Dios, pos max ki kontsi xata xan ti Jajki tin kulbetnl, tu axtsal.
Ani max i chobich ke na Dios tu axtsal tam ki kontsi xata, i chobich jeye ke neech ti ku pidha xowa ni kontsmal.

Max jun xita kin chuu ke nin at kidhb exom in wall, por yab lej plek an walastalb xi exom in tajl, yejat kin kontsintsi abal ka pakwlantsat kal na Dios. Na Dios neech kin pidha ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal jech an kidhblb, max jaich jun i walastalb xi yab lej plek. Waach i walastalb xu jnax ban kibeltalb, kal jech an walastalb, yab exom u ulal ka kontsin na Dios abal kin pakwlantsi xita in tajl jelti jech an walastalb.
Ejtal xowa yab alwa, i walastalb; por waach i walastalb xi yab u jnax ban kibeltalb.
I chobich ke xita xin kool na Dios jelt in Tta, yabich in tajl an walastalb; pos belkmtejich kal nin Chakmil na Dios ani yabich u taknal kal an lej atax.
I chobich ke waw u dhabalbich kal a Dios ani ejtal xita yabtsik u belom, teykmtetsik kal an lej atax.

I chobich ke nin Chakmil na Dios tsinek ani tu pidhmal ti chalab abal ki exla na Dios xi tsubax. Ani xo u kwajatich kal na Dios xi tsubax, kal tin kwentaki nin Chakmil Jesukristo. Jech jaich na Dios xi tsubax ani Jaj jaich nin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Tsitsik chakam, yab ka belltsik an chilabtsik. Anchan ka tjan.

Nan, xin pulektalbich tajat, u dhutsuntsal jech an ti w an mmlb xi takudh kal na Dios ani nin chakmiltsik jeye. Jaich xi tsubax lejtal tu kanidhltsik tajat. Yab nanki, u kanidhb jeye kal ejtal xin exlmalichtsik an tsubaxtalb.
Tu kanidhltsik kal tin kwenta an tsubaxtalb xi koolich ani neech ka kwajay kal waw malill i kij.
Ka bachwaltsik an alwatalb, an yajnantsixtalb ani an kijidhtalb xin pidhnl kal i tsubaxtalb ani kal i kanidhaxtalb na Dios an Ttalb ani ni Ajtik Jesukristo, xu Chakmlb kal an Ttalb.
In kulb tajat abal u ela taltsik na chakmiltsik kwajajadh xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb, jelt xan ti na Dios an Ttalb tu utsl ku kwajay.
Ani xo mmlb, tu lej kontsal abal ku kndhxin jn ani jn. Jech xowa tu dhutsuntsal yab i t takixtalb, jaychki an takixtalb xu pidhnk asta tam ti tujuki tu belom.
U xalkanal abal u kanidhaxich tam ku kwajch xan tin ulal nin takixtal na Dios. An takixtalb jaich xi achmalich kejle asta tam ti tujuki tu belom, ke yejat ku kwajay u kndhx.
Yn waach ban kayl i kambixtsik, xin ulal ke na Jesukristo yab tsinek ban kayl jelti jun i inik. Xin ulal anchan, jaich an kambix ani jech, jaich xu atnal kl na Kristo.
Ka koytsik tajat i kwenta abal yab ka kibdhatsik an tojlb xa tajmal ani ka bachutsik kidhat na chejwalb.

Xita xu okxinal kal an chalab abal in chalpayal ke ms in chob ani yab in wwnantsal tin oktsixtal na Kristo, yab kwajat kal a Dios; por xita xin wewkm nin oktsixtal na Kristo, kwajat kal an Ttalb ani kal an Chakmlb jeye.
Max jun xita ka ulich ti ki lnatsik ani yab in oktsixnl nin oktsixtal na Kristo, yab ka bachutsik nibal ka chapndhatsik kal yantam i kulbtalb;
por xita kin bachu ani kin chapndha kal yantam i kulbtalb, u kalelich jeye tm in tajl xowa yab alwa.

U kool tajat yn xata xowa u l tu utsatsik, por yab u l tu utsa dhutsadhki ba jun i w; pos u chalpayal kin kale tu lnatsik abal ku tilololch junax kal tattsik ani anchan, ms plek an kijidhtalb ki acha.
Nin chakmiltsik an mmlb xu belomich, xi takudh kal na Dios, ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Anchan ka tjan.
Nan, xin pulektalbich tajat, u dhutsuntsal jech an ti w nu jab xin bij Gayo, xi tsubax lejtal u kanidhl tajat.
Kidhblb xi tu kanidhl tajat, u kontsal na Dios abal ti ki tolmiy kal ejtal xowa a tajl ani ki kwajay juntam aniki, anchan xan ti na ejattal kwajatich alwa abal i belmmadhich.
Pos in kulb tajat tam ti ulich an kidhblbtsik ani tin tiltsitsik abal i kwajat in lujtalki jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb.
Yab waach ni jun xata ms xowa tin kijidhmdhl, tokot tam ku acha ke an belomtsik xi kwajat jelti u chakmiltsik kwajajadhtsik in lujtalki jelt xan tin ulal an tsubaxtalb.
Kidhblb xi tu kanidhl tajat, lujat tajat xan ta tajl tam a tjontsal an kidhblbtsik, ms xi pltsik ti tl.
Jajtsik in tilmal tin tamt an kidhblbtsik xan ta kanidhltsik. Ani alwa tajat ka tolmiytsik kal xowa in yntsaltsik abal kin ejtotsik kin ntsi an bl, pos jech jaich nin kulbetnl na Dios.
Pos jajtsik kalnek abal kin tjontsitsik na Jesukristo ani yab in bachkuntsmaltsik ni jun i tolmixtalb xi yabtsik u judo.
Jaxtm ti yejat ki tolmiy jelti jech an kidhblbtsik abal kin ntsi ka xechintsik kin tila an alwa tilab.
Nan u abtsitsik jun i dhutsadh w an belomtsik, por na Ditrefes, xin kulbetnl ka kwajay ti oklek kal an belomtsik, yab in tajl ti kij an awiltalb xi tu pidhmal an Ajtiklb.

Jaxtm, max kin kale tu lnatsik, neech ku tawna na Ditrefes abal in ulal i januts kw kal waw ti kwenta. Ani yab tokot jki in tajl, anl jeye yab in bachwal an kidhblbtsik xu ulel ti tonel tin kim. Ani an kidhblbtsik xin lenl kin bachu an toneltsik, in taxkantsal ani yabich tm in walkl ka ochich xon tu junkunal an belomtsik.
Kidhblb xi tu kanidhl tajat, yab ka wwna i oktsixtalb xi yab alwa, tokot ka wwna xi alwa. Xita in tajl xowa alwa, kal a Dios tu dhabalb; por xita in tajl xowa yab alwa, yab in exll a Dios.
Kal ejtalki tu tilnal alwa na Demetrio, abal tokotki in tajl xowa in ulal an tsubaxtalb. Waw i chumalich weye jech ani a chobichtsik abal tsubax xowa i ulal.
Jab Gayo, u kool tajat yn xata xowa u lwiik tu utsa, por yab u l tu utsa dhutsadhki;
pos u chalpayal kin kale tu lna jikat ani tm neech tu tiloll.
U l ki kwajay kijidh. An jaublbtsik xi tech u kwajl ti abtsaltsik ti chapndhomtalb. Tu kontsal ti alwatalb, abal ka chapndha juntsik ti juntsik ejtal ni jabtsik xi tachan u kwajl.

Nan, xu bij Judas, nin kidhb na Jakobo, in kwajat u tjontsal na Jesukristo. Tu dhutsuntsaltsik jech an ti w tattsik xi takudhich kal na Dios an Ttalb ani i dhabalbichtsik kal Jaj. Ti beletnltsik alwa abal i kwajatichtsik kal na Jesukristo.
Ka bachwaltsik yn i yajnantsixtalb, i kijidhtalb ani i kanidhaxtalb.

Kidhblbtsik xi tu kanidhl tajat, u lenmal tajat tu dhutsuntsi kal tin kwenta an loeltalb xi nan ani tattsik i kool. Por xo u chutal ke yejat tajat tu dhutsuntsi abal tu utsatsik ke yab ka walka ki tantsat nw an ta belomtal xi pidhnktsik abal echekijich, kom i dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.

Pos taltsik i atiklbtsik xin wynl u belom, ochenektsik kal an kidhblbtsik xi tsubax lejtal tu belom. Jech jaich xu tilnaltsik asta ti weje ke neech ka kale ban kibeltalb. Jajtsik yab alwa iniktsik, in ynl nin alwatal na Dios abal kin taja xowa yab alwa; in pojkltsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo xi Jaj tu dhabal ani na Dios jeye xi junkax Jajki in kool an awiltalb.
U l tu chalpantsi maske a chobnmalichtsik ke an Okxlb in kldha Ejipto an atiklbtsik xi Israel, por tayl in kibdhatsik xi yab belmch.

Ka chobnatsik jeye ke an tokat abatwletsik xin chikat taja xant in y ti tajadhtsik ani yab kwajaytsik xon ti bijtsin, xo u kyb ti wiknl kal na Dios ban jikwaxtalb xi yab in kool in okontal, in aytsm kin bajaw xowki neech an ljundaxtalb.

Anl jeye an bitsowtsik xi Sodoma ani Gomorra ani an bitsowtsik xi taja kunat, in walatsik jeye jelti jech an tokat abatwletsik. U junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, u junkunaltsik i inik kal in at inik ani i mmlb kal in at mmlb; ani xo kwajattsik ban yajtsiktalb. Dhutsadh xowa tajtsinktsik kal na Dios abal yab ki taja weye anlki.
Anchan jeye, jech an iniktsik xin oktsixnl xowa jajkitsik in chalpayal, in choyalich nin tul kal xowa atax in tajl. In pojkantsal tin awiltal an Ajtiklb ani in odhbijtsal tin y an tokat abatwletsik.
Pos nibal an oklek tokat abatwle Miguel, tam ti kwajat ti pjx kal an lej atax in kntsxnl nin tul na Moiss, yab in utsa ti odhbijixtalb an lej atax, tokot in utsa ench: “Ke an Okxlb ti ki kwiya.”
Por jech an iniktsik, in odhbijyal xowa jajtsik nibal ela in exll. In junwal jelti konltsik xi tokot in tajl xowa in kulbetnl in tul ani jaich kal jech tin kwenta tin kibdhltsik tinb.

Chojontl in chubltsik! abal in wwnmal xowa in taja na Kan. Kom in ltsik kin ta i tumn, in taja jeye jelt xan tin taja na Balm. Kibeytsik jelt xan ti kibdh na Kor; pos jech na Kor, jaich jun i tomnax inik.

Xi jechtsik, u tidhebdhomtsik tajat tam ka ulich xon ta kwajattsik ta kapul junini abal a kaknlichtsik an Ajtiklb. Jajtsik in kulbetnl ti okox kapultsik abal ka ajw ani yab in dhltsik ti kwenta max waach keet xu kaltsik ani in l jeye ti kapul. In junwal jelti an tokow xi yab in kool i ja xu beldhb kal an ik; in junwal jeye jelti an tetsik xi yab u walim, xu kwajlb puudh asta bin ibl ani u wayl.

In junwal jelt in dhujl an ja xin xalkl tam u mlk chapik ban pujal. Anchan jeye tu xalkanal an ataxtalb xin tajl jech an iniktsik. In junwal jelti a ttsik xin kibdhmal in blil; kom kibchonkichtsik tajat, neech ka kwajaytsik xon ti lej jikwaxich tajat malill i kij.
Na Enok, an inik xin bklb ms tayl k na Adn, in tila jechtsik ijtsidh kal a Dios tam tin ulu ench: “U chuu an Ajtiklb tam ti tl kal yn i mil i tokat abatwletsik
abal kin ljundha ejtalkitsik ani kin abna ban kibeltalb an atax iniktsik kal tin kwenta xowa yab alwa in tajmal. Jechtsik, jaich an walablomtsik xin tomnmal ani in odhbijymal na Dios.”

Jechtsik u tilax ani u itixbltsik kal xowakich, tokot xeech xan ti jajkitsik in kulbetnl. In till ke jajtsik ulutstsik tajat ani in till alwa taltsik an atiklbtsik abal in l kin chuu xanty kin ejto kin jixtsi.
Por tattsik, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, ka chalpay ke nin abatwlejiltsik ni Ajtik Jesukristo, ti okox utsmalichtsik ench:
“Tam u kunelich an pakwenib, neech ka wachin i atiklbtsik xi neech ti labdhnax ani neech kin taja tokot xowa jajkitsik in kulbetnl.”
Jechtsik, jaich nin tajltsik an kxtalb; tokot in tajltsik xowa in l nin tul ani yab in kool tin itsch nin Tokat Ejattal na Dios.
Por tattsik, kidhblbtsik xi kn tajat, ki kwajajantsik lujat kal an tokat belomtalb xa kool ani ki lantsik kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb.
Anchan neech tm ka ejto ki kwajajantsik bin kanidhaxtal na Dios, a aytsm kin bajaw xowki ni Ajtik Jesukristo, kal nin yajnantsixtal, neech ti ku pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
Ka tolmiytsik kin exbay xita yabtsik in lej bell.
Xi keettsik, ka tolmiy ka loey abal yab ka kaletsik ban kibeltalb. Ani ka kontsi ti yajnantsixtalb xi keettsik; por ka koy i kwenta abal yab ki chon kal an walastalb xin tajltsik.

Na Dios in kool an awiltalb ti ku beletna abal yab ku kwajlan ban walastalb ani ti ku utu u tokat ani u kijidh bin labidh tokt. Jaj jaich nu junkax Dios ani chalpadh tajat. Jaich xi tu lom kal tin kwentaki ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Ke jech na Dios, kin koy an labidh tokattalb, an takixtalb, an awiltalb ani Jajki ka kwajay echeki ultalb malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.

Jech jaich xowa na Dios in xalkantsi na Jesukristo abal kin pidha kin chobna nin tjontsixiltsik xowa neech ka tmun kunat i kij. Na Jesukristo in aba nin tokat abatwlejil abal ka xalkantsat na Juan jech an ti xalkantsixtalb.
Jech na Juan, nin tjontsixil na Jesukristo, jaich xin tilmalich nin kwintal na Dios, in lnmal xowa in tajmal na Jesukristo ani ejtal xowa in chumal.
Kijidh tajat abal xita kin ajay, kin exbay jech an tiltsixtalb ani kin taja xowa jech kwajat dhutsadh, pos an kij exomich ti kunel.

Nan, xu bij Juan, u dhutsuntsal an belomtsik xi kwajattsik ba bk i bitsow xu taknaltsik ban chabl xi Asia. Ka bachutsik i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Dios, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij ani xi tl jeye ba bk an ejattalbtsik xi kwajat tin tamt nin tokat kwajtal na Dios.

Ka bachutsik jeye i alwatalb ani i kijidhtalb xi tl ba na Jesukristo an lujat ltsix, xi okxink ka ejech ti t abal yabich jayki ka chemech ani xin kool i awiltalb kin takiy i pakdha takix xi tech ti kayl. Na Jesukristo tu kanidhl, tu wixkintsmalich an ti walastalbil kal nin xichl,
ani tu tajmalich tu pakdha takix ani tu ple abal ki tjontsi nin Tta Dios. Ke an labidh tokattalb ani an awiltalb kin koy Jajki malill i kij! Anchan ka tjan.
Ka achatsik, na Kristo neech ka tsch ban tokow! Kal ejtal ti neech ka chutat, asta kal xi kl ti chojbdhats. Ejtal an atiklbtsik xi ban kayl neech ka ukintsik tam kin chuu. Ani anchan neech ka tmun.
“Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal”, anchan tin ulal an Ajtiklb xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja ani xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.

Nan, xu bij Juan, tu at kidhbtsik neye ani exom u watnl an yajtsiktalb jelti tattsik. In taknlich neye kal na Dios ani exom u watnl xowakichki kal tin kwenta na Jesukristo. In kwajat tin wiknl ban chakam chabl xin bij Patmos xi kwajat ban ja. In kwajat tin wiknl abal u till an alwa tilab ani abal u till jeye xowa in tajmal na Jesukristo.
Jun i domingo, xi jaychki jelti na kts tam ti ejech ti t an Ajtiklb, in jilkon teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb ani u acha tu kx jun i kawidh kwintalb, jelt xan tu jsnal i korneta,

xu kw tin utsa ench: —Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal. Ka dhutsa ba jun i w xowa exom a chutal ani ka abtsi an belomtsik xi kwajat ba bk an bitsow xu taknaltsik ban chabl xi Asia. An bitsowtsik xi Efeso, xi Esmirna, xi Prgamo, xi Tiatira, xi Sardis, xi Filadelfia ani xi Laodisea.
In chawkin abal ku chuu xitam j tin tawnl ani tam tin chawkin, u chuu bk in kb i bla xi tajadh kal i oro.
Junax chejel ba jachan bk in kb an bla, u chuu jun i inik xeketlidh kal jun i xeketlb xi bodhl asta bin akan ani in wkm bin itsch jun i wikaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro.
Nin xil dhakni tajat jelt in dhak xil i borrego o jelti an chm ani nin wal jelti i kamal.
Nin akan chaxixl jelti i bdhits patl xin bij bronse, xi xokadh ba jun i jorna; ani nin kwintal, kawidh jelti tam u bososl yn i ja.
Bin ejt kubak in kool bk a ttsik ani bin wi u kalel jun i chupidh macht xi tamatki ti wiidh. Putl nin wal in junwal jelti na kts tam tajax tajat.
Tam tu chuu, in kwajlan bin akan jelti max in chemnek. Por Jaj tin puntsi an tin ejt kubak ani tin utsa ench: —Yab ki jikey, Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal.
Nanich xin kwajat ejat, in chemdh, por xo in kwajatich ejat abal malill i kij. Nan u tantsmalich tin awiltal an cheml ani xon tu kalel an chemlomtsik.
Ka dhutsa xowa a chumal, xowa a chutal ani xowa neech ka chuu tayl.

Jech jaich xowa kwajat yab tejwa ba xi bk na t xa chuu bu ejt kubak ani xi bk in kb an bla xi tajadh kal i oro: xi bk na t, in l kin ulu i ltsixtsik abal an belomtsik xi kwajat ba bk an bitsow; ani xi bk in kb an bla, in l kin ulu an belomtsik xi kwajat ba bk an bitsow.
Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Efeso: “Ench tin ulal xin kool bk na ttsik bin ejt kubak ani xi xeech junax chejel ba xi bk in kb an bla xi tajadh kal i oro:
Nan u chob xowa a tajl, u chob abal chapik tajat tin tjontsal, a kuxyal xowakichki ani yab tajat a kulbetnl xi yabtsik alwa inik. A chumalich ke xin ulaltsik u abatwle, yab tsubax ani u kambixtsik.
A watnmal i yajtsiktalb, a kuxymal xowakichki, i tjnkich tajat kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab i chekenek.
Por u chutal jun xata yab alwa xowa a tajm: yabich tin kaknl jelt tam ti jidhtal.

Jaxtm, ka chalpay xowa yab alwa a tajl, ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa ani ka tajaich jun xowa a tajlwiik tin jidhtal. Pos max yab ka jila ka taja xowa yab alwa, neech kin kale jikat tu chuu ani neech ku wkoy nin kb na blajil xon ti kwajat.
Por a kool jun xata alwa, a pojkl xowa in tajl an nikolatas, xi Nan u pojkl neye.

Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik: Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku pidha kin kaptsi tin wall an te xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech an te, kwajat xon tu takix na Dios.”
Ka dhutsuntsi an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Esmirna: “Ench tin ulal xi Jajich nin tujtal ani in okontal, xi chemech ani ejech ti t:
Nan u chob xowa a tajl; u chob an yajtsiktalb xa watnl ani abal i chojontl, por yab i chojontl. U chob xan ti odhbijyal xin ulaltsik ke u judo, por yabtsik u judo, in atiklbil i lej atax.

Yab ka jikna an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka watna. An lej atax neech kin taja ka balyat ban wikaxte taltsik xi tattsik abal ki chutattsik max tsubax lejtal tin belltsik ani neech ka watnatsik i yajtsiktalb tin nakl lju a kts. Por yab ka jalkuy na chalab, ka ntsi ti kin bela maske ki chemdh ani Nan, neech tu pidha an ti xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik: Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, yabich neech kin chuu an cheml xin chabtal.”
Ka dhutsuntsi an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Prgamo: “Ench tin ulal xin kool an chupidh macht xi tamatki ti wiidh:

Nan u chob xowa a tajl ani u chob abal i kwajl xon tu takix an lej atax, por blki a ntsal ti kin bela. Yab a jilmal ti kin bela, nibal tam ti xechin na Antipas nu lujat tjontsixil. Jech na Antipas, chemdh xon ta kwajltsik, tachan xon tu takix an lej atax.

Por u chutal taltsik xowa yab alwa a tajl: a kool tachan Prgamo chb x xi yab in l kin jilatsik nin oktsixtal na Balm. Jech na Balm, jaich xin oktsi na Balak abal kin taja kin wala an israelitatsik, in utsa kin kaputsik xowakich xi pikbantsidh an chilabtsik ani ka kwajaytsik yab exbadh.
T jeye a kool tachan xi yabtsik in l kin jila nin oktsixtal an nikolatas, xi Nan u pojkl.
Jaxtm, ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa, pos max yab ka taja anchan, neech kin kale jikat tu lna ani neech ku pjeytsik kal an macht xu kalel ba nu wi.

Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik: Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku pidha kin kapu an kapnl xi painek walki xi kwajat chinat ani neech ku pidha jun i chakam dhak tujub. Ba jech an chakam tujub, neech ka kwajay dhutsadh jun i t bijlb xi yab xita in exll, tokot xita kin bachu.”
Ka dhutsuntsi an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Tiatira: “Ench in ulal nin Chakmil na Dios, xin kool in wal jelti kamal ani nin akan jelti i bdhits patl xin bij bronse:
Nan u chob xowa a tajl, u exll xan ta kanidhax, xan ta belom, xan ta tjontsix, xan ta kool i chaattalb ani abal xo ms exomich a tajl xowa alwa k tam tin jidhtal.

Por u chutal jun xata yab alwa xowa a tajl: a walkl kin taja xowa yab alwa jachan an uxum xin bij Jesabel, xin ulal ke jaj in tiltsxil a Dios. Jaj in kambiyal ani in oktsal nu tjontsixiltsik abal ka kwajaytsik yab exbadh ani kin kaputsik xowa u pikbantsb an chilabtsik.
Nan u aytsmalich tajat jachan an mmlb abal kin jilaich ti kwajl yab exbadh, por yab in l kin jila.
Jaxtm, neech ku yaundha jachan an mmlb ani neech ku taja kin watnatsik i yajtsiktalb xin wwnantsal tin oktsixtal max yab kin jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa u oktsinal.

Neech ku walka ka chemdh xita junaxtsik kal jech an mmlb. Anchan, ejtal an belomtsik neech kin chobna ke Nan u exlantsal xowa in chalpayal ani xowa in achl tin itsch jun xita. Juntsik ta b neech tu pidha xowa a lujyaltsik ka bachu kal tin kwenta xowa a tajmal.

Por xi ms na kidhtaltsik xi kwajattsik jeye Tiatira, xi yabtsik in wwnmal jachan an oktsixtalb nibal in exlmaltsik xi jajtsik in bijyal tin tekat chalpadhtal an lej atax, u utsltsik abal yab ms xata u punkuntsal.
Por ka ntsi ka bela xowa Nan tu oktsmaltsik, asta kin bajaw xowki neech kin tsch jun.
Xita kin ntsi kin taja xowa Nan u tajl asta kin bajaw an pakwenib, neech ku pidha ti awiltalb ti takix ban atiklbtsik.

Anchan jelt xan ti nu Tta tin pidhmal ti awiltalb tin takix, anchan jeye neech ti takixtsik. Neech kin koy tajat i awiltalb ti takix ani xita kl ti ka tomn, neech kin muu jelt xan tu mwb jun i pats xi tajadh kal i kut.
Neech jeye kin koy xowa Nan u kool xin kwajat jelti na pulek t xu kalel tam dhajaw.
Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”

Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Sardis: “Ench tin ulal xin kool xi bk nin ejattal na Dios ani bk a t: Nan u chob xowa a tajl, u tilnal abal tin belltsik ani a kooltsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, por yab tsubax, pos i kwajattsik jelti max i chemnek.
Ka chalpch jun ti t ani ka tajaich in tsubtal xowa a tajl abal a Dios, pos jech xowa a tajl, kwajat jelti max nechich ka chemech. U chumalich ke xowa a tajl, yab lej lujat tin tamt na Dios.

Ka chalpay ani ka ntsi ka wwna an tsubaxtalb xan ta oktsink. Ka ntsi ka wwna an tsubaxtalb ani ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa, pos max yab ka taja anchan, neech kin kale jelti jun i kw xon ta kwajat ani yab neech ka chobna xowa i ora.
Por waach taltsik tachan Sardis i atiklbtsik xi yab in tajmaltsik xowa yab alwa, jajtsik neech ka xechin kal Nan xeketlidhtsik kal dhakni, pos anchan tin tomnltsik ka xechin.

Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ka xeketliyattsik kal dhakni ani yab neech ku pakwtsitsik tin bij ban w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh xi neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Neech ku lnantsitsik tin bij tin tamt nu Tta ani tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik.
Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”

Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Filadelfia: “Ench tin ulal xi Tokat ani Tsubax, xin kool an awiltalb jelti xin kymal an pulek takix Dabid, xi tam kin japiy an wileb, ni jun xita yab in ejtowal kin mapuy ani tam kin mapuy, ni jun xita yab in ejtowal kin japiy:
U chob xowa a tajl. Jaxtm tu kwajbmal ta tamt, jun i wileb japidh xi yab xita neech kin ejto kin mapuy; pos maske yab yn ta b, yab a chikat tajmal nu kwintal ani yab a tidhenmal ti kin tila.
Waach xin wwnltsik an lej atax, xin ulaltsik ke u judo, por yab tsubax. Neech ku utu kal tattsik ani neech ku taja ka tudhlantsik ta tamt abal kin chobna ke tu kanidhltsik.

Kom a kuxymal ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta, jaxtm ti neech tu tolmiy abal yab ka watna an yajtsiktalb xi neech ka tsch abal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ba putl an kayl. Jech an yajtsiktalb, neech ka tsch abal ka chutat kal na Dios xan ti kwajat ejtal an atiklbtsik xi tech ti chabl.
Kunat i kij neech kin tsch. Yab ka jila ti kin bela abal yab xita ti ki kntsi xowa neech ka ta.

Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku kwajba jelti jun i akanlb ban at xon tu kwajl nu Diosil ani yab ms jayki neech ka kale taja. Neech ku dhutsa ba jaj nin bij nu Diosil ani nin bij nin bitswil nu Diosil. Jech an bitsow, jaich an t Jerusaln xi tl walki xu dhabalb kal nu Diosil. Neech jeye ku dhutsa ba jaj nu t bij.
Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”
Ka dhutsuntsi ench an ltsix xi kwajat ban belomtsik xi Laodisea: “Ench tin ulal xin lnl xowa tsubax ani lujat, xin tajmal junax kal na Dios ejtal xowa waach:
Nan u chob xowa a tajl. U chob abal yab a lej pojkl xi yab alwa nibal a lej tajl an chplb abal ka taja xowa alwa, jelti jun xata xi yab kk nibal chamay. U lak max i kk o i chamayak!
Por kom yab i chamay nibal i kk, neech tu xaa.
Tat a ulal ke i tumnladh tajat, ke i kwajatich alwa ani ke yab xata a yntsal; por yab a chob ke i kwajat jelti max i chojontl, jelti max yab xata a kool, jelti max i jokol ani jelti max i chilim.

Jaxtm, tu takyal abal ti kin chaytsi an ti oro xi tajadh alwa ban kamal abal ki kwajay lejtal i tumnladh. Ti kin chaytsi an ti dhak kudhkum abal ki xeketlin ani ti kin chaytsi an ti ill abal ka kwajbantsi na wal ani anchan ka ejto ki chuxin.
Nan u tawnl ani u kwiyl ejtal xu kanidhltsik. Pos ka tajaich i chplb abal ka taja xowa alwa ani ka jilaich ka taja xowa yab alwa.

Ka acha, Nan in kwajat jelti jun xita xi kwajat ti tawnax ban wileb, max jun xita ti kin axtsi an tu kwintal ani tin walka ki ochich bin itsch jelti tam jun xita u japtsinal an ti wileb, neech kin kwajay kal jaj ani jaj neech ka kwajay kal Nan.

Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku walka ka buxkan junax kal Nan bu tokat kwajtal, jelt xan ti Nan u tmalich ejtal xowakich ani in buxkank kal nu Tta bin tokat kwajtal.
Xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay xowa an Tokat Ejattalb in utsl an belomtsik.”

Tam ti watch ejtal jech, u tela ani u chuu walki jebl jun i wileb. Jachan an kwintalb xin junwal jelt xan tu jsnal jun i korneta xi tin tawnmal jidhtal, tin utsa ench: —Ki kadhiy tech ani neech tu ltsi ejtal xowa neech ka tmun tam ka tmunich jech.
Tmki jachan, tam tin kwajat teykmte kal in chp an Tokat Ejattalb, u chuu jun i tokat kwajtalb xi kwajbadh walki ani ban tokat kwajtalb ta ti buxl jun xita.

Xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb, in junwal jelti jun i chaxixl tujub xu bijyb jaspe ani jelti tujub xu bijyb kornalina. Malill ban tokat kwajtalb ta ti kwajat jun i pichal chaxixl jelti jun i tujub xu bijyb esmeralda.

Malill ban tokat kwajtalb u chuu jeye jun inik ch i tokat kwajtalbtsik ani ba jachan an tokat kwajtalbtsik, ta ti buxutsik jun inik ch i yejcheltsik xeketlidh kal dhakni ani in kojmtsik jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro.
Ban tokat kwajtalb u lamkil i ly, u achatml xata ani u julull. Tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb, ta ti letotl bk i tajbaxtalb, xi jaich xi bk nin ejattal na Dios.

Tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb, ta jeye ti kwajat jun xata xin junwal jelti pujal xi tumax tajat. Junax chejel ani malill ban tokat kwajtalb, ta ti kwajat ch xata ejat xin kool in wal putlki, tin kx ani tin tamt.
In jidhtal jech xi ejattsik, in junwal jelti padhum; nin chabtal, in junwal jelti toro; nin oxtal, in kool in wal jelti inik ani nin chetal, in junwal jelti tw u jumuml.

Chelam jech xi ejattsik in kool akak in sutsts juntsik ti b, in kooltsik tajat in wal eblidh ani alkidh ani akal i kij yab in kubdhltsik kin ulu ench: Tokat, tokat, tokat, Okxlb Dios, xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja, i kwajat ejat malill i kij.
Echeki tam xi jechtsik ch in pidhl ti labidh tokattalb, ti kaknaxtalb ani ti jalbintsixtalb xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij,

xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik, u tudhlanal tin tamt xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani in kaknltsik xi kwajat ejat malill i kij. In kwachbltsik nin kwetsotsl kwajbaxtal tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb ani in ulaltsik ench:
Okxlb ani Diosil, Tat nin tomnl ka koy echeki an labidh tokattalb, an kaknaxtalb ani an chplb; pos Tat a tajmal ejtal xowa waach ani kom Tat anchan ta lenmal, jaxtm ti waach ani jaxtm ti tajadh.
Bin ejt kubak xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb, u chuu jun i dhutsadh w tulilidh, dhutsuntsidh alkidh ani eblidh ani pajkidh kal bk i pajkixtalb.
Ani u chuu jun i likat tokat abatwle xi kwajat in ulal kawidh tajat ench: —Jita in tomnl kin wela an dhutsadh w ani kin wkontsi an tin pajkl?
Por nibal walki, nibal chabl, nibal alkidh ban chabl, yab waach ni jun xita xi neech kin ejto kin wela an dhutsadh w, nibal ela kin tela.
Nan in ukin tajat abal yab elan ni jun xita xin tomnl kin wela ani kin ajay an dhutsadh w, nibal ela kin tela.

In utsan tm ench kal jn ti b an yejcheltsik: —Yabich ms ki ukin, pos xu kidhtalb kal na Jud ani u kidhtalb jeye kal an pulek takix Dabid, in tmalich ani neech kin ejto kin wela an dhutsadh w ani kin wkontsi xi bk an tin pajkl. Jech an kidhtalb, in kool in chp ani in awiltal jelti an padhum, jaxtm tu bijyb ti padhum.

U tela tm jun ani u chuu ke junax chejel ban tokat kwajtalb, ba xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani junax chejel ban yejcheltsik ta ti kubl an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, por kwajat jelti max chemdhats. Jech xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, in kool bk in ichm ani bk in wal. Nin ichmtsik ani nin wal, jaich xi bk nin ejattal na Dios xi kwajat putlki an kayl.
Jech xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, kale ani in bachu an dhutsadh w xi ta tin kool bin ejt kubak xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb.

Tam tin tyna an dhutsadh w, xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik, tudhlan tin tamt an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios. Ejtaltsik in teykm juntsik i sn ani in teykmtsik jeye i lejab xi tajadh kal i oro tsutsat kal i ikob. Jech an ikob, jaich jelti nin lbil xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.

Ani in ajatnltsik jech an t ajatlb: Tat nin tomnl ka tyna an dhutsadh w ani ka wkontsi an tin pajkl; pos Tat i chemdh ani kal na xichl tu chaymal abal ku dhabalnjich kal na Dios, ejtalki an kidhtalbtsik, an kwintalb ani an atiklbtsik.
Tu pidhmalich ti awiltalb abal ku kwajay tu pakdha takix ani tu ple abal ni Diosil, ani neech tu takix ban chabl.
Tayl u tela jun ani u axtsi tin kwintal yn i tokat abatwletsik xi ta ti kwajattsik malill ban tokat kwajtalb, ba xi ch jeye xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani ba xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik,

ani in ulaltsik kawidh ench: An Ajtiklb xi chemdh, xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, in tomnl kin koy an chplb, kin dhabalna ejtal xowa waach, kin koy an chalpadhtalb ani an chapnitalb. Jaj kin bachu an kaknaxtalb ani Jaj kin koy an labidh tokattalb.

U acha jeye ejtal xowa tajadh kal na Dios, xi kwajat walki, xi kwajat chabl, xi kwajat alkidh ban chabl, xi kwajat ban pujal ani ejtal xowa xi waachtsik taja in ulaltsik ench: Kin bachu an kaknaxtalb, kin koy an labidh tokattalb ani an awiltalb malill i kij, xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
Xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik, in ulal ench: —Anchan ka tjan!  Ani xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik tudhlan kututsik asta chabl ani in kaknatsik xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.

U chuu tm ke an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios in wkoy an jidhtal pajkixtalb ani u acha tin ulu jn ti b xi ch xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik, kal jun i kwintalb xin junwal jelti junkil: —Jala ani ka tela!
U tela ani u chuu jun i dhak bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, in teykm jun i kwiixtalb. Pidhan jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ani kale abal ti tax.
Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin chblb an pajkixtalb, u acha jeye tin ulu ench xi chabtal xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik: —Jala ani ka tela!
Kale tm jun jun i chak bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, pidhan ti awiltalb abal kin wkoy an kijidhtalb ban kayl ani abal kin taja ka chmdhxin an iniktsik jn ani jn. Pidhan jun i nakat macht.

Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin xlb an pajkixtalb, u acha tin ulu ench xi oxtal xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik: —Jala ani ka tela! U tela ani u chuu jun i tunuy bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, in teykm jun i lejbaxtalb.

U acha jun i kwintalb junax chejel xon ti kwajat xi ch ta ti kwajat ejattsik ani xu kw in ulu ench: —Jun i denario in jalbl xi jun kilo i trigo ani anlki jeye in jalbl xi ox kilo i sebada; por yab ka odhna an asyte nibal an yajtsik uxnl.
Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin chlb an pajkixtalb, u acha tin ulu ench xin chetal xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik: —Jala ani ka tela!

U tela ani u chuu jun i mn bitsim. Xi ta ti punat ban bitsim, u bijyb ti Cheml ani tin kx ta ti tl xu bijyb tin kubtal an chemlomtsik. Pidhan ti awiltalb ba jun peje an chabl abal kin chemdha an atiklbtsik kal i pjxtalb, kal i kanab, kal i yawlchtsik ani kal i padhumtsik xi waach ban chabl.

Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin blb an pajkixtalb, u chuu tin l xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, nin ejattal xi chemdhatstsik kal tin kwenta nin kwintal na Dios ani abal in lnltsik ke na Kristo jaich nu loox.
Jechtsik in ulal kawidh ench: —Tokat Okxlb ani tsubax, asta jowki neech ka ljundha ani ka tajatsik kin jalbiy xita tu chemdhmal, xi kwajattsik ban chabl?
Pidhantsik tm tin dhak xekt ani utsantsik abal ka koychtsik bl w i kij, asta ka kidhey nin yanl an kidhblbtsik xi kwajat in tjontsal na Kristo xi neechtsik jeye ka chemdh jelti jajtsik.
Tam ti an Ajtiklb in wkoy xin akaklb an pajkixtalb, lwkin an chabl. Na kts tunkan jelti tunuy kudhkum, na ch wenkon jelti xich
ani na ttsik xi kwajat walki, kwajlan chabl jelt xan tu kwajlanal nin tej wall jun i te tam u wawyb kal i chapik ik.
An walki kibchon jelti tam u tlnal jun i w ani ejtal an chntsik ani an chabltsik xi kwajat ban pujal, plmdhtsik.

An pakdha takix xi ban kayl, chinkontsik ban cholax chn ani ban pakdha tujub xi waach ban chn, junax kal an ultalb iniktsik, kal xi tumnladhtsik, kal an oklek soldadotsik, kal ejtal an jolibtsik ani kal xi yab u jolibtsik;

ani in utsltsik ench an chntsik ani an pakdha tujub: —Ti ku tuchiy ani ti ku china abal yab ti ku chuu xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani abal ki jeka an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna an Ajtiklb, xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
Pos in bajmalich xowki ti neech kin pidhna an pulek yajtsiktalb, ani jita neech kin ejto kin kuxuy?

Ms tayl u chuu ch i tokat abatwletsik kubutsik ban chabl. Jn ebl, jn all, jn xon tu kalel na kts ani jun xon tu ochel na kts. Jech an tokat abatwletsik, kwajat in tamkm an ik abal yab ka waun n w ban chabl, nibal ban pujal ani nibal ban tetsik.

U chuu jeye jun i tokat abatwle xi tl xon tu kalel na kts ani in kool nin exlixtal na Dios xi ejat. Jech an tokat abatwle in dhjay kawidh ench xi ch an tokat abatwletsik xi pidhnktsik ti awiltalb abal kin atax tajtsitsik an chabl ani an pujal:
—Yab ka atax tajtsi an chabl, nibal an pujal, nibal an tetsik, asta ki exliy okox bin pkib nin tjontsixiltsik ni Diosil.
Ani u acha xy nin yanl xi exlidhtsik: buk inik che mil in kidhtaltsik xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.
Lajuchab mil xi exlidh nin kidhtaltsik na Jud, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Rubn, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Gad,
lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Aser, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Neftal, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Manass,
lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Simen, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Leb, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Isakar,
lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Sabuln, lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Jos ani lajuchab mil nin kidhtaltsik na Benjamn.

Tam ti watch jech, u tela ani u chuu yn i atiklbtsik. Jechtsik, tl ba putlki an atiklbtsik, ba putlki an kidhtalbtsik, ba putlki an bitsowtsik ani ba ejtalki an kwintalb. Kwajat kubutsik tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb ani tin tamt an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios; yn tajat an atiklbtsik ke nibal xita neech kin ejto kin ajay. Xeketlidhtsik kal dhakni ani in teykmtsik i apach.
Ejtal in ulaltsik kawidh ench: An loeltalb tl ba ni Diosil, xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani ban Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.

Ani ejtal an tokat abatwletsik xi ta ti kubutsik malill ban tokat kwajtalb ani malill ban yejcheltsik ani ba xi ch jeye xi ta ti kwajat ejattsik, tudhlan kututsik asta chabl tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb ani in kaknatsik na Dios,

ench tin ulutsik: Anchan ka tjan! Kin bachu an ajtintsixtalb, an jalbintsixtalb ani an kaknaxtalb malill i kij ni Diosil; ani Jaj kin koy an labidh tokattalb, an chalpadhtalb ani an chplb malill i kij. Anchan ka tjan.
Tin konoy tm ench jn ti b an yejcheltsik: —Jitam jtsik p jeye xi j kwajattsik xeketlidh kal dhakni ani jn ti tltsik?

Nan u utsa ench: —Paylomlb, tat a chob. Ani jaj tin utsa ench: —Jechtsik jaich xin watnmalichtsik an pulek yajtsiktalb, xi tokedhatsichtsik kal tin kwenta tam ti chemdh na Kristo pajkidh ban peltsidh te. Tokedhatsichtsik, jelti jun i tokat dhak kudhkum.
Jaxtm ti kwajattsik tin tamt nin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani in tjontsaltsik akal i kij ban at xon ti Jaj kwajat; neech ka beletntsik kal xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb kom Jaj kwajat kal jajtsik.
Yabichtsik neech ti kal nibal neech ti tsikl, yabich neech kin achatsik nin yjtsk na kts nibal neech kin achatsik i kitsowtalb,

pos neech ka beletntsik kal an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, xi kwajat tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb. Neech ka beletntsik kl jelt xan tu beletnb an borregotsik. Neech ka jntsik kl bin kalemtal i ja xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani neech ka kwitsintsik tin jaml nin wal kal na Dios.
Tam ti an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, in wkoy xin bklb an pajkixtalb, chamkan ejtal t walki. Chejel ora xna chamkan.
U chuu tm ti pidhan juntsik juntsik ti korneta xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi ta ti kubutsik tin tamt na Dios.

Ms tayl, ulich jun i tokat abatwle, in tsidhl jun i ikbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro ani kubey tin tamt xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb. Jech an tokat abatwle, pidhan yn ti ikob abal kin ikbaxna tam u l ejtal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios. Jech xon tu l xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, jaich xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb xi tajadh kal i oro, xi ta ti kwajat tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb.
An paw xu kalel ban ikbaxtalb xin teykm an tokat abatwle, tekey asta xon ti kwajat na Dios junax kal nin lbil xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.

An tokat abatwle in tyna tm an ikbaxtalb, in tsutsiy kal i kalul xi ta ti kwajat xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb ani in petna ban chabl. Tam ti an tokat abatwle in taja jech, tujey ti lamkil an ly an ti pknal an junkil. Julululch ani lwkin an chabl.
Xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi ta tin kool juntsik juntsik i korneta, tojojontsik tm abal kin jutsuy.

Tam ti nin jidhtal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, ulich i idhidh b ani kwajlan i kamal xukudh kal i xich xi petn ban chabl. Taay wich junax chejel an chabl junax kal wich jeye junax chejel an tetsik ani ejtal an yax chojltsik.
Tam ti nin chabtal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, petn ban pujal jun xata xin junwal jelti jun i yejche chn jomoml ani wenkon ti xich wich junax chejel an pujal.
Ani chemech wich junax chejel ejtal xowa waach ban pujal. Pakwat jeye wich junax chejel an pakdha tan.

Tam ti nin oxtal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, kwajlan jun a yejche t jomoml jelti jun i tajbaxtalb. Kwajlan ba wich junax chejel an waljatsik ani ba wich junax chejel xon tu kaleltsik i ja.
Jech na t in bij Ajenjo, (ti kwintalb tnek, Ajenjo in l kin ulu, tsaiktalb). Kal jech tin kwenta, wich junax chejel an jatsik tsaikm ani yn i atiklbtsik chemech kal tin kwenta abal tsaikm an ja.

Tam ti nin chetal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, odhyat wich junax chejel na kts, na ch ani na ttsik jeye. Jaxtm ti wich junax chejel na kts yab tajbaxin ani wich junax chejel na ch ani na ttsik yab jeye tajbaxin.

Tayl u tela ani u acha jun i tokat abatwle ti jumuml junax chejel an walki ani in ulal kawidh ench: —Chojontl in chubl an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban chabl kal tin kwenta an kornetatsik xi neech kin jutsuy xi x an tokat abatwletsik!
Tam ti nin botal an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, u chuu jun a t xi kwajlank chabl. Jachan na t, pidhan tin japb an owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk.
In japiy tm an owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk ani kale taja i paw jelt xan tu kalel ba jun i yejche jorna. An paw xu kalel ban owtsiktalb, in jikwchiy na kts ani an kij.
Ba jachan an paw kale i pichichtsik xu jumuml ban chabl. Jachan an pichichtsik pidhan ti awiltalb jelti an awiltalb xin kool an dhiniytsik.
Utsantsik abal yab xata kin tajtsi an chojltsik xi waach ban chabl, ni jun xata xowa yaxni nibal an tetsik; tokot an atiklbtsik xi yab exlidh bin pkib kal nin exlixtal na Dios.

Por yab walkantsik kin chemdha an atiklbtsik, tokot kin yajlombdha tin nakl b a ch. An yajal xin jill tam ka chikxin jachan an pichich, in junwal jelti an yajal xin achl jun xita tam ka chikan kal jun i dhiniy.
Jachan i kij, an atiklbtsik neech kin lena ka chemech, por yab neech ka chemech; ani maske in ltsik tajat ka chemech, yab neech ka chemech.

An pichichtsik in junwal jelti bitsimtsik xi kwajatich tojojodh abal an pjxtalb; bin k in kooltsik jun xata xin junwal jelti jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro ani nin wal in junwal jelt in wal i iniktsik.
In kooltsik in xil jelt in xil i mmlb ani nin kamab in junwal jelt in kamab i padhum.
Nin putll nin tul bolidh kal jun i bolixtalb xi jelti i patl ani nin kawdh nin sutsts in junwal jelt in kawdh yn i karrotsik xu kinoknb kal i bitsim tam neechtsik adhik abal ti pjx.
In kool in ww jelt in ww i dhiniy ani in kool jeye in chikaxtal. Taja ba nin ww, in kooltsik i awiltalb kin yajlombdha an atiklbtsik tin nakl b a ch.

An pichichtsik in kool jun in oklkil xi jaich an abatwle xi tl ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk. Jech an abatwle, ti kwintalb ebreo u bijyb, Abadn ani ti kwintalb griego u bijyb, Apolin.
An jidhtal yajtsiktalb watch, por bl u kibel ka watey chb.

Tam ti nin akaklb an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, u acha jun i kwintalb xi kale ba chelam xon ti jiltsidh chupitsik xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb. Jech xon tu kwajbb an pikbantsixtalb, tajadh kal i oro ani kwajat tin tamt na Dios.
Ani utsan ench nin akaklb an tokat abatwle xin kool an korneta kal jachan an kwintalb: —Ka walka chelam an tokat abatwletsik xi kwajat wikats bin wl an pulek walja xin bij Eufrates.
Walk tm xi ch an tokat abatwletsik abal kin chemdha wich junax chejel an atiklbtsik, pos jaich ti tojojodh abal jachan i ora, jachan a kts, jachan a ch ani jachan i tamub.
Ani u acha abal lju inik i miyn nin yanl an soldadojiltsik xi punutsik kal i bitsim.

Anchan tu chuu ban xalkantsixtalb an bitsimtsik ani xi punattsik taja. An bitsimtsik ani xi punattsik taja, in kool tin tamt jun i dhabuxtalb chakni, asul ani mn. An bitsimtsik in kool in k jelti padhum ani bin wi, u kalel i kamal, i paw ani i asufre.
Wich junax chejel an atiklbtsik chemdh kal jech x an yajtsiktalb xu kalel bin wi an bitsimtsik: an kamal, an paw ani i asufre.
Abal nin awiltal jech an bitsimtsik in kool bin wi ani bin ww; pos nin ww jech an bitsimtsik, in kool in k jelti chan ani kl tu yajlombdhaxtsik.

Por xi jilkon an atiklbtsik, xi yab chemech kal jechtsik an yajtsiktalb, yab in jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa. Yab in jilatsik kin kakna an atax ejattalbtsik, an chilabtsik xi tajadh kal i oro, kal i plata, kal i bronse, kal i tujub ani kal i okcha. Jech an chilabtsik, yab u chuux, yab u ochox, nibal u belal.
Yab jeye in jilatsik ti chemdhax, nibal ti dhimkax, nibal ti kw, nibal ti junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal.
U chuu tm ti pal walki ba jun i tokow jun i likat tokat abatwle ani b in k, in kool jun i pichal. Nin wal chaxixl jelt a kts ani nin akantsik in junwal jelti kamal.
In teykm jun i chakam dhutsadh w weladh, in kuba nin ejt akan ban pujal ani nin kwatab akan ban chabl.
Dhjan tm kawidh jelt xan tu dhajnal jun i padhum ani tam ti dhjan, pkan bkl an junkil.
Tam ti pknkich bkl an junkil, nechich ku dhutsa xowa u acha in ulu, por u acha jun i kwintalb xi tl walki xi tin utsa ench: —Ka tapa chinat xowa in ulu xi bk an pknaltalb ani yab ka dhutsa.
An tokat abatwle xu chuu kubat ban pujal ani ban chabl, in dhaya tm tekat nin ejt kubak
ani in lej tsubax ulu tin bij xi kwajat ejat malill i kij, xin tajm an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani ejtal xowa waach taja, in ulu ench: —Yabich ms neech ka owey;

pos tam kin bajaw xowki nin bklb an tokat abatwle kin tuju kin jutsuy an korneta, neech tm ka tjanich xowa yab tejwa xin kool chalpadh na Dios, jelt xan ti Jaj tin utsmal nin tiltsxiltsik xi kl tu tjontsb.
An kwintalb xi tl walki xi nan u achmal, tin tawna jun ani tin utsa ench: —Ki kale ani ka tyna an chakam dhutsadh w xi weladh, xin teykm an tokat abatwle xi kwajat kubat ban chabl ani ban pujal.
In kale tm ban tokat abatwle ani u kontsi an ti chakam dhutsadh w. Jaj tin utsa ench: —J kwajat ani ka kapu. Ba na wi chiik neech ka acha jelti an chiik, por alkidh ba na tsukul neech ka tsaikm.
U bachkuntsi tm an tokat abatwle an ti chakam dhutsadh w ani u kapu. Ba nu wi, u acha chiik jelti an chiik, por tam tu kapmalich, tsaikm alkidh ba nu tsukul.
Tin utsa tm ench: —Yejat ki kale jun ka tiltsi xowa in ulal na Dios, yn i bitsowtsik ani i atiklbtsik. Ejtalki xan tu kw an atiklbtsik ani ka tiltsi jeye an pakdha takix.
In pidhan tm jun i lejbaxtalb xin junwal jelti jun i te xu lejbaxnb ani in utsan ench: —Ki kale ka lejbay an at xon tu kwajl na Dios ani xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb ani ka ajay xy xu kaknaxtsik taja.
Por yab ka lejbantsi tin elbil an at xon tu kwajl na Dios, pos jachan, pidhnkich an pl iniktsik. Jech an iniktsik, neech kin odhbijiy an tokat bitsow tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
Neech ku aba chb u tiltsxil abal ti kin tila tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel, xeketlidhtsik kal i kodhow kudhkum.
Jech chb an tiltsixtsik, jaich xi chb an olibo ani xi chb in kb an bla xi kwajat tin tamt na Dios xin dhabal an chabl.
Max u lenb ka atax tajtsintsik kal jun xita, jajtsik in kldhl i kamal bin wi ani in tsikl kl xu tomnaxtsik, pos anchan kool ka chemech xitakichki xi kl tu lenb ka atax tajtsintsik.

Jech an tiltsixtsik, in kool i awiltalb abal kin taja ke yab ka ulich i b tam ka xechin ti tiltsixtsik. In kooltsik jeye i awiltalb abal kin wenko an ja ti xich ani kin wachindha xowakichki i yajtsiktalb tech ti chabl xyl kin lenatsik.
Por tam kin okch ti tiltsix jech an tiltsixtsik, neech ka pjeyat kal an atax xi kale ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk. Neech ka t ani neech ka chemdh an tiltsixtsik.

Nin tul an tiltsixtsik, neech ka jilkon kwachatsik junax chejel an yejche bitsow. Jech an yejche bitsow, jaich jelti an bitsow xi Sodoma ani xi Ejipto. Ba jech an yejche bitsow, jaich jeye xon ti chemdh ni Ajtik pajkidh ban peltsidh te.
Tin nakl x a kts kal chejel, neech ka chutsintsik kwachatsik an tin tul kal ejtalki an atiklbtsik xi tech ti chabl ani yab neech kin walkatsik ka jolyat.

Xu kwajltsik tech ti chabl, neech ka kulbtsik tajat abal in chuu chemdh jech an tiltsixtsik. Neech ka kulbtsik tajat, ke asta neech ti chjwlixtsik jn ani jn; pos abal jajtsik, jachan chb an tiltsixtsik, in junwal jelti max i yajbdhomtalb.
Por tam ti kidhch x a kts kal chejel, ejdhtsik kal na Dios. Chakaytsik ani jikeytsik tajat ejtal xi kl ti chutattsik.
Xi jech chb an tiltsixtsik in acha tm jun i kawidh kwintalb t walki xu usnal kl ench: —Ki kadhiytsik tech. Kadhiytsik tm walki ba jun i tokow ani chutattsik xita kl ti tomnadh.

Tmki jachan, lwkin chapik an chabl, julpan jun peje an bitsow ani chemech buk mil i atiklbtsik kal tin kwenta abal lwkin an chabl. An atiklbtsik xi jilkon, jikeytsik tajat ani in kaknatsik na Dios xi kwajat walki.
Nin chabtal an yajtsiktalb, watch, por kunat i kij neech ka tujey nin oxtal.

Tam ti nin bklb an tokat abatwle in jutsuy an korneta xi ta tin kool, achatm i kawidh kwintalbtsik tu walki xin ulal ench: Xo in bajch xowki an Okxlb ani an Kristo neech ti takixich ban chabl xon tu takix an iniktsik; ani Jaj neech ti takix malill i kij.
Xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik, xi ta ti buxutsik bin tokat kwajtaltsik tin tamt na Dios, tudhlan kututsik asta chabl, in kaknatsik na Dios,
ani in ulutsik ench: Tu pidhl ti jalbintsixtalb, Okxlb, Dios xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij, pos a xalkmalich na pulek chp ani a tujmalich ta takix.

Ejtal an atiklbtsik chakunek, por in bajmalich an kij xowki Tat neech ka pidhna an ti yajtsiktalb, xowki jeye neech ka ljundha an chemlomtsik ani xowki neech ka pidha na tiltsxiltsik xowa in tmal abal ti tjontsmaltsik. Xowki jeye neech ka pidha xowa in tmal xu dhabalbichtsik kal Tat ani xita ti kaknantsal an ta bij, tsitsik ani pakdha. In bajmalich jeye an kij xowki neech ka kibdhatsik xin atax tajtsaltsik an chabl.

Japyat tm t walki an at xon tu kwajl na Dios ani xalkan nin tapb nin lejkintalbil xi ta ti kwajat ban at xon ti Jaj u kwajl. Lamkin tm i ly, pkan i junkil, achatm i kwintalbtsik, lwkin an chabl ani ulich jun i chapik idhidh b.
Xalkan tm walki jun i exl plek: jun i mmlb xin kool in xekt jelt a kts, kubat ba na ch, in kojm jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ani jachan an kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb, in kool lajuchb a t.
Jech an mmlb, kwajat kodh ani u dhajnal abal in achlich i chukuxtalb, kom nechich kin wachiy an chakam.
Xalkan tm jun walki t i exl: jun i yejche aknidh chan xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn xin kool bk in k, lju in ichm ani in kojm juntsik i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ba juntsik nin k.

In bodhoy kal nin ww wich junax chejel na ttsik xi kwajat walki ani in petna ban chabl. Jech an yejche aknidh chan, kubey tin tamt an mmlb xi wich kin wachiy an chakam. In taja anchan abal in l kin kaptsi an tin chakmil tokot kin wachiy.
An mmlb in wachiy jun i chakam kwitl, xi neech kin chapik takiy ejtal an atiklbtsik. Tayl, kntsin an tin chakmil ani jntsin ba na Dios xon ti buxl bin tokat kwajtal;
ani an mmlb jlch abal ka kale ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, xon ti tojojontsidh kal na Dios abal ka beletn taja tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
Wachin tm jun i pjxtalb t walki, xon ti an oklek tokat abatwle Miguel ani nin tokat abatwlejiltsik kwajay ti pjx kal an yejche aknidh chan. An yejche aknidh chan ani nin tjontsixiltsik pjexin,
por yab in ejtotsik kin ta an pjxtalb ani nibalich wachin ejtidh t walki abal jajtsik.

Petn tm elb an yejche aknidh chan. Jech jaich an weje yejche chan xu bijyb ti lej atax ani ta Satans, xin kambiyal ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl. Jaj ani nin tjontsixiltsik, petntsik ban chabl.

U acha tm jun i kwintalb kawidh t walki, xu kw in ulal ench: —Xo in bajch xowki na Dios neech kin xalka ke Jaj nu loox, Jaj nu takix ani in kool in chp abal kin taja xowakich. In xalkmalich jeye ke na Kristo in kool i awiltalb. Pos petnadhich elb an lej atax, xi kl tu walbindhb ni at kidhbtsik akal i kij tin tamt ni Diosil.

tadhich kal ni at kidhbtsik kal tin kwentaki nin xichl an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios ani kal tin kwentaki jeye an tsubaxtalb xin tilmaltsik. Yab in ajymaltsik tinb maske ka chemdh tam ti xechintsik kin tila jech an tsubaxtalb.

Jaxtm, ki kulbtsik ejtal xi kwajat walki. Por chojontl a chubltsik xi kwajat ban chabl ani ban pujal! Pos an lej atax petnadh asta xon ta kwajattsik ani u chakl tajat kom in chob abal yabich nakat i kij neech ka kwajay.
Tam ti an yejche aknidh chan in chuu abal petn chabl, in kajna an mmlb xin wachiymal an chakam kwitl.

Por an mmlb pidhan chb tin pakdha sutsts jelti nin sutsts i tw abal kin ejto ka jumun ani ka kale asta ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh, xon ti yab ka bajwat kal an yejche aknidh chan. Taja neech ka beletn tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
In kldha tm i ja bin wi an yejche aknidh chan abal kin taja jun i walja ani ka jn kl an mmlb;
por tolmiyat an mmlb kal an chabl, pos jakpin an chabl ani in kutu an walja xin kldhmal bin wi an yejche aknidh chan.

Tam ti an yejche aknidh chan in chuu anchan, in chakuntsi tajat an mmlb ani kale kin pjey nin kidhtal an mmlb. Jech nin kidhtaltsik an mmlb, jaich xin tajltsik xowa in ulal nin takixtal na Dios ani in wewkmtsik an tsubaxtalb xin tilmal na Jesukristo.

In kubey bin wl an pujal ani u chuu ti kalel ban pujal jun i atax xin kool bk in k ani lju in ichm. Ba juntsik in ichm in kool juntsik i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb ani bin ktsik in kool jun i odhbijixtalb abal a Dios.

Jech an atax xu chuu, in junwal jelti padhum ani nin akan, in junwal jelt in akan i oso. An yejche aknidh chan, in watbantsi jech an atax ti chplb ani ti kwajtalb xi jajwiik in kool. In pidha jeye ti awiltalb plek.

Ba jun in k jachan an atax, in kool jun i chojbdhaxtalb xi jelti max neech ka chemdh kl; por jachan an chojbdhaxtalb jeldhantsat ani ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl, labantsik ani in wwna an atax.
Kakn an yejche aknidh chan xin pidhmal ti awiltalb jachan an atax ani kakn jeye an atax. Ench tin ulutsik: —Jita waach in junwal jelti jech an atax ani jita neech kin ejto kin tomna?
Walk jeye kin ulu an atax ejtal xowa yab alwa ani i odhbijixtalb abal a Dios ani kin koy i awiltalb tin nakl x i tamub kal chejel.
Anchan tin taja, in odhbijiy na Dios, in odhbijtsi xon tu kwajl na Dios ani in odhbijiy jeye ejtal xi kwajattsik walki.
Walk kin pjey xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios ani kin tatsik. Pidhan ti awiltalb abal kin takiy ejtal an kidhtalbtsik, an bitsowtsik ani an atiklbtsik xi keetich keetich i kwintalb in kooltsik.

Jachan an atax, kakn kal ejtalki xu kwajltsik ban chabl xi yabtsik kwajat dhutsadh nin bij asta ti tujenek an kayl bin dhutsadh wil an Ajtiklb. Jech an Ajtiklb, jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios ani jaich jeye xi chemdh.
Max jun xita in kool in ochoxtal alwa, kin exbay.

Xita in nedhl keet ti wiknl, neech jeye ti wiknl. Ani xita u chemdhax kal i macht, kal i macht jeye neech ka chemdh. Techich ti neech ka xalkan max tsubax lejtal tu belom ani max neech kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.
Tayl u chuu jun t i atax xi kwajat ti kalel ban chabl. Jech an atax, in kool chb in ichm jelt in ichm i borrego, por u kw jelti jun i yejche aknidh chan.

In kool jeye ejtal an awiltalb jelti xin kool xi jidhtal an atax ani in tajl ka kakn an jidhtal atax kal ejtal xu kwajltsik ban chabl. Jech an jidhtal atax, jaich xi jeley kal an chojbdhaxtalb xin koolwiik.
In tajl jeye i pakdha labidh exl tin tamt an atiklbtsik ani asta in tajl ka kwajlan chabl i kamal xi tl walki.

Kal jech an exltsik xu walkb kin taja tin tamt xi jidhtal an atax, in kambiyal xu kwajltsik ban chabl ani in utsl kin tajtsi jun in chilbil jachan an atax xin koolwiik jun i chojbdhaxtalb bin k ani jeley.
Nin chabtal an atax, pidhan ti awiltalb kin ejdhantsi tin chilbil an jidhtal atax abal ka kwin ani kin taja ka chemdh ejtal xi yab u kaknb kl.
Ani yab tokot jki jech in taja, in taja jeye ke ejtalki, tsitsik ani pakdha, xi tumnladhtsik ani xi chojontltsik, xu jolibtsik ani xi yaba, ka kwajbantsattsik jun i exl bin ejt kubak o bin pkib.
Ani ke yab xita kin ejto ti chaum nibal ti njul max yab in kool an exl o nin bij an atax o nin ajumtal nin bij.

Jech in l tajat i chalpadhtalb; xita xin exbayal, kin exbantsi tin ajumtal nin bij an atax. Nin ajumtal nin bij, jaychki an ajumtalb xin ynl an iniktsik. Nin ajumtal jaich jech: akak i bo inik kal ox inik akak.

Tayl u tela jun ani u chuu kubl ban chn xu bijyb Sin an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios. T ti kwajat kal Jaj buk inik che mil i atiklbtsik xin kool dhutsadh bin pkib nin bij an Ajtiklb ani nin bij nin Tta.
Tayl u acha jun i kwintalb xi tl walki, xin junwal jelt xan tu bososl yn i walja ani jelt xan tu julull kawidh i junkil. In junwal jelti tam yn xita in tenyal i sn.

In ajatnltsik jun i t ajatlb tin tamt an tokat kwajtalb, tin tamt xi ta ti kwajat ch ejattsik ani tin tamt an yejcheltsik. Yab xita in ejtowal kin wita jech an t ajatlb, tokot xi buk inik che mil xi kwajattsikwiik jeye ban chabl ani xo loodhich.

Jech jaich xi yabtsik in kaknmal i chilabtsik, tokattsik ani in wwnltsik an Ajtiklb xontiki ka kale. Loodhichtsik ban atiklbtsik abal ka kwajay jelti jidhtal wallb abal ka dhabalnjichtsik kal na Dios ani kal an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.
Yabtsik eltsin ni jun i kambixtalb, tokattsik tin tamt na Dios.

U chuu tm jun i tokat abatwle ti jumuml chejel walki ani ta tin kool an alwa tilab xi yab in kool in okontal abal kin ltsi xu kwajltsik ban chabl, ejtal an kidhtalbtsik, an bitsowtsik ani an atiklbtsik xi keetich keetich i kwintalbtsik in kool.
Ani kawidh in ulal ench: —Ka jiknatsik na Dios ani ka kakna, pos in bajch an kij xowki neech ti ljundhax. Ka kaknatsik xin tajmal an walki, an chabl, an pujal ani xon tu kaleltsik an ja.
Tin kuxmats, tsch jun t i tokat abatwle xin ulu ench: —Kwajlanich, kwajlanich an yejche bitsow xin bij Babilonia abal junkunk kal ejtal an atiklbtsik abal kin taja xowakich xi yab alwa.
Tayl kwin jun jun i tokat abatwle xi jaich in oxtal ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Max jun xita kin kakna an atax, kin kaknantsi an tin chilbil ani kin walka ka kwajbantsat an ti exl bin pkib o bin kubak,

kool kin acha an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna na Dios, xin koolich tojojodh. Neech ka yajlombdhtsik kal i kamal ani i asufre tin tamt nin tokat abatwlejiltsik na Dios ani tin tamt an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.

An paw xu kalel xon ti neech ka yajlombdhtsik, yab jayki neech kin koy in okontal. Akal i kij yab jayki neech ka koych kin achatsik an yajtsiktalb xin kaknltsik an atax ani nin chilbil o xin kooltsik nin exlixtal an atax.
Techich ti neech ka xalkan max tsubax lejtal ti neech kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich, xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, xi yabtsik in chikat tajtsal tin takixtal ani xin belltsik na Jess.

U acha tm jun i kwintalb xi tl walki xi tin utsl ench: —Ka dhutsa jech: “Kijidh tajat xi xo ani tayl ka chemechtsik in bell an Ajtiklb.” An Tokat Ejattalb in ulu ench: —Ani, pos neech ka koychich kin tjontsi na Dios tech ti chabl ani ejtal xowa in tajmaltsik abal na Dios, neech kin chuutsik.
U tela tm ani u chuu jun i dhak tokow; bin b an dhak tokow, ta ti buxl jun i inik. Jech an inik, in kojm jun i kwetsotsl kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro ani in teykm jun i kuchl wiidh patl.

Kale tm jun i tokat abatwle ban at xon tu kwajl na Dios ani in utsa kawidh ench xi ta ti buxl bin b an tokow: —Ka ynaich an kuchl wiidh patl ani ka kotsch tin wall an tayablb; pos in bajch an kij ani an wallb xi waach ban chabl, yejnekich. An atiklbtsik xin belmal na Jesukristo, jaich jelti an wallb xi neech ka junkuwat.
Xi ta ti buxl bin b an tokow, in yna tm nin kuchl wiidh patlil ani in junku nin wall an tayablb xi waach ban chabl.
Kale tm jun t i tokat abatwle t walki ban at xon tu kwajl na Dios in teykm jeye jun i kuchl wiidh patl.

Kale jeye keet i tokat abatwle xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb, xin kool i awiltalb kal i kamal. Jech an tokat abatwle, in utsa kawidh ench xin teykm an kuchl wiidh patl: —Ka ynaich an kuchl wiidh patl ani ka kotsch tin wall an uba xi waach ban chabl, pos an wallb wejnekich.

An tokat abatwle in yna an kuchl wiidh patl, in kotsi tin wall an uba xi waach ban chabl ani in baliy ba jun i yejche balixtalb abal ka watyat. Anchan jelt xan ti neech ka tajtsin an atiklbtsik kal na Dios tam ka abtsin an ti kakadh yajtsiktalb.
An uba yab watyat taja ban bitsow, elb bitsow ti watyat. Ban yejche balixtalb kale i xich, nin wtsk an xich in bajaw asta bin wi an bitsim ani nin chikwl, x i bo inik i kilmetro.
U chuu jun walki jun i exl plek ani labidh: u chuu bk i tokat abatwletsik xin tsidhl xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi tin okontal, pos kal jachan, kl tu oknalich nin chkub na Dios.

U chuu jeye jun xata xin junwal jelti pujal xi jyki i lam xukudh kal i kamal. Tin wl jech, ta ti kubutsik in teykm i sn xi pidhnktsik kal na Dios, xi yabtsik in kaknmal an atax, yab in kaknantsmal tin chilbil nibal in walkmaltsik ka kwajbantsat tin ajumtal nin bij an atax.

Ani in ajatnltsik nin ajatlbil na Moiss nin tjontsixil na Dios ani nin ajatlbil jeye an Ajtiklb xin ulal ench: Pakdha ani labidh tajat xowa a tajmal, Okxlb, Dios xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja; lujat ani tsubax ejtal xowa a tajl, Pulek Takxal an atiklbtsik.

Jita yab neech ti ki jikna, Okxlb? Jita yab neech ti ki kaknantsi an ta bij? Pos tokot Tat ni tokat, neech ka tsch ejtal an atiklbtsik ani neech ti ki kakna, pos xalkankich abal ejtal xowa a tajmal, lujat tajat.
Tam ti watch jech, u tela ani u chuu t walki ti japyat an alt xon ti kwajat tapadh an lemdha tujub xon ti dhutsadh an takixtalb.

Ba jech an alt, taja ti kale xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xin tsidhltsik xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb. Jech an tokat abatwletsik, xeketlidhtsik kal i alwa tokat kudhkum xi chaxixl ani in wkmtsik tin tamt i wikaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro.

Jn ti b xi ch ta ti kwajattsik ejat, in pidha tm xi bk an tokat abatwletsik juntsik ti lejab xi tajadh kal i oro tsutsat kal an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin pidhna na Dios xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.

An alt xon ti kaletsik xi bk an tokat abatwle, tsutsich kal i paw xi tl bin labidh tokt ani bin chp na Dios. Yab xita in ejtowal ka ochich ba jech an alt, asta ka okon okox xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi ta tin kool xi bk an tokat abatwletsik.

U acha tm jun i kwintalb kawidh xi kale ban alt xon ti kalnek xi bk an tokat abatwletsik ani utsan ench xi jech bk an tokat abatwle: —Ki kaletsik ani ka jolo ban chabl an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi kwajat balidh ba xi bk an lejab. Jech an kakadh yajtsiktalb, jaich xi tl ba na Dios.

Kale xi jidhtal an tokat abatwle ani in jolo an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi ta ti kwajat balidh ban lejab. Tam ti an tokat abatwle in taja jech, ejtal an atiklbtsik xin kool nin exlixtal an atax ani in kaknantsal an tin chilbil, in koytsik i atax tt xi yab u jell ani yajtsik.
Xin chblb an tokat abatwle in jolo ban pujal xowa ta ti balidh ban lejab ani an ja wenkon ti xich jelt in xichl i chemlom. Ejtal xowakich xi ta ti kwajat ejat ban ja, chemechtsik.
Xin xlb an tokat abatwle in jolo ban waljatsik ani xon tu kaleltsik an ja xowa ta ti balidh ban lejab ani an jatsik xi waach taja wenkon ti xich.
U acha tm tin ulu ench an tokat abatwle xin belkm an ja: —Okxlb, i lujat tajat abal anchan ta taja, tokat Okxlb, xi kwajat ejat malill i kij.
Kom in chemdhmaltsik xu dhabalbich kal Tat ani na tiltsxiltsik jeye, xo a tajmalichtsik kin ucha i xich, pos anchan tin tomnl ka tajtsintsik.
U acha jeye ti kwin jun xita asta xon tu kwajbb an pikbaxtalb xin ulu ench: —Aniich Okxlb, Dios xi ejtal a ejtowal ka taja, Tat i ljundhax in tsubtalki ani in lujtalki.
Xin chlb an tokat abatwle in jolo ba na kts xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani pidhan ti awiltalb na kts kin tsika an atiklbtsik kal i kamal.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik tsikantsik tajat, por yab in jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa. Yabtsik in kakna na Dios xin kool i awiltalb ba jech an kakadh yajtsiktalbtsik, in odhbijiy tokot.
Xin blb an tokat abatwle in jolo bin kwajtal an atax xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani jikwchin xon tu takix an atax. An atiklbtsik in katwaltsik nin lekb kal i yajal,
por nibal anchan yab in jilatsik kin taja xowa yab alwa. In odhbijiytsik tokot na Dios xi kwajat walki kal tin kwenta an yajal xin achltsik ani kal an tt xin kooltsik.

Nin akaklb an tokat abatwle in jolo ban yejche walja Eufrates xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani an ja xi ta ti kwajat taja, dhikey abal ka tjan jun i bl ani ka watey taja an pakdha takix xi tl in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts.
U chuu tm ti kalel bin wi an yejche aknidh chan, bin wi an atax ani bin wi an kambix tiltsix, x i atax ejattalbtsik xin junwal jelti kwa.

Jech jaich in ejattal i ataxtsik xin ejtowal kin taja i labidh exltsik. Ani kaletsik kin junku ejtal an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl abal ti pjxtsik tam kin bajaw an kij kal na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
“Ka achatsik, Nan neech kin tsch jun jiktowle jelti jun i kw. Kijidh tajat abal xita ku ela tin bell ani tokat nin ejattal, pos yab neech ku ela jelti max chilim ani yab neech ka tidheb.”
Ani junkuwat an pakdha takix ban chn xu bijyb Armajedn.
Nin bklb an tokat abatwle in jolo al ik xowa ta tin kool balidh ban lejab ani achatm jun i kawidh kwintalb ban at xon ti kwajat nin tokat kwajtal na Dios xin ulu ench: —Okonich ti tjnal.
Tujey tm ti lamkil i ly, achatm i kwintalbtsik, pkan i junkil ani lwkin chapik an chabl jelt xan ti yab jayki lwknk asta ti wachink an atiklbtsik ban chabl.

An yejche bitsow pejkan ti x i peje ani an bitsowtsik xi ban kayl, julpan. Na Dios in chalpay an yejche bitsow xin bij Babilonia abal kin taja kin watna ejtal an kakadh yajtsiktalb xin abtsi kal nin chkub.
Ejtal an tsitsik chabl xi kwajat ba ja, kibchon ani an chntsik, yab elan.

Ulich jeye i pakdha idhidh b xon ti kwajat an atiklbtsik. Nin lm juntsik an idhidh b, chab inik xna i kilo. An atiklbtsik in odhbijiy na Dios kal tin kwenta an kakadh idhidh b, pos jech, jaich jun i yejche kakadh yajtsiktalb.

Tsch tm jn ti b xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi ta tin kooltsik xi bk an lejab ani tin utsa ench: —Jala ani neech tu ltsi an ti yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachu an yejche bitsow Babilonia. Jech an bitsow, in junwal jelti jun i junkux inik uxum, xi buxl tin b yn i ja.

Jelti jun i junkux inik uxum, anchan jeye ti junkunk jech an bitsow kal an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl abal kin tajatsik xowa yab alwa. Ani an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban chabl ukpindhtsik jeye kal an walastalb xin tajltsik jech an bitsow ani an pakdha takix.

Ban xalkantsixtalb xi tin pidha ku chuu an Tokat Ejattalb, in jn kal an tokat abatwle ban chabl xon ti yab kwajtsidh. Taja, u chuu jun i uxum punat ba jun i atax xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn. Jech an atax, in kool bk in k, lju in ichm ani in kool dhutsadh ba putlki in tul i odhbijixtalbtsik abal a Dios.

Jech an uxum xeketlidh kal i kudhkum xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn ani in kool in kwajbaxtal xi tajadh kal i oro, xi tajadh kal i labidh tujubtsik ani kal i perlatsik. In teykm jun i lejab xi tajadh kal i oro tsutsat kal xowa in atl na Dios ani kal an ataxtalb xin tajmal an uxum.
In kool jeye dhutsadh bin pkib jun i bijlb xi yab tajat exbantl: “An yejche bitsow Babilonia, xi kwajat jelti nin nna an junkux inik uxumtsik ani xowa atax tech ti chabl.”
Tayl u chuu abal jachan an uxum jelti max u itel kal nin xichl xi chemdhatstsik xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios ani xin tilmaltsik na Jess. Tam tu chuu jech, in laban tajat.
Tin utsa tm ench an tokat abatwle: —Jantki ta labnk? Neech tu ltsi xanty in l kin ulu jech an uxum ani an atax xin pnm, xin kool bk in k ani lju in ichm.

An atax xa chuu, jaich jn xi ejatwiik, por xo yabich; por blki neech ka kale ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk abal ka petnjich ban kibeltalb. Xu kwajltsik ban chabl, xi yabtsik kwajat dhutsadh nin bij ban dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bij xi neechtsik kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, neech ka labantsik tam kin chuu jachan an atax xi ejatwiik ani xo yabich ejat, por ejech jun. Jech an atiklbtsik, yab kwajat dhutsadh nin bij ban dhutsadh w, asta tam ti tujenek an kayl.
Jech kwajat jun xata abal xita kin ejto kin exbay: Xi bk in k an atax, in l kin ulu bk i chn xon ti buxl jachan an uxum;

ani in l jeye kin ulu bk i pakdha takix. B xi jachan an pakdha takix oknkich ti takix, jn, jaich xi xo kwajat ti takix ani xi jn, yabl in bajmal an kij xowki neech ti takix. Por tam ka takxinich xi bl u kibel, yab neech ti takix nakat i kij.
An atax xi ejatwiik ani xo yabich, jaich in waxiklb an pakdha takix; ani jaich jeye jn ti b xi bk an takixtsik xi neech ka petn ban kibeltalb.

Xi lju in ichm an atax xa chumal, in l kin ulu lju i pakdha takix xi yabl in tujmal ti takix; por neech ka pidhan ti awiltalb abal ti takix jun ora, jelt xan tu takix an pakdha takix. Neech ti takixtsik junax kal an atax.
Jech lju an pakdha takix, junini tin kooltsik nin chalab ani neech kin watbantsitsik an atax an ti chplb ani an ti awiltalb xi jajtsik in kool.

Neech ti pjxtsik kal an Ajtiklb xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, por neech ka ttsik kal an Ajtiklb; pos Jaj, jaich in Ajtik an ajtiklbtsik ani in Pulek Takxal an pakdha takix. Xi kwajattsik kal an Ajtiklb, kanidhtsik ani takudhtsik kal a Dios ani lujattsik.
Tin utsa jeye ench an tokat abatwle: —An ja xa chumal, xon ti buxl jachan an uxum, i bitsowtsik, yn i atiklbtsik ani i atiklbtsik xi keetich keetich i kwintalbtsik in kool.
Xi lju an ichamtsik xa chuu ani an atax, neech ka pojk kl jachan an uxum ani neech ka jilan walbadh ani chilim. Neech ka kaptsin an tin tul ani neech ka tsikan.
Kwajbantsidhtsik bin ejattal kal na Dios abal kin tajatsik xowa Jaj in l. In tajmtsik i kw abal kin pidha ti awiltalb an atax ka takxin asta ka tjan xowa in ulmal na Dios.
An uxum xa chuu, jaich an yejche bitsow xin takyal an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl.
Tam ti watch jech, u chuu jun jun i tokat abatwle ti pal walki kal yantam i awiltalb ani in tajbay an chabl kal nin tajx.
Ani in ulu kawidh ench: —Pakwatich, pakwatich, an yejche bitsow Babilonia, xi wenkodhich tin kim i atax ejattalbtsik, tin chinkontal xowakich i atax ejattalbtsik ani tin pkw i chichintsik xi atax.

Abal ejtal an atiklbtsik, ukpindhats kal an walastalb xin tajl; an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl, in wwnmaltsik xowa yab alwa in tajl ani an njultsik xi kwajat ban chabl tumnladhnktsik kal xowa in pakwal yab exbadh jachan an yejche bitsow.

U acha tm jun jun i kwintalb xi tl walki xin ulal ench: —Ki kaletsik ba jachan an bitsow, tattsik xi Nan tu dhabal, abal yab ki walbintsik kal nin walab nibal ka bachutsik an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi neech kin bachutsik.
Pos nin walabtsik jachan an yejche bitsow, yanenekich tajat ani in bajmalich asta walki. Jaxtm na Dios ti neech kin pidha ti kakadh yajtsiktalb abal yanenekich tajat ni walab.
Ka tajtsi jachan an yejche bitsow anlki xan tin tajtsmal xi keettsik ani chbl ti ka tajtsi xowa in tajmal. Chbl ti ka tajtsin an ti yajtsiktalb xowa in tajtsmaltsik keet.

Kom jaj in tekmal tajat tinb ani kwajinek xan ti jaj in lenmal, ka pidhan ti yajtsiktalb ani ka ukindh, pos jaj in ulal ench tin itsch: “Tech in buxl jelti jun i pulek takix mmlb, yab in chemtsidh nibal neech ku acha i tepintalb.”

Jaxtm, junki a kts ti neech kin chuu ejtal jech an kakadh yajtsiktalb: an cheml, an tepintalb ani an kanab. Neech ka tsikan, pos ejtal in ejtowal kin taja na Dios an Okxlb, xi kl ti bijtsidh xowa neech kin tamu jech an yejche bitsow.

An pakdha takix xin wwnmaltsik xowa yab alwa in tajl jachan an bitsow ani kwajinektsik xan ti jajkitsik in kulbetnmal, neech kin ukintsi ani neech kin tepintsi tam kin chutsi an tin pawil tam exom ti tal.

Neech kin w telaki abal in jiknltsik an yajtsiktalb xi exom in tamwal jech an yejche bitsow ani neech kin ulutsik ench: —Chojontl in chubl jech an yejche bitsow Babilonia xi likat tajat! Pos jnki a kts ti pidhan ejtal xowa bijtsidh neech kin tamu.
An njultsik xi kwajat ban chabl, neech kin ukintsi ani kin tepintsi jech an bitsow abal yabich neech ka wachin xita kl ti ka chaytsintsik an tin nujwl.

Xowa in nujwaltsik, jaich an oro, an plata, an labidh tujubtsik, an perla, an alwa kudhkumtsik xi biliy, an kudhkum xi tajadh kal i seda, xi chakni ani xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn. Ejtal jeye an tetsik xi niwiy, ejtal xowa tajadh kal i marfl, xowa tajadh kal i tetsik xi labidh. Xowa tajadh jeye kal i patl xin bij bronse ani kal i tujub xin bij mrmol.

In nujwaltsik jeye i kanela, xowakich i chojltsik xi niwiy, i ikob, i mirra, i niwiytalbtsik, i yajtsik uxnl, i asyte, i trigo xi cheedh ani xi putdha. In nujwaltsik jeye i konltsik xu kitandhb, i borregotsik, i bitsim, i karreta ani in nujwaltsik jeye i iniktsik abal ti jolib.
Neech kin utsatsik ench jachan an yejche bitsow: —Ejtal xowa a kulbetnl, xo yabich a kool ani ejtal xowa alwa ani labidh xa kymal, xo yabich ms jayki neech ka koy.

An njultsik xin nujmal ejtal jech ani tumnladhnktsik abal njlmadhtsik ba jech an yejche bitsow, neech kin w telaki abal in jiknltsik an yajtsiktalb xi exom in tamwal jech an yejche bitsow, neechtsik kin ukintsi ani kin tepintsi.

Neech kin ulutsik ench: —Chojontl in chubl jech an yejche bitsow! Xin junwalwiik jelti jun i mmlb xi xeketlidh kal i alwa kudhkum xi biliy ani chakni, ani xi tunuyich tajat kal in chkn. Xin kool jeye i kwajbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro, kal i labidh tujubtsik ani kal i perla;

abal jnki a kts ti kibchon ejtal xowa kajbidh in jalbl xin koolwiik! Ejtal xu beldhomtsik an ti pakdha tan, an bitswlomtsik xi neech ban tan, xu tojnaltsik ban tan ani ejtal xu tojnaltsik ban pujal, wmtsik.
Tam tin chutsitsik an tin pawil jech an yejche bitsow tam ti exom ti tal, in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Jowa bitsow waach xi neech kin junu jelti jech an yejche bitsow?
