In mujtsitsik ti pojodh in k abal kin xalka ke u tepinaltsik, ukintsik, tepintsik ani in ulutsik kawidh ench: —Chojontl in chubl jech an yejche bitsow! Pos kal an tumn xi waachwiik taja, tumnladhnktsik xin kool an pakdha tan ban pujal. Ani jnki a kts ti pakwat jech an yejche bitsow!

Por tattsik xi kwajat walki, xi dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, abatwletsik ani tiltsixtsik, ki kulbtsik kal tin kwenta xowa in tamu jech an yejche bitsow, pos na Dios in tajaich kin jalbiy xowa ti tajtsmaltsik jech an yejche bitsow.

Jun i likat tokat abatwle in dhaya tm jun i tujub, xin junwal jelti jun i yejche cha tujub, in petna ban pujal ani in ulu ench: —Anchan jeye ti neech ka petn an yejche bitsow Babilonia ani yab ms jayki neech ka witsiy ka chutat.

Yab ms jayki neech ka achatm ba jech an yejche bitsow ti tenyb an sn, ti jutsyb an chl ani an kornetatsik. Nibal ms neech ka wachin ba jech an yejche bitsow i tojnaltsik, nibal neech ka achatm an cha tujub ti chenb.

Yabich neech ka tajkan i kamal ba jech an yejche bitsow, nibal ms neech ka achatm ti tajnal i ajib jelti xu tajnal tam waach i tomkixtalb. Pos an njultsik xi njlmadhtsik tachan, jaichwiik xi ms tumnladhtsik tajat xi waach ban kayl ani a kambiymal ejtal an atiklbtsik kal na kambixtal.
Ba jech an yejche bitsow chemdhats xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios, i tiltsixtsik ani ejtal xi chemdhatstsik ban kayl.
Tam ti watch ejtal jech, u acha t walki jun i kawidh kwintalb jelt in kwintal yn i atiklbtsik xin ulal ench: Aleluya! An loeltalb, an labidh tokattalb ani an chplb, ni Diosil in dhabal,

pos Jaj in lujtalki tu ljundhax ani in tsubtalki. In pidha xowa in lujyal kin bachu an yejche bitsow Babilonia xin junwal jelti jun i yejche junkux inik uxum. Jech an yejche bitsow, in walbindhm an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban chabl kal an walastalb xi jaj in tajmal. Tajan kin jalbiy kal ni Diosil jech an yejche bitsow, nin chemtal nin tjontsixiltsik na Dios.
In ulutsik jeye ench: —Aleluya! An paw xu bolill tam exom ti tal jech an yejche bitsow, yab jayki neech ka kublan ti bolill.
Xi jun inik ch an yejcheltsik ani xi ch jeye ta ti kwajattsik ejat, tudhlan tm kututsik asta chabl, in kaknatsik na Dios xi buxl ban tokat kwajtalb ani in ulaltsik ench: —Aleluya! Anchan ka tjan!
Achatm tm jun i kwintalb xi kale ban tokat kwajtalb xin ulu ench: Ka kaknatsik ni Diosil, ejtal tattsik xa tjontsal ani xa jiknltsik, tsitsik ani pakdha.

U acha jeye jelt in kwintal yn i atiklbtsik, jelt xan tu bososl yn i waljatsik ani jelti tam u pknal kawidh i junkil xin ulaltsik ench: Aleluya! In tujch ti takix an Okxlb, ni Diosil xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.

Ku kulbch xo, ku kijidhmch ani ki kakna an Okxlb, pos in bajmalich an kij xowki an Ajtiklb ti neech kin utch kal Jaj an belomtsik jelt xan ti jun i kwitl u tomkinalich kal jun i tsidhan. An belomtsik, kwajatich tojojodh abal ka kwajay kal an Ajtiklb;
ani pidhnkich ka xeketlin kal i alwa kudhkum xi biliy, tokat ani chaxixl.  Pos an alwa kudhkum xi biliy, in l kin ulu nin lujat xechintal xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios.

Tin utsa tm ench an tokat abatwle: —Ka dhutsa ench: “Kijidh tajat abal xita xi kanidhtsik ban ajib tam an Ajtiklb kin utch an belomtsik abal ka kwajch kal Jaj.” Ani tin utsa jeye ench: —Jech jaich tsubax in kwintal a Dios.

In tudhlan tin tamt an tokat abatwle abal ku kakna, por jaj tin utsa ench: —Yab ka taja anchan; pos nan u tjontsalki neye na Dios jelti tat ani na at kidhbtsik xin belltsik xowa in lnmal na Jess. Tokotki na Dios ka kakna. Jachan an tsubaxtalb xowa in lnmal na Jess, jaich kl tu ijtsinal an tiltsixtsik.
U chuu tm jebl an walki ani xalkan jun i dhak bitsim. Xi ta ti punat taja, in bij Lujat ani Tsubax, kom Jaj in lujtalki tu ljundhom ani tu pjx.
Nin wal chaxixl tajat jelti an kamal, yn i kwetsotsik kwajbaxtalb in kwajbm bin k ani ta tin kool dhutsadh jun i bijlb xi tokotki Jaj in exll.
Xeketlidh kal jun i xeketlb xi choodh tajat kal i xich ani u bijyb tin Kwintal a Dios.
Wewkmte kal yn i soldadotsik xi tl walki, xeketlidhtsik kal i alwa kudhkum xi biliy, dhakni ani tokat ani punutsik kal i dhak bitsim.

Bin wi u kalel jun i wiidh macht abal kin takiy kl an atiklbtsik xi kl tu tomnb ani neech ti chapik takix. Jaj neech kin ljundhatsik jelt xan tin tajl an wtil uba xin watyal kal in akan ani neech kin taja kin watnatsik an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi tl bin chkub na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja.
Ani bin eblidh kudhkumil ani bin chejet, in nedhl dhutsadh jech an bijlb: “In Pulek Takxal i pakdha takix ani in Ajtik i ajtiklbtsik.”
U chuu tm jun jun i tokat abatwle xi ta ti kubat ba kts ani in utsa kawidh ench ejtal an chichintsik xi xeech ti jumuml: —Jala ani ki junkuntsik abal ta kapul ban kapxnich xi neech kin taja na Dios.

Abal ka kaptsitsik tin tul i pakdha takix, i oklek soldadotsik ani i likdha iniktsik. Abal ka kaptsitsik jeye tin tul i bitsim ani xi punattsik taja. Nin tul jeye i jolibtsik ani xi yaba; xi tsitsik ani xi pakdha.
U chuu tm an atax ani an pakdha takix xi kwajat ban chabl kl nin soldadojiltsik, xi junkunktsik abal kin pjey xin pnm an dhak bitsim ani nin soldadojiltsik.

Yakwan an atax junax kal jachan an kambix tiltsix xin tajmal i labidh exltsik tin tamt jech an atax. Kal tin kwenta an exltsik xin tajm, an kambix tiltsix in kambiymal xin walkmaltsik ka kwajbantsat tin exlixtal an atax ani in kaknantsmal tin chilbil. An atax ani an kambix tiltsix, petntsik ejat ban kamal xi kwajat jomoml xukudh kal i asufre.
Xi ms, chemdhtsik kal an macht xu kalel bin wi xin pnm an dhak bitsim ani ejtal an chichintsik, ajw kal nin tul xi chemdhtsik.
Tayl u chuu ti pal walki jun i tokat abatwle xin tsidhl an japixtalb abal kin japiy an owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk ani in teykm jun i yejche patl.
Jech an tokat abatwle in yakwa an yejche aknidh chan, xi jaich an weje chan xu bijyb ti lej atax ani ta Satans ani in wika kal an patl tin nakl mil i tamub.

An tokat abatwle in petna an yejche aknidh chan ban owtsiktalb xi yab in kool in okontal in wtsk. Taja tin mapuy ani in pajkintsi an ti wileb abal yabich ms kin kambiy an atiklbtsik asta ka watey xi mil i tamub. Tayl, tam ka watch xi mil i tamub, neech ka walk w i kij.

U chuu jeye i tokat kwajtalbtsik ani buxkan taja xi pidhantsik ti awiltalb ti ljundhom. U chuu jeye nin ejattaltsik xi kotsidhtsik tin k kal tin kwentaki abal in belltsik xowa in lnmal na Jess. Jajtsik yab in kaknmal an atax, nibal in kaknantsmal an tin chilbil, nibal in walkmaltsik ka kwajbantsat tin exlixtal an atax bin pkib o bin kubak. U chuu ke ejechtsik ti t ani takxin tin nakl mil i tamub junax kal na Kristo.
Jech jaich tin jidhtal ti ejech ti t an chemlomtsik. Por xi keet an chemlomtsik yab ja ejechtsik ti t, asta tam ka watch xi mil i tamub.

Kijidh tajat ani tokodhich kal na Dios, xi neech ka ejech tam ka ejdh tin jidhtal an chemlomtsik! Jechtsik, yabich ja neech ka chemech tin chabtal. Jajtsik neech ti ple abal na Dios ani abal na Kristo ani neech ka kwajaytsik ti takix kal na Kristo tin nakl mil i tamub.
Tam ka watch xi mil i tamub, an lej atax neech ka walk xon tu kyb balidh,

ani neech ka kale kin kambiy ejtal an atiklbtsik xi kwajat ban kayl. Neech kin kambiy na Gog ani na Magog, neech kin junku an soldadotsik abal ti pjx. Nin yanl, in junwal jelti an kidhib xi waach ban pujal.
Kaletsik putl in chikwl an chabl, in wiliytsik xon ti kwajat xu dhabalbichtsik kal na Dios ani an bitsow xu kanidhb tajat kal na Dios. Por petnantsattsik ti kamal kal na Dios ani ejtal taaytsik.
Ani an lej atax, xi kl ti kambidhtsik, petn ban kamal xi xukudh kal i asufre, xon ti petnadhtsik an atax ani an kambix tiltsix. Taja neech ti yajlombdhbtsik akal i kij malill i kij.
U chuu tm jun i yejche dhak tokat kwajtalb ani xi ta ti buxl taja. Tin tamt Jaj, wixkin an chabl ani an walki ani yab elan n w xon ti ka kwajb an chabl ani an walki.

U chuu an chemlomtsik, tsitsik ani pakdha, kubutsik tin tamt na Dios. Welan tm an dhutsadh wtsik ani welan jeye jn xi jaich xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bij xi neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. An chemlomtsik, ljundh kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmaltsik, xantiki ti kwajat dhutsadh ba jachan an dhutsadh wtsik.

An pujal in pidhna an chemlomtsik xi taja tin kool, an cheml ani xon tu ulel an chemlomtsik, in pidhnatsik jeye xi taja tin kool. Ejtal an chemlomtsik, ljundh juntsik ti juntsik kal tin kwenta xowa in tajmal.
An cheml ani xon tu ulel an chemlomtsik, petn ban kamal. Jech, jaich nin chabtal an cheml.
Taja jeye ti petn xi yabtsik eltsin dhutsadh tin bij xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bijtsik xi neech kin bachutsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.
U chuu tm jun i t walki ani jun i t chabl; pos an jidhtal walki ani an jidhtal chabl, wixkin ani yabich wachin an pujal.
Nan, xu bij Juan, u chuu an tokat bitsow ti pal walki tojojodh tajat, jelti jun i tsidhan xi kwajat tojojodh abal neech ti tomkinal. Jech an bitsow, jaich an t Jerusaln xi abnadh kal na Dios.
Ani u acha jun i kawidh kwintalb xi tl walki xin ulu ench: —Ka tela, na Dios kwajatich xo kal an iniktsik. An iniktsik neech ka kwajay tin bitswil na Dios ani Jaj, neech ka kwajay tin Diosil.
Neech ka kwitsintsik tin jaml nin wal kal na Dios ani yabich neech ka wachin i cheml, nibal i ukil, nibal i tepintalb, nibal i yajal; pos ejtal xowa xi waachwiik, watch.
In ulu tm ench xi ta ti buxl ban tokat kwajtalb: —Nan u tajl ti t ejtal xowakich. In ulu jeye ench: —Ka dhutsa, pos ejtal jech xowa u ulal, tsubax ani awil ka belan.

Tayl tin utsa ench: —Tajadhich ti kwajat. Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal, xi okox ani tayl. Xita u tsikl, neech ku pidha an ti ja xu kalel xon tu kalel an ja xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech kin jalbiy ni jun xata.
Xita kin kuxuy ejtal xowakich kal Nan tu kwenta ani yab kin jila ti kin bela, neech ku pidha ejtal xowa u kool; neech kin kwajay tin Dios kal jaj ani jaj neech ka kwajay tu chakmil.

Por xi jikelomtsik, xi yabtsik u belom, xi pojkantltsik, xu chemdhaxtsik, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, xu dhimantsik, xin kaknltsik i chilab ani ejtal xu kambixtsik, neech ka kaletsik ban kamal xi kwajat jomoml xukudh kal i asufre. Jech jaich an cheml xin chabtal.

Tsch tm xon tin kwajat jn ti b xi bk an tokat abatwletsik xi twiik tin teykm jn xi bk an lejab tsutsat kal jn xi bk an kakadh yajtsiktalb xi tin okontal ani tin utsa ench: —Jala ani neech tu ltsi xi neech kin tomikna an Ajtiklb. Jech an Ajtiklb, jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios.

Ban xalkantsixtalb xi tin pidha ku chuu an Tokat Ejattalb, an tokat abatwle tin jna ba jun i yejche tekat chn ani tin xalkantsi an ti yejche tokat bitsow Jerusaln xi kwajat ti pal walki xi tl ba na Dios.
Jachan an bitsow, chaxixl kal nin tajx na Dios ani nin chaxixltal in junwal jelti jun i labidh tujub xu bijyb ti jaspe, tajujl jelti lam.

Malill jachan an bitsow, mapudh kal jun i mapuxtalb plek ani tekat. In kool lajuchb i wileb ani ba juntsik an wileb, kubutsik juntsik i tokat abatwle. Ba juntsik an wileb, dhutsadh juntsik i bijlb, xi jaich xi lajuchb nin chakmiltsik na Israel.
x i wileb kwajat in lujtal xon tu kalel na kts, x jeye ebl, x all ani x, in lujtal xon tu ochel na kts.
Nin mapl an bitsow aknidh kal lajuchb i tujubtsik ani ban tujubtsik, kwajat dhutsadh nin bij xi lajuchb nin abatwlejiltsik an Ajtiklb.
An tokat abatwle xi kwajat ti tilom kal nan, in teykm jun i lejbaxtalb xi tajadh kal i oro abal kin lejbay an bitsow, nin wilbiltsik ani nin mapl.

An bitsow, ch in waltsik in kool, nin nakl ani nin chikwl junax aniki. An tokat abatwle in lejbay an bitsow kal an lejbaxtalb ani chab mil lju inik i kilmetro ti lejban; nin nakl, nin tekl ani nin chikwl, junax aniki.
Tayl in lejbantsi jeye an tin mapl, ox inik ch i metro ti lejban. Jech an lejbaxtalb xin yna an tokat abatwle, jaich an lejbaxtalb xin ynl an iniktsik.
An mapuxtalb, tajadh kal i tujub xu bijyb jaspe ani an bitsow, kal i mapal oro ti tajadh, in junwal jelti jun i lam xi tokat.
Nin akan an mapuxtalb, labidhmdhats kal xowakich i labidh tujubtsik: nin jidhtal, kal i jaspe; nin chabtal, kal i safiro; nin oxtal, kal i gata; nin chetal, kal i esmeralda;

nin botal, kal i nise; nin akaklb, kal i kornalina; nin bklb, kal i krislito; nin waxiklb, kal i berilo; nin beljulb, kal i topasio; nin ljutal, kal i krisoprasa; nin lajujuntal, kal i jasinto ani nin lajuchabtal, kal i amatista.
Xi lajuchb an wileb, i labidh tujubtsik xu bijyb ti perla; juntsik an wileb, kal juntsik i perla ti tajadh. Ani an pulek bl xi kwajat ba jachan an bitsow, tajadh kal i mapal oro jelti lam xi tajujl.
Ba jachan an bitsow, yab u chuu ni jun i pulek at xon tu kaknb na Dios, pos an Okxlb, na Dios xi ejtal in ejtowal kin taja, Jajich na kwajat jelti an at xon ti Jaj u kaknb ani an Ajtiklb jeye.
An bitsow yab in yntsal ka tajbayat kal a kts nibal kal a ch, pos u tajbayb kal nin tajx na Dios ani an Ajtiklb, xi jaich jelti an borrego xu pikbantsb na Dios, jaich nu tajaxtalb.
An atiklbtsik xi loodhich, neech ka xechintsik bin tajx jachan an bitsow ani an pakdha takix xi ban kayl, neech kin jnatsik taja i chejwalixtalb ani neech kin kaknatsik na Dios.
Nin wilbiltsik yab jayki neech ka mapyat, pos taja yab neech ka jikwchin.
Ejtal an atiklbtsik, neech kin jna taja i alwa chejwalixtalb ani neech kin kaknatsik na Dios.

Yab jayki neech ka ochich taja xowa yab alwa, xowa atax nibal xu kambixtsik. Tokot neech ka ochichtsik taja xi kwajat dhutsadh nin bij bin dhutsadh wil an Ajtiklb. Jech an dhutsadh w, jaich xon ti dhutsadh xi neech kin koytsik an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal.

An tokat abatwle tin ltsi tm jun i alabl walja ani an ja xi waach taja, jaich xin pidhnl i xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Jech an ja, tajujl jelti lam ani u kalel bin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani ban Ajtiklb.

Junax chejel ban pulek bl xi kwajat ba jachan an bitsow ani jun pake jun pake tin waltsik an walja, taja ti kubat an te xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal, xu walim lajuchbl ti tamub. ch ta ch u walim ani nin xekltsik alwa abal ka jeldh kl an atiklbtsik.
Yabich neech ka wachin xata xi bijidh ke neech ka kale ban kibeltalb. Nin tokat kwajtal na Dios ani an Ajtiklb, taja neech ka kwajay ba jachan an bitsow ani neech ka kakn kal nin tjontsixiltsik.
Neech ka chutat kal nin tjontsixiltsik ani neech kin kontsitsik an tin bij ba nin pkib.

Taja yab neech ka jikwchin. Xi neech ka kwajaytsik taja, yab neech kin yntsitsik i tajbaxtalb, nibal nin tajx na kts. Pos neech ka tajbayattsik kal na Dios, an Okxlb ani neech ti takixtsik malill i kij.

Tin utsa jeye ench an tokat abatwle: —Ejtal jech xowa u ulal, tsubax ani awil ka belan. An Okxlb, na Dios xin ijtsal an tiltsixtsik, in abnmal nin tokat abatwlejil abal kin xalkantsi nin tjontsixiltsik xowa neech ka tmun kunat i kij.
—Kunat i kij neech kin tsch! Kijidh abal xita xin tajl xowa in ulal nin tsubaxtalbil na Dios xi kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w!
Nan, xu bij Juan, u acha ani u chuu ejtal jech. Tam tu achmalich ani u chumalich, in tudhlan tin tamt an tokat abatwle xi tin xalkantsmal jech abal ku kakna.

Por jaj tin utsa ench: —Yab ka taja anchan, pos nan u tjontsalki neye na Dios jelti tat ani na at kidhbtsik an tiltsix ani ejtal xin tajltsik xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w. Tokotki na Dios ka kakna.
Tin utsa jeye ench: —Yab ka china xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w, pos kunatich xowki neech ka tmun jech.

Xita xin tajltsik xowa yab lujat, jila kin ntsi kin tajatsik xowa yab lujat; xi ataxtsik, jila kin ntsi kin taja xowa atax. Por xi lujattsik, kin ntsi kin taja xowa lujat ani xi tokodhichtsik kal na Dios, kin ntsi kin toko tinb.
—Kunat i kij neech kin tsch ani neech ku tsidha an chejwalixtalb xi neech tu pidha juntsik ta b, kal tin kwenta xowaki a tajmaltsik.
Nanich nin tujtal ani nin okontal, xi okox ani xi tayl.
Kijidh xita exomtsik in tokwal tinb abal kin ejtotsik ka utey xon ti kwajat an te xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani abal kin ejtotsik ka ochich bin wilbil an bitsow.
Por xi ataxtsik, xu dhimantsik, xu junkunaltsik kal xi yab in tomtal, xu chemdhaxtsik, xin kaknltsik i chilab ani ejtal xin kulbetnltsik ti kambix, elb neech ka jilkon.
—Nan, xu bij Jess, u abmal nu tokat abatwlejil abal kin ltsi jech ejtal an belomtsik. Nanich nin tujtal ani nin kidhtal an pulek takix Dabid. Nanich nin kwajat jelti na pulek t xu kalel tam dhajaw.

An Tokat Ejattalb ani an belomtsik, in ulaltsik ench: —Jala. Xita kin acha, kin ulu jeye: —Jala. Xita u tsikl, ka tsch ani kin ucha an ja xin pidhnl an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal ani yab neech kin jalbiy ni jun xata.

Ejtaltsik xin achl xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w, u utsltsik ench: Max jun xita kin puntsiy xowa j kwajat dhutsadh, neech jeye tm ka pidhan kal na Dios an ti kakadh yajtsiktalb xi kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w.

Ani max jun xita kin wkoy jun xata xowa kwajat dhutsadh ba jech an dhutsadh w, neech jeye ka wkontsat tin bij kal na Dios ban dhutsadh w xon ti kwajat dhutsadh nin bijtsik xi neech kin bachu an xechintalb xi yab in kool in okontal. Yab neech ka walk ka ochich ban tokat bitsow xi kwajat in till jech an dhutsadh w.
An Ajtiklb, xin lnl jech, in ulal ench: —Tsubax u ulal abal kunat i kij neech kin tsch. Anchan ka tjan. Ki tsch, Ajtiklb Jess!
Ka bachwaltsik echeki nin alwatal ni Ajtik Jesukristo. Anchan ka tjan.
